translation.lb: Monsieur le Rédacteur, J'étais tout dehors de la maisonette quand j'ai lu la commune lettre de mon garçon d'apprentissage dans votre feuille.
translation.en: Mr. Editor, I was completely outside the small house when I read the public letter from my apprentice boy in your paper.

translation.lb: Au dessus de ce qu'il vous écrit là, j'allumerai par vous faire quelques partages-avec.
translation.en: Beyond what he has written to you there, I will add by sharing a few comments.

translation.lb: Ils est pris dehors cette hors-recherchée communauté de dire qu'il a déjà envoyé dedans beaucoup d'articles de feuilles de journal et qu'il veut se faire d'aujourd'hui poseur-d'écriture.
translation.en: He has taken outside this under-appreciated community to say that he has already sent many newspaper articles and wishes to make himself into a kind of writer today.

translation.lb: Je le lui combats contre, s'il peut écrire justement deux rangées, car il fait toujours des boucs dans l'écriture-droite.
translation.en: I challenge him against this, if he can actually write just two lines, for he always makes errors in straightforward writing.

translation.lb: Il a sa vie jaihais appris pas le français; les paires de bouchées qu'il a ramassées sur sont de ma femme; car il lui est toujours allé dans 1a- cuisine.
translation.en: Throughout his life he has hardly learned French; the bits he has picked up are from my wife; because he always went into the kitchen to her.

translation.lb: Elle a si une légère langue, que quand elle est une fois en fleuve, personne ne peut plus la tenir-sur.
translation.en: She has such a loose tongue that once she starts talking, nobody can stop her.

translation.lb: Ce garçon-de-pàturage m'a dit une têtede-brebis; je ne veux pas le chercher-sur auprès le rectificateur de paix; mais je lui montrerai la tête-de-brebis.
translation.en: This young pasture-boy called me a sheep head; I don't want to complain about him to the peace officer; but I will show him the sheep head.

translation.lb: Il peut aussi se tenir-en-huit, car si je lui viens dedans la chevelure alors il y donnera de la poussière, et il en recevera de vieux sur la gueule; je le rangerai qu'il ne sera plus bon pour aller escrimer.
translation.en: He can also watch out, because if I get into his hair, he will get dust, and he will get old on his face; I will fix him up so he will be no good for sparring anymore.

translation.lb: Tout le monde sait qu'il est un souffreur de faim, un voleur-de-jour, un jeune hommede-chien, qu'il n'a pas de la formation, et qufil n'en recevra aucune de sa vie.
translation.en: Everyone knows that he is a hungry sufferer, a daytime thief, a young man of no good, that he has no education, and will receive none in his life.

translation.lb: Il ne faut pas donner commun avec de vieuxdebout-gens, car le mot-de-parole dit: Estimez l'âge, afin que vous viviez long sur terre.
translation.en: One should not mingle with old standing people, for the saying goes: Respect age, so that you may live long on earth.

translation.lb: La rage me mange le cœur, je ne peux plus voiturer plus long; et je ferme pour aujourd'hui tout en vous pressant dehors ma haute attention, Atlion Brissol, tailleur d'hommes et confectioneur d'enfants.
translation.en: Rage eats my heart, I can no longer carry on; and I close for today while pressing upon you my highest attention, Atlion Brissol, tailor of men and maker of children.

translation.lb: An der Buvette. De Jang: „Éch wéss net wé dât ass; éch dokteren an éch dokteren, an emmer get méng Nûos mé rôt."
translation.en: At the tavern. Jang: "I don't know how it is; I doctor and I doctor, and yet my nose gets even redder."

translation.lb: De Charel: „Jo bei dir kann dât net fill hèllefen, éch wesst nemmen é Mettel fir déch."
translation.en: Charel: "Well, with you that can't help much, I only know one remedy for you."

translation.lb: De Jang: „An dât wir?"
translation.en: Jang: "And that would be?"

translation.lb: De Charel: „Drénk bis se blô get."
translation.en: Charel: "Drink until it turns blue."

translation.lb: Fir neischt.
translation.en: For nothing.

translation.lb: D'Koh muss aus dem Stall, éch gin net mé drân.
translation.en: The cow has to leave the stable, I won't go in anymore.

translation.lb: Dât hûot dén ârme Méchel schons fir d'dausenstmol missen héere fun sénger Prâ.
translation.en: That's what poor Michel has had to hear for the thousandth time from his wife.

translation.lb: E wosst et jo ganz gut, séng „Blèss" wor âl, schon zenter lang hûot se kèng Melléch mé gin, an ail Dâg ass se mé môer gin.
translation.en: He knew very well that his 'Blèss' was old, for a long time it hasn't given any milk, and each day it's going downhill.

translation.lb: Endléch, en hât dès Spetakel genoch, höllt en se an de Strack an e féert se op den Ettelbrécker Mârt; mè emesoss, kê wollt em s'ofkâfen, kê Jud a kê Krescht.
translation.en: Finally, he had enough of the spectacle, puts her in the leash and drives her to the Ettelbruck market; but in vain, no Jew or Christian wanted to buy her.

translation.lb: An de Mârt war eriwer, an hién hât séng Blèss nach.
translation.en: And the market was over, and he still had his Blèss.

translation.lb: Traurég gong en hêm.
translation.en: Sadly he went home.

translation.lb: Ennerwé kent nach den Hènnes bei en.
translation.en: On the way, Hennes still comes to him.

translation.lb: Dém klot e nun sei Lêd: Kuckt Hènnes, eist Lies, dir wesst jo, esö gut wé et ass, esö béss kann et och gin; et ass em Stand et schlét méch döt, wann éch mat dém ferwenschte Yéh hêm kommen.
translation.en: To him he now laments his sorrow: Look, Hennes, our trouble, you know, as good as it is, it can also be bad; it's likely it will kill me if I come home with this cursed beast.

translation.lb: E' lamentéert nach, du spréngt èng Mök iwert de Wé: Hènnes, jeitzt de Méchel, wanns du de Mök do fröss, da kriss de méng Köh!
translation.en: He's still lamenting, when a frog hops across the road: Hennes, shouts Michel, if you eat that frog, you'll get my cow!

translation.lb: Den Hènnes spréngt dur, ergreift d'Mök a beisst de Kapp erôf.
translation.en: Hennes jumps over, grabs the frog and bites its head off.

translation.lb: Mais den Appetit lésst e bâl am Stéch.
translation.en: But his appetite soon leaves him in the lurch.

translation.lb: Kuck Méchel, mèngt en, wanns du de Rèscht elo éss, da krisst du déng Köh erem.
translation.en: Look Michel, he says, if you eat the rest now, you'll get your cow back.

translation.lb: De Méchel hât schons Angscht kriet, wé den Hènnes esö séer zögebasst hât, en hât schons hirt Lies gesin op hién dursprangen.
translation.en: Michel was already frightened when Hennes bit so fiercely, he had already seen his trouble jumping at him.

translation.lb: Durfir höllt hién elo den Hènnes beim Wûort, an e wirgt an e wirgt biss en dé âner Halschécht fun der Mök am Mô hât.
translation.en: So he now holds Hennes to his word, and he struggles and struggles until he has the other half of the frog in his mouth.

translation.lb: Rôhég, öne e Wûort ze schwètzen, gin se firun, de Méchel hât jo séng Köh erem.
translation.en: Calmly, without saying a word, they go on, Michel has his cow back.

translation.lb: Endléch bleiwt de Méchel stoen, hie kuckt den Hènnes mat grossen Aen un, a sét: Hènnes, fir wât hu mer eigentléch dé Mök gefriéss?
translation.en: Finally Michel stops, looks at Hennes with big eyes, and says: Hennes, why did we actually eat the frog?

translation.en: The lady: How much is the rabbit here?

translation.en: The vendor: Three francs, madame.

translation.lb: D'Madame: Dât ass fill ze deier, sot.
translation.en: The lady: That is much too expensive, she said.

translation.en: The vendor: Too expensive!

translation.en: A witty butcher comes in who always teases other people.

translation.lb: De Grosse kent zur Dir eran, an de klèngen sötzt do, de Kapp an den Hènn a grommelt wé e' rosenen Hond ■ dêm ên èng Schank ofhuole wellt.
translation.en: The tall one comes through the door, and the little one sits there, head in hands, grumbling like an angry dog whose bone is being taken away.

translation.lb: De Grossen: A wat ass da nêss geschit, Klèngen?
translation.en: The tall one: And what has happened now, Little one?

translation.lb: De Klèngen: Du wôss jo, éch Hu,jo esô èrig schén, nei Polica gemacht a' 7 Mént dru geschafft fir dé Partitur ohné Féhler fèrdég ze bréngen, an elo sohn se alleguort am Gronn éch wir et net elèng gewiéscht, et hètten âner mer dru geholef.
translation.en: The little one: You know, I was so eager, made a new piece, worked 7 months to complete the score without mistakes, and now they all say around here that I didn't do it alone, that others helped me.

translation.lb: De Grössen: A wié sét dann dât?
translation.en: The tall one: And who says that?

translation.lb: De Klèngen: Majo méng léf Mamm, dé Rödebergei, onse Jang etc.
translation.en: The little one: Well, my dear mother, the Rödebergei, our Jang, etc.

translation.lb: De Grössen: Wé ass dann den Titel fun der Polica?
translation.en: The tall one: What's the title of the piece then?

translation.lb: De Klèngen: ©inc Dîadjt beim Sic&djen allein.
translation.en: The little one: A Diet at the Sewing alone.

translation.lb: De Grössen: Oho, dat ass jo e schénen Titel.
translation.en: The tall one: Oh, that's a nice title.

translation.lb: De Klèngen: D'Musik ass nach mé schén, dûorfir gin éch nemme rosen driwer, ewèll èng Arbecht wô ên esô lang 110 der Arbechtzeit sech geplôt hûot, behèllt och gèr de Lûof fir sech; ech géf nach net esô bés wann se net sohn géwen éch hètt Nöten gemacht, an den Zetter, den Tyroler, de Misch, de Bartschossel, de Battis, dé hètte Schwentz un d'Noten gemacht; t'ass jo fir an e Grêf ze lâfen.
translation.en: The little one: The music is even more beautiful, therefore I won't get angry about it, because work that someone labored over so long during working hours deserves to have credit; I'd still not be so mad if they hadn't said I'd made mistakes and that Zetter, Tyroler, Misch, Bartschossel, Battis, they added tails to the notes; it's enough to drive one to the grave.

translation.lb: De Grössen: Dât ass neischt, soh einfach zu dém, dén der et r.et wellt gléwen, e soll bei dech hêm kommen, du déts em d'ganz Partitur weisen; ech wètten mat dir, et kent kên, ewèll si wessen dass du e gude Musikant bass.
translation.en: The tall one: That's nothing, just tell them, those who don't want to believe it, to come to your home, and you show them the whole score; I bet with you, no one will come because they know you are a good musician.

translation.lb: De Klèngen: Dât ass och wder, mais méng Mamm soll de Mont hâlen.
translation.en: The little one: That's also true, but my mother should keep quiet.

translation.en: Madame N. went to visit her good friend, Madame X., and she talked about this and that, among others about her little Albert who is so nice and well-mannered.

translation.lb: Le petit gamin entre tout-à-coup et sa maman lui dit de vouloir dire bonjour à Madame N.
translation.en: The little boy suddenly enters and his mother tells him to say hello to Madame N.

translation.lb: „ Est-ce que je connais cette étrangèrelà?" riposta Albert.
translation.en: "Do I know this stranger?" replied Albert.

translation.lb: De Jampier: Hûos du schons gehéert, dass se dem „Grosse Jang" èng Statue zu Strossen oprîehte wollen?
translation.en: Jampier: Have you already heard that they want to erect a statue of 'Great Jang' in Strossen?

translation.lb: De Néckel: Ma nên, a' wûofir dât dann? an nach zu Strossen?
translation.en: Neckel: No, and why that? And in Strossen no less?

translation.lb: sie sténg dach bèsser an der Millebach beim Demm, wo de Rödebirger och elo e' Monument opgerîcht krit, wann de Plang derfu bei der Obrigkêt approuvéert ass.
translation.en: It would stand better in Millebach near the Dam, where the Rödebirger will also soon have a monument erected, if the plan for it is approved by the authorities.

translation.en: Jampier: No, it must come to Strossen because he made himself famous at the fair.

translation.lb: De Néckel: A wât ass dann erem geschit?
translation.en: Neckel: And what happened again?

translation.en: Jampier: Listen, I'll tell you how the statue should be, then you'll understand the rest of the story.

translation.lb: De Sockel stellt 12 Mêdercher fir, dé hâle' gross Kîref an d'Lûcht an durop könnt de „Jang de Grossen" stôn,
translation.en: The pedestal represents 12 maidens who are holding big candles in the air, and on top stands 'Jang the Great.'

translation.en: Is it true that at the same time a truck went to Brussels to... transport grapes?

translation.lb: Eng kleng Fro un de Kadaster
translation.en: A small question for the cadastre

translation.lb: Zönter e puer Dég krit én an de Butiker nés nei Landkarten vum Letzeburger Land ze kafen, en Artikel, dén och am Krich verschwonne vvor.
translation.en: For a few days now one can buy again new maps of the Luxembourg land in the shops, an article that also disappeared during the war.

translation.lb: Mé et ass eppes sehe ns!
translation.en: But it is something worth seeing!

translation.lb: Ass et net me'glech, datt onse Kadaster eng nei Kârt eraus get matt letzebur-'esche Nim?
translation.en: Is it not possible that our cadastre releases a new map with Luxembourgish names?

translation.lb: Wann én am Kadaster e Gemengeplang geseit, da fönt én, datt ail de' verschidden Plazen matt letzeburgesche Nim agesa sin z.
translation.en: If one sees a municipal plan in the cadastre, they will find that all the different places are listed with Luxembourgish names, for example.

translation.lb: B. op der Meierchen, a Seitert, an de Wisen a. e. w.
translation.en: For example, at the Meierchen, in Seitert, in the meadows, etc.

translation.lb: Wann dat fir de' verschidden Plazen pje'glech ass, da könne mer och e Schrack me' weit goen an de' énzel Dicrfer och mam letzeburger Num nennen.
translation.en: If that is possible for different places, then we can take a step further and also call the individual villages by their Luxembourgish names.

translation.lb: Do breichten blo'ss de' -énzel Landçeometer de' verschidden Nimm an d'Stad ze Schecken fir de Fall, wo' mir se net all kenne ge'wen, an am Kadaster könnt dann de' ganz Sâch geännert gin.
translation.en: The individual land surveyors would only need to send the different names to the office in case we do not know them all, and then everything could be changed in the cadastre.

translation.lb: Elo könt jo ons Sprôch glecklechei brauch an da könt jo d'letzeburgesch Geographie op Grond vun der neier Laftdkart an der Scho'l grad eso' gudd op letzeburgesch gele'ert gin ewe' op deitsch.
translation.en: Now we can happily use our language and Luxembourgish geography could just as well be taught in schools based on the new maps as it is in German.

translation.lb: Ech mengen, et mecht de Kanner vill me' Spâss, wjin s'eso' an der Geographie eremrésen können; de' deitsch a franze'sch Nim le'eren se me' spe't.
translation.en: I think it would be much more fun for the children when they can find their way around geographically; they can learn the German and French names later.

translation.lb: Wat nun de' friem Touristen ubelângt, de' ons Sprôch net verstin, dat ass net schlöm, de' brauchen dach blo'ss hir Autoskârten ze huelen an de' sin all an enger friemer Sprôch gedreckt; a wa sie sech eng Ke'er net erömfannen, da froen se eben.
translation.en: As for foreign tourists who do not understand our language, that is not a problem, they just need to take their maps which are printed in a foreign language; and if they ever get lost, they can just ask.

translation.lb: Dé Fall hu mir jo elo all Dag mat den Amerikaner.
translation.en: We experience this case every day now with the Americans.

translation.lb: Nun nach eppes: Ass et net me'glech, datt am Kadaster eng Kartote'k ugeluegt get matt allen Nim aus dem ganze Land, a wo' é ka gesin, wo' den Enzeinen seng verschidden Heiser leien huet.
translation.en: Now something else: Is it not possible that a card catalog could be set up in the cadastre with all the names from the whole country, where one can see where each individual has their different houses?

translation.lb: Wann én en extrait frét, an et wéss én net, datt ausser engem Haus zu Letzeburg "nach én anert zu Hâssel ass, da get dat zwét net op de relevé gesät.
translation.en: If one requests an extract and does not know that besides a house in Luxembourg City "there is another one in Hassel, then the second one is not recorded in the report.

translation.lb: Fir de Moment ass net zevill Arbecht an déne verschiddene Büroen (Mutatio'nen si rar), op der aner Seit hu mir vill jong Leit.
translation.en: At the moment, there is not too much work in the various offices (changes are rare), on the other hand, we have many young people.

translation.lb: dé* keng Arbecht fannen.
translation.en: who cannot find work.

translation.lb: Et war vleicht elo de Moment fir de' Kartote'k unzeléen, resp. de Kadaster ewe'neg ze modernise'eren.
translation.en: It might be the moment now to set up the card catalog, or to modernize the cadastre a bit.

translation.lb: Nie. Jacoby, commerçant, Letzeburg, press- a propagandawalter vun der DAF an an der NSDAP, go'f zu 8 joer prisong an 10 000 frang strof verurtélt.
translation.en: Nie. Jacoby, a businessman from Luxembourg, a press and propaganda officer of the DAF and a member of the NSDAP, was sentenced to 8 years in prison and fined 10,000 francs.

translation.lb: Vun denen anere beschëllegongen go'f hié freigesprach.
translation.en: He was acquitted of the other charges.

translation.lb: Ernst Kielhorn, techniker, Letzeburg, iwerfe'ert, kassewalter vun der DAF, blockhelfer an Zellenleiter vun der VdB an an der NSDAP gewiéscht ze sin an sech eng denunziatio'n zu schelle komme geiöss ze hun go'f zu 10 joer züchthaus an 10000 frang bo'sa vcrurtélt.
translation.en: Ernst Kielhorn, a technician from Luxembourg, was accused of being a treasurer of the DAF, a block helper and cell leader of the VdB and NSDAP, and for facilitating a denunciation, was sentenced to 10 years in a penal house and fined 10,000 francs.

translation.lb: E verle'ert d'letzeburgesch nationalite't.
translation.en: He loses his Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: De stémetzer Nie. Reiter vu Koplescht krut 2 joer prisong a 6000 fr. strof, well en an der NSDAP wor an de pompjéen befuel huet „Heil Hitler" ze man.
translation.en: The stonemason Nie. Reiter from Kopstal was sentenced to 2 years in prison and fined 6,000 francs because he was in the NSDAP and commanded the firefighters to say 'Heil Hitler'.

translation.lb: lleinrech Greisch vun De'fferdcng, stémetzer, hât d'uniform vun der NSKK gedroen a wor an deser organisation.
translation.en: Heinrich Greisch from Differdange, a stonemason, wore the NSKK uniform and was in this organization.

translation.lb: E go'f zu 9 me'nt prisong verurtélt.
translation.en: He was sentenced to 9 months in prison.

translation.lb: De werkschutzmann J. H. Thill, Esch-Alz., zellenleiter vun der NSV, blockwalter vum WHW, wor an der NSDAP an huet sech eng dénunziatio'n zu schelle komme geiöss, go'f zu 7 joer zûchthaus verurtélt, an d'letzeburgesch nationalite't go'f him entzun.
translation.en: The factory security officer J. H. Thill, from Esch-Alzette, a cell leader of the NSV and block warden of the WHW, was in the NSDAP and facilitated a denunciation, was sentenced to 7 years in a penal house, and his Luxembourg nationality was revoked.

translation.lb: Lucion Jakob, employé, De'fferdeng, iwerfe'ert ortspresse-, ortsgruppenleiter a ratsherr gewiéscht ze sin, go'f zu 4 jor prisong a 50 000 frang verurtélt.
translation.en: Lucion Jakob, an employee from Differdange, was accused of being a local press, local group leader, and councilman, was sentenced to 4 years in prison and fined 50,000 francs.

translation.lb: Leo Wagner, techniker, Béteburg, mitglied vun der NSDAP, bildstellenleiter vun der VdB, op den Hitler verédegt an u wehrmachtbetreuong délgeholl, go'f zu 5 joer prisong a 15000 frang bo'ss verurdélt.
translation.en: Leo Wagner, a technician from Bettembourg, a member of the NSDAP, director of the education department of the VdB, defended Hitler and participated in Wehrmacht support, was sentenced to 5 years in prison and fined 15,000 francs.

translation.en: Willibald Taschler, a painter from Bieles, was a squad leader in the NSKK and a works representative, wore the NSKK uniform and carried a weapon while spreading propaganda, he was sentenced to 10 years in a penal house and loses his Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: D’le’song vun der landarbechter-fro
translation.en: The solution to the issue of rural laborers

translation.lb: Et ass erwisen, datt dem bauer net arbechtskräfte genuch zur verfügong stin.
translation.en: It has been shown that farmers do not have enough labor available to them.

translation.lb: Waftir eng le'song ass vum Staat virgesin am fall, wo' de' preisesch krichsgefângen erem hém gin?
translation.en: What solution is foreseen by the state in the event that the Prussian prisoners of war are sent home?

translation.lb: Mir sin der ménong, datt aus dem géscht vun der solidarite't eraus, dé mir am krich eso' he'ch schätze gele'ert hun, e gemilderten arbechtsdengsc.ht bei de 1 summer- an hiérschtarbechten dem bauer vu gro'ssem notze war.
translation.en: We are of the opinion that, from the spirit of solidarity we have learned to appreciate so highly during the war, a relaxed labor service during summer and autumn work would be of great benefit to the farmer.

translation.lb: Domatt génge mir d'landflucht, de' spéziell durch de' schwe'er arbechtsconditio'nen um land bedéngt ass, andämmen, denen anere beruffer ower, we' arbechter a beamten, géng eng onne'deg konkurrenz erspuerl bleiwen.
translation.en: This would curb rural exodus, which is particularly caused by difficult working conditions in agriculture, while other professions like workers and civil servants would be spared unnecessary competition.

translation.lb: So' kënnte mir vleicht op de' auslännesch höllef zum gro'ssen dél verzichten an engem eventuellen arbeitslo'seproblém virbauen.
translation.en: Thus, we might be able to largely do without foreign help and prevent a potential unemployment problem.

translation.lb: De bauerebetrieb ge'w dodurch och me rentabel, an d'verbridderong vun déne verschiddene volleksschichten a beruffsklassen kënnt dobei nëmme gewannen, an d'land och.
translation.en: The farming business would thus become more profitable, and the fraternization of different social strata and professional classes would only benefit, as would the country.

translation.lb: * Mir fuerdere gesond, stabil a rentabel preisser, de' der schwe'erer a lângstënneger arbecht vum bauer entspriéchen.
translation.en: We demand healthy, stable, and profitable prices that correspond to the hard and laborious work of the farmer.

translation.lb: Eso' we' mir am Conseil Supérieur d'Economie fir eng vertriédong vun aile beruffsorganisatio'nen antriéden, de' net vum Staat dohi genannt gin, mé aus déne betreffende beruffsorganisatio'nen g e w i é 1 1 an dohi geschéckt gin als verteideger vun hiren intressen, grad eso' soll an dem Conseil Supérieur d'Economie och eng prozentual gleich stärk vertriédong vun der bauerencentral figure'- eren.
translation.en: Just as in the Conseil Supérieur d'Economie, we advocate for a representation of all professional organizations not appointed by the state, but chosen and sent by the relevant professional organizations as defenders of their interests, the agricultural centre should also have an equally strong proportional representation.

translation.lb: Duerfir verlange mir nach virun de wählen eng so'forteg unerkennong vun der Centrale paysanne.
translation.en: Therefore, we demand an immediate recognition of the farmers' union before the elections.

translation.lb: Zo'gleich ënnerstëtze mir voll a ganz de' fuerderongen, de' d'baueren-central de 16. September op der gro'sser baueremanifestatio'n opgestallt huet, an dèr si démols ëffentlech ge'nt d'bauerepolitik vun eiser regirong stellong geholl huet.
translation.en: At the same time, we fully support the demands made by the farmers' central committee on September 16 at the large farmers' demonstration, in which they publicly took a stand against the agricultural policy of our government.

translation.lb: Ail des fuerderongen entsprangen net enger opportunistescher, berechnender wahlpropaganda vu 5 minutte vir 12, mé si sin e kèrstéck vun dem sozialpolitesche programm vun der UNIO'N.
translation.en: All these demands do not arise from opportunistic, calculating election propaganda five minutes before midnight, but they are a cornerstone of the UNION's social-political program.

translation.lb: Krichsgefângener D'gemengeverwaltongcn, de' d'krichsgef&ngen, de' an der landwirtschaft beschäftegt sin, nach net beim akerbauministerium „Abteilung Kriegsgefangenendienst" gemellt hun, gln heimatt gebiéden, dat direct nozehuelen.
translation.en: Prisoners of war: The municipal administrations, whose prisoners of war are employed in agriculture and have not yet been reported to the Ministry of Agriculture 'Department of Prisoner of War Service', are hereby requested to do so immediately.

translation.lb: Etwaeg nodre'gleeh änneronge vu lëschten, de' schon ageschéekt si, müssen och nogeholl gin.
translation.en: Any subsequent changes to lists that have already been submitted must also be accounted for.

translation.en: How cold your hand presses on the forehead!

translation.en: Does perhaps death repay your suffering?

translation.lb: SEI LESCHTE BRE ’F Le'f Mamm! seat hun ech dax un dech geduecht Wa posten ech gestan a kaier nuecht!'
translation.en: Dear Mother! I have often thought of you when I stand post in the cold night!'

translation.lb: 'Ech hu gesi mech dann bei dir dohém, An nei erwâcht sin all meng kannerdrém:
translation.en: I have seen myself then at home with you, and all my childhood dreams have reawakened:

translation.lb: E"h hu gesi mech dann als klenge jong We' ech matt dir an onsem gârd do stong.
translation.en: I have seen myself then as a little boy standing with you in our garden.

translation.lb: An dir, o Mamm, a mengem kannergléck De' sche'nste blumm, de' sche'nste ro's gepléckt!
translation.en: And you, oh Mother, in my childhood happiness plucked the most beautiful flower, the most beautiful rose!

translation.lb: We' go'f et em dei Mammenhierz da warçi Wanns du dei jong geholl liues op den arm,
translation.en: How did the mother's heart then brighten when you held your young dear in your arms,

translation.lb: An him eng Ms op d'kannerstier hues gin...
translation.en: And gave him a kiss on the child's forehead...

translation.lb: 0 Mamm, nach ni könnt ech me' glécklech sin!...
translation.en: Oh Mother, I could never be happier!...

translation.lb: V ergângen ass nu läng dat gléck, de' fréd,
translation.en: The happiness, the peace is long gone now,

translation.lb: An iwer ddand ko'm krich an do'd a léd...
translation.en: And over there war and death and pain came...

translation.lb: Am hémechtsgârd do stét fir d'lescht dei kand.
translation.en: In the home garden there stands your child for the last time.

translation.lb: • Dréekt dir, matt enger bés, eng rö's an d'hand...
translation.en: Press a rose into one hand with a tear...

translation.lb: O kreisch net Mamm! ecli kommen dach geschwënn Gesond a monter nés bei dech crem!
translation.en: Oh, don't cry Mother! I will soon come back to you healthy and cheerful!

translation.lb: O kreisch net Mamm, a kränk och net dein hierz.
translation.en: Oh, don't cry Mother, and do not sicken your heart.

translation.lb: Du dre's.jo net eleng den de'we schmierz!...
translation.en: You do not carry the heavy pain alone!...

translation.lb: Dach sollt et ower Gottes wëlle sin Datt ech so' jonk mei liesven hir misst gin,
translation.en: But should it be God's will that I have to leave my life so young,

translation.lb: Da sief dat hei, o Mamm. mei leschte s_chwur:
translation.en: Then let this be here, oh Mother, my last vow:

translation.lb: Ech gin et gcr fir d'land dat mech gebuer!
translation.en: I give it for the country that gave birth to me!

translation.lb: Ech bleiwe bis zum do'd der hémecht trei,
translation.en: I will remain loyal to my home until death,

translation.lb: O ge'f se endlech, endlcch dach nés frei!
translation.en: Oh, if only they would finally, finally be free again!

translation.lb: A kënnt mam fridden d'freihét an onst land,
translation.en: And if freedom comes with peace to our country,

translation.lb: Loss net a friemem buedem dann dei kand!
translation.en: Do not leave your child in foreign soil then!

translation.lb: O huel mech, Mamm, no Letzeburg dann hém,
translation.en: Oh take me, Mother, back home to Luxembourg,

translation.lb: Wo' ech gedréml meng sche'nste kannerdrém!.,*.
translation.en: Where I dreamed my loveliest childhood dreams!.,*.

translation.lb: Dann hätt ech, Mamm, e leschte wonsch nach blo's:
translation.en: Then I would have, Mother, merely one last wish:

translation.en: Plant on your son's grave a rose from home!

translation.lb: Eng nei regirong am Asserbeidjan
translation.en: A new government in Azerbaijan

translation.lb: Gëschter mueren huet de radio Moskau gemellt, datt d'regirongstrUppen an der haptstad vum Asserbeidjan Tabris virun de rebei'lentruppen capituele'ert hun, de' d stad emzéngelt baten
translation.en: Yesterday morning Radio Moscow reported that the government troops in the capital of Azerbaijan, Tabriz, have capitulated to the rebel troops that besieged the city.

translation.lb: D'ru&sech norichtenagentur Tass mallt, datt sech zu Tabris eng ége provinzialverwaltong gebild hâtt, de' d'autonomie vum Asserbeidjan sechergestaMt huet.
translation.en: The Russian news agency Tass reported that a provisional administration had been established in Tabriz, securing the autonomy of Azerbaijan.

translation.lb: Weider héscht et, datt d'truppen vun der democratescher persescher partei, de' d'hapstad matt hëllef vu kutdeschen freitruppen eruewert hun, sech ënnert d'autorite't vun der neier regirong stellen a versprach hun hir waffen ofzetiweren.
translation.en: It further states that the troops of the democratic Persian party, who conquered the capital with the help of Kurdish free troops, have submitted to the authority of the new government and promised to surrender their weapons.

translation.lb: No leschte meWongen soilen d'rebellen oc h an weste vun der provënz Asserbeidjan eng garniso'n ageschloss hun.
translation.en: According to recent reports, the rebels are also said to have surrounded a garrison in the west of the province of Azerbaijan.

translation.lb: Eng drëtt garniso'n huet schons 11 dég neischt me' vun sech he'ere gelôss.
translation.en: A third garrison has not been heard from for 11 days.

translation.lb: De' so genannt democratesch partei, dèr hir frruppen sech dese stiéd bemâchtegt hun, ass de' ënnert dem numm „Tudi" bekannt partei, de' am joer 1941 gegrënd go'w.
translation.en: The so-called democratic party, whose groups have taken control of these cities, is known under the name "Tudi" party, founded in the year 1941.

translation.lb: Si huet hir inéscht unhänger an dem russeschen dél, d. h. am norde, vun der provënz.
translation.en: It has its strongest supporters in the Russian part, that is, in the north of the province.

translation.lb: D'provënz Asserbeidjan ass de' reichst an de' fruchtbarst vu Persien.
translation.en: The province of Azerbaijan is the richest and most fertile of Persia.

translation.en: Where is the Adolf Association?

translation.en: The bands and singing societies were accustomed before the war, every year in October, to receive a call from the Union Adolphe for a major general assembly.

translation.en: For a long time, the individual associations waited for their central association to show signs of life, but October has passed, and nothing has resulted.

translation.en: Otherwise, the Adolf Association still lets nothing be heard of any activity.

translation.en: All associations in the country have already resumed their activities, but only the Adolf Association remains inactive.

translation.lb: Smolenskerprozess * De prozess ge'nt de' 10 preisesch zaldoten, de' ugeklot sin, russesch krichsgefängener an Zivilisten do'tgem&ch oder gefoltert ze hun, ass gëschter virugesat gin.
translation.en: The Smolensk trial * The trial against the 10 Prussian soldiers, who are accused of having killed or tortured Russian prisoners of war and civilians, was continued yesterday.

translation.lb: D russesch uklovertriédong huet dem gericht weidert beweismateria'l virgeluegt.
translation.en: The Russian prosecution has presented further evidence to the court.

translation.lb: E vun dénen ugekloten, den doeter Modisch, huet zo'gin, datt hién an deitsche lazaretten honnerte vu res sesche krichsgefängenen durch kënschtlech bluddvergëftongen do'tgemäch huet.
translation.en: One of the accused, the criminal Modisch, admitted that he killed hundreds of Russian prisoners of war in German military hospitals through artificial blood poisoning.

translation.lb: En hu-.t och zo'g'n, russesche kanner bludd ofgezapt ze hun fir et de preisesche verwondten zo'kommen ze lôssen.
translation.en: He also admitted to having drawn blood from Russian children to supply it to wounded Prussians.

translation.lb: D'kanner sin herno durch entkräftong gestuerwen.
translation.en: The children subsequently died from exhaustion.

translation.lb: Et get geschätzt, datt wäreod d.e joren vun der preisescher besetzong ca. 135.000 russesch leidd zu Sinolensk em d'iiéwe komm s i
translation.en: It is estimated that during the years of Prussian occupation, approximately 135,000 Russians died in Smolensk.

translation.lb: ONS ZEIDONG Ona zeidong ass d'zeidong vun de.x Resistenz.
translation.en: OUR NEWSPAPER Our newspaper is the newspaper of the Resistance.

translation.lb: Si ass net neramen d'zeidong vun der L'nlo'n, yun der organise'erter Resistenz, mé si ass d'zeidong vun ailen, de' gelidden a gestridden hun, vun ail dénen, de' dem Preis widderstân hun, aktiv a passiv, organise'ert a net organise'ert.
translation.en: It is not merely the newspaper of the Union, of the organized Resistance, but it is the newspaper of all who have suffered and fought, of all those who have resisted the enemy, both active and passive, organized and unorganized.

translation.lb: D'gro'ss majorite't vum Letreburger voliek huet resiste'ert, aktiv oder passiv.
translation.en: The great majority of the Luxembourgish people have resisted, actively or passively.

translation.lb: dén i vleicht e bësse me' we' dén aner a muench netorganise'erten me' we' verschidden organise'erter, awer jidferén eso'vill, wc' hién ënnert de schwe'eren emstann könnt.
translation.en: One perhaps a bit more than the other and some unorganized more than some organized, but everyone as much as they could under the difficult circumstances.

translation.lb: An dat iescht ass d'haptsâch:
translation.en: And that is ultimately the main thing:

translation.lb: D'zeidong „D'Unio'n" ass d'zcidnng vun aile resistenzler, vun ail dénen, de' seeh als Letzeburger verhâlen hun, vun allen, de' net preisesch woren.
translation.en: The newspaper "The Union" is the newspaper of all resisters, of all those who have behaved as Luxembourgers, of all those who were not German.

translation.lb: An d'missio'n vun der zeidong ,,D'l: nio'n" ass et, d'e'er, d'rechter an d'fiichten ze vertriéden, de' Letzeburger »oren, de' et nach sin an de' et och wêile bieiwen.
translation.en: And the mission of the newspaper "The Union" is to represent the honor, rights, and duties of those Luxembourgers who are and still want to remain so.

translation.lb: Der zeidong „D'Unio'n" hir missio'n ass et, d'e'er he'chzehaien an ze verdédegen vun ail dénen, de' fir d'Hémecht gestuerwe sin, vun ail dénen, de' an der schwe'erster zeit zur Hémecht stongen.
translation.en: The mission of the newspaper "The Union" is to honor and defend the honor of all those who died for the homeland, of all those who stood by the homeland in the hardest times.

translation.lb: Der zeidong „D'Unio'n" hir misslo'n ass et, d'rechter vun der Resistenz — vun der ganzer Resistenz — organesch an objektiv erauszekrisf allise'eren a sech matt aller krâft fir d'réaiisatio'n derrun anzesetzen.
translation.en: The mission of the newspaper "The Union" is to promote and defend the rights of the Resistance — of the entire Resistance — organically and objectively, and to dedicate itself with all its strength to their realization.

translation.lb: Der zeidong „D'Unio'n" hir missio'n aaa et d'flichten vun der Resistenz — vun der ganzer Resistenz — erauszeschécken aq all resistenzler, all Letzcburger unzehalen, seng fliehten ze dongen.
translation.en: The mission of the newspaper "The Union" is also to disseminate the duties of the Resistance — of the entire Resistance — and to remind every resister, every Luxembourger, to fulfill their duties.

translation.lb: An engem wuert, d'zeidong „D'L'nio'n" ass d'zeidong vun all Letzeburger, dem um égene wuel, um wuel vun alle Letzeburger an un der zo'konft vun der Hémecht geléen ass.
translation.en: In a word, the newspaper "The Union" is the newspaper of every Luxembourger who cares about their own well-being, the well-being of all Luxembourgers, and the future of the homeland.

translation.lb: Wién sech als Letzeburger an als resistenzler net afkapscle wellt vum LeUeburgertom a vun der gesamtresistenz, den abonne'ert d' zeidong „D'Unio'n".
translation.en: Whoever does not want to disconnect from being Luxembourgish and from the complete resistance, subscribes to the newspaper "The Union".

translation.lb: Wlén als Letzeburger an als resistenzler mattschaffe wëllt un der épuratio'n, un der reconstructio'n an un der remoralisatio'n vun der Hémecht, dé schafft matt un der zeidong „D'Unio'n".
translation.en: Whoever wants to work as a Luxembourger and as a resister on the purification, reconstruction, and moral restoration of the homeland, works together with the newspaper "The Union".

translation.lb: D'ZEIDONG „D'UNIO'N".
translation.en: THE NEWSPAPER "THE UNION".

translation.en: It is intended to prevent Germans, who due to their Nazi or anti-Allied hostile attitude are dismissed, from being employed again in another district.

translation.en: For this reason, these undesirable elements receive an extra stamp on their identity papers upon their release, characterizing them as Nazi-friendly.

translation.en: General Eisenhower further announced that enough food supplies have been provided for Jews and forced labor foreigners.

translation.en: So far, 2.5 million foreigners have already been brought back to their homeland, but there are still 500,000 foreigners in the Ame-

translation.lb: Ons nationalhelden Lemmer Jängy Mir gedenken bei engem vun onse bcschten, dé we'nt beihellef zur „Fahnenflucht" weit fort vun senger le'wer hémccht sei jonkt liéwen hirgin huet.
translation.en: Our national hero Lemmer Jängy is remembered as one of our best, who due to aiding in 'desertion' far away from his beloved homeland sacrificed his young life.

translation.lb: Trei séngem éd, trei séngc komeroden, an trei séngem land huet de Jängy a schwe're stonnen stand gchalen, an all de' preisesch lackpreisser an drohungen konnten hien net erschüttern.
translation.en: Loyal to his oath, loyal to his comrades, and loyal to his country, Jängy stood firm in difficult times, and all Prussian blandishments and threats could not shake him.

translation.lb: Wat onse frend Jängy an der Resistenz geléscht huet, wor eng arbecht, we' nemmen ideaiisten se könne verrichten.
translation.en: What our friend Jängy achieved in the Resistance was a task that only idealists can accomplish.

translation.lb: Kén dag wor him ze läng, keng nuecht ze deischter, ké gank ze schwe'er, keng entreprise ze gefe'erlech, wann et gehéscht huet, et geschitt fir d'hémecht, fir d'freihét vu Letzeburg.
translation.en: No day was too long for him, no night too dark, no path too hard, no endeavor too dangerous when it was said, it is for the homeland, for the freedom of Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Hien huet gehollef hei am E'sleck de gro-ndstén vun onse resistenxorganisatio'ne leen, an huet sech keng ro' gegönnt, huet fra a kand nuechte läng cleng gelöss fir ■engem ideal, fir der arbecht an der Resistenz nozekommen.
translation.en: He helped here in E'sleck to lay the foundation of our resistance organizations, and he allowed himself no rest, he left wife and child at night for his ideal, to pursue the work and resistance.

translation.lb: Am october 1943 go'w hie vun der gestapo verhaft, nn verschidde verhe'ertn am Gronn no Hinzert verschléft, a go'w nom erdroen vu schwc'ersien torturen we'nt „Beihilfe zur Fahnenflucht" zum do'd verurtélt, an ass matt anere komeroden den heldendo'd fir séng hémecht gestuerwen.
translation.en: In October 1943 he was arrested by the Gestapo, transferred after several hearings in Gronn to Hinzert, and after enduring severe torture, he was sentenced to death for 'aiding desertion', and died a hero's death with other comrades for his homeland.

translation.lb: De schwärzen dag duerfe mir ni vergiéssen, de 2B. februar, »«' hie matt dénen anere condamne'erten matt autoen net weit vum Hinzerter laper verschifft go'w an do dén do'd durch ersche'ase fond huet.
translation.en: We must never forget the dark day, February 28, when he and the other condemned were driven not far from the Hinzert camp and there met death by shooting.

translation.lb: Net genuch, datt de' bluddhonn hie gepéngept baten, seng le'w fra a sei këndchen ai no Schlesien verschifft gin.
translation.en: Not enough that the bloodhounds tortured him, his dear wife and little child were also deported to Silesia.

translation.lb: Jjtt'yre JHngy, ail de misèr an dat léd. dat dértjr familjen hliet missen erdroen, kann net me' gudd gernâch gin.
translation.en: Dear Jängy, all the misery and suffering that your family had to endure cannot be made good enough.

translation.lb: Mé mir vergiéssen et net.
translation.en: But we do not forget it.

translation.lb: Dag a nuecht hu mir keng ro', bis datt de', de' dech gepéngegt liun, hirer gerechter strof i'vverli wert gin.
translation.en: Day and night we have no rest until those who tortured you will receive their rightful punishment.

translation.lb: Ducrfir, le'we Jtlngy, schlof ro'eg, well d'hémecht denkt un dech an un ail de', de' hirt iiéwen fir d'freihét vun oueem le'we l«tzeburg gin kun.
translation.en: Therefore, dear Jängy, rest peacefully, for the homeland thinks of you and all those who gave their lives for the freedom of our living Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Gusty FREYLINGER, mann »um Calhérine Hroes, gcstuerwe fir séng hémecht am KZ.
translation.en: Gusty FREYLINGER, a man from 'Calhérine Hroes', died for his homeland in the concentration camp.

translation.en: The food situation of the different countries should be reviewed and measures should be taken to increase yield.

translation.lb: Den organissem soll all ertragsquellen matt hirem optimum erfassen, ">.n den ubau an den énzelne ge'genùen dem weltbedarf entspriéchend upassen.
translation.en: The organization should include all sources of yield with their optimum and adjust cultivation in individual regions according to world demand.

translation.en: Thus, any overproduction is prevented and a proper nourishment of all nations is made possible.

translation.en: The demobilization of the Japanese army.

translation.en: The supreme allied headquarters recently announced that the disarmament of the Japanese troops is progressing well.

translation.lb: D’norwegesch parlamentswahlen.
translation.en: The Norwegian parliamentary elections.

translation.lb: An de norwegesche parlamentswahlen hun d'sozialisten eng ganz partie sëtzer op d'käschte vun der conservativer- an der bauerepartei bcikritL
translation.en: In the Norwegian parliamentary elections, the socialists won a considerable number of seats at the expense of the conservative and farmer parties.

translation.lb: D'virléfeg resultater sin: arbechterpartei: 390 000 stëmmen, kommunisten 93 000 stëmmen, also hun d'Iënksparteien bal eng hallef millio'n stëmmen fir sech ze buchen.
translation.en: The provisional results are: Labor Party: 390,000 votes, Communists: 93,000 votes, so the left parties have nearly half a million votes to their name.

translation.lb: De' aner resultater sin: liberal: 145 000. conservativ; 127 000, bauerepartei 130 000 an d'chrëschtlech vollekspartei 70 000 stëmmen.
translation.en: The other results are: Liberal: 145,000. Conservative: 127,000, Farmer Party: 130,000, and the Christian People's Party: 70,000 votes.

translation.lb: D'sozialisten kre'en demno 73 sëtzer, d'kommunisten der 7, d'eonservativ der 28.
translation.en: Thus, the socialists receive 73 seats, the communists 7, the conservatives 28.

translation.lb: d'liberal 22 an d'bauerepartei 11 sëtzer.
translation.en: The liberals 22 and the farmer party 11 seats.

translation.lb: Ze fre’ geschwat D'„Luxemburger Wort" ass be's, se'er be's iwer ons, an dorfir versieht et ons bei all geléenhét eng ze versetzen.
translation.en: To speak frankly, the "Luxemburger Wort" is angry, very angry with us, and therefore takes every opportunity to attack us.

translation.lb: Durchswegs kennt et un de' falsch adress, a speitzt secb sclwer op de kenn.
translation.en: It always comes to the wrong address and struggles to hit the mark.

translation.lb: D'„Luxcmburgcr Wort" hat geduecht eppes se'er, se'er schlëmmes • entdeckt ze hun, a flupp fällt et drap eran.
translation.en: The "Luxemburger Wort" thought it had discovered something very, very serious, and suddenly it falls right into it.

translation.lb: Et schreiwt matt déckegen, déckege bustawen, mir hatte vergiéss en artikel ze bréngen iwer de référendum vum 10. october 1941.
translation.en: It writes in bold, thick letters that we forgot to bring an article about the referendum of October 10, 1941.

translation.lb: Wann d'„Wort" gewosst hätt, datt zu gleicher zeit net nëmmen é mè zwé artikelen iwer dese référendum an oser zeidong stoe ge'wen, dann hätt et de mond gehalen.
translation.en: If the "Wort" had known that at the same time not just one but two articles about this referendum were in our newspaper, it would have kept quiet.

translation.lb: Et ass geschieht vum 10. mé 1945: „Ein Misston" — „Nein, es war kein Misston".
translation.en: It happened on May 10, 1945: "A false note" — "No, it was not a false note".

translation.lb: Jo, d'„Wort" irrt sech de lescht zeit andauernd!
translation.en: Yes, the "Wort" has been continuously mistaken recently!

translation.lb: Zum schluss vu sengem entrefilet schreiwt dann d'„Wort" dat hei: „Oder war es so, dass dieses Ereignis für stänkerische Ausbeutung ungeeignet schien?".
translation.en: At the end of its column, the "Wort" then writes: "Or was it that this event seemed unsuitable for malicious exploitation?"

translation.lb: Wann d'„Wort" ënner „stänkerischer Ausbeutung" ons attacken ge'nt d'giélemânnercher an d'cotlaborateure mengt, da kënne mir him verroden, datt d'„Unio'n" zo'fälleg — ganz zo'fälleg — d'iëscht vun dénen vun der Musel huet, de' den 10. october 1941 sehe' brav matt „deutsch" gestëmmt hun.
translation.en: If the "Wort" means by "malicious exploitation" our attacks against the yellow men and the collaborators, then we can reveal to them that the "Union", coincidentally — very coincidentally — was the first among those from the Moselle who voted obediently "German" on October 10, 1941.

translation.lb: Wann d'„Wort" wëllt, da publize'ere mir e puer nimm vu leidd, de dem „Wort" an der rechtspartei vill me' nostin we' ons an dem Gruppement.
translation.en: If the "Wort" wants, we will publish a few names of people who are much closer to the "Wort" and the right-wing party than us and the group.

translation.lb: A bon entendeur, salut.

translation.lb: Gëschter hu sech a ganz Palästina de' schon ugekënnegt juddemanifestatio'nen ofgespillt.
translation.en: Yesterday, the previously announced Jewish demonstrations took place throughout Palestine.

translation.lb: Obschon et zu kenge gre'sseren onro'e komm ass, ass d'situatio'n dach nach me' gespânt gin.
translation.en: Although there were no major riots, the situation has become even more tense.

translation.lb: D'manifestanten hun op gro'sse meetingen d'ofschafong vum englesche weissbuch 39 verlangt, an dem d'zo'wanderong vun de judde limite'ert gi wor.
translation.en: The demonstrators demanded the abolition of the English White Paper of 1939 at large meetings, which limited the immigration of Jews.

translation.lb: Si verlangen ausserdem d'usidlongsme'glechkét fir weideren 100 000 rassegenossen, de' aus Europa verdriwe gi woren.
translation.en: They also demand the settlement opportunity for another 100,000 fellow Jews who have been expelled from Europe.

translation.lb: D'englesch regirong, de' haut am Parlament zum Palästinaproblem stellong hëllt, fèrt, datt eng arabesch reaktio'n net läng op sech warde le'sst, well d'Araber gro'ss waffelageren verstoppt hun.
translation.en: The English government, which is addressing the Palestine problem in Parliament today, fears that an Arab reaction will not take long, as the Arabs have large weapon caches hidden.

translation.lb: Englesch panzerpatrulle fueren dag an nuecht durch d'strôsse vu Jerusalem, Tel Aviv an Haifa.
translation.en: English tank patrols travel day and night through the streets of Jerusalem, Tel Aviv, and Haifa.

translation.en: All leave for the English troops in the Levant is suspended.

translation.en: 1. When all good positions in the state are filled by reliable party members, without consideration for qualifications.

translation.en: In the north of this line, the Slavic autonomists and non-Slavic communists are becoming increasingly active.

translation.en: If the campaign continues in this way, if the government troops fail to stop the advance of the partisans, and if the autonomists occupy an area sufficient to proclaim the autonomy of this region, then it is already certain today that Yugoslavia and the other sympathetic neighboring states will directly recognize this autonomy.

translation.en: The Metropol Hotel, which was severely damaged by an explosion, has been almost completely restored.

translation.en: The final work on the ceilings was completed by the Heiter company, and the hotel is ready to welcome guests for the upcoming tourist season.

translation.en: — Our Kreuzkapelle, which had suffered severe damage from shelling, has also been almost fully restored in recent weeks.

translation.en: There are still some repairs to be made on the furniture.

translation.en: We are happy that the Kreuzkapelle, which had been a symbol of our community for centuries, is saved from further decay.

translation.en: In Norway, the Storting, that is the chamber, took up a very successful stance after the Germans landed in the country in 1940.

translation.lb: Si hât verhandlunge matt dem preisesche militar upgeholl, a war eso'guer eso' weit gang, de kinnÄ Hakon an d'regirong ze désavoue'eren, de' sech an England a secherhét bruecht haten.
translation.en: It started negotiations with the German military and even went so far as to disavow King Haakon and the government, who had fled to England for safety.

translation.en: An inquiry was conducted after the liberation, and it turned out that more than 100 deputies had played a leading role in this matter.

translation.lb: „Um eine luxemburgische Nationalbühne“
translation.en: "On a Luxembourgish National Theater"

translation.lb: Hei zo' Letzeburg gi vill a gudd Stecker am theater gespillt.
translation.en: Here in Luxembourg, many good plays are performed in the theater.

translation.lb: Mé et si méscht franse'scH auteuren, de' d'e'er hun.
translation.en: But it is mostly French authors who have the honor.

translation.lb: Dat ass net schlecht.
translation.en: That is not bad.

translation.lb: Leider get de letzeburgeschen theater e bëssche néglige'ert.
translation.en: Unfortunately, Luxembourgish theater is somewhat neglected.

translation.lb: Just op den amateurbühne vun den diérfer get nach letzeburgeseh geschwat.
translation.en: Only on the amateur stages in the villages is Luxembourgish still spoken.

translation.lb: D'ursâeh, fir wat um théâtre municipal vun der stad Letzeburg bis elo nach kén uerdentleeht stéck gespillt go'f, leit vleicht dobei, well et un enger gudder trupp félt.
translation.en: The reason why no decent play has been performed at the municipal theater of the city Luxembourg might be because it lacks a good troupe.

translation.lb: Et héscht, bis elo hätten sech nom brich drei truppe constitue'ert an eng ve'ert war um kommen.
translation.en: It is said that until now, three troupes had been formed after the break and a fourth was on the way.

translation.lb: Dat aas vcrke'ert.
translation.en: That is wrong.

translation.lb: „Es ist höchste Zeit, dass jene, die, sei es als Sänger, sei es als Schauspieler, über ein bestimmtes Können verfügen, sich zusammenfinden und jede persönliche Ranküne beiseite setzen.
translation.en: "It is high time for those who, whether as singers or as actors, possess a certain skill, to come together and set aside any personal grievances.

translation.lb: Machen wir Schluss mit den In-Acht-und-Bann-Erklärungen und schauen wir, dass etwas Rechtes zustande kommt.
translation.en: Let's put an end to the declarations of Acht und Bann and make sure something proper emerges.

translation.lb: (Obermosel 14. Dez. Um eine luxbg. Nationalbühne).
translation.en: (Obermosel December 14, On a Luxembourgish National Theater).

translation.lb: Fir eng hallef dosen truppen ass ons't land ze kleng.
translation.en: Our country is too small for half a dozen troupes.

translation.lb: Mé eng énzeg, gro'ss nationalbühn kënne mer op d'bé breiiger.
translation.en: But we can manage a single, large national stage.

translation.lb: A mîr müssen dat, eso'gucr wann e wcnl vuh uewe ne'deg ass.

translation.en: Under the label "Rassemblement des Gauches," the Radical-Socialists and the Social-Democratic Union of the Resistance are presenting joint lists in 65 departments.

translation.en: The lists of the PRL are presented in 24 departments and 4 districts of the Seine.

translation.en: A new element in the election campaign is the presentation of the candidate list by the Gaullist Union, which has set up 10 homogeneous lists.

translation.en: The head of the Gaullist Union, Capitant, previously assumed to stand in Bas-Rhin, ultimately opted for the 2nd sector of the Seine.

translation.en: The Gaullist Union also presents candidates on combined lists with the U.D.S.R., but mostly with the PRL.

translation.en: Van Steenbergen, together with Kint, also dominated everything in the handicap race.

translation.lb: An der australienne kantert de Van Steenbergen de berüchtegtc Bartali nidder.
translation.en: In the Australian race, Van Steenbergen defeated the notorious Bartali.

translation.lb: An der éliminatio'n huet et en ament geschéngt, we' wann de Bartali sech durchsetze ge'f, mé am endispurt huet hién dem onvergleichleche sprinter Van Steenbergen nés nokuckc missen.
translation.en: In the elimination race, it seemed for a moment as if Bartali would prevail, but in the final sprint, he had to watch the incomparable sprinter Van Steenbergen again.

translation.lb: Generalclassement: 1. Van Steenbergen, 2. Kubier, 3. Kint, 4. Bartali, 5. Nötzli, 6. Knecht, 7. Wagner.
translation.en: Overall standings: 1. Van Steenbergen, 2. Kubier, 3. Kint, 4. Bartali, 5. Nötzli, 6. Knecht, 7. Wagner.

translation.lb: En e’erleche beamten Bauschelt.
translation.en: An honest official in Bauschelt.

translation.lb: De gcndarm Pierre Hoffmann vun der Hàreler brigad huet virun der post zu Bauschelt e portemonni matt enger gewësser zomm geld fond.
translation.en: The gendarme Pierre Hoffmann from the Hàreler brigade found a wallet with a certain amount of money in front of the post office in Bauschelt.

translation.lb: No etleche recherchen huet hién de' perso'n ermëttelt, dèr e gehe'ert huet, an hié könnt hir hiren égentom ermegin.
translation.en: After several investigations, he identified the person to whom it belonged and was able to return their property to them.

translation.lb: En dc'we merci wor fir den e'erleche beamtet!
translation.en: A well-deserved thanks was given to the honest official!

translation.lb: eng bercchtegt satisfactio n.
translation.en: A justified satisfaction.

translation.lb: Erem onro’en an Indien Calcutta, 14. oct.
translation.en: Again unrest in India Calcutta, Oct. 14.

translation.lb: — E communiqué vun 'der bengalescher regirong besét, datt truppen a polizeiformatio'nen an den district Noakhali geruff si gin, well do onrœ'n ausgebrach sin.
translation.en: — A communiqué from the Bengal government states that troops and police formations have been called to the district of Noakhali because unrest has broken out there.

translation.lb: A 7 dierfer si brandstëftongen, ausreiberongen a verschléfong vu frae virkomm.
translation.en: In 7 villages, arson, looting, and abduction of women have occurred.

translation.lb: Bewaffent banden hun dierfer attacke'ert an zu Sadara a Feni am district Noakhali si schändonge vun hellegtëmer ennerboll gin.
translation.en: Armed gangs have attacked villages and in Sadara and Feni in the district Noakhali, desecrations of sanctuaries have been committed.

translation.en: Free Greek unions Athens.

translation.en: — The Greek Prime Minister Tsaldaris reassured the parliament yesterday evening that he will introduce a law on the establishment of free unions in Greece.

translation.en: These unions should be able to elect their delegates in free elections and be secure from any interference by the government.
