translation.lb: D’Franso’se ge’nt eng drei-parteie-regirong Parois:
translation.en: The French have a three-party government system:

translation.lb: Eng enquête vnm frtnse'schen institut fir d'erlucrscbong vuri dei ëffentlecher mcnong, <lc' vom 2. bis den 10. oct ober durehgefo'crt go f, huet de Franco'se folgend froe gestallt:
translation.en: A survey from a French institute for the study of public opinion, conducted from October 2 to 10, asked the French the following questions:

translation.lb: „Wellt dir no <le wahilen eng sozialistescli-kommunistesch, eng sozislistesch- MRP., eng MRPrechlsregirong «.der eng «ombinalio'n vun den drei parleicn, we' et bis elo wor?
translation.en: "After the elections, do you want a socialist-communist, a socialist-MRP, an MRP-right-wing government, or a combination of the three parties, as it has been until now?

translation.lb: Antworten: fir eng sozialistesch-komraunistesch regiroug: 2t)% sozialistesch M,RP-regirong 21% MRP-rechtsparteien'15% jlrei parteien 7% b'ni ménong 28%
translation.en: Answers: for a socialist-communist government: 20%, socialist MRP government: 21%, MRP right-wing parties: 15%, three parties: 7%, no opinion: 28%

translation.lb: Aus der enquête gét och ervir, datt 75% vun -de Franso'sen der mcnong sin, datt ..et de moment gurr net gét".
translation.en: The survey also reveals that 75% of the French believe that things are not going well at the moment.

translation.lb: 56% vun de gefrote gesin d'ursâch an der dreiparteie-regirong.
translation.en: 56% of those asked see the cause in the three-party government.

translation.lb: Rentabilite’t.
translation.en: Profitability.

translation.lb: E wichtegt argument an der discussio'n vun de lo'n- a preisfroen ass emmer dat vun der rentabilite't vum betrieb.
translation.en: An important argument in the discussion of wage and price issues is always that of the profitability of the business.

translation.lb: ,,Das Unternehmen muss einen Ertrag einbringen, der die Verzinsung der Kapitalanlage sichert, in andern Worten, das Unternehmen muss rentabel sein." (L. W, 13. oct.)
translation.en: "The company must generate a return that ensures the interest on the capital investment, in other words, the company must be profitable." (L. W, 13. Oct.)

translation.lb: Et ass selbstverständleeh, datt e capital, dat an engem betrieb Investe'- ert ass, och zënse brénge muss.
translation.en: It is self-evident that capital invested in a business must also yield interest.

translation.lb: D'fro stellt sech nemmen, matt wivill prozent d'zënse gcrechent gin.
translation.en: The question only arises as to what percentage the interest should be calculated.

translation.lb: Et gi leidd, de' behapten, liire betrieb ge'f sech net' rentee'ren, wann e net we'negstens 10% ofwèrfe ge'f.
translation.en: There are people who claim their business would not be profitable unless it yields at least 10%.

translation.lb: De streit dre'nt sech em den tau*, em soss neischt.
translation.en: The dispute revolves around the rate, nothing else.

translation.lb: An dén ass haut gewe'nlech se'er he'ch, besonnesch bei decke cnpitalien.
translation.en: And that is generally very high today, especially with large capitals.

translation.lb: Gemengerotswahlen M è r t z e g — Bei de gemengerotsersalzwahile vum 20. oclober go'f de bauer Pierre Olinger matt 134 stëmme gewiélt.
translation.en: Municipal council elections in Mertzig — In the municipal council supplementary elections on October 20th, the farmer Pierre Olinger was elected with 134 votes.

translation.lb: D'absolul majorité'! wor 188.
translation.en: The absolute majority was 188.

translation.lb: Net gewiélt go' wen: de sténhacr Nie.
translation.en: Not elected were: the stoneware maker Nie.

translation.lb: Weiter 1110 stemmen) an de I.auer Jean- Pierre Schteiner (70 stemmen).
translation.en: Further with 1110 votes, the farmer Jean-Pierre Schteiner had 70 votes.

translation.lb: D. L. K. W. T. Né, wat der bustawen!
translation.en: D. L. K. W. T. No, what the letters!

translation.lb: Merci fir dei Je'we hre'f.
translation.en: Thank you for the letter received from you.

translation.lb: No denger photo schéngt de' coiffure der wonnerbar ze stoen.
translation.en: From your photo, the hairstyle seems to suit you wonderfully.

translation.lb: Ail complimenter fir dé gudde goût!
translation.en: All compliments for the good taste!

translation.lb: Deng adresse hun ech och weideT gelét.
translation.en: I have also forwarded your address.

translation.lb: Aus der eisenindustrie D'siluatio'n vun de schmelze verbessert sech lues a dues.
translation.en: In the iron industry, the situation of the smelters is slowly and gradually improving.

translation.lb: D'productio'n vum goss a vum stol ass am September geklommen.
translation.en: The production of cast iron and steel rose in September.

translation.lb: En he'chuewe weider uss ugcfânge gin.
translation.en: A further increase has begun.

translation.lb: Am ganze sin et der elo 15 (Echo de l'Industrie, 19. oct.).
translation.en: In total, there are now 15 of them (Echo de l'Industrie, October 19).

translation.lb: Et k«nn cn ower nach net behâpten, dalt d'siluatio'n stabil ass.
translation.en: It cannot yet be claimed, however, that the situation is stable.

translation.lb: Dofir kennt de kok nach net re'gclme'sseg genuch.
translation.en: For this reason, the coke supply is still not regular enough.

translation.lb: Fir manner kok ze brauchen, mëschen d'schraelzen elo scho friém minette ënner dén aneren.
translation.en: To use less coke, the smelters are now already mixing Minette ore with others.

translation.lb: Der deiwel!
translation.en: The devil!

translation.lb: Drei opere'erler leien am krankenhaus.
translation.en: Three surgical patients are lying in the hospital.

translation.lb: Si discute'eren iwert hir kTankhét.
translation.en: They are discussing their illnesses.

translation.lb: Bei en allen drei blinddarm.
translation.en: All three have appendicitis.

translation.lb: „Onsen docter ass tipp-topp", sét den e'schten, „nemme leider eng grimmel vergiésserlech.
translation.en: "Our doctor is top-notch," says the first, "just unfortunately a bit forgetful.

translation.lb: Bei mir hât e sei fangerhutt an ongedanke matt agebitzt."
translation.en: With me, he mistakenly sewed his thimble inside.

translation.lb: „Bei mir hât en eso'guer seng sche'erche vergiéss", sét dén aneren.
translation.en: "With me, he even forgot his little scissors," says the other.

translation.lb: An dém moment streckt den docter de kapp zur dir eran: „Pardon, h na ech vleicht hei mein hutt leie gelôss?"
translation.en: At that moment, the doctor sticks his head through the door: "Pardon, have I perhaps left my hat here?"

translation.lb: Do ass et dém drëtte schlecht gin.
translation.en: Then the third felt unwell.

translation.lb: D’coupe-finale (F.L.F.)
translation.en: The cup final (F.L.F.)

translation.lb: Op neutralem terrain get e sonndeg um 15.30 auer op der Jeunesse zu Esch d'finale vun der Coupe de la F.L.F. ausgedroen.
translation.en: The final of the F.L.F. Cup will be held on neutral ground this Sunday at 15:30 at Jeunesse in Esch.

translation.lb: Des coupe, de' als tro'schtpreis fir de' duerch accident ausgeschëft vereiner aus der Coupe de Luxembourg virgesin ass, bréngt det joer eng interessant puerong op d'bén.
translation.en: This cup, intended as a consolation prize for the clubs disqualified by accident from the Luxembourg Cup, presents an interesting matchup this year.

translation.lb: Den haushe'ge champion, d'Stade, an d'Coupe-équipe par excellence, d'Red Boys.
translation.en: The home champion, Stade, and the top cup team, the Red Boys.

translation.lb: Dén én eso' gudd we' den aner war würdeg gewiéscht als finaliste vun der Coupe de Luxembourg ze figure'eren.
translation.en: One as good as the other, both would have been worthy finalists of the Luxembourg Cup.

translation.lb: Et get eso'vill geschwat, datt d'Stade keng Coupe-mannschaft war a pronostike si gedélt.
translation.en: There is much talk that Stade was not a cup team and predictions are divided.

translation.lb: We' dém och ass, d'Red Boys muss als ganz éschte ge'gner ugekuckt gin.
translation.en: However that may be, the Red Boys must be regarded as a very serious opponent.

translation.lb: Trotzdem gléwe mer, datt d'Stade, a war et nemmen é fir allemol desen heimtückische epupe-bann ze briéchen, d'victoire behält.
translation.en: Nevertheless, we believe that Stade, if only to finally break this insidious cup curse, will secure the victory.

translation.lb: An der 3. divisio'n gét et fir de champion an d'candidate fir den opstîg an d'2. divisio'n festzestellen.
translation.en: In the 3rd division, the champion and the candidates for promotion to the 2nd division will be determined.

translation.lb: Op der Aris tre'ffe sech Mondorf — Bartreng, zu Dickerech, Cliérf a Wallefer; zu Ettelbréck, Strossen an Elwen; an zu Wallefer, Jonglënster an Itzeg.
translation.en: At Aris, Mondorf meets Bartreng, in Diekirch, Clervaux and Walferdange meet; in Ettelbrück, Strassen and Elwen; and in Walferdange, Junglinster and Itzig.

translation.lb: Um 3 auer sti sech op der Union (Verluerekascht) de' zwo' e'scht équipe vun der Union an dem Stadgronn ge'ntiwer.
translation.en: At 3 o'clock, the first teams of the Union and Stadgronn face each other at Union (Verluerekascht).

translation.lb: Et ass wirklech interessant festzestellen, we' d'spillstärkt vum champion vun der 2. divisio'n am vergleich zu engem e'erendivisionsverein sech duerchsetzt.
translation.en: It is really interesting to observe how the playing strength of the 2nd division champion measures up against a first division club.

translation.lb: DE NÜRNBERGER PROZESS Weider aussoe vum Keitel
translation.en: THE NUREMBERG TRIAL Further Testimony from Keitel

translation.lb: * De' 100 sëtzong vum Nürnberger prozess huet de russeschen ukléar Rudenko eröffent andém datt en de Keitel an d'kreizverhe'er geholl huet.
translation.en: * The 100th session of the Nuremberg trial was opened by the Russian prosecutor Rudenko by cross-examining Keitel.

translation.lb: Hié wollt haptsächleeh wessen, ob de Keitel e beféi ënnerzéchent hätt, durch den d'offize'er vun der Wehrmacht d'recht kritt hätten, zivilperso'nen o'ni weider gerîchtlecht verfahren ersche'ssen ze lôssen.
translation.en: He mainly wanted to know whether Keitel had signed an order that allowed Wehrmacht officers the right to shoot civilians without further judicial proceedings.

translation.lb: De Keitel huet dT)estoen vun eso' engem befél net geléchent, huet awer behapt, datt e vum Hitler erausgi go'w.
translation.en: Keitel did not deny the existence of such an order but claimed that it had been issued by Hitler.

translation.lb: Ob d'fro ob zaldote vun der Wehrmacht och d'recht gehat hätten, zivilperso'nen z'ersche'ssen o'ni datt se dofir bestroft wire gin, sot de Keitel. da't. dat bis zu engem gewisse grad gc'w stemmen.
translation.en: When asked whether Wehrmacht soldiers also had the right to shoot civilians without being punished, Keitel said that this was true to a certain extent.

translation.lb: Allerdéngs wiren hir befugnësser eppes beschränkt gewiéscht, fir datt keng disziplinlo'segkét an der preisescher arme' entstoe sollt.
translation.en: However, their powers were somewhat restricted to prevent indiscipline in the Prussian army.

translation.lb: We' emmer huet de Keitel seng äntwerten deitlech a prezis ofgin, we' dat sech fir en zaldot, dé scho 40 joer gedéngt huet, schéckt.
translation.en: As always, Keitel gave his answers clearly and precisely, as befits a soldier who has served for 40 years.

translation.lb: Emmer an emmer erem awer huet en all verantwortlechkét, speziell, wat d'verbriéchen un allie'erte krichsgefângenen ubetrëfft, op den Hitler an den Himmler ofgewälzt.
translation.en: Again and again, however, he shifted all responsibility, especially concerning crimes against Allied prisoners of war, onto Hitler and Himmler.

translation.lb: Am fall vun der ersehe'asong vun déne 50 allie'erten offize'er, denen et gelongo wor, aus dem Stalag f.uft III auszebriéchen, de' dann iéwer erem agefäng an erschoss si gin, sollt de Keitel eso'guer d'absicht gehât hun, dem Hitler uih Eerghof neischt doriwer ze mellen, well e gehofft hätt, d'offize'er wiren dach no enger gewësser zeit erem agefängen an da wir d'affaire vun sech aus schon erlédegt.
translation.en: In the case of the shooting of the 50 Allied officers who managed to escape from Stalag Luft III, and were then recaptured and shot, Keitel supposedly had intended not to report this to Hitler at Berghof, because he hoped the officers would be recaptured after a certain time and the matter would resolve itself.

translation.lb: Wat de Keitel awer ënnerlôss hätt, dat hätt den Himmler gemäch, dén d'affaire dem Hitler gemellt hätt.
translation.en: What Keitel failed to do, Himmler did; he reported the matter to Hitler.

translation.lb: Den Hitler wir dorophin an eng roserei geroden an en hätt dem Keitel sehwe'er virwërf gemäch, de' dén awer net op sech sëtze gelôss hätt.
translation.en: Following this, Hitler became furious and made serious accusations against Keitel, which he did not accept.

translation.lb: Dat wir den ufank gewiéscht vun enger rei vun ausernanersetzongen, de' den Hitler an de Keitel an der spe'derer zeit emmer matteaner gehat hätten.
translation.en: That was the beginning of a series of confrontations that Hitler and Keitel would have with each other in the later period.

translation.lb: Kënt de griechesche kinek erem op den tro’n?
translation.en: Can the Greek king return to the throne?

translation.lb: * Matt ausnahm vun de resultater vun 200 biiroen, leien d'resultater vun de griechesche wählen elo bal complett vir.
translation.en: * With the exception of the results from 200 offices, the results of the Greek elections are now almost complete.

translation.lb: We' mer richteg gëschter ugeholl haten, hun d'monarchisten bis elo 50 Prozent vun aile stemme kritt, de' ofgi si gin.
translation.en: As we correctly assumed yesterday, the monarchists have so far received 50 percent of all the votes that have been cast.

translation.lb: We' et schéngt sollen d'monarchisten wëlles hun de griechesche kinek an déne nexte me'nt erem op sein tro'n ze ruffen,
translation.en: It appears that the monarchists intend to call the Greek king back to his throne in the coming months,

translation.lb: wat awer nach a fro gestallt ass, well d'monarchisten representativ nach net de' erfuerderlech majorite't hun fir hiren entschloss durchzesetzen.
translation.en: which is still in question, as the monarchists do not yet have the necessary majority to enforce their decision.

translation.lb: An der tëschenzeit hun d'monarchisten emsoss versieht eng nei regirong op d'bén ze kre'en.
translation.en: In the meantime, the monarchists hastily prepare to form a new government.

translation.lb: Si sin awer décide'ert hiren optrag, dén se vum regent Damaskino kritt hun, durchzefe'eren.
translation.en: They are determined, however, to carry out the mandate given to them by Regent Damaskino.

translation.lb: D ’eisebunnstarifer gi gehe ’ cht.
translation.en: The railway tariffs are being increased.

translation.lb: No enger mattdélong vun der beischer bunneverwaltong gin d'eisebunnstarifer fir d'résender vum 1. abrël un em 50% gehe'cht.
translation.en: Following a decision by the railway administration, the railway tariffs for passengers will be increased by 50% from April 1st onwards.

translation.lb: De billet aller et retour matt 20 Prozent reductio'n get gleichzeiteg erem agefe'ert.
translation.en: The round-trip ticket with a 20% reduction will be simultaneously reintroduced.

translation.lb: Fir all détailer muss é sech an dem bureau de voyages renseigne'eren.
translation.en: For all details, one must inquire at the travel office.

translation.lb: Leipziger Messe Op befél vum marschall Schukow, iéveschte chef vun der sowjetescher militärverwaltong, fend elo erem ail joer d',, Leipziger Messe" statt.
translation.en: Leipzig Fair On the orders of Marshal Zhukov, the senior head of the Soviet military administration, the 'Leipzig Fair' is now held every year again.

translation.lb: Dest joer get se vum 8. bis den 12. mé ofgehalen.
translation.en: This year it will be held from March 8th to 12th.

translation.lb: Et get dermatt gerechent, datt ongefe'er 300.000 leidd d'Leipziger Messe besichen, an zwar gi se matt extrazich dohi gefe'ert.
translation.en: It is expected that approximately 300,000 people will visit the Leipzig Fair, and they will be taken there by special trains.

translation.lb: De' leidd, de' matt denen zieh fueren, brauche keng „Interzonenpäss".
translation.en: The people traveling with these trains do not need 'interzone passes'.

translation.lb: Et get duer, wann de visiteur eng erlabnes vun der sowjetescher militärarme' huet.
translation.en: It suffices if the visitor has a permit from the Soviet military army.

translation.lb: E kritt da vu senger zu'stänneger industrie- an Handelskammer e messeauseiw a kritt och gesot, wat fir én extrazuch hié bcnotze muss.
translation.en: He then receives a fair pass from his respective Chamber of Industry and Commerce and is also informed which special train he must use.

translation.lb: Get Indien opgedélt?
translation.en: Is India being divided?

translation.lb: * Zu Nei Delhi ass de congress vun der Moslem-liga gëschter matt enger usprôch vum Cinna, président vun der hind. partei, agelét gin.
translation.en: In New Delhi, the congress of the Muslim League commenced yesterday with a speech by Jinnah, president of the Indian party.

translation.lb: Hié sot, datt d'Moslem-liga fir en énegt Pakistan kämpfe ge'w a wa no'tmendeg och derfir stiérwe ge'w.
translation.en: He said that the Muslim League would fight for a unified Pakistan and, if necessary, would die for it.

translation.lb: „Mir müssen onst zill erréchen oder ënnergoen."
translation.en: "We must achieve our goal or perish."

translation.lb: Iwer d'bespriéchonge matt der britescher ministermissio'n sot en, en hätt d'geléenhét gehât fir ganz offen a frëndschaftlech matt den engleschen delege'erten ze schwetzen an en hätt hinnen deitlech ze verstoe gin.
translation.en: Regarding the talks with the British ministerial mission, he mentioned he had the opportunity to speak quite openly and amicably with the English delegates and he clearly made them understand.

translation.lb: datt e compromis! tëschent dem Hindustan an dem Pakistan net kënnt erbeigefo'ert gin.
translation.en: That a compromise between Hindustan and Pakistan could not be maintained.

translation.lb: En énhétlecht Indien wir ganz onme'glech.
translation.en: A unified India would be entirely impossible.

translation.lb: Et misst en onofhängegt Hindustan an en onofhänget Pakistan geschaf gin.
translation.en: An independent Hindustan and an independent Pakistan must be created.

translation.lb: D'englesch ministercommissio'n hât gëschter muere weider bespriéchonge matt fe'rend indesch perse'nlechkéten, ënner anere mam fre'ere gouverneur vu Bengalen a matt cheffe vun den oppositio'nsparteien a vun der Hindustanescher congresspartei.
translation.en: Yesterday morning, the English ministerial commission held further discussions with various Indian personalities, including the former governor of Bengal and with leaders of the opposition parties and the Indian National Congress.

translation.lb: Den hèr WAGNER brengt vir, datt ons kantonal krankekésen erem eso' agericht ge'we gin, we' se virum krich waren.
translation.en: Mr. WAGNER suggests that our cantonal health funds should be reinstated as they were before the war.

translation.lb: Et huet jo gehéscht, datt erem jidferén op seng plaz soll zréck goen, wo' en den 10. mé geschafft huet.
translation.en: It was said that everyone should return to their position where they worked on May 10th.

translation.lb: Mé bei der krankekése wär dat net de fall gewiéscht an et wären doranner vill me' leidd agesta'lt we' virum krich.
translation.en: But with the health funds, that was not the case, and many more people were registered there than before the war.

translation.lb: E frét, op d'rentenempfänger, de' an engem KZ woren, keng rent nobezuelt kriten.
translation.en: He asks if pensioners who were in a concentration camp did not receive back payment of their pensions.

translation.lb: Den hèr SCHAFFNER fret, ob de krichsschued net kennt matt oons de trésor bezuelt gin.
translation.en: Mr. SCHAFFNER asks if the war damages cannot be paid with our treasury.

translation.lb: Den her staatsminister äntwert, datt dat am princip géng goen.
translation.en: The Mr. state minister replies that in principle, that would work.

translation.lb: mé datt d'banken em e vleicht net ge'nge converte'eren.
translation.en: But that the banks might perhaps not be able to convert it.

translation.lb: Da propose'ert den her Schaffner nach, datt d'chamber sech emol soll d'sinistre'ert gebidder ukucke goen, ir se doriwer ge'w discute'eren.
translation.en: Then Mr. Schaffner further proposes that the chamber should first go and look at the affected areas before discussing it.

translation.lb: De virschlag get vun der Chamber ugeholl an all discussio'nen doriwer gin ausgesat.
translation.en: The proposal is accepted by the Chamber and all discussions about it are suspended.

translation.lb: PROTEST weider uertschafte schle’ssen sech un:
translation.en: PROTEST continued activities join in:

translation.lb: D’Unio’n vu Bo’neweg R c s o 1 u I i o'n Mir verlangen:
translation.en: The Union of Bonneweg Resolutions We demand:

translation.en: The Romanian automotive industry * For the first time in its history, Romania has started car production.

translation.en: These are light cars with 20 hp, manufactured solely from Romanian materials.

translation.lb: De Goldschmit huet 39 sek. kredit op de Wagner, hié gét définitif aus sech eraus, hié schéngt net ze wëssen, datt hién e bierg ënnert de riéder huet, so' kënnt en erugedrosch.
translation.en: Goldschmit has a 39-second lead on Wagner, he definitely goes forward, he seems unaware that he has a mountain under his wheels, so he comes charging forward.

translation.lb: Dat wor eng léschtong, an de psychologesch richtege moment fir sech selbstänneg ze machen.
translation.en: That was a performance, and the psychologically right moment to make himself independent.

translation.lb: Op der kopp hëlt hién definitiv reissaus an et soll och kén aneren e me' ze gesi kre'en, bis no der arrivée.
translation.en: At the top, he definitely takes flight and no one else should see him anymore until after the finish.

translation.lb: Hannerun him schaffen sech de bierg crop: Wagner, Clemens, Diederich, Keteleer, Hamelryckx, Schotte, Callens.
translation.en: Behind him, the mountain group works hard: Wagner, Clemens, Diederich, Keteleer, Hamelryckx, Schotte, Callens.

translation.lb: Duerno kommen den Igel, de Lambrichts an de Knecht.
translation.en: Then come the Hedgehog, Lambrichts, and the Servant.

translation.lb: Wat eso' e bierg ower net ailes fèrdeg bréngt, o'ni sech selwer unzestrengen!
translation.en: What a mountain can't manage on its own without requiring effort!

translation.lb: Ailes ass zerstéckelt.
translation.en: Everything is fragmented.

translation.lb: De Kirchen ass vum pech befall.
translation.en: Kirchen is struck by bad luck.

translation.lb: Eng pedal firt kapott a muss repare'ert gin.
translation.en: A pedal is broken and has to be repaired.

translation.lb: (Verschidde leidd hu malchance, fir anerer schénge gudd se'len net matt de sto'ssgebiéder liannert dem bierg ze halen), z. b. fir de Schotte, dé bis elo nach emmer verscho'nt bliwen ass).
translation.en: (Some people have misfortune, while others seem unable to keep their good souls behind the mountain's bumps, such as Schotte, who has remained spared so far).

translation.lb: De Jansen schafft och op égen hand, de Meu- och.
translation.en: Jansen also works on his own, and so does Meu.

translation.lb: Duerno passe'eren de Majerus, den Diederich, de Poiré, de Mithouard an de Wang.
translation.en: Then Majerus, Diederich, Poiré, Mithouard, and Wang pass by.

translation.lb: E puer kilometer me' weit sin de Wang an de Meulenberg ofgehâng gin, de Jansen huet eng klcng avance op si, de Bintner kämpft och eleng virum Jansen.
translation.en: A few kilometers further, Wang and Meulenberg have been dropped, Jansen has a small lead on them, Bintner also fights alone ahead of Jansen.

translation.lb: E puer minutto me' no vir pcdale'ert den Igel mam Lambrichts a mam Knecht, si leien e puer honnert meter hannert dem e'schte peloton, 6 mann, wo'rënner de Schotte, de Callens an de Ketelcer bestét.
translation.en: A few minutes further ahead, Hedgehog pedals with Lambrichts and the Servant, they are a few hundred meters behind the first peloton of 6 men, including Schotte, Callens, and Ketelcer.

translation.lb: Mé quetschen och!
translation.en: But they also push hard!

translation.lb: Weder de Mett nach den Diederich welle vun enger chasse eppes wessen.
translation.en: Neither Mett nor Diederich want to know anything about a pursuit.

translation.lb: Si denken, et wir besser wann de Goldschmit d'étape ge'f wannen, ass we' wann nach eng ke'er de Schotte oder é vun senge bridder al3 sieger alafe ge'f.
translation.en: They think it would be better if Goldschmit won the stage than if Schotte or one of his brothers crossed the finish line as the winner again.

translation.en: Commemorative week Dudelange.

translation.lb: Fir d'ausschaffong vun engem programm fir eng „semaine commémorative" an der woch vum 4. bis den XI. august 1946 hei an Dideleng ofzehalen, bât d'gemengeverwa'ltong, d'UnioX d'L.P.P.D an d'Ligue..Ons Jongen" zo' enger sëtzong am stadhauç invite'ert.
translation.en: For the creation of a program to hold a 'commemorative week' in the week from August 4th to the 11th, 1946 here in Dudelange, the municipal administration, the Union, the L.P.P.D, and the League 'Our Boys' invited to a meeting at the town hall.

translation.lb: A gro'ssen zieh go f de programm lestgeluegt.
translation.en: A large direction was set for the program.

translation.lb: Enner anerem ass eng expositio'n am stadhaus virgesin, wo' och eng ..chapelle ardente" fir ons sämtlech gel'alen Didelenger nazi-affer opgerîcht gel.
translation.en: Among other things, an exhibition in the town hall is planned, where a 'chapelle ardente' for all our fallen Dudelange Nazi victims will be erected.

translation.lb: Den organisatio'nscomité versammelt sech elo regelme'sseg atl woch fir d'délailer vun dose feslivite'ten auszeschaffen.
translation.en: The organizing committee now gathers regularly every week to work out the details of these festivities.

translation.lb: Den hèr GRANDGENET beto nt datt d'biergarbechter emmer hire mann gestallt hun.
translation.en: Mr. GRANDGENET emphasizes that the miners have always held their own.

translation.lb: Et ass dofir ze bedaueren, datt d'ilag vun de mineuren haut kritesch ass, vir allem, well de heische wirtsshaftspartner ons minieren, de' e fre'er so'zesoen embiedelt huet, am plang de'sst.
translation.en: It is therefore regrettable that the situation of the miners is critical today, especially since the major economic partner of our mines, who in a manner of speaking used to favor us, is considering plans.

translation.lb: Den hir Grandgenet bedauert besonnesch de' jonk mineuren, de' am lèschte joer durch vidi propaganda „angeheuert" go'wen a steldt fest, datt et einfach lamentabel ass, wann de' selwecht haut entlôss gin.
translation.en: Mr. Grandgenet particularly regrets the young miners who were recruited last year through empty propaganda and states that it is simply lamentable if those same people are dismissed today.

translation.lb: Hié geseit awer en auswé doranner, datt d'betrieber haut de' iwerfälleg arbechtskräfte sollte virufoeschäftege fir hir exploitatio'nsarîchtongen an e virschrëftsme'ssegen resp. besseren zo'sttnd ze setzen.
translation.en: However, he sees a solution in that employers today should continue employing the surplus workforce to set their operational facilities in a regulatory or better state.

translation.lb: Do’desbés E jonkc Londoner, de Lcslie Bowmer, ass seng freiescb, de' 22järeg Doreen Quarrel, besiehe gâng.
translation.en: Recently, a young Londoner, Leslie Bowmer, visited his girlfriend, the 22-year-old Doreen Quarrel.

translation.en: He told her the news of the day and especially talked about his bet on a dog race, which had brought him quite a bit of money.

translation.lb: Aus fréd dodriwer, datt dese gewënn de mariage me' se'er erme'glccbe ge'f, sin de' zwé scch iwerglécklech an d'ärcm gefall.
translation.en: In joy over the fact that this win would make their marriage possible sooner, the two fell blissfully into each other's arms.

translation.lb: Mé wr* ass geschitt r
translation.en: But what happened?

translation.lb: De Lcslie bât seng freiescb kaum gekësst, dun ass si do'd emgefall.
translation.en: Leslie had barely kissed his girlfriend when she collapsed dead.

translation.lb: Den dokter huet bei der ënnersuchong festgcstallt, datt de Leslie sei médehen op enger empfindlecher plaz um hals ze fest gedreckt hat.
translation.en: The doctor determined upon examination that Leslie had pressed on a sensitive spot on the girl's neck too firmly.

translation.lb: an obschon desen drcck nurc momentan wor. huet en dach läng genueb gedauert, fir dem médehen sei • herz auszesetzen an den do'd erbei ze fe'eren.
translation.en: And although this pressure was just momentary, it lasted long enough to stop the girl's heart and cause death.

translation.en: Unrra aid for Belarus and Ukraine

translation.en: La Guardia announced that Unrra sent more than 250,000 tonnes of goods to Belarus and Ukraine by May 1, 1946.

translation.lb: De' e'scht vun dese be'de republiken huet 73.396 tonne kritt an de' zwét 178.881 tonnen.
translation.en: The first of these two republics received 73,396 tonnes and the second 178,881 tonnes.

translation.lb: Wärend dem mo'nt mé si nach 30.000 tonnen embarque'crt gin, de' och an des länner geliwert gin.
translation.en: During the month of May, another 30,000 tonnes were shipped and delivered to these countries.

translation.lb: Zu Minsk, an der haptstad. vu Weissrussland, huet de chef vun der Unrra, Scandrett, anerseits erklärt, datt d'Preisen all tracteuren aus desem land ewechgeschlcft haten zcsumme matt 70°/o vum pèrdsbestand.
translation.en: In Minsk, the capital of Belarus, the Unrra chief, Scandrett, on the other hand, stated that the Germans had shipped away all the tractors from this country along with 70% of the horse population.

translation.lb: En huet weider énnerstrach, datt et net me'glech ass, an dém land och nemmen eng minimal quantite't vu fett oder ueleg opzedreiwen.
translation.en: He further emphasized that it was not possible to procure even a minimal quantity of fat or oil in this country.

translation.lb: 1. Wärend 10 joer soll TrieBt matt der ëmge'end an autonomen territorium ëmgestallt gin, ënnert der controll vun de 4 gro'ssmächten, vun Italien a vu Jugoslawien, an ërinert der iwerwachong vum weltsecherhétsrot.
translation.en: 1. During 10 years, Trieste and the surrounding area should be transformed into an autonomous territory under the control of the 4 great powers, of Italy and Yugoslavia, and under the supervision of the United Nations Security Council.

translation.lb: 2. De gouverneur vun desem gebidd get am accord matt Italien a Jugoslawien bestemmt, an zwar vun de 4 gro'ssmächten.
translation.en: 2. The governor of this region is determined in agreement with Italy and Yugoslavia, and specifically by the 4 great powers.

translation.lb: 3. Eng assemblée get gewiélt durch geheim an allgemeng wählen, des assemblée soll d'legislativ gewalt duerstellen.
translation.en: 3. An assembly will be elected through secret and general elections, this assembly is to exercise legislative power.

translation.lb: 4. De' 4 gro'ssmächte matt Italien a Jugoslawien bestëmmen e regirongsrot vu 6 member.
translation.en: 4. The 4 great powers together with Italy and Yugoslavia determine a governing council of 6 members.

translation.en: May 6th. The Luxembourgers deported from Schreckestén are coming to Illuppendorf.

translation.en: May 11th. Bettembourg and its surroundings were attacked by heavy bombers.

translation.lb: E neie fuendel fir ons arme’!
translation.en: A new banner for our army!

translation.lb: Den 30. september 1858 huet de Prince Henri, démolege gouverneur vu Letzebuvg, de bataillo'ne vun Dickerech an Iechternach e fuendel iwerrécht.
translation.en: On September 30th, 1858, Prince Henri, then the governor of Luxembourg, presented a banner to the battalions of Diekirch and Echternach.

translation.lb: E vun dém fuendéle' wor bis elo dat banner, ënnert dém d'ietzeburger zaldote stongen, ënnert dém ai an alle situatio'nen hire mann gestallt.
translation.en: One of those banners has always been the banner under which Luxembourg soldiers stood, under which they proved themselves in all situations.

translation.lb: Haut hu mer eng nei arme', de' vun der freiwëllegekompanie zur voileksarme' erweidër't go'f.
translation.en: Today we have a new army, expanded from the volunteer company to the people's army.

translation.lb: De' nei arme' go'f e mëttwoch, de 29. mé ënnert e neie fundel gestallt.
translation.en: The new army was placed under a new banner on Wednesday, the 29th of May.

translation.lb: All militäresch autorite'te wore bei der feierlecher cérémonie am kasèrenhaff présent: de geiierol Prënz Félix, den Iérw- Grand-Duc Jean, de krichsminister Dupong.
translation.en: All military authorities were present at the ceremonial event in the barracks courtyard: General Prince Félix, the heir Grand Duke Jean, and the Minister of War Dupong.

translation.lb: De lt.-col. Ginter vyiérdegt an treffende ■wiérder dVerdéngschter an de' solid haltong vun ail déne letzeburger zaldoten, de' ënnert dem aie fuendel gedéngt resp. sech fir d'hémecht agesat bun, an hié mécht appell un'ons nei arme', grad eso' trei a fest zum neie fuendel ze istoen.
translation.en: Lt. Col. Ginter praised in striking words the merits and solid commitment of all the Luxembourg soldiers who served under the old banner and stood up for the homeland and appealed to our new army to stand as loyally and firmly by the new banner.

translation.lb: Den Iérw- Grand-Duc Jean iwerget der arme' am jiumm vun der Grande-Duchesse Charlotte dat neit banner, "nanner dém d'arme' zesummestoe soll; iwer dem kasèrenhaff wiéwt d'stëmmong vun historesche momenter,-•.
translation.en: The heir Grand Duke Jean hands over the new banner to the army in the name of Grand Duchess Charlotte, under which the army is to stand together; over the barracks courtyard the mood of historical moments wafts.

translation.lb: D'arme' défile'ert; d'parad get ofgeholl vum generol Prënz Félix, vum Iérw-Grand- Duc Jean, vum krichsminister Dupong a vun de lt.-col. Ginter â Jacoby.
translation.en: The army parades; the parade is reviewed by General Prince Félix, heir Grand Duke Jean, Minister of War Dupong, and Lt. Col. Ginter and Jacoby.

translation.lb: De neie fuendel glënnert a biénkt an der sonn.
translation.en: The new banner glitters and shimmers in the sun.

translation.lb: Stolz stét de Ro'de Le'w a weiss-bloem feld, a gëlle glëtzert de Kro'nele'w iwer dem monogramm vün der Grande-Duchesse.
translation.en: Proudly stands the Red Lion in the white-blue field, and the Golden Lion glimmers above the monogram of the Grand Duchess.

translation.lb: Wierklech, de neie fuendel le'sst sech weisen an ze félicite'ere sin de' de' en entworf a geschaf: d'hère Roger, Mockel, Wirion, Kaufmann a vir allem den hèr Oberleutnant Steffen.
translation.en: Indeed, the new banner can be proudly displayed, and those who designed and created it are to be congratulated: Mr. Roger, Mockel, Wirion, Kaufmann, and especially Mr. Oberleutnant Steffen.

translation.lb: Mir wënscben, datt ons nei arme' ënnert dem neie fuendel ste'ts voll e'ere stoe soll à m sënn vun der letzeburger traditio'n: frei a- frei.
translation.en: We wish for our new army to always stand with full honor under the new banner in the spirit of Luxembourg tradition: free and free.

translation.lb: D’hollännesch provinzialwahlen
translation.en: The Dutch provincial elections

translation.lb: D'rcsultater vun den hollännesche provinzialwahlen sin ongefe'er de' we' se de 17. mé ansgefall woren.
translation.en: The results of the Dutch provincial elections are roughly as they occurred on 17 May.

translation.lb: D'arbechterpartei verle'ert bal 140.000 stemmen, d'historesch chrëschtc gewannen der 80.000 an d'kommnnisten an d'katholiken hnn hir positio'ne verbessert
translation.en: The Workers' Party lost almost 140,000 votes, the historic Christian party gained 80,000, and the Communists and Catholics improved their positions.

translation.lb: Bai 570.500 wiéler hn net gewiélt oder hnn e weisse stëmmziédel ofgin, dat sin der 90.000 me' we' de 17. mé.
translation.en: About 570,500 voters did not vote or cast a blank ballot, which is 90,000 more than on 17 May.

translation.lb: Am nördleche Brabant an am Limburg hun d'katholiken eng absolut majorite't.
translation.en: In North Brabant and Limburg, the Catholics have an absolute majority.

translation.lb: An denen anere provönzen huet keng partei eng absolut majorite't kritt.
translation.en: In the other provinces, no party gained an absolute majority.

translation.lb: De e seht chamber. vun denen d'membercn vun de provënze gewiélt gin, erleid also keng wesentlech ehangementer.
translation.en: The first chamber, from which members are elected by the provinces, therefore does not suffer any significant changes.

translation.lb: D'katholike sin hei am stärkste vertrueden an zwar hu si 16 Setzer kritt.
translation.en: The Catholics are the strongest represented here, having received 16 seats.

translation.lb: Duerno kënnt d'arbechterpartei matt 14 an d anti-revolutionnärpartei matt 7 sëtzer.
translation.en: Next comes the Workers' Party with 14 seats and the Anti-Revolutionary Party with 7 seats.

translation.lb: Des drei Parteien hun hir positio'ne behapt.
translation.en: These three parties held their positions.

translation.lb: D'historesch chröschten hun 1 setz verlner a si hun der elo nure me' 5.
translation.en: The historical Christians lost 1 seat and now only have 5.

translation.lb: Och d'kommunisten hu 5 sëtzer op sech verénegt.
translation.en: The Communists also have united around 5 seats.

translation.lb: D'freihétspartei behält hir drei sëtzer.
translation.en: The Freedom Party retains its three seats.

translation.lb: De' 4 nationalsozialistesch memberen vun der fre'erer Chamber si natirlech verschwonnen.
translation.en: The 4 National Socialist members of the former Chamber have naturally disappeared.

translation.lb: D’graw vum Otto vu Lothréngen an der Basilika?
translation.en: The grave of Otto of Lorraine in the Basilica?

translation.lb: De grof Otlo vu Lolhrénge wor e nokomme vum Karl dem Grossen (f 814) au de löschte mäunteche spross vun dem berühmte caroléngesche gesch locht.
translation.en: Count Otto of Lorraine was a descendant of Charlemagne (died 814) and the last male descendant of the famous Carolingian dynasty.

translation.lb: Hié so'M seng lèscht liévvensjoeren an der sbtei vun Iécbternacli verbruecht hun a we' hién am joer 1005 gestuerwen ass, huet hién der ablei gro ss werter hannerlôss matt der bedéngong.
translation.en: It is said he spent his last years in the abbey of Echternach, and when he died in the year 1005, he left behind considerable wealth with the condition.

translation.lb: datt sei graw ganz einfach sollt sin a ni bekannt ge f.
translation.en: that his grave should be very simple and never be made known.

translation.lb: Ob bien an der Basilika begruewe go'f ass net bekannt.
translation.en: Whether he was buried in the Basilica or not is unknown.

translation.lb: D iwerliwci mg sÄ. datt wärend ail déne joerhonuerten emmer liemmen zwé mönchen de' plaz kannt hätten.
translation.en: The legend goes that throughout all these centuries only two monks knew the location.

translation.lb: Nuren eng stenge plaque, de' no alen documenter ursprénglech ilénks vum cho'cr an der Basilika ubruecht wor, huet him an einfache wiérder e'weg ro' gewünscht:
translation.en: Only a stone plaque, which according to old documents was originally placed to the left of the choir in the Basilica, wished him eternal peace in simple words:

translation.lb: „Ollo Cornes tibi sit requies in saecula perpes" (Grof Oito, matt dir siéf d'ro' an e'wcgkét).
translation.en: "Ollo Cornes tibi sit requies in saecula perpes" (Count Otto, may rest and eternity be with you).

translation.lb: Wärend déne villen einbaute vun der Basilika go'f "de' opschrëft ail ke'er nés malt kat.lck zo'gedeckt an am joer 193S ass si bei der restauratio'n vun der Basilika endlech crem freigeluegt gin (J. P. Brimmeyr: 1862).
translation.en: During the many renovations of the Basilica, "the inscription got covered over and in the year 1938 during the restoration of the Basilica, it was finally uncovered again (J. P. Brimmeyr: 1862).

translation.lb: Mé aplaz lénks vum cho'er zc sin, wor si um rechte seilcschëff direct niewend der praelate capell.
translation.en: But instead of being to the left of the choir, it was on the right aisle directly next to the prelate chapel.

translation.lb: We' et schéngt go'f si wärend dem OOjärege krich, fir d'graw, an dem gro'ss reichtemer leie sollen, virum de'fstall ze behiüden, vun de mönchen un de' nei plaz ubruecht.
translation.en: As it appears, it was during the Thirty Years' War, to protect the grave, which was supposed to contain great wealth, that the monks moved it to the new location.

translation.lb: Well ons Basilika wahrscheinlech nés vun ennen erop ganz nei opgebaut muss gin, ivèrt sech vleicht dat rätsel em den Otto vu Lothringen an em seng lèschte ro'plaz le'sen.
translation.en: As our Basilica will probably have to be entirely rebuilt from the ground up, maybe the mystery about Otto of Lorraine and his last resting place will be solved.

translation.lb: Op jidde fall wir et net schlecht, vva recherchen an dém sënn ennerholl ge'- wen.
translation.en: In any case, it would not be amiss if research in this sense were undertaken.

translation.en: A stormy weather incident again.

translation.lb: — Pengschlsamschdeg liate mer hei op der uewersauer nés e schwe"- ert wiéder.
translation.en: — Last Saturday, we experienced a severe storm here on the Upper Sauer.

translation.lb: Leider ass d'sâch de' ke'er net grad eso' gemillech verlaf.
translation.en: Unfortunately, this time the situation did not go quite as smoothly.

translation.lb: Vcrschiddc mol huet et ageschlocn an zimleche schued gemäch.
translation.en: Several times it struck and caused considerable damage.

translation.lb: Onse kirchturm go vv uerg gelraff a krut en de'we rëss.
translation.en: Our church tower was badly hit and got a severe crack.

translation.lb: Am stall vun engem noper ass d've' richteg durchené geworf gin an c rand huet misse gleich otgeschluecht gin.
translation.en: In a neighbor's stable, the storm caused chaos, and a cow had to be slaughtered immediately.

translation.lb: An derbei mecht de baromcjjT nach emmer de'sehvecht spreng, eso dalt d'wiéder sech kaum ze fcslege schéngt.
translation.en: Moreover, the barometer still suggests bad weather, indicating that the storm seems hardly settled.

translation.lb: E neie „Super-Liner“
translation.en: A new "Super-Liner"

translation.lb: De Wladimir Jurkewitsch, dén de franse'sche riesendampfex „Normandie" gebaut huet, ass am gang, nei plangen auszeschaffen, fir en anere monstrum ze bauen.
translation.en: Wladimir Jurkewitsch, who built the French giant steamship "Normandie", is working on new plans to build another monster.

translation.lb: Et soll e passage'erdampfer vun 100 000 brutloregistertonne gin.
translation.en: It will be a passenger steamer of 100,000 gross register tons.

translation.lb: D'plangen hu schon eng präzis form ugeholl, so'datt de bau fir de' next zo'konft envisage'ert ka gin.
translation.en: The plans have already taken a precise shape, so that construction can be considered for the near future.

translation.lb: D'„Queen Mary" ass 310 meter läng, d'„Normandie" 313,75 meter an d'„Queen Elisabeth" 314,35 meter.
translation.en: The "Queen Mary" is 310 meters long, the "Normandie" 313.75 meters, and the "Queen Elisabeth" 314.35 meters.

translation.lb: De neie Super-Liner soll eng längt vun 360 meter hun a 4000 passage'er ophuele kënnen.
translation.en: The new Super-Liner is supposed to have a length of 360 meters and accommodate 4,000 passengers.

translation.lb: D'streck tëschent Southampton a New York kann an drei dég gemat gin.
translation.en: The route between Southampton and New York can be done in three days.

translation.lb: Hei si vergleichshalwer e puer undeitongen:
translation.en: Here are a few comparisons:

translation.lb: „Queen Mary": Volumen: 81 235 registertonnen; längt: 310,70 meter; maschinnestärkt: 200 000 PS; Vitesse 29/30 kniét.

translation.lb: De’ nei orthographie An enger pxessconferenz go'w den hèr minister Margue explicatio'nen, we' a fir wat de' orthographie agefo'ert go'w.
translation.en: The new orthography In a press conference, Mr. Minister Margue gave explanations about why and for what the orthography was introduced.

translation.en: In the discussions, it was established: "The new orthography will be tentatively introduced in our schools. Failure to grasp the new spelling (-if a child does not master it) should not be an obstacle for promotion to a higher class.

translation.lb: Die Schulbücher sollen vorläufig noch nicht umgeschrieben werden.
translation.en: The school books shall, for the time being, not be rewritten.

translation.lb: Pareisser friddensconferenz Rumänien kennt zu wuert Schlecht opnahm vum De Gasperi senger ried AB der sëtzong vu geseilter huet de rumäneschen Busseminister Tatarescu de standponkt vun senger regirong iwer den entworf fir de rumänesche friddensvertrag virgedroen.
translation.en: At the Paris peace conference, Romania is given a voice. The reception of De Gasperi's speech was poor. At the session, Romanian Foreign Minister Tatarescu presented the position of his government regarding the draft for the Romanian peace treaty.

translation.lb: Hié sot d'rumänesch regirong géng matt bedauere feststellen, datt d'rumänesch krichsbedélegong op de seite vun den allie'erte net berécksichtegt gi wir.
translation.en: He said the Romanian government regretted that Romania's wartime involvement on the side of the Allies was not acknowledged.

translation.lb: De rescht vum entworf ge'f vum rumänesche vollek matt satisfactio'n opgeholl gin, well en de Wiener sehiedssproch annulle'ert a Nord Siebenbürgen dodurger erem u Rumänien kennt an d'grenz matt Ollgarn erem eso' hirgestallt ge'f gin, we' se 1938 bestanen hätt.
translation.en: The rest of the draft was received with satisfaction by the Romanian people, as it annulled the Vienna Award, returning Northern Transylvania to Romania, and reestablished the border with Hungary as it was in 1938.

translation.lb: Dese beschloss vun den ausseministere ge'f vill derzo' beidroen, datt tëschent Rumänien an Ongarn erem eng activ collaboratio'n zustand kennt.
translation.en: This decision by the foreign ministers would greatly contribute to an active collaboration between Romania and Hungary again.

translation.lb: Weider huet den Tatarescu drop higewisen, datt Rumänien durch seng krichsbedélegong op de 6eite vun den allie'erten 110.000 mann verluer hätt.
translation.en: Furthermore, Tatarescu pointed out that Romania had lost 110,000 men through its wartime involvement on the side of the Allies.

translation.lb: Hié bedauert och, datt Rumänien eso' gro'ss wirtschaftlech afferen ofverlângt ge'we gin an datt seng reparatio'nefuerderengen un Deischland an Italien net berécksichtegt ge'we gin.
translation.en: He also regretted that Romania had been demanded to make such significant economic sacrifices and that its reparations claims against Germany and Italy had not been acknowledged.

translation.lb: Nodém de rumäneschen ausseminister matt senger riéd zu enn wor, krut de russeschen delege'erte Wischinsky d'wuert.
translation.en: After the Romanian Foreign Minister finished his speech, the Russian delegate Vyshinsky took the floor.

translation.lb: Hié begre'sBt et, datt a Rumänien den democratesche géscht a voller entwécklong stét so'we* den entschlosa vun der rumänescher regirong d'féler vun der vcrgângenhét erem guddzemâchen.
translation.en: He welcomed that the democratic spirit in Romania was fully developing, as well as the determination of the Romanian government to rectify the mistakes of the past.

translation.en: Molotov laid out the following three main points regarding De Gasperi's speech: 1) De Gasperi did not acknowledge in his speech that Italy regrets its past.

translation.lb: Weider gét draus ervir, datt Italien de' al imperiallstesch politik nach net:opgin hnet.
translation.en: It further emerges that Italy has not yet given up its old imperialistic policy.

translation.en: 2) While Russia assigns Italy an important position in the Mediterranean, certain powers attempt to dispute this position for not only Italy but also France.

translation.lb: Den abessyneschen delege'erten huet sen» gern erstaunen ausdrock gin, datt Italien net gewëllt ass seng roll an Afrika opzegin.
translation.en: The Abyssinian delegate expressed his astonishment that Italy is not willing to give up its role in Africa.

translation.lb: De Salazar hält England an Amerika fir „d’frënn vum Portugal“
translation.en: Salazar considers England and America as 'friends of Portugal'

translation.lb: Lissabon. — E samschdeg den owend huet de Premierminister vu Portugal Salazar eng ried vi-.un der generolconferenz vun der Nationaler Union gehalen an. dèr hién haptsächlech gcsôt huet:
translation.en: Lisbon. — On Saturday evening, the Prime Minister of Portugal, Salazar, gave a speech before the general conference of the National Union where he mainly said:

translation.lb: „Rucsiand ass amstand ganz Europa ze beherrsc.hen an et wir eng lîchtegkét fir et, dat durchzesctzen, well a ganz Europa keng natio-'n ass, de' amstand wir, him bewaffnete widaerstand cntge'ntzesetzen.
translation.en: "Russia is capable of dominating all of Europe, and it would be easy for it to do so because there is no nation in all of Europe that would be able to offer armed resistance against it.

translation.lb: Ech sin der ménong, "datt mir dofir England an Amerika als frëndstaate berechne kennen.
translation.en: I am of the opinion that we can therefore count England and America as friendly states.

translation.lb: Datselwccht kënnc mir vis-à-vis vu Russland, mègen ech, net soen."
translation.en: I can't say the same about Russia."

translation.lb: Op d'portugiesesch politip iwergoend, ass de Salazar weidergefuer:
translation.en: Continuing on the topic of Portuguese politics, Salazar went on:

translation.lb: „Wann c land we' Portugal e wé fond huet, wo' d'gedanken an d'actio'nen op enger solider bsis opgebaut kenne gin, dann ass et net ubruecht, desen systeni opzegin an op d'streidereg stemmen vum ausländ, de' énegkét a verse'nlechkét pricdcgcn, ze iauschteren."
translation.en: "If a country like Portugal has a way, where thoughts and actions can be built on a solid basis, then it is not appropriate to abandon this system and listen to the contentious voices from abroad that preach unity and understanding."

translation.lb: „Zwo' gro'ss natio'ne sin operstanen, fir sech d'herrschaft iwer d'welt ze délen: Amerika a Russlar.d.
translation.en: "Two great nations have arisen to divide world dominance: America and Russia.

translation.lb: Amerika wéss haut, wat et am joer 1919 nach net gewosst huet: seng verantwortong iwert seng muecht a sei sieg.
translation.en: America now knows what it didn't know in the year 1919: its responsibility for its power and its victory.

translation.lb: England, dat sech op eng wonnerbar mane'er gerett 'huct. kënnt der dualistescher opfâssong vun der anglo-sächseseher weit emmer me' no, obschons et nach onofhängeg handele kann."
translation.en: England, having saved itself in a miraculous manner, aligns more and more with the dualistic view of the Anglo-Saxon world, although it can still act independently."

translation.lb: Deitsch reparatio’nszuelongen Berlin.
translation.en: German reparations payments Berlin.

translation.lb: — D'wirtschaftsamt von allie'- erte controllrot huet gëschter bekanntgin, datt industriell instailatio'nen an dçnen drei westlechen zoncn, de' e wèrt vun 23 tnillio'nen dollar duerstellen, als reparatio'nszuelongen zur verfügong gestallt si gin.
translation.en: — The economic office of the allied control council announced yesterday that industrial installations in the three western zones, which represent a value of 23 million dollars, are made available as reparations payments.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech cm ronn 25.000 maschinnen, de' aus 70 verschiddene betrieben hirstâmen.
translation.en: It concerns around 25,000 machines, originating from 70 different operations.

translation.lb: 3/4 vun den instailatio'nen, e wèrt vun 58 millio'ne mark, sollen ënnert de' 18 allie'ert länner verdélt gin, de' usproch op deitsch reparatio'nszuelongen hun.
translation.en: 3/4 of the installations, worth 58 million marks, are to be distributed among the 18 allied countries that have a claim to German reparations payments.

translation.lb: De rescht kritt laut de Potsdamer bestëmmongen Russland a Polen.
translation.en: The rest will be given to Russia and Poland according to the Potsdam agreements.

translation.lb: De gre'ssten dél vun de fabriken stamt aus der amerikanescher zon (49 fabriken) wärend 18 fabriken aus der englescher an drei aus der franse'scher zon hirsin.
translation.en: The largest portion of the factories comes from the American zone (49 factories), while 18 factories are from the English zone and three from the French zone.

translation.lb: De chef vum wirtschaftsamt huet zu gleicher zeit bemîrkt, datt des reparatio'nszuelonge neischt un der amerikanescher reparatio'nspolitik ännere ge'f, d. h. datt d'bestëmmongen, datt ail preisesch fabriken, de' krichsmaterial hirgestallt hun a net op friddensproductio'n emgestallt kënne gin, als reparatio'nsléschtonge verwèrt kënne gin.
translation.en: The head of the economic office also noted that these reparations payments change nothing in the American reparations policy, i.e., the provisions that all Prussian factories that manufactured war material and cannot be converted to peace production can be used as reparations removals.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech bei dese fabrike méschtens cm Dornier an anere> fliegerfabriken, era chemesch a munitio'nsfabriken.
translation.en: These factories mostly concern Dornier and other aircraft factories, as well as chemical and munitions factories.

translation.lb: Aus der Uno Lake Success. — D'aussoe vum ministerpresident vun der Südafrikanescher Union, datt d'Union och o'ni d'awëllegong vun der Uno, dat fre'ert deitscht gebidd vu Südwestafrika ënnert hir verwaltong huele ge'f, eso'wuel vum ukraineschen, we' och vum weissrusseschen delege'erte schärf kritisc'ert,
translation.en: From the UN Lake Success. — The statement by the Prime Minister of the South African Union, that the Union would take control of the former German territory of Southwest Africa without the consent of the UN, was sharply criticized by both the Ukrainian and Belarusian delegates.

translation.lb: Des be'd delege'ert sin dobei einfach der russescher linn gefollegt.
translation.en: These two delegates simply followed the Russian line.

translation.lb: De weissrusseschè vertriéder huet beto'nt, datt d'Union geme'ss de bestëmmonge vun der charte gczwonge kennt gin, en ofkommen matt der Uno fir eng tieuhänderschaft iwert dat a fro kommend gebidd angoen.
translation.en: The Belarusian representative stressed that the Union is obliged under the provisions of the charter to enter into an agreement with the UN for a trusteeship over the territory in question.

translation.lb: De politeschc comité huet a senger sëtzong vu gëschter matt 29 ge'nt néng stëmme beschloss, dem secherhétsrot d'demande vun déne länner, de' gèren an d'Uno opgehnll gifwen, nach eng ke'er virzeiéen.
translation.en: The political committee decided in its session yesterday by 29 votes against nine to present the request of those countries wishing to join the UN once more to the Security Council.

translation.lb: Deser entschédong lo'g en australeschen antrag zu grond.
translation.en: This decision was based on an Australian proposal.

translation.lb: Ge'nt d'recommande'erong un de weltsecherhétsrot hu gestemmt d'delegatio'nc vun Amerika, Russland a Frankreich.
translation.en: The delegations of America, Russia, and France voted against the recommendation to the World Security Council.

translation.lb: l 19 amerikanesch Staaten hu sech uge-« bueden, der Uno gebidd z'iwerlôssep, fijr datt de stännege setz an hirem Staat opgerlcht soll gin.
translation.en: Nineteen American states offered to cede territory to the UN so that a permanent seat in their state would be established.

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch detegatio'n bei der Uno huet awer virgeschloen, datt fir de stännege sëtz- vun der Uno nemmen d'bezirker vu New-York, Philadelphia a Boston a fro komme sollten.
translation.en: The American delegation at the UN, however, proposed that only the districts of New York, Philadelphia, and Boston should be considered for the permanent seat of the UN.

translation.lb: De russesche vertriéder huet seng fuerderong, datt de stännege setz an Europa opgerlcht soll gin, erem zréckgezun.
translation.en: The Russian representative withdrew his demand that the permanent seat be established in Europe.

translation.lb: Op der anerer seit huet de schweizereschen ausseministerrot ugtfrot, ob et ne'- deg wir, datt en extrae sender fir d'Uno gebaut misst gin.

translation.lb: Matt Deitschland England fèrt, datt d'internationalisatio'n vun der Ruhr et de Russen erme'gleche ge'w, sech am weste festzesetzen.
translation.en: Germany and England fear that the internationalization of the Ruhr would allow the Russians to establish themselves in the west.

translation.en: America wants the Ruhr and the Rhineland to be exploited by an international organization, but the area should remain under German law.

translation.en: France demands the annexation of the Saar mines, the internationalization of the Ruhr, and the separation of the Rhineland.

translation.en: Russia takes no position.

translation.lb: Definitiv décisio'n: d'fro ruuss nach weider diskute'ert gin.
translation.en: Definite decision: the question will still be further discussed.

translation.lb: Den hèr Hamiilius werft der Chamber vir, datt hirt schaffe net me' sériés a rationnel ass an datt matt alle me'glechen an onme'glechen interpellatio'nen wèrtvoll zeit verplempert get.
translation.en: Mr. Hamiilius accuses the Chamber that their work is no longer serious and rational and that valuable time is wasted with every conceivable and inconceivable interpellation.

translation.lb: Am sölwechten zesummenhank mécht den hèr Rock d'propositio'n, de' députe'erl sollten fir klengegkéten de responsable minister vu fall zu fall schrëftilcch „interpelle'eren" an den hèr minister sollt och schrëftlech äntweren; dat geschreiws all ke'm dann an den „AnaJyteschen" an d'députe'ert an hir respectiv wiéler kennten et jo och dann do liésen.
translation.en: In the same context, Mr. Rock proposes that for trivialities, the deputies should individually "interpelate" the responsible minister in writing, and the minister should also respond in writing; this correspondence could then be in the "Analytical" and the deputies and their respective voters could also read it there.

translation.lb: (Da wiren awer de' ugeschmiert, de' sech eso'gèren schwetzcn he'erenl Hätte mer dann och iwerhapt gcnuch pabeier fir den „Analyteschen?" — d'redactio'n.)
translation.en: (But then those who like to hear themselves talk would be silenced! Would we even have enough paper for the "Analytical?" — the editorial.)

translation.lb: Aus de gemengere’t Wanseler.
translation.en: From the municipality council of Wanseler.

translation.lb: Bericht ivyert d'sëtzong vum conseil communal vum 14. februar.
translation.en: Report about the session of the municipal council on February 14th.

translation.lb: Ail membere wore présent.
translation.en: All members were present.

translation.lb: Ponkt I: Beschlossfâssong iwer den secretärsposten.
translation.en: Point 1: Decision-making regarding the secretary position.

translation.lb: Zur propositio'n vum hèr scheffe Loes, dén d'secretärsplaz net me' vun dem jetzegen titulär besât wëllt hun, fret den hèr bui'germéschter Kinnen em grën.
translation.en: Regarding the proposal of Mr. Scheffe Loes, who does not want the secretary position to be occupied by the current titleholder anymore, the mayor Mr. Kinnen asks for a reason.

translation.lb: Den hèr secretär Guth fret d'wuert an dèr ugeléenhét.
translation.en: Mr. Secretary Guth asks for the floor regarding this matter.

translation.lb: No enger ausfe'erlecher préambel iwer seng ustellong fir d'e'scht als receveur, dann als secretär exDlice'ert den hèr Guth d'fe'erong vun der gemeng zënter dem dag vun der liberatio'n bis zur ople'song vum gemengerot am juli 1945, fernerhen d'ge'stio'n vum neiernannte schefferot ad intérim bis haut.
translation.en: After an extensive preamble about his appointment first as a receiver, then as a secretary, Mr. Guth explains the management of the municipality since the day of liberation until the dissolution of the municipal council in July 1945, further detailing the management by the newly appointed interim council until today.

translation.lb: Den her secretär revoce'ert an heftegster weis an a schèrfste wiérder dat onqualifice'ert virgoe vum hèr Loes als eng perse'nlech intrigue an hién déclare'ert, datt hién matt oder ge'nt de wëll vum conseil communal seng plaz ge'w behalen, eso' läng we' et him ge'w passen.
translation.en: Mr. Secretary revokes in the strongest terms and with the sharpest words the unqualified action of Mr. Loes as a personal intrigue and declares that he will keep his position, with or against the will of the municipal council, as long as it suits him.

translation.lb: Et le'g absolut keng gesetzlech handhab ge'nt hié vir.
translation.en: There is absolutely no legal measure against him.

translation.lb: (Allgemeng zo'stëmmong seitens allen iwregen conselljéen.)
translation.en: (General agreement from all other councilors.)

translation.lb: Ponkt 2: D'grondgehälter vum receveur a vum gemengefiéschter gin der voller Indexziffer ugepasst.
translation.en: Point 2: The base salaries of the receiver and the municipal officer are adjusted to the full index figure.

translation.lb: Den hèr secretär renonce'ert op eng opbesserong vu sengem gehalt.
translation.en: Mr. Secretary renounces an improvement of his salary.

translation.lb: Dat blciwt op 1500 fr de mo'nt bestoen.
translation.en: That remains at 1500 francs per month.

translation.lb: Fir den civilstand gi fir de mo'nt 100, fir d'gestio'n vum bureau de bienfaisance 50 fr. pro mo'nt festgesät.
translation.en: For the civil status, 100 francs per month, and for the management of the welfare office, 50 francs per month are set.

translation.lb: -Ponkt 3: De conseil ass am prineip d'accord, eng parzell terrain zu Doncels, op rechnong vun der sectio'n Doncels unzeschâfen.

translation.en: With this, I also make an appeal to all other countries to renounce all aggressive policies and to desist from using propaganda and nerve warfare to keep other countries in constant alertness.

translation.lb: Fir unzefänken, liest hién en auszoch aus enger erklärong vum Ribbentrop vir, wo'ranner hién awer vum président gesot kritt, datt et him net erlabt wir, dat schrëftstéck weider virzeliésen.
translation.en: To start, he read out an excerpt from a statement by Ribbentrop, but was told by the president that he was not allowed to continue reading that document.

translation.lb: De Ribbentrop hätt an der aussepolitik sve'neg oder guer neischt ze soen gehat, en hätt nemme breichen dem Hitler seng uerderen auszefe'eren.
translation.en: Ribbentrop supposedly had little or nothing to say in foreign policy, he only had to carry out Hitler's orders.

translation.lb: Als zeie fir de Ribbentrop get dann de fre'ere secrétaire vum auswärtegen amt, Adolf von Steegrad, ausgefrot.
translation.en: Then, as a witness for Ribbentrop, the former secretary of the foreign office, Adolf von Steegrad, is questioned.

translation.en: Ribbentrop's defender states that due to the heavy nerve-wracking nature of the proceedings, it is not possible for Ribbentrop to testify himself.

translation.lb: D’Liberatio’n vu Pareis De 24. august 44 h net d'ganz weit voîler spannong de franse'sehe Tadio gelauschtert, dé fix d'e'scht vun der diberatio'n vu Pareis geschwat huet.
translation.en: On August 24, 1944, the whole world listened with tension to the French radio, which first spoke of the liberation of Paris.

translation.lb: Nach si a d'preisesch panzer an de strôsse patrouille'ert, nach hât d'SS hire oommandoposlo net verlôss, nach huet de militärbefehlshaber von Cboltitz d'befehler aus dem F ühre rhau p t qua rt ie r kritt a schon hât d'pareisser populatio'n sech matt engem énzegartege coup erhuewen.
translation.en: Still, Prussian tanks patrolled the streets, the SS had not yet abandoned their command posts, and the military commander von Choltiz was still receiving orders from the Führer's headquarters, yet the Parisian population had risen with a unique coup.

translation.lb: De radio wor an der hand vun der gro'sser FFlarme'.
translation.en: The radio was in the hands of the great FFlarme'.

translation.lb: Den dag virdrun hât de generol Eisenhower der divisio'n Leclerc d'erlabnes gin, de marsch op PaTcis opzehuelen, a gieichzeiteg huet sech d'immens heeresgrupp Bradley no Osten a bewegong gesat.
translation.en: The day before, General Eisenhower had given the division Leclerc permission to march towards Paris, and simultaneously, the immense Bradley army group began moving east.

translation.lb: Get Pareis a strôsseJcâmpf zerste'ert? Dat huet d'ganz civilise'ert weit sech gefrot.
translation.en: Will Paris be destroyed in street fighting? This is what the entire civilized world was asking.

translation.lb: De 25. august ass an engem onbeschreiwleche jubel d'divisio'n Leclerc an d'stad ageréckt an huet de" verénzelt kämpfend preisesch gruppen opgeriwen.
translation.en: On August 25, with indescribable jubilation, the Leclerc division entered the city and broke up the isolated fighting Prussian groups.

translation.lb: Pareis wor libere'ert duerch eng wonneribar zesummenarbecht vun de Pareisser birger matt der franse'scher arme'<
translation.en: Paris was liberated through a wonderful collaboration between the Parisians and the French army.

translation.lb: Mir liate seiner geléenhét, ne' mer heim lèschten internationale congress vun <ler Resistenz zu Pareis waren, fiions de réduit op der Place Denfert- Rochereau unzekucken, vun dém aus de Colonel Rot, chef vun den F. F. I. de l'lle-de-France, d'insurrection vu Pareis dirige'ert huet.
translation.en: We had the opportunity, when at the last international congress of the Resistance in Paris, to visit the stronghold at Place Denfert-Rochereau, from where Colonel Rol, leader of the F. F. I. de l'Ile-de-France, directed the insurrection of Paris.

translation.lb: Den CNR hât eng intim feler organise'ert, fir de friénie gäscht op der plaz durch de Colonel Roi sel wer de venlaf vun den operatio'nen, de' zur liberatio'n vu Pareis gefo'ert huu, explizc'eren ze Jössen.
translation.en: The CNR had organized an intimate event to allow Colonel Rol to personally explain to the honored guests on site the course of operations that led to the liberation of Paris.

translation.lb: Bei deser geléenhét konnte mer perse'nlecbe contact ophueie matt de generél Le Gentilhomme a Joinville, de' selwer oc.h eso' villes zur befreiong vu Pareis bcigedToen hun, an et huet sech erausgeslallt, datt de' séchercher, de' îwer des liberatio'n verbrét gi sin, der wirklechkét net entspriéchen.
translation.en: On this occasion, we were able to establish personal contact with General Le Gentilhomme in Joinville, who had also contributed so much to the liberation of Paris, and it turned out that the certainties spread about this liberation did not correspond to reality.

translation.lb: Et ass net engem wonner an och net der guddhét vum „Kommandierende General von Gross-Paris" zo'zeschreiwen, datt Pareis sech de Preisen hirer eso' se'er entlédege könnt.
translation.en: It is not due to a miracle nor the goodness of the "Commanding General of Greater Paris" that Paris could rid itself of the Prussians so easily.

translation.lb: Mir hun ons den ennerstand ugekuckt, den de'f cnner dem buedem catacombenarteg ausgebaut nss, an den d'Preise selwer als abri nach besser ausgebaut haten.
translation.en: We looked at the shelter, which was expanded catacomb-style under the ground, and which the Prussians themselves had further fortified as a shelter.

translation.en: They had possession of the plans, and yet Colonel Rol had set up his headquarters there, complete with all facilities, offices, and a functioning staff headquarters with telephone.

translation.lb: Bei sche'ssnianöveren an der Manche liuet den zerste'erer..Saint James" de remorker „Bucaneer" onglécklecherweis versenkt.
translation.en: During shooting maneuvers in the Channel, the destroyer 'Saint James' unfortunately sank the tugboat 'Bucaneer'.

translation.lb: Dese reinorker huet d'zill, op dat den zerste'rer sche'sse sollt, virun sech geschléft.
translation.en: This tugboat was towing the target that the destroyer was supposed to shoot at.

translation.lb: Den zerste'rer ass direct nom onglécksfall a schnellstem tempo op d'plaz, wo' de remorker gesonk ass, lassgedampt, mé et wor schon ze spe't.
translation.en: The destroyer immediately steamed at full speed to the place where the tug sank, but it was already too late.

translation.lb: De „Bucaneer", é vun déne mächtegsten englesche remorkeren ass gesonk.
translation.en: The 'Bucaneer', one of the most powerful English tugboats, sank.

translation.lb: Virdrun wor et dem zerste'rer nach gelongen, de 43 mann besatzong vum remorker zc retten, eso' datt kén affer zc bekloen ass.
translation.en: Previously, the destroyer managed to rescue the 43-man crew of the tugboat, so there are no casualties to mourn.

translation.en: Buenos Aires, September 9th — All agents of the city's radio stations have gone on strike.

translation.en: They have come into conflict with their musicians, who have demanded a wage increase and a bonus for Christmas.

translation.lb: Freideg, den 20. 4. 45 Em 8 auer sin ech an de büro gâng ail duerno...
translation.en: Friday, April 20th, 1945, at 8 o'clock I went to the office and then...

translation.en: I got on the bike and rode to Schillerstrasse to the city command office "Wehrmacht Location Elder".

translation.en: An enormous number of cars and motorcycles stood in front of the building.

translation.lb: 4 poste matt opgeplanztem seitegewier vrum haptagank...
translation.en: 4 guards with bayoneted rifles were in front of the main entrance...

translation.en: My "courier ID" was in order.

translation.en: - Up the stairs - again two guards. -

translation.lb: D'trap of an de keMer... vrum gefechtsstand... erem zwe' posten...
translation.en: Down the stairs to the room... in front of the combat post... again two guards...

translation.lb: an du stong ech vrun der portière vum allerhellegsten, vrun der hiél vum le'w....
translation.en: and I stood in front of the door of the most holy, before the head lion....

translation.lb: Am räum hannert der portière (et woren rwo' decken), eifreg discussio'nen, alles an engem dompfen to'n.
translation.en: In the room behind the door (there were two blankets), lively discussions, everything in a muffled tone.

translation.lb: Melder sin aus an a gelaf.
translation.en: Couriers ran in and out.

translation.lb: Gereischer vun engem morseapparai hun durch de räum getut.
translation.en: Noises from a Morse apparatus echoed through the room.

translation.lb: Ké mënsch huet sech em mech gekëmmert vun all dénen, de' doremmer gerannt sin*
translation.en: No one paid any attention to me among all those who ran around there.

translation.lb: Wat hätt ech och gesot, wann é mech gefrot hätt: Was machen Sie hier?
translation.en: What would I have said if he had asked me: What are you doing here?

translation.lb: Ech menge, wann den zirk zu Cottbus nach läng gedauert hätt,da wär ech och nach hannen um enn verréckt gin.
translation.en: I think, if the circus in Cottbus had lasted longer, I would have gone crazy at the end.

translation.lb: Ech wor op jiddefall fro' we' ech d'daglicht erem gesin hun....
translation.en: In any case, I was glad when I saw the daylight again....

translation.lb: Vrun der schokela&fabrik Burckbraun wor é gro'sse mënschenoplaf, a well ech jo emmer hu missen derbei sin, wann eng kâtz durch d'bâch geschléft go'f, sin ech och alt dohinner gefuer.
translation.en: In front of the Burckbraun chocolate factory, there was a large crowd, and since I always had to be there when a cat sneezed, I went there as well.

translation.lb: DMeidd si matt kartrongskëschten aus der fabrik eraus komm,..
translation.en: The women came out of the factory with cardboard boxes...

translation.lb: De schokela go'f verdéilt, jidderé krut eng këscht gratis...
translation.en: The chocolate was being distributed; everyone got a free box...

translation.lb: Et ka kaum é mënsch sech virsteilen, wat do alles opgestapelt wor...
translation.en: Hardly anyone can imagine what was all stacked there...

translation.lb: a mir, mir hun emol de geschmâch net me' vum schokela kannt.
translation.en: and we didn't even recognize the taste of chocolate anymore.

translation.lb: ..Die armen Soldaten" si natirlech virgelôss gin an eso' ko'm et, datt ech och gleich é kartrong matt 100 tablette schokela ënner dem arem hät.
translation.en: ..The "poor soldiers" were of course given priority, and so it came that I also had a cardboard box with 100 chocolate bars under my arm.

translation.lb: — D'Franse'sch Republik ënnerhëlt ni en eruewerongskrich a setzt seng truppe ni ge'nt d'freihét vun engem anere vollek an.
translation.en: The French Republic never undertakes a war of conquest and never deploys its troops against the freedom of another people.

translation.lb: — D'franse'scht vollek get songer souveränite't ausdrock durch d'députe'ert vun der Assemblée Nationale, de' durch allgemeng wählen gleich, direkt a geheim gewiélt gin.
translation.en: The French people express their sovereignty through the deputies of the National Assembly, who are elected by universal suffrage, equally, directly and secretly.

translation.lb: — D'Iänner aus iwersee wiéle oo de bedengonge vun de wahlgesetzer och députe'erte fir d'Assemblée Nationale.
translation.en: The overseas territories also elect deputies to the National Assembly under the conditions of the electoral laws.

translation.lb: — All Franso'sen a Franso'sinue vun 20 joer un kënc wiélen a sin also zu 20 joer gro'ssjäreg.
translation.en: All French men and women from the age of 20 can vote and are thus considered of legal age at 20.

translation.lb: — All wiéler a wiélerinne vun 23 joer un kenne gewiélt gin.
translation.en: All voters, male and female, from the age of 23 can be elected.
The 15th of 8. 43

translation.lb: De Russ soll hannert ons um wé no Poltava sin.
translation.en: The Russians are supposed to be behind us on the way to Poltava.

translation.lb: — Ons kompanie go'f nei opgestallt vun elauter ersaz.
translation.en: — Our company was newly formed entirely from replacements.

translation.lb: De ganzen dag weiderneischt we' trommelfeier a kleng russesch ugrëff.
translation.en: The whole day nothing but drumfire and small Russian attacks.

translation.lb: — Em den owend hun ech mech verdréckt a sin en tiérchen „zréck" mâche gângen..
translation.en: — In the evening I hid myself and went for a little "retreat".

translation.lb: An engem verlôssene russesche bunker an engem gârd hun ech geschlof.
translation.en: I slept in an abandoned Russian bunker and a garden.

translation.lb: Hei war et vill me' ro'eg we' un der front.
translation.en: Here it was much quieter than at the front.

translation.lb: Den 18. 8. 43 De muerge ko m ech nach „grad zer zeit" fir eng attaque mattzemâchen.
translation.en: On the morning of 18th August 1943, I just barely made it in time to join in an attack.

translation.lb: „Fertigmachen zum Mot.-Angriffl" Et sollt é verzweiwelongscoup gin.
translation.en: "Prepare for motorized attack" It was supposed to be an all-or-nothing attempt.

translation.lb: Mir op den autoen, stukkae ganz de'f iwert ons.
translation.en: We were in the vehicles, dive bombers flew directly over us.

translation.lb: De' kc'er huet de Russ awer d'schlappe verluer, mé mir hâte no e puer minutte scho kén auto me', hun ons missen op d'panzer setzen, weider gong et bis...
translation.en: However, the Russian messed up and lost the upper hand, but after a few minutes, we no longer had any vehicles, had to rely on tanks, it continued until...

translation.lb: datt de' ké sprit (benzin) me' haten.
translation.en: there was no more fuel (gasoline).

translation.lb: — Aus. — Mir wäre vleicht 4 —5 kilometer virgângen.
translation.en: — Finished. — We might have advanced 4-5 kilometers.

translation.lb: Wann én do zréck gekuckt huet iwert dat immenst sch'lucchtfedd,.. erofgeschosse flieger... brennend autoen... panzer, oilhémlech viM mënschen...
translation.en: When you looked back over that immense battlefield,... shot down planes... burning vehicles... tanks, numerous people...

translation.lb: oft op ganze ke'p zesumniegeschoss... kano'nen... pèrd a panjéwén... alles zerste'ert, verbrannt, do't.
translation.en: often gathered in large heaps... cannons... horses and wagons... everything was destroyed, burned, dead.

translation.en: He intends to save the English industry from decline through nationalization, as production fell from 267 million tons to 174 million tons in comparison to 1924.

translation.en: In the name of the opposition, Eden sharply criticized the government's policy and warned of the immense difficulties that are yet to present themselves.

translation.en: After long negotiations between representatives of the employers and of the unions, the steelworkers can finally sign a new "collective agreement."

translation.en: This is so that workers see improvements in their salary and working conditions.
