translation.en: For example, an unskilled worker who works his regular number of shifts per month will no longer earn only the minimum wage, as it was until now, but will even get an additional 364 francs per month.

translation.lb: AH le'n go'wen un eng nei indexziffer adapte'eTt, an dat un de' vun 2000 ponkten.
translation.en: Everything has been adapted to a new index number, and that to one of 2000 points.

translation.en: (The officials are still being paid according to the 1950 figures.)

translation.en: It is said that the total of these increases will amount to about 70—80 million francs.

translation.en: Most delegates, however, are completely pessimistic about the outcome of the operation.

translation.en: The commission that was established was the last hope, and it is to be feared that it will also only result in a failure.

translation.en: France has made a proposal, which leaves the choice between two procedures: to establish an investigative commission in the Balkans, to be accompanied by experts;

translation.en: or to dissolve this commission and send a mediation commission from the UN.

translation.en: The Russian delegate Gromyko commented on this proposal by saying that he does not understand one part of it, and the other part, which he understands, he cannot accept.

translation.en: A sub-committee was established.

translation.en: under the chairmanship of the Colombian delegate Lopez, to consolidate all the proposals that had been made.

translation.en: This sub-committee led to a fiasco.

translation.lb: D'amerikanescli regirong huet dem sccherhétsrot eng note zo komme gelôss.
translation.en: The American government sent a note to the Security Council.

translation.en: which states: "If the United Nations is blocked by the Russian veto in the Balkans.

translation.en: then America will take other measures to protect Greece."

translation.en: The American representative Johnson presented a resolution stating that the Security Council should declare,

translation.en: that Albania, Yugoslavia, and Bulgaria are giving the partisans all the support in their struggle against the Greek government.

translation.en: He is of the opinion that this assistance is a factor for the unrest and calls upon the three nations to cease their support.

translation.lb: Amerika fuerdert weider, datt e beliebt gemacht get iwer d'art a weis, we' de' 3 länuer desem befél nokomm siu.
translation.en: America further demands that it be made known how the three countries are complying with this order.

translation.lb: D'resolutio'n vcriâttgt weider, datt de' 3 lünner hëllefen, matt friddleche mëttel ro' am Balkan ze stëften.
translation.en: The resolution further maintains that the three countries help to establish peace in the Balkans through peaceful means.

translation.lb: Stârken écho vum Churchill senger riéd London, 20. augusl (Reuter) —
translation.en: Strong echo from Churchill's speech London, August 20 (Reuter) —

translation.lb: DTiéd vum Churchill vum leschte samschdeg stét ëmmer nach am mëttclponkt vun den erörterongen vun der englescher press,
translation.en: The speech by Churchill last Saturday is still at the center of the discussions in the English press,

translation.lb: de' an der beuxtélong vun den ausfe'erongen vum fre'ere Premierminister spéciell seng behaptong,
translation.en: which in the interpretation of the statements of the former Prime Minister, especially his assertion,

translation.lb: datt dle'song vun der actueller kris an der tederong vun der freier entreprise leie ge'f, schärf gedélt sin.
translation.en: that the solution of the current crisis lies in the support of free enterprise, has been sharply divided.

translation.lb: Conservativ Mieder we' den „Daily Express". „Daily Telegraph" an den „Daily Mail" luewen den Churchill an allen to'narten,
translation.en: Conservative media like the 'Daily Express', 'Daily Telegraph' and the 'Daily Mail' praise Churchill in all tones,

translation.lb: wärend d'organ vun der Labour-parly, den „Daily Herald", so'we' d'liberal blieder „News Chronicle" a „Manchester Guardian" d'wirksamkét
translation.en: while the organ of the Labour party, the 'Daily Herald', and the liberal papers 'News Chronicle' and 'Manchester Guardian' doubt the effectiveness

translation.lb: vnu der le'song. de' de Churchill propose'ert huet, we'negsteus descn ament stark bezweiwelen.
translation.en: of the solution proposed by Churchill, at least currently strongly questioning it.

translation.lb: D'„London Times" erklärt, d'riéd vum Churchill war oprichteg gewiéscht,
translation.en: The 'London Times' declares that Churchill's speech was sincere,

translation.lb: a seng krilik hält de' fondamental problemer vun der actueller kris getraff.
translation.en: and his critique touched on the fundamental problems of the current crisis.

translation.lb: Seng gudd opgebaut, energesch riéd hätt d'theorien vu senge ge'gner dar un d'wackele kritt,
translation.en: His well-structured, energetic speech had managed to shake the theories of his opponents,

translation.lb: doge'ut ass zeidong net ganz d'accord malt him, wo' hié gesot huet, wat hlé mâche ge'f wann hién am Attlee senger plaz war.
translation.en: however, the newspaper is not entirely in agreement with him, when he said what he would do if he were in Attlee's place.

translation.lb: An d'zeidong sét, dat war we'neg iwerzégend gewiéscht.
translation.en: And the newspaper says that was not very convincing.

translation.lb: De „Manchester Guardian" luewt d'riéd als „wirksam an hire kritik ge'ut d'regirong", si ass ower net constructiv.
translation.en: The 'Manchester Guardian' praises the speech as 'effective in its criticism of the government', but it is not constructive.

translation.lb: Letzeburger Memorandum
translation.en: Luxembourg Memorandum

translation.lb: De fridd vu Regensburg Ain joer 1679 hât de franse'sche kinnek Louis XIV réunio'nskammeren agesat, fir ze ënnersichen, op wat fir gebidder Frankreich nach recht hätt.
translation.en: The peace of Regensburg In the year 1679, French king Louis XIV established reunion chambers to investigate which territories France still had rights to.

translation.lb: Bei dèr geléenhét go'w och d'festong Letzeburg vve'nt hirer gro'sser strategescher bedeitong als franse'sch déclare'ert.
translation.en: On that occasion, the fortress Luxembourg was also declared French due to its great strategic significance.

translation.lb: Mé Spuenien huet net mir neischt dir neischt op Letzeburg verzieht.
translation.en: But Spain did not readily concede Luxembourg.

translation.lb: D'festong go'w duerophin belagert vum Créqui a Vauban.
translation.en: The fortress was then besieged by Créqui and Vauban.

translation.lb: De 4. juni ass se gefall.
translation.en: On June 4th, it fell.

translation.lb: Frankreich huet du de 15. august 1684 um fridd vu Regensburg Letzeburg u Spuenien ofgetrueden.
translation.en: France ceded Luxembourg to Spain on August 15, 1684, at the peace of Regensburg.

translation.lb: Domatt hât de' e'scht franse'sch herrschaft fir onst land agesat.
translation.en: Thus began the first French rule over our land.

translation.lb: Well verscliidden adeleger dem absolutisteschen franse'sche klnnek getrotzt hun, go'wen eng ganz rei vu réngraaueren geschleift, ënner aneren Dikerech, Iéchternach a Gre'vemacher; och verschidde bürgen sin zesumme geschoss gin.
translation.en: Because various nobles resisted the absolutist French king, a whole series of fortifications were demolished, including in Diekirch, Echternach, and Grevenmacher; also several townspeople were shot together.

translation.lb: Matt der franse'scher besatzong hun dem Vauban senb gedeiteud festongsarbechtcn agesat.
translation.en: With the French occupation, Vauban's significant fortress works were implemented.

translation.lb: D'populatio'n, de' durch all de' kricher stark zréckgange war, go'w opgefëllt doduerch, datt ënnert gënschtege couditio'ne friém Laueren, handwierker asw. erageholl go'wen.
translation.en: The population, which had been greatly decreased through all the wars, was replenished by taking in foreign laborers, craftsmen, etc., under favorable conditions.

translation.lb: Arn handel ass et du stark biergop gang, grad eso' gudd we' d'landwirtschaft an d'eisenindustrie nés an d'lucht an zo' ueier ble' komm sin.
translation.en: In trade, things went strongly uphill, just as agriculture and the iron industry came back to life.

translation.lb: De' e'scht franse'scli herrschaft, erbeigefe'ert durch de fridd vu Regensburg, wor also fir onst land e gudden zeitaller, wann och tëschend dem frause'sGhen a spueneschen ahsolutismus e gro'ssen ënnerschéd wor.
translation.en: The first French rule, brought about by the peace of Regensburg, was thus a good era for our land, even though there was a great difference between French and Spanish absolutism.

translation.lb: dén àl arichtongen a freihéten zo' schâne gemacht huet.
translation.en: which made the old institutions and freedoms fall apart.

translation.lb: Si nach Letzeburger zu Tambow?
translation.en: Are there still Luxembourgers in Tambow?

translation.lb: Et ass en elsässcsche jong aus Russland eremkomm, dé versehiddene letzeburgescbe familje matfgedélt huet, hlre joug -wir matt ongefe'er 200 anere Letzeburger an engem sainmellager bei Tambow.
translation.en: A young Alsatian returned from Russia who informed various Luxembourgish families that their youth were with approximately 200 other Luxembourgers in a collection camp near Tambow.

translation.lb: Des meldong musse mir jiddeialls matt gro'sser virsiclit ophuclen.
translation.en: We must handle this report with great caution.

translation.lb: Oflénong vun der russescher Protestnote durch d’USA Washington, 4. sept. (AFP)

translation.lb: D Tussesch Protestnote iwçr d'erhe'goug vum preiseschen industrievolumen ass vun den USA matt der heier begrënnong zréckgewisc gin:
translation.en: The Russian protest note about the increase of the Prussian industrial volume has been rejected by the USA with the following justification:

translation.lb: D'tatsäch, datt Sowjetrussland de Potsdamer accord net ausgefeert huet, huet d'Verénegt Staaten vun Amerika finanziell] schwe'er belSscht.
translation.en: The fact that Soviet Russia did not implement the Potsdam Agreement has financially burdened the United States of America heavily.

translation.en: Russia defends the Potsdam agreement. Berlin, September 6 (AFP). — The "Tägliche Rundschau", the organ of the Soviet military administration, published a statement on Thursday, in which Marshal Sokolowsky criticized at the Allied Control Council the Anglo-American plan for increasing industrial potential in the merged Anglo-American zones.

translation.lb: Tragesche selbstmord zu Wanseler W a n s e 1 e r.
translation.en: Tragic suicide in Wanseler W a n s e l e r.

translation.lb: An de fre'e muerge s tonnen vum 10. mé go'f eng fra aus dem duerf Wanseler, de' op de kierledit gong, zeie vun engem sohauregen Selbstmord.
translation.en: In the early morning hours of the 10th, a woman from the village of Wanseler, who was going to the cemetery, witnessed a horrific suicide.

translation.lb: Un engem grawkreiz um kierfechi hong d'leich vun engem an de' 70 joei nie mann, de' als de' vum bauer Wcinzcl vun hei identifize'ert go'w.
translation.en: On a grave cross at the cemetery hung the body of a man in his 70s, who was identified as the farmer Wcinzcl from here.

translation.lb: Den aussoe, vun den duerfbewunnci no waren d'beweggrënn vun deser dot de' folgend:
translation.en: According to statements from the villagers, the motives for this act were the following:

translation.lb: We' no der Rundstedtofl'ensivo d'leiehe vun de gefallenen amerikaneschen zaldote niassrvveis an onse besehet lo gen,
translation.en: After the Battle of the Bulge, the bodies of fallen American soldiers had to be temporarily stored in our area,

translation.lb: -huet de selbstmiérder sech bei desen armen 110 bijou'en emgekuckt, de' hién och selbstverständlech fond huet.
translation.en: -the suicide looked among these poor people for jewels, which he naturally found.

translation.lb: Hién huet et fèrdeg bruecht, t'ir engem gefâllenen zaldot eil diamantrenk ze stielen, net genug, datt hielt de rank geholl luiet, hién huet och, we' et hini net se'er genug gong, de fanger niant rank vun der band ofgetrennt.
translation.en: He managed to steal a diamond ring from a fallen soldier, and when that was not enough for him, he even severed the finger with the ring from the hand.

translation.lb: D'sacli blo'w onbekannt, bis se kierzlech vuii senger égcner duechter, dèr hién de rank als cadeau ivverrécht hat, verrode go'f an och eso' vrun d'gericlit ko'm...
translation.en: The matter remained unknown until recently, when he gave the ring as a gift to his own daughter, who revealed it and brought it before the court...

translation.lb: De Weinzel, clé gegléwt liuel, datt seng dot ongeheier folgen hält, we'nt der leichenschändong un onse befreiet, wo'sst wuel kén aneren auswé me',
translation.en: The Weinzel, who believed that his act would have monstrous consequences because of the desecration of our liberators' bodies, presumably saw no other way,

translation.lb: we' sengein liéwen durch de strack de schlussponkt ze setzen.
translation.en: than to put an end to his life by hanging.

translation.lb: Wuerfir hién ausgerechent de kieifecht als Schauplatz vun senger dot an é kiert'echtskrciz als galge gewiélt liuet, dat siéf dohigestallt, op jiddefall, ei lend all dot liirc ricliter.
translation.en: Why he chose the cemetery as the scene of his act and a church cross as the gallows is left unsaid, but in any case, the final judgment lies beyond.

translation.lb: Stëps a schwéss.
translation.en: Dust and sweat.

translation.lb: An der loft hänken d'stëpskiérpercher zu millio'nen a millio'nen.
translation.en: In the air, dust particles hang by the millions and millions.

translation.lb: Si setzen sech natirlech och um kiérper fest.
translation.en: Naturally, they also settle on the body.

translation.lb: Bei gro'sser hëtzt treffen si do op de schwéss an haften sech fest r verdréchnen zum gro'sseu dél a stoppen d'poren zo\ so'datt si weder kulestoff aussschéden nach Sauerstoff anôtme kënnen.
translation.en: In great heat, they meet the sweat there and stick firmly, drying to a large extent and blocking the pores so that they can neither release carbon dioxide nor inhale oxygen.

translation.lb: Dodurch de malaise bei gro'sser hëtzt.
translation.en: Hence the malaise in great heat.

translation.lb: D'haut selwer bestét aus elauter Zeilen, de' fortwährend ofstierwen an sech erneieren.
translation.en: The skin itself consists of numerous cells that constantly die off and renew themselves.

translation.lb: De' ofgestuerwen zellen gi beim waschen elimine'ert.
translation.en: The dead cells are eliminated during washing.

translation.lb: Ennerbleiwt e regelme'ssegt Wäschen, da kliéwen si sech ebenfalls um schwéss fest au hellefen och d'poren verstoppen.
translation.en: If regular washing is neglected, they also stick to the sweat and help block the pores.

translation.lb: Aus dese puer elementare betrachtongen zwéngt sech jidferengem d'erkenntnes op, datt d'wäschen an d'bueden eng onbedengt necessite't am intressi vun onser gesondhét a vun onsem Allgemenge wuelbefanne sin.
translation.en: From these few elementary considerations, it becomes clear to everyone that washing and bathing are absolute necessities in the interest of our health and general well-being.

translation.lb: De kiérper verlangt no erfrëschong, besonnesch am sumemr.
translation.en: The body craves refreshment, especially in summer.

translation.lb: De' eng sichen des erfrëschong vu bannen, an engem kàlen humpen, a .fannen se net, well vu bannen kre'e mir d'poren an der haut net op.
translation.en: Some seek this refreshment from within, in a cold drink, but do not find it, because from within we do not open the pores of the skin.

translation.lb: New York, 4. october (AFP) — Virun enger versamnulong, huet den amerikanesche verdédegongsminister, James Forrestal, erklärt, datt an den USA weder d'entrepreneuren nach d'arbechter e ne-ie krich wellten.
translation.en: New York, October 4th (AFP) — Before an assembly, American Secretary of Defense James Forrestal declared that neither the entrepreneurs nor the workers in the USA wanted a new war.

translation.lb: De Forrestal huet sech ge'nt de' am kJ vun de leschten drei wochen e puer mol opgestallte behaptong, wo'no d privatentreprise an de capitatismus d'ustëfter vun engem neie krich wären, gewandt.
translation.en: Forrestal opposed the claims, repeatedly made in the last three weeks, that private enterprise and capitalism were instigators of a new war.

translation.lb: Hién huet erklärt, am laf vun de leschten 2 joer hätten d'amerikanesch industriell me' we' 20 mMliarden dollar investe'ert, fir de friddleche wuerebedarf vun der weit ze decken.
translation.en: He stated that American industry had invested more than 20 billion dollars in the last two years to meet the peaceful needs of the world.

translation.lb: De Forresta'l huet d'erhalen vun der railitärescher macht vun den USA verdédegt an huet erklärt, so'lâng d'Verént Natio'nen nach net zu engem wirksamen instrument vum fridden gi wären, war et gené eso' domm, éseiteg ofzerëschten, d'pompiet'en ofzeschafen, an der hoffnong dodurch nei brsnn ze verhënneron.
translation.en: Forrestal defended maintaining the United States' military power and stated that as long as the United Nations was not yet an effective instrument of peace, it was equally foolish to unilaterally disarm, to eliminate pomp and splendor, in the hope of thereby preventing new wars.

translation.en: — A demonstration, which was organized by Catholic action to protest against the anti-Catholic press, escalated into chaos due to the interference of opposing elements.

translation.en: Cardinal Adeodato Piazza, who was supposed to speak at St. Mark's Square, was repeatedly interrupted in his speech and his voice was drowned out by insults and jeers from the opponents.

translation.en: The bomb completely destroyed the courtroom.

translation.en: It was well known that the same incident occurred weeks ago in Stuttgart and Esslingen.

translation.en: 11 defendants were now awaiting sentencing.

translation.en: Prosecutor Karl Erhard associated the bombing with a denazification trial.

translation.lb: de' ge'nt de frc'eren directer vum Gcstapo-prisong zu Nürnberg ugestrèngt gin ass, an zesummenhang bruecht.
translation.en: which had been initiated against the former director of the Gestapo prison in Nuremberg, and linked it together.

translation.lb: Dese prozess wor de leschte freideg suspende'ert gin, w-ell de President vum entnazifize'erongsgerlcht matt der verdédogong averstane wor, fir de fall virun e gewe'ulecht gericht ze bréugen.
translation.en: This trial was suspended last Friday because the president of the denazification court agreed with the defense to bring the case before an ordinary court.

translation.en: In the session, the rent was discussed, which should have been raised weeks ago.

translation.en: But in the first session, the deputies could not yet agree.

translation.lb: Et ass jo kloer, datt de loyer haut ze nidreg ass am vergleich zo' denen anere preisser (net all loyers'en, well et gin och propriétairen, de' no neischt kukken an einfach hire lokatâr nom index festgesât hun).
translation.en: It is clear that the rent today is too low compared to other prices (not all rents, because there are landlords who pay no attention and simply set the rent for their tenant according to the index).

translation.lb: Mé de' méscht égentëmmer stin nach um loyer vun 1939, obschon den index vun 700 op 1850 gestigen ass, obschon d'steieren gehe'gt go'wen an obschon d'repavaturen eso' deier sin.
translation.en: But most owners still have the rent from 1939, although the index has risen from 700 to 1850, although taxes have increased and although repairs are so expensive.

translation.lb: E klcnge propriétaire, dén zwé oder drei heiser huet, könnt virum krich dovu liéwen.
translation.en: A small landlord, who has two or three houses, could live off it before the war.

translation.lb: Haut ass dat him f»anz onme'glech.
translation.en: Today that is completely impossible for him.

translation.lb: Allerdéngs ass sei kapital haut ve'ermol eso' he'cli, we' 1939.
translation.en: However, his capital today is just as high as in 1939.

translation.lb: En de virum krich boer geld op der spuerkés luit, huet sei kapital nemme matt 25°/# vum Staat opgewert kritt.
translation.en: Those who placed cash in the savings bank before the war have had their capital revalued by only 25% by the state.

translation.lb: De krich liuçt se allen zwe'n gestroft, well se gespuert bäten.
translation.en: The war punished them all in a way because they saved.

translation.lb: Wann de staal de loyer reglemenle'- ere well, da muss dat me'glechst gerecht gemach gin.
translation.en: If the state wants to regulate the rent, it must be done as fairly as possible.

translation.lb: Geschitt dat, wann en einfach op den 1..januar 1939 zréekgreift?
translation.en: Does that happen if one simply refers back to January 1, 1939?

translation.lb: Oder muss e fir de loyer net de-selwecht basis unhuelen de' och fir d'kapitalsteier erugezu go'w, närolecb den „Einheitswert"?
translation.en: Or must one not take the same basis for the rent as was applied for the capital tax, namely the "Einheitswert"?

translation.lb: Well de revenu vun engem haus muss dach op wechter basis festgeluecht gin, we d'steier.
translation.en: Because the income from a house must be determined on the same basis as the tax.

translation.lb: Zwétens erfuerdert d'gerech tegkét awer och, datt de' nei reglemen tatio'n fir ail haiser gëlt.
translation.en: Secondly, justice also requires that the new regulations apply to all houses.

translation.lb: Well wann nemmen de' àl Iokalären dervu profite'erc kënnfen, da ge'we vill propriétâre sichen, nei leidd an hire quartier ze kre'en, de' se dann he'ge kënnte, we' se wellten.
translation.en: Because if only the old locals could benefit from it, many landlords would seek to create new leases in their areas, which they could then set as they wanted.

translation.lb: An den hémleche schwärze mârt muss onbedengt verhënnerl gin.

translation.lb: Iwregens kritt en emmer me' d'impressio'n, dass an der matière vun den haiser an de loyers'en ké gesetz vill déngt.

translation.lb: Grondstén fir d’Dreifaltegkétskirch
translation.en: Foundation stone for the Church of the Holy Trinity

translation.lb: Den 22. Juni 1737 go'w zu Letzeburg de grondstén fir d'Dreifaltegkétskirch geluegt.
translation.en: On June 22, 1737, the foundation stone for the Church of the Holy Trinity was laid in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Nom nu mm vun dem orden vim de schwesteren zu denen hirem klo'schter d'kircli gebe ert huet, go'w se och Gongrégatio'nskirch genannt.
translation.en: According to the name of the order of the sisters to whose convent the church was given, it was also called the Congregational Church.

translation.lb: Durch e gank iwer d'sfcrôss wor se matt dem klo'schter verbonne gewiéscbt.
translation.en: Through a corridor over the street, it was connected to the convent.

translation.lb: We' d'Franso'sen d'herrschafl hei am land baten, go'w si matt anere kirchen beschlagnahmt.
translation.en: When the French ruled in this land, it was confiscated together with other churches.

translation.lb: We' nom gro'ssen Napoléon d'Franso'sen vill vun hirer muecht verluer baten, an an der festong Letzeburg eng preisesch garnison lo'g, go'w d'Drcifaltegkétskireh eng prolestantesch garniso'nskireh.
translation.en: When after the great Napoleon, the French lost much of their power, and a Prussian garrison was stationed in the fortress of Luxembourg, the Church of the Holy Trinity became a Protestant garrison church.

translation.lb: Haut déngt se nach emmer dem protestantesche cult.
translation.en: Today it still serves the Protestant cult.

translation.lb: Den âlen Cercel Wo' haut de Palais Municipal an der släd stet, go'w den HO. Juni 1830 de ftrondslén fir den àlen Cercel geluegt.
translation.en: The old Cercle where today the Municipal Palace stands in the city, the foundation stone for the old Cercle was laid on June 10, 1830.

translation.lb: We ’ wäscht én eng gaine?
translation.en: How do you wash a girdle?

translation.lb: Zum trousseau vun jidder fia gehe'- ert hautzudags eng gaine, héscht se Barbara oder Roussel oder anescht; sie ersetzt.de fre'eren onpraktesche corset.
translation.en: Every woman's trousseau nowadays includes a girdle, called Barbara or Roussel or something else; it replaces the previously impractical corset.

translation.lb: Fir datt eng gaine me'glechst läng an hirem ursprénglechen gudden zo'stand soll bleiwen, muss se ganz gudd versuergt an ënnerhale gin.
translation.en: For a girdle to stay in its original good condition for as long as possible, it must be well cared for and maintained.

translation.lb: A well se jo hei déne méschten dämmen direct op der haut gedroe get, muss se zimlech oft gewäscli gin.
translation.en: And since it is mostly worn directly on the skin here, it needs to be washed quite often.

translation.lb: Dat ass nalirledh eng kridelech arbecht, a vun deser arbecht hängt hir dauer an hir élastizite't of.
translation.en: That is naturally a delicate task, and from this task depends its durability and elasticity.

translation.lb: Hei nun, we 1 é se am bèschte wäscht:
translation.en: Here now, how to wash it best:

translation.lb: Et stécht én d'gaine a wodlecht séfwâsser, viru m krich huet é ~Lux"-séfeflocken dofir geh 011, elo ass „Mousse" wuel dat beseht.
translation.en: You soak the girdle in warm soapy water, once "Lux" soap flakes were used for this, now "Mousse" is probably the best.

translation.lb: Et le'sst é se ewe'neg an déni wâsser, hëlt se dann eraus an dét se a ganz gliddech, bal kache wâsser, wo'ran én eng grëtz soda an ewe'- neg schwarz séf gemûch huet;
translation.en: You leave it briefly in the water, then take it out and put it in very hot, almost boiling water, in which a pinch of soda and a bit of black soap have been mixed;

translation.lb: e puer minuten le'sst é se dran, hëlt se eraus, le'sst -kal gin, a bîscht se da ganz kräfteg matt enger harder bîscht.
translation.en: you leave it in for a few minutes, take it out, let it cool, and then scrub it vigorously with a hard brush.

translation.lb: Duerno gét et dann un d'schwänken.
translation.en: Then comes the rinsing.

translation.lb: Dat muss ganz grëndlech hesuergt gin.
translation.en: That must be done very thoroughly.

translation.lb: Matt engem émer wâsser gét et net duer; se muss eso' läng geschwankt gin, bis keng séf me' am wâsser ass.
translation.en: One bucket of water is not enough; it must be rinsed so long until no more soap is in the water.

translation.lb: D'gaine get net augedre't, mé se get an en épongenhandduch geluegt, licht gerullt an ausgedréckt, net ausgedre't;
translation.en: The girdle is not wrung out, but is placed in a sponge towel, lightly rolled and pressed out, not twisted;

translation.lb: et lét é se nach an en zwét épongenduch an dréckt se eso' läng an eso' oft bis ké wâsser me' erausgét.
translation.en: you put it in a second sponge towel and press it so long and so often until no more water comes out.

translation.lb: D'dréchnen ass eng sâch, de' làng dauert.
translation.en: The drying is something that takes a long time.

translation.lb: De' einfachst a prakteschst manc'er fir eng gaine ze dréchnen ass, wann én se an 2 oder 3 ärem vun engem handduchgestell ka stiéchen.
translation.en: The simplest and most practical method to dry a girdle is to hang it over 2 or 3 bars of a towel rack.

translation.lb: Dodurch datt d'loft dann och bannendra ka circule'eren, dréchend se me' se'er.
translation.en: This allows air to circulate inside and dries it faster.

translation.lb: Ass d'gaine ganz aus caoutchouc, get se net gestreckt; se kritt scho vum selwen hir richteg form erëm.
translation.en: If the girdle is entirely made of rubber, it is not stretched; it will regain its proper shape by itself.

translation.lb: Ass se awer délweis aus stoft, da ficht én de' stoftendéler lîcht un a streckt se, awer o'ni mam eisen iwert de' caoutchoucs déler ze frieren.
translation.en: But if it is partly made of fabric, you lightly dampen the fabric parts and stretch them, but without ironing over the rubber parts.

translation.lb: Ens gaine, de' eso' behandelt get, dauert läng a behält läng daussin an d'qualite'ten vun- enger neicr, an dir, Madame, behalt durch si èr ligne.
translation.en: A girdle treated this way lasts longer and retains the qualities of a new one, and you, Madame, keep your figure.

translation.en: The theater premiere in Esch-sur-Alzette on Saturday, March 1st and on Sunday, March 2nd, a completely new operetta 'Du meng Hémecht' by Josv Urth, with music by Nie. Schuh will be performed here at the Nouveauté Palace.

translation.en: To bring this splendid work to the stage, three associations from Esch joined forces: the Cercle Symphonique for the music, the gymnastics club ..Eschois" for the ballet in the 2nd act, and the Municipal Choir 'Uelzecht' for the stage piece itself and the choirs.

translation.lb: Tribune libre E schandflèck op dem Escher Bann
translation.en: Free Opinion A disgrace on the Esch territory.

translation.lb: Wann é vun der Biéleser seit hir 110 Esch kennt, an et huet én de' gro'ss bréck, de' vun der Belvaler schmelz op de schlàckentipp fe'ert, passe'ert, da geseit en d'barâcken, an denen haut de" preisesch collaborateuren, a leider och e puer aner famillje wunnen, an engem net se'er erfrélechen zo'stand vrun sech leien.
translation.en: When someone from the Biélés area says they have known Esch for 110 years, and they pass the big bridge that leads from the Belval foundry to the slag heap, they see the barracks where today the Prussian collaborators, and unfortunately some other families, live in a not very cheerful condition.

translation.lb: An dem krich. we' d'russech médercher nach do gewunnt hun, an d'barâcken gréng ugestrach woren. huet de' ganz sidelong, vu hausse gesin. E gudden androck gemach.
translation.en: During the war, when Russian girls still lived there and the barracks were painted green, the whole area, seen from the outside, made a good impression.

translation.lb: Wivill misèr a léd sech bannen de wann an den hiérzer vun de jonge médercher ot'gespillt huet, könnt en onbedélegten net ermiéssen.
translation.en: How much misery and suffering played out inside the walls and in the hearts of the young girls, an uninvolved person could not comprehend.

translation.lb: Matt der zeit, we' se e bësschen freïhét haten an an Esch konnte goen, huet é bal hei an do rideau'en an de fënsteren gesin, d'fënstere selwer wore blank we' e Spiegel a ronderem wore blumen- a geme'ss"ärdercher ugeluegt gin.
translation.en: Over time, as they had a little more freedom and could go to Esch, one saw curtains here and there in the windows, the windows themselves were as clean as a mirror, and flowers and small vegetable gardens were laid out around them.

translation.lb: Wann é net gewosst hätt, datt arem onglécklech mënschekanner do interne'ert wiren, hätt é wirklech dat ganzt als e richtegen idvll ugekuckt, so' hémlech huet dat ausgesin matt de bém am hannergrond an de gestreicher vir länscht d'barâcken.
translation.en: If someone did not know that poor unhappy children were interned there, they would truly have regarded the whole scene as a real idyll, so homely it appeared with the trees in the background and the bushes in front running along the barracks.

translation.lb: Et huet engem geschéngt we' wann de' jong kanner, weit vun hirer hémecht, trotz hirer gefângenschaft sech énegermôssen glécklech gefillt hnn.
translation.en: It appeared as if the young children, far from their homeland, despite their captivity, felt somewhat happy.

translation.lb: Si haten d'gewësshét datt se dach net eso' eleng op der weit stongen. well d'Letzeburger matt hinnen gefillt hun.
translation.en: They had the assurance that they were not so alone in the world, because the Luxembourgers sympathized with them.

translation.lb: Mir hoffe gèren datt se sech an hirer hémecht Crem gudd agebirgert hun.
translation.en: We hope gladly that they integrated well into their homeland Crem.

translation.lb: Ve'er joer si seithir vergangen.
translation.en: Four years have passed since then.

translation.lb: Wann én haut d'barâokc hetrnecht de' kén ustrach me' hun.
translation.en: Today, when one sees that the barracks haven't had a fresh coat of paint anymore.

translation.lb: wo' rar eng fënster.matt rideau'en behängen ass an och keng fënster me' blénkt:
translation.en: Where rarely a window is hung with curtains and no window shines anymore:

translation.lb: Wann é geseit datt d'clôture bâl ganz verschworenen ass, de' héchstwahrscheinlech zo brennzwecken gebraucht go'w:
translation.en: When one sees that the fence is almost completely demolished, probably used for firewood:

translation.lb: Wann é bedenkt, wat fir leidd doannen hausen, de' keng suergfalt op neischt léen, de' am knascht an am wo'scht versenken, dénen och keng ordentlech wunneng bedéngt wir; dann iwerkënnt én eng gro'ss trauer.
translation.en: When one considers what kind of people live down there, who do not care about anything, who are sunk in dirt and neglect, for whom no decent accommodation would suffice; then one is overcome with great sorrow.

translation.lb: wann én de' verschandelong vun der landschaft vrun sech geseit.
translation.en: When one sees the disfigurement of the landscape in front of them.

translation.lb: So' we' et haut ass.
translation.en: As it is today.

translation.lb: kann et net bleiwen, \va mir als Escher ons net ichumme müssen.
translation.en: It cannot remain this way, as we as Eschers must not accept.

translation.lb: Mir hoffen datt onse conseil communal, dém de' zo stänn gewëss net onbekannt sin, sech matt der säc-h befässt, an zwar ass et onbedéngt ne'deg datt d'barâcken e frëschen ustréch kre'en an d'clôture erem hirgestallt get.
translation.en: We hope that our town council, who are certainly not unaware of the situation, will take up the matter, as it is absolutely necessary for the barracks to get a fresh coat of paint and the fence reinstated.

translation.lb: Vrun allem müssen d'bewunner vun de barâcken un uerdnong a proprete't gehàle gin.
translation.en: Above all, the inhabitants of the barracks must be compelled to maintain order and cleanliness.

translation.lb: Bratzelesonndeg Wàsserbëlleg.
translation.en: Pretzel Sunday Wasserbillig.

translation.lb: Et war dest joer fir d'e'seht datt hei op Bratzelesonndeg eng gro'ss cavalcade vum Syndicat d'lnitiative organise'ert go'w.
translation.en: It was this year for the first time that a large parade was organized here in Wasserbillig on Pretzel Sunday by the Initiative Syndicate.

translation.lb: Aus alle ge'gende sin d'leidd erbeikomm fir dé oortège ze kucken cun dem virdrun schon so' vill erziélt go'w, an et war och kén enttäuscht, well et huet jidderengem ausgezêchent gefall.
translation.en: People came from all the regions to see the procession which had been talked about so much beforehand, and no one was disappointed because everyone thoroughly enjoyed it.

translation.lb: All verein hât sein égene wôn dé wonner sehe' matt guirlanden, blummen, bändercher a vir allem matt bratzele gerecht war.
translation.en: Each club had its own float which was wonderfully decorated with garlands, flowers, ribbons, and above all, filled with pretzels.

translation.lb: 17 wén woren et am ganzen, so'datt et vill ze kucke gin ass
translation.en: There were a total of 17 floats, so there was much to see.

translation.lb: D'stëmmong war woonerbar, mais wât de leidd am béschte gefall huet, war d'negerhaisehe matt de negeren.
translation.en: The atmosphere was wonderful, but what people liked best was the negro house with the negroes.

translation.lb: Öch d'Benelux war matt drei wén vertrueden, wo'vun é me' sehe' war we' den aneren.
translation.en: The Benelux was also represented with three floats, one of which was more beautiful than the others.

translation.lb: Mir kenne ro'eg soen, datt all verein sei beseht gemat huet, fir de' cavalcade so' sehe' we' me'glech ze mächen wat jo och eso' gudd réusse'ert ass.
translation.en: We can calmly say that every club did its best to make the parade as beautiful as possible, which indeed succeeded so well.

translation.lb: Vir allein awer gehe'ert d'unerkennong dem Syndicat d'lnitiative zo\ dé sech eso' viil me' gemât huet, fir dé ganze cortège an d'wé ze lêden, a mir hoffen datt dese brauoh op bratzelesonndeg och weiderhin bestoe bleiwt.
translation.en: Above all, however, the recognition belongs to the Initiative Syndicate which put in so much effort to organize the entire procession, and we hope that this tradition on Pretzel Sunday will continue to exist.

translation.lb: Dir hutt alléguer lâng op des Dég gewârt, fir iech erem z'amese'eren.

translation.lb: well mir gäre we'ssten, wé sech ons Lieser zo' onser Zeidong stellen a wat se drun aus ze setzen hunn?
translation.en: because we would like to know how our readers feel about our newspaper and what they have to say about it?

translation.lb: Mir ge'wen lech duerfir bieden, nött matt erer Ménong hannert dem Bierg zu halen,
translation.en: We would therefore ask you not to keep your opinion to yourself,

translation.lb: an ons frei an ongene'ert ze schreiwen, wat dir \un unser Zeidong hält.
translation.en: and to write to us freely and openly about what you think about our newspaper.

translation.lb: Er Zo'schreften de lafend an déne nächsten Nummercn önner dem Titel ~We' gefällt lech ons Zeidong" ofgedreckt ginn,
translation.en: Your letters will be printed in this and the next issues under the title "How do you like our newspaper",

translation.lb: könnt der un de Redactio'nscomité vun der Ligue „Ons Jongen", Neipurtsgäss 9 zu Letzeburg ofginn.
translation.en: and can be submitted to the editorial committee of the League "Ons Jongen", Neipurtsgäss 9 in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Villmols Merci am Viraus!
translation.en: Many thanks in advance!

translation.lb: Wat ons Lieser iwert ons Zeidong denken
translation.en: What our readers think about our newspaper

translation.lb: Als regelmässeg Liéserin vun der Zeidong „Ons Jongen" kann ech iéch vtrrôden, datt ech matt wärmer Sympathie jidfer neien Nummer erwârdcn.
translation.en: As a regular reader of the newspaper "Ons Jongen", I can tell you that I look forward to each new issue with warm sympathy.

translation.lb: All Respekt!
translation.en: All respect!

translation.lb: Dir vertriéd eso' richteg d'ldéalcn vum Letzeburger Jonktcm.
translation.en: You truly embody the ideals of Luxembourgish youth.

translation.lb: Als Mamm vun engem énzegen Jong, •den nach net d'Gléck hât, aus dem verhâssten Naziland crom ze kommen, verfollegen ech all Effôren, de' dir mächt fir de rapatriement vun dénen •ongléckleche Jongen.
translation.en: As the mother of an only son, who has not yet had the fortune to return from the hated Nazi land, I follow all your efforts for the repatriation of those unfortunate boys.

translation.lb: Doniéwend sprécht fir iéch de' sche'n Missio'n, de dir iéch gesät hut, fir ären mutile'erten an un der Gesondhét geschiédegten Komeroden d'Liéweu eso' erdre'glech we' me'glech ze mächen.
translation.en: In addition, your beautiful mission speaks to me, which you have undertaken, to make the lives of your comrades who are mutilated and harmed in health as bearable as possible.

translation.lb: D'ganz Letzeburger Vollek ass hinnen verbonnen; si hun der Hémecht en Affer bruecht an d'Hémecht darf hinnen dat net vcrgiéssen.
translation.en: The entire Luxembourgish people is connected to them; they have made a sacrifice for the homeland and the homeland must not forget that.

translation.lb: Ech wünschen der Zeidong ~Ons Jongen" én ömmer me' gro'sse Liéserkrés a soen iéch: „Mächt eso' virun, Jongen!"
translation.en: I wish the newspaper "Ons Jongen" an ever larger readership and I say to you: "Keep going, boys!"

translation.lb: M. A.
translation.en: M. A.

translation.lb: D’Sectio’n Bouzonville vun vun de „Malgré-Nous“ zu Letzeburg
translation.en: The Bouzonville Section of the 'Malgré-Nous' in Luxembourg

translation.lb: E Sonndeg, den 1. September, huet eng Delegatio'n vun de franse'sche Malgré-Nous (Sectio'n Bouzonville) onst Ländche besieht.
translation.en: On Sunday, September 1st, a delegation of the French Malgré-Nous (Bouzonville Section) visited our country.

translation.lb: Renn 80 Komeroden de' de selwechte Kreizwé mattgemâch hun we' „Ons Jongen" a muenech Frênn hei a Letzeburg hun, si Muerges ge'nt 10 Auer vun onse Komeroden Jean Gremling a Marcel Becker empfang gin.
translation.en: Around 80 comrades who walked the same path as 'Our Boys' and many friends here in Luxembourg were received in the morning at 10 o'clock by our comrades Jean Gremling and Marcel Becker.

translation.lb: De Groupe huet sech zu engem Recueillement beim Monument du Souvenir afond an eng Gerbe dépose'ert.
translation.en: The group gathered for a moment of reflection at the Monument du Souvenir and laid a wreath.

translation.lb: Duerno hun ons sympathesch franse'sch Frênn d'Stad besieht.
translation.en: Afterwards, our sympathetic French friends visited the city.

translation.lb: Am Nomëtteg sin se matt hiren Autocaren 4prch de Möllerdall gefuer iwer d'Musel a fun do aus erem hém.
translation.en: In the afternoon, they drove with their coaches through the Mullerthal over the Moselle and from there back home.

translation.lb: Et war alles an allem eng sche'n Journée an eng Manifestatio'n vu Solidarité 't a franse'sch-letzeburger Frëndschaft.
translation.en: All in all, it was a beautiful day and a demonstration of solidarity and French-Luxembourgish friendship.

translation.lb: STEMMUNGS-BILD Den Hierscht ass do, et mierkt én et kaum.
translation.en: ATMOSPHERIC PICTURE Fall is here, you barely notice it.

translation.lb: Bâl d'ganzt Joer wâr den Himmel gro a verhäng, richteg Summerdég wäre rar,
translation.en: Nearly the whole year the sky was gray and overcast, real summer days were rare,

translation.lb: mä wann én elo zréckbléckt, huet sech dach munnecht sche'nt a fröndlecht Erliewnes an onser Erënnerong festgesät!
translation.en: but when you look back now, many beautiful and pleasant experiences have taken root in our memories!

translation.lb: Et get elo schons mat Zeiten deischter owens, d'Bliéder fâlen, de Sturm hault, ficht a nâss ass et och derbei an et fänkt nés un elo gemiddlech ze gin dohém,
translation.en: It is already getting darker earlier in the evening, the leaves fall, the storm howls, wind and rain come with it and it's starting to be cozy again at home,

translation.lb: Wann e klengt wâkrecht Feierchen hèll a frédeg am Uewen dubbert an den Hond oder d'Kâtz derhannert hirt Quarte'er nés bezun a verschlôfen aus hallefzo'en Ae blönzelen.
translation.en: When a small real fire crackles brightly and cheerfully in the stove and the dog or the cat claim their quarters again and drowsily blink from half-closed eyes.

translation.lb: De' al Leidd si me' verschloss gin, si denken un den Hierscht vun hirem Liewen.
translation.en: The old people have become more withdrawn, they think of the autumn of their lives.

translation.lb: We' läng nach bis och fir si et Wanter get a Nuecht?
translation.en: How long until it becomes winter and night for them as well?

translation.lb: Mä de Jonktem kennt keng Hierschtstëmmong.
translation.en: But the youth knows no autumn mood.

translation.lb: Fir hienass et nemmen eng Otempaus, eng Statio'n zu neiem Erliewen.
translation.en: For him, it is just a pause, a stop to new experiences.

translation.lb: A vollen Zieh huet en de Summer genoss, huet sech sénge Fréden higin.
translation.en: With full breath, he enjoyed the summer, surrendered to its joys.

translation.lb: Schwärmeresch gedenkt desen engem Camping, erget sech a Begéschterong fir de' romantesch Wanderongen iwer Bierg an Dali,
translation.en: Dreamily, he remembers a camping trip, delights in excitement for romantic hikes over mountains and valleys,

translation.lb: durch geheimnesdurchwuewe Böscher, wo' de Wand gehault an d'honnerjéreg Bâmriese geschwât vu soenhafte längstvergiessen Zeiten,
translation.en: through mysterious forests where the wind howled and hundred-year-old giant trees spoke of legendary long-forgotten times,

translation.lb: wo' monter a ver raut eng Quell iwer Wâken a Wuerzele gesprudelt a vu riesege Schätz de'w, de'w an der Deischtert vum Bierg erzielt!
translation.en: where lively and untouched a spring bubbled over rocks and roots and told of gigantic treasures in the darkness of the mountain!

translation.lb: An dén nés drémt vun enger wärmer Summernuecht, wo' den Himmel blo a mat Stère bese't,
translation.en: And he dreams again of a warmer summer night, where the sky is blue and studded with stars,

translation.lb: an dem Mo'nd sei matt Sëlwerlîcht d'lerd beschéngt, wo' d'Bém gro'ss gespensteg Schied geworf,
translation.en: and the moon bathes the earth with its silver light, where the trees cast great ghostly shadows,

translation.lb: wo' lues aus der Fèr verlângend Musek erklongen an hién op enger Bänk sein e'scht Wuert der Le'wt schei engem Médchen an d'O'er gepöspert.
translation.en: where slowly from afar yearning music sounded, and on a bench, he shyly whispered his first word of love into a girl's ear.

translation.lb: An dann hiewen sech dem Jonktem séng Gedanke lîcht beschwéngt an onbeschwe'ert iwer d'Stierm an d'Nätzt vum Hierscht eweg.
translation.en: And then the youth's thoughts lift lightly and carefree away from the storms and dampness of fall.

translation.lb: Wat kann d'Stierwe vun der Natur hie beândrecken, fir hién existe'ert neischt me' we' d'Gléck an d'Fréd, endlech Fridden ze hun a keng Stonn, keng Minutt wëllt e me' verle'eren no all déne längen deischtre Joere vun der Krichsno't!
translation.en: What can the dying of nature impress upon him, there exists nothing more for him than happiness and joy, to finally have peace and he doesn't want to lose a single hour, a single minute after all these long dark years of wartime hardship!

translation.lb: Wat de Summer him gebueden, huet en o'ni Zécken erstiermt, an elo erwart e mat Ongedold d'Wantersaison mat hire Bâlen, Théater- a Familgenowenden.
translation.en: What summer offered him, he embraced without hesitation, and now he eagerly awaits the winter season with its balls, theatre, and family evenings.

translation.lb: Alles, alles wëllt e matmâchen, erliewen, grad eso' we' en och d'Schrecken an de Misär vum fënnefjérege Muerd huet missen erdroen.
translation.en: He wants to participate in everything, experience everything, just as he had to endure the terror and misery of five years of killing.

translation.lb: Eng Gier no Amusement huet en ergraff a le'sst e netme' lass, égal we' dat eng.
translation.en: A craving for amusement has seized him and does not let him go, regardless of where that may lead.

translation.lb: Ke'er en Enn sollt kre'en, fir hién ziélt nemme me' d'Erliewe vum Moment.
translation.en: Should it ever come to an end, for him only the living of the moment counts.

translation.lb: Wié wés op net muer, iwermuer oder d'nèxt Joer vleicht neie Schrecken e nés a sei Bann ka schloen?
translation.en: Who knows if not tomorrow, the day after or next year perhaps new terrors will seize him again?

translation.lb: D'Welt huet change'ert, a mat hiér de Jonktem!
translation.en: The world has changed, and with it the youth!

translation.lb: C. An onse Standponkt?
translation.en: C. And our standpoint?

translation.lb: Ons Lecteure kennen also' elo de Klank vun déne be'de Klacken:
translation.en: Our readers now know the sound of both bells:

translation.lb: vun dem offizielle „Bourdon" a vun der patriotescher Stûremklack.
translation.en: from the official 'Bourdon' and from the patriotic Storm bell.

translation.lb: Op dësem Carrefour stin ons Jongen an et héscht sech décide'eren.
translation.en: At this crossroads, our boys stand, and they must make a decision.

translation.lb: We'? Virwât?
translation.en: Who? For what?

translation.lb: Kappzerbriechen a Kapprechnen.
translation.en: Puzzling over and calculating in the head.

translation.lb: 1. E Bauer kéft um Mart 100 Biesemstiller fir 100.— frang e kéft de' 100 Biesemstiller awer zu 3 verschidde Preisser, an zwar zu 0.05. —, I. a 5. frang.
translation.en: 1. A farmer buys 100 broom handles at the market for 100 francs, but he buys the 100 broom handles at 3 different prices, namely at 0.05, 1, and 5 francs.

translation.lb: Wievill kéft hien zu 0,05. —, zu I. an zu 5. frang.
translation.en: How many does he buy at 0.05, 1, and 5 francs.

translation.lb: Um Endresultat müssen 100. — frang an 100 Biesemstiller eraus kommen.
translation.en: The final result must be 100 francs and 100 broom handles.

translation.lb: 2. E Bauer wollt un eng Konn 4 Liter Möllech verk fen.
translation.en: 2. A farmer wanted to sell 4 liters of milk to a customer.

translation.lb: En huet awer nömmen 3 Mossen an zwar zu 8-5-3 Liter.
translation.en: But he only has 3 measures, namely 8, 5, and 3 liters.

translation.lb: We' mecht de Bauer dat, datt seng Konn 4 Liter Möllech kritt.
translation.en: How does the farmer make sure that his customer gets 4 liters of milk.

translation.lb: 3. Schreiwt des Zuel op e Blat (an Zuelen) Elefdausendelefhonnerteief.
translation.en: 3. Write this number on a sheet (in figures) eleven thousand one hundred eleven.

translation.lb: (Ople'song an der néxter Nummer).
translation.en: (Solution in the next issue).

translation.lb: MORTS POUR LA PATRIE!
translation.en: DIED FOR THE HOMELAND!

translation.lb: «ONS JONGEN»
translation.en: "OUR BOYS"

translation.lb: STROSSEN JEMPY GRAF gefall zu Hohllstein bei Königsberg am Februar 1945
translation.en: STROSSEN JEMPY GRAF fell at Hohllstein near Königsberg in February 1945

translation.lb: JEAN JUNG gefall bei Rukschino (Newel) de 4. Januar 1944
translation.en: JEAN JUNG fell at Rukschino (Newel) on January 4, 1944

translation.lb: ERNY KREMER gefall bei Ostrow (Russland) den 11. Abrël 1944
translation.en: ERNY KREMER fell at Ostrow (Russia) on April 11, 1944

translation.lb: JEMPY HOUDREMONT gefall a Russland den 1. Oktober 1943
translation.en: JEMPY HOUDREMONT fell in Russia on October 1, 1943

translation.lb: Remerciementsacti’on Hierber Datt „Ons Jongen" et verstin, hir Liewensretter a Wueltäter ze e'eren, hun si de leschte Sonndeg mat hirer Remerciementsaactio'n bewisen.
translation.en: Thanksgiving action Last Sunday, 'Our Boys' proved that they understand how to honor their rescuers and benefactors with their thanksgiving action.

translation.lb: Ve'er verdéngschtvoll Hierher Patrioten, de' am Krich enner perse'nlecher Liewensgefohr Refraktären verstoppt haten oder hinne soss vira gehollef hun, krute vun onse Jongen als Zéchen vun Unerkennong an de'wen Dank, konschtvoll Plaketten an Diplomen iwerreécht.
translation.en: Honorable local patriots, who during the war had hidden refractories at personal risk or otherwise helped them, received from our boys, as a token of recognition and sincere thanks, artfully crafted plaques and diplomas.

translation.lb: Nodém den Här J. P. Schmit, Président vun onser „Ligue" ail Uwiésend, a speziell de' .ve'er Résistenzler begre'&st hât, huet den Här Hurt vum Zentralcomité vun der Ligue „Ons Jongen" kürz den Zweck an d'Absidrte vun der Ligue ömrass.
translation.en: After Mr. J. P. Schmit, President of our 'League', welcomed all present, especially the veterans of the resistance, Mr. Hurt from the Central Committee of the 'Our Boys' League briefly outlined the purpose and objectives of the league.

translation.lb: Duerno hun dann de' énzel Refractären hire Liéwensretter d'Diplômen a Plaketten ausgehennegt.
translation.en: Afterwards, the individual rescuers were handed the diplomas and plaques by their lifesavers.

translation.lb: D'Hierber Musek, de' sech net huele geloss hât, de Jongen hir Aktio'n durch hire Beidrag ze versche'neren, huet dann déne gee'erte Patrioten eng Tusch gesp'llt.
translation.en: The local music, who would not miss the opportunity to enhance the boys' action with their contribution, then played a fanfare for the honored patriots.

translation.lb: Mam Ofspillen vun der ~Hémecht" huet de' schlicht, awer erhiéwend Feier hiren Ofschloss fond.
translation.en: With the playing of the 'Anthem', the simple but uplifting ceremony came to a close.

translation.en: Magic Square.

translation.en: Spanish girl's name

translation.en: Water whirlpool

translation.lb: Partei vun den iresche Freihétskämpfer
translation.en: Party of the Irish freedom fighters

translation.lb: „Ons Jongen“ an No’t!
translation.en: "Our Boys" in Distress!

translation.lb: Si sin tätsächlech an No't, „Ons Jongen", me' we' jé virdrun!
translation.en: They are indeed in distress, "Our Boys," just like before!

translation.lb: Grâd elo, wo' iwert hirt Lo's débatte'ert get, a wo' hir Stëmm hârt a fest duerch d'Land schäle soll, lâfe se Gefôr, hiren énzege Porte-parole am öffentleche Liewen ze verle'eren, hir Zeidong.
translation.en: Right now, when their fate is being debated, and when their voice should resound loudly and firmly throughout the country, they risk losing their only spokesperson in public life, their newspaper.

translation.lb: Drei Joer lâng huet se de Souvenir vun dénen emmer erem lieweg gehâlen, de' weit uechter d'Welt versprét, den Do't fond hun.
translation.en: For three years it has continuously kept alive the memory of those who, spread far across the world, found death.

translation.lb: Drei Joer lâng huet se d'E'er he'chgehal vun dénen, de' o'ni Recht hir Schmot eleng an d'Hémecht bruecht hun.
translation.en: For three years it has upheld the honor of those who, without rights, brought their pain alone back home.

translation.lb: Drei Joer lâng huet s'emmer erem un d'Gewësse vum Land appelle'ert, wann et drëm go'ng, de' Komeroden, de' nach drop laueren, hémzehuelen.
translation.en: For three years it has repeatedly appealed to the country's conscience when it was about bringing home the comrades who are still waiting.

translation.lb: Drei Joer lâng huet s'emmer erem op de Misère vun dénen higewisen, de' moralesch a kierperlech krank an hir Dierfer ko'men.
translation.en: For three years it has constantly pointed out the misery of those who returned morally and physically ill to their villages.

translation.lb: Mir verstin, dass é midd get, drei Joer lâng de'selwecht Kloen ze he'eren, besonnesch an enger Zeit, wo' d'Liewe mächteg weiderdreiwt an emmer erem nei Zweiflen, an anere Misère mat sech dre't.
translation.en: We understand that one gets tired of hearing the same complaints for three years, especially in a time when life powerfully moves on, bringing new doubts and other miseries.

translation.lb: Ower mir hoffe fest, dass „Ons Jongen" hir Stëmm an der Offentlechkét net verle'eren well an all Stiedchen, an all Dierfchen op mannst e Grapp Hierzer schlon, de' drop hâlen, dass de Souvenir vun eise Gefâlenen, d'E'er vun dénen, de' iwreg blo'wen, an d'helleg Rechter vun dénen, de' hir Glidder verluer hun, net ennert dem Trëtt vun enger egoïstescher Nokrichszeit zerdreckt gin.
translation.en: But we strongly hope that "Our Boys" will not lose their voice in public and that in every small town and village at least a handful of hearts will insist that the memory of our fallen, the honor of those who remained, and the sacred rights of those who lost limbs will not be crushed under the march of a selfish post-war era.

translation.lb: Mir appele'eren dofir un de' Hierzer, de' hierem Gewëssen, hierer E'er an hierer Mënschlechkét et schëlleg sin, derfir ze suergen, datt d'Stëmm vun de Jongen, vun hi r e Jongen, net am Wand verfle't a vergét, we' e wielecht Blât am Hierscht.
translation.en: We therefore appeal to the hearts bound by their conscience, honor, and humanity to ensure that the voice of the boys, of our boys, is not blown away and forgotten in the wind like a wilting leaf in autumn.

translation.lb: Mir hun oft am Krich mat engem bluddege Grapp no enger drechener Kuescht gebiedelt, mir hun oft mat enger raschteger Konservebéx no Wässer gegruewen
translation.en: We often begged with bloody fists for a dry crust during the war, we often dug with a rusted can for water.

translation.lb: mir gesin et guer net als One'er un, haut virun d'Leidd aus eise Stied an Dierfer ze trieden an em hir Hëllef ze biedelen.
translation.en: We do not see it as a disgrace at all to stand before the people from our towns and villages today and beg for their help.

translation.lb: Mir fénken haut eng Souscriptio'nslëscht un, an der Hoffnong, op de Mane er e stabile Fong fir ons Zeidong ze schâfen, de' op ké Fall aus onsem öffentleche Liewe verschwannen därf well se helleg Rechter ze vertrieden an helleg Pflichten ze erföllen huet!
translation.en: We are starting a subscription list today, in the hope of creating a stable fund for our newspaper, which must by no means disappear from our public life because it has sacred rights to represent and sacred duties to fulfill!

translation.lb: d’Redaktio’n.
translation.en: The Editorial Office.

translation.lb: Cartes d’invalidité et de priorité D'Letzeburger Krichsmutile'ert musse Recht op Invaliden- a Virzochskârten kre'en.
translation.en: Disability and priority cards Luxembourg war invalids must be entitled to acquire disability and priority cards.

translation.lb: AU dénen Invaliden, de' hir gesond Glidder durch de Krich verluer hun an de' op manst 30»/o invalid sin, muss eng Invalidekârt zo'- sto'en an hinne folgend Erlîchterong verschâf en:
translation.en: To those disabled who have lost their healthy limbs due to the war and are at least 30% invalid, a disability card must be issued providing them the following benefits:

translation.lb: 1. Wien 30 — 490/o arbechtsonfäheg ass; kritt op Grond vun dèr Kârt:
translation.en: 1. Those who are 30% to 49% incapable of working receive based on this card:

translation.lb: a) 50«/o Reduktio'n op allen öffentlecho Verke'ersmëttelen,
translation.en: a) 50% reduction on all public transportation,

translation.lb: b) Deduktio'nen a Kino'en Théateren, a bei allen öffentleche Manifestatio'nen, an dém Môss, we' d'Propriétairen oder d'Organisateuren dës Reduktio'n festle'en.
translation.en: b) Discounts at cinemas, theaters, and all public events, to the extent determined by the owners or organizers.

translation.lb: 2. wie me' we' 50«/o arbechtsonfäheg ass, kritt op Grond vun dèr Kârt:
translation.en: 2. Those who are more than 50% incapable of working receive based on this card:

translation.lb: a) 750/o Reduktio'n op allen öffentleche Verke'ersmëttelen,
translation.en: a) 75% reduction on all public transportation,

translation.lb: b) Reduktio'nen a Kino'en an Théateren, a bei allen öffentleche Manifestatio'nen, dém Môss, we' d'Propriétairen oder d'Organisateuren dës Reduktio'n festle'en.
translation.en: b) Discounts at cinemas and theaters, and all public events, to the extent determined by the owners or organizers.

translation.lb: 3. Wien ëmmer ob d'Hëllef vun enger drëtter Perso'n ugewiesen ass, ka fir dës Perso'n eng extra Légitimatio'nskârt ausgestallt kre'en; dës Kârt get de'selwecht Virrechter we' d'lnvalidekârt, mé si muss ëmmer mat dèr zesumme virgewise gin.
translation.en: 3. Whoever is always dependent on the help of a third person can have an additional authorization card issued for this person; this card grants the same rights as the disability card, but it must always be presented together with it.

translation.lb: 4. Eng extra Virzochskârt muss agefo'ert gin, mat dem Vermierk «Station debout pénible» fir de' Invaliden oder Krank, fir de' all Déplacement beschwe'erlech ass;
translation.en: 4. An additional priority card must be issued, with the notation «Station debout pénible» for the disabled or sick, for whom all movement is difficult;

translation.lb: si get hinnen d'Recht, iwerall firgelôss a fir t'e'scht zerve'ert ze. gin, an eng Sëtzplâz ze kre'en, wo' ëmmer et ne'deg ass.
translation.en: it grants them the right to queue jump everywhere and to be served first, and to receive a seat whenever necessary.

translation.lb: Volkszählung Den Zähler: „We, dir sitt dach zo’ sechs am Stot, an hei stin der nemmen 3 um Ziedel“
translation.en: Census Taker: 'Well, there are six of you in the household, but here are only 3 on the slip.'

translation.lb: De Schmitts Néckel: Jé, jé, sitt net klenglech, ech hu jo och dofir e puer Meter karé bei den Zemmeren derbeigesat.“
translation.en: Schmitt's Nick: 'Yes, yes, don't be petty, I included a few square meters with the rooms for that too.'

translation.lb: „So, Misch, mâch e we’neg virun mat dém do, da brauch ech dén alt net me’ op d’Lescht ze schreiwen.“
translation.en: 'So, Misch, move a little forward with that, then I won't need to write that old one at the end anymore.'

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Wé hûot den Här gester den Hären emol d'Woerécht gesot!

translation.en: Bärbel: Yes, and that wasn't nearly everything the gentleman said; last night at fat Jämpi's, they accused each other of things that make you laugh out loud when you hear them.

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Et hûot ê mer erziélt dén do war, et war esö sché' gewiést, wé de Fils gefrot hätt op 450 Frang dann net 3 [ze fill wär fir Kannermod a Privatcommissionaire, dât war scho' bal hinrêchend fir e Gemènge-Kannerasil ze enerhâlen.
translation.en: Schnarr: It was told to me by someone who was there, it was so nice when the son asked if 450 Francs weren’t too much for children's fashion and private commissions, that was almost enough to maintain a municipal children's asylum.

translation.lb: D'Bärbel: Ja, et 'ass schûod dat éch elo kèng klêng Kanner mé hun, éch géf s'och an den Asil dun fir s'opzezillen; en âner hât ower kê Gléck!
translation.en: Bärbel: Yes, it is a shame that I no longer have little children, I would put them in the asylum to educate them; another one wasn't so lucky!

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Ja, mir âner müssen eîs fill geheie fir dé lidderéch Kèrelen ze erhâlen, a fun ail Kâbesblât Steiere bezûolen.
translation.en: Schnarr: Yes, we others must sacrifice a lot to maintain those useless boys, and pay taxes from every cabbage patch.

translation.lb: D'Bärbel: Ja, an dé ganze Buték ass kên Dahler wèrth!

translation.en: As she told how the wolf devoured the grandmother and the girl, and she was done with everything, Mischi still listened attentively and expectantly.

translation.en: Even a good Betschel is not to be missed by the best gourmets.
