translation.lb: D’famiil Schimberg- Gcngler.
translation.en: The family Schimberg-Gengler.

translation.lb: A mir stin a wëlle falen matt dem Letzeburger land....
translation.en: And we stand and want to fall with the Luxembourgish land....

translation.lb: D'Unio'n vun alle gudde Letzeburger stong am krich éneg g'ent de Preiss,
translation.en: The union of all good Luxembourgers stood united in war against the Prussians,

translation.lb: haut stét d'Unio'n vun alle gudde Letzeburger geschlossen ge'nt de' clique,
translation.en: today the union of all good Luxembourgers stands united against the clique,

translation.lb: de' dem nazi sei wirk fortsetze wellt, d. h. ge'nt d'réactio'n,
translation.en: who wish to continue the Nazi's work, i.e., against the reaction,

translation.lb: i— de' offen an de' camoufle'crtl
translation.en: whether openly or covertly

translation.lb: A muer an op e'weg zeiten ass et d'missio'n vun der Unio'n vun alle gudde Letzeburger zesumnfenxehalen an zesummenzestoen ge'nt réactio'n,
translation.en: And tomorrow and forever it is the mission of the union of all good Luxembourgers to stand united and hold together against reaction,

translation.lb: ge'nt de' offen a ge'nt de' camoufle'ert.
translation.en: against the open and against the disguised.

translation.lb: Si, d'réaction, ze démaske'eren an bir manöver opzedecken,
translation.en: To unmask the reaction and uncover their maneuvers,

translation.lb: dat ass a bleiwt de' eng, der réactionnârer clique an hire ma©hinatio'nen onbarmhèrzeg d'handwirk ze Wen,
translation.en: that is and remains one, to mercilessly end the handiwork of the reactionary clique and their machinations,

translation.lb: dat ass a bleiwt de' aner missio'n vun der Unio'n.
translation.en: that is and remains the other mission of the union.

translation.lb: Vun der Unio'n vun alle gudde Letzeburger!
translation.en: Of the union of all good Luxembourgers!

translation.lb: Stét de Jang och e Lesse nie' lenks, den Neckel e bësse nie' rechts,
translation.en: Whether Jang leans a little left, Neckel a bit right,

translation.lb: denkt de Pier e bësse me' cooperatiwistesch an de Judes e bësse me' liberalislesch,
translation.en: thinks Pier a bit more cooperative and Judes a bit more liberalistic,

translation.lb: ént an datselwecht bënnt si zesummen an der lutte fir d'freihét,
translation.en: yet they are all bound together in the fight for freedom,

translation.lb: d'schluecht em d'gerechtegkét ge'nt d'faschislesch.
translation.en: the battle for justice against the fascist.

translation.lb: idiotie ge'nt d'réactionnâr menschentrafikanten ge'nt d'dktatur vun der sozialer ongerechlegkét!
translation.en: idiocy against the reactionary human traffickers against the dictatorship of social injustice!

translation.lb: Dat ass a bieiwt de sënn vun der Unio'n.
translation.en: That is and remains the sense of the union.

translation.lb: Dat ass a bieiwt den hellegen an iwerparteilechen zweck vun der Unio'n.
translation.en: That is and remains the holy and non-partisan purpose of the union.

translation.lb: Och muer, dir hère vun der réactio'nlll A wann et Iéch och daiisendmol net gefäldtlll
translation.en: Also tomorrow, you gentlemen of the reaction!!! And even if you dislike it a thousand times!!!

translation.lb: Niéwebei gesot, Dir hèren, Dir schwammt an illusio'nen,
translation.en: By the way, gentlemen, you are swimming in illusions,

translation.lb: wann Dir mengt, de' Letzeburger,
translation.en: if you think that the Luxembourger,

translation.lb: de' Dir durch èr manöver a machinatio'ne verkuerbelt huet, sténgen op d'dauer zu Iéch.
translation.en: whom you have misled with your maneuvers and machinations, will stand by you forever.

translation.lb: Nén, Dir hèren, de' leidd sin democraten, et si keng réactionnâren, mé Letzeburger.
translation.en: No, gentlemen, the people are democrats, they are not reactionaries, but Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: Si woren am kricb — matt oder o'ni liârt — an der gro'ssex légio'n vun der Unio'n vun alle Letzeburger,
translation.en: They were in the war — with or without a card — in the great legion of the union of all Luxembourgers,

translation.lb: si sin och ahut a bleiwen och muer, — matt oder o'ni memberkârt — bewosst oder onbewosst an der Unio'n vun alle gudde Letzeburger.
translation.en: they are also today and remain also tomorrow, — with or without membership card — consciously or unconsciously in the union of all good Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: Ob ro't ob schwärz, ob gréng oder giél, iwer allem droen si dach fir d'e'scht de fuendel rot'-weiss-blol
translation.en: Whether red, whether black, whether green or yellow, above all they carry the banner red-white-blue first

translation.lb: An der belscher gesandschaft A sénger gesandschaft selwcr huet de Minister vu Belgien, de Vicomte ltcrrycr a séng madame, d'Vicomtesse Berryer, d'perse'nlechkéten empfângen.
translation.en: At the Belgian embassy, in his own suite, the Belgian Minister, Vicomte Berryer and his wife, Vicomtesse Berryer, received personalities.

translation.lb: Et géng ze weit fe'eren an et war octi vleicht gcfe'erlech (well et kënt éu oder dén anere vergiéss gin) fir do' gro'ss zueé vun notabililc'ten opzeziélen.
translation.en: It would be going too far and it might even be dangerous (because someone might be forgotten) to enumerate the large number of notables present.

translation.lb: De belsotie minister hat eng gudd idi, datt en d'letzeburgesch an d'belsch autorite'ten grad um virowend vun de liberatio'nsfesllechkéten invite'ert hat, fir so'zesoen d'gesandschaft erein frësch anzeweilien.
translation.en: The Belgian minister had a good idea in inviting Luxembourgish and Belgian authorities just on the eve of the liberation festivities, so to speak, to inaugurate the embassy anew.

translation.lb: Et ass bekannt, datt während der occupatio'nszeit d'gcbei vun der beischer gesandschaft vernole'ssegt gi wor; kirzlech ere'scht könnt et crem a stand gesät gin.
translation.en: It is known that during the occupation time, the building of the Belgian embassy had been neglected; only recently could it be put back in order.

translation.lb: De buffet froid huet du d'geléenliét gin, fir toasten auszetauschen.
translation.en: The cold buffet provided the opportunity for exchanging toasts.

translation.lb: An der altgemenger animatio'n hun de belsche minister an den hèr Dupong scch gilécklech geschätzt, no engem längen a schreckleche kricli de' al traditio nell vun der helsch-iletzeburgeschcr frëndschaft erem frësch opliéwen ze lôssen.
translation.en: In the general animation, the Belgian minister and Mr. Dupong were pleased to revive the old traditions of Belgian-Luxembourgish friendship after a long and terrible war.

translation.lb: Den Anderson schle’t de Wooderson.
translation.en: Anderson defeats Wooderson.

translation.lb: Zu Göteborg a Schweden wor e gro'ssen internationale lîchtathlétikmeeting un dem de' beseht schwédesch, finnlänndesch, däncsch. franse'sch (Hansenne, Sigonney) englesch (Wooderson) athléten, délgeholl hun.
translation.en: In Gothenburg, Sweden, there was a large international athletics meeting in which Swedish, Finnish, Danish, French (Hansenne, Sigonney), and English (Wooderson) athletes took part.

translation.en: The main duel was the encounter between Andersen and Wooderson in the 'mile'.

translation.lb: No 800 m lo'g den Anderson nn der spëtzt, dicht gefollegt vum Wooderson.
translation.en: After 800 m, Anderson was in the lead, closely followed by Wooderson.

translation.lb: An déne leschten 200 m greift de Wooderson resolut un an d'1500 m gin an der seit vun 8'48"4/10 passe'ert.
translation.en: In the last 200 m, Wooderson made a determined move and the 1500 m mark was passed at 8'48"4/10.

translation.lb: Vun 20.000 zo'schauer ugefeieTt riposte'crt den Anderson a kämpft de Wooderson ënner.
translation.en: Encouraged by 20,000 spectators, Anderson responded and fought off Wooderson.

translation.lb: D'resultat: 1. Anderson 4'3 8/10 2. Wooderson 4'4"2/10, 3. Gustavson 4'5"8/10.
translation.en: The result: 1. Anderson 4'3 8/10, 2. Wooderson 4'4"2/10, 3. Gustavson 4'5"8/10.

translation.lb: Op der 1000 m course ass den Hansenne 3. gin hannert dem Strand, Liljekwist (Schweden), d'zeit vum l. ass 2'25"5/10 a vum Hansennc 2'26"1/10.

translation.lb: — D'sammlong fir d'kanner vun onsen nationalhelden, organise'ert vun der Unio'n an dem localcomité vun dem „Oeuvre National de Secours Grande-Üucliesse Charlotte", huet de' onerwart zomm vu 17.125 frang abruecht.
translation.en: — The collection for the children of our national heroes, organized by the Union and the local committee of the 'Oeuvre National de Secours Grande-Duchesse Charlotte', yielded the unexpected sum of 17,125 francs.

translation.lb: Den organisatio'nscomité ass fro', dénen ëmmer hëllefsberéte Colmer-Bierger leidd en ëffentleche merci ze soen.

translation.lb: E spezieile gro'sse merci un d'guiden vun dénen 2 sectio'nen hei a Biéles, de' sech eso' gèr an den dengscht vun deser sâch gestallt hun.
translation.en: A special big thank you to the leaders of the two sections here in Biéles, who have willingly served this cause.

translation.lb: D'populatio'n vu Biéles an ons guiden hun domatt bewisen, datt si d'hèrz op der richteger Dlaz hun, wann et gellt eppes fir ons gudd an trei Letzeburger ze mächen.
translation.en: The population of Biéles and our leaders have thus proven that they have their hearts in the right place when it comes to doing something for our good and loyal Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: Sandweiler. — En donneschdeg hat ons sectio'n de' e'scht opklärongsversammlong iwer d'Unio'n an de gruppement.
translation.en: Sandweiler. — On Thursday, our section held the first informational meeting about the Union and the group.

translation.lb: D'riédner, de' hèren Pol Jonié, districtschef an den hèr Pol Sand, KZler zënter 1941 hun a klore wirdor un déne net ze deitelen ass, déne ville miinner a fraen d'situatio'n, an dèr mer stin, explize'ert an hinnen d'pflichten, d'arbecht an de Programm vun der Unio'n am gruppement, de' dorausser erwues ass, gcwisen.
translation.en: The speakers, Mr. Pol Jonié, district chief, and Mr. Pol Sand, a concentration camp detainee since 1941, explained clearly to the many men and women, the indisputable situation we are in, and showed them the duties, work, and program of the Union within the group which has emerged from it.

translation.lb: De schlussaccord wor: Mir all welle schaffen am dengscht vun onsem le'we Eetzeburg.
translation.en: The concluding agreement was: We all want to work in service of our beloved Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Woltz. — E neien do'descandidnt ass an Deitschland verhafft a no Letzeburg bruecht gin an der perso'n vum ortsgruppCnleitcr an dictator vu Woltz, dem Gust Weber.
translation.en: Woltz. — A new death candidate was arrested in Germany and brought to Luxembourg, being the local group leader and dictator of Woltz, Gust Weber.

translation.lb: Den empfank op der gare vu Letzeburg wor sengem stand geme'ss ganz „hèrzlech".
translation.en: The reception at the Luxembourg station was, according to his status, quite "cordial."

translation.lb: L. P. P. D. — De 17. September 1945 II. Anniversaire vun den e'schten Verbannungen vu letzeburger familjen an d'Preiseland, hält den hèr Vie. Molitor owends um 19.45 auer iwer radio Letzeburg eng interessant causerie iwer: „D'emsiedlong an hir ausivirkong op d'ietzeburger resistenz".
translation.en: L. P. P. D. — On September 17, 1945, the second anniversary of the first deportations of Luxembourgish families to Prussia, Mr. Vie. Molitor will hold an interesting talk over Radio Luxembourg at 7:45 PM about: "The resettlement and its impact on Luxembourgish resistance."

translation.lb: Offiziell MATTDELONGEN Mattdélong iwert d'gemengcwahlcn 1945.
translation.en: Official ANNOUNCEMENTS regarding the municipal elections 1945.

translation.lb: — D'Gemengewahlen sin op de 7. october 1945 festgesat gin.
translation.en: — The municipal elections are scheduled for October 7, 1945.

translation.lb: D'candidaten müssen hir erklirong bis spe'tstens de 27. september viru 6 auer ofgin hun.
translation.en: Candidates must submit their declaration no later than September 27 before 6 o'clock.

translation.lb: D'bekanntmachong vum président vum haptbüro, an dër d'dég, d'stonnen an den uert iudique'ert gin, wo' d'eandidaturen no d'bezéchnong vun den zeîen entge'nt geholl gin, muss bis spe'tstens den 22. september erfollecht sin.
translation.en: The announcement by the president of the main office, in which the days, hours, and place are indicated where candidates will be received according to the designation of the hours, must be made no later than September 22.

translation.lb: Letzeburg, de 17. sept. 1945.
translation.en: Luxembourg, September 17, 1945.

translation.lb: Den inneminis ter: R. Als.
translation.en: The Minister of the Interior: R. Als.

translation.lb: Admission d'étudiants à la Fondation Biermans-Lapôtre (Cité Universitaire de Paris).
translation.en: Admission of students to the Biermans-Lapôtre Foundation (University City of Paris).

translation.lb: — Le prix de location des chambres d'étudiants sera d'environ 900 fr. français par mois.
translation.en: — The rental price for student rooms will be about 900 French francs per month.

translation.lb: Les demandes d'admission sont à adresser au Ministère de l'Education Nationale à Luxembourg avec les pièces suivantes:
translation.en: Applications for admission should be addressed to the Ministry of National Education in Luxembourg with the following documents:

translation.lb: 1. certificat de nationalité,
translation.en: 1. certificate of nationality,

translation.lb: 2. certificat du directeur de l'établissement d'enseignement secondaire du Grand-Duché fréquenté en dernier lieu,
translation.en: 2. certificate from the director of the secondary school of the Grand Duchy last attended,

translation.lb: 3. certificat renseignant ta situation de fortune et de famille occupation et revenu du père, nombre bre d'enfants etc.)
translation.en: 3. certificate providing details about your financial and family situation, occupation and income of the father, number of children, etc.

translation.lb: Ministère de l'Edustion Nationale.
translation.en: Ministry of National Education.

translation.lb: D’Famill Nie. Kayser sét heimatt aile frënn a bekannten /un hèrzen merci fir d’beiléd,
translation.en: The family of Mr. Kayser hereby extends heartfelt thanks to all friends and acquaintances for the condolences,

translation.lb: de’ sehe’ blummen an d’helleg massen.
translation.en: the beautiful flowers and the holy masses.

translation.lb: E spezielle merci fir d’komeroden an d’vereiner.
translation.en: A special thanks to the comrades and associations.

translation.lb: D’sechawochemëss get durch stellmessen ersat.
translation.en: The six-week mass is replaced by other masses.

translation.lb: Rodange, den 15. 9. 1945.
translation.en: Rodange, 15th September 1945.

translation.lb: Nuvellen aus Frankreich Pareis. — Haut gel de loftverke'er Pareis — Amsterdam erem opgeholl.
translation.en: News from France Paris. — Today air traffic Paris — Amsterdam resumed.

translation.lb: Me'ndes, mëttwochs a freides get d'ilinn an den zwo' richtonge geflunn.
translation.en: Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays the route is flown in both directions.

translation.lb: Valence. — Bei engem zuchongléck bei Vemaison sin 30 leidd Ieie biiwen an eng 100 si schwe'er verletzt gin.
translation.en: Valence. — In a train accident near Vemaison, 30 people were killed and about 100 were seriously injured.

translation.lb: Athlétissem De Strand schle ’ t den Andersson den Hansenne den Haegg an dem Ladoumègue sei meilerekord
translation.en: Athletics: The Strand breaks Andersson, Hansenne, Haegg and Ladoumègue's mile record

translation.lb: De Teschte samschdeg wor zu Stockholm dé làngerwârten duell,
translation.en: Last Saturday in Stockholm was the much-awaited duel,

translation.lb: Anderason, Haegg, Strand, Hanaenne op enger meil (1604 m).
translation.en: Andersson, Haegg, Strand, Hansenne on one mile (1604 m).

translation.lb: De Strand huet revanche geholl fir seng lescht défaite ge'nt den Andersson.
translation.en: The Strand took revenge for his last defeat against Andersson.

translation.lb: Den Haegg wor net eso' richtcg am bild,
translation.en: Haegg was not quite in the picture,

translation.lb: an den Hansenne, dén seng course ganz op den Haegg agestallt hât, huet dodurch kostbar zeit a vleicht och nach d'zwét plaz verluer.
translation.en: and Hansenne, who had set his race entirely against Haegg, thereby lost valuable time and perhaps even the second place.

translation.lb: De Strand huet durch sei formidable finish, dén e schon op 300 m ugesât hât gewonn.
translation.en: The Strand won through his formidable finish, which he had already set up at 300 m.

translation.lb: D'zeit vum vainqueur laut 4'4"8/10.
translation.en: The winner's time was 4'4"8/10.

translation.lb: Dem Andersson seng 4'7", dem Hansenne seng 4'8"2/10 (neie franz. rekord, fre'ere rekord Ladoumègue 4'9"2/10), an dem Haegg sein 4'13".
translation.en: Andersson's was 4'7", Hansenne's 4'8"2/10 (new French record, previous record Ladoumègue 4'9"2/10), and Haegg's 4'13".

translation.lb: Offiziell MATTDELONGEN Den telegrammdengscht am land get erem opgeholl.
translation.en: Official Announcements: The telegraph service in the country is resumed.

translation.lb: — De'je'neg postbüroen, de' zum telefonsdengscht zo'- gelôss sin, kenne vun elo un och telegrammen unhuelen.
translation.en: — The post offices that are authorized for telephone service can now also accept telegrams.

translation.lb: (Mattgedélt vun der PTT.)
translation.en: (Communicated by the PTT.)

translation.lb: Ausdehnong vum telefonsdengscht.
translation.en: Extension of the telephone service.

translation.lb: Et get heimadder bekannt gemâclit: 1) An de netzer, de' »um telefonsdengscht zo'geldss sin, get den avis d'appel crem agefo'ert.
translation.en: It is hereby announced: 1) In the networks authorized for telephone service, the call notification is re-introduced.

translation.lb: 2) Vun haut de mëtteg em 2 auer un, ass et den abonnenten vun de netzer vu Gre'vemàcher, Dikrech »n Ettelbreck erlabt ënnert enén ze telefone'eren.
translation.en: 2) From today at 2 PM, subscribers of the networks in Grevenmacher, Diekirch, and Ettelbruck are allowed to call each other.

translation.lb: Well des netzer nach ganz schwe'er beschiédegt sin, kenne nëmme verbindongen, de' fir d'reconstructio'n, de ravitaillement, den transport, d'ëffentleeh an d'gemengeverwaltongen zo'geldss gin.
translation.en: Because these networks are still heavily damaged, only connections for reconstruction, supply, transport, public services, and municipal administrations can be authorized.

translation.lb: D'abonnenten vu Letzeburg, de' sech gèren iwert d'verbindongsme'glechkéten zu Dikrech oder Ettelbréck renseigne'eren, kënnen sech un d'nr. 02.1 Ettelbréck addresse'eren.
translation.en: Subscribers from Luxembourg, who wish to inquire about the connection possibilities to Diekirch or Ettelbruck, can contact the number 02.1 Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: CMattgcdélt vun der P. T. T.)
translation.en: (Communicated by the PTT.)

translation.lb: D’coupe du Prince den 12. august zu Esch um stade Em. Mayrisch héscht et bei ense lichtathléten, léft et vu mond zu mond bei de supporteren vun dem noblen a sche'ne sport.
translation.en: The Prince's Cup on August 12th in Esch at Em. Mayrisch stadium is the talk among our athletes, spreading from mouth to mouth among the supporters of this noble and beautiful sport.

translation.lb: Wie gewënnt d'ci'.ipe an der présenz vun S. K. A. dem Prënz Félix?
translation.en: Who will win the cup in the presence of His Royal Highness Prince Félix?

translation.lb: D'chance si verdélt.
translation.en: The chances are distributed.

translation.lb: T" ka grad eso' gudd d'Spora, de' virum krich zwémol sieger wor, we' de Racing matt senge stärke jugendéquipen, oder Schëffleng matt sénger seniors-mannnschaft, de' d'championnat gewonn huet, sin.
translation.en: Then just as well Spora, who before the war was a two-time winner, as Racing with its strong youth teams, or Schifflange with its senior team, which won the championship, can win.

translation.lb: Jidder club diérf nëmmen 1 mann pro épreuve stellen.
translation.en: Each club may only enter one man per event.

translation.lb: Um 14.50 aucr ass de rassemblement vun allen athléten virum stade fir den emfank vu S. K. A. dem Prënz Félix, um 3 auer fënnt den défile an d'présentatio'n vun den équippe statt.
translation.en: At 2:50 PM is the gathering of all athletes in front of the stadium for the reception of His Royal Highness Prince Félix, and at 3 o'clock the parade and presentation of the teams takes place.

translation.lb: Op grond vun de léschtongtn get d'sélectio'n fir de gro'ssen internationale meeting de 19. august am stadion vu Letzeburg virgeholl.
translation.en: Based on the results, the selection for the big international meeting on August 19th in the stadium of Luxembourg is carried out.

translation.lb: Stodenteméschterschaften am tennis Den 11. an 12. august organise'ert de „Letzeburger Stodentesport-Verband" am stadion zu Letzeburg seng méschterschaften 1945 am tennis.
translation.en: Student championships in tennis On August 11th and 12th, the "Luxembourg Student Sports Association" organizes its 1945 championships in tennis at the stadium in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Hei D'engagementer si schrëftlech bis de 7. 8. 1945 un de stodentesportverband, I.etzeburg, Louvignystrôss 11, ze richten.
translation.en: Here registrations must be submitted in writing by August 7, 1945, to the student sports association, Luxembourg, Louvigny Street 11.

translation.lb: (Mattgedélt vum Stodentesportverband.) sin d'classen, de' délhuele kennen: a) Junioren-Elèven (jongen a médercher) vu 16 bis 20 jor.
translation.en: (Communicated by the student sports association.) the classes are, who can participate: a) Junior pupils (boys and girls) from 16 to 20 years old.

translation.lb: — b) Senioren-Stodenten a stodentinnen an och „anciens élèves", jongen a médercher vun 20 bis 28 jor.
translation.en: — b) Senior students, male and female, and also "former students", boys and girls from 20 to 28 years old.

translation.lb: De Bintner am „Grand Prix de l’Humanité” hât pech.
translation.en: Bintner had bad luck in the 'Grand Prix de l’Humanité'.

translation.lb: Nodém hién é moment 3.45' avance nât, huet sech sei guidon, dén sech schon e puer mol virdrun blocke'- ert hat, definitiv festgesat, so' datt hién huet missen opgin.
translation.en: After he had a 3.45' lead for a moment, his handlebar, which had already blocked several times before, finally got stuck so he had to give up.

translation.lb: De Majerus Jäng, de Clemens Pier an de Kirchen worc virdru scho creve'ert a konnte neischt me' mächen, well d'course émoi ze se'er gângen ass.
translation.en: Majerus Jäng, Clemens Pier, and Kirchen had already dropped out beforehand and could do nothing more because the race was running too fast.

translation.lb: Si hun dun och opgin.
translation.en: They then also gave up.

translation.lb: D'course go'f vum Tacca gewonn virum Knecht, Van Schendel a Lauk.
translation.en: The race was won by Tacca ahead of Knecht, Van Schendel, and Lauk.

translation.lb: Den e'schten am sprint wor ewer de Lank, hié go'f déelasse'ert weil hién den Tacca gehënnert soll hun.
translation.en: However, the first in the sprint was Lank, but he was disqualified because he was said to have hindered Tacca.

translation.lb: International spiller Letzeburg ge’nt Bre’ssel
translation.en: International games Luxembourg against Brussels

translation.lb: De 15. a 16. august treffen sech zu Letzeburg an zu Mondorf d'selectio'nsfquincn villi der universite't Bre'ssel a vuni letzeburger stodentesportverband an der lichtathletik (atodenten a stodent.nnnen) am tennis an am roasbalL
translation.en: On August 15 and 16, the selection teams from the University of Brussels and the Luxembourg Student Sports Association meet in athletics (students and female students), tennis, and football in Luxembourg and Mondorf.

translation.lb: De 15. em 3 auer aas au Letzeburg stad.on lichtathletik (stodenten a stodentinnen) a fo'aaball.
translation.en: On the 15th at 3 o'clock in Luxembourg City, there is athletics (students and female students) and football.

translation.lb: De Iii. aas em 4 auer zu Mondorf am parc en tourne'er am tennis an em halwer 8 owes um terrain vum C. S. Mondorf en internationale fo'saballmatch Letzeburg-Bre'ssel.
translation.en: On the 16th at 4 o'clock in Mondorf Park, a tennis tournament and at half-past 7 in the evening on the field of C. S. Mondorf, an international football match between Luxembourg and Brussels.

translation.lb: ; JOURNÉE ONS JONGEN DEN 1. SEPTEMBER 1945 ZU LETZEBURG DESEN DAG ass an der stad de' e'scht gro'ss manifestatio'n vun déne jongen, de' vun de Preisen fir d'wehrmacht mobilise'ert go'wen.
translation.en: ; ON OUR YOUTH DAY SEPTEMBER 1, 1945 IN LUXEMBOURG THIS DAY is the first major demonstration in the city of those young people who were mobilized by the Prussians for the Wehrmacht.

translation.lb: DEN 1. SEPTEMBER sin et 3 joer, datt de generalstreik ausgebrach wor.
translation.en: SEPTEMBER 1 marks 3 years since the general strike broke out.

translation.lb: An der cathedral ass eng trauermëss fir de', de' hirt liéwe fir ons gin hun a fir ons gefale komeroden.
translation.en: In the cathedral, there is a memorial mass for those who gave their lives for us and for our fallen comrades.

translation.lb: DUERNO ass eng kränz- I nidderléong virun dem Monument du Souvenir.
translation.en: AFTERWARD, a wreath-laying takes place in front of the Monument of Remembrance.

translation.lb: NOMETTES ass e gro'ssen défilé.
translation.en: IN THE AFTERNOON, there is a grand parade.

translation.lb: Duerno ass eng assemblée générale am Cercel matt verschidde riédner.
translation.en: Then there is a general assembly in the Cercle with various speakers.

translation.lb: De' offiziell in- an auslän. vertriéder gin empfangen.
translation.en: The official national and international representatives are received.

translation.lb: T'get eng déclaratioSj un d'auslännesch press ofgin.
translation.en: A declaration is given to the foreign press.

translation.lb: DEN 1. SEPTEMBER proteste'ere mir nach eng ke'er ganz feierlech ge'nt d'preisesch mobilisatio'n a mir gin iéch e kloert bild iwer d'haltong vun der letzeburger jugcnd am krich.
translation.en: ON SEPTEMBER 1, we solemnly protest once more against the Prussian mobilization and we give you a clear picture of the attitude of the Luxembourg youth during the war.

translation.lb: Jidfer Letzeburger, den sech fir d'zo'konft vun onsem land interesse'ert, ass desen dag derbei.
translation.en: Every Luxembourger who is interested in the future of our country is present on this day.

translation.lb: JOURNÉE «ONSJ0N6EN» THE YANK Du vendredi 10 au jeudi 16 août Un film de grande classe!
translation.en: DAY «OUR YOUTH» THE YANK From Friday 10 to Thursday 16 August A high-class film!

translation.lb: Jeannette Mac Donald Allan Jones — W'arren William L • ESPIONNE DE CASTILLE
translation.en: Jeannette Mac Donald Allan Jones — Warren William L • SPY OF CASTILE

translation.lb: Du chant, de la danse et de l'amour!
translation.en: Singing, dancing, and love!

translation.lb: Monde Libre — Séances: 4 et 8 h. 30
translation.en: Free World — Sessions: 4 and 8:30 PM

translation.lb: MARIVAUX Du vendredi 10 au jeudi 16 août Laurel et Hardy dans leur meilleur film IRA DIAVOLO Un éclat de rire d'un bout à l'autre Séances: 2, 4, 6, 8 h. 30.
translation.en: MARIVAUX From Friday 10 to Thursday 16 August Laurel and Hardy in their best film THE DEVIL'S BROTHER Laughter from start to finish Sessions: 2, 4, 6, 8:30 PM.

translation.lb: Monde Libre Enfants admis
translation.en: Free World Children admitted

translation.lb: René COLBACH, medezinstudent,.gefall den 12. aug. 1944 fir seng le'f Hémecht am alter vun 23 jor.
translation.en: René COLBACH, medical student, fell on August 12, 1944, for his beloved homeland at the age of 23.

translation.lb: E feierleche leichendengscht ass an der parkirch zu Miérsch e me'ndeg, den 13. aug. ri em 10 auer.
translation.en: A solemn funeral service is in the parish church in Mersch on Monday, August 13, at around 10 o'clock.

translation.lb: — Famill Colbach- 1; Ewert, Miérsch.
translation.en: — Family Colbach- 1; Ewert, Mersch.

translation.lb: Ons nationalhelden Den 10. august, e schwärzen dag an der geschieht vun der Resistenz vu Letzeburg, hu 6 trei Letzeburger, de Pelkes Pier vun Dummeldcng Barthel Roger vu Bereldeng Mertens Henri vu Rodange Würth Herbert vum Lamperbirg Rinnen Ado vun Henchereng Tompers vu Pèrel an e brave Belschen, de Flammang Nie vun Athus hirt liéwe gelôss fir hir hémecht.
translation.en: Our national heroes On August 10, a black day in the history of the Luxembourg resistance, 6 loyal Luxembourgers, Pelkes Pier from Dummeldange, Barthel Roger from Bereldange, Mertens Henri from Rodange, Würth Herbert from Lamperbirg, Rinnen Ado from Henchereng, Tompers from Parel and a brave Belgian, Flammang Nie from Athus, gave their lives for their homeland.

translation.lb: Fir ons jongen dem zo'greff vun déne verhâsste nazien z'entze'en, hun si hire kapp riske'ert.
translation.en: To save our youth from the grasp of the hated Nazis, they risked their heads.

translation.lb: Et wor hinne keng stonn ze fre' an ze spe't, wann et gehéscht huet, seoh fir d'hémecht a speziell fir d'wuel vun onse beschten anzesetzen.
translation.en: They wasted no time, when it became necessary, to commit themselves for the homeland and especially for the welfare of our best.

translation.lb: Hir égen interessen an d'wuel vun hire familjen go'wen vun onsen helden guer net a betracht gezun, wann et gehascht huet dem preiseschen ënnerdrécker an d'handwirk ze fuschen.
translation.en: Their own interests and the welfare of their families were not considered by our heroes, when it was necessary to disturb the Prussian oppressor.

translation.lb: Eleng de'je'neg, de' matt hinne geschafft hun, kennen sech e kloert bild mâche vun déne geforen, de* si bestanen, a vun der fréd an der begéschterong, de' si emfond, wann e neie stréch gegléckt wor.
translation.en: Only those who worked with them can make a clear picture of the dangers they faced, and the joy and enthusiasm they felt when a new stroke succeeded.

translation.lb: Eng gro'ss zuel vun onse jonge borschten hun si virun der front gerett, a wivill jongen hätten si nach geholief, wann si net durch en on-- gléckilechen zo'fall der gestapo an d'hänn gefall wiren.
translation.en: They rescued a large number of our young boys from the front, and how many more would they have saved if they had not unfortunately fallen into the hands of the Gestapo by chance.

translation.lb: An der villi; Pauly an an der villa Seligmann zu Esch huet hire deidenswé ugefângen an am Gronn, zu Wittlech a Köln seng fortsetzong fond.
translation.en: In the villa Pauly and in the villa Seligmann in Esch, their path of suffering began and found continuation in Gronn, in Wittlich and Cologne.

translation.lb: Trotz senge barbaresche methoden ass et dem Preiss net gelongen, hir moral z'ënnergruewen, eso'guer d'do'- desurtél, dat den 12. juli zu Letzen bürg ausgesprach gof, könnt de' vun i hire preiseschen henker erwârd dö- < faillance net ervirbréngen.
translation.en: Despite their barbaric methods, the Prussian could not undermine their morale; even the death sentence pronounced on July 12 in Luxembourg could not elicit failure from them in front of their Prussian executioners.

translation.lb: Matt dem selwechte courage, matt. dém si ons jongen iwer d'grenz ge- I fo'ert, sin si an den do't gingen.
translation.en: With the same courage with which they carried our boys across the border, they went into death.

translation.lb: Den 10. august 1944 hun ons helden hirt liéwen hirgin, matt der iwerzcgong, datt a kurzer zeit hir le'f hcmecht van der preisesoher pescht i befreit ge'f.
translation.en: On August 10, 1944, our heroes gave their lives with the conviction that their dear homeland would soon be freed from the Prussian pestilence.

translation.lb: Le'f komeroden, èrt bludd ass net, emsoss gefloss, èr hémecht wèrt iéch net vergiéssen.
translation.en: Dear comrades, your blood has not flowed in vain, your homeland will not forget you.

translation.lb: D'wuel vun èrer familjen, dat w&rend èrer länger prisongszeit èr énzeg suerg wor, wèrde mir net aus dem â verle'eren.
translation.en: The welfare of your families, which during your long imprisonment was your only concern, we will not lose sight of.

translation.lb: Dat heWecht verspriéchen mächen iéob d'resistenzler vu Letzeburg, Schlott ro'eg komeroden, dir gel net vergiéss.
translation.en: This solemn promise is made by the resistance fighters of Luxembourg. Rest in peace comrades, you will not be forgotten.

translation.lb: Aus dem Syrdall Nach eng salztut:
translation.en: From the Syrdall: After a salt bag:

translation.lb: En épicier krilt eng sendong tuten.
translation.en: A grocer receives a shipment of bags.

translation.lb: Si gi bei de' aner opgehângen a fir dé seâwechten zweck gebraucht.
translation.en: They are hung up with the others and used for the same purpose.

translation.lb: Iwert dem serve'eren fällt der madame aus dem boutique op, datt eppes op enger tut, ënnen an der fal, geschriwen ass.
translation.en: While serving, the lady from the shop notices that something is written on one of the bags, at the bottom in the fold.

translation.lb: Si liés*: BIST DU LUXEMBURGER: Ja DiANN WERDE MITGLIED DER UNIO'N DER BANDITEN, PLÜNDERER UND STEHLERI
translation.en: She reads: ARE YOU LUXEMBOURGER: Yes THEN BECOME A MEMBER OF THE UNION OF BANDITS, PLUNDERERS AND THIEVES.

translation.lb: Des tut stamt o'ni zweifei aus der selwechter fabrik, we' de' aner.
translation.en: This bag undoubtedly comes from the same factory as the others.

translation.lb: De' hère giélemânnercher müssen dach am gronn eng colossal arbecht löschten, wann si hir propaganda matt hirer sche'ner handschrëft mâche müssen.
translation.en: The gentlemen yellow men must do a colossal task in the ground if they have to make their propaganda with their neat handwriting.

translation.lb: Mir wiren direct a verstauen fir hinnen de bleisteft »pelzen ze kommen.
translation.en: We would directly store away to bring them the pencil 'pelt'.

translation.lb: Ech hat mer emmer virgestaWt, wann de ganze musek an Deitschiland eri-wer war, da geng ejh dohi fueren a meng sache sichen, de' ecb do zréck gelôss hun.
translation.en: I always imagined that when all the commotion in Germany was over, I would go there and look for the things I left behind.

translation.lb: Et geng mech nâmlech ganz vidi interesse'eren ze wëssen, wat matt all déne wackere Parteigenossen, matt all déne muttien, matt ail déne ferventen.Kriegeinsätzler", männlech a weiblech, geschitt wir, a we' se de brocke verdauen, den hinnen d'allie'ert ze knae gin.
translation.en: I would be very interested to know what happened to all those brave party comrades, all those courageous ones, all those fervent war campaigners, male and female, and how they digest the lump given to them by the allies.

translation.lb: Leider si meng sâchen an der russesch besäter zon, an ech kommen haut oder mur nach net dohin.
translation.en: Unfortunately, my things are in the Russian-occupied zone and I cannot go there today or tomorrow.

translation.lb: Mé de', dénen hir sâche bei de Franso'se woren, sin dohi gefuer, an et ass ganz interessant ze he'eren, wat se dohanne fond hun:
translation.en: But those whose belongings were with the French have gone there, and it is quite interesting to hear what they found there:

translation.lb: „D'Preise sin eso' arrogant, we' se nach je woren, se hu genuch ze friéssen, hir wunnénge si net zerste'ert, hir mark ass nach emmer „eng mark", se bezuele fiT den h umpen 26 Rpf. a fir d'bro't 30 Rpf-, grad we' zu der zeit, wo' mir nach do woren.
translation.en: "The Prussians are as arrogant as they ever were, they have enough to eat, their dwellings are not destroyed, their mark is still 'one mark', they pay 26 Reichspfennig for a beer and 30 Reichspfennig for bread, just like when we were still there.

translation.lb: Se organise'eren a reorganise'eren sech, se bu vereinercher a cluhercher (grad ewe' mir och??), se „tratemise'ere" matt den zaldoten a sc sichen hinne weiss ze mächen, we' ongleich hinne geschitt ass."
translation.en: They organize and reorganize themselves, they have clubs and associations (just like we do??), they fraternize with the soldiers and try to make them understand how unfair things have been for them.

translation.lb: An d'fotleg dervun???
translation.en: And the consequences of that???

translation.lb: Wa mer nach fofzeng oder zwanzeg joer liéwen, da wèrde mer et gesin, bis dohin, Jôss mer hinnen hir ro' lôssen, et woren elauter „eso' fei kèrelen"....

translation.en: In the 'Sudetenland' (those who were resettled there know well, they know the infected Prussians who lived there) Benesch immediately began to clean up when he arrived.

translation.en: I do not know what happened afterward.

translation.en: This is the 'master race', which shows what they thought of the terms of the armistice,

translation.lb: dat ass we' si virgin, wann en en d'se'l eng grimmelche' libber 4e'sst.
translation.en: that is how they proceed when someone leaves them a little room.

translation.en: 'Does Germany think of revenge?' Poor 'Wort'!

translation.lb: Firwat fënns de emmer erem leidd, de' der jeremiade sehreiwen, iwert d'intoteranz vun denen „anereu", vun dcne „bloen" oder wc's de se nenne wëUs.
translation.en: Why do you always find people who write jeremiads about the intolerance of those 'others', of the 'blues' or however you want to call them.

translation.lb: Och mir si keng henker, mé mir halen ons et ënimer virun aen: „Denkt Deutschland an Revanche?"
translation.en: We are also not executioners, but we always keep in mind: 'Does Germany think of revenge?'

translation.en: Always with the phrase that fits so well with everything: A word to the wise, greetings

translation.lb: Gebiéd am summer Tëschent sohle'wenhecken, keicht de päd ge' op, Bongecten, a wiss a wéden wie'sslen bis op d'kopp.
translation.en: Prayer in summer between hedges of soles, the path winds its way up, bends, and meadows and willows reach up to the top.

translation.lb: Peipedenken tirklen durch d'feld an drénke rhum, an d'beie schléfen erdeg hir lascht int blumm zu blumm.
translation.en: Butterflies flutter through the field and sip rum, and the bees sleepily carry their burden from flower to flower.

translation.lb: E bauer lued seng fudven, d'sonn brennt him d'muskle brong, seng frächen schert zesummen a lëschieg gét hir zong.
translation.en: A farmer loads his carts, the sun bronzes his muscles, his girls tie their skirts together and cheerfully sing their song.

translation.lb: De bayard voller liéwen, dé stcipt sech streng an d'sträng, d'ke' muhen lues gemittlech am schiéd vu bém an häng.
translation.en: The bayard full of life, he treads firmly in the harness, the cows leisurely chew in the shade of trees and hedges.

translation.lb: En hengerde' f schwicwt lusseg am kr es itver d'gewan, em d'kischte spillen d'mëschen a piken hémlech dran.
translation.en: A hammock swings cheerfully across the orchard, around the chest the people play and hide stealthily inside.

translation.lb: Ech hu lanscht Schielmeks-Seilen de pad mech opgedreckt, mei bo'w dén huet am spränge nach blumm a biet gepleckt,
translation.en: I pushed myself along the path past Schielmeks-Seilen, my boy who, in jumping, still plucked blossoms and flowers,

translation.lb: Dat bild vu kraft an arbecht, a fréd hun ech betruecht, de bauer a seng be'schten, de kcitzchen op der wuecht,
translation.en: The image of strength and work, and joy I observed, the farmer and his beasts, the kitties on the watch,

translation.lb: de bo'w am fro'e spillen, de peiperlenk am jumm, de kischtebam voll musek, an d'beien op der blumm.
translation.en: the boy in happy play, the butterflies in the sky, the chestnut tree full of music, and the bees on the flower.

translation.lb: Meng hänn hun ech gehuewen, gebiéd aus hèrzenskraft: 0 hèrgott lôss dem vollek dé géscht, dé liéwenssaft,
translation.en: I raised my hands, a prayer from the depths of my heart: O Lord, grant the people the spirit, the life force,

translation.lb: da muss et dach sech hiéwen he'ch op aus léd a plo da muss dach e'weg ble'en de fuendel ro't, weiss, blo.
translation.en: then it must surely rise high from suffering and toil, then the banner red, white, blue must surely remain.

translation.lb: I Der dég én sin ech op Esch gefuer mam 4.auer-zuch.
translation.en: That day I traveled to Esch on the 4 o'clock train.

translation.lb: Am compartiment, vis-à-vis vu mir setzt e le'ft jongt médchen vun 18 joer, hatt setzt ro'eg an zergutzt an sengcm eck, einfach ugedoen, net gemolt — der mapp matt de bicher no ze schle'ssen, ko'm hatt aus der scho'l.
translation.en: In the compartment, sitting across from me, was a lively young girl of 18 years, calmly and neatly seated in her corner, simply dressed, not made up — judging by the bag with books, she came from school.

translation.lb: Et wor en echt brawt letzeburger médchen, e gesonde letzeburger apel.
translation.en: She was a genuine fine Luxembourg girl, a healthy Luxembourg apple.

translation.lb: Mir woren net eJeng, bei der fenster stongen zwé hèren, och secher vun 20—22 joer; si hun hir witze gemâch iwer de', de' dobausse lânscht gânge sin:
translation.en: We weren't alone; at the window stood two gentlemen, likely also around 20—22 years old; they were making jokes about those passing by outside:

translation.lb: „Kuck emol, sét den én, wat kommen hei zwé „Bätz", a scho reisst den aneren d'portière op, an era klammen zwo' jofferen.
translation.en: "Look there," one said, "here come two 'bimbos'," and immediately the other pulled the door open, and two young ladies climbed in.

translation.lb: Do hält dir ons jonge misste gesin; d'häls hun se sech verdre't, d'ärm verrenkt fir de „Bätz" hir kofferen a päckelcher am netz ze verstauen — an e wärme, feierege bléck wor de merci.
translation.en: There you should have seen our young men; they twisted their necks, strained their arms to store the 'bimbos'' suitcases and bundles in the net — and a warm, passionate glance was the thanks.

translation.lb: — Den apel setzt weider ro'eg am eck, fir hién ass ké bléck — hié wor eben en apel, ké batz.
translation.en: — The apple continued to sit calmly in the corner, for her there were no glances — she was simply an apple, not a bimbo.

translation.lb: Wat bleiwt vun onsem sche’ne patriotissem iwereg?
translation.en: What remains of our beautiful patriotism?

translation.lb: Wann d'Preise matt hirer barbare musek durch d'strdsse gezu sin an se baten hir hakekreizfendele bei sroh, da si mer geilaf wat mer lafe konnte tir net braueben d'patt an d'lüchl ze biéwen.
translation.en: When the Prussians marched through the streets with their barbaric music and hoisted their swastika flags, we ran as fast as we could, ready to brew no more beer and to extinguish the lights.

translation.lb: De' zeit hu mer ons gewënscht, nëmmen erem émoi onsc fendel ro't, weiss a blo virun ons ze gesin, an ecb wetten, et wor muencherén, dén scch an dem ament virun desen onsc fendel op d'kne'e gesät hält.
translation.en: At that time, we wished only once more to see our flag, red, white, and blue, in front of us, and I bet there were some who knelt before this our flag at that moment.

translation.lb: Maut kre'e mer emol net den huit vum kapp, wann offizieM de fendel lânschl gedroe get.
translation.en: We don't even take off our hats anymore when the flag is carried along officially.

translation.lb: Ass dat alles wat vun onser begfschterong iwereg bliwen ass??
translation.en: Is that all that's left of our enthusiasm??

translation.lb: Mir hun am londoner B. B. C. de Fcierwôn gehe'ert, an d'hèrz huet ons vu fréde geklappt.
translation.en: We heard the firework through London B. B. C., and our hearts clapped with joy.

translation.lb: D'Hémecht, de' sche'nsle melodie, de' je compone'ert ass gin, ass gespililt gin, a mir hun tre'nen an d'ae kritt, mir hun d'hänn gefalt we' zum gebiéd...
translation.en: The Homeland, the most beautiful melody ever composed, was played, and we got tears in our eyes, we folded our hands as if to pray...

translation.lb: Haut get op de bauereklrmessen de feierwôn, an eso'gur hin and widder d'Hémceht als damm u s e k gespillt...
translation.en: Today, at the farmers' markets, the firework goes on, and here and there the Homeland is played as if nothing matters...

translation.lb: Ass dat adles, wat mir fir ons nationalhymnen iwereg hun???
translation.en: Is that all we still have for our national anthems???

translation.lb: Fir de' melodien, de' mer nëmmen am stoen, a malt slëller andacht unhe'ere sollen???
translation.en: For the melodies, we should only hear with reverence and silent attention???

translation.lb: Um dësch viru mer deit c klengt btiédehen „Freihét", am zwéten ofsaz beseht et: „Et ass d'Organisalio'n vun onsen Nationalhelden CLAUDE, DONDELINGER, SIEDLER"
translation.en: On the table in front of me is a small paper 'Freedom,' the second paragraph reads: 'It is the organization of our national heroes CLAUDE, DONDELINGER, SIEDLER'

translation.lb: an am leschten ofsaz... „durch eng soirée dansante, de' mir den 1, September op der Schueberfoer am „VICTORY DANCING" halen.
translation.en: and in the last paragraph... 'through a soirée dance, which we hold on September 1 at the Schueberfouer in 'VICTORY DANCING'.

translation.lb: Mir hun neischt dcrge'nt, dalt onse jonktem secli amese'erl, et kennt binnen zo' no e.so' vidi joren misär a verdross.
translation.en: We have nothing against it, our youth should enjoy themselves, it is understandable after so many years of misery and frustration.

translation.lb: — Mé ein gottes wellen net an engem otem malt dem undenke vun den „Nationalhelden", wedl soss ma mer aus hinnen eng reotam, en aushângeschëld fir ons Propaganda.
translation.en: — But for God's sake, do not in the same breath change the remembrance of the 'National Heroes,' or else we make them a mere banner, a billboard for our propaganda.

translation.lb: An all onse sche'nc patriolissem gét ënner an et bleiwt ncischt iwereg ewe' en huele klank.
translation.en: And all our beautiful patriotism perishes, and nothing remains except an empty sound.

translation.lb: Dem artikelschreiwer vun Esch musse mir mattdélen, datt ënner dénen emstänn, we' en seng uklo gemat huet, et me'glech wir, datt dé betreffende jéer e permis an och eng juegd ka kre'en.
translation.en: We must inform the article writer from Esch that under the circumstances he has made his complaint, it is possible that the concerned hunter can obtain a permit and also a hunt.

translation.lb: Ower am selwechte fall kann dé betreffende jéer ké permis an och keng juegd kre'en, wann den artikelschreiwer him bekannt verfélongen der épuratio'nskommissio'n schrëftlech bekannt get.
translation.en: However, in the same case, the concerned hunter cannot obtain a permit or a hunt if the article writer informs the purification commission in writing of his violations.

translation.lb: Mir profite'eren vun deser geléenhét fir all sectio'nen vun der Unio'n ze biéden ge'nt all de'je'neg jéer, de' am krich net propper woren an dénen hir patriotesch haltong ze wënschen iwreg gelôss huet, plainte anzeréchen.
translation.en: We take advantage of this opportunity to ask all sections of the Union to file complaints against all those hunters who were not clean during the war and whose patriotic conduct left much to be desired.

translation.lb: De' plainte muss enthalen e gcnéen exposé vum fait, an d'gené adress vun den zeien, a soll spe'tstens bis zum 30. august agerécht gin.
translation.en: The complaint must contain a precise account of the matter, and the correct address of the witnesses, and should be filed by August 30 at the latest.

translation.lb: Mé de generalissimus liuet et gemäch! An net ze knapps!
translation.en: But the Generalissimo takes it easy! And not too limited!

translation.lb: Den hèr Peter Krier huet also' neischt ze soenl —
translation.en: So Mr. Peter Krier has nothing to say —

translation.lb: Wann hién ower neischt ze soen huet, wat mecht hién dann an der regirong!
translation.en: If he has nothing to say, then what is he doing in the government!

translation.lb: Wa mer ons gudd erënneren. huet iwregens de Peter Krier matt ënnerschriwen.
translation.en: If we remember correctly, Peter Krier has also signed it.

translation.lb: — Wëllt den her Peter Krier haut neischt nie' dovu wëssen, oder wéss hién net, wat hién ënnerschreiwt?
translation.en: — Does Mr. Peter Krier want to know nothing more about it today, or does he not know what he signed?

translation.lb: Dat wir traureg a géng net sehe' man am „Werk eines Mannes".
translation.en: That would be sad and would not belong in 'The Work of a Man'.

translation.lb: P.S. — Fir wat ass d'..Arbeiterpartei" iwerhapt eso' be's iwer de generalissimus, et huet jo och schle'sslech e generol, de Vi-Bol Od r ass et vleicht, well de generol net generalissimus ass?
translation.en: P.S. — Why is the 'Workers' Party' so angry with the Generalissimo when it also has a general, perhaps because the general is not a Generalissimo?

translation.lb: Buedemspeculatio’n
translation.en: Land speculation

translation.lb: Et heut sech erausgestallt, datt am laf vun de nokrlchsjores leidd aus industriellen a commer- Cielle beruffer op d'land komm sin an zu preisser, de' Kr d'IandbevëHcerong onerschménglech woren.
translation.en: It has turned out that over the past years, people from industrial and commercial professions have come to the land and at prices that were unaffordable for the rural population.

translation.lb: land a buedem ans de bauerenh&nn gérais hun.
translation.en: Land and soil have ended up in the hands of non-farmers.

translation.lb: D'follech dovunner wor, datt de bauer, dé virdrun als égentëmmer op aénger égener scholl geschafft a gewirtschaft hat, um enn zum piéchter a lo'narbechter erofgesonk ass.
translation.en: The consequence was that the farmer, who previously worked and managed on his own land as an owner, eventually was reduced to a tenant and laborer.

translation.lb: De' zo'stänn müssen é fir allemol ophe'eren.
translation.en: These conditions must end once and for all.

translation.lb: Déje'negen, dén d'land beakert a bebaut, dém soll et och gehe'eren.
translation.en: Those who cultivate and farm the land should also own it.

translation.lb: Et soll him me'glecb sin, zo' uerdentleche preisser, de' ▼un offizieller seit no dem ravenit festgeluecht gin, d'land z'erueweren an et als égentom ze bewirtschaften.
translation.en: It should be possible for him, at reasonable prices, established officially according to revenue, to acquire the land and manage it as property.

translation.lb: D ’ preisesch kënschtler a schrëftsteller.
translation.en: The Prussian artists and writers.

translation.lb: D'militärautorite'ten an der amerikanesch besäter zon hun 3 lëschten opgestallt, an dénen d'preisesch kënschtler a schrëftsteller me' gené ennert d'lupp geholl gin.
translation.en: The military authorities in the American-occupied zone have compiled three lists, in which the Prussian artists and writers have been scrutinized more closely.

translation.lb: Op der e'schter lëscht figure'eren de'je'neg, de' politesch zo'verlässeg sin an dénen fe'rend plazen uvertraut kënne gin.
translation.en: On the first list are those who are politically reliable and to whom leading positions can be entrusted.

translation.lb: Op der zwéter gin all de' ernimmt, dénen hire fall nach net ganz kloer leit, de' och weider an hirem fach schaffe kennen awer keng fe'rend plazen unhuelen dèrfen.
translation.en: On the second list are all those mentioned, whose case is not yet entirely clear, who can continue to work in their field but are not allowed to take on leading positions.

translation.lb: De' 3. lëscht endlech enthält de'je'neg, de' absolut net me' hire beruff ausüben dèrfen.
translation.en: The third list finally contains those who are absolutely not allowed to practice their profession anymore.

translation.lb: Ennert hinne sin de FurlwjV,0er de berühmten dirigent, an den acteur Emil Jannings.
translation.en: Among them are the famous conductor, Furtwängler, and the actor Emil Jannings.

translation.lb: DEN UNIO’ NSGEDANKEN SETZT SECH DURCH!
translation.en: THE IDEA OF UNION PREVAILS!

translation.lb: Mir gestin et an: mir wore stolz besonnesch zefridden, we' mir lie'ert a geliést hun, datt d'komuinistesch partei, d'arbechter»artei an de Gruppement sech.
translation.en: We admit it: we were especially proud and satisfied when we learned and read that the communist party, the workers' party, and the group have.

translation.lb: iso' weit we' mir wëssen, éstemmeg zu dem ideal bekannt hun.
translation.en: as far as we know, unanimously acknowledged the ideal.

translation.lb: lat mir seit me'nt priédegen: Eng ■oncentratio'n vun allen onsen politesche parteien.
translation.en: Let us say with a sermon: A concentration of all our political parties.

translation.lb: eng „union acrée" vun alle Letzeburger.
translation.en: a 'sacred union' of all Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: D'rechtspartei huet hir astelong zu der formatio'n vun der teier regirong nach net bekannt ,'in.
translation.en: The right party has not yet announced its position on the formation of the current government.

translation.lb: Mir huelen iéwel un. datt pch si, de' stärkst partei aus dem 'and, sech zu deser unio'n vun Hen, de' enges gtidde wëllens sin.
translation.en: We assume as a given that they, the strongest party in the country, will join this union of those who are willing to build something.

translation.lb: D unio'n ass eben de' énzeg rettong, de' ons bleiwt, et ass dei énzegc wé, den ons op ass, fi erem gesond ze gin, et ass den énzege moyen, dén evite'erc kann, datt d'onzefriddenhét wîsi an zu engem chaos fe'ert.
translation.en: The union is indeed the only salvation that remains for us, it is the only way open to us to become healthy again, it is the only means that can prevent dissatisfaction from escalating into chaos.

translation.lb: Mir si fro\ datt, vu ve'er, gleicl drei parteien sech zu onsem idea bekannt hun, a mir sin iwerzégt datt d'ganzt letzeburger vollek matt ons des unio'n fuerdert.
translation.en: We are glad that, unexpectedly, three parties have aligned with our idea, and we are convinced that the entire Luxembourgish people demand this union with us.

translation.lb: Ai der Unio'n leit d'kräft, de' mii brauchen, fir all de' froen, de sech stellen — et sin der vill-zum bèschten vun onser hémecl ze le'sen.
translation.en: In the union lies the strength we need to solve all the questions we face—there are many—to the best benefit of our homeland.

translation.lb: D'unio'n vun alle Letzeburg' duerf net félschlon.
translation.en: The union of all Luxembourgers must not fail.

translation.lb: Et wèr crime un unsem land' D'Uclo'n.
translation.en: It would be a crime against our country, the Union.

translation.lb: ,ONS JONGEN' Section de LUXEMBOURG Grande SOIRÉE-DANSANTE au profit de nos jeunes mutilés samedi, le 3 novembre à 20 heures au Cercle Municipal à Luxembourg.
translation.en: 'OUR BOYS' Luxembourg Section: Grand Dance Evening in support of our injured youths on Saturday, November 3rd at 8 PM at the Municipal Circle in Luxembourg.

translation.en: I am committed to serving my clientele well and honestly.

translation.lb: DO’DEFEIEREN Allerhellgen em 10 auer mueres huet um kirfech Notre Dame eng stëll feier beim monument „Aux Soldats Français de la Grande Guerre morts dans le Grand-Duché" stattfond.
translation.en: THE CELEBRATION On All Saints' Day at 10 o'clock in the morning, a quiet ceremony took place at the Notre Dame cemetery at the monument "Aux Soldats Français de la Grande Guerre morts dans le Grand-Duché".

translation.lb: D'perse'nlechkéten haten sech virum kirfech versammelt a ko'me, begléd vun de fendelen, bei d'monument wo' si kränz niddergeluegt hun.
translation.en: The dignitaries had gathered in front of the cemetery and came, accompanied by the flags, to the monument where they laid wreaths.

translation.lb: 'Noenaner sin d'gesandten, S. E. du Chayla, bevollmächtegte minister vu Frankreich, de Cal. Archen, militärattaché, S. E. Vicomte de Berryer, bevoHmächtegte minister vu Belgien,» S. E. den hèr staatsminister Dupong, den hèr burgerméschter Diderich, de président vun der „Amicale Volontaire luxembourgeoise 1914—18, de président vun der „Union Royale Belge" an de président vun der „Amicale des Français et Anciens Combattants Differdange" virgetrueden an hu kränz niddergeluegt, während ronderem ailes stëll wor an de public den do'dege geduecht huet, de' hei am friémembuedem ro'en, op dém si hirt liéwe fir Frankreich gin hun.
translation.en: Afterward, the envoys, His Excellency du Chayla, plenipotentiary minister of France, Colonel Archen, military attaché, His Excellency Vicomte de Berryer, plenipotentiary minister of Belgium, His Excellency the state minister Dupong, mayor Diderich, the president of the "Amicale Volontaire luxembourgeoise 1914—18," the president of the "Union Royale Belge," and the president of the "Amicale des Français et Anciens Combattants Differdange" laid wreaths while all around was silent and the public remembered the dead who rest here in foreign soil, where they gave their lives for France.

translation.lb: Ennert de perse'nlechkéten hu mir de' hère ministère Bech a Frieden, den hèr président vun der Chamber, Reuter, den hèr Vanheeghe, handelsattiaché bei der franse'scher légatio'n an den hèr Graeffe, attaché bei der beischer legatio'n, gesin.
translation.en: Among the dignitaries, we saw Mr. ministers Bech and Frieden, the president of the Chamber, Mr. Reuter, Mr. Vanheeghe, commercial attaché at the French legation, and Mr. Graeffe, attaché at the Belgian legation.

translation.lb: Vum kirfech Notre-Dame sin d'perse'nlechkéten op den amerikanesche kirfecht bei Hamm gefuer, wo' ronn 8000 zaldoten a letzeburgeschem buedem hir ro' fond hun.
translation.en: From the Notre-Dame cemetery, the dignitaries traveled to the American cemetery in Hamm, where around 8,000 soldiers have found their rest in Luxembourg soil.

translation.lb: Eng e'erenabteilong vun der letzeburgescher arme' wor hei ugetrueden an hun hir gewierer présente'ert, während de' uewegenannt perse'nlechkéten kränz niddergeluegt hun.
translation.en: An honor guard of the Luxembourg army was present and presented arms while the aforementioned dignitaries laid wreaths.

translation.lb: D'cérémonie um amerikanesche kirfech wor vun dèrselwechter einfachhét, we' de' um kirfech Notre-Dame.
translation.en: The ceremony at the American cemetery was of the same simplicity as the one at the Notre-Dame cemetery.

translation.lb: Och beim „Monument des Communards" op dem HoHerecher kirfech, wo' Englänner, Franso'sen a Letzeburger zesumme begruewe leien, de' am e'schten an am zwéte weltkrich gefall sin, kränz niddergeluegt.
translation.en: Wreaths were also laid at the "Monument des Communards" at the Hollerich cemetery, where English, French, and Luxembourgers who fell in the first and second world wars are buried together.

translation.lb: D'Unio'n hat e kränz op d'e'eregraw vun déne leidd, de' duerch d'bombardementer em d'iiéwe komm sin, e kränz dépose'ert.
translation.en: The Union laid a wreath on the honorary grave of those who lost their lives through the bombings.

translation.lb: Sq' ass det joer erem eng al traditio'n, den helde vun den alliie'erte länner ze gedenken, opgeholl gin, a mir hoffen, datt mir elo als freit land des traditio'n all joer erem widerhuele kennen.
translation.en: This year, once again, an old tradition of commemorating the heroes of the allied countries was revived, and we hope that as a free country, we can continue to repeat this tradition every year.

translation.lb: Prozess ge’nt d’krichsverbriécher vum lager Dachau
translation.en: Trial against the war criminals of the Dachau camp

translation.lb: 50 fe'rend beatnten vum konï.cntratio'nslagrr Dachau kommen de nexte mo'nt virun en ameri» kanescht krichsgerîcht.
translation.en: 50 leading officials of the Dachau concentration camp will appear next month before an American military court.

translation.lb: De proress ass ain lager «elwer.
translation.en: The trial is a camp in itself.

translation.lb: Si sin ugeklot, daüsuiule von hfift lengen durch vergasen, ersche'ssen, erhânken an erhingeren gemiu/dt ze hun.
translation.en: They are accused of putting hundreds of prisoners to death by gassing, shooting, hanging, and starving.

translation.lb: Uh 3000 hâftlengen si medizinesch expérimenter ugestallt gin, 5000 juddeti si vergast, erhäng a. e. sv. gin.
translation.en: Approximately 3000 prisoners were subjected to medical experiments, 5000 Jews were gassed, hung etc.

translation.lb: Dest ass dé gre'sste pro2ess, dé jé ge'nt krichsverbriéchcr gefo'ert go'f.
translation.en: This is the largest trial ever conducted against war criminals.

translation.lb: De' anet beamten vum lager Dachau komme spe'der och virun d'gerîcht.
translation.en: Other officials from the Dachau camp will also later be brought before the court.

translation.lb: Ennert den haptugekloten befannen sech e puer docleren, de' experimenter matt den hâftlénge gemat hun.
translation.en: Among the main defendants are several doctors who conducted experiments on the prisoners.

translation.lb: Et sin e. a. den Dr. Klaus Schilling, dén d'iédong iwer d'malariaabteilohg hât, den Dr. Frit* Hintermeier, den Dr. Siegmund Rascher.
translation.en: Including Dr. Klaus Schilling, who had the department over malaria, Dr. Frit* Hintermeier, Dr. Siegmund Rascher.

translation.lb: Op uerder vun der luftwaff hun se experimenter matt de prlsonne'er gemat fir FestZestelien, wat de mënsch ü kélt ganz he'éh an der lOcht verdroe kennt.
translation.en: On orders from the air force, they conducted experiments on the prisoners to determine how much cold a human could withstand at high altitudes.

translation.lb: 90 prozent vun den häftlengen, de' an der nuecht an de kale sehne' gestallt go'wen, si gestuerwen, vill anerer si geckeg gin.
translation.en: 90 percent of the prisoners, who were placed in the cold snow at night, died, many others went insane.

translation.lb: Weider ass och en hauptmann ugeklot, bei der ukonft vun den Amerikaner d'lager vu I.audsberg a brabd gestach ze hun.
translation.en: Additionally, a captain is accused of having set the camp of Landsberg on fire upon the arrival of the Americans.

translation.lb: Den Attlee iwer d’ atomenergie.
translation.en: Attlee on atomic energy.

translation.lb: Den englesche premier huet virum ënneschthaus ausgesot, hié ge'w keng erklârong iwer d'verwendong vun der atomenergie ofgin, bis datt d'bespriéchonge matt dénen un deser fro bedélegte lânner, nämlech Amerika a Canada zu enn gefe'ert wären.
translation.en: The English Prime Minister stated before the lower house that he would not give any explanation regarding the use of atomic energy until discussions with the countries concerned, namely America and Canada, had concluded.

translation.lb: De kinek George VI. huet en appel gemat, d'atomenergie nemme fir friddenszwecker ze verwennen an zur hiéwong vum liéwensstandart vun der ganzer weit.
translation.en: King George VI made an appeal to use atomic energy only for peaceful purposes and to raise the standard of living worldwide.

translation.lb: Desen appell huet hié gemâch bei geléenhét vun der jorhonnertfeier vun enger universite't fir technologie aew.
translation.en: He made this appeal at the occasion of the centenary celebration of a university for technology and science.

translation.lb: Et ass elo de verschléfte perso'nen an Deitsebland erme'glecht gin, matt hire familjen an hiren hémechtslânner ze corresponde'eren.
translation.en: The displaced persons in Germany are now enabled to correspond with their families in their homelands.

translation.lb: Si dèrfen zwémol am mo'nt e bre'f ze kre'en oder ze schécken an si dèrfe net me' lâng sin ewe' eng seit.
translation.en: They are allowed to receive or send a letter twice a month, and they may not remain away from each other for long.

translation.en: Letter exchange between the individual occupation zones is now possible.

translation.lb: D ’ wehrflicht an Amerika
translation.en: The conscription in America

translation.lb: De président Truman huet virgëschter dem amerikanesche sénat de virsclilag gemat, d'allgemeng Wehrpflicht an Amerika anzefe'eren, fir datt d'Verénegt Staaten zu jidder zeit eng genügend stärk reserv hätten, fir allen éventualite'ten ze bege'nen a virun allem de fridden z'erhalen.
translation.en: President Truman yesterday proposed to the American Senate to introduce universal conscription in America so that the United States would always have a sufficiently strong reserve, to meet any eventualities and above all to maintain peace.

translation.lb: Dese projet ass net ge'nt ons allie'ert gerîcht, sot hién, mé eng bewaffent macht ass eleng amstand de fridden matt erfollech ze verdédegen.
translation.en: This project is not directed against our allies, he said, but an armed force is alone capable of defending peace successfully.

translation.lb: Nom président Truman sengem projet soll all mann an Amerika nach virum oflaf vu sengem 20. joer 1 joer militärdéngscht mächen.
translation.en: According to President Truman's plan, every man in America should serve one year of military service before the end of his 20th year.

translation.lb: Dat ass de' e'schte ke'er an der amerikanespher geschieht, datt d'wehrflicht a friddenszeiten agefo'ert soll gin.
translation.en: This is the first time in American history that conscription is to be introduced during peacetime.

translation.lb: Amerika kann sech och net me' énzeg an eleng op seng avantage's geographesch siluatio'n verlôssen.
translation.en: America can no longer rely solely and alone on its advantageous geographic position.

translation.lb: Amerika huet bei de conferenzen matt hiren allie'erten d'charge opgelueden, de fridden fir jidfer preis oprecht z'erhalen, an dèr verflichtong misst hatt onbedéngt nokommen.
translation.en: America took on the responsibility at the conferences with its allies to maintain peace at any cost, and it must absolutely fulfill this obligation.

translation.lb: De Kratzenberg Mir krute igesot de Kralzenberg wèr „somewhere in Germany" verhaft gin, an datt hién am Gronn, wo'hin hié scho läng virun dem 10. mé 1940 higehe'ert huet, ageiiwert go'w.
translation.en: The Kratzenberg We were told that Kratzenberg was arrested "somewhere in Germany" and that he had been handed over to the Gronn, where he had already belonged long before May 10, 1940.

translation.lb: Mir hun emsoss op me' détailler gewärt.
translation.en: We have waited in vain for more details.

translation.lb: Kuckt, hèr justizminister, mir interesse'eren ons eso' immens Er den Damian, datt mir gère Wesse ge'wen, wat de „Landesleiter" geinftcht huet no sengem „strategischen Rückzug aus Lützelburg", wo' a bei wiém hién sech zeréckgezun hât, ob nach én oder den aner matt him verliaft ass gin, a wat hié sot, we' si e krulen.
translation.en: Look, Minister of Justice, we are so immensely interested in Damian that we would like to know what the "Landesleiter" did after his "strategic retreat from Luxembourg", where and with whom he retreated, whether anyone fled with him, and what he said when they caught him.

translation.lb: Dir wort net hei an Dir kënnt net wëssen, we' den Damian ons de ganze krich um mo lo'g, soss hätt Dir ons et scho gesot.
translation.en: You weren't here and you can't know how Damian lied to us throughout the war, otherwise you would have already told us.

translation.lb: Dir musst ooh haut reconstitue'ere kënnen, wat ons Landes-, Kreis- an Ortgruppen erre'der no dem 9. septf mber 1914 am Reich gemäch bun.
translation.en: You must also be able today to reconstruct what our national, district, and local groups have done in the Reich since after September 9, 1914.

translation.lb: Sot ons et dach, mir sin eso' virwëtzeg.
translation.en: Just tell us, we are so curious.

translation.lb: Et ass dach sëcher -e secretl
translation.en: It is surely - a secret!

translation.lb: All de' „Führer" sin eso' wichteg perse'nlechkéten fir ons gin, datt alles ons interesse'ert, wat si mächen a geinftcht hun.
translation.en: All the "leaders" have become such important personalities for us that we are interested in everything they do and have done.

translation.lb: Mir recommande'eren dem hèr Jirecler vum prisong de Kratzenberg ganz besonnesch.
translation.en: We especially recommend Kratzenberg to the prison director.

translation.lb: Hèr direU.' passt gudd op op den Damian, suergt iir hién, datt hié bei gudder gesondhét bleiwt, datt him nëmme neischt geschitt, well Dir wësst mir brauchen den Damian.
translation.en: Mr. Director, take good care of Damian, ensure that he stays in good health, that nothing happens to him because you know we need Damian.

translation.lb: Hié muss ons opl-le'erong gin iwer dat, wat virura krich hei geschitt ass, dat ass och wichteg, wién hién ënnerstëlzt, finanze'ert a gehalen huet, wién d'H.l hei gegrcnnt huet, wié relatio'nen hât matt der NSDAPL.
translation.en: He must give us explanations about what happened here before the war; it is also important who supported, financed, and kept him, who founded the H.l here, what relationships he had with the NSDAPL.

translation.lb: Mir müssen och wëssen, wién him am krich 110- stong, wién un hién erugetrueden ass fir avantagen ze kre'en.
translation.en: We also need to know who stood by him during the war, who approached him to gain advantages.

translation.lb: Hèr directer de Kratzeaberg v.és eso' vill.
translation.en: Mr. Director de Kratzenberg expects so much from you.

translation.lb: Dofir, hèr directer, passt gudd op op den Damian.
translation.en: Therefore, Mr. Director, take good care of Damian.

translation.lb: Et wèr en dauerschued, wann hié krank ge'w gin, et wèr onverzeilech,wann hié ge'w stiérwen, scescht we' durch eng kugel no engem jugement.
translation.en: It would be a permanent damage if he got sick, it would be unforgivable if he died, especially through a bullet after a judgment.

translation.lb: A sollt den Damian net schwetze wëllen, dann, hèr justizminister, gitt hién e puer KZ-Ier oder mutile'ert jongen aus der Wehrmacht an d'hänn, de' kennen d'sprôch, de' dem Dr. seng zong le'sen.
translation.en: And if Damian does not want to talk, then, Minister of Justice, give him a few KZ guards or mutilated boys from the Wehrmacht who know the language, who can read the Dr.'s tongue.

translation.lb: De Kratzenberg muss schwetzen, an d'Letzeburger vollek muss gewur gin, wat hié sotl
translation.en: Kratzenberg must speak, and the Luxembourgish people must be made aware of what he said!

translation.lb: Den dockarbechter streik zu enn N'o 7 woche streik hu 40 bis 50 000 liafenarbechter hir arbecht erem opgeholl.
translation.en: The dockworkers' strike came to an end after 7 weeks as 40 to 50,000 laborers resumed their work.

translation.lb: Am Londoner hafen eleng leie 60 schëffer, de' nach net gelëseht sin, weider 60 schëffer si nemmen délweis gelueden resp. nusgelueden.
translation.en: In the London harbor alone, 60 ships are still unloaded, while another 60 ships are only partially loaded or unloaded.

translation.lb: D'fuerderonge vun den arbechter woren: en dageslo'n vu 25 Shilling an d'40-stonne-woch.
translation.en: The demands of the workers were: a daily wage of 25 Shillings and a 40-hour week.

translation.lb: D'verhandlonge woren den 18. october ofgebrach, well d'arbechter ge'nt de welle vun hire gewerkschafte gestreikt hun.
translation.en: Negotiations were broken off on October 18th because the workers had struck against the wishes of their unions.

translation.en: Political trials

translation.lb: Den her Edouard Meyer, bauer.
translation.en: Mr. Edouard Meyer, farmer.

translation.lb: Conter, ass e samschdeg, den 3. november 1945 freigesprach gin.
translation.en: Conter, was acquitted on Saturday, November 3, 1945.

translation.lb: Jean Klein, eisebunnsschlesser, Gâsperech ass matt 5 jor Zuchthaus, 25.000 frang an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't bestroft gin.
translation.en: Jean Klein, railway smith, Gasperich, was sentenced to 5 years in prison, a fine of 25,000 francs, and the loss of Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: E wor blockwalter vun der NSV, hât en antrag fir d'NSDAP gestallt ar huet sech eng dénunciatio'n zu schëlle komme gelßas.
translation.en: He was a block leader of the NSV, had applied for the NSDAP, and had committed denouncement.

translation.lb: Rallye vun de scouten um stadion
translation.en: Scout rally at the stadium

translation.lb: Gëschter mëtteg wor uni stadion zu Letzeburg de gro'sse rallye vun de scouten aus dem ganze land.
translation.en: Yesterday afternoon, at the stadium in Luxembourg, the great rally of scouts from all over the country took place.

translation.lb: Lënks vun der e'rentribiin haten d'sectio'ne vun der F.N.É.L., an der mëtt vum terrain d'mi'litärmusek an e peloton zaldote vun der Garde Charlotte, a lenks d'sectio'ne vun de Letzcburger Scouten a wëilefcher opstellong gehoil.
translation.en: To the left of the honor tribune were the sections of the F.N.É.L., in the middle of the field the military band and a platoon of soldiers from the Garde Charlotte, and to the left, the sections of the Luxembourg Scouts and Cub Scouts were lined up.

translation.lb: De ganzen terrain wor voll vu jongen, de' alléguer komm wore, fir dem feiçrleche verspriéche vun hirem chef-scout, dem Çrënz Jean, beizewunneu.
translation.en: The entire field was full of boys, who had all come to witness the solemn promise of their chief scout, Prince Jean.

translation.lb: Cfp der e'rentribüu haten den hèr Bëschof, de belsche Minister Vicomte Berryer, de franse'sche Minister du Chayla, den englesche Consul, den hèr List, d'ministere Frieden, Konsbrück, Margue an Als, de capt.
translation.en: On the honor tribune were Bishop Mr. Bëschof, the Belgian Minister Vicomte Berryer, the French Minister du Chayla, the English Consul Mr. List, Ministers Frieden, Konsbrück, Margue and Als, Captain.

translation.lb: Märzen, de ipajo er Ginter, de major Grieve, den lier Jacquemart, den abbé Elz, den hèr WHweirs a vill âner perse'nlechkéte plaz geholl, we' ponkt 3 auer de Prënz Jean a begl-édong vum hèr Loesch a vun den hèren Hentgen a Schommer um stadion agetraff ass.
translation.en: Märzen, the junior commissioner Ginter, Major Grieve, Senior Jacquemart, Abbot Elz, Mr. WHweirs and many other personalities took their places, as at exactly 3 o'clock Prince Jean, accompanied by Mr. Loesch and Messrs. Hentgen and Schommer, arrived at the stadium.

translation.lb: Nom ofhuele vun der revue hun d'fièren Hentgen a Schommer aïs vertriéder vun de 2 scouteverbânn de Prënz Jean a kurze riéde begre'sst an him als hirem iéweschle chef trei versprach.
translation.en: After the review, leaders Hentgen and Schommer, as representatives of the two scout associations, greeted Prince Jean with a brief speech and pledged loyalty to him as their supreme chief.

translation.lb: De Prënz Jean huel sech op letzeburgesch u seng scoutebridder aus dem ganze land gewand an hinne i ersechert, datt hién all seng krâft asetzt, fir e gudde chef ze sin.
translation.en: Prince Jean addressed his scout brothers from across the country in Luxembourgish, assuring them that he would apply all his strength to be a good leader.

translation.lb: Uschle'ssend huet de Prënz Jean d'lenks hand um letzeburger fuendel an de' rechts zum schwûr erhuewen, d'édformeil gesprach, de' de minister Frieden virgedroen huet.
translation.en: Subsequently, Prince Jean raised his left hand on the Luxembourg flag and his right in oath, accompanying the formal speech presented by Minister Frieden.

translation.lb: D'Hémecht, gesonge vun aile scouten, huet den éd bekrâftegt.
translation.en: "D'Hémecht," sung by all the scouts, affirmed the oath.

translation.lb: Nom tschikklaka zu e'ere vum Prënz Jean, ass den défilé ugâng.
translation.en: After a cheer in honour of Prince Jean, the parade began.

translation.lb: A länge reie sin dausende vu scouten virun der tribün défile'ert, fuendelen an d'trommen un der spëtzt, an hun hir foularcn iwer dem kapp krése gedon zum gro'ss.
translation.en: In long rows, thousands of scouts paraded past the tribune, with flags and drums at the front, and raised their scarves above their heads in salute.

translation.lb: Domatt wor de' sehe' feier zu enn.
translation.en: With that, the beautiful ceremony came to an end.

translation.lb: Vum stadion aus sin ons scouten durch d'strôsse vun der stâdt défile'ert.
translation.en: From the stadium, our scouts marched through the streets of the city.

translation.lb: Um balcon vum palais hun d'Grande-Ducbesse, de Prënz Jean, d'Prënzesinnen Elisabeth, Marie-Gabrielle a Marie-Adelaide den défilé ofgeholl, wärend d'leidd sech virum palais gestaut hur, an der Grande- Duchesse eng sche'n ovalio'n bruecht hun.
translation.en: On the balcony of the palace, the Grand Duchess, Prince Jean, Princesses Elisabeth, Marie-Gabrielle, and Marie-Adelaide watched the parade, while people gathered in front of the palace, bringing the Grand Duchess a beautiful ovation.

translation.lb: D'Luxembourg Boyscout Association bestét eio ënner der lédong vum Prënz Jean an ass en unerkannt erze'ongsorgan vun onser jugend.
translation.en: The Luxembourg Boy Scout Association is now under the leadership of Prince Jean and is a recognized educational organization for our youth.

translation.lb: D'énegkét, de' mir so' läng bei onse scouten erbeigewünscht haten, ass elo endlech realise'ert.
translation.en: The unity we had long desired among our scouts has now finally been achieved.

translation.lb: Wahlen a Portugal.
translation.en: Elections in Portugal.

translation.lb: A Portugal hu geschter d'wahlen fir en neit paniament ugefângen.
translation.en: In Portugal, yesterday the elections for a new parliament began.

translation.lb: Sämtlech candidaten ennerstetzen d'regirong bis op e puer.
translation.en: All candidates support the government except for a few.

translation.lb: D'oppositio'nsparteien we' d'democratesch énhétspartei huet hir memberen opgefuerdert, net vun hirem stëmmrecht gebrauch ze mächen.
translation.en: The opposition parties, like the democratic unity party, have urged their members not to make use of their right to vote.

translation.lb: D'wahlresuitater wèrten am lâf vun haut nach bekannt gemâch gin.
translation.en: The election results will be announced later today.

translation.en: The total number now amounts to 3203.

translation.lb: 31 022 arbechter sin dra beschäftegt.

translation.en: 15 million letters were distributed in September.
