translation.en: As preparation and selection for the big cross in Brussels, organized by "Soir", a 3rd training cross will be held on Sunday morning at 9:30.

translation.en: The meeting point for the athletes and the changing rooms are at the "Stade Gmile-Meyriseh".

translation.lb: Op grond vun déne spannende kämpf an den 2 e'schte Crossen, dèrf et e sonndeg äusserst interessant hier goen.
translation.en: Based on the exciting fights in the first two Crosses, it should be extremely interesting on Sunday.

translation.lb: Den O’ Dwyer burgerméschter vu New York.
translation.en: O'Dwyer, mayor of New York.

translation.lb: New York, 7. nov. — Als nofolger vum fre'ere burgerméschter vu New York La Guardia ass de candidat vun der democratesclier an der amerikanescher arbechterpartei William O'Dwyer, dé 55 jor al ass, gewielt gin.
translation.en: New York, November 7 — As the successor of the former mayor of New York La Guardia, the candidate of the Democratic and the American labor party, William O'Dwyer, who is 55 years old, has been elected.

translation.lb: De ietzege burgerméschter ass Irlänner vu gebuert, mé en huet scho seit 30 joer d'amerikanesch nationalite't.
translation.en: The current mayor is Irish by birth, but he has held American nationality for 30 years.

translation.lb: Den O'Dwyer huet eng ganz brillant carrière liannert secli.
translation.en: O'Dwyer has had a very brilliant career behind him.

translation.lb: E wor fir d'e'scht arhechter, da polizist, ass dann affekot gin an ass an d'magistratur agetratt.
translation.en: He was first a worker, then a policeman, became a lawyer, and joined the judiciary.

translation.lb: 1942 ass e matt dem grad vun engcm commandant agezu gin, zum schluss vum krich wor hien brigadegenérol.
translation.en: In 1942, he was enlisted with the rank of a commander, and by the end of the war, he was a brigadier general.

translation.lb: Nuvellen aus Belgien (vun unsem correspondent Bre'ssel, den 2. november 45.
translation.en: News from Belgium (from our correspondent Brussels, November 2, 45.

translation.lb: — Haut de mëtteg bu gleichzeiteg de radio R. N. B. an d'press drei documenter zo'geschéckt kritt, de' d'kinneksfro an e neit Stadium brénducrch special-courrier) gen.
translation.en: — This afternoon, both Radio R. N. B. and the press received three documents regarding the royal question in a new stage, delivered by special courier.

translation.lb: We’ jo bekannt, hun d’amerikanesch za Idolen de prolokoll fond, dén den Dr. Schmit, dem Führer sein dolmetschet, iwer d’entrevue Leopold—Hitler opgestaMl hät.
translation.en: As is known, the Americans found the protocol that Dr. Schmit, the Führer's interpreter, had drawn up about the Leopold—Hitler meeting.

translation.lb: Dese Protokoll ass edo publize’ert gin, zesumme matt engem geleitbrc'f vum belsche premier Van Acker an der stellong vum kinnek zu desem Meissner-Schmit-dokument.
translation.en: This protocol was published here, along with a cover letter from Belgian Premier Van Acker and the king's position on this Meissner-Schmit document.

translation.lb: Et ass oas haut net me'gleeb, ausfe’erlech heirop anzegoen.*
translation.en: It is today not possible to elaborate extensively on this.

translation.lb: BemtrkenswH® si nëmmen d’vtrwërf, de’ de kinnek der regirong mecht, dattse him d'dossiere verweigert huet, an datt si refuse’ert huet, adl pièces o’ni ausnahm dem gesamte Parlament an der beischer natio’n zo’gängeg ze raächen.
translation.en: Remarkable are only the accusations the king makes against the government, that they refused him access to the dossiers, and refused to make all documents available to the entire Parliament and the Belgian nation without exception.

translation.lb: (Datt d'communicatio'n vum dossier sol! verweigert gi sin, verwonnert ons net, datselwecht ass jo och schon an onser épuratio'n virkomm. D'red.)
translation.en: (That the communication of the dossier should be refused does not surprise us, the same has already occurred in our purging. The editorial.)

translation.lb: Bre'taeL — D'belsch Chamber huet no enger bedeitsamer riéd vum ausseminis'lcr Spaak, d'charta vun de Verénte Natio'nen matt 126 stemmen ge'nt 1 ratifize'ert.
translation.en: Brussels — The Belgian Chamber ratified the United Nations Charter with 126 votes to 1, after a significant speech by Foreign Minister Spaak.

translation.lb: Bre'ssel. — We' mir ons bei der zo'stänneger stell informe'ert hun, huet d'belsch akafsmissio'n an Amerika éerpudder fir... 1.5 miMiarde frang akaft.
translation.en: Brussels. — As we have been informed by the responsible authority, the Belgian purchasing mission in America has bought ear powder for... 1.5 billion francs.

translation.lb: Wann dMetzeburger regirong heiru bedélegt ass oder am gleiche inôss sech virgcsin huet, da brauche mir wirklech net ze fèrten, d'éerpudder géng ons of.
translation.en: If the Luxembourg government is involved or intends to involve itself in the same manner, then we truly need not fear that the ear powder will be distributed to us.

translation.lb: D’Lëtzeburger evakue’ert a Belgien.
translation.en: The Luxembourgers evacuated to Belgium.

translation.lb: Am moment wo' d'preisen en dél vum hémechtsbuedem erömgeholl hun, hu sech iwer dausend Iëtzeburger no Belgien refugie'ert.
translation.en: At the moment when the Prussians took back part of the homeland, over a thousand Luxembourgers took refuge in Belgium.

translation.lb: Laut de conventio'nen, de' ons regirong zu London ofgeschloss huet, iwerhötlt Belgien d'önnerbrengong an de kascht vun déne betreffende Iëtzeburger.
translation.en: According to the conventions concluded by our government in London, Belgium assumes the accommodation and costs of the respective Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: D'regirong huet och onse chargé d'affaires zu Bre'sseil beoptragt, verhandlongen mat der beischer regirong opzehuelen fir datt hinnen de'selwecht finanziell höllef soll zo*- kommen ewe' déne belschen evakue'erten aus den Ardennen.
translation.en: The government also instructed our chargé d'affaires in Brussels to initiate negotiations with the Belgian government so that they would receive the same financial aid as the Belgian evacuees from the Ardennes.

translation.lb: Dorophin krit edo all Iëtzeburger evakue'erten a Belgien, dén eng finanziell höllef ne'deg huet, eng déglech accolatio'n.
translation.en: Consequently, every Luxembourger evacuated to Belgium who needs financial help receives a daily allowance.

translation.lb: Durch de' belsch regirong kruten de' belsch gouverneuren a burgerméschteren de* ne'deg Uweisongen, wärend onse chargé d'affaires zu Bre'ssel onse konsulater vun Namur a Leck präzis instructio'ne gin huet.
translation.en: Through the Belgian government, the Belgian governors and mayors received the necessary instructions, while our chargé d'affaires in Brussels gave precise instructions to our consulates in Namur and Liège.

translation.lb: {Matgedélt vun dar regirong, office d'information.)
translation.en: {Communicated by the government, office of information.)

translation.lb: Onsem Prenz Jang öem zo'kënfteqe qßo'ssheßzoq vu lëtze- Bußq iweßßßenqt ö'unio'n op öesem wé fiß sei -24.
translation.en: Our Prince Jean's future contribution to the Luxembourg Union is very important on his way to being -24.

translation.lb: qeßUßtsöaq hiß Beseht qlëckwënsch a veßsecheßt him hiß tßei öenqschteß zum wuel vun onseß hémecht AH hißeß famill.
translation.en: We express our best wishes and assure him our sincere wishes for the well-being of our homeland and his family.

translation.lb: <et ass och fiß si nach kßich à. meß fille matt hinnen wat et héscht na net öohem kennen ze sin.
translation.en: It is also for them not enough yet, but we feel with them what it means to not be able to be at home.

translation.lb: «f onst qanz hoffen ass ößop aqestallt si me'qlechst Bai eßem an onseß mött ze qesin, an hißem öohem an éneqkét a fßiöö.
translation.en: Our whole hope is aligned to see them soon among us again, in their home, in peace, and joy.

translation.lb: Aus der REDACTIO’N
translation.en: From the EDITORIAL

translation.lb: D'redaktlo'n vum Organ vun der Unio'n ass um e'schte stark vun der nummer 40 an der aler awenii.
translation.en: The editorial office of the Union's publication is on the first floor of number 40 on the old avenue.

translation.lb: Et ass é schelt do an eng schält, et ass och eng bre'fköscht ënnenan, atvorf baussen an der gro'sser part.
translation.en: There is a sign and another sign, there is also a mailbox at the bottom, accessible from outside on the large part.

translation.lb: Mir biéden all zo'sehrëften doliin ze schécken.
translation.en: We kindly ask everyone to send subscriptions there.

translation.lb: D'expedio'n ass och do, owcr ënucnan am agank vun der dréckerei.
translation.en: The dispatch is also there, but further inside at the entrance of the printing house.

translation.lb: Wo' zug- an atitoverbindongcn sin, dur get d'Unio'n geschécki.
translation.en: Where there are train and car connections, the Union is dispatched.

translation.lb: Wo' soss eng me'glcchkét bestéi se ze schécken, biédc mer ons et niattzedélen.
translation.en: If there are other possibilities to send it, please let us know.

translation.lb: Si kann och ofgrholl gin direct nom druck mcndes, mëtlivochs a freides am nomettcg.
translation.en: It can also be picked up directly after printing on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays in the afternoon.

translation.lb: Hcelamatio'nen sin zc schécken un d'expédition.
translation.en: Complaints should be sent to the dispatch.

translation.lb: D'abonné in enter an d'ofrecbn o n g c n vun de sectio'nen sin ze man op é vun de konlen, de' uni kapp vun der zeidong vcrmirkt sin, oder och pcrsc'nlecli am biiro um c'schie Stack vun der redactlo'u.
translation.en: The subscriptions and office hours of the sections should be noted on one of the pages marked by the newspaper heading, or personally at the office on the first floor of the editorial.

translation.lb: Ousc k a 1 eil u e r gel fir d'abounenten a inemhcrcn e samsehdeg der zcidong bei- 5 geluegt.
translation.en: An official calendar for the subscribers and members is included in the Saturday edition of the newspaper.

translation.lb: De' sectlo'nen a geschsifter de' der iiaeh gär verkafen, sollen liir bestellongen • direct mächen, ir se vergraff sin.
translation.en: The sections and shops that would like to sell them should place their orders directly before they are sold out.

translation.lb: Aus virgeschichtlecher Zeit
translation.en: From prehistoric times

translation.lb: Et get an der geschieht vun onser hémecht kén urtsnum, dé me' fre' genannt ass we' de num „ANTETHANNA";
translation.en: There is no locality name in the history of our homeland that has been mentioned earlier than the name 'ANTETHANNA';

translation.lb: kén huet an der geschieht éler beze'ongen zu den ufäng vun der crëschtlecher religio'n;
translation.en: none has been listed earlier in history relating to the beginnings of the Christian religion;

translation.lb: dén num bezéchent onstreitbar den élsten urt vun onser hémecht;
translation.en: the name undoubtedly signifies the oldest place in our homeland;

translation.lb: et gehe'eren derzo' Uewer- a Nideranven, Hueschtert, Ramnieldeng, Ernster a Sennengen.
translation.en: it includes Oberanven and Niederanven, Hostert, Ramscheid, Ernster, and Senningen.

translation.lb: Des urtschaften woren nach bis an d'lB. jorhonnert den „haff Anven".
translation.en: These localities were until the 18th century known as the 'Anven estate'.

translation.lb: Läng îr d're'mer onst land eruWert an de' gro'ss arme'strôss gebaut haten, de' vu Reims iwer Arel no Tre'er gangen ass,
translation.en: Long before the Romans conquered our land and built the great military road that went from Reims via Arlon to Trier,

translation.lb: -wor d'Syrdall vu mënschen be- wunnt, de' an den hiélen, an de bëscher geliéwt hun, de' onst land iwerdeckt hun.
translation.en: the Syrdall was inhabited by people who lived in the caves and the forests that covered our land.

translation.lb: Aus der virgeschichtleeher zeit a besonnesch aus der spe'derer sténzeit stâmen de' vill vasen an dat villt handwierksgeschir aus geschlaffenem stén hir, de' um bann vu Sennengen dacks gemäch go'wen.
translation.en: Many vessels and much crafted stone tools from prehistoric times, especially from the later Stone Age, originated from there, which were often made on the ground of Senningen.

translation.lb: Den här A. Dervaux schreiwt an enger toponymescher étiid, de' en 1935 publize'ert huet, datt nofurschongen von déne leschte 25 jor op eng geheimnisvoll vergângenhft schle'ssen.
translation.en: Mr. A. Dervaux writes in a toponymic study he published in 1935, that investigations from the last 25 years suggest a mysterious past.

translation.lb: Ante oder Ande ass e keltescfit wart a wëllt so' viH so en we" weit, gro'ss;
translation.en: Ante or Ande is a Celtic word and is said to mean something wide and big;

translation.lb: et fënnt sech a villen urtsnimm: Andernach, Andelot;
translation.en: it appears in many place names: Andernach, Andelot;

translation.lb: Langres huet an aler zeit Andematurnum gehéscht; aus Andergavis go'w Angers.
translation.en: Langres was formerly called Andematurnum; Angers was once Andergavis.

translation.lb: Thann ass och e keltescht wurt an et héscht bësch.
translation.en: Thann is also a Celtic word meaning forest.

translation.lb: An der Bretagne bezéchnen se mat tann eng eech; dat franse'scht wurt le tan, tanner an dat deitscht Tanne kommen dovun hir;
translation.en: In Brittany, tann refers to an oak; the French word le tan, tanner and the German Tanne come from it;

translation.lb: Antetluinna vir démno en urt an engem gro'sse bësch.
translation.en: Antetluinna therefore denotes a place in a large forest.

translation.lb: Och de num Sennengen ass, nom här Dervaux, zeien fir en he'gen alter vun der urtschaft.
translation.en: According to Mr. Dervaux, the name Senningen also testifies to the ancient age of the locality.

translation.lb: A muenchen urtsnim fënnt sech dat wurt Sen, we' a Senan, Senau, Senheim.
translation.en: In many place names, you find the word Sen, as in Senan, Senau, Senheim.

translation.lb: An Irland, dat eso' reich un erënnerongen aus der keltenzeit ass, huet dat wurt Sen d'bedeitong vun al, ehrwürdeg, grad we' dat latengescht senex an dat franse'scht sénile.
translation.en: In Ireland, which is rich in memories of the Celtic era, the word Sen means old, venerable, just like the Latin senex and the French sénile.

translation.lb: D'endong ing, am pluriel ingen, bezéchent e germanesche gott.
translation.en: The ending ing, plural ingen, refers to a Germanic god.

translation.lb: Plinius an Tacitus ernimmen de volksstam vun den Ingaevonen, dé sech vu Jütland aus iwer Skandinavien a Germanien ausgebrét huet an am 3. jorhonnert no onser zeitrechnong, zur zeit we' d'angelsachsen eruwerongszig gemâch hun, Gro'ssbritannien iwerschwemmt hun.
translation.en: Pliny and Tacitus mention the tribe of the Ingaevones, who spread from Jutland across Scandinavia and Germania and in the 3rd century AD, during the time the Anglo-Saxons were making their conquest move, flooded Great Britain.

translation.lb: De num England ass bliwen, der aussprôch no Ingland.
translation.en: The name England remained, pronounced as Ingland.

translation.lb: Démno hätt Sennengen dann an zvvéfacher hisîcht e myteschen urspronk, no keltescher a germanescher deitong; et bezéchent en alen ehrwiirdegen urt.
translation.en: Thus, Senningen would have a dual mythical origin, according to Celtic and Germanic interpretation; it denotes an old venerable place.

translation.lb: An aie scnrëften get de grengewald dacks Sennegerl>ësch genannt; 't ka sin datt dé bësch, dén sech weithin erstreckt ay so' hémlech doleit, a vun déni de beriimte Sulpicius Severus schreiwt, «l'r- durf sei num gin huet.
translation.en: In some writings, the Grunewald is often called Senneger Forest; it could be that the forest, which extends far with its hidden corners and which the famous Sulpicius Severus writes about, gave it its name.

translation.lb: Dé bësch, dén sech we' e liéwege rido vrun déne genannten urtschaften hinzitt an de' gro'ssarteg lag, de' vu gro'ssen, aie bém ëmrauscht get, hu vleicht derzo' beigedron, bei engem naturvollek we' d'kelten eng religie's stëmmong z'erwechen an ze beliéwen.
translation.en: The forest, which stretches like a living curtain in front of these mentioned localities and whose impressive location, surrounded by large, ancient trees, perhaps contributed to awakening and reinforcing a religious mood among a nature-loving people like the Celts.

translation.lb: E meltwoch, den 17. 1. 1945, ass em 10 auer mures an der kathedral zu Lëtzeburg eng feicrlech Mëss fir de 3 Lëtzeburger de hirl liéwen tir d’héraecht gin hun,
translation.en: On Wednesday, January 17, 1945, at 10 o'clock in the morning, a solemn mass was held in the cathedral in Luxembourg for the 3 Luxembourgers who sacrificed their lives for the fatherland,

translation.lb: an fir de 9 jongen aus der stad de’ gezwongcn an der preisescher uniform gefall sin.
translation.en: and for the 9 young men from the city who were forced and fell in the Prussian uniform.

translation.lb: Bertemes MAIL Weller Josy, Schauen Jangeli. Kirschten Marcel.
translation.en: Bertemes MAIL Weller Josy, Schauen Jangeli. Kirschten Marcel.

translation.lb: Paquet Mas, Emme) Françi.
translation.en: Paquet Mas, Emme) Françi.

translation.lb: Pfeiffenschncldcr Charel.
translation.en: Pfeiffenschneider Charel.

translation.lb: Thomé Raymond.
translation.en: Thomé Raymond.

translation.en: Siegler Hari, Elsen Henri.

translation.en: Alf Leo. Klees Jerap.

translation.lb: D’Union Lëtzeburg Stad.
translation.en: The Union of Luxembourg City.

translation.lb: E Virschlag un den här prison gsdirekter 1940 hât ech de pech, vun de preisen gedeckt ze gin well ech eng propliezeîong weider gin hât, schlëm, schlëin!
translation.en: A suggestion to the prison director in 1940: I had the misfortune of being covered by the prices because I had furthered a proposal, terrible, terrible!

translation.lb: • Belo'nong: 3 ment prisong.
translation.en: • Reward: 3 months prison.

translation.lb: No e pur dég go'f ech mat engem sche'nen auto mat engem valet op Tre'er gefo'ert, wo' ech an der bekanntçr „Kulturpflegestätte" aquarte'ert go'f.
translation.en: After a few days, I was driven in a nice car with a valet to Trier, where I was accommodated in the well-known "Cultural Care Facility."

translation.lb: Den hôtel war net grad e'scht class, mé et ass ait gâng, a well eeh mech' gudd gescheckt hun (der deiwel scheckt sech net an eso' enger gesellschaft) krut ech 14 dëg geschenkt:
translation.en: The hotel wasn't exactly first class, but it was all right, and because I adapted well (the devil doesn't belong in such a society), I got 14 days as a gift:

translation.lb: Wann én eso' eleng sëlzt, da get engein d'zeit lâng, an- du wdr ech alt fro', we' ech eng kleng arbecht krit hun.
translation.en: When one sits alone like that, time moves slowly, and that's when I was eager to get a small job.

translation.lb: Ech hu mech net vermitt- domat (et kann é wqel denken).
translation.en: I wasn't too keen on that (one could easily imagine).

translation.lb: We' ech eraus ko'm an um Schalter meng siwe Sachen erëm krit hun, du krut ech meng pai: 1.70 Rm.
translation.en: When I got out and retrieved my seven belongings at the counter, I received my pay: 1.70 RM.

translation.lb: Meng arbecht war net deck bezuelt.
translation.en: My work was not well paid.

translation.lb: Et assemol net dur gâng fir de billet vun Tre'er op Xetzeburg- ze bezuelen.
translation.en: It wasn't even enough to pay for the ticket from Trier to Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Hei no e pur wochen ko'm eng rechnong vum gericht, wo' se mir fir de koscht, ishlofea tu«, oaeb 109. Rwreclazne'eren.
translation.en: Here, after a few weeks, I received a bill from the court, stating that for the costs, including items I had taken, I owed 109.

translation.lb: Ech sollt haschte vu roserei, mé wat sollt 'ech man, ech hu geblecht.
translation.en: I was supposed to rage with anger, but what could I do, I paid up.

translation.lb: ■ Bezuelen ech net, da muss ech nés an d'këscht, kre'en eng frësch rechnpng tir de kascht asw. asw-,
translation.en: ■ If I don't pay, then I have to go back to the box, get a fresh bill for the costs, etc., etc.,

translation.lb: Elo liésen ech an der Unio'n, datt onsen hôtel am.gronn eso' stârk besat ass/ datt én iwert dém aner seng bén fällt.
translation.en: Now I read in the Union that our hotel in the ground is so overcrowded that one falls over the other's legs.

translation.lb: De' kaschtgänger liéwe besser we' muencheré vun onsen evacue'erten.
translation.en: The boarders live better than some of our evacuees.

translation.lb: An elo wëll ecb emol gär wëssen, ob de petteren och hire pensio'nspreis bezùelen.
translation.en: And now I would like to know if the clergy also pay their pension price.

translation.lb: Se hu jo de preisen ve'er jor làng d'wâsser op d'mille gedriwen an hir ge Schäften matt e gemâch, eso' datt se ganz gudd 30 —50 fr. den dâg, je no der class, bezuele kënnen.
translation.en: They have been grinding the water for the mills of the prices for four years and have made their business calmly, so that they can very well pay 30 —50 francs a day, depending on the class.

translation.lb: Wa vleicht d'employéen aus déni biiro keng zeit hun, fie d'rechnongen ze schreiwen, da ka secher den én oder anere gielemännchen de' arbecht mnn.
translation.en: If perhaps the employees from the office have no time to write the bills, then surely one or another nimble fellow can do the work.

translation.lb: Wann ech net îren, da sëtzt eso'gur en hotellier do ënnen.
translation.en: If I'm not mistaken, then there's even a hotelier sitting down there.

translation.lb: Dat war de richtege sgajçiaUst dofir» j
translation.en: That was the right specialist for it.

translation.lb: Dat elei AN Dat elo Honnert Ictzeburger frang haten den 10. mé 1940 eng valeur vun 125 belsche frang, vun 18,41 schweizer frang, vun 216,75 franse'sche frang, vu 7,77 hollännesche gülden, vun 4,12 dollaren oder vun engem pond, 4 schilling a 7 pence.
translation.en: Back then, on May 10, 1940, one hundred Luxembourgish francs had a value of 125 Belgian francs, 18.41 Swiss francs, 216.75 French francs, 7.77 Dutch guilders, 4.12 dollars, or a pound, 4 shillings and 7 pence.

translation.lb: Honnert letzeburger frang hun haut é wert vun 100 belsche frang, vun 9,80 schweizer frang, vun 113,66 franse'sche frang, vun 6,05 hollännesche gülden, vun 2,28 dollar oder vun 11 schilling an drei pence.
translation.en: One hundred Luxembourgish francs today have a value of 100 Belgian francs, 9.80 Swiss francs, 113.66 French francs, 6.05 Dutch guilders, 2.28 dollars, or 11 shillings and three pence.

translation.lb: Honnert letzeburger frang sin also' haut 25 belsch frang, 8,61 schweizer frang, 103,09 frans'esch frang, 1,72 liollännesch gülden, 1,86 dollar oder 13 schilling a 4 pence manner wert.
translation.en: One hundred Luxembourgish francs are thus worth 25 Belgian francs, 8.61 Swiss francs, 103.09 French francs, 1.72 Dutch guilders, 1.86 dollars, or 13 shillings and 4 pence less today.

translation.lb: Drësseg wopen hänken vir am cho'er vun eiser neier cathédral.
translation.en: Thirty coats of arms hang in the choir of our new cathedral.

translation.lb: Iwer der Gro'ssherzogin hirer loge hänken d'wopen vun Arel, Bastnech, Bitburg, Chimay, Durbuy, Houffalize, Marche, N.eufchâteau a. e. w.
translation.en: Above the Grand Duchess's box hang the coats of arms of Arlon, Bastogne, Bitburg, Chimay, Durbuy, Houffalize, Marche, Neufchâteau, etc.

translation.lb: Op der ancrer seit d'wopen vu Virton, Laroche, Thionville, Montmédy, Marville, Orval, St. Hubert, St. Vith, Neierburg a. e. w.
translation.en: On the other side, the coats of arms of Virton, Laroche, Thionville, Montmédy, Marville, Orval, St. Hubert, St. Vith, Neufchâteau, etc.

translation.lb: Si erziélen vun âler letzeburgescher herrlechkét, vu fre'erer letzeburgescher muecht an âlem letzeburgesche glanz.
translation.en: They tell of ancient Luxembourgish splendor, of former Luxembourgish power and old Luxembourgish glory.

translation.lb: Si erënneren ons all ke'er dorunner, we' eis d'land fre'er eso' gro'ss an eso' mâchteg war an, op mir wëllen oder net, mir denken oft matt erbatterong drun, we' engt stéck no dem aneren ons entrass ass gin.
translation.en: They remind us every time how our country was once so big and so powerful, and, whether we want to or not, we often think with bitterness about how one piece after another was taken from us.

translation.lb: D'politesch entwéckelong an dem leschten jorhonnert huet et onme'glech gemäch, de' verluer gânge länner am westen an am süden erëmzefroen.
translation.en: The political developments in the last century have made it impossible to reclaim the lost territories in the west and the south.

translation.lb: Mé wat hënnert ons, compensatio'nen am osten ze froen.
translation.en: But what prevents us from asking for compensations in the east.

translation.lb: Mé e sche'nt geschenk kënnte mir eiser Gro'ssherzogin fir de geburdsdag 1946 net mächen.
translation.en: But we couldn't make a more beautiful gift for our Grand Duchess on her birthday in 1946.

translation.lb: Ennert dém point de vue sin d'wopen an onser call 'dral net eng schmèrzl ech erënnerong, mé é Programm an eng zo'konft.
translation.en: From this point of view, the coats of arms in our cathedral hall are not a painful memory, but a program and a future.

translation.lb: Ons national a sportlech erzéong Radio- Causerie vun der Madam Gust. Jacquemart Mëttwoch, 24. 1. 45
translation.en: Our national and athletic education radio conversation by Madam Gust. Jacquemart Wednesday, 24. 1. 45

translation.lb: Ons médercher sollen och, wann se bestued sin, net me' ängschtlech de schmiérze vun der maternrte't aus dem wé sichen ze goen nié courage'ert bire fliehten als mammen entge'nt kuken.
translation.en: Our girls should also, even when they are married, not fearfully avoid the pains of motherhood, but boldly face them as mothers.

translation.lb: En àlt sprechwuert sét: d'fra mecht da mann ma doriwer eraus kann é ro'eg soen, datt d'fra d'fundament lét fir e sche'ne stôt an e glécklecht familjeliéwen.
translation.en: An old saying goes: the woman makes the man, but it is calmly said that the woman lays the foundation for a beautiful home and a happy family life.

translation.lb: Fir datt nun all efforen de physiologesche contidio'nen vum kirper streng iwerwâcht kënne gin, müssen de'je'neg, de' de méderchessport an d'culture physique léden a fe'eren siéw et d'fédération féminine oder aner änlech institutio'nen, no bestëmmten directive virgoen.
translation.en: To ensure that all efforts are strictly supervised under the physiological conditions of the body, those who lead and promote girls' sport and physical culture, whether the women's federation or other similar institutions, must proceed according to certain directives.

translation.lb: A fro kommen: gymnastique éducative oder rythmique schwammen tennis basket-ball athlétisme Wassersport a wantersport.
translation.en: In question are: educational gymnastics or rhythmic swimming tennis basketball athletics water sports and winter sports.

translation.lb: Weider gesi njir am scoutisme eng ideal erze'ong fir d'médercher.
translation.en: Furthermore, we see scouting as an ideal education for girls.

translation.lb: Seit jehir ass bei de sçouten an de guiden vill culture physique gemâch gin a weider durch eng freiwëlleg disciplin an eng he'ch moralesch a national erze'ong, könnt de scoutisme an e'schter ligne stoe fir d'erze'ong vun der jugend.
translation.en: For years, a lot of physical culture has been done among scouts and guides, and further through voluntary discipline and a high moral and national education, scouting stands in the forefront for the education of the youth.

translation.lb: Mir wëllen elo.
translation.en: We want now.

translation.lb: datt all ons iongen a médercher an der zo'konft eso' eng erze'ong kre'en, de' se kirperlech stârk a géschteg a moralesch zu dichtege mënlche mecht.
translation.en: That all our boys and girls receive such an education in the future, which makes them physically strong and mentally and morally mature people.

translation.lb: A wa vill vun onse médercher hir frei zeit matt sport ausfëllen, kënt eng ganz partie vun der strôss eweg wat och ké schued ass,
translation.en: And if many of our girls fill their free time with sports, a large part will stay away from the street, which is no harm either.

translation.lb: Datt matt desem program— en elementare begrëff,vun hygiene matt abegraff get, ass selbstverständlech, well wa vill vun onse médercher zeit fannen fir sech ze pudderen an ze firwen, hun s'och eso' vill zeit fir sech gesond a proper ze halen durch eng geégent culture physique.
translation.en: That with this program—an elementary concept of hygiene is also included, is self-evident, because if many of our girls find time to powder and paint themselves, they also have enough time to keep themselves healthy and clean through a suitable physical culture.

translation.lb: Dir hut an de vergangen. conferenzen he'eren, datt an alle länner de sport an d'culture physique ganz stârk ënnerstëtzt gin, datt de Staat iwerall d'erze'- ong vun dem jonktem stramm an d'hand hëlt.
translation.en: You have heard in past conferences that in all countries sport and physical culture are strongly supported, that the state takes the education of the youth firmly in hand everywhere.

translation.lb: Abé, dat ass net eleng fir d'jongen, mé och fir d'médercher an alle Staatende fall.
translation.en: Well, that is not only for the boys, but also for the girls in every state.

translation.lb: Dofir fort matt alle préjugéen, sle' sech dem fraesport entge'nt stelle wëllen!
translation.en: Therefore, away with all prejudices that want to oppose women's sports!

translation.lb: Mir wëllen onsem land gudd a. kräfteg kanner erze'en  dodurch eleng kann et bestoen a virugoen.
translation.en: We want to raise good and strong children in our country, through which alone it can exist and progress.

translation.lb: Dat elei AN Dat elo Wann et eso' weider gét, gét d'E'slek sengem ennergank entge'nt.
translation.en: This and now, if it continues like this, E'slek is approaching its downfall.

translation.lb: — Norichtena rapporen de' vun do uewe kommen, sin einfach furchtbar.
translation.en: — The reports from up there are simply terrible.

translation.lb: Mir gesin den ament eso'gur of vun denen onglecklechen de' d'preisen erschoss oder mattgeschléft hun, a vun dèr we'neg bëneidenswèrter situatio'n vun onsen evacue'erten an der Belsch.
translation.en: We now even see the unfortunate ones whom the prices shot or maltreated, and the less enviable situation of our evacuees in Belgium.

translation.lb: Mir schwätzen nëmmen vun dém, wat elo nach, am E'slek ass.
translation.en: We are only talking about what is still in E'slek right now.

translation.lb: Vill heiser si jo ggnz. oder hallef futti; ma eng onmass heiser sin nëmmen beschiédegt.
translation.en: Many houses are completely or half destroyed; but an enormous number of houses are only damaged.

translation.lb: Bal bei allen ass den dag kapott an elo rént et scho wochen an et get ké geschéck fir arbechter an handwirkercolonnen dur ze schécken fir ze rette wat nach ze retten ass.
translation.en: Almost everywhere the roof is broken and it has been raining for weeks now, and there is no way to send workers and craftsmen columns to save what can still be saved.

translation.lb: D'stëmmong ënnert den e'sleker leidd ass natirlech um siedeponkt.
translation.en: The mood among the E'slek people is naturally at boiling point.

translation.lb: Wann ënnert der occupatio'n e loftugrëff wor, woren eng stonn durno all onglecksplazen matt ganze colonne besät.
translation.en: During the occupation, if there was an air raid, within an hour every disaster site was crowded with columns.

translation.lb: 1940 si ganz léendeckercolonnen an d'Saar gescheckt gin fir de Preisen hir dîrfer ze flécken.
translation.en: In 1940, entire roofing columns were sent to the Saar to repair the villages for the prices.

translation.lb: An hei müssen d'leidd nokucken,w e' é stéck nom aneren zerfällt, we' dag fir dag de schued em milîro'ne me' gro'ss get.
translation.en: And here people have to watch as one piece after another collapses, and every day the damage grows by millions.

translation.lb: Et mag jo schwe'er fir de' verantwortlech plaze sin a bal önme'glech, iwerall direct ze hëllefen, ma ass net dach e bësse vill schlencfrian schold drun, wann net me' gemâch ka gin?
translation.en: It may be difficult for the responsible places and almost impossible to help everywhere directly, but isn't some sluggishness to blame if more can't be done?

translation.lb: Verschidde burgerméschteren am E'slek spülen eng éklech roll.
translation.en: Certain mayors in E'slek play a disgusting role.

translation.lb: Bei hirer verzweiwlongsoffensiv huu d'Preisen an all durf, wo' se hikom sin fir d'e'scht no réfractairen, milizleidd, unionisten an hëllefsgendarme gesicht.
translation.en: In their desperate offensive, the prices searched first for resisters, militia members, unionists, and auxiliary gendarmes in every village they came to.

translation.lb: Verschiddener sin net me' ewechkom, sin erschoss oder versohléft gin..
translation.en: Some did not get away, got shot or mistreated.

translation.lb: Aneren ass et am leschten ament ënnert liéwesgefor gegléckt, sech eweeh ze man.
translation.en: Others managed to escape at the last moment, despite the danger to their lives.

translation.lb: An elo kommen de' hère burgerméschteren, de' dp bliwe sin, well se vun de Preisen neischt ze färten häten, an de' eso'gur op hirer dichteger plaz bleiwe konnten a kloen de' jongen als feig un.
translation.en: And now come the esteemed mayors who stayed because they had nothing to fear from the prices, and who could even remain in their rightful places and accuse the young ones of cowardice.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, datt et ville burgerméschteren eng speziell fréd gewiéscht wir, wa me'glechst vill vun déne jongen vun de Preisen erwëscht an opgehäng gi wären, well da wir ké me' do gewiéscht, dén oppositio'n gemâch, an déne quislingen d'hand-wirk geluegt hätt.
translation.en: We know that many mayors would have taken special pleasure if as many of those young ones as possible had been caught and hanged by the prices, because then there would be nobody left to oppose, and those quislings would have had their handiwork praised.

translation.lb: Maurice THOREZ (komm.), ministre d ’ Etat.
translation.en: Maurice THOREZ (comm.), Minister of State.

translation.lb: Hién ass haut 45 joer al.
translation.en: He is 45 years old today.

translation.lb: Virun 30 joer so'iz hié nach an engpm deischfere cafc an huet iwer de „klassekampf' matt senge komeroden discute'ert.
translation.en: Thirty years ago he was still sitting in a dim café discussing the 'class struggle' with his comrades.

translation.lb: Haut ass hié Parteiführer a minister.
translation.en: Today he is a party leader and minister.

translation.lb: Et get him virgeworf. datt hié 1939 d',,armé verlôs«" huet.
translation.en: It is alleged against him that he 'left the army' in 1939.

translation.lb: Jacques SOUSTELLE (UDSR), colonieminister.
translation.en: Jacques SOUSTELLE (UDSR), minister of colonies.

translation.lb: Schon ir hién den de Gaulie pcrse'nlerh kannt huet, huet hién an Amerika Propaganda' fir hié gemét.
translation.en: Even before he had personally met de Gaulle, he did propaganda for him in America.

translation.lb: Hién ass de jéngste vun de minssteren.
translation.en: He is the youngest of the ministers.

translation.lb: war fre'er directer an engem muséum, huet eng ausgedehnt instructio'n, wat hié seit der tiberalio'n op allerlé poste beweise könnt.
translation.en: He was previously the director of a museum and has an extensive education, which he can prove in many positions since the liberation.

translation.lb: Aus dem informatio'nsmindsterium plënnert hién elo an d'colonieabteilong.
translation.en: From the Ministry of Information, he is now moving to the colonial department.

translation.lb: Raoul DAUTRY (techniker), recon structio ’ n.
translation.en: Raoul DAUTRY (engineer), reconstruction.

translation.lb: Hién ass ké Parlamentarier a kennt och keng feinden.
translation.en: He is not a parliamentarian and also knows no enemies.

translation.lb: Scho virum krich huet bien d'eisebunnsnctz ausgebaut.
translation.en: Even before the war, he expanded the railway network.

translation.lb: Haut stét bié matt ze soe kenge mëtteilen virun engem zerste'erte land.
translation.en: Today, he stands almost speechless before a devastated country.

translation.lb: „Lösst tnech emol 6 me'nt hei schaffen, da wèrd dir eppes gcsin", sét hién.
translation.en: "Let me work here for 6 months, then you will see something," he says.

translation.lb: Dese wonach get him erfëllt.
translation.en: This desire is fulfilled for him.

translation.lb: Marcel PAUL (komm.), Industrie.
translation.en: Marcel PAUL (comm.), Industry.

translation.lb: A senger we' io'g hié net a gold an och net a seid.
translation.en: In his life here, not gold and not silk.

translation.lb: Mé hién huet och eng solid structur.
translation.en: But he also has a solid structure.

translation.lb: Buchenwald huet hié net kleng kritt.
translation.en: Buchenwald did not break him.

translation.lb: Zu Pareis war hié schaffen, an duerno huet hién de poslen als generalsccretâr vun der „Fédération de l'Eclairage et de la Force Motrice" ugeholl.
translation.en: He was working in Paris, and afterwards he took the position as general secretary of the "Fédération de l'Eclairage et de la Force Motrice".

translation.lb: Hién ass also' net grad e noviz an der industrie.
translation.en: He is therefore not exactly a novice in the industry.

translation.lb: François BILLOUX (komm.), Nationaleconomie.
translation.en: François BILLOUX (comm.), National Economy.

translation.lb: Hié stammt aus Marseiii«.
translation.en: He comes from Marseille.

translation.lb: Bis elo so'tz hién an der Santé Publique.
translation.en: Until now he was in Public Health.

translation.lb: Vun der ganzer minist eréquipe war hién de favorit vun de journalisten, well hién hinnen am méschten interviewen a communiquée bewëllegt huet.
translation.en: Of the entire ministerial team, he was the journalists' favorite because he granted them the most interviews and statements.

translation.lb: Bei der wahlcampagne huet hié sech heldenhaft matt de Sozialisten erëmgeballegt.
translation.en: During the election campaign, he bravely engaged with the Socialists.

translation.lb: Politesch prozesser Peter Denzer, polizeibrigadier, Ettelbréck, ass zu 15 joer zwangsarbecht 50.000 frang bo'ss an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Peter Denzer, police brigadier from Ettelbrück, was sentenced to 15 years forced labor, a 50,000 franc fine, and the loss of Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: Hién ass den 1. 8. matt der nr. 10 der VdB beigetrueden, wor zelleleiter, districtsorganisatio'nsleiter an districtsausbildongsleiter, huet als districtsaubildongsleiter de stosstrupp organise'ert an ausgcbildt, d'awunner vun Ettelbréck- opgefuerdert an d'VdB ze goen an tyrannise'ert, emmer matt „Heit Hitler" gegre'sst, bei der zerste'erong vun der synagog zu Ettelbréck dru bedélegt an iwerwâcht, u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl, am ufank vun der besetzong matt der geheimer Staatspolizei zesummegeschafft a sech 6 denunziatio'nen zu schold komme gelôss.
translation.en: He joined the VdB on 1st August with number 10, was a cell leader, district organization leader and district training leader, organized and trained the assault squad as district training leader, urged and tyrannized the residents of Ettelbrück to join the VdB, always greeted with 'Heil Hitler', participated and monitored the destruction of the synagogue in Ettelbrück, took part in political demonstrations, collaborated with the secret police at the start of the occupation, and was responsible for six denunciations.

translation.lb: Als mëlderongszo'stand fir d'festléong vun der strof get unerkannt, datt hién am joer 1941 seng haltong geännert a net me' politesch an erscheinong getratt ass.
translation.en: As a mitigating circumstance for the determination of the sentence, it was acknowledged that in 1941 he changed his stance and no longer appeared politically.

translation.lb: 1943 ass hién eso'guer aus der VdB ausgeschloss gin an hât sech och soss nach verdengschter em land erwuerwen.
translation.en: In 1943, he was even excluded from the VdB and had otherwise earned merits for the country.

translation.lb: Trotzdém muss hién elo fir de' begânge verbriéchen durch zwangsarbecht be'ssen.
translation.en: Nevertheless, he must now atone for his committed crimes through forced labor.

translation.lb: Peter Wolter, eisebunner, Reimberg dén sech a friddenszeiten zur Waffen-SS gemellt hât, och gemustert, mé fir ondauglech wor gin, ass zu 18 me'nt prisong an zu enger geldstrof vun l.OOO frang verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Peter Wolter, railway worker from Reimberg, who had volunteered for the Waffen-SS in peacetime and was also drafted, but deemed unfit, was sentenced to 18 months in prison and a fine of 1,000 francs.

translation.lb: Jos. Biever, beamten, Ettelbréck, hât a krichszeiten d'amt vun engem zellenwart vun der NSV, dat vun engem kassenwalter vun der WHW an dat vun engem propagandaleiter vun der Vdß ugeholl, huet u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl an 1943 en antrag fir an d'NSDAP gestallt an dran opgeholl go'w, krut 6 me'nt prisong a 5.000 frang zo'dicte'ert.
translation.en: Jos. Biever, official from Ettelbrück, held the office of cell warden of the NSV during wartime, as well as cashier of the WHW and propaganda leader of the VdB, participated in political demonstrations, applied for membership in the NSDAP in 1943 and was admitted, was sentenced to 6 months in prison and fined 5,000 francs.

translation.lb: Et lei melderongsemstänn vir.
translation.en: There are extenuating circumstances.

translation.lb: Fr. Kramer, beamter, Re'mech wor a krichszeiten Zellenleiter a presseamtsleiter vun der Vdß, huet en antrag fir an d'NSDAP gestallt an seeh drei denunziatio'nen zu schëlle kom me gelôss.
translation.en: Fr. Kramer, official from Remich, was a cell leader and press office leader of the VdB during the war, applied for membership in the NSDAP and engaged in six denunciations.

translation.lb: E krut 9 jqer züchthaus, 10.000 frang bo'ss an d'letzeburgesch nationalite't entzun.
translation.en: He was sentenced to 9 years in prison, a 10,000 franc fine and lost his Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: Felix Schneider, pensionnc'erte schmelzarbechter, Didejeng huet a friddenszeiten am allgemengen eng deitschfrtndlech haltong gewisen an u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl.
translation.en: Felix Schneider, retired steelworker from Dudelange, generally showed a pro-German attitude in peacetime and participated in political demonstrations.

translation.lb: E ko'm matt enger prisongsstroî vu 6 me'nt an enger bo'ss vu 5.000 frang dervun.
translation.en: He got away with a prison sentence of 6 months and a fine of 5,000 francs.

translation.lb: AUS DER Redactio’n E JOER SCHON.
translation.en: FROM THE Editorial A YEAR AGO.

translation.lb: Editio'n Fr. Bourg- Bourger.
translation.en: Edition by Fr. Bourg-Bourger.

translation.lb: Erem e photoreportage vun der liberatio'n?
translation.en: Again a photo report of the liberation?

translation.lb: Mir erënneren ons nach un dein Tony Krier seng brochure, an e vergleich drängt sech op — e vergleich, an d'fro, wat dann nach ncies iwer dé sujet ze soe ble'w.
translation.en: We still remember Tony Krier's brochure, and a comparison imposes itself — a comparison, and the question remains what else on this subject was to say.

translation.lb: 'T wier da ge làcht, wann de wichtegsten dag vun eiser nationalgeschicht matt engem énzege grapp voll photoen ofgedoc wier, — lôss mer fro' sin iwer des« neie stén fir de gro'sse bau vum héroeschsten akt an der letzeburger geschieht.
translation.en: It would indeed be laughed at if the most important day of our national history were documented with only a handful of photos, — let us ask about these new stones for the great monument of the most heroic act in Luxembourgish history.

translation.lb: Dese neie reportage, den de Verlag Bourg-Bourger erausbréngt, e joer post festum, huet de gro'ssen avantage vun der zeitlecher dlstanz:
translation.en: This new report, published by the Bourg-Bourger publishers a year after the event, has the great advantage of time distance:

translation.lb: an der auswiél vun de biller an am knappen text, eso'guer schon am engleschen ënnertitel „GI's liberate the baby ally" (illustre'ert op engem glécklech monte'erten titelbild) weist sech en anere se'lesche point de vue ge'ntiwer de geschichtlechen tatsâchen.
translation.en: in the selection of pictures and in the concise text, even in the English subtitle "GI's liberate the baby ally" (illustrated on a cleverly arranged cover image) reveals a different humorous point of view towards the historical facts.

translation.lb: Dem Tony Krier sei reportage iwer den 10. September 41 ko'm Chrëschtdag 44 eraus, we' d'hierzer nach me' se'er geklappt hun ënnert dem gewicht vun den aktuelle geschichtieche fait'en: an durfir wor sei buch voller pathos an iérscht.
translation.en: Tony Krier's report on September 10, 1941, came out at Christmas 1944, when hearts were still pounding under the weight of current historical facts: and therefore his book was full of pathos and seriousness.

translation.lb: Haut si scho bal keng Amerikaner me' hei — dat ailes leit hannert ons a mir bréngen es haut scho fèrdeg, au3 de sëllegen erënnerongen de' lëschteg seiten erauszekromen — an eso'guer voiler ironie a sarkasmus hannert de Preise matt der caméra direct tëschent den e'schten Amerikaner um Fëschmârt an am Clausener bierg hirzejoen...
translation.en: Today, there are almost no Americans left here — all that lies behind us, and we manage today to unearth the amusing sides from the many memories — and even full of irony and sarcasm, as the camera chased the Prices straight between the first Americans at the Fish Market and up the Clausen hills...

translation.lb: trotz de sche'ssereien.
translation.en: despite the shootings.

translation.lb: Et ass engem, vre' wa nure fro' biller an dest buch eragerëtscht wieren, op ddnen „...d'vertriéder vun der hère rass nuets hir valise pâken an hire bidd iéch e monieren text „hei, muttien do iwer ënner dem Addi seng gestutzt fliléken ze kommen...
translation.en: It seems, if only some pictures were inserted into this book, on those "...the representatives of the master race pack their suitcases at night and conclude with a witty text "hey, huddling under Addi's clipped wings to come..."

translation.lb: ijeat iéch idscht géng stemmen, da't be't iéch e monteren text „hei, wat wor dat iéch en zodi..." op der der nexter seit em zo' engem moniere spâss. rbr.
translation.en: you could indeed protest that a lively text "hey, what a mess was that..." would follow on the next page to an enjoyable fun. rbr.

translation.lb: E’STREICH
translation.en: AUSTRIA

translation.lb: E’streich huet seng nei währong
translation.en: Austria has its new currency

translation.lb: Vu gëschter un huet E'streich erern »eng nei wâhrong.
translation.en: Starting yesterday, Austria has introduced a new currency.

translation.lb: Wc' e britesche radio-reporter mellt, stin zu Wien scho vunt fre'e muergen un d'ieidd virun de bankschalteren fir hir al Schillingen an d'preisesch marken gc'nt nei Schillingen emzetauschen.
translation.en: As a British radio reporter mentions, people in Vienna have already from early morning queued in front of the bank counters to exchange their old schillings and Prussian marks for new schillings.

translation.lb: Pro kapp gin 150 nei e'streichesch Schillingen ausbczuelt, de' ancr betrag si gespArt.
translation.en: 150 new Austrian schillings are paid out per person, the additional amounts are saved.

translation.lb: D'e'streichesch regirong, so' rneklt de reporter weider, verfollegt matt der afe'erong vun enger neier wâhrong 3 ziller:
translation.en: The Austrian government, as the reporter further notes, is pursuing three goals with the introduction of a new currency:

translation.lb: 1. D'Lasstrennong vun der e'streichescher wâhrong vun der deilscher.
translation.en: 1. The separation of the Austrian currency from the German.

translation.lb: 2. D'finanziell situatio'n an déne verschiddcnen e'streiçhcsche lânner ze verénhétlechen.
translation.en: 2. To unify the financial situation in the various Austrian states.

translation.lb: 3. D'inflatio'n z'évite'eren an den iwerfloss vun der iwerschësseger kafkrâft erofzedrécken.
translation.en: 3. To avoid inflation and reduce the excess of purchasing power.

translation.lb: DE KINEK PETER II. PROTESTE’ ERT ge ’ nt proklamatio ’ n vun der jugoslawescher republik
translation.en: KING PETER II. PROTESTED against the proclamation of the Yugoslav republic

translation.lb: Iwert lie bescliloss vun der jugoslawescher nalionaiversamnilong, d'monarchie a Jugoslawien ze beseltegen an durch eng republik ze ersetzen,
translation.en: Regarding the decision of the Yugoslav National Assembly to abolish the monarchy in Yugoslavia and replace it with a republic,

translation.lb: hne't de kinek Peter den II. eu Jugoslawien zu London eng erklärong veröffentlecbt.
translation.en: King Peter II of Yugoslavia published a declaration in London.

translation.lb: An deser erkläroag beschëllegt hién de niarschall Tito a Jugoslawien en totalitäre regime oprieblen ze weilen an dem vollek d'entschédoug, ob Jugoslawien eng monarchie oder eng repnblik sollt gin, aus den hänn grrnss ze hun.
translation.en: In this declaration, he accused Marshal Tito in Yugoslavia of establishing a totalitarian regime, depriving the people of the decision whether Yugoslavia should be a monarchy or a republic.

translation.lb: D'prokiamatlo'n vun der jugnslaweseber repnblik, so' sot blé», ass nel vnn baut op muer beschloss gin, mé si ass d'resultat vun länge virberedendcn aetio'nen vun dem Tito senger partri.
translation.en: The proclamation of the Yugoslav republic, as he said, was not decided overnight, but is the result of long-term preparatory actions by Tito's party.

translation.lb: Des entsehédong hätl misse vum ganze jugoslawesehe vollek getraff gin a net nëmme vun der natioualversammlong, de' nuren aus uiembereu vum Tito senger Nationalfront bestét.
translation.en: This decision should have been made by the entire Yugoslav people and not just by the national assembly, which consists only of members of Tito's National Front.

translation.lb: Den Tito wir senge vcrpflichtongen, de' hién am ofkommen mam Soubatschitsch versprach bât, net nnkomm.
translation.en: Tito did not fulfill his obligations, which he promised in the agreement with Subasic.

translation.lb: Hién, de kinek, géng de kämpf virufe'ercn bis datt d'tyrannei a Jugoslawien brseitegt wäc au dMugoslawen erem frei ménongsau haiidlongsfreihét hätten.
translation.en: He, the king, would continue the fight until tyranny in Yugoslavia was overthrown and the Yugoslavs had their freedom of speech and freedom of action again.

translation.lb: Uschlc'ssend un dein kinek Peter seng erklärongen.
translation.en: Following King Peter's statements.

translation.lb: buet och de' Ire'- er klnegln vu Jugoslawien.
translation.en: The widowed queen of Yugoslavia also joined in.

translation.lb: Maria,
translation.en: Maria,

translation.lb: (Twltfra vun détn zu Marseille ermuerdte kinek Alexander, eng proklamatio'n nn d'jugoslawesebt vollek gerichl.
translation.en: (Widow of the assassinated King Alexander in Marseille, issued a proclamation to the Yugoslav people.

translation.lb: „Jugoslawien ass momentan me' de'w gesonk, we' et je an senger geschieht gesonk wor.
translation.en: "Yugoslavia is currently more sick than it has ever been in its history.

translation.lb: All vülker hun dureh de sieg vnn den allie'erten bir national onofhängegkfl an d'democratie crem kritt.
translation.en: All nations have received their national independence and democracy due to the victory of the Allies.

translation.lb: Nnre Jugoslawien hart vum sieg vun den allie'erten net vill.îotzen ze ze'e gewosst,
translation.en: Only Yugoslavia did not know how to benefit much from the victory of the Allies,

translation.lb: mé d'kinekleeh familjen get de kämpf net einfach op.
translation.en: but the royal family does not simply give up the fight.

translation.lb: Si ass enlschloss ze kämpfen, bis datt d'freibét a Jugoslawien eremjiirgeslallt ass."
translation.en: They are determined to fight until freedom is restored in Yugoslavia."

translation.lb: D'brlleseh regirong bemirkt he»- zo' riatt d'jogoslawcseb wählen am sënn vun den demoeratesehe principien dnrehgefe'ert wlre gln an datt sl de* vom vnllek gewlélte reglrong unerkenne ge'w.
translation.en: The British government noted that Yugoslav elections should be conducted according to democratic principles and that they would recognize the government elected by the people.

translation.lb: wat sech nattrleeb och op d'décisio'ncn vun déne vum vollek gewillte vertrllder bezc'e gew.
translation.en: which naturally also applies to the decisions of the representatives elected by the people.

translation.lb: D'lescht joer wore mir verwonnert beim erwachen, t'wor am dezember näss a kal we' d'Preisen d'offensiv ugefängen, uewe vum E'sléck bis op d'Muscl raf.
translation.en: Last year we were surprised when we woke up, it was wet and cold in December when the prices began the offensive, from E'sléck up to Muscl raf.

translation.lb: T'buel gedonnert iwer biérg an dajl, mir Fouhrcner duechten, wat nlftn au desem fall.
translation.en: The artillery thundered over mountains and valleys, we foreigners thought, what could be of use in this case.

translation.lb: T'buel gehéscht fort vun dohém, nëronie fort, * wo' mir lande wéss de le'we gott.
translation.en: The artillery chased us away from home, away from wherever, only the dear Lord knows where we will land.

translation.lb: Allgememg wirtschaftslag D'emslellong vun der amerikanescher kricbswirtschaft op friddensproduktio'n huet trotz de rohstoffa te'nschwieregkéten gudd fortsclirëtt gemat.
translation.en: General economic situation The transition from American war economy to peace production has made good progress despite raw material difficulties.

translation.lb: An den haptzentren vun der industrie si ronn 80 '/* vun den entreprise Ii eingestallt gin.
translation.en: In the main centers of industry, around 80% of the enterprises have been restarted.

translation.lb: Bis elo h net haptsichlecb de sector vu New-York Offizien opmierksamkét erfuer.
translation.en: So far, primarily the sector of New York has attracted attention.

translation.lb: weit op desem gebidd 40 •/« vun aile flieger a vun aile radio'e wârend dem krich produze'ert go'- wen.
translation.en: Because in this area, 40% of all aircraft and radios were produced during the war.

translation.lb: Et hun ongefe'er 7,25 millio'- nen arbechter an desem Zentrum geschafft, an trotz der anniillatio'n vu krichskontrakter am wèrt vu 6 railliarden dollar sin der bis haut erc'acht 100 000 entlôss gin.
translation.en: Approximately 7.25 million workers have worked in this center, and despite the cancellation of war contracts worth 6 billion dollars, only about 100,000 have been laid off until now.

translation.lb: Fir d'iwergangsperiod listen d'Verénegt Staaten matt 5—10 millio'nen arbechisloser gerce lient.
translation.en: For the transition period, the United States anticipated 5-10 million unemployed.

translation.lb: Des berechnongen hun sech glécklcchcrweis al* iwe.rdri wen erwisen, well kaum me' we' 1,5 mülio'nen arbechler erwerblos sin.
translation.en: Fortunately, these calculations have turned out to be wrong, as hardly more than 1.5 million workers are unemployed.

translation.lb: Des gererig zuel get erklärt durch den einstand, datl nom krieb eng stärk nofro n spézialarbechter wor.
translation.en: This lower number is explained by the fact that after the war, there was a strong demand for skilled workers.

translation.lb: De streik bei der General Motors Corp. huet besuergnesser ervirgernff-
translation.en: The strike at General Motors Corp has raised concerns.

translation.lb: Auer Streiks, de' den opbau vun der amerikanescher Wirtschaft behënnere kfnnen, sin ze befèrten, so' an der stolindusirie, an de kuelegro'- wen, ain eleclrizite'tswiéaen, an de schluechtheiser a bei den telegraphegeseH schatten.
translation.en: Other strikes that could hinder the development of the American economy are to be feared in the steel industry, coal mines, electricity works, slaughterhouses, and telegraph companies.

translation.lb: D'regirong buet eng verlängerong vum War Powers Act beantragt, fir am entschédendr moment Jiéwenswichteg betrieber besetzen an d'arbechter zum weiderschaffen zwengen ze kennen.
translation.en: The government has requested an extension of the War Powers Act to, at a decisive moment, be able to occupy vital businesses and compel workers to continue working.

translation.lb: Politesch prozesser Hermann Steicher, bauer, Nidderfeien, ass de 17. dezember 1945 zu liéwenslânglecher zwangsarbecht, 250.000 frang bo'ss an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Political trial Hermann Steicher, farmer, Nidderfeien, was sentenced on December 17, 1945, to lifelong forced labor, a fine of 250,000 francs, and the loss of Luxembourgish nationality.

translation.lb: Hié wor ortsgruppenleiter, gemeinschaftsleiter vun der NSDAP, SS-sturmführer,' member vun der politescber Staffel, kreisbauernführer, huet sech verschidden denunziatio'nen zu schelle komme geloss an zwo' perso'nen als geisele bezéchent.
translation.en: He was a local group leader, community leader of the NSDAP, SS storm leader, member of the political staff, district farmer leader, allowed various denunciations to occur and identified two people as hostages.

translation.lb: Seng fra geb. Christine Theiss ass we'nt onhirgerlechem verhalen zu 2 joer prisong an 250.000 frang bo'ss verurtélt gin.
translation.en: His wife, née Christine Theiss, was sentenced for dishonorable behavior to 2 years of imprisonment and a fine of 250,000 francs.

translation.lb: Antoine Spedener, magazinverwalter, Ettelbréck, ass de 17. dezember 1945 zu 1 joer an 8 me'nt prisong an 150.000 frang.bo'ss verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Antoine Spedener, store manager, Ettelbrück, was sentenced on December 17, 1945, to 1 year and 8 months in prison and a fine of 150,000 francs.

translation.lb: Hié wor é vun dénen 8 e'schten an der VdB, huet sech senger nazifrëndlechkét scho virum krich an engem schreiwe gerühmt a bei senge virgesetzten ausgedréckt, hié wellt eng mustergülteg ortsgrupp hirstellen.
translation.en: He was one of the first 8 in the VdB, boasted of his Nazi friendliness before the war in a writing and expressed to his superiors that he wanted to establish an exemplary local group.

translation.lb: Weider huet hié sech nach zwo' denunziatio'nen zu schelle komme ge-1ÔSS.
translation.en: Furthermore, he allowed two more denunciations to occur.

translation.lb: Am fall Emile Peters, fre'eren avecot, Letzeburg, sin all beschëllegongen zréckgehale gin an hién ass zu 15 joer zwangsarbecht, 1.000.000 fr. bo'ss an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't verurtélt gin.
translation.en: In the case of Emile Peters, former lawyer, Luxembourg, all charges were upheld and he was sentenced to 15 years of forced labor, a fine of 1,000,000 francs, and the loss of Luxembourgish nationality.

translation.lb: De président Turaan huet neilech erklärt, datt weider zesummekënft vun de „Big Three" net no'twenneg wären, mé datt d'organisatio'n vun de Verénte Natio'nen matt alle wichtege froe befâsst sollte gin.
translation.en: President Turaan recently declared that further meetings of the 'Big Three' were not necessary, but that the organization of the United Nations should deal with all important questions.

translation.lb: D'engilesch press bedauert allgemeng des usîcht.
translation.en: The English press generally regrets this view.

translation.lb: Si ass der ménong, datt bis elo munech schwieregkét hätt kennen eng le'song fannen, wann d*„Big Three" perse'nlech dueriwer discute'ert a stellong geholt hätten.
translation.en: They believe that many difficulties could have been resolved if the 'Big Three' had personally discussed and taken a position on them.

translation.lb: Si lét duer, datt am schlëmmste fall eng isolatio'nspodilik fir Amerika a fir Russland vleicht tragbar wir, mé datt d'englesch interessen eng andauernd zesummenanbecht matt dénen zwo' gro'sse natio'nen erforderen.
translation.en: They assert that, in the worst-case scenario, a policy of isolation might be tolerable for America and Russia, but that English interests require a continuous collaboration with these two great nations.

translation.lb: England ass gezwongen, d'bindong matt Russland an Amerika ze kräftegen an auszrbauen, an sech d'organisatio'n vun de Verénte Natio'nen bis un d'grenz vum me'gleche notzbar ze mächen.
translation.en: England is compelled to strengthen and expand its ties with Russia and America and to make use of the United Nations' organization to the fullest extent possible.

translation.lb: we's de vilum..Monument du Souvenir" durch denger beschler in, durch den Albert Kongs de kränz niddcrlée golôss hues?

translation.en: Have you thought that we swore in war to stand by our country, during the hardest times, and that we want to raise it high when the danger is over and a new era dawns for us.

translation.lb: (AP) De kin-ok George VI buet sccli haut vu sengem palast ru Sandrigham un ail birgcr vum empire gewandt, speriel'l awer un de'je'neg. de' an de&em krich inattgekampit huit an un d'kanoer, de' „elo befreit »in vun de nuechten o'ni lùcht an de' dese Chrësehtdag an der fréd an an bire famlljen verliéwe kennen".
translation.en: (AP) King George VI addressed all citizens of the empire today from his Sandringham palace, especially those who fought in this war and the children who are "now free from the nights without light and who can celebrate this Christmas in peace and with their families."

translation.lb: Sech un si wendend huet de kinek George vun England déclare'- crt: „Bcortélt net d'iiéwen no dém wat dir an déne leschte krkhsjocren gesin huctt mé och no dem, wat dir nach an dénen c'schte friddensjoeren gesitt Huit vertrauen an d'zo'- konft."
translation.en: Addressing them, King George of England declared: "Do not judge life by what you have seen in recent war years but also by what you will see in the first years of peace. Have confidence in the future."

translation.lb: ASS D’MONARCHIE A BULGARIEN A GEFOR?
translation.en: IS THE MONARCHY IN BULGARIA IN DANGER?

translation.lb: * Sofia, de 27. dezember.
translation.en: * Sofia, December 27th.

translation.lb: De chef vun der bulgarescher kommunistescher partei, Georgi Dimitrov, huet gëschter am parlamenl d'ofschafong vun der monarchie a Bulgarien gefuerdert.
translation.en: The leader of the Bulgarian Communist Party, Georgi Dimitrov, yesterday in parliament demanded the abolition of the monarchy in Bulgaria.

translation.lb: Ennert stirmeschem beifall huet den Dimitrov déclare'ert, datt d'monarchie a Bulgarien den Zentrum vun der reactio'n wir an datt si et wor, de' Bulgarien an de krich gedriwen hätt.
translation.en: Amidst stormy applause, Dimitrov declared that the monarchy in Bulgaria was the center of reaction and that it had driven Bulgaria into war.

translation.lb: We' e gefrot huet, wié sech hir ge'w gin, fir d'monarchie ze verdédegen, du hun d'députe'ert geruff: Ké mënsch, ké mënsch-
translation.en: When he asked how they would defend the monarchy, the deputies shouted: No one, no one-

translation.lb: Den Dimitrov huet viru gesol „Bulgarien ge'w eng republik gi matt enger parlamentärer regirong",
translation.en: Dimitrov declared, "Bulgaria will become a republic with a parliamentary government,"

translation.lb: an en huet d'convocatio'n vun enger nationaler versammlong gefuerdert fir d'constitutio'n ze änneren.
translation.en: and he demanded the convening of a national assembly to amend the constitution.

translation.lb: No meldonge vu radio Moskau soll den Dimitrov och d'verstaatlechong vun aile gro'ssen entreprise gefuerdert hun.
translation.en: According to reports from Radio Moscow, Dimitrov is also said to have demanded the nationalization of all large enterprises.

translation.lb: (AP.)
translation.en: (AP.)

translation.lb: Em eng äntwert „Wort“ Als äntwert op onsen artikel: „Mir verlângen eng aner regirong" (24. 5. 45) brengt d'„Wort" an senger nuramer vum 9. 3. 45 én argument: mir wiren eng partei, well mir am intressi vum land disciplin vun onse memberen verlangen.
translation.en: In response to our article: "We demand a different government" (24. 5. 45), the 'Wort' in its issue of 9. 3. 45 presents one argument: we are a party because we demand discipline from our members in the interest of the country.

translation.lb: Mir stellen dozo' fest:
translation.en: We note the following:

translation.lb: 1. D'„Wort" facht wirklech express lânscht de kèr vun der sâch: et gét jo em eng nei regirong an net drem, ob d'Unio'n eng partei ass oder net.
translation.en: 1. The 'Wort' really deliberately avoids the core of the matter: it is about a new government and not about whether the Union is a party or not.

translation.lb: 2. D'„Wort" hëlt a kengem wurt stellong zu dénen ukloen, de' mir ge'nl d'regirong richten; mir lôssen et durfir mol dohigestallt, ob d'„Wort" et net fir wichtêg genuch fënnt, an eso' enger wichteger sâch, wo' d'intresse vum land um spill stin, stellong ze liuelen oder ob et net à même ass, eng äntwert ze fannen.
translation.en: 2. The 'Wort' does not take a stance on any of the accusations we make against the government; we leave it open whether the 'Wort' does not find it important enough, in such an important matter where the country's interests are at stake, to take a position or whether it is unable to find an answer.

translation.lb: 3. Mir sin net klenglech; mir hu jo scho vill nini.a krit: mir sin anarchisten, extremisten, revolulionnären, e staat am Staat, mir sin illegal a. e. w. — Et mëcht ons durfir neischt aus, wann d'„Wort" als énzeg äntwert op eng läng uklo ons sét, mir wiren eng partei.
translation.en: 3. We are not petty; we have already been criticized in many ways: we are anarchists, extremists, revolutionaries, a state within the state, we are illegal, etc. — It does not matter to us if the 'Wort' as the only answer to a long accusation calls us a party.

translation.lb: Et as i jo och égal, ob d'kand Jempy oder Metty héscht, d'haptsâcb ass, wann et gudd ass.
translation.en: It does not matter whether the child is called Jempy or Metty, the main thing is that it is good.

translation.lb: 4. Et get parteiintressen a landesintressen: mir triéde net an fir d'intressenvun enger partei, mir verdédegen d'wuel vun der hémecht a vum vollek, dat ass zwéerlé.
translation.en: 4. There are party interests and national interests: we do not advocate for the interests of a party, we protect the welfare of the homeland and the people, that is clear.

translation.lb: 5. Mir verlangen disciplin net aus muecht- oder parteipolitesche grënn, nié am dengscht vun onsem Lefzeburg a f.r d'constructio'n vun enger sche'nerer a besserer hémecht, dal ass och zwéerié.
translation.en: 5. We demand discipline not for power or party political reasons, but in the service of our Luxembourg and for the construction of a more beautiful and better homeland, that is also clear.

translation.lb: Am September 1944 huet de fre'ere conseil municipal vun der stad Letzeburg d'gemèngegeschâfter erem iwerholil an de princip vum chèfferot, all parteipolilik op der seit ze lôssen an nëmmen positiv arbecht am dengscht vun der allgemenghét ze léschten.
translation.en: In September 1944, the former municipal council of the city of Luxembourg resumed the municipal affairs and adopted the principle of the chief administrative office to leave all party politics aside and only work positively in the service of the general public.

translation.lb: ass vun all seilen genschteg opgeholl gin.
translation.en: has been well received from all sides.

translation.lb: De chèfferot ass awer nach e schreit weider gângen an huet d'arbechterpartei agelueden, un der fe'erong vun de stadgeschäfter délzehuelen an d'arbechterpartei huet gèrcn ugeholl.
translation.en: The chief administrative office went a step further and invited the workers' party to participate in the administration of city affairs, and the workers' party gladly accepted.

translation.lb: Deser dcg ass eng bespriéchong vum chèfferot matt den delege'erten vun der arbechterpartei ofgchale gin a d'propositio'n, dem minister vum intérieur eng erweiderong vum chèfferot vu fcnnef op siewe memberen ze emfiélen, huet allgemeng zo'stemmong font.
translation.en: Following this, a discussion took place between the chief administrative office and the delegates of the workers' party, and the proposal to recommend to the Minister of the Interior an expansion of the chief administrative office from five to seven members found general approval.

translation.lb: De minister vum intérieur go'w durch e schreiwes vun désir propositio'n a kenntnes gesät a gcbiéden si ze légalise'eren.
translation.en: The Minister of the Interior was informed through a written document about this proposal and asked to legalize it.
