translation.lb: De generol de Gaulle iwerrécht d’fendelen
translation.en: General de Gaulle hands over the flags

translation.lb: D'iwerréchong vun hire fendelen un de' iwer 120 regimenter, de' erem schons forme'ert sin, wor eng imposant fcier, de' wuel eso' imposant wor we' historesch feieren änlecher natur, matt dénçn se verglach go'f.
translation.en: The handing over of their flags to the over 120 regiments, which had already been formed, was an impressive ceremony, perhaps as imposing as historical celebrations of similar nature, with which it could be compared.

translation.lb: All ke'er, wann den De Gaulle dem colonel vun engem regiment sei fendel iwerrécht huet, go'f ënne bei der Seine eng artîlleriesalv ofgefeiert.
translation.en: Every time de Gaulle handed the flag to a regiment's colonel, an artillery salute was fired below by the Seine.

translation.lb: An den e'rentribunen woren he'ch offize'er vun den allie'erte lainier: Chinese vum Tschang-kai-Shek.
translation.en: In the stands of honor were high-ranking officers from the allied camps: Chinese from Chiang Kai-Shek.

translation.lb: Russen an hire flotten uniformen, de' eso' eng impressio'n vum jonktem, force an eneTgie gin hun o'ni dat onangenehmt a provocant vum preisesche militär,
translation.en: Russians in their fine uniforms, who gave an impression of youth, strength, and energy without the unpleasant and provocative nature of the Prussian military,

translation.lb: Schotten am kilt, Englännerf Amerikaner an d'spëtzen vum franse'sclien état-major.
translation.en: Scots in kilts, Englishmen, Americans, and the chiefs of the French General Staff.

translation.lb: Mé t'hätt é missen uewen op der spëtz vum obelisk sëtzen, fir dat sche'nt farwecht bild op der Place de la Concorde ganz ze gene'ssen.
translation.en: But one would have had to sit atop the obelisk to fully enjoy the beautiful colorful picture on the Place de la Concorde.

translation.lb: Leider kann ech dofir net gudd genuch klammen, an t'wor soss kén do, dén eso' gudd klamme kann, well sos-. hätt bestëmmt én op der spëtzt vun dém hc'ge granitstén gezabbelt.
translation.en: Unfortunately, I cannot climb well enough for that, and there was no one else who could climb that well, otherwise someone would surely have perched on top of that tall granite stone.

translation.lb: Den défilé vun eppes 10 000 mann zu pärd an zu fo'ss no der République a vun de motorise'erte kräftee no der Etoile huet t>eim publicum eng begéschterong ausgele'st, we' ech se nach ni zu Pareiss gesin hun.
translation.en: The parade of about 10,000 men on horseback and on foot towards the Republic and from the motorized forces towards the Etoile stirred an enthusiasm in the audience like I've never seen in Paris before.

translation.lb: Op den troltoiren vun de gro'sse boulevard'en wor e 11t*- wensgefe'erlechl gedrécks, d'fënstere wore voll leidd a voll fendelen, un all lanter hungen e pur menschen (o'ni stréck natirlcch), an de seilestrôssen d'camion'en voll leidd, an de' ganz schlau hate lédere mattbruecht, huu de' Widdert d'facade gestallt, an dann zimlech deier verlo'nt.
translation.en: On the sidewalks of the large boulevards, there was a dangerously tight crowd, windows were full of people and full of flags, a few people (obviously without ropes) hung from each lantern, and in the alleys, trucks were full of people, and the very clever ones brought ladders, placed them against the facades, and rented them out fairly expensively.

translation.lb: D'begéschterong vun de volleksmassen (de' zu Pareiss eso' schlecht an eso' deier iéssen, mé fir émoi de' surge vergiéss hun) huet der jonger franse'scher arme' gegollen, de' a formatio'n ass an eng richteg modem volleksurme' soll gin, capabel d'feiude vu baussen an d'feinde vum republicanesch-democratesche regime am. sclfach ze halen.
translation.en: The enthusiasm of the masses (who eat so poorly and so expensively in Paris but for the moment forgot about that worry) was directed towards the young French army in formation, meant to become a true modern national army capable of keeping external enemies and the enemies of the republican-democratic regime at bay.

translation.lb: D'Gârde Républicaine, d'offize'eschaspiranten, d'médercher an uniform, d'F. F. I an uniform, d'chasseure matt hirem flotte lichte marsch, d'iégio'nen matt liirem ro'egen gemiéssene schrëtt, d'Marokaner matt hirem widder als mascotte, hirem weissen turban a ro'der ceinture, d'marine, d'aviatio'n, d'chaftruppen, ailes go'f frenetesch applaude'ert.
translation.en: The Republican Guard, the officer candidates, the girls in uniform, the F. F. I in uniform, the chasseurs with their splendid light march, the legionnaires with their calm steady stride, the Moroccans with their ram as a mascot, their white turban and red sash, the navy, the aviation, the reserves, all were applauded frenetically.

translation.lb: An o'ni zweiwel huet de' begéschterong sech besonnesch dynamesch manifeste'ert, well d'leidd iwerzégt sin, datt de Preiss eso' gudd ewe' geklappt ass, datt de krich geschwënn ausgét.
translation.en: And without a doubt, the enthusiasm manifested itself particularly dynamically because the people are convinced that the Prussian has been so thoroughly beaten that the war will soon be over.

translation.lb: Pareiss rieht haut tatsächlech gudd ne fre'jor a no sîg.
translation.en: Paris truly smells good today, like spring and victory.

translation.lb: Pareiss krit d’croix de la libération
translation.en: Paris receives the Cross of Liberation

translation.lb: 'Nomëttes, we' der stad Pareiss dûrch den De Gaulle d'eroix de la libération iwerrécht go'f, wor virum Hôtel de Ville eso' e gedrécks, datt 418 fraen schwäch gefall sin.
translation.en: Just now, when the city of Paris was awarded the Cross of Liberation by De Gaulle, there was such a crowd in front of the City Hall that 418 women fainted.

translation.lb: An do ass och en ashusanten zwëschefall virkomm,' dén eçh onbedéngt erziele muss.
translation.en: And there occurred an amusing incident, which I absolutely must tell.

translation.lb: An engem sche'nen auto ko'm grad e ganz he'ge militär un.
translation.en: In a nice car came a very high-ranking military officer.

translation.lb: „T'ass den De Gaulle", sot eng fra zu hirer nopesch.
translation.en: "It's De Gaulle," said a woman to her neighbor.

translation.lb: „Nén, t'ass den De Lattre de Tassigny", sot de' aner, ech kennen en ganz gené.
translation.en: "No, it's De Lattre de Tassigny," said the other, I know him very well.

translation.lb: De' zwo' dämmen konnten net énz gin, si hun sech ordentlech ver'nannt a schlisslech eng dèr aner de para- pluie um kapp durchgeschloen.
translation.en: The two ladies could not agree, they exchanged quite a few words and finally one hit the other on the head with an umbrella.

translation.lb: An um commissariat huet schlisslech den zwëschefall sech opgeklärt: t'wor weder den De Gaulle nach den De Lattre de Tassigny, t'wor de Leclerc gewiéscht, dén an dém betreffenden auto so'z,
translation.en: And at the police station, the incident was finally resolved: it was neither De Gaulle nor De Lattre de Tassigny, it was Leclerc who was in the car in question,

translation.lb: Frankreich huet also' haut seng nei arme' gefeiert, de' am wüstesand vun Afrika an an dem franse'sche maquis gebur go'f.
translation.en: So France celebrated its new army today, which was born in the desert sands of Africa and the French resistance.

translation.lb: An et huet Pareiss gee'ert, datt ewe' schon eso' oft an der geschieht matt senger égener freihét och d'freihé» vun der weit verdédegt huet,
translation.en: And Paris was honored, as it has so often defended not only its own freedom but also the freedom of the world in history,

translation.lb: dodûrch datt et matt ausdauer an energie der barbarei, der typnnei an der réactio'n seng freihétsle'ft an sei revolutionären a fortschrëttlechen kampfwëllen entge'nt gebeit huet.
translation.en: by persevering with energy against barbarism, tyranny, and reaction, engaging its love for freedom and its revolutionary and progressive fighting spirit.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch renaissance get schwe'er, huet £en De Gaulle an senger riéd am Stadhaus gesot.
translation.en: The French renaissance is difficult, said De Gaulle in his speech at City Hall.

translation.lb: Mé, sot hién -och, schwe'er conditiö'nen si besser ewe' illusio'nen.
translation.en: But, he also said, difficult conditions are better than illusions.

translation.lb: Well e vollek, dat d'caressen vun der decadenz oflént a matt sengem ganzen erwâchten instinct no erneierong striéft si schwieregkéten a rau strôsse besser ewe' piéd,
translation.en: Because a people that rejects the caresses of decadence and strives with its awakened instinct for renewal perform better on difficult and rough roads,

translation.lb: op dénen é lîcht a rnëll no ënhe rutsche kann.
translation.en: on which one can quickly slide backward.

translation.lb: Ech mengen, de' männlech wlrder si fir Letzeburg grad eso' wo'er ewe' fir Frankreich.
translation.en: I believe these words are just as true for Luxembourg as they are for France.

translation.lb: Pareis, 2. 4. 45.
Gemengerotsetzeng Stâd Letzeburg vum 27. 9. 45
translation.en: Municipal Council Meeting of the City of Luxembourg from 27. 9. 45

translation.lb: Gëschter nomëtteg wor eng wichteg gemengerotasëtzong.
translation.en: Yesterday afternoon there was an important municipal council meeting.

translation.lb: Um ordre da jour waren d'noininatio'nen, d'avancementer an d'astufongen vun de beamten a remengenarbechter.
translation.en: On the agenda were the nominations, advancements and categorizations of officials and communal workers.

translation.lb: Den her Leischen huet en détaille'crte rcchensehaftsbericht von der commissio'n ofgeluecht.
translation.en: Mr. Leischen presented a detailed financial report from the commission.

translation.lb: An der hâptsàch huet den hèr Leischen de neie barème vun de gehSlter exptize'ert.
translation.en: Mainly, Mr. Leischen explained the new salary scale.

translation.lb: Ronn 100 avancementer a noBiinatio’nen ain ugcholl gin.
translation.en: Approximately 100 advancements and nominations were decided.

translation.lb: D’IcscM an den détail vun der sëtzong kënne mer wént plazmangel cre’scht aft onser nummer vun e samschteg bréngen.
translation.en: The details and outcomes of the meeting can be brought in our Saturday edition due to space constraints.

translation.lb: D’sëtzong huct vun 4 bis 8 auer gedauert.
translation.en: The meeting lasted from 4 to 8 o'clock.

translation.lb: Luz BENTZ, tumprofesser, cantonalchef vun der L. V. L. Iéchternacb, vun de Preisen matt 22 komeroden fir d'Hémecht zu Hinzert erschoss gin, de 25. februar 1944, am alter vun 28 jor.
translation.en: Luz BENTZ, teacher, district leader of the L. V. L. Echternach, was shot by the Germans with 22 comrades for the homeland in Hinzert on February 25, 1944, at the age of 28.

translation.lb: Leichendengscht e me'ndeg, den 1. october, ëm 9.30 auer zu Echternach.
translation.en: Funeral service on Monday, October 1, at 9:30 in Echternach.

translation.lb: — D'Unio'n a seng komeroden vun der L. V. L. vun Echternach. 793b
translation.en: — The Union and his comrades from the L. V. L. of Echternach. 793b

translation.lb: Eng gelunge lésong
translation.en: A successful solution

translation.lb: We' d'Obermosel zeidong mellt, ass ons spuerkés am gàng sech eppes ganz aussergewe'nleches ze léschten, wat vill be's bludd mecht.
translation.en: As reported by the Obermosel newspaper, our savings bank is in the process of doing something very extraordinary that causes much outrage.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech en d'obligatio'nen, de' d'spuerkés vun 1941 un an der Bourse oder an hiren égene guichéen verkaft hat.
translation.en: It concerns the bonds that the savings bank had sold from 1941 onwards on the stock exchange or at their own counters.

translation.lb: Haut hätt si de' gèrcn erëm an offre'ert dem kéfer gro'ssmiddeg den halwe preis, dén hie bezuelt huet.
translation.en: Today, they would buy them back and generously offer the buyer half the price he paid.

translation.lb: Dest geld get dann nach bloeke'ert, eso' datt d'spuerkés eigcntlech neischt bezillt an de kéfer och neischt kritt.
translation.en: This money then remains blocked, so the savings bank essentially pays nothing and the buyer gets nothing.

translation.lb: Matt watfir motive get versieht, dat ze justifize'eren?
translation.en: What motives are used to justify this?

translation.lb: Den hèr, dén den artikel doriwer an der Obermosel-zeidong vum 19. 9. 45 verbrach huet, hat sech d'sâch e besse lîcht gemâch.
translation.en: The gentleman who wrote the article on this in the Obermosel newspaper on September 19, 1945, made the matter somewhat simple.

translation.lb: De* pabeieren, sét hién, si vun den Deitsche „gerawt" gin,also' nach me' ewe' gestuel, an d'ieidd, de' se kaft hun, hätten eigentlcch guer ké recht, eppes erem ze kre'en.
translation.en: The papers, he said, were 'robbed' by the Germans, thus even more stolen, and those who bought them actually have no right to get anything back.

translation.lb: D'spuerkés ass ower net eso'.
translation.en: But the savings bank is not like that.

translation.lb: Si get hinnen d'halschecht vum kafpreis erem a bloeke'ert en.-
translation.en: They give them back half of the purchase price and block it.

translation.lb: Fo’ssball.
translation.en: Football.

translation.lb: De' kloer victoire vu Lille iwer Bordeaux, wor zo' engem gro's3en dél dem Bihel zo'zeschreiwen.
translation.en: The clear victory of Lille over Bordeaux was to a large extent due to Bihel.

translation.lb: Fir seng rentrée, huet den zenterstiermer vun der nationaléquipe e wonnerbare match gemâch.
translation.en: For his return, the center forward of the national team played a wonderful match.

translation.lb: Anscheinend klëmmt a fällt de Red Star vu Pareis matt der bedélegong vu sengen zwé marokaneschen assen Hamiri a Kadmiri.
translation.en: Apparently, the rise and fall of Red Star Paris depend on the participation of its two Moroccan aces Hamiri and Kadmiri.

translation.lb: Den Delfour, capitaine vum Red Star, wollt den Hamiri lénksinnen setzen.
translation.en: Delfour, captain of Red Star, wanted to place Hamiri on the left.

translation.lb: Den Hamiri wollt net an den Delfoui huet hién aus der équipe gesät.
translation.en: Hamiri did not want to and Delfour removed him from the team.

translation.lb: Dorobhin huet de Kadmiri och net gespillt.
translation.en: As a result, Kadmiri also did not play.

translation.lb: D'Resultat: De Red Star ass vum Racing geschloe gin.
translation.en: The result: Red Star was defeated by Racing.

translation.lb: Beim match Arsenal —Aston Villa (0:5) huet den zenterstiermer vum Aston Villa, Edwards 4 goaler geschoss.
translation.en: In the match Arsenal vs Aston Villa (0:5), Aston Villa's center forward Edwards scored 4 goals.

translation.lb: Hié stét elo un der spëtz vun der goalgëtter-tabell.
translation.en: He now stands at the top of the goal-scorer list.

translation.lb: An der Schweizer Coupe sin 281 cluppen ugemellt, ge'nt 265 vum virege jor.
translation.en: In the Swiss Cup, 281 clubs are registered, against 265 from the previous year.

translation.lb: Am Berliner Olympia-Stadion huet eng russesch gajrniso'nséquipe eng englesch militärmannschaft 2:0 geschloen.
translation.en: In the Berlin Olympic Stadium, a Russian garrison team defeated an English military team 2:0.

translation.lb: Héchstwarscheinlech spillcn d'Russen ge'nt eng englesch selectio'nséquipe vum besetzte gebiet.
translation.en: Most likely, the Russians will play against an English selection team from the occupied area.

translation.lb: Kurz bemiérkt: De belsche kinek, dén secb s eit dem iné an der anierikaiieseher occiipatio'nszon opgchalen huet, huct SI.
translation.en: Briefly noted: The Belgian king, who withdrew from the American occupation zone, has Sir.

translation.lb: Wolfgang verlôss fir an d'Schweiz zc résen.
translation.en: Wolfgang left to travel to Switzerland.

translation.lb: E correspondent vun der agence Exchange Telegraph meill aus der Schweiz, datt de kinck an der unecht zu Gent ukomni ass.
translation.en: A correspondent from the agency Exchange Telegraph reports from Switzerland that the king has arrived clandestinely in Ghent.

translation.lb: No. donc selwcchte rappnren, soll d'tra vom kinck Leopold eng „gudd nouvelle" er wârdeu.
translation.en: According to the same reports, King Leopold's wife is expecting 'good news.'

translation.lb: Dat elei an dat elo...
translation.en: That here and that now...

translation.lb: We' nier aus zo'verle'sseger quell he'eren hun, ass ons crem c giélemânnchen aus <ieu] prisons resp. aus der gefângenschaft fortgelaf, el handelt sech eso'guer em en ortsgrnppenleiter.
translation.en: As we have heard from a reliable source, our dear prisoner has escaped from [unclear] prisons or rather from custody, and it even concerns a local group leader.

translation.lb: Wivill sin der schons bis do entkomm?
translation.en: How many have already escaped until now?

translation.lb: Vleieht wèrd de.i hèr Bodson dat an senge walilriéde verroden.
translation.en: Perhaps Mr. Bodson will reveal that in his election speeches.

translation.lb: Datt e gendarm an enger sche'ner letzeburger uniform ka sin an ower ké stëoom recht huet, dat ass eng sâch, de' den honnersten am E'sléck net ka verstoen.
translation.en: That a gendarme can be in a nice Luxembourgish uniform and yet has no voting rights, that is something that not even the hundredth person in E'sléck can understand.

translation.lb: An dach ass et wo'er, mir kennen zwé fäM, wo' gendarme vun der stëmmlëscht gestrach si gin.
translation.en: And yet it's true, we know of two cases where gendarmes have been struck from the voter list.

translation.lb: Eppes ass do jiddenfaills faul, entweder sin de' zwé hèren onschëlleg an da müssen si malt kenne stemme goen oder si si schëlleg, dann dèrfeu si op k enge m fall me' d'uniforrn undoen.
translation.en: Something is certainly wrong there, either the two gentlemen are innocent and then they must be able to vote again, or they are guilty, then they should in no case wear the uniform anymore.

translation.lb: Erem eng sâch, de' den hèr Bodson senge wiéler auserné lée nmss.
translation.en: Again, something Mr. Bodson must explain to his voters.

translation.lb: De Gillen an de Baumert zu Pareis.
translation.en: Gillen and Baumert in Paris.

translation.lb: E sonndeg wor zu Pareis am Parc des Princes de rendez-vous vu sämWeclie gro'ssen amaleur-sprinter vun Europa, ènner ancren de' forinidabel <iémarreuren Harris, Lohmüller, Bivoa'I, Plattner, onse Lull Gillen an de Jang Baumert als vertriéder vum klenge Letzeburg.
translation.en: On Sunday in Paris at the Parc des Princes was the meeting of some of the great amateur sprinters of Europe, among others, the formidable race starters Harris, Lohmüller, Bivoal, Plattner, our own Lull Gillen, and Jang Baumert representing tiny Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Datt dé Lull Gillen haut schon zu déne beschte ka gerechent gin, dat beweist sei Klassement, dat mer gesell-ter bruecht hun.
translation.en: That Lull Gillen can already be counted among the best today is proven by his ranking that we have brought together.

translation.lb: Onsen zwéte vertriéder, de Jang Baumert, liuet sich bei dèr geléenhét ocli net eso' schlecht aus der affär gezun, dat huet de succès bewisen, den hién hât, we' hié mam Caustret als pariner an der américaine gefuer ass.
translation.en: Our second representative, Jang Baumert, did not do so poorly either in the event, as his success proved when he rode with Caustret as a partner in the American race.

translation.lb: Do sin 30 klm an der zeit vu 39 minutten erofgedrummt gin, dat héscht matt 45 à l'heure ass et ronderem gangen, a vu 17 équipen huet de Baumert—Causeret sech u 4. stell classe'ert.
translation.en: There were 30 kilometers completed in the time of 39 minutes, which means they went around at 45 km/h, and out of 17 teams, Baumert-Causeret placed in 4th position.

translation.lb: Vainqueure waren Platiner—Siegenthailer.
translation.en: The winners were Platiner—Siegenthailer.

translation.lb: An der vitesse hät de Baumert de pech, an de sérien gleich op de' stärkst we' de Lohmüller an Doguette ze sto'ssen.
translation.en: In the speed race, Baumert had the bad luck to immediately face the strongest such as Lohmüller and Doguette in the series.

translation.lb: An der 1. série go'f hién den 3. hannert dem Lohmüller-Doguette.
translation.en: In the 1st series, he came 3rd behind Lohmüller-Doguette.

translation.lb: Am repêchage go'f hién den 2. hannert dem Doguettc, awer hârt op hält wor et gângen well de Lohmüller huet op pneudéckt gewonn, an de Baumert wor neinmen 20 cm hannert dem zwéten.
translation.en: In the repechage, he came 2nd behind Doguette, but it was very close because Lohmüller won by a whisker, and Baumert was just 20 cm behind the second place.

translation.lb: De Lohmüller hât sech dat net erwart, well we' et fèrdeg wor huet de Lohmüliler de Baumert matt all respekt bekuckt, en hât sech dat net vun dem 18- järege Letzeburger erwart.
translation.en: Lohmüller had not expected that, because when it was over, Lohmüller looked at Baumert with all respect; he had not expected that from the 18-year-old Luxembourger.

translation.lb: Matt de féschtongen, de' de Baumert e sonndeg gemäch huet, kenne mir zefridde sin wa mer a betrachf ze'en, datt hién matt dem Lull Gillen de jéngste coureur wor.
translation.en: With the performances Baumert made that Sunday, we can be satisfied when considering that he, together with Lull Gillen, was the youngest racer.

translation.lb: Et wor dest sein e'schte gro'sse start zu Pareis an hié ko'm och schon direct matt délie gre'ssten assen a contact.
translation.en: It was his first big start in Paris, and he immediately came into contact with the greatest stars.

translation.lb: Ennert denen 30 000 zo'- schauer, do' do woren, huet én och vill Letzeburger he'eren, wann ons zwé vertriéder en effoH geinat hun, a wann se geruff hun: allez Letzeburger!
translation.en: Among the 30,000 spectators who were there, one could also hear many Luxembourgers cheering when our two representatives made an effort and when they shouted: go Luxembourgers!

translation.lb: Onse manager M. Gillen-huet vun den organisateuren fclicitc'ert krrtt fir seng zwé jong coureuren, de' den assen de bass eso' gudd ge halen hun.
translation.en: Our manager, Mr. Gillen, was congratulated by the organizers for his two young racers who held their ground so well against the stars.

translation.lb: Matt e bësschc me' training a routine wert de Maurice an nächster zeit sech matt sengem Lull a mam Jang Baumert op den internationale vitesse-matcher matt e'ere weise können.
translation.en: With a bit more training and routine, Maurice will soon be able to show himself with his Lull and Jang Baumert at international speed matches.

translation.lb: NOKRICHSPROBLEMEN D’Londoner conferenz matt hire schwächten.
translation.en: AFTER-WAR PROBLEMS The London conference with its weaknesses.

translation.lb: Ans aile meWongen, de' incr bis elo \un der Londoner conferenz bruecht hun, könnt i licht erausfannen, datt et de verhandio-ngsparfiiercn haptsScliiech nuren drop «kennt, vir ailem d'glcichgewîcht te sc lient défie verschiedene paftneren net ze ste'eren.
translation.en: In all the motions brought so far from the London conference, it is easily discernible that the main issue negotiators focus on is above all to maintain the balance without destabilizing the different partners.

translation.lb: An ai+e froen, de' d'frkfdensverträg ugâng sin, sin d'aussem-inisteren sech ofiéneg, an d'hoffnoitg, datt d'conferenz zu engem gndden enn gefo'ert get, ass kteng.
translation.en: In all questions concerning the peace treaty, the foreign ministers are at odds, and the hope that the conference leads to a satisfactory conclusion is small.

translation.lb: Ganz wicliteg problème«, we' z. Ii.
translation.en: Very important problems, for example.

translation.lb: d'italien esc h-jugoslawesch grenzfro, d'fro van de balkaniänner an d'frr vun den italienesche eolonien si so' ze soen einfach op d'seit geschubhst gin.
translation.en: the Italian-Yugoslav border issue, the question of the Balkan states, and the issue of the Italian colonies have been, so to speak, simply set aside.

translation.lb: De' drett woch vun der conferenz hun de' 5 gro'ss aussemiHistcren dermatt Hgefängen, H we'neger schwiereg problemen iwerzegoen, we' z. b. zur fro vun der internationalise'erong vun den curopäesche bann 9- gewässer, d'erweiderong vun def e'streichescher regirong an d'raumen vnm Iran vu jusséschen an englescheïi truppen.
translation.en: In the third week of the conference, the 5 great foreign ministers began to address less difficult problems, such as the question of the internationalization of European inland waterways, the expansion of the Austrian government, and the withdrawal of Russian and English troops from Iran.

translation.lb: Enn deser woch soll d'Londoner conferenz schon erem ausernaner goen, mé positiv resnltaler, de' jidder intéressent befriddegt hätten, si nach keng opweisbar.
translation.en: By the end of this week, the London conference is supposed to disband again, but positive results that would satisfy every interested party are still not apparent.

translation.lb: Zwar sin secb de' intresse/ert länner, also Russland an England iwert de princip vum friddensvertrag matt Finnland éneg gin, mé oh dese friddensvertrag och schon eso' gesohwënn ennefzéchent gét, ass ercm eng aner fro.
translation.en: Indeed, some interested countries, that is Russia and England, agreed on the principle of the peace treaty with Finland, but whether this treaty will even reach a significant conclusion is another matter.

translation.lb: Wat Russiand vu Finnland fuerdert, hu mer schon an engem artikei gesot.
translation.en: What Russia demands from Finland has already been stated in an article.

translation.lb: Russland denkt och net druh, fir Finnland ze scho'nen, we' z. b. matt Bulgarien, dat iwerhapt keng repara, tio'nszuelengen fir d'schiéd, de' el a Griechenland gemat huet, ze löschte brauch.
translation.en: Russia does not even consider sparing Finland, unlike Bulgaria, which doesn't have to pay any reparations for the damage it caused in Greece.

translation.lb: Aner wicliteg froen, we' z. b. d'grenzze'ong teschent Italien a le goslawien hun d 'susse min isteren hire spezialdelege'erteTi iwerlôss.
translation.en: Other important issues, such as the border demarcation between Italy and Yugoslavia, have been left to their special delegates by the southern ministers.

translation.lb: Wann si selwer net dermatt fèrdcg gi sin, da kann én sech op sénge fënnef fangeren ofziéilen, wat dann cre'scht hir assisfentefi erausbrengen.
translation.en: If they themselves have not completed it, one can count on their fingers what their assistants will eventually achieve.

translation.lb: Ir se de' froen weidergelét hun, ass e beschloss gefâsst gin, am no'tfail erem eng ke'er zu enger conferenz zesunimenzekommen.
translation.en: Before they passed on the issues, a decision was made to reconvene for another conference in case of emergency.

translation.lb: Mir kennen on s also op weider aiisseministerconfcrenze gefftsst halen.
translation.en: So we can prepare for further foreign ministers' conferences.

translation.lb: Iwer d'friddensverträg matt Bulgarien a Rumänien sin i'werhapt keng décisio'ne getraff gin.
translation.en: No decisions have been made regarding the peace treaties with Bulgaria and Romania.

translation.lb: Déje'negen matt Ungarn ass iwerhapt net zur sproch komm, well Rnssland sech widdersat huet, Frankreich a China un de bespriechongen fir dese friddensvertrag délhuelen ze lôssen.
translation.en: Those concerning Hungary were not discussed at all, because Russia opposed allowing France and China to participate in the discussions for this peace treaty.

translation.lb: Wärend der ganzer daucr hun da' énzel ministeren net gespiiert, fir én dém aneren sen-g ponkte kloer ze léeii, m« wat net gesot go'w, dat ass, datt trotz allen discutio'nen an alle protestatio'nen, Europa practesch an zwo' influenzzonen gedélt ass, an datt des conferenz dach Tremmen d'ziil verfollechl huet, én énegeTmôssent gleichgewîchl teschent descii influenzzonen hirzestellcn.
translation.en: During the entire duration, the individual ministers did not feel the need to clarify each other's points, but what was not said is that despite all discussions and protests, Europe is practically divided into two zones of influence, and that this conference actually sought to establish some form of balance between these zones of influence.

translation.lb: D’Sonja Henie divorce’ert.
translation.en: Sonja Henie is getting a divorce.

translation.lb: Sonja Henie, de' bekannt filmschauspillerin, huet beschloss, sech schéden ze lôssen.
translation.en: Sonja Henie, the well-known actress, has decided to get a divorce.

translation.lb: VVëllt si zu Hollywood keng ausnahm mächen?
translation.en: Does she not want to make an exception in Hollywood?

translation.lb: We' d'Sonja Henie vun enger Vakanz zu Honolulu erem komm ass, huet d',,kinnigin vum eis" annonce'- ert, si wëllt sech vuri hirem mann, dem champion Dan Topping, dé momentan an der marin ass, trennen.
translation.en: When Sonja Henie returned from a vacation in Honolulu, the 'queen of ice' announced she wants to separate from her husband, champion Dan Topping, who is currently in the navy.

translation.lb: D'Sonja huet erklärt, desen hiren e'schten divorce, war fir si eng wich» teg sâch.
translation.en: Sonja explained that this, her first divorce, was an important matter for her.

translation.lb: Den Dan Tapping doge'nt huet schon 2 mol divorce'ert.
translation.en: However, Dan Tapping has already divorced twice before.

translation.lb: Englesch schwieregkéten.
translation.en: English difficulties.

translation.lb: Wat och ëmn "r de grond vun der divergenz ass, d'englesch volleksmass ass verbëttert durch hir auswîrkong.
translation.en: Whatever the reason for the divergence, the English populace is embittered by its effects.

translation.lb: Jorelâng huet England gelidden, séng Wirtschaft eingestallt, sein auslandshandel ënnerbonnen.
translation.en: For years, England suffered, its economy stalled, its foreign trade hindered.

translation.lb: An haut muss et nokucke, we' Amerika iwerall, a virun allem an Europa seng stellonge verstirkt a fir d'englesch no'tlag ké verständnes me' huet.
translation.en: And today it must watch how America everywhere, especially in Europe, strengthens its positions and has no more understanding for the English plight.

translation.lb: Et muss nokucke, we' an de fre'er vun Deitschland "besäte länner d'iiéwe se'er erem an normal bunne kënnt durch d'amerikanesch liwerongen,
translation.en: It must watch as in the formerly German-occupied countries life returns to normal through American deliveries,

translation.lb: we' a Belgien, Holland, Frankreich a Letzeburg de liéwesstandard geschwënn erem iwer dem engleschen ass.
translation.en: as in Belgium, Holland, France, and Luxembourg, the standard of living soon again surpasses the English one.

translation.lb: Et muss nokucken an et kann neischt mächen.
translation.en: It must watch and can do nothing.

translation.lb: Et ka weider neischt mächen, ewe' onzefridden ze sin an d'schold der regirong zo'zeschreiwen.
translation.en: It can continue to do nothing except be dissatisfied and blame the government.

translation.lb: Hätte mir den Churchill crem!
translation.en: If only we had Churchill back!

translation.lb: Dat ass e saz, dén én oft an oft erem he'ert.
translation.en: That is a sentence one hears again and again.

translation.lb: D'démobilisatio'n, de' v'run de wähle versprach gi wor> gét net virun.
translation.en: The demobilization, which was promised before the elections, is not progressing.

translation.lb: D'verstaat- Iechong vun de gro'wen, den eisebunnen, de banken, de fabriken le'sst op sech warden.
translation.en: The nationalization of the mines, the railways, the banks, the factories is being delayed.

translation.lb: D'sozial zo' stïnn an de betrieber gin net verbessert.
translation.en: The social conditions in the businesses are not improving.

translation.lb: De programm Attlee-Bevin ass weit vu sénger verwirklechong ewech.
translation.en: The Attlee-Bevin program is far from being realized.

translation.lb: An d'symplome vun enger krisestëmmong gin ëmmer me' stârk......
translation.en: And the symptoms of a crisis mood are becoming ever stronger......

translation.lb: De René Deltgen sëtzt am Gronn D'zeidonge bréngen et all, de' eng e besselche me' ausfe'erlech, an de' aner o'ni commentai-.
translation.en: René Deltgen is sitting in Gronn. All the newspapers are reporting on it, some in more detail, others without comment.

translation.lb: Et ass nach net vil! me' ewe' e jor, du I d'„Wort" och en artikel iwert de né Deltgen bruecht.
translation.en: It's not much yet! But over a year ago, 'Wort' also published an article about the famous Deltgen.

translation.lb: Ech gesi nit-cli nach a mengem biiro zu Niederau setzen, et rieht no phénol a naphtalin;
translation.en: I can still see myself sitting in my office in Niederau, it smells of phenol and naphthalene;

translation.lb: d'„Wort" leit gro'ss opgeschloen um schreiwdësch, an iwert meng schëller kiebitzt dat ait schëld, wat matt mer zesumme schafft:
translation.en: 'Wort' lies open on the desk, and over my shoulder peers the old sign, which works with me:

translation.lb: „Ach, Sie lesen über den René Deltgen, der stammt doch bekanntlich aus Luxemburg," an iwertdém et d'ae verdre'nt:
translation.en: "Ah, you are reading about René Deltgen, who is, as is well known, from Luxembourg," and it rolls its eyes:

translation.lb: „Gott, der spielt aber wundervoll, kennen Sie ihn?"
translation.en: "God, he plays wonderfully, do you know him?"

translation.lb: Ech liésen haseleg virun, et interesse'ert mech stärk, et gét do riéds vun dém dag, wo' en entdeckt, datt e beruff zum schauspiller huet,
translation.en: I read on hastily, it interests me greatly, it talks about the day when he discovered he had a vocation for acting,

translation.lb: et wor op enger soirée vun enger „deutschen Theatergesellschaft",
translation.en: it was at an evening event by a 'German Theatre Society',

translation.lb: an da we' en an d'friemd gét, we' sei papp oder seng mamm matt schwe'- erem hèrz...
translation.en: and then when he goes abroad, how his father or his mother with a heavy heart...

translation.lb: an et gét riéds vun engem wecker, ech wéss net me' a watfirengem zesummenhank...
translation.en: and it talks about an alarm clock, I no longer know in what context...

translation.lb: jé et ass e richtege „Schauspieler-Interview", matt e besselche rührong, e besselche romantik an enger ganzer onmass ligen.
translation.en: yes, it is a real 'Actor Interview', with a bit of emotion, a bit of romance, and a whole bunch of lies.

translation.lb: Well wann de René Deltgen démols d'worecht gesot hätt, dann hätt e gesot:
translation.en: Because if René Deltgen had told the truth back then, he would have said:

translation.lb: ,,Wc' ech fir d'e'scht gefillt hun, datt ech kënnt theater spillen, dat wor, we' ech e klengt gedieht declame'ert hun als scho'ljéngelche virun onser ie'wer verstuerwener Grande-Duchesse Marie-Adelaïde,
translation.en: "When I first felt that I could act in theater, that was, when I declaimed a small poem as a schoolboy before our late Grand Duchess Marie-Adelaide,

translation.lb: démols huet si mech geluewt an onse scho'ilméschter och, a we' ech e puei jor me' al wor, hun ech mam jünglingsverein zu Esch-Uelzecht theater gespillt,
translation.en: back then she praised me and our schoolmaster too, and when I was a few years older, I acted in the youth club in Esch-Uelzecht,

translation.lb: mer hun den „Don Fernando" gespillt an de „Wilhelm Tell", mer hun de „Julius Cäsar" an de „Napoléon" interprete'ert.
translation.en: we played 'Don Fernando' and 'William Tell', we interpreted 'Julius Caesar' and 'Napoleon'.

translation.lb: Et woren de' Escher géschblech hèren, de' meng vocatio'n zum theater gro'ssgezillt a gudd gehéscht hun,
translation.en: It was the Esch clergymen who greatly esteemed and called out my vocation for theater,

translation.lb: et wore si, de' mech ënnerstëtzt hun, et wore si, de' mech als é vun hire bèschte matt hire segenswënsch an d'friemd, an Deitschland geschéckt hun,
translation.en: it was they who supported me, it was they who sent me abroad, to Germany, with their blessings as one of their best,

translation.lb: a wéder mei papp nach meng mamm huet et verdross, am conliär, se woren ho'ffereg op hiren dichtege jong....
translation.en: and neither my father nor my mother regretted it, on the contrary, they were proud of their promising son...

translation.lb: Mé dat aMes huet de René Deiltgen net gesot, en huet et net gesot, well en sech geschummt huet,
translation.en: But René Deltgen didn't say that at all, he didn't say it because he was ashamed,

translation.lb: en huet sech onser le'wer Gro'ssherzogin hirer geschummt,
translation.en: he was ashamed before our dear Grand Duchess,

translation.lb: en huet sech der Escher géschtlechen hère geschummt,
translation.en: he was ashamed before the Esch clergymen,

translation.lb: vleicht huet en sech och sénger mamm a séngem papp sénger geschummtî...
translation.en: perhaps he was also ashamed before his mother and father...

translation.lb: De René Deltgen hât ailles vergiéss, en hât ailes verkaft un e land, dat ons gepéngegt huet bis op dïdudd,
translation.en: René Deltgen forgot everything, he sold everything to a country that tormented us to the utmost,

translation.lb: en huet ons u sein immense grössenwahn verkaft....
translation.en: he sold us out for his immense megalomania....

translation.lb: Vleicht, wann en um gerîcht ervir kennt, dann erënnert en sech un de', de' séng frënn woren,
translation.en: Perhaps, when he comes to court, he will remember those who were his friends,

translation.lb: un de' dénen hién eng photo geschenkt huet, wo' drop stong „meinem lieben Freunde",
translation.en: to whom he gave a photo that was inscribed "to my dear friend",

translation.lb: en erënnert sech un de' de' matt him hei schon am jor 1934 d'„GEDELIT" gegrënnt hun (an dat ass fir hién net gudd, well et get ké sche'ne nimbus, wann én an der „Gedelit" wor),
translation.en: he remembers those who founded 'GEDELIT' with him here already in 1934 (and this is not good for him because there is no fine aura if one was in 'Gedelit'),

translation.lb: en erënnert sech un d'Escher hèren, vun dénen der haut net me' vill zu Esch sin,
translation.en: he remembers the Esch clergy, of whom not many remain in Esch today,

translation.lb: en erënnert sech, we' gudd datt et fir hié gewiéscht wir, wann en zwar schauspiller gi wir. iéwel trotzdem ni sei land verroden hätt,..
translation.en: he remembers how good it would have been for him, if he had become an actor but never betrayed his country nonetheless...

translation.lb: en erënnert sech... iéwel dann ass et ze sipe't.
translation.en: he remembers... yet then it is too late.

translation.lb: Politesch prozesser Marthe Oberllnkels, Letzebürg, go'w zu 2 jor prisong an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't ver urtélt.
translation.en: Political trials Marthe Oberlnkels, Luxembourg, was sentenced to 2 years in prison and the loss of Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: Si wor member vun der VDB, scharführerin vun der BDM, huet sech freiwelleg fir d'flichtjor an den RAD gemellt, huet sech als führerin am RAD ausbilde gelôss, wor maidenunterführerin a member vun der NSDAP op den Hitler verédegt.
translation.en: She was a member of the VDB, squad leader of the BDM, volunteered for the compulsory year in the RAD, was trained as a leader in the RAD, was maiden supervisor and member of the NSDAP sworn to Hitler.

translation.lb: E wor blockleiter vun der VDB, huet seng arbechter ënnor drock gesat. an matt Heil Hitler ze gre'ssen.
translation.en: He was a block leader of the VDB, put his workers under pressure and greeted with Heil Hitler.

translation.lb: Joseph Berger, chauffeur, Befort, ass zu 15 me'nt prisong an zu enger geldbo'ss vun 20.000 frang verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Joseph Berger, driver, Befort, was sentenced to 15 months in prison and a fine of 20,000 francs.

translation.lb: En hât d'uniform vun der VPB, ■»•or oytsobmann vun der DAS 1, mèrnber vun der NSDAP an op de Führer matt handschlag verflicht, en huet Sech an den dengscht vun der,,Nothilffe" ophuele gelôss, huet u sche'ss- Ubongen an um streifendengscht délgcholl.
translation.en: He wore the uniform of the VPB, was district leader of the DAS 1, member of the NSDAP and pledged to the Führer with a handshake, he joined the service of the 'Nothilfe', participated in shooting exercises and in patrol duty.

translation.lb: Uwv Nie. Kayser, installateur, Woltz, ass zu engem jor prisong verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Nie. Kayser, installer, Woltz, was sentenced to one year in prison.

translation.lb: E «or member vun der NSDAP, zellenleiter vun der VDB a 16 me nt läng ortsgruppenleiter.
translation.en: He was a member of the NSDAP, cell leader of the VDB, and local group leader for 16 months.

translation.lb: An det égenschaft hât hié politesch berichter gemâch.
translation.en: In that capacity, he made political reports.

translation.lb: En huet de Letzeburger vi 11 dengschter erwisen z. b. huet hié jiddferengem dé gefrot huet seng YPBskârt erem gin, vre' d'leidd se no dem generalstreik ageschéckt haten; en huet ké mënsch geplot.
translation.en: He rendered many services to the Luxembourger, for example, he returned the YPB cards to anyone who asked, after they had sent them in after the general strike; he did not harass anyone.

translation.en: This would be to allow Germany to economically recover.

translation.lb: De Schumacher huet och gefuerdert, datt der deitscher jugend me*. intressi entge'ntbruecht sollt gin, de' matt hirem wessen stärk am réckstand wir.
translation.en: Schumacher also demanded that more interest should be shown to the German youth, who lag behind in terms of knowledge.

translation.lb: Iwer d'verwaltotig vum zo'kënftegen Deitschland, huet de Schumacher bckanntgin, datt 6cng partei categoresch ge'nt d'oftrennong vum Ruhrgebidd wir; matt enger internationaler controll wir seng partei awer averstanen.
translation.en: Regarding the administration of future Germany, Schumacher announced that his party was categorically against the separation of the Ruhr area; however, they agreed to international control.

translation.lb: O'pi weider kritik un der englescher verwaltong ze üben, sot hié weider, datt d'englesch verwaltong ze vill op de System vum Bürokratismus obgebaut wir an dofir net eso' cffcctiv fonctionne'ere kënnt, we' d'englesch regirong an d'deitsch awunner et wënsche ge'wcn.
translation.en: While continuing to criticize the English administration, he further stated that the English administration was too reliant on bureaucracy and therefore not as effectively functioning as the English government and German residents would wish.

translation.lb: De besuch vum Dr. Schumacher Jet a Frankreich zimlech schlecht opgeholl.
translation.en: Dr. Schumacher's visit was received quite poorly in France.

translation.lb: E spriecher vum franse'schen ausseministerium huet erklärt, den zeitponkt fir dese besuch wir se'er schlecht gewielt.
translation.en: A spokesperson from the French foreign ministry stated that the timing of this visit was very poorly chosen.

translation.lb: Et wir net übruecht en deitsche Politiker an England iwer d'zo' konft vun Deitschland schwätzen ze lôssen ir d'Uno oder d'ausseminister des fro iwerhapt emol opgcgraff hatten.
translation.en: It was considered inappropriate to let a German politician talk about Germany's future in England before the UN or the foreign ministers had even addressed the issue.

translation.lb: De franse'sche kréser ass et onerklärlech.
translation.en: French circles find it inexplicable.

translation.lb: we' d'englesch regirong eso' eppes kennt zo'lôssen.
translation.en: how the English government could allow such a thing.

translation.lb: Vun dèrselwechter quell get confirme'ert.
translation.en: The same source confirms.

translation.lb: datt d'franse'sch autorite'te membere vun der SPD keng erlabnes gin hun, (ir e besuch an England ze mâcheru
translation.en: that the French authorities have not given permission to SPD members to make a visit to England.

translation.lb: Frankreich nach emmer o ’ ni premierminister
translation.en: France still without a prime minister

translation.lb: Och de Georges Bidault ass gescheitert
translation.en: Even Georges Bidault has failed

translation.lb: Sozialisten a radicalsozialiste wèrten e candidat opsetzen-
translation.en: Socialists and radical socialists will propose a candidate,

translation.lb: D’sozialiste nemme fir regirong ennert kommunistescher fe’er ong-
translation.en: The socialists only want to govern under a communist guidance,

translation.lb: D’kommuniste formell ge’nt M.R.P. regirong
translation.en: Communists formally against M.R.P. governance.

translation.lb: Edouard Herriot a Felix Gouin gin am méschte genannt
translation.en: Edouard Herriot and Felix Gouin are mentioned the most.

translation.lb: Pareis. — D'kommu.niste.sch partei vu Frankreich huet geseilter hir revanche iwer d'nidderlag vu virgëschter gefeiert,
translation.en: Paris. — The Communist Party of France celebrated their revenge for the defeat of the day before yesterday,

translation.lb: andern de candidat fir d'miniaterpresiden tschaft, de jetzege Premierminister Georges Bidault net de' erfuerderlech majorite't vu stemmen op sei numm veréncgc könnt,
translation.en: when the candidate for the presidency, the current Prime Minister Georges Bidault could not gather the necessary majority of votes for his name,

translation.lb: E krut nemmen 201 stemmen, warenddém don Thorez der 259 kritt hât.
translation.en: He only received 201 votes, whereas Thorez received 259.

translation.lb: Fir de Bidault hu gestemmt sämtlech membere vum MRP eo'we' de' verschidde rechtsparteien,
translation.en: All members of the MRP along with various right-wing parties voted for Bidault,

translation.lb: d'kommunisten, d'sozialisten an d'radica.lsozialisten hun derge'nt gestemmt, wârend'dém d'Union démocratique vun der Resistenz fir hiren égene candidat Petit gestemmt huet.
translation.en: the communists, socialists, and radical socialists voted against, while the Democratic Union of Resistance voted for their own candidate Petit.

translation.lb: De nèxten dënschdeg soll e ncie versuch gemâch gin, de neie m i ni Storp resident ze wiélen.
translation.en: Next Tuesday, a new attempt will be made to elect the new minister president.

translation.lb: Et get ugeholl, datt des ke'er d'sozialisten oder d'radicalso-zialisten e candidat présente'ere wèrten,
translation.en: It is assumed that this time the socialists or radical socialists will present a candidate,

translation.lb: zemols weil d'sozialiste sech geweigert hun, eng regirong z'ënncrstëtzen, de' net vun d'e kommunisten ugefo'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: especially because the socialists have refused to support a government not led by communists.

translation.lb: Wann et gelengt e Sozialist als Premierminister durchzedrécken, da werten ongefe'er all Parteien an der neier regirong vertrnede sin mat ausnahm ower vun der repubilikanescher freihötspartel.
translation.en: If it succeeds to push through a Socialist as Prime Minister, almost all parties will be represented in the new government, except the republican freedom party.

translation.lb: Am méschte genannt gip de radicajsozial; st Edouard Herriot an den Yvon Delbos, fre'eren ausseminister,
translation.en: The most mentioned are the radical socialist Edouard Herriot and Yvon Delbos, former foreign minister,

translation.lb: wärenddem de Félix Gouin als candidat vun de Sozialisten am méschten cite'ert get.
translation.en: while Félix Gouin is most often cited as the socialist candidate.

translation.lb: Zum schluss vun der zwéter isëtzong huet de président V. Auriol erklärt, d'regirongskris misst endleeh iwerwonne gin
translation.en: At the end of the second session, President V. Auriol declared that the government crisis must finally be overcome

translation.lb: an huet en d'eheffe vun de kommunisten, Maurice Thorcz a Jacques Duclos so'we' de'je'neg vum MRP, Maurice Schumann a Robert Dclcourt agelueden an enger extraeëtzong hir ménonge bekanntzegin.
translation.en: and he invited the leaders of the communists, Maurice Thorez and Jacques Duclos, as well as those from the MRP, Maurice Schumann and Robert Delcourt, to express their opinions in an extra session.

translation.lb: No deser extrasëtzong huet ké vun denen uewegenannten eppes iwer d're<sultat vun de bespriéchonge bekannt wolle mächen.
translation.en: After this extra session, none of those mentioned wanted to make anything known about the result of the discussions.

translation.lb: Nuren d'eheffe vum MRP hun erklärt, si ge'wen hirem exécutivcomité vun der partei e rapport iwer des bespriéchongen ofléen.
translation.en: Only the leaders of the MRP declared they would submit a report to their party's executive committee about these discussions.

translation.lb: D'politesch beobachter sin der ménong, datt all parteimanöveren, de* elo agelét gin, d'oppositio'n tëscht engem lénksb-lock,
translation.en: Political observers believe that all party maneuvers now initiated will strengthen the opposition between a left bloc,

translation.lb: dé vun de kommunisten ugefo'ert get an dem anti-kommunistesche block, dé vum MRP dirige'ert get, nach me' stârk mâche wèrten.
translation.en: led by the communists, and the anti-communist bloc, led by the MRP.

translation.lb: An de kulisse vun der nationalversammlong get emmer me' fir d'zo'konft vun enger parlamentarescher regirong gefârt.
translation.en: Behind the scenes of the national assembly, concerns about the future of a parliamentary government continue to grow.

translation.lb: Trotzdém hun ail riédner, vun de kommuniste bis zur extrem rechster d'no'twennegkét ënnerstrac-h, jidfer retard an der ernennong vun engem Premierminister z'évite'eren fir „de frang ze retten".
translation.en: Nevertheless, all speakers, from the communists to the far right, emphasized the necessity of avoiding any delay in appointing a Prime Minister "to save the franc".

translation.lb: Heng partei wëllt ausschle'sslech o'ni d'bedélegong vun de kommuniis-te rege/eren,
translation.en: Each party wants to govern exclusively without the involvement of the communists,

translation.lb: mé d'majorite't wëllt hinne net d'voll verantwortong iwerlôssen.
translation.en: but the majority does not want to give them full responsibility.

translation.lb: Dorop e chef vun der kommunistescher partei an dere'schter sëtzong miatt dem saz geäntwert: „Wat haut net kënnt, muss no'tgedronge muer dach kommen."
translation.en: To that, a leader of the communist party responded in the remaining session with the phrase: "What doesn't come today must be enforced tomorrow."

translation.lb: Gëschter mueren hât d'kommunistesch partei sech versammelt, wo'bei eng resolutio'n uge-holl go'f, d-att d'kommuniste sech u kenger regirong bedélege ge'wen, dfe' vum MRP ugefe'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: Yesterday morning, the communist party met and passed a resolution that they would not participate in a government led by the MRP.

translation.lb: D'candidatur vum Maurice Thorez go'f zréckgezun.
translation.en: The candidacy of Maurice Thorez was withdrawn.

translation.lb: Op dèr anerer seit huet d'icommunistesch partei neischt ge'nt eng sozialistesch oder radicalsozialistesch presidentschaft
translation.en: On the other hand, the communist party had nothing against a socialist or radical socialist presidency.

translation.lb: Zu gleicher zeit hât och d'radicalsozialistesch partei eng versammlong an dèr beschilo3s go'f, d'candidatur vum Georges Bidault net z'ënnerstëtzen.
translation.en: At the same time, the radical socialist party held a meeting where they decided not to support Georges Bidault's candidacy.

translation.lb: Belgien entle’sst preisesch krichsgefângener Bre'ssel.
translation.en: Belgium releases Prussian prisoners of war in Brussels.

translation.lb: — D'belsch regirong huet beschloss, all preisesch krichsgefângener, de' seit dem 15. november mindestens 100 dég an de belsche kuelegro'we geschafft hun, an hir hémecht z'entlôssen.
translation.en: — The Belgian government has decided to release all Prussian prisoners of war who have worked in the Belgian coal mines for at least 100 days since November 15, to their homeland.

translation.lb: Zur bedéngong aas ower gestallt, datt.
translation.en: However, the condition was set that.

translation.lb: d'krichsgefangener mindestens 80 prozent vun der arbecht léschten, de' de beltsche kuelegruewenarbechter am durchschnitt léseht.
translation.en: the prisoners of war must complete at least 80 percent of the work that the Belgian coal miners do on average.

translation.lb: De moment sin d'Preise not un -de! verlängten 80 prozent erukomm, et _ huet nemme bis zu 71 prozent gerecht.
translation.en: At the moment, the Prussians have not yet reached the extended 80 percent, having only reached up to 71 percent.

translation.lb: Aus der Unio’n Opklärongsversammlong fir Esch/Sauer an emge’gend E sonudeg, den 8. 12. 46,
translation.en: From the Union Enlightenment Meeting for Esch/Sauer and surrounding regions on Sunday, the 8th of December, 1946,

translation.lb: fënnt em 4.00 auer nomöttes am Hôtel de la Sûre zu Esch/Sauer eng gro'ss opklärongsversammlong statt
translation.en: a large enlightenment meeting will take place at 4:00 in the afternoon at the Hôtel de la Sûre in Esch/Sauer,

translation.lb: Verschiddo membere vun dem Central- Comité schwätzen iwer all actuel) froen, de' d'OMO'li ugin.
translation.en: Various members of the Central Committee will speak about all current questions that concern the public.

translation.lb: Jiddferén ass frëndiechst invite'ert.
translation.en: Everyone is cordially invited.

translation.lb: L'NIO'N Esch/Sauer.
translation.en: The Union Esch/Sauer.

translation.lb: Ons pompjéen e’eren hire commandant L c 11 1 g e n.
translation.en: Our firefighters honor their commander.

translation.lb: — De ü. dezcmber h un ons pompjée sech owes bei hirem commandant Nicolas Zens afond, fir liini eng kleng ovatio'n duerzebrengen an him op 5 engem namensdag hir hcrzlechst glëckwcnsch z'exprime'crcn.
translation.en: On the evening of December the 11th, our firefighters gathered with their commander Nicolas Zens to give him a small ovation and express their heartfelt congratulations on his name day.

translation.lb: De Nie. ZenS liuet virun Iii joer <le pompjéscorps, dé aanz zerfall war, crem nci gruppe'ert an liaut hu mir en Clite-pompjéscorps, dé bei alle festlechkéten a begriëwnësser stramm optrëtl fir eso' matt ze hëllefen um versche'nren vuu onsem duerfliéwen.
translation.en: Mr. Zens rebuilt the firefighter corps a few years ago, which had previously fallen apart, and now we have an elite fire brigade that performs admirably at all festivities and funerals to help with securing our village's life.

translation.lb: Ons po-mpjéeu hun eng e'eresalv ofgeschoss fir liire commandant ze e'eren an hun him e klenge cadeau isverrécht an hir gléckwënsch a usgcsprach.
translation.en: Our firefighters fired a salute in honor of their commander and presented him with a small gift and expressed their congratulations.

translation.lb: Den her Nie. Zens huet du d'pompjéen invite'ert un engem banquet délzehuelen.
translation.en: Mr. Zens then invited the firefighters to participate in a banquet.

translation.lb: wo' bei giuldem iéssen a gedrénks bis spe't au <i nuecht era gefeiert go'w.
translation.en: where fine food and drinks were enjoyed, celebrating late into the night.

translation.lb: Theaterowend H oller. — De lesohte sonndeg hat ouse ioDgméderchersverein seilt esehten theaterowcnd organise erl.
translation.en: Theater evening in Holler. — Last Sunday, our young girls' club organized a real theater evening.

translation.lb: De ganz sfich huet prima geklapp!.
translation.en: The entire event went excellently!

translation.lb: Als haptstéck hurt se: „Hai dach deng m am m an e'eren", wodurch si de teidd szénen virgefo'ert hun vuu engem jonge médehen.
translation.en: As the main piece, they had: 'Always respect your mother', through which they presented various scenes of a young girl.

translation.lb: dat seng ma m m verle'sst au 110 Pareis gét.
translation.en: who leaves her mother and goes to Paris.

translation.lb: Hai fällt do ennert schlecht frëiidimien an no enger zeit kennt hat an de prixong,
translation.en: There she falls in with bad friends and after a while ends up in prison,

translation.lb: wo' et sei schlecht iliewen bereit a schliesslech dach crem hém bei seng inamm l'ënd...
translation.en: where she reflects on her bad life and finally returns home to her mother at the end...

translation.lb: do-fir liai dach deng niamin an e'eren, svel!
translation.en: therefore, always respect your mother!

translation.lb: si kann decli hole'eren!
translation.en: because she can endure so much!

translation.lb: Niklosdag 1943 *T wor an der zeit, we' d'ligcn hei d'wo'recht do't gete'nt, du sin ech ent Niklosdag dem Ziniklos bege'nt.
translation.en: Saint Nicholas Day 1943 *It was during a time when justice was served here, when I met Saint Nicholas on Saint Nicholas Day.

translation.lb: Ech ro'f iro': Gudden owendl We" gét et, her Niklos?
translation.en: I called out to him: Good evening! How are you, Mr. Nicholas?

translation.lb: Net gudd, mei jong, sot hielt du *t ass misèr an all strôss.
translation.en: Not well, my boy, he said to me, it's misery on every street.

translation.lb: Lo sin ech honnertniol schoiis bal hir, bal dur geschléft, ech fanne keng adress me', all strôss hun s'emgedéft.
translation.en: I'm nearly one hundred years old now, almost passed over, I can't find any address anymore, every street has changed.

translation.lb: Ech sin well we' widdeg durch d'deisclitert hei gerannt, a wann ech mer wëll lichten gin ech op deitscli vernannt.
translation.en: I've run wildly through the disarray here, and whenever I want to enlighten myself, they call me German.

translation.lb: A wann eso' e bâtschbo'w op preisesch mech vernennt, da brëllt en och nach emmer ech hätt net ofgeblennt!
translation.en: And when such a lad calls me Prussian, he still insists I've not dimmed the lights!

translation.lb: Och d'Chrëschtkand fënd ké licht nir dat hell genug ge'w schéngcn, fir an d'krichswurlewiesen f nés ro' a fridd ze bréngen.
translation.en: Even the Christ Child finds no light that shines bright enough to bring peace into the turmoil of war.

translation.lb: Ecb wéss menger bann ké rot me! Watt soll ech nemme mächen?
translation.en: I have no advice left to give! What should I even do?

translation.lb: Hütt jidfcrén alt eng grimmel vun dese gTëtzches sâchen.
translation.en: If only everyone had a little piece of these modest things.

translation.lb: Den armen Zinikléschen stong traureg an der strôss a vcor, we' mir, vum Hèrgott a vun der weit verlôss.
translation.en: The poor little Nicholas stood sadly in the street and was, like us, abandoned by God and the world.

translation.lb: Du frot eclt: lier Nikléschen! Ech u mech schons beduechl Dir huet dest joer kén iésel, kén ho'séckcr mattbruecht?
translation.en: Then I asked: little Nicholas! I thought you wouldn't have a donkey or a sack with you this year?

translation.lb: Hei hien! ro'f de Niklos du, nié de' ltu sech verkroch, se duecliten, dir hätt iéselen an ho'sécker genoch!
translation.en: Here he is! called Nicholas then, before he hid himself, they thought you had enough donkeys and sacks!

translation.lb: Du hun ech mam Nikléschen fro' hêrderhart gelâcht — A munnecli gudd englen hun du bei d'kanncr d'rond gemächt.
translation.en: Then I laughed heartily with little Nicholas — And quite a few good angels danced around the children.

translation.lb: A w-c' seng schell geklonk huet de' matt der sëlwer bimmel, du ro'f ech: Merci Kléschen! a sturt voll fréd ge'nt himmel.
translation.en: And when his bell rang with the silver bell, I called out: Thank you, little Nicholas! and fell full of joy towards the sky.

translation.lb: Log och dat joer um teller vill mores — matt vill sputt, all liierz or voller hoffnong, voll héinechtsle'ft a mutt.
translation.en: Even this year began with many manners — with much encouragement, all hearts were full of hope, full of brightness of life and courage.

translation.lb: L. M
translation.en: L. M.

translation.lb: „Barblendag“ De'fferdeng. — „Barblendag", dat traditionellt fest vun onse biergarbechter, go'f op eng wirdeg mane'er begangen.
translation.en: "Barblendag" Differdange. — "Barblendag," the traditional festival of our miners, was celebrated in a dignified manner.

translation.lb: Frédeg huet et muerges vor. onse bitrger gekracht, we' d'mineuren sech op „Thüle» bierg" versammelt hun, fir d'helleg Barbara aus hirer grott ze hiéwen an op hiren égene schël'ieren an d'kîreh ze droen, wo' hir zu e'eren eng fcierlech mass ofgehale go'f.
translation.en: Friday morning it began with the noise of our town, as the miners gathered on 'Thüle' mountain to lift Saint Barbara from her grotto and carry her on their own shoulders to the church, where a solemn mass was held in her honor.

translation.lb: An songer festpriédegt feiert den hèr pasch-to'er d'helleg Barbara als kinegin, der all mineuren, de' dax rauh an hart sin we' hirt schwe'ert handwierk, dach immer hirer Barbara a le'ft ugehe'eren a ni emsoss hir mäehteg hëllef ugefleht hun.
translation.en: In his special sermon, the pastor celebrated Saint Barbara as a queen, to whom all miners, whose days are rough and hard like their difficult craft, always devotedly belong and never in vain have sought her mighty help.

translation.lb: No der mass go'f St. Barbara am cortège, dé vun der stadmusek gefo'ert war, durch d'strôsse gedroen fir durno erem an hir grott op den „Thillebierg" gesät ze gin zum weidere schütz vun alle mineuren.
translation.en: After the mass, Saint Barbara was carried in a procession, led by the town music, through the streets to then be placed back in her grotto on 'Thillebierg' for continued protection of all miners.

translation.lb: Dé sche'ne Barblendag go'f beschloss durch e gesellegen owend vun on.se biergarbechter am sali Federspiel.
translation.en: The beautiful Barblendag concluded with a convivial evening of our miners in the Federspiel hall.

translation.lb: Nazidocteren hun zu Ravensbrück ennert dem deckmantel vun der wëssenschaft greilech verbriéche begângen, an zu Nürn berg sollen si elo ofgeurtélt gin.
translation.en: Nazi doctors committed gruesome crimes under the guise of science in Ravensbrück, and they are now to be judged in Nuremberg.

translation.lb: — Zu Hamburg kucken d’KZ-wiéchter hirer strof entge’nt Nürnberg.
translation.en: In Hamburg, the concentration camp guards await their judgment in Nuremberg.

translation.lb: — (Reuter).
translation.en: — (Reuter).

translation.lb: — De 9. dezember ass zu Nürnberg de praiess ge'nt 23 doeteren a wëssenschaftler vum frae-KZ vu Ravensbrück ugängen.
translation.en: On December 9th, the trial against 23 doctors and scientists from the Ravensbrück female concentration camp began in Nuremberg.

translation.lb: Ge'nt de' verbriechen, de' hinnen zur lascht geluegt gi sin, nämlech ënnert dem deckmantel vun der wëssenschait morde begangen zu hun — hu säiptlech uge-klot sech onschölleg erklärt.
translation.en: Against the crimes they are accused of, namely having committed murder under the guise of science, all the defendants have pleaded not guilty.

translation.lb: Desen ass den e'schte vun déne klenge Nürnberger prozesser.
translation.en: This is the first of the smaller Nuremberg trials.

translation.lb: D'ugeklot halen also hir aussoen, de' se den 21. novémber an der enquête gemach haten, nach emmer opreçht.
translation.en: The defendants therefore still maintain the statements they made on November 21st during the inquiry.

translation.lb: Desc prozess, dé bis an de februaf dauere soll, spillt sech virun engem gericht of, üat sech aus 3 amerikanasche lichteren zesummesetzt.
translation.en: This trial, which is to last until February, is conducted before a court composed of three American judges.

translation.lb: D'ugeklot setzen op déneselwechte bünken, op denen de Coering a seng compliien sengerzeit och plaz gcholl haten.
translation.en: The defendants sit on the same benches where Goering and his accomplices once sat.

translation.lb: An der uklo héscht et, des doeteren harten d'gc'gner vum Reich, krichsgefângencr an aner häftlengen aus de konzentratio'nslageren derzo' benotzt, fir hir so'genannt wesseaschaftlech experimenter um liéwege kîrper ze mächen.
translation.en: The indictment states that these doctors used enemies of the Reich, prisoners of war, and other detainees from concentration camps to conduct their so-called scientific experiments on living bodies.

translation.lb: Masse vun häftlenge go'wen a kümmeren agespart, de' ennert en atmosphärendrock gesät go'wen, we' en an der he'cht vun 21 000 meter bestét,
translation.en: Masses of detainees were locked in chambers and subjected to atmospheric pressure equivalent to that at an altitude of 21,000 meters.

translation.lb: Aner ugeklote sollen un den häftlengen afre'- erongsexperimenter gemäch hun, fir erauszefannen, bis zu wellechem grad de mënschleche kierper widderstandsfäheg wir.
translation.en: Other defendants are said to have conducted freezing experiments on the detainees to determine the extent to which the human body could resist.

translation.lb: Enner anerem b u si folgend experimenter dupchgefo'ert: animpfong vup der malaria fir matt serummen a nareotiquen experimenter mächen ze kennen,
translation.en: Among others, the following experiments were conducted: injecting malaria to experiment with serums and narcotics,

translation.lb: d'pre'fong vum menschlcchc widderstand gc'nt de moschtergas, fir d'anlirgasbchandlong anszeprobe'eren,
translation.en: testing human resistance against mustard gas to try out gas treatments,

translation.lb: sterilisatio'n vun dausende vun häftlengen durch allerhand expérimental methoden.
translation.en: sterilization of thousands of detainees using various experimental methods.

translation.lb: Et gct ugeholl, datt dem Hitler sei fre'ere lcibdocter, de Karl Brandt, d'haptv roll an dcscm prozess spille wert.
translation.en: It is assumed that Hitler's former personal physician, Karl Brandt, will play a leading role in this trial.

translation.lb: Samschdeg, de 7. dezember — Zu Lelzeburg get de Ferd. Spierkel zum do't durch ersclie'sse verurtélt.
translation.en: Saturday, December 7 — In Luxembourg, Ferd. Spierkel is sentenced to death by shooting.

translation.lb: — De John Lewis get de kuelenarbech ter uweisong, einstweilen d'arbecht nés opzehuelen.
translation.en: — John Lewis is assigned to the coal work, for the time being to resume the work.

translation.lb: — Et get gemellt, de Stalin gc'f un lièrz krankhéte leiden.
translation.en: — It is reported, Stalin is suffering from a serious illness.

translation.en: — CAPITOLS Katherine Hepburn SON OF THE DRAGON Children not admitted 2:15-5—8:30
