translation.lb: An enger länger déclaratio'n iwer d'amcrikancsch politik vis-à-vis vu China huet de président Truman openeis beto'nt, datt Amerika de gencralissime Tschang Kai Chek ënnerstëtzt.
translation.en: In a lengthy declaration regarding American policy towards China, President Truman openly emphasized that America supports Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek.

translation.lb: De président huet erënnert un d'déclaratio'n vum lèschte joer, we' Amerika d'nationalregirong unerknnt huet.
translation.en: The President recalled the declaration from last year, when America recognized the national government.

translation.lb: „Onse standponkt vun démols huet sech nach net geännert."
translation.en: "Our stance from then has not changed."

translation.lb: An der déclaratio'n get bedauert, datt d'énhét a China nach emmer net verwirklecht ass: „Mir si berét, fir China a sengem kämpf em de fridden ze hëllefen an et z'ënnerstëtzen, fir eng wirkleeh demoeratesch régiront anzusetzen."
translation.en: The declaration laments that unity in China has still not been achieved: "We are ready to help China in its struggle for peace and to support it in establishing a truly democratic government."

translation.lb: De président hiéwt ervir, datt d'Import and Export Bank fir China eng zomm vu 500 millio'nen dollar reserve'ert huet an erklärt: „Amerika ass berét, fir un der wirtschaftleeher reconstructio'n vu China mattzehëliefen, wann eng besserong an der situatio'n agetratt ass."
translation.en: The President highlighted that the Import and Export Bank has reserved a sum of 500 million dollars for China and stated: "America is ready to help with the economic reconstruction of China when an improvement in the situation occurs."

translation.lb: Amerika ass ugeklot gin, et ge'f sech o'ni recht an d'affaire vu China amëschen.
translation.en: America has been accused of interfering in China's affairs without right.

translation.lb: Zo' desem ponkt huet de président Truman bemiérkt: „Ons stellorg ass kloer.
translation.en: On this point, President Truman remarked: "Our position is clear.

translation.lb: Mir bleiwen aus dem innere kämpf eraus, mé mir bedreiwen eng politik, fir dem chinesesche vollek ze hëllefen de fridden eremzefannen a ser.g économie nés opzebauen."
translation.en: We stay out of the internal struggle, but we pursue a policy to help the Chinese people regain peace and rebuild their economy."

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch truppebestänn a China si vun 113.000 mann op manner we' 12.000 reduze'ert gin, an de président Truman huet versprach, datt dese contingent och nach reduze'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: The American troop presence in China has been reduced from 113,000 men to less than 12,000, and President Truman promised that this contingent will be further reduced.

translation.lb: „De generol Marshall ass als aussergewe'nleche gesandten a China geschéckt gin, well Amerika eng ie'song zo' den actuelle schwieregkét sieht.
translation.en: "General Marshall was sent to China as an extraordinary envoy because America sees a solution to the current difficulty.

translation.lb: De piang vun der militärescher unificatio'n wor schwe'er ze réalise'eren we'nt dem birgerkrich, mé et konnten ower prinzipiell accord'cn ofgeschloss gin.
translation.en: The plan for military unification was difficult to achieve due to the civil war, but some principal agreements could be concluded.

translation.lb: Mir hoffen, datt ons wënsch sech matt de wënsch vum chincsesche vollek decken."
translation.en: We hope that our wishes align with the wishes of the Chinese people."

translation.lb: De président Truman schle'sst seng déclaratio'n matt folgende wiérder: „Mir verfollegen ons politik weider, si ass basc'ert op dem respect vun der nationaler souverainite't an op der traditionnelles frëndschaft tëschcnt onse Völker."
translation.en: President Truman concluded his declaration with the following words: "We continue to pursue our policy, which is based on respect for national sovereignty and on the traditional friendship between our peoples."

translation.lb: Barromäusbibliothe’k Eltelbréck. -- De lèschten dënschdeg go'f ons Barromäusbi'bliothe'k erem opgemâch.
translation.en: Barromäus Library Ettelbrück. -- Last Tuesday, our Barromäus Library was reopened.

translation.lb: Si ass an engem sali viim prîmârscho'igébei ënnerbruecht gin, wo' all dënschdes tëscliend hatwer zwo' an lialwer ve'er bicher ausgele'nt gin.
translation.en: It is housed in a hall of the primary school building, where every Tuesday between two and four o'clock, books are lent out.

translation.lb: Trotzdém dé gre'ssten dél vum virkrichsbestand vum occupant beschlagnahmt go'f, slin Ho crem ca. (K)0 bann de liéser zur disposition.
translation.en: Despite the fact that the largest part of the pre-war stock was confiscated by the occupier, there are approximately (K)0 volumes available to the readers.

translation.lb: Durch intressant neiuschâfonge soll d'bi'bliothe'k an der nèxtcr zeit ausgebaut gin.
translation.en: Through interesting new acquisitions, the library is expected to be expanded in the near future.

translation.lb: De bichercatulog, dén an den e'schten dég erschéngt, wèrd allen intressenten c practesche wéweiser gin.
translation.en: The book catalog, which appears in the first days, will serve as a practical guide for all interested parties.

translation.lb: Mir hoffen, datt ons Barroniäusbibliothe'k. de' virum krieh bal DOOO bann emfûsst huel, a we'nege jocren erem amstand ass, aile klassen a liéwensaItéré vun onser populatio n eng intressant a wertvoll reclure ze bidden.
translation.en: We hope that our Barromäus Library, which before the war had nearly DOOO volumes, will once again, in a few years, be able to offer an interesting and valuable selection to all classes and ages of our population.

translation.lb: Den èrzherzog vun Habsburg krichsverbriecher Budapest.
translation.en: The Archduke of Habsburg war criminal Budapest.

translation.lb: — D'ongarescht öffentlecht ministerium huet e freideg dem ongaresche volleksgerîcht den ukloact ge'nt den èrzherzog vun Habsburg iwerrécht.
translation.en: The Hungarian public ministry submitted an indictment against the Archduke of Habsburg to the Hungarian people's court on Friday.

translation.lb: Den èrzherzog wor fre'er président vun der chamber a vun der ongarescher wëssenschaftlecher académie.
translation.en: The Archduke was formerly president of the chamber and of the Hungarian scientific academy.

translation.lb: Den èrzherzog, dem sein openthalt de moment net bekannt ass, huet eng gewëssen zeit an E'streich gewunnt.
translation.en: The Archduke, whose whereabouts are currently unknown, lived for some time in Austria.

translation.lb: Hié get dofir „in contumaciam" we'nst „krichshetzong, faschistesch Propaganda an als stëtz vun der ongarescher collaborationistescher organisatio'n „Pfeilkreuzler", de' ënnert dem Syalassy stong, verurtélt.
translation.en: He is therefore being sentenced "in absentia" for "war-mongering, fascist propaganda, and as a supporter of the Hungarian collaborationist organization "Arrow Cross", which was under Szálasi's leadership.

translation.lb: Dem èrzherzog sein immenst verme'gcu ass bei der Iiberatio'n vun der ongarescher regirong confisque'ert gin.
translation.en: The Archduke's immense wealth was confiscated during the liberation of the Hungarian government.

translation.lb: De boycott a Palestina Jerusalem.
translation.en: The boycott in Palestine Jerusalem.

translation.lb: — Offiziell get mattgedélt, datt d'palestinensesch polizei eng descente an d'btiroc vum arabesche comité fir de boycottage a Palestina gemäch huet,
translation.en: — It is officially reported that the Palestinian police conducted a raid on the office of the Arab committee for the boycott in Palestine,

translation.lb: Verschidde membere vum comité si yerhaft gin.
translation.en: Several members of the committee have been arrested.

translation.lb: Eng gewesse quantite't vu wueren, de' jüddescher hirkonft sin, si confisque'ert gin.
translation.en: A certain quantity of goods, which are of Jewish origin, have been confiscated.

translation.lb: Des wuere sti bei der polizei am verdacht, datt sc vum boycott-comité bei Araber confisque'ert si gin, de' dem comité seng uerder, all jüddesch wueren ze boycotte'ereh, riet befollegt hun.
translation.en: These goods are suspected by the police of being confiscated by the boycott committee from Arabs who have strictly followed the committee's orders to boycott all Jewish goods.

translation.lb: Den arabesche boycottage-comité wor am juli 1946 durch den iéweschte comité fir Palestina forrae'- ert gin.
translation.en: The Arab boycott committee was established in July 1946 by the supreme committee for Palestine.

translation.lb: Sein zweck ass et, de boycott vum industrielle, kulturelle, sozialen a professionnelle liéwe vun de judden ze boycotte'erçn,
translation.en: Its purpose is to boycott the industrial, cultural, social, and professional life of the Jews,

translation.lb: de'je'neg, de' d'boycottuerder nct befollcgen. ze bestrofen a schliesslech fir de' jong arabesch Industrien, de' artikelen hirstellen, de' bi'S de moment nemme vu judde fabrize'ert go'wen, z'encourage'- eren.
translation.en: to punish those who do not comply with the boycott orders, and finally to encourage young Arab industries that produce articles which until now were only manufactured by Jews.

translation.lb: De boycottage-comité hât gedrét, c ge'f vu sämtlechen Araber, de' d'boycottuerder net befollege ge'wen, eng „schwärz lëscht" opstellen, de' an der &rabescher press publize'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: The boycott committee threatened that a "blacklist" would be compiled of all Arabs who have not complied with the boycott orders, which would be published in the Arab press.

translation.lb: Juegd Méch el b ue h. — Vum 1. bis den 31. october ass et gesctzlech erlâbl, den hirschste'er ze sche'ssen.
translation.en: Hunting Notice - From the 1st to the 31st of October, it is legally permitted to shoot stags.

translation.lb: Bis elo ass et onse jéer nach net gegléckt, eso' e prachtde'er ne'erzeléen.
translation.en: So far, we have not succeeded in spotting a magnificent stag this year.

translation.lb: Kîrz'lech go'f en hirschruddel vu 9 stéck am hellen dag op onser gewân gesin.
translation.en: Recently, a herd of 9 deer was seen in broad daylight on our land.

translation.lb: Well de' hirsche sech net emmer an ohsc bescher ophaien, nié och emol fir danger zeit op d'nopeschjuegdreve'cr iwerwiésseelen, ass de wëldschued, dén si hei mâchcn, zimlecb kleng.
translation.en: Since the deer do not always stay in the same thickets and sometimes move to neighboring hunting grounds for longer periods, the wildlife damage they cause here is rather small.

translation.lb: Fir datl d'hirsche net ganz ausgerott gin, bleiwt d'juegd op d'hirschko' an d'hirschkallef am lafen.de juegdjoer zo'.
translation.en: To prevent the deer from being entirely exterminated, the hunt for hinds and calves remains ongoing for the hunting year.

translation.lb: „Ons Jongen“ feieren Monnerech.
translation.en: "Ons Jongen" celebrate Monnerech.

translation.lb: — Fir e sonndeg, de 27. october, huet d'Ugue „Ons Jongen" festivite'ten organisc'ert.
translation.en: — For a Sunday, the 27th of October, the group "Ons Jongen" has organized festivities.

translation.lb: All Patrioten, de' de jongen am krich gehollef hun, kre'en ëffentlech merci gesol.
translation.en: All patriots who helped the youth in the war will receive a public thank you.

translation.lb: Zu gleicher zeit get dé neio fuendel ageweiht.
translation.en: At the same time, the new banner will be consecrated.

translation.lb: Hei de Programm:
translation.en: Here is the program:

translation.lb: 2.SO auer: Empfank vun den autorite'ten an de vereiner bei der scho'l zu Monnerech;
translation.en: 2.30 pm: Reception of the authorities and the associations at the school in Monnerech;

translation.lb: 3.00 auer: Opstellong vuin cortège;
translation.en: 3.00 pm: Assembly of the procession;

translation.lb: 3.13 auer: Ofmarsch vum cortège;
translation.en: 3.15 pm: Departure of the procession;

translation.lb: -1.00 auer: Réuniû'n am porupjéssall;
translation.en: 4.00 pm: Meeting in the parish hall;

translation.lb: nsprôch vum gencrolsecrétaire vun der ligue „Ons Jongen", Romain Fandel;
translation.en: Speech by the General Secretary of the league "Ons Jongen", Romain Fandel;

translation.lb: iwerréchong vum fuendel un d'sectio'n;
translation.en: Handover of the banner to the section;

translation.lb: usprôch vum président vun der sectio'n Monnerech, Sylvain Grem'ling;
translation.en: Speech by the president of the Monnerech section, Sylvain Gremling;

translation.lb: iwerréchong vun den diplomer a plaquetten.
translation.en: Presentation of the diplomas and plaques.

translation.lb: Schlusswuert vuin lièr Pierre Bicheler, burgerméschler a président vun der Entente vu Monnerech.
translation.en: Closing words by Mr. Pierre Bicheler, mayor and president of the Union of Monnerech.

translation.lb: Eng dichteg telefonséquipe CliSrf.
translation.en: A reliable telephone team CliSrf.

translation.lb: De' lèscht woch huet d'ar bechtercölonn vun der technesclirr abteilong vun der postverwallong ons uerlschafl verlôss.
translation.en: Last week, the auxiliary column of the technical department of the postal administration left us here in the area.

translation.lb: nodëm si a me'ntlânger arbeclit d'telefnnsnetz erem hirgesiatlt hâtcn.
translation.en: After they had successfully restored the telephone network after a lengthy effort.

translation.lb: Zënler dem mé hu si hei an an der emge'gend geschafft an hu vit:! derzo' heigedroen an dé sinistre'erten diérfer Vilm canton Oliérf zê normalise'eren.
translation.en: Since the beginning of the month, they have been working here and in the surrounding area and have contributed significantly to normalizing the devastated villages in the canton of Olierf.

translation.lb: Dem colonnefiihrer Seywert a sengen arbechter eil hfrzleche tnerci!
translation.en: A heartfelt thank you to Colonel Leader Seywert and his workers!

translation.en: Land estates -II ensdref. — At the auction held by Madame J Birgen-Schimberg from Hensdref the following properties were sold: 1) a piece, near Maximeinerbësch, 1 ha 74 ar for 17,000 francs to farmer Ch. Regenwetter from here;

translation.en: 2) a piece, near Maximcinerbësch, 90 ar, for 60,000 francs to farmer P. Lemmer from here;

translation.en: 3) a piece, at Elterchen, 17 ar 40 ca, for 1,000 francs to farmer P. Lemmer from here;

translation.en: 4) a piece, on Hangeniefchen, 10 ar 16 ca, was not sold;

translation.en: 9) a piece, on Hiéhl, 21 ar 90 ca, for 6,000 francs to farmer Fr. Birgen from here;

translation.lb: 10) e Stéck tnatt plérch, an der Ro'tz, 1 ha 19 ar 20 ca dem bauer Fr. Birgen zo' unbekanntem p.-c s:
translation.en: 10) a piece with pasture, in Ro'tz, 1 ha 19 ar 20 ca, to farmer Fr. Birgen at unknown price;

translation.lb: 11) eng wiss, bei de Stengen, 20 ar 80 ca, f; r 6000 frailg dem bauer Fr. Birgen vun bei;

translation.en: 12) a meadow, near Stengen, 26 ar 70 ca, for 4,000 francs to farmer Fr. Birgen from here;

translation.en: 13) a meadow, on Basc'nelt, 14 ar 90 ca, for 2,000 to farmer M. Trierweiler from Luerentzweiler;

translation.en: 14) a meadow, in Scharfendal, 91 ar 10 ca, for 37,000 francs to farmer Ad. Schmit from Pretten.

translation.lb: Kurz bemierkt...
translation.en: Briefly noted...

translation.lb: D'Europaméschterschaften am schwammen fannen tëschent dem 3. an dem /. September 1947 zu Monaco an der piscine vu Palm Beach Statt.
translation.en: The European Swimming Championships take place between the 3rd and the 7th of September 1947 in Monaco at the Palm Beach pool.

translation.lb: _ Den engl esche basketball huet e richtege „boom" ze verzéchnen.
translation.en: _ English basketball is experiencing a real "boom".

translation.lb: Virum krieh huet England kaum 5.000 spiller gezielt» mé nodém d'zaldote matt den amerikanesche basketspiller a kontakt komm sin, konnten de' verschidde clubben bis zu 2.000 member affllie'eren.
translation.en: Before the war, England had barely 5,000 players, but after the soldiers came into contact with American basketball players, various clubs were able to affiliate up to 2,000 members.

translation.lb: Dat nächst joer huelen si fir d'e'schte ke'er un den Olympesche spiller dél.
translation.en: Next year, they participate for the first time in the Olympic Games.

translation.lb: Den tennistournoi vu Mexico go'f vum Frank Parker gewonn.
translation.en: The tennis tournament in Mexico was won by Frank Parker.

translation.lb: Am simple blo'w hié sieger iwer den Segura matt 6-4, 6-8, 6-3, 5-7.
translation.en: In the men's singles, he won against Segura with 6-4, 6-8, 6-3, 5-7.

translation.lb: Am double-messieurs hun Parker-Falkeburg matt 12-10, 6-3, 7-5 ge'nt Segura-Drussel gewonn.
translation.en: In men's doubles, Parker-Falkeburg won against Segura-Drussel with 12-10, 6-3, 7-5.

translation.lb: Den double-dames go'f gewonn vun Mlles Osborne-Brouge ge'nt Mlles Betz-Hart matt 6-3, 9-7.
translation.en: The ladies' doubles were won by Mlles Osborne-Brouge against Mlles Betz-Hart with 6-3, 9-7.

translation.lb: D’belsch-hollännesch-letzeburgesch zollunio’n Den Haag.
translation.en: The Belgian-Dutch-Luxembourgish customs union The Hague.

translation.lb: — Aus gudd ennerrîchte kréser get gemellt, datt d'belsch-hollänneschletzeburgesch zollunio'n net den 1. november a krâft triéde kann, we' den accord et virgeseit.
translation.en: - Well-informed circles report that the Belgian-Dutch-Luxembourgish customs union cannot take effect on November 1st as the agreement states.

translation.lb: D'énhétlech tarifer si féx a fèrdeg, mé si musse nach vun den intresse'erte parlamenter iwerpre'ft gin.
translation.en: The unified tariffs are fixed and ready, but they still need to be reviewed by the interested parliaments.

translation.lb: Et kann ugehcll gin, datt den énhétszolltarif vum januar oder vum februar un a krâft trëtt.
translation.en: It can be assumed that the unified customs tariff will come into effect in January or February.

translation.lb: De' érhétlech accisentarifer triéden doge'nt ere'scht an zeit vu 6 me'nt a krâft.
translation.en: However, the increased excise tariffs will only come into effect after 6 months.

translation.lb: Sobal d'belsch-hollännesch-letzeburgesch zollunio'n a krâft trëtt, fe'eren de' drei länner hir verhandlonge mam ausländ zesummen.
translation.en: As soon as the Belgian-Dutch-Luxembourgish customs union comes into effect, the three countries will conduct their negotiations with foreign countries together.

translation.lb: China um krichsfo’ss Kalgan an den hänn vun de nationalisten Nanking.
translation.en: China on a war footing: Kalgan in the hands of the Nanking nationalists.

translation.lb: Iii oct. — Eng he'ch gestallte perse'nlechkct huet gemelit, d'slad Kaigan, de' vun de chinesesche kommunisle verzwei weit verdédegt go'f, wir vun de chinesesche regirongslruppen ageboll gin.
translation.en: III Oct. — A high-ranking individual has reported that the city of Kalgan, which was valiantly defended by the Chinese communists, has been taken by the Chinese government troops.

translation.lb: De generol Tschang Kai Scheck ass gëschter inneren zum président vun der chinesesclicr vepublik eremgewiélt gin.
translation.en: General Chiang Kai-shek was re-elected as president of the Chinese republic yesterday.

translation.lb: E communiqué, dé gëschter erauskomm ass, besét, datt de gcnexol Tschang Kai Scheck d'militärcontroll iwert sämllech ziviladministratio'nen ercm hirgesUMt hält.
translation.en: A communiqué issued yesterday states that General Chiang Kai-shek maintains military control over all civilian administrations.

translation.lb: Durch des mesure, vun dèr ongeîe'er 300 millio'ne perso'ne betraft gin, ass China practesch.
translation.en: Through this measure, which affects roughly 300 million people, China is practically.

translation.lb: op krichsfo'ss gesat gin.
translation.en: put on a war footing.

translation.lb: AU Chinese vun 18 bis 43 joer kennen direct zu de waffe geruff gin.
translation.en: All Chinese from 18 to 43 years old can be directly called to arms.

translation.lb: De generol Tschang Kai Scheck huet des mesure ergraff, well en agesin huet, datt matt de kommuniste ké fridde me'glecli ass.
translation.en: General Chiang Kai-shek has taken this measure because he realized that peace with the communists is not possible.

translation.lb: Als bedéngong zu eugein waffestëllstand hâten des d'astellong vun der nationalistescher offensive op Kalgan gefuerdert.
translation.en: As a condition for a ceasefire, they had demanded the halt of the nationalist offensive on Kalgan.

translation.lb: Kréser aus der emgebong vum amerikanesche generol Marshall, dé sech emsoss beme't huet, de fridden tëscht be'de Parteien ze vermëttelen.
translation.en: Circles around the American General Marshall, who tried in vain to mediate peace between the two parties.

translation.lb: demente'eren, datt de Marshall sech virberéde ge'f, ereni an Amerika zréckzegoen.
translation.en: Report that Marshall is preparing to return to America.

translation.lb: Generol Tschang Kai Scheck dé virgëschter zum president vun der chinesescher republik eremgewiélt gin ass
translation.en: General Chiang Kai-shek, who was re-elected as president of the Chinese republic the day before yesterday

translation.lb: Ofkommen twer de’ deitsch industrie-patenter Zwiéief länner, dobei och Letzeburg, hun en accord gemâch iwer de' preisesch patenter.
translation.en: An agreement concerning the German industrial patents has been made between countries, including Luxembourg, regarding the Prussian patents.

translation.lb: „Die Patente sollen zur freien Verfügung der Angehörigen der am Abkommen beteiligten Staaten gestellt werden.
translation.en: "The patents are to be freely available to the citizens of the states involved in the agreement.

translation.lb: Ausserdem soll durch das Abkommen verhindert werden, dass diese Patente zukünftig wieder an ihre ehemaligen deutschen Besitzer zurückfallen können."
translation.en: Furthermore, the agreement is supposed to prevent these patents from falling back into the hands of their former German owners in the future."

translation.lb: (E. T. 2. oct.) Et handelt sech em 100.000 patenter.
translation.en: (E. T. 2nd Oct.) It concerns 100,000 patents.

translation.lb: Den accord soll verhënneren, datt d'Preise wirtschaftlech erem zevill stärk gin.
translation.en: The agreement aims to prevent the Prussians from becoming economically too strong again.

translation.lb: Watfir patenter sollen dann a letzeburgesch hänn. kommen?
translation.en: Which patents are supposed to come into Luxembourgish hands, then?

translation.lb: Den 20. 9. 45. Matt der flemm si mer schlofe gâng, matt der filetnm si mir erem opgestan.
translation.en: On the 20th of September '45, we went to sleep reluctantly, and reluctantly we got up again.

translation.lb: Dat gudd icsse bei den offize'er huet mir och net me' geschmâcht.
translation.en: Even the good food with the officers didn't taste good to me anymore.

translation.lb: Dagsiwer, wa mir net grad op onse matrazen ze schlofe lo'gen, si mir durch de' verlôssen heiser gestrolcht, hun no brauchbare sâche gesiebt, fir onst zëmmer me' sche'n ze mächen, hun al bicher an opzéchnonge vun den SS durchwullt, hu gehummert a genélt, nemme fir an der bewegong ze bleiwen an net un bém ze denken.
translation.en: During the day, when we weren't lying on our mattresses sleeping, we strolled through the abandoned houses, searched for usable things to make our room nicer, rummaged through old books and records of the SS, hammered and nailed, just to stay in motion and not think about home.

translation.lb: Em 12 auer haut de mëfcteg ko'm é Russ an engem otem an on se bloc gelaf an huet ons matt dénen onme'glechsten armverenkongen kloer gemäch, datt mir ons sâchen zesummepâcke sollten...
translation.en: At 12 o'clock a Russian came in a hurry into our block and made it clear with the most impossible arm movements that we should pack our things...

translation.lb: „Franzuskis weg!... dawei da.wei,... snell snell... na kommandature!"
translation.en: "Frenchies out!... come on, come on,... fast fast... to the command post!"

translation.lb: Ech mengen hie war an desem moment me' fro' we' mir, well mir hun nach un de sâch gezweiwelt, mir wäre schons eso' oft genarrt gin an waren an der sâch vum hémgoen zimlech misstrauesch gin.
translation.en: I think he was more excited than us at that moment, because we still doubted it, we had been tricked so often and had become quite suspicious about going home.

translation.lb: Onst spréohwuert war: mix gléwen et net bis datt mir am zuch sëtzen, an dann nach net, bis datt mir dohém sin.
translation.en: Our saying was: don't believe it until we're on the train, and then not even until we're home.

translation.lb: A kaum fënnef minute ston'ge mir matt sàck a pâck vrun der russescher commandantur, vruni russesche commandant.
translation.en: And within barely five minutes, we stood with our bags and belongings in front of the Russian commandant's office, in front of a Russian commander.

translation.lb: Hién huet ons a geschwollene wiérder nach eng sehe' riéd gehalen, de' mir net verstan hun, mé hien hätt seng wiérder kenne spueren, well vun ons huet dach ké nogelaruschitert... bestëmmt huet schons jidderén sech dohém gesin zur vischter dier era goen... „moien, hei sin echl"...
translation.en: He gave us a long-winded speech that we didn't understand, but he could have saved his words, because none of us understood Russian... surely everyone had already envisioned themselves at home going through the front door... "hello, I'm here"...

translation.lb: Matt engem lastauto, den de commandant extra zur verfiigoag gestallt hat, go'f onst gepäck op d'gare vun Oppeln gefo'- ert a mir si we' de blëtz hannendru marsche'ext.
translation.en: With a truck that the commander had specially provided, our luggage was taken to the station in Opole, and we marched after it like lightning.

translation.lb: Henriette.... Virgedréckt remerciements-käTtercher schéckt nemmen, fir op eng kärtchen oder en tedegraram merci ze soen.

translation.en: Nurmi has no record anymore.

translation.en: The famous Finn Paavo Nurmi, who set 16 world records, has not been the record holder of Finland for a few days now.

translation.en: Since 1930, Nurmi held the Finnish record for 20 km (1.4.38 4/10).

translation.en: This time was also the world record until 1936, when Zabala improved it to i. 4 2/10.

translation.en: Zabala himself was beaten by the Hungarian Csalpar in 1941 with 1.3.14/10.

translation.en: In Helsinki, the marathon winner of Oslo also took Nurmi's last Finnish record over 20 km with a time of 1.4.26 4/10.

translation.en: Briefly noted... — As we have already reported, the international football federation has banned all matches with Russian teams until Russia joins the federation.

translation.lb: Et gel erward, datt och d'athletikfederatio'n de'- selwecht mesuren ergreift, zemol well no dem championnat vun Oslo de' russesoh athlete vun hirer regirong remunere'ert go'wen.
translation.en: It is expected that the athletics federation will take the same measures, especially since after the championship in Oslo the Russian athletes were remunerated by their government.

translation.lb: — De Racing Club vu Pareis ass net se'er stolz op seng positio'n an der championnatstabelle an huet wälle», sein team durch zwe' auslännesch spiller ze verstärken.
translation.en: — The Racing Club of Paris is not very proud of its position in the league table and wants to strengthen its team with two foreign players.

translation.lb: De Wiener centerstirmer Epp soll mol a fro kommen.
translation.en: The Viennese center-forward Epp is being considered.

translation.lb: — Zu London get ugeholl, datt momentan 120 millio'ne velo'en uechter d'welt zirkule'eren, Dorunner wäre bedélegt: England matt 12 millio'nen, Frankreich an Amerika matt je 10 millio'nen.
translation.en: — In London, it is assumed that currently 120 million bicycles are circulating around the world, with contributions from: England with 12 million, France and America with 10 million each.

translation.lb: An Dänemarkt kennt 1 velo op 1 3/4 awunner, an Holland an a Schweden 1 velo op 2 awunner, an der Schweiz, a Frankreich, Belgien, England 1 velo op 4 awunner.
translation.en: In Denmark, there is 1 bicycle per 1 and 3/4 inhabitants, in Holland and Sweden 1 bicycle per 2 inhabitants, in Switzerland, France, Belgium, and England 1 bicycle per 4 inhabitants.

translation.lb: — Fir de fo'ssbailmatch England-Continent (10. mé 1947 zu Glasgow) get matt engem publicumsbesuch vu ronn 150.000 leidd gerechent.
translation.en: — For the football match England-Continent (May 10, 1947, in Glasgow), an attendance of around 150,000 people is expected.

translation.lb: We'- 1937 England ge'nt Schottland op demsolwechte Stadion gespült hun, wor d'recordzuel vun 149.547 Zuschauer errécht gin.
translation.en: When England played against Scotland in 1937 at the same stadium, the record number of 149,547 spectators was reached.

translation.lb: D'directio'n envisage'ert eng vergre'sserong vum Stadion, so'- datt hiéen 200.000 leidd soll fässe kennen.
translation.en: The management is planning an enlargement of the stadium so it could accommodate 200,000 people.

translation.lb: Et ass ower nach eng fro, ob des arbechten fir de mé 1947 fërdeg gestallt kenne gin.
translation.en: But it is still a question if these works can be completed by May 1947.

translation.en: — The American coal export to Europe for November will most likely not meet the forecasts.

translation.en: The quota for December is set at 1,135,000 tons, which is 283,000 tons less than in November.

translation.en: Luxembourgish viticulture

translation.lb: Den Echo de l'Industrie (2. nov. 1946) publize'ert en intressanten artikel iwer de muselwein.
translation.en: The Echo of Industry (November 2, 1946) published an interesting article about Moselle wine.

translation.lb: D'land wéss, datt de wein eso' rar ass, well d'recolte vu 1944 a 1945 verluer gânge sin.
translation.en: The country knows that wine is so rare because the harvests of 1944 and 1945 were lost.

translation.lb: Mé fir d'joer 1946 wor schon de' normal productio'nscapacite't erem hirgestallt.
translation.en: But for the year 1946, normal production capacity had already been restored.

translation.lb: „La récolte (de 1946) a été, dans l'ensemble, satisfaisante tant au point de vue de la quantité qu'au point de vue de la qualité oe qui"aura des conséquences favorables également pour tout le pays, les prix devont baisser,.."
translation.en: “The harvest (of 1946) was, overall, satisfactory both in terms of quantity and quality, which will have favorable consequences for the whole country; prices should fall...”

translation.lb: Op dat lèscht warden d'iveindrénker scho läng, well wann eng fläsch „Portugieseschen" 20 frang kascht, da misst et dadh me'glech sin, e gudde pättche letzeburgesche fir 5 bis 6 frang ze kroe'n.
translation.en: In the meantime, wine lovers were expecting it for a long time, because if a bottle of "Portuguese" costs 20 francs, it should be possible to get a good glass of Luxembourgish wine for 5 to 6 francs.

translation.lb: Momentan sin am iand 1250 ha matt riéwe beplanzt;
translation.en: Currently, there are 1250 hectares planted with vines in the country;

translation.lb: de' méscht wéngerte si regenere'ert a matt amerikaneschen zorte gepro'ft.
translation.en: most vineyards have been regenerated and tested with American varieties.

translation.lb: Et fehlt oeh wuel net un arbechtsleidd, well et kenne nach mc' maschinne verwand gin.
translation.en: There is also likely no shortage of labor because machines can still be used.

translation.lb: Et wor e gléck fir d'land, datt d'gebeier vun déne fënnef coopérative net zerste'ert go'wen.
translation.en: It was fortunate for the country that the buildings of the five cooperatives were not destroyed.

translation.lb: Och de' nei unio'n matt Holland ka fir de letzeburgesche wein virdéler bréngen.
translation.en: Also, the new union with Holland can bring advantages for Luxembourgish wine.

translation.en: On Wednesday evening, a police patrol conducted a strict car and bicycle control at the corner of Avenue G D. Charlotte and Avenue de la Gare, checking thoroughly whether all vehicles were 'up to date', or better set 'for the night', as they were specifically looking to see.

translation.lb: op d'beiichtonge richteg an deT rei wären.

translation.en: These controls are indeed worthy of appreciation, but a lighter control was sometimes also necessary.

translation.lb: De schmoggel tescht Holland a Belgien Den Haag.
translation.en: The smuggling between Holland and Belgium The Hague.

translation.lb: — D'höllännesch zeidong „Trouw" iiiwert détailler iwer. d'activite't vun enger schmogglerband, de' hirt onwiésen an Holland an a Belgien dreiwt.
translation.en: — The Dutch newspaper 'Trouw' details the activities of a smuggling gang that operates in Holland and Belgium.

translation.lb: Kirzlech ere'scht hu spezialbeanite vun der douane zu Amsterdam en Zemmer, dat vun engem belschen händler bewunnt wor, ënnersicht.
translation.en: Recently, customs special agents in Amsterdam inspected a room that was occupied by a Belgian trader.

translation.lb: Am zëmmer hu si den händler an zwo' aner perso'nen entdeckt, de' an der mëtt vun engem riesege stock vu fiillfiédere geschlof hun.
translation.en: In the room, they discovered the trader and two other people sleeping amidst a large stock of quills.

translation.lb: Et könnt matt lîchtegkét festgestallt "gin, datt et sech em schmoggler vu gro'ssem format gehandelt huel.
translation.en: It can be easily determined that this was a smuggler of significant scale.

translation.lb: Niéwt de füllfiederen hât hién och nach 20.000 florinen an Holland importe'ert.
translation.en: Aside from the quills, he also imported 20,000 florrins into Holland.

translation.lb: Eng gro'ss zuel vu fiillfiédere go'wen ënnert engem spezial agerichte sëtz vum auto entdeckt.
translation.en: A large number of quills were found under a specially arranged seat in the car.

translation.lb: De' zwé complize sin einstweilen op freiem fo'ss gelôss gin.
translation.en: The two accomplices have temporarily been released.

translation.lb: E vun hinne get vun der polizei vu Levde we'nst illegalem verkaf vu geschmoggelto fiillfiédere gesicht.
translation.en: One of them is being sought by the police in Levde for the illegal sale of smuggled quills.

translation.lb: Kino zu Eech Eech.
translation.en: Cinema in Eech Eech.

translation.lb: — Zënter e samschdeg, dem 12. october 1946, liuel de' âi gemeng Eech erem hircn cinéma.
translation.en: — Since Saturday, October 12, 1946, the community of Eech once again has its cinema.

translation.lb: Enner dem numm „FLORIDA" huet den hèr Stra inchamps vu Bre'ssel (e gebirtege Letzeburger) am frc'ere kiuo „Eden" zu Eech, dé seit 1938 zo' war, é ganz moderne proppere suit malt 236 sëtzplazen (premièren a reserye'ert) agerkht.
translation.en: Under the name 'FLORIDA,' Mr. Strainchamps from Brussels (a native Luxembourger) has opened a very modern and clean cinema with 236 seats (premieres and reserved) in the former 'Eden' cinema in Eech, which had been closed since 1938.

translation.lb: Leider ass nach c manktem un der apparatur, so' dalt é net ganz gudd verstét, awer den hèr Strainchamps huet versechert, datt dest iwel an der e'schler zeit, héxlwahrscheinlech schp tir de nèxle samschdeg behuewe gel.
translation.en: Unfortunately, there's still a lack of equipment, so it is not functioning well yet, but Mr. Strainchamps has assured that this problem will likely be resolved soon, probably by next Saturday.

translation.lb: — Mir wënschen dem hèr Strainchamps viil gléck a senger neier entreprise, a wa sein apparat an der rei ass, da werten de' Eecher an de' aus der emge'gend s et h scho samschdes, sonndes a me'ndes hei bim afannen.
translation.en: — We wish Mr. Strainchamps much luck with his new enterprise, and once his equipment is set, the people of Eech and those from the surrounding area will be here on Saturdays, Sundays, and Mondays.

translation.lb: Feier ausgebrach Ettelbréck.
translation.en: Fire broke out in Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: En dënschdeg ge'nt 14 auer ass feier ausgebrach an déni,op dem Lôpert", isoile'crtcn an onbewunnte gebei vum bauer Henri Posiug vun hei.
translation.en: On Tuesday around 2 PM, a fire broke out in the empty, uninhabited building of the farmer Henri Posiug here on the Lôpert.

translation.lb: Säratlech récolté si verbrannt.
translation.en: Considerable harvests were burned.

translation.lb: Weil et um ivâsser gefeit liuet, könnt dem feier kén anhalt gebuede gin, so' datt nemmen dat geschwärzt mauerwiérk iwreg blo'f.
translation.en: Because it was missing water in the area, no resistance could be given to the fire, so that only the blackened masonry remained.

translation.lb: De schued ass bedeitend an duereh versécherong gedeckt.
translation.en: The damage is significant and covered by insurance.

translation.lb: D'ursâch vum brand ass onbekannt.
translation.en: The cause of the fire is unknown.

translation.lb: De marschall Smuts beséngt den englesche Commonwealth New York.
translation.en: Marshal Smuts praises the English Commonwealth in New York.

translation.lb: An exiger ricd, de' bien zu New York gehalten huet, hu,et de Premierminister vun der Südafrikanescher Union, marschall Smuts erklärt, dalt „englesch bewegong no freihét" d avantgarde vun enger weJtbewegong ge'f gin, dèr s ec h net nemmcn d'cnglesch colonien, mé och aner länner uschle'sse ge'- wen.
translation.en: In an impressive speech delivered in New York, the Prime Minister of the South African Union, Marshal Smuts, declared that the 'English movement towards freedom' would become the vanguard of a world movement, to which not only English colonies but also other countries would join.

translation.lb: De marschall Smuts ass der ménong, datt, wann an Europa déselwechte System opgerîcht ge'f gin, we' d'Commonwealth énit duerstelile ge'f, et dann aus dem durchenaner erauskomme ge'f.
translation.en: Marshal Smuts believes that if the same system that represents the Commonwealth were established in Europe, it would emerge from chaos.

translation.lb: Eso' guer d'Yerént Natio'no kennte ncmme fortschretter an der sehafong vun engem dauerhafte fridden a seng onofhängegkét verwirklechen, wann et scch enger ähnlecher con s titliti o n n e Her basis bedéngo ge'f.
translation.en: Even the United Nations could only progress in creating a lasting peace and achieve its independence if it were grounded on a similar constitutional basis.

translation.lb: „D'latsäch, so' ass de Premierminister virugefuer, dalt. ech am n-um vun der englescher regirong sehwetzen ass bedeitongsvoll a vcrdéiigt ervirgestrach ze gin.
translation.en: "The fact," continued the Prime Minister, "that I speak on behalf of the English government is meaningful and should be prominently highlighted.

translation.lb: We' kann c Boer, dé bis zur lescliter minutt fir d'onofhangegkét vu sengem land gekämpft huet, elo zu gonschte vum engle sehe Commonwealth schwätzen?
translation.en: How can a Boer, who fought to the last minute for the independence of his country, now speak in favor of the English Commonwealth?

translation.lb: D'ursâch ass de', datt den actudMen erglesclie Commonwealth net me' datselwecht ass we' d'engiescht empire vum I. Elite jorhonnert.
translation.en: The reason is that the present English Commonwealth is not the same as the British Empire of the 19th century.

translation.lb: Den engleschen imperialismus huet am Boer-krich den do'dessto'ss versât krilt a vun dèr zeit un ass e nemme me' c gespenst, <iat nuren de'- je'neg erschrecke kann, de' net am bild sin oder et net wëlle sin.
translation.en: English imperialism received the death blow in the Boer War, and since then it has been merely a specter that can only frighten those who are not informed or refuse to be aware.

translation.lb: Durch d'tatsâch, <latt England dem Imperialismus de reck geke'ert huet. huct et e gro'sse beitrag zum fridde beigcdroen.
translation.en: By turning its back on imperialism, England has made a great contribution to peace.

translation.lb: De genere'se geste vun England vis-à-vis vu Südafrika a sein heroeschen dévouement fir d'sâch vun der onofhängegkét hun ohs vun der oprichtegkét vu sengen handlongen iwerzégt.
translation.en: England's generous gesture towards South Africa and its heroic devotion to the cause of independence have convinced us of the sincerity of its actions.

translation.lb: Obschons England de klengste krichspotentiai, net de' immens ressource vun Amerika, de' gewalteg ausdénong vum russeschen territoire an eso' eng gcnsehteg defensiv posiUo'n huet \ve' Russland, musse mir dach all,onst vertrauen an England setzen, well et an ntien déler vun der weit eng reich eTfahrong vun der mënschlecher natur huet."
translation.en: Although England has the smallest war potential, not the immense resources of America, nor the vast expanse of Russian territory or such a comprehensive defensive position as Russia, we must still place our trust in England because it has a rich experience of human nature gained in every part of the world.

translation.lb: Iwer de systeiu vuni oommonweatth huet hie folgend ponkte festgestallt: „En ass vi-11 me' infini a wirkongsvoll we' d'Panamerikanesch Union a net eso' starr we' d'Sowjetesch Union, de' nemme vun déne mächtegste perse'nlechkéte beherrscht get.
translation.en: Regarding the Commonwealth system, he noted the following points: "It is much more infinite and effective than the Pan-American Union and not as rigid as the Soviet Union, which is dominated only by the most powerful personalities.

translation.lb: de commonweatth ass d'typesch regirongsform, de' am méschten den idealer vun der freihét an dem fridden entsprecht an de' am stärkste no der humanitc't striewt."
translation.en: The Commonwealth is the typical form of government that most corresponds to the ideals of freedom and peace, and strives most strongly for humanity."

translation.lb: D’Russe kre’e froe gestallt Berlin.
translation.en: The Russians posed questions in Berlin.

translation.lb: Geseilter owend ass d'déportatio'n vun deitschen arbechler no Russland am coordine'erongscomité vum alllie'erte controllrot zur sprôch komm.
translation.en: That evening, the deportation of German workers to Russia was discussed in the coordination committee of the allied control council.

translation.lb: Den englesche vertrieder, de generolleitnanl Sir Brian RoberVson, huet dem russesche général Kurochkin, e questionnaire mall 4 ponkten iwerrécht.
translation.en: The English representative, General Lieutenant Sir Brian Robertson, handed a questionnaire with 4 points to Russian General Kurochkin.

translation.lb: Heibei si nach 3 froe vum amerikanesche generol Lucius Clay derbeikomm.
translation.en: Additionally, 3 questions from American General Lucius Clay were added.

translation.lb: De generol Kurochkin huet erklärt, bien hätt net dat ne'degt material zur hand, fir op all froen äntweren ze kennen.
translation.en: General Kurochkin explained that he did not have the necessary material at hand to answer all questions.

translation.lb: Et ass dorophin beschloss gin, d'froen an der n ester sëtzong vum controllrot, de' de 4. nc mber stattfend, ze bespriechen.
translation.en: It was then decided to discuss the questions in the next session of the control council, scheduled for November 4th.

translation.lb: De Sir Brian Robertson huet iwer folgend ponkte froe gestallt: d'zuel vun den déporte'erte Preisen; sin se all durch contract verpflicht g'n; sin d'contracter freiwëlleg ofgeschiloss gin; watfir conditio'- nen enthält eso' e contract a wo'hinner sin d'arbechter gefo'ert gin?
translation.en: Sir Brian Robertson asked the following questions: the number of deported Prussians; were they all bound by contract; were the contracts voluntarily concluded; what conditions does such a contract contain and where were the workers taken to?

translation.lb: De generol Clav huet d'fro gestallt, ob d'arbechter d'recht halen.
translation.en: General Clay asked whether the workers retain the right.

translation.lb: Sech der déportatio'n ze widdersetzen, we' läng dé contract dauert a wiviH arbechter schon déporte'ert si gin.
translation.en: To oppose the deportation, how long the contract lasts and how many workers have already been deported.

translation.lb: Cakes Mir brauchen: 65 g botter, 125 g zocker, 1 é, salz, eng messerspëtz bâkpolver, 300 g miél, 2-3 iésslaffele mëllech.
translation.en: Cakes We need: 65 g butter, 125 g sugar, 1 egg, salt, a pinch of baking powder, 300 g flour, 2-3 tablespoons milk.

translation.lb: Préparatio'n: De botter, den zocker an <Té gudd schaumeg re'eren.
translation.en: Preparation: Cream the butter and sugar together well.

translation.lb: Salz beigin.
translation.en: Add salt.

translation.lb: De bâkpolver main miél vermëschen, ofwiésselnd matt der mëllech an den déch gin.
translation.en: Mix the baking powder with the flour, alternately adding with the milk into the dough.

translation.lb: Ailes dichteg kniéden, kill ro'e lôssen.
translation.en: Knead everything tightly, let it rest to cool.

translation.lb: Den déch ausrollen a matt enger rapp dat muster drop drécken.
translation.en: Roll out the dough and press the pattern onto it with a grater.

translation.lb: Den déch schneiden, op engem matt miél bestëpste blech 15—20 minutte bâke lôssen.
translation.en: Cut the dough, and let it bake on a floured baking sheet for 15—20 minutes.

translation.lb: D’House of Lords stellt sech ge’nt dem Stalin seng déclaratio’nen London.
translation.en: The House of Lords opposes Stalin's declarations in London.

translation.lb: Am verlaf von den debatten i iwer d'international al'fairen am House of Lords huet de Lord Altringham, fre'ere minister am Noen Orient, sech a senger; qualite't als 1 haptriédner vun de conservative schärf ge'nt dem Stalin seng behaptongen, den Ohurchill wir e „krichshetzer" gewand.
translation.en: During the debates on international affairs in the House of Lords, Lord Altringham, a former minister in the Near East, sharply opposed Stalin's claim that Churchill was a "warmonger," in his capacity as a main spokesman for the conservatives.

translation.lb: Hié sot: „Ech bedaueren et, datt de Stalin sech erlabt huet, perse'nlech iwerléongen iwer d'perso'n vum Churchill ze mächen.
translation.en: He said: "I regret that Stalin allowed himself to make personal assumptions about Churchill.

translation.lb: Dat si net nemme bemirkongen iwer eng perso'n, mé iwer onst ganzt land.
translation.en: These are not just remarks about one person, but about our entire country.

translation.lb: Ech sin iwerzégt, datt dat net virkomm wir, wann de perse'nleche contact tëschent déne be'de Staatsmänner oprechtgehal wir gin.
translation.en: I am convinced that this would not have happened if the personal contact between these two statesmen had been maintained.

translation.lb: Et ass blëdsinn, bei ons vu krichshetzerei ze schwètzen, well mir dach de' e'scht victimer vun engem eventuelle krich ge'we gin."
translation.en: It is nonsense to talk about warmongering among us because we would be the first victims of any potential war."

translation.lb: Weider huet de Lord Altrincham e<r* klärt, Russland wällt neischt weider, we' d'duerchsetzong vun Deitschland mam' kommunismus.
translation.en: Furthermore, Lord Altrincham explained that Russia wants nothing more than the imposition of communism on Germany.

translation.lb: D'russescht vollek hätt e glaw, den et matt alle mëttelen ze verbréde sieht, wat jo och sei recht wir, mé et dèrft dat awer net matt gewalt an drock mächen.
translation.en: The Russian people have a belief they want to spread by all means, which is their right, but they should not do so by force and pressure.

translation.lb: D'ofkomme vu Potsdam misst complett revide'crt gin, well seng bestëmmongen dach net me' agehal ge'we gin.
translation.en: The Potsdam agreement must be completely revised because its provisions are no longer being adhered to.

translation.lb: Datselwecht trëfft fir d'kuelecontroll an de niveau vun der deitscher industrie zo\
translation.en: The same applies to coal control and the level of German industry.

translation.lb: De liberale Lord Perth, fre'ere botschafter zu Eo'm, mengt, d'zuel vun de russeschen divisio'nen, de' am westen démobi- 1 lise'ert wire gin, wir onbedeitend.
translation.en: The liberal Lord Perth, a former ambassador in Rome, thinks that the number of Russian divisions being demobilized in the West is insignificant.

translation.lb: Hié verlângrt vun der regirong, datt si sech jidfer versuch, d'e'streichesch grenezn zum nodél vun E'streich emzeänneren, widdersetze soll.
translation.en: He demanded that the government oppose any attempt to change the Austrian borders to Austria's disadvantage.

translation.lb: Boxen Marcel Cerdan — Georgie Abrams
translation.en: Boxing Marcel Cerdan — Georgie Abrams

translation.lb: De franse'sche champion vun de milourds, Marcel Cerdan, mecht soho läng ustrengongen, fir ge'nt de weltméschter an senger catégorie, Tony Zale (USA) untriéden ze können.
translation.en: The French champion of the middleweights, Marcel Cerdan, has been making many efforts to be able to compete against the world champion in his category, Tony Zale (USA).

translation.lb: Mé d'Amerikaner mächen engem friémen hir dire net besonnesch gèr op.
translation.en: But the Americans do not particularly like letting a foreigner compete against them.

translation.lb: Et ass schliessleeh ower gelongcn, dem Marcel Cerdan en engagement an Amerika ze verschafen.
translation.en: Finally, however, it has succeeded in securing Marcel Cerdan a match in America.

translation.lb: Als début trëtt hién de 6. dezember ge'nt de Georgie Abrams un.
translation.en: As a debut, he will compete against Georgie Abrams on December 6th.

translation.lb: De Géorgie Abrams ass 1918 gebuer, an ongefe'er vum selwcchten alter we' den Cerdan.
translation.en: Georgie Abrams was born in 1918 and is approximately the same age as Cerdan.

translation.lb: Hién hât eigentlech acho làng keng gcléen'hét me', fir vun sech sclvwètzen ze din.
translation.en: He actually hadn't had much opportunity for a long time to make a name for himself.

translation.lb: 1942 go'f hién an d'marine mobilise'ert, an de lèschte wanter wor hié nach a Japan a besatzong.
translation.en: In 1942 he was mobilized into the Marines, and last winter he was still in Japan in occupation.

translation.lb: 1941 huet hié ge'nt den Tony Zale geboxt.
translation.en: In 1941 he boxed against Tony Zale.

translation.lb: Ké mensch hätt e stéck chewing-gum op hié gewat.
translation.en: No one would have bet a piece of chewing gum on him.

translation.lb: Hién huet den Zale owcr zwémol op de buedem gcstrecht.
translation.en: However, he knocked Zale down twice.

translation.lb: Schliesslech blo'f den Tony Zale no hardem kämpf ponkbsieger a könnt de championstitel an d'täsch stiéchen.
translation.en: Finally, Tony Zale remained the winner on points after a hard fight and could pocket the championship title.

translation.lb: Duerno huet de weltméschter e schwe'ere stand ge'nt de Graziano gehat.
translation.en: Afterwards, the world champion had a hard stand against Graziano.

translation.lb: Wann den Gerdan ge'nt den Abrams wënnt, kann hié getro'scht d'revanche Zale — Graziano ofwarden, an duerno ge'nt de vainqueur untriéden.
translation.en: If Cerdan wins against Abrams, he can calmly await the Zale — Graziano rematch, and then compete against the victor.

translation.lb: De Mike Jacobs huet him prophezeit, datt no engem sieg iwer den Abrams „d'dire vu'n der weit him opstoe gc'fen.
translation.en: Mike Jacobs has prophesied to him that after a victory over Abrams, 'the doors of the world will open for him.'

translation.lb: Den Abrams ass weider ké gefe'erlccht Subjekt, seng k. o.-sieger lôssen sech un de fénger vun enger hand ofziélen.
translation.en: Abrams is not a particularly dangerous subject, his knockout victories can be counted on the fingers of one hand.

translation.lb: D’atomexperimenter fuerderen hirt e’scht affer
translation.en: The atomic experiments claimed their first victim.

translation.lb: Virun e puer wocJtje war çt am Atomlaboratöire vu Los AJamos bal zu enger i ISVWWTO.
translation.en: A few weeks ago in the atomic laboratory of Los Alamos, it almost came to a catastrophe.

translation.lb: l /V° catastrophe, komm, wo eng onmass leidd én-iéwen JRätte ilôsse, missen an de laboratoire.
translation.en: A catastrophe occurred where a vast amount of suffering unraveled, requiring the laboratory.

translation.lb: sejlwer complell zèrste'ert gi wir.
translation.en: to be completely destroyed.

translation.lb: Durch d'onvirsichtegkét vun engem rtiattarbcchter wor op en hoer eng atomesch ketteréactib'n provoce'ert gin.
translation.en: Due to the carelessness of a worker, an atomic chain reaction was almost triggered.

translation.lb: Am leschte moment huet en experimentschef de fêler erkannt.
translation.en: At the last moment, an experiment leader recognized the error.

translation.lb: Nemnien en direct agreifen könnt cfongiléck verhënneren.
translation.en: Only direct intervention could prevent the accident.

translation.lb: Déje'negen, dén dat ge'f mächen, ge'f ower, we' jidderé gesin huet, engem sécheren a furchtbaren do't verfalen, well en direct an de'dleche contact matt dem gefe'erleche material komme mùss.
translation.en: Whoever did that, though, as everyone saw, would face a certain and terrible death because they must come into direct contact with the dangerous material.

translation.lb: Nach o jonge alomwëssenschaftler, dé vun ufgnk u bei den atomexperimenjer zu Los Atainos derbei wor, huet sech o'ni läng z'iwerlégn, geaffert.
translation.en: Yet a young atomic scientist, who had been involved in the atomic experiments at Los Alamos from the beginning, sacrificed himself without hesitation.

translation.lb: Hién huet d'zon vun den do'desstrahle betraft, d'cxplosio'n verhënnert an ass dorop lâchend a scheinbar unverletzt an d'spidol gangen.
translation.en: He faced the zone of deadly rays, prevented the explosion, and then went laughing and seemingly unhurt to the hospital.

translation.lb: Dé mann, dén haut ganz Amerika e'ert, héscht Dr. Slotin.
translation.en: The man who today honors all of America is called Dr. Slotin.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Slotin ass e russesche judd a ko'm wärend dem krich an Amerika.
translation.en: Dr. Slotin is a Russian Jew and came to America during the war.

translation.lb: Virdrun hât en a Spuenien, wärend dem birgerkriçh, ge'nt de Franco gekämpft.
translation.en: Before that, he fought against Franco in Spain during the civil war.

translation.lb: We' de krich ugângen ass, wor en zu London a wollt oiibedengt pilot vun engem chasseur gin, otfschon e net gudd gesin huet.
translation.en: When the war began, he was in London and wanted to become a pilot of a fighter, even though he didn't see well.

translation.lb: Vell seng wëssenschaftlech qualite'ten opgefall sin, go'f dé jonge physiker no Amerika gescheckt.
translation.en: Due to his noticeable scientific qualities, the young physicist was sent to America.

translation.lb: Den Dr. S'.ulin gehe'ert zu déne wëssenschaftler, de' entsat woren iwer den ofwurf vint der e'schter atombomm bei Hiroshima.
translation.en: Dr. Slotin belongs to the scientists who were horrified by the dropping of the first atomic bomb on Hiroshima.

translation.lb: Wärend den dég vu senger lueser agonie huet en, eso' läng we'*e bei besennong wor, acliv un der medizinescher aus wer tong vu senger ato mkrankhét rnatlgehollef.
translation.en: During the days of his slow agony, as long as he was conscious, he actively helped with the medical investigation of his atomic sickness.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Slolin ass den énzege mensch, un dorn d'wëssenschaft bis elo d'wîrkonge vun der radiumvergëftong vum e'schte moment bis zum fatalen exitus stode'ere könnt.
translation.en: Dr. Slotin is the only person on whom science could study the effects of radium poisoning from the first moment to the fatal end.

translation.lb: An hién ass den e'schte martyrer vum Atomzeitalter.
translation.en: And he is the first martyr of the Atomic Age.

translation.lb: D’kannergeld Et ass e projet de loi do, fir all familjepapp kaunergeld zo'korumcn ze lôssen.
translation.en: The children's allowance There is a bill to allow every family father to receive child benefits.

translation.lb: De' iddi dervun ass richteg.
translation.en: The idea behind it is correct.

translation.lb: Mi et ass ganz wichteg, emol fir d'e'scht nei prin eipien opzesteHen.
translation.en: But it is very important to first establish new principles.

translation.lb: Dat e'scht prineip ass dat hei: Eng familje matt kanner huet recht op déselwechte liéwensstandard we eng o'ni kanner oder e jonggesetl.
translation.en: The first principle is this: A family with children has the right to the same standard of living as one without children or a bachelor.

translation.lb: Familje matt kanner si fir de Staat me' nëlflech we* de' aner.
translation.en: Families with children are more beneficial to the state than others.

translation.lb: Dofir musse si et jo sécher net me' schlecht hun.
translation.en: Therefore, they certainly should not be worse off.

translation.lb: Den zwéte princip: D'kannergekl inuss vum ganze land, d. h. aus de sleiere bezuelt gin.
translation.en: The second principle: The child benefits must be paid by the whole country, i.e., from the taxpayers.

translation.lb: Et ass falsch de patron derfir opkommen ze Jössen.
translation.en: It is wrong to let the employer pay for it.

translation.lb: Wann en arbechter, dé familjepapp ass, ai. engem betrieb schafft, dann huet de betrieb kén avantage dovun, datt sein arbechter kanner rillt.
translation.en: If a worker, who is a family father, works in a company, then the company has no advantage from his raising children.

translation.lb: Den avantage huet de Staat an d'land.
translation.en: The advantage is to the state and the country.

translation.lb: Dofir müssen de' och bezuelen.
translation.en: Therefore, they also must pay.

translation.lb: Dén neie projet a'ilerdéngs schle't vir, datt de patron d'kanner bezuele soll
translation.en: However, the new proposal suggests that the employer should pay for the children.

translation.lb: Et soll eng késs gegrënnt gm, an de' fir all arbechter 4,5% vum lo'n bezuelt muss gin
translation.en: A fund is supposed to be established, in which every worker must pay 4.5% of their wage.

translation.lb: Eng kanuerzo'lag soll op 180 frang oder dorenner fixe'ert gin.
translation.en: A child allowance should be fixed at 180 francs or less.

translation.lb: Dal ass jo alt en ufa-nk Mé v.ié brengt et da fèr<leg, fir matt der zomm e kand e mo'nt lfing nemmen ze fidderen.
translation.en: That is at least a start, but how is it possible to feed a child decently for a month with that amount?

translation.lb: El ass och propose'ert, d'kanuergeld ine' ze besteieren.
translation.en: It is also proposed to tax the child benefit.

translation.lb: Et war jo Iächerlech, wa vun déne puer frang cch nach crem steieren ofgezu ge'wen.
translation.en: It would be ridiculous if from those few francs some cream taxes were still deducted.

translation.lb: Mlerdéngs niccht de staut et eso' iiei de Staatsbeamten.
translation.en: However, the state does not treat civil servants in the same way.

translation.lb: A vun dèr ganzer zomm gin d'steiere berechent.
translation.en: And the taxes are calculated on the entire sum.

translation.lb: Folge vum KZ.
translation.en: Consequence of the concentration camp.

translation.lb: D e'f f e r d e n g.
translation.en: Differdange.

translation.lb: Den 23. oclol>er ge'nl 1 auer go'f do 19järegen, erc'scht kurz aus dem militärdengscht entlôssenen ureisser Arthur VVarnier op senger arhechtsplaz vun enger hèrzkris befall.
translation.en: On the 23rd of October at 1 o'clock, the 19-year-old Arthur Warnier, recently discharged from military service, was struck by a heart attack at his workplace.

translation.lb: Dé se'er erbeigeruffenen sclimelzsanitätcr liuet em gleich eng piquûre gemâch.
translation.en: The immediately summoned smelter paramedic gave him an injection right away.

translation.lb: Gleich drop go'f de jongen arbechler mam sanitätsauto ofgefo'ert.
translation.en: Soon after, the young worker was taken away by the ambulance.

translation.lb: De' hèrzkrisen bei dem jonge Warnier sin op de' onmënschlech behandlong an engem deitschen KZlager zréckzefe'ercn, wo' en als déserteur langer zeit gefânge gehâle go'f.
translation.en: The heart attacks of the young Warnier are attributed to the inhumane treatment in a German concentration camp, where he was held captive for a long time as a deserter.

translation.lb: Export vu setzgromperen Ettelbréck.
translation.en: Export of seed potatoes Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: — An de lèschle Wochen go'fen hei vill iéssgromperen age- Iueden, de' fir d'slâd Lelzeburg an d'minettsge'gend bestëmmt wiéjieu.
translation.en: — In recent weeks, many eating potatoes have been brought in here, which were destined for the city of Luxembourg and the Minett area.

translation.lb: An dëscn dég kommen nach enimer pèrdswén a camions malt setzigromperen op der gare un, de' an eist.Guddland, an d'Schweiz, no Frankreich a Belgien gescheckt gin.
translation.en: These days, horse-drawn carts and trucks full of seed potatoes still arrive at the station, which are sent to our good land, to Switzerland, France, and Belgium.

translation.lb: Fir én zènner sètzgromperen gin 170 fr. bezuelt.
translation.en: For one ton of seed potatoes, 170 francs are paid.

translation.lb: Vive d’police!
translation.en: Long live the police!

translation.lb: D'criminaiipolizei huet e gefe'erleche verbriécher gesicht.
translation.en: The criminal police were looking for a dangerous criminal.

translation.lb: Se hâte vun em weider keng donnéen, we' eng streif matt sex passfotoen.
translation.en: They had no further details on him, just a strip with six passport photos.

translation.lb: Aus enger kienger uertschaft, wo' des fotoen och tiigescbéckt gi woren, ko'm dorop geschwënn en telegramm:
translation.en: From a small locality, where these photos were also sent, soon came a telegram:

translation.lb: „Ve'er vun déne gesichte verbriëcher hu mer schon.
translation.en: "We already have one of the wanted criminals.

translation.lb: Hoffen, de' aner zwe'n och nach ze kre'en."
translation.en: Hope to catch the other two as well."

translation.lb: Russland get land zréck
translation.en: Russia gives land back

translation.lb: E spriécher vun der e'streichescher regirong huet gëschter mattgedélt, datt d'russesch militärautorite'ten seeh entschlosa hun, eng partie Tun dem land, Trat si a Niddere'streich confisque'ert haten, der e'streichescher regirong erem zur verfügong ze stellen.
translation.en: A spokesperson for the Austrian government announced yesterday that the Russian military authorities have decided to return part of the land that they had confiscated in Lower Austria to the Austrian government.

translation.lb: Si haten ufänglech 51.000 ha beschlagnahmt a behale nach 21.000 ha.
translation.en: They initially seized 51,000 hectares and still retain 21,000 hectares.

translation.lb: Dat land, wat si elo behalen, wor fre'er haptsächlech terrain, wo' manöveren drop ofgehale go'wen.
translation.en: The land they are keeping now was primarily used for maneuvers earlier.

translation.lb: D'Sussen hun sech och berét erklärt, all sôt, de' si durch des confisquatio'n ze vill kruten, der e'streichescher regirong erem ze gin.
translation.en: The Russians have also agreed to return any surplus grain they received through this confiscation to the Austrian government.

translation.lb: Desen entschloss huet d'russesch militärregirong gefâsst, nodäm d'Unrra bekannt gemäch hht, datt e land, an dém durch allie'ert truppe land confisque'ert wir gin, net me' matt liéwensmëttel beliwert ge'w gin.
translation.en: This decision was made by the Russian military government after UNRRA announced that any country where land had been confiscated by allied troops would no longer be supplied with food.

translation.lb: ET ASS ENG SCHWE’ER ARBECHT
translation.en: It is a heavy work

translation.lb: D'arbechter schaffen an équipen.
translation.en: The workers work in teams.

translation.lb: De' eng schafft vu muerges 8 auer bis 3 auer nomëlfes, de' aner vu 7 auer oives bis 3 auer muerges.
translation.en: One team works from 8 in the morning until 3 in the afternoon, the other from 7 in the evening until 3 in the morning.

translation.lb: D'arbccht ass bcschwe'erlech.
translation.en: The work is very strenuous.

translation.lb: D'galerie sin dèrmôsse no beim wâsser.
translation.en: The galleries are so close to the water.

translation.lb: datt ef emmer ficht dran ass.
translation.en: that it is always damp inside.

translation.lb: D'arbechter sin an imperméable gekléd,
translation.en: The workers are dressed in waterproof clothing,

translation.lb: mé des klédong scliëtzt si net emmer ge'nt de' streng temperatur,
translation.en: but these clothes do not always protect them against the harsh temperatures,

translation.lb: de' de'f ënner null leit,
translation.en: which lie below zero,

translation.lb: also am ge'gendél vun allen anere minnen.
translation.en: thus contrary to all other mines.

translation.lb: Enner der pioche le'sen sech oft eisbléck,
translation.en: Ice blocks often break free under the pickaxe,

translation.lb: de' zënter dausende vu joere net geschmolz sin.
translation.en: that have not melted for thousands of years.

translation.lb: AU stonn gin 160 dausend litcr wâsser aus der mine gepompelt.
translation.en: 160 thousand liters of water are pumped from the mine every hour.

translation.lb: D'èrz get durch dynamitcartouchen erausgeschloen,
translation.en: The ore is blasted out using dynamite cartridges,

translation.lb: duerno get et malt schëppen op lorie gelueden,
translation.en: afterwards it is shoveled onto lorries,

translation.lb: de' et bis bei d'lifte fe'eren.
translation.en: which transport it to the lifts.

translation.lb: Do hleiwt et leien, bis et dréchen ass.
translation.en: There it remains until it is dry.

translation.lb: Da get d'èrz aus der mine befërdert, zu stëps gemuel, aus déni dann d'pçchblend erausgesicht get.
translation.en: Then the ore is transported out of the mine, ground to dust, from which the pitchblende is extracted.

translation.lb: De stëps get a wâsser geworf,
translation.en: The dust is thrown into water,

translation.lb: an duerno get e vu bewegleclie platten bestänneg dttercherné gerëselt.
translation.en: and then continuously swirled by moving plates.

translation.lb: Well d'pechblend me' schwe'er ass we' de rescht.
translation.en: Since the pitchblende is heavier than the rest,

translation.lb: sammelt si sech.
translation.en: it gathers.

translation.lb: So' get d'pechblend gesonnert, gedréchent an a sack verpakt.
translation.en: Thus the pitchblende is separated, dried, and packed in sacks.

translation.lb: Wann am Summer d'schëffahrt frei ass,
translation.en: When shipping is possible in the summer,

translation.lb: gin des säek an d'raffinerie vu Port Hope um Ontario-See transportent.
translation.en: these sacks are transported to the refinery in Port Hope on Lake Ontario.

translation.en: Dr. Aljechin is no more the chess world champion,

translation.lb: den Dr. Aljechin ass e sonndeg a Spunien.

translation.lb: wo' e sech elo grad opgehalen huet, ganz plötzlcch un enger hèrzerise am alter vu 57 joer gestuerwen.

translation.en: Following the deaths of former world champions Dr. Dasker and Casablanca, another great star has disappeared from the international chess sky with him.

translation.lb: Inventar-aus verkâf
translation.en: Inventory sales

translation.lb: Den dépôt vun Hanau, eng 20 km vu Frankfurt ewech, ass momentan eng art internationale verkafs-magasin, wo' den amerikanesche liquidatio'ns-commissaire de client'en aus der ganzer weit flugmaschinen an detache'ert stécker verkéft.
translation.en: The depot of Hanau, about 20 km from Frankfurt, is currently a kind of international sales store where the American liquidation commissioner sells airplanes and spare parts to clients from all over the world.

translation.lb: D'maschinen an d'piècen, de' do ausgestallt sin, hun e gesamtwert vun emmerhi 50 millio'nen dollar.
translation.en: The machines and parts on display there have a total value of about 50 million dollars.

translation.lb: All dag stre'men amateuren erbei an diskute'eren an alle weltsprochen iwert de wert an de preis vun den ausgestallten artikelen.
translation.en: Every day, amateurs come by and discuss in all world languages the value and price of the displayed items.

translation.lb: Bis elo sin 180 maschine verkaft gin.
translation.en: So far, 180 machines have been sold.

translation.lb: Do vu sin der 67 „flieger fir alles".
translation.en: Of those, 67 are 'flyers for all'.

translation.lb: Den erle's beléft sech op 1.600.000 dollar.
translation.en: The revenue amounts to 1,600,000 dollars.

translation.lb: Beino all maschine gin an den dengscht vun de kontinentale fluglinne gestallt.
translation.en: Almost all machines are put into service for the continental airlines.

translation.lb: Holland, Irland, d'Schweiz, Schweden, Belgien, Dänemark, d'Tschekoslowakei, Polen, Spuenien a Portugal hun demanden agerécht, fir den typ C-47.
translation.en: Holland, Ireland, Switzerland, Sweden, Belgium, Denmark, Czechoslovakia, Poland, Spain and Portugal have submitted requests for the type C-47.

translation.lb: Am ganzen emfâssen d'stocke 900 maschinen an engem gesamtwert vu 27 millio'nen dollar, ferner motoren a piècen fir 20 millio'nen.
translation.en: In total, the stocks comprise 900 machines with a total value of 27 million dollars, as well as engines and parts worth 20 million.

translation.lb: D'preisser si vum Iiquidatio'nsoffice festgeluegt.
translation.en: The prices are set by the liquidation office.

translation.lb: D'C-47, de' den amerikanesche Staat 127.000 dollar ze stoe ko'men, gin zu 20-40.000 dollar ofgesat.
translation.en: The C-47, which costs the American state 127,000 dollars, is being sold for 20-40,000 dollars.

translation.en: Sports Boxing G. Schiltz in Rotterdam

translation.en: On Monday evening, G. Schütz boxed against Lu Van Dam in Rotterdam.

translation.en: The match was stopped in the 4th round by the doctor because both boxers had serious injuries.

translation.en: In the 4th round, the fight was a draw.

translation.en: The rematch will soon take place in Amsterdam.

translation.lb: DE NÜRNBERGER PROZESS De Keitel sét aus * An der 98. verhandlong ko'm de verdédeger vum Keitel zu wuert.
translation.en: THE NUREMBERG TRIAL Keitel takes the stand * At the 98th session, Keitel's defense attorney addressed the court.

translation.lb: De Heitel ass haptsächlech beschëllegt, d'ersche'ssonge vun den allie'erte commandoen ugeuerdent ze hun oder zu mindest mattverantwortlech derfir gewiéscht ze sin.
translation.en: Keitel is mainly accused of ordering the shootings of the Allied commandos or at least being partly responsible for them.

translation.lb: Weider get him d'ersche'ssong vu 50 engleschen offize'er zur lascht geluegt, dénen et gelonge wor aus engem preisesche krichsgefângenelager ze entkommen.
translation.en: He is additionally blamed for the shooting of 50 English officers who had managed to escape from a Prussian prisoner of war camp.

translation.lb: Des offize'er woren am märz 1944 op uerder vum Keitel no hirem fluchtversuch erschoss gin, fir denen anere mattgefângenen d'loseht fir unzedrécken ze huelen.
translation.en: These officers were shot in March 1944 on Keitel's orders after their escape attempt, to serve as a deterrent to other prisoners.

translation.lb: De Keitel huet erklärt, hié ge'w all verantwortong droen fir all befehler, de' hié gin hätt.
translation.en: Keitel declared that he bore full responsibility for all orders he had given.

translation.lb: Sengen aussoe no wor hié net member vun der NSDAP, bis datt d'offize'er vun der Wehrmacht an d'partei gezwonge go'wen an e wir ganz iwerrascht gewiéscht, we' en he'eren hätt, datt den Hitler hién zum iéweschte kommandant vun der Wehrmacht ernannt hätt.
translation.en: According to his testimony, he was not a member of the NSDAP until the Wehrmacht officers were forced to join the party, and he was very surprised when he heard that Hitler had appointed him as the supreme commander of the Wehrmacht.

translation.lb: Den Hitler hätt als iéweschte kommandant vun der Wehrmacht all macht an sengen hänn gehat an all de' uerderen, de' de Keitel ënnerschriwen hätt, wire nemmen erem uerdere vum Hitler gewiéscht.
translation.en: Hitler, as the supreme commander of the Wehrmacht, held all power in his hands, and all orders that Keitel signed were merely issued by Hitler.

translation.lb: E get zo' datt vill uerderen, de' hién ennerzéchent hätt, ge'nt d'bestëmmonge vum Völkerrecht gewiéscht wiren, awer de' uerderen wiren all vum Hitler ausgângen an hién hätt nuren seng ënnerschrëft dröimer ze setze gehat.
translation.en: He admitted that many orders he had signed were against the provisions of international law, but those orders had all originated from Hitler, and he merely had to apply his signature.

translation.lb: Am iwregen hätt hién (de Keitel) wann en eso' e befehl durchzegin hät, emmer folgend wirder gebraucht: De Führer huet ordonne'ert....
translation.en: Moreover, when Keitel had to relay such an order, he always used the following words: The Führer has ordered....

translation.lb: Kulturchronik Penicillin.
translation.en: Cultural Chronicle Penicillin.

translation.lb: Aus enger annonce, de' an enger auslännescher zeidong atong, gét ervir, datt elo Penicillin, dat neit hélmëttel, iwer dat mer schons oft an onser zeidong gcschwat hun, am handel ze kre'en ass.
translation.en: From an advertisement that appeared in a foreign newspaper, it is evident that Penicillin, the new remedy, which we have often talked about in our newspaper, is now available in stores.

translation.lb: (Hei zu Letzeburg a pëllen, mé räch net flësseg.)
translation.en: (Here in Luxembourg in pills, but not yet in liquid form.)

translation.lb: Vum amerikaneschen zeidongsmarkt Am joer 1909 go'w et an de Vereinegte Staaten 2600 dageszeidongen, haut ower nemme me' nach 1700.
translation.en: From the American newspaper market In the year 1909 there were 2600 daily newspapers in the United States, but today only about 1700 remain.
