translation.lb: DE NÜRNBERGER PROZESS Wat stong am deitsch-russesche geheimvertrag?
translation.en: THE NUREMBERG TRIAL What was in the German-Russian secret treaty?

translation.lb: Gëschter go'w dem Ribbentrop seng fre'er secretärin, Margarete Blank, virun d'schranke vum gericht zite'ert, fir de Ribbentrop z'entlâschten.
translation.en: Yesterday, Ribbentrop's former secretary, Margarete Blank, was summoned to the court's bar to exonerate Ribbentrop.

translation.lb: Hir aussoen hâlen zum haptge'genstand de russeschdeitsche geheimvertrag, dén am joer 1939 ënnerzéchent gin ass.
translation.en: Her testimonies were primarily about the Russian-German secret treaty, which was signed in the year 1939.

translation.lb: We' d'Margarete Blank ufänke wollt matt hiren aussoen, huet de rasseschen ukléer proteste'ert, datl d'geheimklauselen vun dem vertrag virum gerîcht zite'ert ge'wen.
translation.en: When Margarete Blank wanted to start with her testimonies, the Russian prosecutor protested that the secret clauses of the treaty were being cited in court.

translation.lb: D'trihunal huet sech dorophin zreckgezun an délibére'ert.
translation.en: The tribunal then withdrew to deliberate.

translation.lb: SchJe'sslech huet et sech fir d'aussoe vun der zei ausgesprach.
translation.en: Finally, it decided in favor of the witness's testimony.

translation.lb: Et huet sech awer erausgestallt, datt si weider net viffl driwer wo'sst.
translation.en: It turned out, however, that she did not know much more about it.

translation.lb: Si könnt lédeglech nuren aussoen, datt dëse vertrag wirklech bestanen huet an datt gewësse klauselen dervun geheim ze lia le woren.
translation.en: She could only testify that this treaty did indeed exist and that certain clauses of it were kept secret.

translation.lb: Durno huet si d'individuel! versicher vum Ribbentrop fir de fridde fir Deitschland erbeizefe'eren, ausenanergeluegt.
translation.en: Afterward, she explained Ribbentrop's individual assurances to secure peace for Germany.

translation.lb: Dës versicher soll de Ribbentrop gemftch hun, o'ni datt och nëmmen é vun de' fe'rende perse'nlechkéten an Deitschland eppes dervu wo'sst
translation.en: These assurances Ribbentrop should have made, without any of the foreign dignitaries in Germany knowing anything about them.

translation.lb: Schon am wanter 1943 soll hié vermëttler an d'Schweiz geschéckt hun.
translation.en: As early as the winter of 1943, he is said to have sent intermediaries to Switzerland.

translation.lb: Spe'der huet en datselwecht versieht zu Stockholm, Madrid a Lissabon.
translation.en: Later, he did the same in Stockholm, Madrid, and Lisbon.

translation.lb: Ziélt et weider!
translation.en: Tell it further!

translation.lb: Dir iérgert iéch, datt d'landesverre'der net streng genuch bestroft gin.
translation.en: You annoy yourselves that the traitors are not punished strictly enough.

translation.lb: Hütt di r dem geriebt dann de' tatsâchc mattgedélt, de' dir nach iwer desen oder dé wësst?
translation.en: Have you then shared the facts with those concerned that you still know about these or those?

translation.lb: Nén?
translation.en: No?

translation.lb: Dann hatt der och ké recht, iéch iwer de' ze mëll urtéler ze beschwe'eren.
translation.en: Then you also had no right to complain about the mild judgments.

translation.lb: f E sonndeg, den 31. mürz, ge t an der kirch zu Ce'sseng e feierleche leichendengscht ofgehâlen fir de' gefâle komerôden:
translation.en: On Sunday, March 31, a solemn funeral service will be held in the church at Ce'sseng for the fallen comrades:

translation.lb: René AUGE Roger LORANG Grégoire BINTNER Théodore WAGNER Alphonse WENNER Nicola» HAUSEMER de' hirt liéwen fir d'hémeeht hirgin hun.
translation.en: René AUGE Roger LORANG Grégoire BINTNER Théodore WAGNER Alphonse WENNER Nicolaus HAUSEMER who sacrificed their lives for their homeland.

translation.lb: No der mass aweiong vun enger gedenktafel um kirfecht.
translation.en: After the mass, the inauguration of a memorial plaque at the cemetery.

translation.lb: 623b Mir bieden all ons membren un der feier délzehuelen.
translation.en: 623b We ask all our members to participate in the ceremony.

translation.lb: Unio'n Ce'sseng
translation.en: Union Ce'sseng

translation.lb: Amerika muss stârk bleiwen *
translation.en: America must remain strong *

translation.lb: De' neist riéd vum président Truman huet an der ganzer amerikanescher press e gro'ssen echo fond, de' a me' oder we'neger gro'sse commentaren des riéd commente'eren.
translation.en: President Truman's latest speech found a great echo in the entire American press, with more or less extensive commentaries on this speech.

translation.lb: Reportere mellen: Dem Truman seng neist riéd beweist, datt Amerika gewëllt ass seng gesamt machtmëttele fir d'ennerstëtzong vun der UNO anzesetzen, well si dat wirksamst instrument fir d'oprechterhale vum fridden duerstelle ge'w.
translation.en: Reporters report: Truman's latest speech demonstrates that America is willing to deploy all its power resources to support the UNO, as it represents the most effective instrument for maintaining peace.

translation.lb: De président huet d'Amerikaner virdru gewarnt, ze vill eng schnell démobilise'erong ze verlangen.
translation.en: The president previously warned Americans against demanding too rapid a demobilization.

translation.lb: Virléfeg gin d'klasse nach zum militärdengscht agezun, we' dat virgesi wor.
translation.en: For the time being, the classes are still being drafted for military service, as was intended.

translation.lb: De président ass iwerzégt, datt d'UNO am stand ass, de weltfridden tëschent de vëlker oprechtz'erhalen, obschon tëschent hinne gro'ss ënnerschéder an den traditio'nen, de weltuschauongen an an den intresse bestin.
translation.en: The president is convinced that the UNO is capable of maintaining world peace among the nations, despite the great differences in traditions, worldviews, and interests between them.

translation.lb: Iwer d'situatio'n am noen an am fèren oste sot de président Truman: Et si keng länner, de' am noen an am fèren oste so' gro'ss intressen hpn, datt d'UNO net amstand wir de' énzel froen, de' sech doraus ergin, ze le'sen.
translation.en: Regarding the situation in the Near and Far East, President Truman said: There are no countries in the Near and Far East with such great interests that the UNO would not be able to address the individual issues arising from them.

translation.lb: Hién erkennt un, datt Russland an England do gro'ss intressen hun, awer hién ass iwerzégt, datt de' be'd länner alles asetze fir eng friddlech verstännegong z'erréchen an domatt d'wierk vun der UNO z'ënnerstétzen.
translation.en: He acknowledges that Russia and England have significant interests there, but he is convinced that both countries will do everything to achieve a peaceful understanding and thereby support the work of the UNO.

translation.lb: E schëff get vun engem wâlfësch verfollegt.
translation.en: A ship is being pursued by a whale.

translation.lb: Fir dem ongeheier lass ze gin, le'sst de Kapitän eng bänk iwer 'bord wèrfen.
translation.en: To get rid of the monster, the captain throws a bench overboard.

translation.lb: De wâlfësch verschléngt se a setzt d'jucgd fort.
translation.en: The whale devours it and continues the chase.

translation.lb: De kapitän schmeisst eng këscht matt orangen an d'wâsser.
translation.en: The captain throws a box of oranges into the water.

translation.lb: De fësch verdillegt se ebenfalls, mé d'verfolgong gét weider.
translation.en: The fish swallows them too, but the pursuit continues.

translation.lb: De kapitän rauft sech d'hoer.
translation.en: The captain pulls his hair.

translation.lb: Hic rifft d'pass-ge'er zesummen, mécht si op d'gefôr opmierksam an erklärt, et war e judd an en araber um schëff, de' schold un dem ganzen onhél wären.
translation.en: He calls the passengers together, warns them of the danger, and explains that it was a Jew and an Arab on the ship who were to blame for all the trouble.

translation.lb: Hié le'sst se iwer bord wërfen, an de wâlfësch frësst se op.
translation.en: He has them thrown overboard, and the whale eats them.

translation.lb: Hié get op den deck gezun an opgeschnidden.
translation.en: He is pulled onto the deck and cut open.

translation.lb: Am bauch so'tz de judd op der bänk an huet dem araber d'orange verkâft.
translation.en: Inside the belly, the Jew sits on the bench and has sold the orange to the Arab.

translation.lb: Englesch Himalajaexpeditio’n
translation.en: English Himalaya expedition

translation.lb: Net nemme Russland berét eng Himalajaexpedito'n vir, mé och England.
translation.en: Not only Russia is preparing a Himalayan expedition, but also England.

translation.lb: De' englesch expeditio'n soll am joer 1947 stattfannen.
translation.en: The English expedition is supposed to take place in the year 1947.

translation.lb: D'expeditio'n stét ënner dem patronat vum englesche alpeklub.
translation.en: The expedition is under the patronage of the English Alpine Club.

translation.lb: Hire fiihrer, den Englänner George Shipton, wëllt matt neie mëttele versichen den héxte bierg vun der weit ze bezwengen.
translation.en: Their leader, the Englishman George Shipton, wants to try with new means to conquer the highest mountain in the world.

translation.lb: An der leschter expeditio'n war hié bis 91 m ënner de' héxt spëtz vum bierg komm.
translation.en: In the last expedition, he had reached up to 91 meters below the highest peak of the mountain.

translation.lb: Den Toscanini gét op Mailand.
translation.en: Toscanini is going to Milan.

translation.lb: Den Arturo Toscanini, den 1938 no Amerika gong, kennt elo fir d'e'scht an seng hémecht zréck.
translation.en: Arturo Toscanini, who went to America in 1938, is now for the first time returning to his homeland.

translation.lb: E war net matt der faschistescher regirong d'accord.
translation.en: He did not agree with the fascist government.

translation.lb: w. Jang:,,We' konnst du den hues da net treffen,"
translation.en: W. Jang: "Why can't you hit the hare then?"

translation.lb: Pîr: „Dat ass einfach.
translation.en: Pîr: "That's simple.

translation.lb: Den hues ass am zick-zack gelaf, ech hun och am zick-zack geschoss, mé wann den hues op zack war, da wär ech mam sche'ssen erc'scht op zick, so'- datt et emmer lanscht gong.
translation.en: The hare ran in zig-zag, and I also shot in zig-zag, but when the hare was in zig, I was only in zig during the shooting, so it always missed.

translation.lb: Dat klengt Lili ass gourmangzeg.
translation.en: The little Lili is greedy.

translation.lb: Lili: „So mamm, hues du mech gèr?"
translation.en: Lili: "Say mom, do you love me?"

translation.lb: Mamm: „Ech hun dech gèr, Lili."
translation.en: Mom: "I love you, Lili."

translation.lb: Lili: „Hues du mech le'wer we' alles op der weit, mamm?"
translation.en: Lili: "Do you love me more than anything in the world, mom?"

translation.lb: Mamm: „Bestemmt, Lili."
translation.en: Mom: "Certainly, Lili."

translation.lb: Lili: „Firwat divorce'erst' de da net mam papa, fir dech mam zockerbäcker ze bestueden?"
translation.en: Lili: "Why don't you divorce daddy to marry the confectioner?"

translation.lb: Ongaresch reparatio’nszuelongen * Virgëschter huet d'ongaresch regirong en ofkomme matt Russland a matt der Tschechoslowakei ënnerzéchent,
translation.en: Hungarian reparations Yesterday the Hungarian government signed an agreement with Russia and with Czechoslovakia,

translation.lb: an' dém d'rcparatio'nszuelonge festgesat si gin, de' et un de' bc'd länner ze mächen huet.
translation.en: and in which the reparations amounts were fixed, to be made to both countries.

translation.lb: Démno muss Ongarn u Russland 50 millio'ne pond sterling bezuelen, an zwar a form vu wueren.
translation.en: Accordingly, Hungary must pay Russia 50 million pounds sterling, in the form of goods.

translation.lb: D'iiweronge müssen an zeit vu 6 joer gesche'en.
translation.en: The payments must be made over a period of 6 years.

translation.lb: An dèr gleicher zeit huet Ongarn sech verpflicht, reparation'szuelongen an der he'cht vu 7,5 milllo'ne pond sterling un d'Tschechoslowakei ze bezuelen,
translation.en: At the same time, Hungary has committed to paying reparations amounting to 7.5 million pounds sterling to Czechoslovakia,

translation.lb: an zwar a form vu matière première, boer geld an arbecht.
translation.en: in the form of raw materials, cash, and labor.

translation.lb: Weider huet d'ongaresch regirong gro'ss veTStaatlechongsplange bekanntgin.
translation.en: Furthermore, the Hungarian government announced large plans for nationalization.

translation.lb: Et solle verstaatlecht gin: all bauxitgesellschaften, all aluminiumwierker, buedemueleg-installatio'nen, raffinerien an electrizite'tswierker.
translation.en: All bauxite companies, aluminum works, oil installations, refineries, and power plants are to be nationalized.

translation.lb: Och d'ongaresch banke sollen ënner stattlech controll ze stoe kommen.
translation.en: Hungarian banks are also to come under state control.

translation.lb: Kulturchronik Bibliographie Luxembourgeoise
translation.en: Culture Chronicle Luxembourg Bibliography

translation.lb: An der zeitschrëft „D'Hémeoht" vum 30. März 1946 ass d'letzeburger bibliographie vum 1. januar bis zum 31. März 1946 opgeziélt.
translation.en: In the magazine "D'Hémeoht" of March 30, 1946, the Luxembourg bibliography from January 1 to March 31, 1946, is listed.

translation.lb: Et sin am ganze 49 drockschrëften (bicher a brochüren) a 16 Periodiken (zeidongen an zeitschrëften) erauskomm.
translation.en: In total, there are 49 printed publications (books and brochures) and 16 periodicals (newspapers and magazines) published.

translation.lb: D'bicher verdéle sech ap de' verschidde gebidder: généralite'ten 6, arts 3, chronique 1940 — 1944 6, droit an économie politique 5, geschieht 2, deitsch literatur 2, franse'sch literatur 1, dialect-literatur 1, önnerhaltong 6, religio'n 2, wësse- Schaft 4, musekscécker 2, pédagogie 4.
translation.en: The books are distributed across various fields: generalities 6, arts 3, chronicle 1940 — 1944 6, law and political economy 5, history 2, German literature 2, French literature 1, dialect literature 1, entertainment 6, religion 2, science 4, music collectors 2, pedagogy 4.

translation.lb: Indien soll selwer bestëmmen *
translation.en: India should decide for itself *

translation.lb: An Indien huet den englesche minister fir Indien, Sir Stafford Cripps, indesch an engilesch Journalisten empfângen an hinnen erklärt:
translation.en: In India, the English minister for India, Sir Stafford Cripps, met with Indian and English journalists and explained to them:

translation.lb: D'verhandlongen matt den indesche politesche perse'nlechkéten wèrd nach eng zeitchen undaueren, ir eng définitiv entschédong fâle kann.
translation.en: The negotiations with the Indian political personalities will still take some time before a definitive decision can be made.

translation.lb: Ob d'britesch truppen an Indien bleiwen, stét elo nach net fest, dat sollen d'Inder selwer bestëmmen.
translation.en: Whether the British troops will remain in India is not yet determined, the Indians should decide that themselves.

translation.lb: D'rechter, de" d'minorite't an Indien kre'e soll, gin och net vun ons bestëmmt, mê vun den Inder selwer.
translation.en: The rights that the minorities in India shall receive are also not determined by us, but by the Indians themselves.

translation.lb: Et ass der englescher regirong de virworf gemäch gin, firwat de plang fir d'indesch verfassong net publize'ert gin ass.
translation.en: The English government has been accused of not publishing the plan for the Indian constitution.

translation.lb: Ech well dofir bemirken, datt mir net komm sin, fir den Inder ons décisio'nen opzedrängen, mé mir si nemme komm, fir den Inder bei hiren égene verhandlongen ze hëllefen.
translation.en: I want to point out that we have not come to impose our decisions on the Indians, but we have only come to assist the Indians in their own negotiations.

translation.lb: D'entschédong, watfir eng verfassong Indien kre'e soll, hängt énzeg an efleng vun den Ipder selwer of, mir sin hinnen dobei nemme behëlleflech.
translation.en: The decision on what kind of constitution India should have depends solely and entirely on the Indians themselves, we are merely assisting them.

translation.lb: Desch-Tennis DESCH-TENNIS D. T. Ho’wald—D. T. Mondorf?,???
translation.en: Table Tennis TABLE TENNIS D. T. Howald—D. T. Mondorf?,???

translation.lb: Haut den owend em 8 auer fënd am café Friedrich um Ho'wald dé matt spannong erwârte match D. T. Ho'wald ge'nt D. T, Mondorf statt.
translation.en: Tonight at 8 o'clock, the eagerly awaited match between D. T. Howald and D. T. Mondorf will take place at Café Friedrich in Howald.

translation.lb: D. T. Mondorf, eng matt dénc stärksten équipen trëtt complett un, d. h. matt dem letzeburger champion Roeser Pierre an sengem brudder Roeser Jeng;
translation.en: D. T. Mondorf, one of the strongest teams, competes fully staffed, with the Luxembourg champion Roeser Pierre and his brother Roeser Jeng;

translation.lb: de numm vun dcsen 2 spiller genügt schon elleng fir e verwinnt publikum, we' de letzeburger én ass, vollkommen ze befriddegen.
translation.en: the name of these two players alone is enough to fully satisfy a demanding audience, as they are Luxembourgish.

translation.lb: Wann de' 2 elo nach als gégner ké geréngeren we' de Steimetz Metty, Fischer, Wiltzius a Lamesch Mich hun, so' ass do succès vun dem owend gesechert an et lo'nt sech fir ail dësch-tennis-unhânger sech op den Ho'wald zc déplace'eren.
translation.en: If the two now have opponents no lesser than Steinmetz Metty, Fischer, Wiltzius, and Lamesch Mich, then the success of the evening is ensured, and it is worth it for all table tennis enthusiasts to head to Howald.

translation.lb: Den D. T. Ho'wald, encourage'ert durch hire sche'ne sieg vun e sonndeg, muss alles drusetzen fir och dese match ze gewannen an et ass um Steimetz, Fischer, Wiltzius, Lameseh a Schneider zc beweisen, datt den D. T. Ho'wald matt recht zu der beschter équipe hei am land gereohent get.
translation.en: D. T. Howald, emboldened by their fine victory on Sunday, must do everything to win this match as well, and it is up to Steinmetz, Fischer, Wiltzius, Lamesch, and Schneider to prove that D. T. Howald is rightly considered one of the best teams in the country.

translation.lb: Am virspill trëtt d'reservenéquipe matt Krecké, J. Entringer, Leclerc Raym., Leclerc R. a Mme Wiltzius ge'nt d'reserven vum D. T. Mondorf un.
translation.en: In the preliminary game, the reserve team with Krecké, J. Entringer, Leclerc Raym., Leclerc R., and Mme Wiltzius will compete against the reserves of D. T. Mondorf.

translation.lb: Fir den dfe'schtennis ze forderen get fir dese gro'sse match kén entrée opgehuewen..„.jame...
translation.en: To promote table tennis, no entrance fee will be charged for this big match... „...jame...

translation.en: You need: 1. 1 thimble;

translation.en: 3. needles of all sizes and lengths;

translation.lb: Den hèr GRANDGENET weist fir d'e'scht drop hin, datt d'arbechter et am schwe'erste gehat batte, fir resistenz ze löschten, well hinnen dann d'bro't geholl wär gin, wärend de' aner stänn alt e puer erspurnesser gehat hätten.
translation.en: Mr. GRANDGENET first points out that the workers had the hardest time extinguishing resistance because their bread would be taken while other ranks might have some savings.

translation.lb: E sét. datt villes versprach wär gin. a nach we'neg gehale go'w.
translation.en: He says many promises were made but few were kept.

translation.lb: D'mi nistere sollte neischt verspriéchen, wat se net ge'we wellen halen.
translation.en: The ministers should not promise anything they do not want to keep.

translation.lb: E verlängt dann e gesetz fir d'kannergelder.
translation.en: He demands a law for child allowances.

translation.lb: Jideré misst recht op arbecht hun.
translation.en: Everyone should have the right to work.

translation.lb: Och, de' leidd, de' scho 25 bis 30 joer hei am land sin. missten eng arbechtsermächtegong kre'en.
translation.en: Also, those who have been in the country for 25 to 30 years should receive a work permit.

translation.lb: Et waten der schons, de' se jt 3 me'nt op der strôss le'gen.
translation.en: There are already those who have been lying on the street for three months.

translation.lb: D'grenzarbechetr missten och me' lo'n kre'en.
translation.en: The cross-border workers should also receive more wages.

translation.lb: Dofir ge'w et nemmen é wé gin, nämlecb dén, datt eng taxe sollt op de' minette geluecht gin, de 'am ausländ gebrach an hei geschmolt get.
translation.en: Therefore, the only way would be to impose a tax on the ore brought from abroad and smelted here.

translation.lb: sét hién. datt net genuch sëcherhét an de betrieber wär.
translation.en: He says there is not enough security in the operations.

translation.lb: Am februar hätte missen 1000 leidd verbonne gin, de' licht oder schwe'er verletzt woren.
translation.en: In February, 1000 people had to be treated for light or severe injuries.

translation.lb: Da sét hién, d'ausschusswahlen, d'abteilong3- wahlen an d'sëcherhétsmânner wären 'e spe't gewiélt gin, an datt et elo hoffentlech besser gét.
translation.en: Then he says the committee elections, departmental elections, and security personnel were elected late, and that hopefully things will be better now.

translation.lb: Mé do firt den hèr Fohrmann em an d'wuert, a sét, ob hié vleicht ge'w wëllen insinue'eren, datt de' fre'er sëcherhétsmânner hir arbeebt net gudd gemäch hätten.
translation.en: But Mr. Fohrmann interrupts and asks if he might want to insinuate that the previous security personnel did not do their job well.

translation.lb: Den hèr SCHAFFNER brengt dann eppes ervir, wo' e mengt, datt dat ge'w geschwënn e scandai gin, wann do net gewiért gët.
translation.en: Mr. SCHAFFNER then brings up something that he believes will soon become a scandal if it is not addressed.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech em d'frae vun de giélemannercher an em d'fracn. de' hir manner durch d'Preise verluer hun.
translation.en: It concerns the wives of the soldiers and the women who have lost their husbands because of the Prussians.

translation.lb: „Mir, sot hién, de' am KZ woren.
translation.en: "We, he said, who were in the concentration camp.

translation.lb: mir sin eng verschwuere gemeinschaft, de' versprach huet, fir d'famillje vun déne leidd ze suergen. de' durch d'Preisen hirt liéwen hu misse Iôssen".
translation.en: we are a sworn community that promised to take care of the families of those people who had to give up their lives because of the Prussians."

translation.lb: De' leidd hätte recht op ene ordentlech ënaerstëtzong.
translation.en: Those people have the right to proper support.

translation.lb: Déne leidd muss gehollef gin.
translation.en: Those people must be helped.

translation.lb: Op en anert thema iwergoend, sét de riédner.
translation.en: Moving to another topic, the speaker says.

translation.lb: datt eis gemengenarbechter oft 5 bis 6 stonnen me' läng schaffen, fir hir sâchen à jour ze hun.
translation.en: that our municipal workers often work 5 to 6 hours longer to keep their matters up to date.

translation.lb: Si verdéngen ëffentlech gelueft ze gin.
translation.en: They deserve to be publicly praised.

translation.lb: Spora— Merlebach Dese match ass gedueeht fir d'Sporamannschaft a form fir a'Coupe des 3 Nations ze bréngen.
translation.en: This match is intended to get the Spora team in shape for the Coupe des 3 Nations.

translation.lb: En dèrf awer beileiwe net als en einfache galop d'entraînement ugekuckt gin.
translation.en: It should by no means be considered a simple training gallop.

translation.lb: Merlebach ass eng équipe de' net faxt.
translation.en: Merlebach is a team that does not mess around.

translation.lb: Champion vun der lothréngescher e'erendivisio'n (amateurs) konnten si eso'guer den F. C. Metz 1:0 schloen.
translation.en: As champions of the Lorraine honorary division (amateurs), they even managed to defeat F. C. Metz 1:0.

translation.lb: Als haptvedette bei Merlebach start de Müller, dé beim spill Lothringen—Letzeburg selektionne'ert wor.
translation.en: Müller, who was selected for the match Lorraine—Luxembourg, is starting as the main attraction for Merlebach.

translation.lb: De' Merlebacher triéde matt hirer completter équipe un, de' we' follegt héscht: Schuth, Kazmierzak, Luczak, Szablewski, Kieffer, Rosnik, De Guio, Müller, Gauthier, Schuss, Faure.
translation.en: The Merlebach team is competing with their full squad, which is as follows: Schuth, Kazmierzak, Luczak, Szablewski, Kieffer, Rosnik, De Guio, Müller, Gauthier, Schuss, Faure.

translation.en: For carpenters: veneer ovens with warm air, water and steam system, complete veneer presses available from: Mr. LORANG Construction Workshop Luxembourg, near Longwy 167 Tel.- 63-b6.

translation.en: For Easter and communion, place your order in time; salmon, turbot, chicken, trout, shrimp, etc.

translation.en: Late chicken and rabbit restaurant, special prices (At the small Gourmet) 1.8.

translation.lb: De völkerbond um stierwen
translation.en: The League of Nations is dying

translation.lb: We' gemellt get, soll de' lescht sëlzong vum völkerbond an der nexler woeh ofgehale gin.
translation.en: As reported, the last session of the League of Nations is supposed to take place next week.

translation.lb: Anzwësche verhandelen zwé délége'- erter vun der UNO matt der schweizer bundesregirong iwer d'iwerhuele vun de gebeier vum vülkerbondspalais zu Genf durch d'UNO.
translation.en: Meanwhile, two delegates from the UN are negotiating with the Swiss federal government about taking over the premises of the League of Nations' palace in Geneva by the UN.

translation.lb: No ofschloss vun de verhandlongen wèrd d'UNO driwer entschéden, we' de' prachtvoll gebeier am beschte gebraucht kennte gin.
translation.en: After the conclusion of the negotiations, the UN will decide how the magnificent building can best be used.

translation.lb: Well dese paalis cso' wonnerbar setzongssäll huet an all arichtonge fir d'ophuele vun enger internationaler organisatio'n, get ugeholl, datt d'UNO en och dofir belée wèrd.
translation.en: Since this palace has such wonderful meeting rooms and all the facilities for accommodating an international organization, it is assumed that the UN will also use it for that purpose.

translation.lb: Enner anerem huet de Palais och de' berühmt Rockefeller-bibliothe'k, de' 300 000 bänn emfâsst.
translation.en: Among other things, the palace also has the famous Rockefeller library, which contains 300,000 volumes.

translation.lb: Bal all dedege'ert vun der UNO sin der ménong, datt Genf a nexter zeit de sammelponkt an Europa get fir international tagongen.
translation.en: Almost all the delegates of the UN are of the opinion that Geneva will soon become the meeting point in Europe for international conferences.

translation.lb: D’dréchelée vun der insel Walcheren
translation.en: The devastation of the island of Walcheren

translation.lb: D'dréchelée vun der insel Walcheren, op dèr am leschte krich vil! gekämpft goV a wo' bei der stad We3tkapelle an enger stonn me' we' 10.000 leidd gefall woren, ass cso' weit fèrdeg.
translation.en: The devastation of the island of Walcheren, where there was much fighting in the last war and where, near the city of Westkapelle, in one hour more than 10,000 people fell, is almost complete.

translation.lb: Çelgien hat Holland e crédit à découvert vu 75 millio'nen, de' a materialliweronge besten hun! zur verfügong gestallt.
translation.en: Belgium has provided Holland with an overdraft credit of 75 million, which was used for material supplies!

translation.lb: De 6. juni 1944.
An der Normandie hämmere »chwe'er bommen op den Atlantikwall.
translation.en: In Normandy, heavy bombs hammer the Atlantic Wall.

translation.lb: D'englesch flott zitt lânscht der küst op.
translation.en: The English fleet sails along the coast.

translation.lb: Et bestét kén zweiwel me'.
translation.en: There is no doubt anymore.

translation.lb: D'deitscht Oberkommando get uerder, de' virgesin reserven erunzeze'en, besonnesch de' berüchtegt panzerdivisio'nen.
translation.en: The German High Command orders the deployment of designated reserves, especially the notorious armored divisions.

translation.lb: Des panzerdivisio'nen hun ower matt den onerwardste schwlregkéten ze din: si kommen onvollatänneg, auserné gerass, zersléckelt, an ctnmer matt katastrophaler verspe'dong un.
translation.en: These armored divisions, however, face unexpected difficulties: they arrive incomplete, disorganized, scattered, and always with catastrophic delays.

translation.lb: Am hinterland spränge nämlech strôssen an d'Iûcht, d'dépôt'e flamen, d'brécke stîrzen zesummen, so'guer d'ennerirdesch telefonslinne gi keng verbindong me' duerch.
translation.en: In the hinterland, roads are blown up, depots are aflame, bridges collapse, and even underground telephone lines no longer connect.

translation.lb: Ail des onuerdnong ass fein organise'ert, si zerste'ert de' deitsch berechnongen a compense'ert glécklccherweis de retard, dén d'Allie'ert duerch e * stürm um miér krit haten.
translation.en: All this chaos is finely organized, it disrupts the German calculations and fortunately compensates for the delay the Allies suffered due to a storm at sea.

translation.lb: Haut wësse mer, datt des ganz organisatio'n an déne klengsten détailler ausgearbecht gi war, datt et de „Schildkröte-Plang" war, an datt den Organisator dervun André Rondenay gehéscht huet.
translation.en: Today we know that this entire operation was worked out in the smallest details, that it was the 'Turtle Plan', and that its organizer was called André Rondenay.

translation.lb: Den englesche budget
translation.en: The English budget

translation.lb: Den englesche finanzminister, sir Hugh Dalton, huet de budget fir de neien exercice opgestallt.
translation.en: The English finance minister, Sir Hugh Dalton, has drafted the budget for the new fiscal year.

translation.lb: Hién ass optimistesch, well England dest joer nure 4 milliarde pond ausgët, ongefe'er 25% we'neger we' d'ilèscht joer.
translation.en: He is optimistic because England is only spending 4 billion pounds this year, approximately 25% less than last year.

translation.lb: Den defizit bedre't 2200 millio'nen, eppes 100 millio'ne we'neger we' allgemeng erward gi war.
translation.en: The deficit amounts to 2200 million, about 100 million less than was generally expected.

translation.lb: De finanzminister beto'nt, dalt d'recetten sech op 3284 millio'ne pond belafen, wat ronn 19 millio'ne me' ass, we' de sir Andersen virgesin bât.
translation.en: The finance minister emphasizes that the revenues amount to 3284 million pounds, which is about 19 million more than Sir Andersen had predicted.

translation.lb: Hei sin e puer zuelen aus den dépensen:
translation.en: Here are some numbers from the expenditures:

translation.lb: 1773 millio'ne pond fir: Innenministerium, gesondhét, erze'ong, landwirtschaft an ausseministerium;
translation.en: 1773 million pounds for: the Ministry of the Interior, health, education, agriculture, and foreign ministry;

translation.lb: national verteidegorig: 1667 millio'ne pond (1938: 197 millio'nen),
translation.en: national defense: 1667 million pounds (1938: 197 million),

translation.lb: wo'vun 300 000 pond fir gasmaske bestëmmt sin;
translation.en: of which 300,000 pounds are intended for gas masks;

translation.lb: subsidien fir d'preisser vum ravitaillement erafzedrécken: 81 millio'ne fir bro't, 62 millio'ne fir mëllech, 17,5 millio'ne fir zocker, 8,5 millio'ne fir gromperen.
translation.en: subsidies to lower the prices of supplies: 81 million for bread, 62 million for milk, 17.5 million for sugar, 8.5 million for potatoes.

translation.lb: Fir d'Preisen an d'E'streicher z'ernieren, si 50 millio'ne pond virgesin, o'ni de' 90 millio'ne fir d'UNRRA.
translation.en: To maintain prices and essentials, 50 million pounds are allocated, excluding the 90 million for UNRRA.

translation.lb: Fir den Alilie'erten ze hëllefen, gin 20 mitlio'nen ausgin.
translation.en: To help the Allies, 20 million are spent.

translation.lb: Den englesche beilrag fir d'UNO beléft sech op • 600 000 pond.
translation.en: The British contribution to the UNO amounts to 600,000 pounds.

translation.lb: England huet beim Vëlkerbond nach eng schold fir 124 000 pond.
translation.en: England still owes the League of Nations 124,000 pounds.

translation.lb: D'member aus dem parlament haschten 40 000 pond.
translation.en: The members of parliament cost 40,000 pounds.

translation.lb: De geheimdéngscht brauch 2.5 millio'nen.
translation.en: The secret service requires 2.5 million.

translation.lb: (E pond ass elo ongefe'er 176 fr.)
translation.en: (A pound is now approximately 176 francs.)

translation.lb: Kulturchronik Emile Bréhier 70 joer âl.
translation.en: Culture Chronicle Emile Bréhier 70 years old.

translation.lb: Den 12. abrël ass den hèr E m i le Bréhier, professer vun der philosophie un der Sorbonne, 70 joer âl gin.
translation.en: On April 12, Mr. Emile Bréhier, professor of philosophy at the Sorbonne, turned 70 years old.

translation.lb: Hién ass de nofolger vum Henri Bergson an der Académie des sciences et politiques gin.
translation.en: He became the successor of Henri Bergson at the Academy of Sciences and Politics.

translation.lb: Hién ass é vun den dichtegste franse'sche philosophiegeschichtler.
translation.en: He is one of the most important French historians of philosophy.

translation.lb: Hién huet sech gro'ss verdengschter erw-uerwen durch d'organise'ere vu philosopheschen internationale congresser, durch d'erausgin vun der „Revue philosophique" an durch eng philoißphiege schiebt.
translation.en: He earned great merits by organizing international philosophical congresses, by publishing the "Revue philosophique," and through writings in philosophy.

translation.lb: D’krichsverloschter
translation.en: The war losses

translation.lb: D'international commissio'n, de' zu London d'europäcsch Probleme stude'ert, huet e rapport erausgin.
translation.en: The international commission, which studied European problems in London, released a report.

translation.lb: Doraus gét ervir, datt den Hitler geplangt bât, d'deitsch bevëlkerong hei an Europa an d'majorite't ze setzen, andern datt d'judden ausgemerzt an d'geburten an déne netdeitsche länner reduze'ert sollte gin.
translation.en: It emerges that Hitler planned to make the German population the majority in Europe while exterminating the Jews and reducing births in non-German countries.

translation.lb: Dese plang war eng réussite, mc den allie'erte sieg huet verhennert, datt den deitsche bevëlkerongsiwerschoss op de' oecupe'ert länner versprét go'w.
translation.en: This plan was a success, but the Allied victory prevented the German population surplus from spreading to the occupied countries.

translation.lb: Wärend déne 7 joer virum krich huet eng bewosst Propaganda eng vermehreng vun 800.000 mariagen a vun 1506000 geburte matt sech bruecht^.
translation.en: During the seven years before the war, deliberate propaganda resulted in an increase of 800,000 marriages and 1,506,000 births.

translation.lb: De' deitsch verlöschter op der west- an der Ostfront belafen sech op ronn 3 millio'ne mann.
translation.en: The German losses on the western and eastern fronts amount to about 3 million men.

translation.lb: D'deitsch bevëlkerong huet em 7,5 Prozent zo'- geholl an errécht 72 millio'ne mënschen,
translation.en: The German population increased by around 7.5 percent, reaching 72 million people,

translation.lb: Polen huet am méschten ënnert dem krich gelidden.
translation.en: Poland suffered the most during the war.

translation.lb: Seng bevëlkerong vu virum krich ass em 13,6 Prozent zréckgâng.
translation.en: Its pre-war population decreased by 13.6 percent.

translation.lb: Russland huet ongefe'er 7 millio'ne mann verluer.
translation.en: Russia lost about 7 million men.

translation.lb: England ziélt u verlöschter eng gesamtzuel vun 397.591 mann.
translation.en: England reports a total loss of 397,591 men.

translation.lb: Dovun entfalen der 290.500 op d'arme' 45.300 op d'handelsflott, 61.791 op d'zivilbevëlkerong an op d'Home Guard, wat 0.13 Prozent vun der gesamtbevëlkerong ausmécht.
translation.en: Of these, 290,500 are from the army, 45,300 from the merchant fleet, 61,791 from the civilian population and Home Guard, making up 0.13 percent of the total population.

translation.lb: D'militär an d'zivilverloschter vun de Franso'se belafen sech op 820.000 mann, ongefe'er 2 prozent vun der gesamtbevëlkerong.
translation.en: The French military and civilian losses amount to 820,000 men, about 2 percent of the total population.

translation.lb: Holland huet 204.000 mann verluer, dat sin 2,2 prozent.
translation.en: Holland lost 204,000 men, which is 2.2 percent.

translation.lb: Belgien hat verlöschter an enger he'cht vun 125000 mann, ongefe'er 1,5 Prozent.
translation.en: Belgium had losses amounting to 125,000 men, approximately 1.5 percent.

translation.lb: Norwegen huet 11.000 mann verluer.
translation.en: Norway lost 11,000 men.

translation.lb: Den allie'erte rapport bemierkt datt den Hitler an 3 ponkten erfolleg hat: de' deitsch bevëlkerong an d'hecht ze dreiwen; de' méscht judden aus Europa ze liquide'erend'geburten an denen occupe'crte länl ner ze beschränken.
translation.en: The Allied report notes that Hitler had success in three points: pushing the German population to new heights; liquidating most Jews from Europe; and restricting births in the occupied countries.

translation.lb: De' gefor, de' doraus erwtsst, ass keng kleng, bcsonnesch well de' deitsch bevëlkerong zo'geholl huet a well den territorium mc' kleng gin ass.
translation.en: The danger that arises is not small, especially since the German population has increased and because the territory has become smaller.

translation.lb: Eng fro un ons prisongsverwaltong oder E wénk un ons lues a gelënd épuratio’n Frôt Dir emol den hèr Kratzenberg,
translation.en: A question to our prison administration or a nod to our slow and gentle purification, ask Mr. Kratzenberg,

translation.lb: W'at me'gen d'Preisen zo' Nuerenberg, Wann si elo d'gro'ss richter wèren An op der bänk, do se'tzen de' aner hèren?
translation.en: What do the Prussians in Nuremberg think, when they are now the great judges seated on the bench while the others stand?

translation.lb: Da sét hién léch: Dat wier en hackekreitzgenoss!
translation.en: Then he straightaway said: That was a member of the swastika society!

translation.lb: 'T war ké prozess! Si ge'wen ail erschoss!
translation.en: There was no trial! They were all shot!

translation.lb: E politesche prisonne'er vu 1940.
translation.en: A political prisoner from 1940.

translation.lb: Haut erem sëtzong vum secherhétsrot *
translation.en: Today again a meeting of the Security Council *

translation.lb: Vu New York get vu gudd ennerrîchte kréser gemellt, datt de russeschen antrag, d'persesch fro ganz vun der dagesuerdnong vum weltsecherhétsrot ze streichen amplaz se nemme bis op de 6. mé ze verléen, vun Amerika an England ofgelént ge'w gin.
translation.en: It is reported from well-informed circles in New York that the Russian proposal to completely remove the Persian question from the agenda of the World Security Council instead of merely postponing it to May 6th has been rejected by America and England.

translation.lb: De weltsecherhétsrot trëlt haut erem um 21 auer deitscher zeit zu New York zesummen.
translation.en: The World Security Council is meeting again today at 21:00 German time in New York.

translation.lb: De russeschen antrag ass gëschler den delege erlen vum rot ausgehännegt gin, et get dofir ugeholl, datt den antrag net virun donneschdeg op der dagesurdnong erschenge kann
translation.en: The Russian proposal was distributed to the council delegates yesterday, so it is assumed that the proposal cannot appear on the agenda before Thursday.

translation.lb: Vu Washington get gemellt, datt wa neischt dertëschent ke'm, Amerika an England sech ge'nt de versuch vun der polnescher regirong stelle wèrden, d'spuenesch fro viiun de weltsecherhétsrol ze brengen.
translation.en: Reports from Washington indicate that if nothing intervenes, America and England will oppose the Polish government's attempt to bring the Spanish question before the World Security Council.

translation.lb: De polneschen delege'erten, den Dr. Lange, wèrd sein antrag wahrscheinlech awer ere'scht an der mëtt oder uni enn vun deser woçh abrenge kennen.
translation.en: The Polish delegate, Dr. Lange, will probably only be able to submit his proposal in the middle or towards the end of this week.

translation.lb: OEUVRE NATIONALE DE SECOURS GRANDE-DUCHESSE CHARLOTTE D'Oeuvre Nationale de Secours Grande-Duchesse Charlotte verkéft:
translation.en: OEUVRE NATIONALE DE SECOURS GRANDE-DUCHESSE CHARLOTTE The National Relief Organization of Grand Duchess Charlotte is selling:

translation.en: this year at the Eimaischen an ashtray that you will certainly like, because it represents something very Luxembourgish: A peckvillchen.

translation.en: But not only the subject, the entire piece is homemade:

translation.lb: Vu Letzeburger entworf an ausgefe'ert, aus letzeburger iérd gebâk an der âler No'spelter traditio'n.
translation.en: Designed and executed by Luxembourgers, made from Luxembourg clay in the old Nospelt tradition.

translation.lb: Ewe' de' âner joere get et nemmen eng bestömmten zuel dervun.
translation.en: Just like other years, only a certain number of them will be available.

translation.lb: Dofir mächt Iéch matt zeite bei.
translation.en: Therefore, join in on time.

translation.lb: Ewell et sin der net vill do an se si bëlleg: 35 frang! 906
translation.en: Since there aren't many available and they are cheap: 35 francs! 906

translation.lb: Zu onser enquête iwert d’Reconstructio’n: Privatinitiative!!
translation.en: On our investigation about the reconstruction: private initiative!!

translation.lb: Aus enger uèrtschaft am Iand gin ons folgend fait'e mattgedélt:
translation.en: From a locality in the country, we received the following facts:

translation.lb: We' allgemeng bekannt ass, get an der Reconstructio'n durchweg e bauindei vu 5,5 ugeholl.
translation.en: As is generally known, a construction index of 5.5 is assumed throughout the reconstruction.

translation.lb: An anere wiérder: wann en haus virum krich 100 000 frang kascht huet, da kascht et der elo 550 000.
translation.en: In other words: if a house cost 100,000 francs before the war, it now costs 550,000.

translation.lb: Des tatsâch könnt ons einfach net an de kapp eragoen, a mir hu matt alle mëttelen no engem auswé aus desem scMamassel gesicht.
translation.en: We simply cannot comprehend this fact, and we have sought every means to find a way out of this chaos.

translation.lb: Et war fir ons kloer, datt de' e'scht phase vun der Reconstructio'n ons munnech fundamental irtëmmer opgedeckt huet.
translation.en: It was clear to us that the first phase of the reconstruction revealed many fundamental errors.

translation.lb: Do hu mir décide'ert, ons selwer drun ze gin.
translation.en: There we decided to take matters into our own hands.

translation.lb: Mir hun ons geld geie'nt, handwierker engage'ert, an du si mer op ége fauscht lassgefuer.
translation.en: We pooled our money, hired artisans, and then embarked on our own initiative.

translation.lb: No e puer me'nt Reconstructio'n no onser mane'er si mir op engem bauindex vun 3 —3,5 ukomm
translation.en: After a few months of reconstruction in our manner, we reached a construction index of 3 to 3.5.

translation.lb: Mir hätte bestëmmt nach bëWeger schaffe këunen, wann d'verhältnesser net an allen hinsichte fir ons ongënschteg gewiéscht wiren.
translation.en: We could certainly have achieved more if the conditions had not been unfavorable for us in every aspect.

translation.lb: Hei nëmmen e puer zuelen: Fir d'gipse gin an der Reconstructio'n 104.— frang de qm bezuedt.
translation.en: Here just a few figures: for the gypsum, 104 francs per square meter are paid in the reconstruction.

translation.lb: Mir mächen et fir 50.— frang.
translation.en: We do it for 50 francs.

translation.lb: Den ofbroch, den an der Reconstructio'n ebenfalls 104.— frang de cbm ze stoe kennt, dé mâche mir scho fir 42 —60 frang de cbm.
translation.en: The demolition, which also costs 104 francs per cubic meter in the reconstruction, we already do for 42 to 60 francs per cubic meter.

translation.lb: De cbm mauerwierk, dén an der Reconstructio'n ongefc'cr 550 frang kascht, hoffe mir ënner 300 frang fèrdeg ze bréngen.
translation.en: The cubic meter of masonry, which costs about 550 francs in the reconstruction, we hope to finish for under 300 francs.

translation.lb: Mir denken, datt mer iéch a ganz kurzer zeit weider interessant zuelen ënnerbréde kënnen".
translation.en: We think that we will be able to present more interesting figures in a very short time.

translation.lb: Wa mir am ganze land op deseni wé virge'ngen, an dodurch e bauindex vun 3,5 erréche ge'wen, da kennten op der reconslructio'n ongefe'er 2 milliarde gespuert gin, an de ganzen opbau wir 4—5 joer e'schter fèrdeg.
translation.en: If we proceeded this way throughout the whole country and thus achieved a construction index of 3.5, around 2 billion could be saved in the reconstruction, and the entire rebuilding could be completed 4 to 5 years earlier.

translation.lb: Mir rechne malt weideren zo'- schrëfte vun onse liéser.
translation.en: We expect further writings from our readers.

translation.lb: Mir înussen e bessere wé fannen.
translation.en: We must find a better way.

translation.lb: Entspannong. am secherhétsrot
translation.en: Calm in the security council.

translation.lb: Virgëschter donneschdeg hât de weltsecherhétsrot seng lescht sëtzong virun den o'schteren.
translation.en: Yesterday, Thursday, the world security council held its last session before Easter.

translation.lb: An deser sëtzong, de' bis weit an d'nuecht gedauert huet, go'w beschloss, de' next sëtzong en dënschdeg ofzehalen.
translation.en: In this session, which lasted late into the night, it was decided to hold the next session on Tuesday.

translation.lb: An dèr leschter sëtzong sin allerhand diametral virschle' eso'wuel vum russeschen delege'ertem Gromyko, we' vum englesche vertrieder Cadogan gemäch gin.
translation.en: In the last session, a variety of diametrically opposed proposals were made by both the Russian delegate Gromyko and the English representative Cadogan.

translation.lb: Den australeschen delege'erten huet e projet fir eng resolutio'n eragin, no dèr eng spezial commissio'n a Spuenien geschéckt soll gin, de' feststelle soll, we' et matt der spuenescher oprëschtong stét, an ob wirklech eng gefor fir de weltfridden entstoe kënnt.
translation.en: The Australian delegate submitted a project for a resolution, according to which a special commission should be sent to Spain to determine the state of Spanish armament and whether there is truly a danger arising for world peace.

translation.lb: D'chancen, datt des resolutio'n ugeholl get, si nach net kloer, mé op jidde fall huet d'australesch resolutio'n eng gewëssen entspannong am rot brnecht, dé wärend drei stonnen d'thesen vum russeschen a vum engleschen delege'erten huet missen unhe'eren.
translation.en: The chances that this resolution will be accepted are not yet clear, but in any case, the Australian resolution brought some relief to the council, which had to endure the theses of the Russian and English delegates for three hours.

translation.lb: We' de Gromyko matt schwetze fèrdeg wor, wor d'kluft tëschent den extreme ménongen eso' de'f we' je.
translation.en: When Gromyko had finished speaking, the gap between the extreme opinions was as profound as ever.

translation.lb: Dofir wor de'moment vun der australescher resolutio'n ganz richt«g gewiélt, grad am moment, we' d'spannong op engem he'chponkt ukomm wor.
translation.en: Therefore, the timing of the Australian resolution was quite right, just at the moment when tension had reached a peak.

translation.lb: Um virowend vun den o'schteren, huet trotzdém e lächeln an de gestellter vun den delege'erten sech gewisen a beim ausgank könnt én den amerikaneschen delege'erten Stettinius gesin, we' en ârm an arm matt engem russeschen admirol aus dem sëtzongsall komm ass.
translation.en: On the eve of Easter, a smile nevertheless appeared on the faces of the delegates, and at the exit, one could see the American delegate Stettinius walking arm in arm with a Russian admiral out of the session hall.

translation.lb: Watfir en o'schteré wèrd dem weltsecherhétsrot geluegt gin?
translation.en: What kind of Easter will be granted to the world security council?

translation.lb: Dat gesi mer de nexten dënschdeg, wann d'persesch fro erem zur discussio'n kënnt.
translation.en: We will see that next Tuesday when the Persian question comes back for discussion.

translation.lb: Resistenzdég vun der Unio’n
translation.en: Resistance Days of the Union

translation.lb: Den 10. me 1940 huet de Preiss feig onst land iwerfall.
translation.en: On May 10, 1940, the Prussians cowardly invaded our country.

translation.lb: We' huet d'Letzeburger vollek sech vun dém dag un zum ënnerdrécker verhalen.
translation.en: How did the Luxembourgish people behave towards the oppressor from that day on?

translation.lb: Wat ass an der rtuecht vum 9. cp den 10. mé geschitt?
translation.en: What happened in the city on the night of May 9 to 10?

translation.lb: We' war et op der Fielsmillen?
translation.en: What was it like at Fielsmillen?

translation.lb: Wat huet sech zu Esch, zu De'fferdeng an zu Rodange ofgespillt?
translation.en: What took place in Esch, Differdange, and Rodange?

translation.lb: We' ass et an der stad gânge we' d'Preise ko'men?
translation.en: What happened in the city when the Prussians came?

translation.lb: D'äntwert op ail de' froe kre'e mer an de Resistenzdég vun der UNIO'N de 9. bis de 14 mé 1946.
translation.en: The answer to all these questions we will receive during the Resistance Days of the UNION from May 9 to 14, 1946.

translation.lb: Resistenzdég vun der Unio’n Vum 9. bis <le 14. mé eriiéwe mer crem d'resistenz vun de Lelzeburger ge'nt den ënnerdrécker.
translation.en: Days of Resistance of the Union From the 9th to the 14th, we celebrate the resistance of the Luxembourgers against the oppressors.

translation.lb: Duerniéwenl sol'le mer och wessen, wal de' aner länner an der resislcnz gelöscht hun.
translation.en: Additionally, we should also know what other countries have achieved in terms of resistance.

translation.lb: E sche'nt beispill heivu gel ons de film „La dernière Chance", dé mer och an desen dég ze gesi kre'en.
translation.en: A good example of this is the film "The Last Chance," which we can also see during these days.

translation.lb: Et ass e film, dén ons alleguerten eppes ugét, et ass ké roman et ass keng geschieht, et ass neischt erducchtenes, et ass erliéwtes, an zwar dal, wat och mir an déne Lsclile jocren eriiéwt hun.
translation.en: It is a film that concerns us all, it is not a novel, it is not a story, it is nothing fictitious, it is experienced, just like what we also experienced in those hard years.

translation.lb: Mir komme nach me' ausfc'erlech op de fil"' La dernière Chance" zréck.
translation.en: We will return to the film "The Last Chance" in more detail later.

translation.lb: Kurz bemiérkt:
translation.en: Briefly noted:

translation.lb: Oslo: De geldemlaf a Norwegen huet d'zuel vun 1.566 millio'ne kro'nen errécht, dat sin 520 kro'nen op, de kapp.
translation.en: Oslo: The money circulation in Norway has reached the sum of 1.566 million kroner, which is 520 kroner per capita.

translation.lb: Virum krich wor de geldemlaf nemmen den drëtten dél vun dem jetzegen.
translation.en: Before the war, the money circulation was only a third of what it is now.

translation.lb: Bombay: De President Hoover huet Bombay a richtong Bangalore verlöss, wo' en zwé dég bleiwt.
translation.en: Bombay: President Hoover has left Bombay heading towards Bangalore, where he will stay for two days.

translation.lb: Teheran: Et ass décide'ert gin, eng asserbeidschaner missio'n no Teheran ze schécken.
translation.en: Teheran: It has been decided to send an Azerbaijani mission to Teheran.

translation.lb: Washington: D'amerikanesch regirong beme't sech de streik vun de mineuren, dén ela schon 20 dég dauert, ze regle'eren.
translation.en: Washington: The American government is attempting to resolve the miners' strike, which has already lasted 20 days.

translation.lb: Buenos Aires: De 4. juni, de joresdag vun der revolutio'n am joer 1943, ass den offiziellen datum, un dém de' nei regirong Peron installe'ert get.
translation.en: Buenos Aires: June 4th, the anniversary of the 1943 revolution, is the official date on which the new Peron government will be installed.

translation.lb: Prag: D'tschechoslowakesch regirong erkennt d'e'streichesch un.
translation.en: Prague: The Czechoslovak government recognizes the Austrian one.

translation.lb: Washington: D'polnesch provisoresch regirong krut vun Amerika e credit gewährt matt der conditio'n, datt si d'bestëmmonge vun der Potsdamer an der Jaltaer conferenz anhale ge'w.
translation.en: Washington: The Polish provisional government received credit from America with the condition that they adhere to the provisions of the Potsdam and Yalta Conferences.

translation.lb: An anere wirder si muss frei wählen ofhalen.
translation.en: In other words, they must hold free elections.

translation.lb: Telévisio’n Vu m 27. mé un soll d'telévisio'n am Londoner Alexanderpalais eren opgeholl gin.
translation.en: Television From May 27, television broadcasts are supposed to be taken up again at the London Alexander Palace.

translation.lb: De' e'scht gre'sst émissio'n fënd den 8. juni statt.
translation.en: The first major broadcast will take place on June 8.

translation.lb: D'camera soll vis-à-vis vun der kineks. tribiin opgestallt gin.
translation.en: The camera is to be set up opposite the royal box.

translation.lb: Virléfeg ge t matt enger émissio'n vu 4 stonne gerechent.
translation.en: Provisionally, a broadcast of 4 hours is being planned.

translation.lb: Resistenzdég vun der Unio’n Als énzeg sche'n alédong vun liire resistenzdég bréngt d'UNIO'N de film „La dernière Chance".
translation.en: Resistance Days of the Union As a single memorable aspect of their resistance days, the UNION introduces the film 'The Last Chance.'

translation.lb: Hei wat d'auslännesch press iwer dese bèschte resistenzfilm schreiwt: „Dqily News", den 28. nov. 1945:
translation.en: Here is what the foreign press writes about this outstanding resistance film: 'Daily News', November 28, 1945:

translation.lb: Et ass me'glech, datt Hollywood sech net vun A bis Z vun der Schweiz inspire'ere le'sst.
translation.en: It is possible that Hollywood will not let itself be inspired by Switzerland from A to Z.

translation.lb: Et ka sech iéwel e bild drun huelen, we' d'Sckweizer e sujet upâken an durstellen.
translation.en: It can certainly take a cue from how the Swiss tackle and portray a subject.

translation.lb: An et ka bestëmmt eppes do le'eren.
translation.en: And it can certainly learn something from it.

translation.lb: „New York Times" den 28. 11. 45. D'Schweiz schéckt ans do en oprichtegeii a liéwege film.
translation.en: 'New York Times' November 28, 1945: Switzerland sends us here a sincere and lively film.

translation.lb: El ass e splgel,' aus -dem de' gro ss not eraüskuckt an d'angscbt, ënner dèr d'Jeidd.an Eurojia. am krich geliéwt h un vis-à-vis vitui Preiss.
translation.en: It is a mirror from which the great distress and fear emerge, under which the people in Europe lived during the war, concerning the situation with the Preis.

translation.lb: Realise'ert go'f de film an der Schweiz matt dem gro'ssarlegen an natiflechen dccor vun de birger an de landschaflen vun dem Piémont.
translation.en: The film was realized in Switzerland with the grandeur and natural scenery of the Alps and the landscapes of Piedmont.

translation.lb: Et get doriwer neinmen e Iuef, a jidferén, dé fréd un engem gudde, gesonde film huet, kënnt me' ewe' op seng rechnong.
translation.en: There is nothing but praise for it, and anyone who enjoys a good, wholesome film will find it well worth their while.

translation.lb: E geschäftshaus, gelée Gro's&gftss 38, gro ss 0,72 ar, as.s zo'geschloe gin un den hèr Alphonse Roth vu Soller, zum preis vu 24 000 fr.
translation.en: A commercial building, located on Grossengasse 38, with an area of 0.72 ares, was sold to Mr. Alphonse Roth from Soller for 24,000 francs.

translation.lb: En haus, geléeri..ani Graefchen ", gro ss 0,44 ar, go'f gestél vum hèr Martin Schneider, entrepreneur vu Woltz, tir 79 500 fr.
translation.en: A house, located on Graefchen, with an area of 0.44 ares, was purchased by Mr. Martin Schneider, entrepreneur from Wiltz, for 79,500 francs.

translation.lb: En herrschafllecht wunnhaus. gelée lir. 36 Burrewé, desgleichen e gârd, och do, go'we weilt ortgenigcnder offer net zo'geschloen.
translation.en: A grand residential house, located on 36 Burrewé, along with a garden there, was not sold due to insufficient offers.

translation.lb: En akerstéck, gelée „Balzendellt", gro'ss 60,20 ar, go'f ugestét vom her Michel Spedener vu Woltz fir 15 000 fr.
translation.en: A plot of land, located in Balzendellt, with an area of 60.20 ares, was sold to Mr. Michel Spedener from Wiltz for 15,000 francs.

translation.lb: En annerf. gel den „am Gro'ssenberg", gro'ss 9,50 ar, go'f zo'geschloen dem lier Théophile Conter vu WoHtz fir 6000 fr.
translation.en: Another plot, located in "am Grossenberg", with an area of 9.50 ares, was sold to Mr. Théophile Conter from Wiltz for 6,000 francs.

translation.lb: En anert vun 81.50 ar, geléen „an der Houscht ", go'f ugestét vum hèr Nicolas Strolz \u Nidderwoltz fir 14 000 fr.
translation.en: Another piece with an area of 81.50 ares, located in "an der Houscht", was bought by Mr. Nicolas Strolz from Niederwiltz for 14,000 francs.

translation.lb: En akerfeld, geleeen „an der Brochdcllt", gro'ss 218,50 ar, go'f zo'geschloen dem hèr I.éoii Kemp vu Weggdigea fir 51 000 frang.
translation.en: A field, located in "an der Brochdell", with an area of 218.50 ares, was sold to Mr. Léon Kemp from Wégdigen for 51,000 francs.

translation.lb: En akerfeld matt 12järeger denneptanzong, gro'ss 215,90 ar, ge'léen „op Staemicbt", go'f ugeslét vum her Victor Dieschbourg vu Woltz fir 56 000 fr.
translation.en: A field with a 12-year-old plantation, covering 215.90 ares, located "op Staemicbt", was purchased by Mr. Victor Dieschbourg from Wiltz for 56,000 francs.

translation.lb: Eng wiss matt 30järeger denneplanzong, gro'ss 133,90 ar, go'f zo'geschloen un de' hère Kemp vu Weggdigen a Jang Schmilz vu Woltz fir 25 1O0 fr.
translation.en: A meadow with a 30-year-old plantation, covering 133.90 ares, was sold to Mr. Kemp from Wégdigen and Jang Schmilz from Wiltz for 25,100 francs.

translation.lb: De gesamterle's vun der sie beléft sech op 486 600 fr.
translation.en: The total revenue from the sales amounts to 486,600 francs.

translation.lb: „Visitez les ruines de Beaufort“
translation.en: "Visit the ruins of Beaufort"

translation.lb: Zënter Pengscbtsonndeg ass onst schlass crem op fir de publikumsvcrke'er.
translation.en: Since Pentecost Sunday, our castle has been open for public viewing.

translation.lb: Gleich schons don c'schtcn dag sin ongeziélt autocaren a luxmaschincn hcidurch komm.
translation.en: Even on the first day, countless buses and luxury cars came through here.

translation.lb: Hon ■ nerte vu Ietzeburgeschen an auslänneschen tou • riste sin ausgeklommen a sin sech d'ruine vum schiass ukueke gingen.
translation.en: Groups of Luxembourgish and foreign tourists got out and went to look at the ruins of the castle.

translation.lb: Fre'er huet et gehéscht:..Visitez les ruines de Beaufort".
translation.en: Previously, it was said: "Visit the ruins of Beaufort".

translation.lb: Mir Béferter haten démols eng ruine, ep zerfâlent schlass, dat mir déne friémen als attractio'n gewiren hun, an an onsen heiser de' propper an der rei woren hu mir ons gâscht' loge'ert a bekuschtegt.
translation.en: We, the people of Beaufort, once had a ruin, a fallen castle, which we offered as an attraction to strangers, and in our houses, which were clean and orderly, we lodged and fed our guests.

translation.lb: Mé we' geseit et elo hei aus?
translation.en: But how does it look here now?

translation.lb: D'Rundstedt-oIïcnsiv huet jo bekanntlech scbwe'er hei gehaust, vill heiser sin zerste'ert oder si gesi ganz miserabel aus.
translation.en: The Rundstedt offensive famously ravaged here heavily, many houses were destroyed or look very miserable.

translation.lb: Et get jo bal ként. dat héi aus dem krich ervirgânge wir.
translation.en: There is hardly anything that has emerged here from the war.

translation.lb: D'schlass duerge'nt ass vcrhâltnesmë'sseg gudd ewechkomm an et huet ze soe 1 eng spure vum krich behalcn — et ass vleicht besser crhalen we' vill vun onsen heiser.
translation.en: The castle, however, has relatively survived well and has hardly any traces of the war — it is perhaps better preserved than many of our houses.

translation.lb: Bcfert ass haut eng ruinenuertschaft an och wa mer haut erem ge'we schreiwcn,, Visitez le» ruines de Beaufort".
translation.en: Beaufort is today a village of ruins and even if we again write today "Visit the ruins of Beaufort".

translation.lb: da kennt én de' invitatio'n bal gtad so' gudd fir ons zerschossen heiser huelen ass we' fir onst zerfâlent schlass.
translation.en: then one might almost take the invitation equally for our bombed houses as for our fallen castle.

translation.lb: Vun denen engen we' vun dénen anere ruinen kënnten ons letzeburgesch an ons ans • lännesch touristen eppes le'eren:
translation.en: From either one or the other ruins, our Luxembourgish and foreign tourists could learn something:

translation.lb: de' lescht erinneren un d'vergânglechkét vun aller ber"- Iechkét,
translation.en: the last remind us of the transience of all glory,

translation.lb: de' e'scht erinneren un d'vcrnichtongswirk vun de Preisen.
translation.en: the first remind us of the destructive power of the Prussians.

translation.lb: Si erinneren iéwel och un dén hârde kämpf, dén honnerten an dausenden vun onse s'aistre et < ma'inietje! dag fir dag zc fc'eten nuu.
translation.en: They also remind us of the hard battle, which hundreds and thousands of our compatriots fought day after day.

translation.lb: So" huet ailes sein de'were sinn, so'guer c ko'p steng, den de' lcscht iwerreschter vun engem haus oder soss engem menschewicrk duerstellen.
translation.en: Thus, everything has its meaning, even a pile of stones, which represent the last remnants of a house or some other human work.

translation.lb: Mé é gewaltegen ënnerschéd get et dach:
translation.en: But there is a vast difference:

translation.lb: de' ruine vum schlass verfâle vleicht net vill me', mé si gin iéwel och net opgebaut.
translation.en: the ruins of the castle might not decay much more, but they are also not being rebuilt.

translation.lb: Am duerf awer do verschwannen de' zerfâle maueren, d'stèngkc'p gin cwech geschafft, nci maueren erstin, iwerall get geschafft, iuerall ass crem nei liéwcn.
translation.en: In the village, however, the crumbled walls disappear, the piles of stones are cleared away, new walls arise, everywhere work is being done, everywhere there is new life.

translation.lb: A wa nach en ettlech joer crem sin, da geseit onst schlass nach émoi aus we' d'anertmol.
translation.en: And if a few more years pass, our castle will still look like it did back then.

translation.lb: Démissio’n vun der franse’scher regirong
translation.en: Resignation of the French government

translation.lb: De comité-directeur vum M.R.P. huet an enger nuechtsëtzong eng motio'n adopte'ert, no der de Georges Bidault zum ministerpresident vun der zo'kënfteger regirong virgeschloe get
translation.en: The committee director of the M.R.P. adopted a motion in a night session proposing Georges Bidault as the prime minister of the future government.

translation.lb: Eigentlech woren an deser setzong zwo motio'nc vote'ert gin, mé nemmen eng dovun ass publize'ert gin, well de' aner nemme vun enger minorite't ugeholl go'f.
translation.en: Two motions were actually voted on in this session, but only one of them was published because the other was only accepted by a minority.

translation.lb: Si get dofir nach eng ke'er an enger vollversammlong stode'ert an dann ere'scht publize'ert.
translation.en: Therefore, it will be studied again in a full assembly before being published.

translation.lb: De comité-directeur vum M.R.P. huet se< regirongsprogramm opgestallt. dé we' follegt ausgeseit:
translation.en: The committee director of the M.R.P. has drawn up their government program, which looks as follows:

translation.lb: 1) Erhe'gong vun der landwirtschaftlecher production.
translation.en: 1) Increase in agricultural production.

translation.lb: 2) Ennerdéckong vum schwärze mârt.
translation.en: 2) Suppression of the black market.

translation.lb: 3) Entwécklong vum aussenhandel.
translation.en: 3) Development of foreign trade.

translation.lb: 4) Modemisatio'n vum material.
translation.en: 4) Modernization of the equipment.

translation.lb: 5) Erhe'gong vun de familjenzo'Iagen, vun de le'n, gehälter, pensio'nen an erofsenkong vun de preisser.
translation.en: 5) Increase in family allowances, salaries, wages, pensions and reduction in prices.

translation.lb: 6) Reconstruction vun de sinistre'erte gebiddcr an intressi um Schicksal vun de sinistre'erten.
translation.en: 6) Reconstruction of the devastated areas and interest in the fate of the victims.

translation.lb: Gëschter mëtteg huet d'constituante hir inaugural-sëtzong eröffent.
translation.en: Yesterday afternoon, the constituent assembly opened its inaugural session.

translation.lb: D'erôffnongsriéd go'f vum Marcel Cachin, dem élsten députe'erte gehalen.
translation.en: The opening speech was given by Marcel Cachin, the oldest deputy.

translation.lb: Zwo' sympathie-motione fir de' jong italienesch republik go'we propose'ert an och ugeholl.
translation.en: Two motions of sympathy for the young Italian Republic were proposed and accepted.

translation.lb: Drei gruppen an der constituante hun hire président gewiélt: de Jacques Duclos fir d'kommunisten den Edouard Herriot fir d'radical-sozialistcn an de Jules Moch fir de P.R.L.
translation.en: Three groups in the constituent assembly elected their president: Jacques Duclos for the Communists, Edouard Herriot for the Radical Socialists, and Jules Moch for the P.R.L.

translation.lb: De président vun der provisorcscher franse'scher regirong, de Félix Gouin, huet geseilter an engem bre'f un de président vun der Constituante, seng a senger regirong hir démissio'n agerécht.
translation.en: The president of the provisional French government, Félix Gouin, meanwhile submitted his resignation and that of his government in a letter to the president of the constituent assembly.

translation.lb: We' iiblech fe'ert de' al regirong d'lafend geschäfter virun, bis datt de' nei regirong forme'ert ass.
translation.en: As usual, the old government will continue with current affairs until the new government is formed.

translation.en: What struck a Luxembourger here was the precise organization, it had something to do with soldiers, as even the civilians considered themselves as soldiers.

translation.en: A few numbers regarding the big parade: the mechanized column included 430 officers, it was about 6 kilometers long and it took 40 minutes for it to pass a single point.

translation.en: Mr. Urbany: The capital tax should have been voted on in 1945!

translation.en: The value of the land depends a lot on how it can be utilized;

translation.en: the damaged areas are currently poorly positioned, and it would therefore be appropriate to reduce the coefficient for agricultural operations from 1.6 to 3 in those regions.

translation.en: It would have been better if the law on the capital tax had already been implemented in 1946, then today's reconstruction wouldn't have to struggle with financing, and the law itself wouldn't be forced through hastily.

translation.en: The Prime Minister said the taxation mode of the large companies would be determined by the tax administration;

translation.en: however, it seems as if in practice, the companies themselves could eventually determine the mode.

translation.en: Moreover, the state does not make a good deal with the shares it receives instead of cash from the companies, probably because it doesn't have the time to wait for the best moment to convert the shares into cash.

translation.lb: Um départ.
translation.en: At the start.

translation.en: The atmosphere was unusually incredibly enthusiastic,

translation.en: the formalities were smoothly taken care of,

translation.en: and the start could finally be taken, with a 10-minute delay on the scheduled time.

translation.en: Cars were, of course, also abundantly represented,

translation.en: the usual caravan set itself in motion,

translation.en: and it went 'out to the little town'.

translation.lb: De' e'scht zeit huet én sech regelrecht musse festhalen,
translation.en: Initially, one had to literally hold on tight,

translation.en: because the pace our racers set right away was no joke.

translation.en: They were actually out of their routine,

translation.en: because in the first two stages, the event looked more like a leisurely walk.

translation.en: They must have reconsidered as well,

translation.en: because after a few kilometers, they took things more 'with calm'.

translation.en: Everywhere, there were crowds of people.

translation.en: Everyone naturally seized the opportunity enthusiastically,

translation.en: to cheer on their favorite with courage.

translation.en: and one must bring their nose and toes to safety.

translation.en: 'What a train that is', 'oh my, that's worth it',

translation.en: 'if only the.... cars didn't always have to hang behind'....

translation.en: That's how it goes on and on.

translation.en: although they like to read the most detailed reports in the newspapers the next day.

translation.en: It was indeed a success despite or perhaps better, because of the real "English weather", without which it would simply not be England, or so it was.

translation.en: it would have been, why would the whole affair have turned into a catastrophe?

translation.en: A catastrophe was indeed not possible beforehand, it was as if an atomic bomb had exploded, because if one took a look behind the scenes, one realized that everything had been considered.

translation.en: I had the opportunity, a few days before the parade, to attend a conference during which the major in charge of the entire organization gave the final details.

translation.en: Up until the last second the program was carefully calculated, and when the big day came, it proved that it is possible to maintain order even among 10 million people.

translation.lb: E bre’f vun der franse’scher resistenz Fédération Nationale des Déportés et Internés de la Résistance Monsieur Alphonse Osch,.président de l'Unio'n luxembourgeoise..
translation.en: A letter from the French resistance of the National Federation of Deportees and Internees of the Resistance, Mr. Alphonse Osch, president of the Luxembourgish Union.

translation.lb: Monsieur 4e Président.
translation.en: Mr. 4th President.

translation.lb: Nos camarades WEIL Gaston, Président de ta Fédération de l'Ile de France de la F.N.D.I.R. et P1STORA Victor de la Commission des relations internationales, nous ont présenté un rapport très complet sur leur voyage au Luxembourg et les fêles de la libération, organisées sous votre présidence pur l'UNION de la Résistance Luxembourgeoise.
translation.en: Our comrades Gaston WEIL, President of the Federation of the Ile de France of the F.N.D.I.R., and Victor PISTORA of the Commission of International Relations, have presented us with a very complete report on their trip to Luxembourg and the liberation celebrations, organized under your presidency for the UNION of the Luxembourgish Resistance.

translation.lb: Le Bureau National de la F.N.D.I.R. adresse ses plus vifs remerciements à l'UNION de la Résistance Luxembourgeoise, à vous-même, Monsieur le Président. et à tous nos camarades de la Résistance du Luxembourg pour la réception si cordiale et si chaleureuse des délégués de la F.N.D.I.R.
translation.en: The National Bureau of the F.N.D.I.R. extends its most sincere thanks to the UNION of the Luxembourgish Resistance, to you, Mr. President, and to all our comrades of the Luxembourgish Resistance for the so cordial and warm reception of the delegates of the F.N.D.I.R.

translation.lb: Nos délégués furent profondément impressionnés. par l'organisation parfaite de vos fêtes de la libération: profondément émus par l'attention dont ils étaient Lobjet de la part des institutions et du peuple luxembourgeois.
translation.en: Our delegates were deeply impressed by the perfect organization of your liberation celebrations: deeply moved by the attention they were shown by the institutions and the people of Luxembourg.

translation.lb: lis ont été particulièrement heureux de rencontrer, pendant leur séjour ileurs camarades de misère des camps de concentation.
translation.en: They were particularly happy to meet, during their stay, their fellow sufferers from the concentration camps.

translation.lb: Ils ont constaté avec une agréable surprise le rôle prépondérant de la Résistance et de ses Déportés dans la vie politique et économique de votre pays.
translation.en: They were pleasantly surprised to note the predominant role of the Resistance and its Deportees in the political and economic life of your country.

translation.lb: Ils ont é(é émerveillés par cette volonté de fer des Résistants qui, à peine revenus des bagnes nazis, entreprirent malgré toutes les difficultés la reconstruction de leurs cités détruites par les hordes hitlériennes.
translation.en: They were amazed by this iron will of the Resisters who, barely returned from the Nazi camps, undertook despite all difficulties the reconstruction of their cities destroyed by the Hitlerian hordes.

translation.lb: Aussi le Bureau National de la F N O. I.R. s'incline-t-il avec respect devant cet effort immensede leurs camarades luxembourgeois qui, courageux dans la Résistance à l'oppresseur, courageux dans la reconstruction de leurs régions dévastées, parviendront rapidement à effacer les horribles traces de la guerre.
translation.en: Thus, the National Bureau of the F.N.D.I.R. bows with respect before this immense effort of their Luxembourgish comrades who, courageous in resisting the oppressor, courageous in reconstructing their devastated regions, will quickly manage to erase the horrible traces of the war.

translation.lb: signé: Le Président: L, Mazeaud.
translation.en: signed: The President: L, Mazeaud.

translation.lb: Vum schlag getraff Ettelbréck.
translation.en: Struck by a stroke in Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: — We' de lOjärege ve'hândler Jules Hertz vun hei e freideg nomëtteg am hé geschafft huel, krut'hién e scblagufall, dem hién eng hatlef slonn duerno erléen ass.
translation.en: — When the 49-year-old trader Jules Hertz from here was working on Friday afternoon, he suffered a stroke, from which he passed away half an hour later.

translation.lb: De ver.xtuerwenen hannerle'ssl eng wittfra malt 2 onmënnege kanner, vum dénen dat élst 7 joer, an dat jéngst ere'scht 14 dég âl ass.
translation.en: The deceased leaves behind a widow with two underage children, of which the oldest is 7 years old and the youngest is only 14 days old.

translation.lb: — Am summer 1040. \ve' onst land iwerfali ai» gin, ass d'famill Hertz no Süd-frankréioh ausgewandert.
translation.en: — In the summer of 1940, when our country was invaded, the Hertz family emigrated to southern France.

translation.lb: Am hiérschl 1942 liuet si en asyl an der Schweiz fond, wo' si bis zum enn vum krich blo'f.
translation.en: In the autumn of 1942, they found asylum in Switzerland, where they remained until the end of the war.

translation.lb: Am exil huet den hèr Hertz secli en hèrzleiden zo'gezun, dat d'ursâch vu sengem dod war.
translation.en: In exile, Mr. Hertz developed a heart condition, which was the cause of his death.

translation.en: The Ardennes Ring

translation.en: 1. Van Herzelé, 170 km in 4.30.00 hours.
