translation.lb: An déser course bât dê Bintnéf éng avance vu 4 minutten, an du ass e creve'ert.
translation.en: In this race, Bintner had a lead of 4 minutes, and then he got a puncture.

translation.lb: Si plënneren... Dideleng.
translation.en: They are moving... Dudelange.

translation.lb: Jo, si plënnere wirklecli, ower net, we" én elo menge kennt, ons Didelenger Preisen, mé ons flott letzeburger zaldoten.
translation.en: Yes, they are indeed moving, but not, as one might now think, our Dudelange Prussians, but our fine Luxembourgish soldiers.

translation.lb: Nodém schon eso' dax gesot go'f, den Didelenger zaklolecamp ge'f opgele'st gin, ass et elo endlech wirklechkét gin.
translation.en: After it has been said many times that the Dudelange encampment would be dissolved, it has finally become a reality.

translation.lb: Ere'scht viru kurzer zeit, nodém de camp é moment hei bal ganz eidel war, go'f en erem stärk matt zaldote besat, de' vu Walter erop komm sin.
translation.en: Just recently, after the camp here was almost completely empty for a moment, it was again strongly occupied with soldiers who came up from Walter.

translation.lb: Nu go'we bekannt lecli jo och erem nei classen agezun a vidi vun déne neie rekrute ko'men och op Dideleng, so'dalt de camp hei erem gudd besat war.
translation.en: Now it was also announced that new classes were enlisted, and many of these new recruits came to Dudelange, so that the camp here was well occupied again.

translation.lb: Kaum baten de' jonge sech elo hei bal agebirgert. we' et stënterlech gehéscht huet, den Dide- Jenger camp ge'f ganz opgele'st gin.
translation.en: The young soldiers had barely settled here when it was suddenly announced that the Dudelange camp was to be completely dissolved.

translation.lb: Des ke'er huet nun des nouvell den talsâchen entsprach, well en dënschdeg de muergen hun de' e'scht jongen hir garnisonsstad Dideleng verlôss, wärend de' aner och ail am gàng sin anzepâken an ze plënneren, an zwar op Schrâsseg.
translation.en: This time the news was true, as the first young soldiers left their garrison town of Dudelange on Tuesday morning, while the others were also packing and preparing to move to Schieren.

translation.lb: Opfalend bel der ganzer sâch ass, datt ald arrivée an départ vun den zaldoten hei zu Dideleng emmer matt onse kirmessen zesumme gefall ass:
translation.en: It is noteworthy that the arrival and departure of the soldiers here in Dudelange always coincided with our fairs:

translation.lb: De' e'scht zaldote ko'men hir an de camp, dat dèscht joer am juli, just no der Didelenger Gchânskirmes.
translation.en: The first soldiers came here to the camp last year in July, just after the Dudelange Chansin Fair.

translation.lb: Am november 1945, samschdes virun der Märteskirmes ko'm de gros lot vun hinne fort op Bitburg, tn elo, erem 8 dég virun der Geliànskirmes, get de ganze camp opgele'st, an Dideleng ass keng garniso'nss'ad me', wat si elo just e joer war.
translation.en: In November 1945, on the Saturday before the St. Martin's Fair, the majority of them left for Bitburg, and now, 8 days before the Gelb Fair, the entire camp is being dissolved, and Dudelange is no longer a garrison town, which it was for only a year.

translation.lb: Fir wat fir en zweck de propriétaire vum camp, d'Arbed Dideleng, elo de' ganz gebeilechkéle profite'ert, ass nach net bekannt, mé hoffentlech setzen s'ons keng Preisen dran.
translation.en: For what purpose the owner of the camp, Arbed Dudelange, will now use the entire facility is not yet known, but hopefully, they will not put Prussians in it.

translation.lb: Réorganisatio’n vun der englescher eisenindustrie
translation.en: Reorganization of the English iron industry

translation.lb: De' fie'er regirong Churchill hât am nié 1945 d'verbänn vun den eisen- s stolinduslrien ugestallt, fir e Programm opzestelilen, no dém des industrie réorganise'ert an ausgebaut kënnle gin.
translation.en: The previous Churchill government had, in early 1945, established associations of the iron and steel industries to create a program for reorganizing and expanding this industry.

translation.lb: De rapport vun de verbann ass elo a form vun engem weissbuch vun der regirong publize'ert gin.
translation.en: The report of the association has now been published by the government in the form of a white paper.

translation.lb: Dese plang gesei' fir d'crneierong vun de fabrikarîchtongen eng somme vun 108 millio'ne pond sterling vir, de' an zeit vu 7J joer ze verausgabe wiren.
translation.en: This plan foresees an investment of 108 million pounds sterling for the renewal of factory facilities, to be spent over a period of 7 years.

translation.lb: D'productio'nscapacite t ge'f dann op 16 millio'nen to stolbarren an d'durchschnëttlech produclio'n op 15 millio'nen to. erhe'gt gin.
translation.en: The production capacity would then be increased to 16 million tons of steel bars, and the average production would rise to 15 million tons.

translation.lb: Virum krlch war se ongefe'er 13 millio'nen to.
translation.en: Before the war, it was approximately 13 million tons.

translation.lb: De rapport plangt doniéwt de bail vu neie wiérker, besonnesch vun ênger gcô'sser usine am Wales, de' eng millio'n to. stol produzere soll.
translation.en: The report also plans the construction of new plants, especially a large factory in Wales that is supposed to produce one million tons of steel.

translation.lb: De' aner wiérker solle regroupe'ert an zentralise ert gin.
translation.en: The other plants should be regrouped and centralized.

translation.lb: Fuddersté Ko pl csc hl.
translation.en: Fodder pieces were sold.

translation.lb: Op enger, e sonndeg hei ofgehalener fuddcrslé vun der Mme Vve Hemes-Binsfeld war d'nafro net stârk.
translation.en: At a fodder auction held here on a Sunday by Mrs. Vve Hemes-Binsfeld, the demand was not strong.

translation.lb: V'erstét go'we 4 stécker kle' matt gras.
translation.en: Four small parcels with grass were sold.

translation.lb: A „Seiteschfeld" 54 ar 150 frang, op de.Scheppe" 50 ar 250 frang, en anert, 24 ar, 100 lrang, op der strôss 45 ar tir 150 frang.
translation.en: In 'Seiteschfeld' 54 ares for 150 francs, in 'Scheppe' 50 ares for 250 francs, another 24 ares for 100 francs, on the road 45 ares for 150 francs.

translation.lb: Fir de' iwrcg stécker hate kcng libhaber sech afoud.
translation.en: For the remaining parcels, no buyers showed interest.

translation.lb: Bro’trationne’erong an England
translation.en: Bread rationing in England

translation.lb: D'englesch regirong huet beschloss, d'hro'trationne'erong an England erem anzefe'eren.
translation.en: The English government has decided to reintroduce bread rationing in England.

translation.lb: We' et schéngt, soll de John Strachney, den cnglesche minister vum ravitaillement, gösehter am parlament erklärt hun, des mesure ge'f den 21. juli a krâft triéden.
translation.en: As it appears, John Strachney, the English minister of supply, supposedly announced in parliament yesterday that this measure will come into effect on July 21st.

translation.lb: Ir d'regirong awer hir dêcisio'n definitiv gctraff huet, huet d'cabinett de' lescht tatsâchen a chiffere stode'ert, de* de ministère vun der crnirong virgeluegt hât.
translation.en: Before the government made its final decision, the cabinet studied the latest facts and figures presented by the Ministry of Food.

translation.lb: D'bro'tralio'n get op 10 onze pro dag festgesat.
translation.en: The bread ration is set at 10 ounces per day.

translation.lb: Supplementar-ratio'ne fir kanner.
translation.en: Supplementary rations for children.

translation.lb: zo'kënfteg mammen a fir d'schwe'erarbechter si virgcsin.
translation.en: Provisions are intended for future mothers and heavy laborers.

translation.lb: Den handel vun der Union Economique Am nié 194« fouet den handel vun der Union Economique Belgo-Luxeoibourgeoise ongefe'er des ziffercn opze weisen:
translation.en: The trade of the Economic Union in the year 194« shows approximately the following figures for the trade of the Belgo-Luxembourgish Economic Union:

translation.lb: A gewicht: 1 407 363 to fjr den import ge nt 573 375 to'fir den export.
translation.en: In weight: 1,407,363 tons for import compared to 573,375 tons for export.

translation.lb: A wert: 3 795 681 000 frang fir den import ge'nt 2 269 443 000 fr. fir den export.
translation.en: In value: 3,795,681,000 francs for import compared to 2,269,443,000 francs for export.

translation.lb: An dèrsehvechter period wor den durchschnëttshandel an de joere 1936 bis 1938:
translation.en: In the corresponding period, the average trade in the years 1936 to 1938 was:

translation.lb: A gewicht: 2 830 267 to import ge'nt 1 915 664 to export.

translation.en: In value: 2,015,940,000 francs import compared to 1,845,045 francs export.

translation.lb: D’kueleproductio’n a Westeuropa
translation.en: Coal production in Western Europe

translation.lb: D'kueleproducllo'n a Westeuropa ass am steigen, obschon d'productio'n an der vestlecher zon vun Deitschland nach emmer enner 50 prozent vun der virkrichsproductio'n leit.
translation.en: Coal production in Western Europe is increasing, although production in the western zone of Germany is still below 50 percent of the pre-war production.

translation.lb: No de provisorcschen zifferen, de' bis haut virieien, ass d'productio'n vum anthrazit a W e s t d e i t s c h 1 a n d op 4 453 000 to eropgeklommen ge'nt 4 mill. 43 000 to am abrël.
translation.en: According to the provisional figures available to date, anthracite production in West Germany has risen to 4,453,000 tons compared to 4 million 43,000 tons in April.

translation.lb: Dese chiffer ass awer nemwie 40 prozent vun der virkrichsproductio'n.
translation.en: This figure is, however, only 40 percent of pre-war production.

translation.lb: Am mé wor a Frankreich d'productio'n 107 prozent vun der virkrichsproductio'n, et sin am mé 4 142 000 to produze'ert gin, am abrël 4 044 000 to.
translation.en: In May, France's production was 107 percent of pre-war production, with 4,142,000 tons produced in May and 4,044,000 tons in April.

translation.lb: A Belgien liuet d'productio'n 79 prozent vum virkrichsstand errécht.
translation.en: In Belgium, the production reached 79 percent of the pre-war level.

translation.lb: Am nié sin 1 683 00(1 to gefördert gin ge'nt ongefe'er de'selwecht Ziffer am abrël.
translation.en: In May, 1,683,001 tons were extracted, around the same figure as in April.

translation.lb: IV zu cl vun déne beschäftigte mineuren ass a Westdeutschland 233 000, a Frankreich 318 000, a Belgien 1Ö4 000 an an Holland 32 000.
translation.en: The number of employed miners is 233,000 in West Germany, 318,000 in France, 104,000 in Belgium, and 32,000 in Holland.

translation.lb: Wat de kuclenimiport ugél, so' stét Frankreich matt 627 000 to un der spëtzt, et kennt da Schweden matt 301 000 1o, Belgien matt 295 000 an Danemark malt 205 000 to.
translation.en: Regarding coal imports, France leads with 627,000 tons, followed by Sweden with 301,000 tons, Belgium with 295,000 tons, and Denmark with 205,000 tons.

translation.lb: Amerika huet 1 0G3 000 to ausgcfe'ert, England 186 000 to a Westdeitschlaiid 653 000 to.
translation.en: America exported 1,063,000 tons, England 186,000 tons, and West Germany 653,000 tons.

translation.lb: Motocyclette- a camion-zesummesto’ss D ide 1 e n g.
translation.en: Motorcycle and truck collision reported.

translation.lb: De' lescht wocli ass a Béteburg, eppes virun der ke'er, wo' d'strôss 110 Esch ofzweigt, eu arbechter, dé vu Letzeburg per molocvclette op d'arbecht fuerc wollt, hannen an de camion vum entrepreneur Dom.
translation.en: Last week in Bettembourg, just before the turn where road 110 Esch branches off, a worker who wanted to travel from Luxembourg by motorcycle to work collided from behind into the truck of the entrepreneur Dom.

translation.lb: Reimen yun Dideleng gerannt, dén um wé 110 Letzeburg war.
translation.en: Reimen from Dudelange was driving on way 110 towards Luxembourg.

translation.lb: De' Béleburger polizei wor gleich op der onglécksplaz an huet den zesummeslo'ss zu protocoll geholl.
translation.en: The Bettembourg police were quickly at the accident site and documented the collision.

translation.lb: We' et iwerhapt me'glech war, datt de motocycliste op dèr bréder strôss konnl hannen an de camion rennen, ass e rätsei, wal schwe'er ze le'sen ass.
translation.en: How it was even possible that the motorcyclist could crash into the back of the truck on the wide road is a mystery, because it is hard to comprehend.

translation.lb: De motocyclettefuerer* go'f schwe'er blesse'crt an d'spidol ageliwcrl.
translation.en: The motorcyclist was seriously injured and taken to the hospital.

translation.lb: Den hèr KRIER, arbechtsminister, stellt matt bedauere fest, datt d'kris am biergbau scho bal e joer dauert.
translation.en: Mr. KRIER, Minister of Labor, regretfully notes that the mining crisis has been ongoing for almost a year.

translation.lb: Hic fret sech awer, soen ze kennen, datt alles gemäch go'w fir de specler vun der arbechlslo'segkét ze bannen a beto'nt-, datt och d'palronat an dem zesummenhank vill verständnes gewisen huet.
translation.en: However, he is pleased to report that everything is being done to counteract the rise of unemployment, emphasizing that the management has shown a lot of understanding in this context.

translation.lb: D'kris am biergbau huet verschidden ursâclien.
translation.en: The mining crisis has different causes.

translation.lb: E'schtens ass de franse'sche minett durchsohnëttlech besser a me' bëldeg an zwétens get we'nt ■ manktem u kueile gesiebt, dese manktem durch d'verschaffe vu me' reichhaltegen èrzer auszegleichen.
translation.en: Firstly, the French ore is generally better and cheaper, and secondly, due to a shortage of coal, this shortage is balanced by processing more rich ores.

translation.lb: D'kris ass awer net eso' katastrophal, we' se vleicht schéngt.
translation.en: The crisis is not as catastrophic as it might seem.

translation.lb: Et go'wen ronn 200 minueren a kënnegong gesät, de' awer all soss arbecht fond hun an de' och d'virrecht behalen, herno erem als e'scht an de minièren agestallt ze gin.
translation.en: Around 200 miners were given notice, but they all found other work and also retain the right to be the first to be reemployed in the mines later.

translation.lb: Fir der kris ze steieren, go'sv e Conseil Supérieur des Mines institue'ert, dén d'missio'n huel, den assainissement vum biergbau an d'wé ze Jeden a sech matt allen aneren Qafenden an zo'kënflege biergbauproblemen ze befassen.
translation.en: To steer through the crisis, a Superior Council of Mines has been established with the mission to address the restructuring of mining and to tackle all present and future mining problems.

translation.lb: Et lafen iwregens och scho verhandlongen, de' ons als preisesch krichsschuedréparatio'n,,Erzbereicherungs"-installatio'ne séchere sollen.
translation.en: Negotiations are also already underway to secure installations for ore enrichment as part of Prussian war reparations.

translation.lb: Och fir Stèngefort ble't wirklech erem eng zo'konft, well et ass do d'installatio'n vun enger mëttclindustrie envisage'ert, de' seeh matt der productio'n vu glaswoll, kesselen asw. befâsse soll.
translation.en: There is indeed a future for Stengefort as well, as the installation of a middle industry is planned, which will deal with the production of glass wool, boilers, etc.

translation.lb: Weider terror a Palestina
translation.en: Further terror in Palestine

translation.lb: Et ass elo erwisen, datt et d'terroristenorganisatio'n „Irgun Zvai Leirtii" wor, de' geplangt hât, de generolleitnant Evelyn Barker z'entfe'eren.
translation.en: It is now proven that the terrorist organization 'Irgun Zvai Leumi' was the one that planned to abduct Lieutenant General Evelyn Barker.

translation.lb: Et aas nämlech eng lëscht entdeckt gin, wo'robber all de'je'r.eg, de' d'terroristen entfe'ere wollten, figure'ert hun, wo'robber och dem generol sei numm stong.
translation.en: Indeed, a list has been discovered on which all those planned for abduction by the terrorists were named, including the general's name.

translation.lb: D'ëffentlech ménong an Egypten iwcr de Mufti si gedéit.
translation.en: Public opinion in Egypt about the Mufti is divided.

translation.lb: De' eng mengen, en dèrft keng Politik dreiwen, soss kënt hién d'asylrecht net me' beim kinek gene'ssen.
translation.en: Some believe he should not engage in politics, otherwise he could lose asylum under the king.

translation.lb: Anerer sin der.ménong, e misst complett frei handele kënnen.
translation.en: Others believe he should be able to act completely freely.

translation.lb: D'perquisitio'nen a Palestina durch englesch truppen a polizeiformatio'ne gi virun.
translation.en: Searches in Palestine by English troops and police units continue.

translation.lb: An der ge'gend vun der stad Gaza ass virgëschter owend e munitio'nslager vu 50 tonnen an d'lucht gesprengt gin.
translation.en: In the area around the city of Gaza, an ammunition depot of 50 tons was blown up the evening before last.

translation.lb: D'polizei huet direct d'rechercher opgeholl.
translation.en: The police immediately started investigations.

translation.lb: De schued beléft sech op me' we' 100.000 pond sterling.
translation.en: The damage amounts to more than 100,000 pounds sterling.

translation.lb: Détailler iwer d'ursâch fir wat, de Mufti gefliicht ass an iwer seng bespriéchonge mam kinek Faruk, gin aus engem artikel an der „Alkhbar el Yom" ervir.
translation.en: Details regarding why the Mufti fled and about his discussions with King Farouk emerge from an article in 'Alkhbar el Yom'.

translation.lb: De Mufti soll dem kinek gesot hun, „en hätt fir keng auslännesch muecht geschafft.
translation.en: The Mufti reportedly told the king, 'he had not worked for any foreign power.

translation.lb: Hién hätt fir d'onofhangegkét vu Syrien, Palestina, Liban, Irak, Egypten a fir all arabesch länner geschafft.
translation.en: He had worked for the independence of Syria, Palestine, Lebanon, Iraq, Egypt, and all Arab countries.

translation.lb: Hié ge'f d'Englänner net veruechten, och net d'Amerikaner, eso'guer d'judde net, nié en hätt all arabescht land gèren a speziell Palestina.''
translation.en: He would not despise the English, nor the Americans, or even the Jews, as he cherished all Arab lands, especially Palestine.''

translation.lb: Duerno soll de kinek seng fonctionnairen zesummegeruff an hinnen erklärt hun: „De Mufti ass mei gäscht."
translation.en: Afterwards, the king allegedly gathered his officials and explained to them: 'The Mufti is my guest.'

translation.lb: De ministerpresident an aner ministeren, de' an aller eil an de palais goruff wore gin, hun de geste vum kinèk guddgehéscht.
translation.en: The Prime Minister and other ministers, who were hastily summoned to the palace, welcomed the king's gesture.

translation.lb: Senge frënn sot de Mufti, hié wir no Egypte komm, well dat land de fe'rende Staat vun den arabesche länner a well et den zenter vun der Araberbewegong wir.
translation.en: To his friends, the Mufti said he had come to Egypt because that country was the leading state of the Arab nations and the center of the Arab movement.

translation.lb: Nom selwechten artikel soll de Mufti dem kinek an de cheffe vun der Araberliga e chiffre'erten telegramm gescheckt hun.
translation.en: According to the same article, the Mufti is said to have sent an encrypted telegram to the king and the leaders of the Arab League.

translation.lb: Egyptesch panzerwén haie viru 5 gebeier wuecht, an dénen de Mufti wahrscheinlech wunnt, bis datt hién eng definitiv wunnéng fond huet.
translation.en: Egyptian tanks are guarding in front of 5 buildings where the Mufti is likely staying until he finds a permanent residence.

translation.lb: Erem e preisenhäuptling verhaft Marner.
translation.en: Yet again a Prussian leader arrested Mamer.

translation.lb: Matt genugtuong hun ons Manier leidd d'nouvelle opgeholl, datt et der sûreté resp. der gendarmerie gelongen ass, de preisegangster Pg. Aibert Hilbert, ex-cantonnier vun hei, zu Freiburg a sengem feiwëllegen exil opzedreiwen an him d'hémrés an dat vun him verrodent land z'erme'glechen.
translation.en: With satisfaction, we received the news that the police or rather the gendarmerie managed to track down the Prussian gangster Aibert Hilbert, former road maintenance man from here, in Freiburg in his voluntary exile, and deny him re-entry to the place he betrayed.

translation.lb: Wat de Mamer leidd léd dét, dat ass, datt se dat dommt gesieht net kënne gesin dat hié mocht an datt hién net hei zu Mamer kann empfang gin.
translation.en: What grieves the people of Mamer is that they cannot see the fool's face he used to make and that he cannot be received here in Mamer.

translation.lb: L.P.P.D. Ettelbréck.
translation.en: L.P.P.D. Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: Mir biéden all ons membren, en dënschdeg, de 25. juni, em 9 auer, dem leichendéngschl an dem cortège zu e'ere vun onsem ouvergiéssleche komerod Yves Kerger beizewunnen.
translation.en: We invite all our members, on Tuesday, 25th of June, at 9 o'clock, to attend the funeral service and procession in honor of our unforgettable comrade Yves Kerger.

translation.lb: De Comité Schierencrstrôss 1", Ettelbréck.
translation.en: The Committee Schierencrstrôss 1, Ettelbrück.

translation.lb: Lo’nerhe’gong ass haptschwieregkét
translation.en: Wage increase is of major difficulty.

translation.lb: Aus der hallong vun de kommunisten an de leschten dég gét ervir, datt si zur conditio'n fir hir mattartoecht an der Tegirong gestallt hun, datt d'revendicatio'ne vum C. G. T., wat d'lo'nerhe'gong ugét, ugeholl get an de' allgemeng politik vun der regirong net anti-kommunistesch tendenzen ënnerstëtze ge'f.
translation.en: From the attitude of the communists in recent days, it appears that they have set as a condition for their participation in the government that the demands of the C. G. T., regarding wage increases, be accepted and that the general policy of the government does not support anti-communist tendencies.

translation.lb: D'frd vun der lo'nerhe'gong wèrd op jiddefall zu heftegen discussio'ne fe'eren.
translation.en: The issue of wage increase will undoubtedly lead to intense discussions.

translation.lb: well d'techniker der ménong sin, datt, wann d'Ie'n erhe'cht ge'we gin, d'inflatio'n virun der dir sténg an de plang Monnet fir d'reeonstructio'n iwerhapt net durchzefe'ere wir.
translation.en: because the technicians believe that if wages were raised, inflation would be imminent and the Monnet plan for reconstruction could not be implemented at all.

translation.lb: An der emgobong vum Bidault herrscht awer vertrauen, datt eng regirong op bréder unio'n opgertcht get an datt de korseli vum parteisystem gelackert get.
translation.en: Around Bidault, however, there is confidence that a government based on broader unity will be established and that the rigidity of the party system will be relaxed.

translation.lb: Dem Bidault seng frënn sin der ménong. datt, wann him ze vill gro ss fuerderonge gestallt ge'we gin, hién e cabinett forme'ere soll, dat sechjienimen aus membere vum M.R.P. zesummesetze ge'f, et get awer gehofft, datt et net eso' weit könnt.
translation.en: Bidault's friends are of the opinion that, if too many large demands are made of him, he should form a cabinet composed solely of members of the M.R.P., but it is hoped that it will not come to that.

translation.lb: Gëschter mueren huet de Bidault de Maurice Schuman um Quay d'Orsav empfangen.
translation.en: Yesterday morning, Bidault received Maurice Schuman at Quay d'Orsay.

translation.lb: Nö deser bespriéchong huet de Schuman ausgesot, datt „an 48 stonnen eng nei regirong do wir."
translation.en: After this discussion, Schuman stated that "in 48 hours a new government will be in place."

translation.lb: Nom Schuman hun d'vertriéder vum C. G. T. beim Bidault virgesprach.
translation.en: After Schuman, the representatives of the C. G. T. spoke with Bidault.

translation.lb: Des délégation huet virum Bidault hire slandponkt an der lo'nerhe'gong kloergeluegt.
translation.en: This delegation clearly laid out their stance on the wage increase before Bidault.

translation.lb: Eng so'forteg lo'nerhe'gong vu 25% misst hirer ménong no virgehoil gin.
translation.en: A prompt wage increase of 25% should be implemented, in their opinion.

translation.lb: An engem communiqué, dé no deser bespriéchong erausko'm, gin dem Bidault seng argumenter ge'nt de' gefuerdert lo'nerhe'gong als ungerecht fèrdegt betruecht.
translation.en: In a communiqué released after this discussion, Bidault's arguments against the demanded wage increase were considered unfair.

translation.lb: Amplaz datt de bene fice vun der productio'n an d'hänn vun e puer Privatmänner kënnt, sollt en an de'je'neg vun den arbechter oder vun der regirong kommen.
translation.en: Instead of the benefits of production going into the hands of a few private individuals, they should go to the workers or the government.

translation.lb: Op jidde fall hallt den C. G. T. seng fuerderong op eng 2ö%eg ilo'nerhe'gong oprecht.
translation.en: In any case, the C. G. T. maintains its demand for a 20% wage increase.

translation.lb: Dat gëlt selbstverständlech och fir d'gehälter, pensio'nen a. e. w.
translation.en: This applies, of course, also to salaries, pensions, etc.

translation.lb: Gëschter owend huet den directer vum Bidault sengem cabinett, Falaize, de Journalisten erklärt, den dag vu virgëschter wir matt politesche consultatio'nen ausgefüllt gewiéscht an dé gëscbtrege matt consultatio'ne vun technescher natur,
translation.en: Yesterday evening, Bidault's cabinet director, Falaize, explained to journalists that the day before yesterday was filled with political consultations and yesterday with technical consultations.

translation.lb: Niéwt déne gro'sse syndicater huet de Bidault och 2 techniker empfângen, nämlech de René Mayer an de Raoul Dautry, weil niéwent dem politeschen aspect get et och en techneschen, sot de Falaize weider.
translation.en: Besides the major syndicates, Bidault also received 2 technicians, namely René Mayer and Raoul Dautry, because besides the political aspect, there is also a technical one, added Falaize.

translation.lb: Haut ge'wen d'politesch consultatio'nen erem ugoen, all parteie we'ssten elo de standponkt vum Bidault a mîssten hir entschédongen treffen.
translation.en: Today, the political consultations will start again, all parties now know Bidault's position and must make their decisions.

translation.lb: ZUR OPKLXRONG
translation.en: FOR CLARIFICATION

translation.lb: Den actio'nscomité vun der L'nlo'n an d'directio'n vun der zeidong „d'Unio'n" déclare'ere formell, datt de' be'swëllegerweis verbrét gerüchter, „d'Unio'n" wir an de besetz vun der dréckerei Bourg- Rourger iwcrgâiig, votlstänneg aus der loft gegraff sin.
translation.en: The action committee of the Union and the management of the newspaper 'the Union' formally declare that the maliciously spread rumors, 'the Union' was transferred to the possession of the Bourg-Rourger printing house, are completely unfounded.

translation.lb: D'zeidong gehc'ert gené we' fre'er der „Unio'n vun de Letzeburger Freihétsorganisatio'nen".
translation.en: The newspaper belongs just as before to the 'Union of Luxembourgish Freedom Organizations'.

translation.lb: Si ënnerstét énzeg an eleng dem gewiéite comité vun der Unio'n ënnert der verantwortlecher directio'n vun dém durch de congress bestëmmte mann.
translation.en: It exclusively supports the elected committee of the Union under the responsible direction of the man designated by the congress.

translation.lb: Des falsch gerüchter sin ënnert d'leidd bruecht gin, fir ons liéser confus an ofspensteg ze mächen.
translation.en: These false rumors have been spread to make our readers confused and rebellious.

translation.lb: Mir wessen ower, dattons frënn ons weider trei blelwen.
translation.en: However, we know that our friends will remain loyal to us.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, da'it se grad elo, wo' d'hannerlëschteg ugrëff op d'Unio'n nés me' stärk agesat hun. un hirer onofhängeger, freier zeidong festhaien.
translation.en: We know that they will now, when the sneaky attacks on the Union have intensified again, hold on to their independent, free newspaper.

translation.lb: De' schc'nst bestätcgong Ii wert ons de' vun dag zu dag zo'hueiend zuei vu liéser.
translation.en: The best confirmation is the day-by-day increasing number of readers for us.

translation.lb: Den actio'nscomité vun der Unio'n
translation.en: The action committee of the Union

translation.lb: D'directio'n vun der zeidong „d'Union".
translation.en: The management of the newspaper 'the Union'.

translation.lb: Automobil Beim Hans Stuck Défi Hans Stuck, frê'êren as op den autôpistên aus der Zeit viruttt nazi-rfgim exploite'ert haut e garage.
translation.en: Automobile at Hans Stuck Challenge Hans Stuck, once active on the autobahns during the time before the Nazi regime, now runs a garage.

translation.lb: 1934 huet de champion ënnert défn droek vun de nazien seng coursen astel'le missen.
translation.en: In 1934, the champion had to stop his races under the pressure of the Nazis.

translation.lb: Hié gong an d'Schweiz an exil an huet do bis 1940 geliéwt.
translation.en: He went into exile in Switzerland and lived there until 1940.

translation.lb: 1943 huet hién sech an E'slreich étahle'ert, wo' hién zu St. Anton eng resistenzfoe.wegong ge'nt d'nazien organise'ert huet.
translation.en: In 1943, he established himself in Austria, where he organized a resistance movement against the Nazis in St. Anton.

translation.lb: Hién huet sech elo zu Oherammergau, dem bekannten Zentrum vun de Passio'nsspiller an de bayreschen Alpe nidderigelöss.
translation.en: He has now settled in Oberammergau, the well-known center of Passion Plays in the Bavarian Alps.

translation.lb: Hién huet sech do e garage fir autoen agericht.
translation.en: He has set up a garage for cars there.

translation.lb: Seng fra, Paula von Recznicek, fre'ere champion vurn deilschen tennis, bcfënd sech nach emmer zu St. Anton.
translation.en: His wife, Paula von Recznicek, a former German tennis champion, is still in St. Anton.

translation.lb: Si huet hir âl tëlegkét, de' hir 1933 vun de nazien ënhersot gi wor, nés opgeholl a schreiwt romanen a novellen fir magazinen an zeidongen.
translation.en: She has resumed her old position, which was taken from her by the Nazis in 1933, and writes novels and stories for magazines and newspapers.

translation.lb: D’Filme vun der Woch CAPITÖLE.
translation.en: The films of the week CAPITÖLE.

translation.lb: Rio Rila.
translation.en: Rio Rila.

translation.lb: E lëschtégén amérikanesche film, wô' âllèrdengs é puêr kftrtieaeh scénê matt den hôér erbeigetu tin, dén Owér Sengem zweck ganz entspricht an de publié annerhâlêf stônnê lâfig gudd amuse'ert, wat jo bei den aeteurè Bud Abbot a Lôu Costello net ànescht z'erwarden ass.
translation.en: A funny American film, however with a few peculiar scenes added with care, which meet their purpose completely and the audience is well entertained for an hour and a half, which is expected with actors Bud Abbot and Lou Costello.

translation.lb: De charm vum ganze film mécht ower de prachtvolle gesank an de' matt hënnernësser verbonne freierci vun dénè bedêitendè kënschtlêr Kathryn Grayson a John Carroll.
translation.en: The charm of the entire film is made by the splendid singing and the free-spirited artistry connected with the backgrounds of notable artists Kathryn Grayson and John Carroll.

translation.lb: Fransê'sch énnertitel.
translation.en: French subtitles.

translation.lb: MARIVAUX: Narzisse.
translation.en: MARIVAUX: Narcissus.

translation.lb: En urkoihescha film a franse'scher sprëch, bei dém virschidden al a nei tricken, de' d'iâchntuskelen a bewegong sétzên, crem bpgédëscht gin.
translation.en: An unusual film in French language, in which various old and new tricks, which influence scenes and movement, are provided.

translation.lb: Scène vun halsbriécheresch motocyclettefahrten a konschtpro'we mam avion sin einfach kôêtlech.
translation.en: Scenes of breakneck motorcycle rides and artistic feats with the airplane are simply delightful.

translation.lb: Gudd spill am ènsembél a speziell vum Relys aliâs Narzisse, dé ge'nt sei wëllên zu éngém aviâ-i tio'nsheld an zum ierwe vun enger iérwschaft.vun 10 millio'nc get.
translation.en: Good performance in ensemble and especially by Relys alias Narcissus, who unwillingly becomes an aviation hero and inherits a fortune of 10 million.

translation.lb: THE YANK.
translation.en: THE YANK.

translation.lb: The drive by Night (Ufte femme dangereuse).
translation.en: The drive by Night (Meeting a Dangerous Woman).

translation.lb: De film fe'ert. éns de' schwe'er arbecht vun de chaufféiiré vir, de' dag a nuecht op lastàutoe fuêrèrt, fir liéwensmëttel an êèo' weider matt zeit an d'stiéd Ze bféngen.
translation.en: The film highlights the hard work of the drivers who drive day and night on trucks to deliver food and other goods to the cities on time.

translation.lb: An démsêlwechte milieu spillt sech e liebes'drama of, will d'fra vum patron sêch an e jonge chauffeur vcrlc'tvt, hire mann, dén owca bedronk hém kënnt, an d'privatgarago fe'ert an en durch d'autogasen em d'iiéwe bréngt.
translation.en: In the same environment, a love drama unfolds as the boss's wife falls for a young driver, while her husband, who comes home drunk one night, drives into the private garage and is killed by the car exhaust fumes.

translation.lb: An dach kënnt se bei dém jônge mënsch net zu hirem zweck an éndégt âm rtârenhâus.
translation.en: And yet she does not achieve her aim with the young man and ends up in the madhouse.

translation.lb: En intressanten, englesch geschwate film matt franSê'sch ênneztltêlêft.
translation.en: An interesting English-spoken film with French subtitles.

translation.lb: Den italienesche verloscht durch de Bidault-plang
translation.en: The Italian loss due to the Bidault Plan

translation.lb: Den italienesche ministère vum auswärtegen huet d'zuel vun de verlöschter bekannt gin, de' Italien durch d'internationalise'erong vun der Triester zon an durch d'iwerlôsse vun enger partie vun der provënz Venetia Julia u Jugoslawien erleid.
translation.en: The Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has announced the number of losses Italy suffered due to the internationalization of the Trieste zone and the handing over of part of the province of Venezia Giulia to Yugoslavia.

translation.lb: Internationalise'ert zon (Triest an ëmge'gend) 783 kilometer carré ('laut dem recensement vu 1910) matt 176 202 Italiener (nom recensement vu 1921) 276 311 Italiener.
translation.en: Internationalized zone (Trieste and surroundings) 783 square kilometers (according to the 1910 census) with 176,202 Italians (according to the 1921 census) 276,311 Italians.

translation.lb: Territoire, dé Jugoslawien zo'gesprach krut: Nom recensement vu 1910 124 541 Italiener, no démje'negen vu 1921 180 630 Italiener.
translation.en: Territory awarded to Yugoslavia: According to the 1910 census 124,541 Italians, according to the one in 1921 180,630 Italians.

translation.lb: Et get b'emiérkt, datt de recensement vu 1910 vun der Versailler conferen« als richtlinn geholt go'f.
translation.en: It is noted that the 1910 census was taken as a guideline by the Versailles Conference.

translation.lb: Vun alle gebidder, de' durch de Versailler vertrag Italien zo'gestane go'wen, behält Italien nomme me' 2 districttr, nämlech Monfalcone Goriela matt 655 kilometer caTré an Tarvision matt 362 kilometer carré.
translation.en: Of all the territories granted to Italy by the Treaty of Versailles, Italy retains only 2 districts, namely Monfalcone Gorizia with 655 square kilometers and Tarvisio with 362 square kilometers.

translation.lb: De Führer ganz eleng ass schëlleg
translation.en: The Führer alone is guilty

translation.lb: Gëschter ass fir d'e'scht de' juristesch thes gehe'ert gin, no der all 21 ugekloten op ucrder vum Hitler gehandelt hätten, a no dèr de Führer fir hir akte verantwortlech war.
translation.en: Yesterday, for the first time, the legal thesis was heard that all 21 defendants acted on Hitler’s orders and that therefore the Führer was responsible for their actions.

translation.lb: Des thes go'f an engem expsoé vun 20000 wiérder vum Dr. Haman Jahreiss developpe'ert.
translation.en: This thesis was developed in a 20,000-word exposé by Dr. Haman Jahreiss.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Jahreiss ass eng autorite't vum internationale recht an Deitschland a wor ni nazi.
translation.en: Dr. Jahreiss is an authority on international law in Germany and was never a Nazi.

translation.lb: Fir des entwécklong ass eng zeit vun 3 wochc virgesin.
translation.en: Three weeks have been allocated for this development.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Jahreiss explize'ert, datt de „führerprinzip" d'gesetz vum III. Reich wor.
translation.en: Dr. Jahreiss explains that the "Führerprinzip" was the law of the Third Reich.

translation.lb: Wann elo de' ugeklot als krichsverbriécher higestalli ge'fe gin, so' war dat eng verschreiwong vu neie gesetzer matt retroaktivem effekt, wo'vun de' ugeklot virdru keng kenntnes haten an sech net derno richte konnten.
translation.en: If now the defendants are presented as war criminals, it was a prescription of new laws with retroactive effect, of which the defendants had no prior knowledge and could not conform to.

translation.lb: Hién erklärt da weider, datt de pakt Kellog an d'prinzipie vum Vëlkerbond scho läng virun 1939 hifälieg woren, an datt wärend länge joere viru 39 kén internationalt gesetz de krich verbueden hätt.
translation.en: He further explains that the Kellogg Pact and the principles of the League of Nations had long been inapplicable before 1939, and that for many years prior to 1939, no international law prohibited war.

translation.lb: Am Reich woren dem Hitler seng uerder „alpha an omega".
translation.en: In the Reich, Hitler's orders were the "alpha and omega."

translation.lb: De Führer wor de' gesetzgebend gewalt an den autor vun allen individuellen uerder.
translation.en: The Führer was the legislative power and the author of all individual orders.

translation.lb: Dese regim huet Villen Deitsche net gefall, och am ausländ wor hié verhâsst, mé dat ännert neischt un der tatsâch, datt de regim existe'ert huet, an datt hién eso'guer vum ausländ unerkannt wor.
translation.en: This regime did not appeal to many Germans, and it was despised even abroad, but that does not change the fact that the regime existed and was even recognized internationally.

translation.lb: Huren é mënsch, dén an Deitsehland geliéwt huet an a'contact stong matt all de massen de' den Hitler ugebiéd hun, ka verstoen, we' fest de nazissem an Deitchland verankert wor.
translation.en: Any person who lived in Germany and was in contact with all the masses that worshiped Hitler can understand how deeply Nazism was rooted in Germany.

translation.lb: De regim fir des masse wor dat, wat d'propaganda aus him gemäch huet.
translation.en: The regime for these masses was what propaganda made of it.

translation.lb: Hién hât sech matt eso' enger krâft durchgesat, datt jidferén vun der aussichtslo'segkét vun irgendenger resistenzform op d'de'fst iwerzégt wor.
translation.en: It had asserted itself with such force that everyone was deeply convinced of the hopelessness of any form of resistance.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Otto Stahmer huet sech eng Zurechtweisung vum lord Lawrence zo'gezun.
translation.en: Dr. Otto Stahmer received a reprimand from Lord Lawrence.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Stahmer huet dem Goering seng schlussverteidegong ugefâng a bemiérkt, datt d'kräfteverhältnes tëschent der uklo an der verteidegong total ongleich war, an datt d'uklo net geneigt war, d'verteidegong gënschteg unzehe'eren.
translation.en: Dr. Stahmer began Goering's closing defense and noted that the balance of power between the prosecution and the defense was totally unequal, and that the prosecution was not inclined to favorably consider the defense.

translation.lb: De President huet den Dr. Stahmer ënnerbrach matt der erklärong, seng behaptonge wäre komplett falsch.
translation.en: The President interrupted Dr. Stahmer with the explanation that his claims were completely false.

translation.lb: Och den Dr. Stahmer stellt sech op sengem vierrédner sei standponkt an erklärt, datt de' ugeklot net kënnte verantwortlech gemâch gin fir akten, de' si nuren ënner commando ausgefe'ert hätten.
translation.en: Dr. Stahmer also aligns with his predecessor's stance and explains that the defendants could not be held responsible for actions they only carried out under command.

translation.lb: De Garibaldi ass do’t
translation.en: Garibaldi is there

translation.lb: De generol Santé Garibaldi, jong vum Riccioti Garibaldi an cnkel vum generol Joseph Garibaldi, ass en donneschdeg zu Bordeaux gestuerwen.
translation.en: General Santé Garibaldi, son of Riccioti Garibaldi and nephew of General Joseph Garibaldi, died on Thursday in Bordeaux.

translation.lb: Zu Dachau hât hié sech eng tuberkulös zo'gezun.
translation.en: In Dachau, he contracted tuberculosis.

translation.lb: Hié wor GO joer âl an hâ' de krich 1914—18 mattgemâch.
translation.en: He was 60 years old and took part in the 1914–18 war.

translation.lb: D'Preisen haten hién an e KZ gestach, well hié resistent gemâch huet.
translation.en: The Prussians had put him in a concentration camp because he resisted.

translation.lb: Sei brudder, de genrol Peppino Garribaldi, dén an der Argonne 1914 de' bekannt „garibaldesch garde" befélegt huet, hëlt un de begriéwnesfeierlechkéten dél.
translation.en: His brother, General Peppino Garibaldi, who in 1914 commanded the famous 'Garibaldi Guard' in Argonne, is taking part in the funeral ceremonies.

translation.lb: Zweschefäll zu Gibraltar
translation.en: Incident in Gibraltar

translation.lb: D'local press vu Gibraltar mellt en zwëschefall tëschent den Englänner an den Australier.
translation.en: The local press from Gibraltar reports an incident between the English and the Australians.

translation.lb: En détachement vun australeschen truppen, de' um siegesdéfilé zu London délgehoM haten, ass o,p Gibraltar komm, fir sedh d 'fest on g unzekucken.
translation.en: A detachment of Australian troops, who had participated in the victory parade in London, came to Gibraltar to view the fortifications.

translation.lb: D'englesch polizei huet e besoffenen zaldot verhaft.
translation.en: The English police arrested a drunken soldier.

translation.lb: Duerophin hun d'australesoh zaidofen d'englesch polizei ugegraff.
translation.en: Consequently, the Australian soldiers attacked the English police.

translation.lb: Iwer 50 Australier go'we verhaft.
translation.en: Over 50 Australians were arrested.

translation.lb: Eng doze polizisten hu missten an d'spidol iwerfo'ert gin.
translation.en: A dozen policemen had to be taken to the hospital.

translation.lb: Fo’ssball Berichtigung.
translation.en: Football Correction.

translation.lb: In dem Abschnitt Tschammerpokal 1942- 1943 unsers Artikels: Der luxemburger Fussball während der Besatzungszeit, ist uns ein kleiner Irrtum unterlaufen, den wir hiermit richtig stellen wollen:
translation.en: In the section Tschammerpokal 1942-1943 of our article: Luxembourgish Football during the Occupation, we have made a small error which we want to correct here:

translation.lb: Nachdem Stades Spiele (wegen der Teilnahme von Feller I in Neuendorf) gegen Tus Neuendorf, Spora und Niederkorn an nulliert wurden, kam das Spiel Rapid Noudorf-Niederkorn (und nicht wie irrtümlich gemeldet Neuendorf gegen Spora) zum Austrage, das Niederkorn mit 5:2 Toren gewann.
translation.en: After Stades' games (due to the participation of Feller I in Neuendorf) against Tus Neuendorf, Spora, and Niederkorn were annulled, the game Rapid Noudorf-Niederkorn (and not as erroneously reported Neuendorf against Spora) took place, which Niederkorn won 5:2.

translation.lb: Dass Rapid Neudorf wieder auf einmal hinzukam, trug sieh folgendermassen zu:
translation.en: That Rapid Neudorf suddenly came back was due to the following:

translation.lb: Am 30. 5. 43 verlor Spora bereits gegen Rapid in Neudorf mit 5:4 Toren.
translation.en: On 30th May 1943, Spora had already lost to Rapid in Neudorf with a score of 5:4.

translation.lb: Dieses Spiel wurde nun aber vor dem grünen Tische den Neudorfer als verloren angerechnet und zwar durch den damaligen „Allmächtigen" Gaufachwart Staudt aus Koblenz.
translation.en: However, this game was then counted against Neudorf before the 'green table' by the then 'Almighty' district chairman Staudt from Koblenz.

translation.lb: (Und durch diesen Umstand kam es dann zum Spiele Stade-Spora 1:0).
translation.en: (And because of this circumstance, the game Stade-Spora 1:0 took place).

translation.lb: Auf eine Reklamation von Neudorf setzte dann Staudt oben erwähntes Spiel Spora-Rapid erneut an, zu welchem aber Rapid nicht antrat, weil er bereits inzwischen beim Reichsfachamt in Berlin Berufung eingelegt hatte.
translation.en: After a complaint from Neudorf, Staudt scheduled the aforementioned game Spora-Rapid again, to which Rapid did not appear because it had already filed an appeal with the Reich authority in Berlin.

translation.lb: Die Neudorfer bekamen nun auch in Berlin Recht und Genugtuung, denn ihr erstes gegen Spora gewonnenes Spiel wurde validiert, und da folglich jetzt Spora ausgeschaltet und Stade deklassiert war, kam es zum Spiele Rapid- Niederkorn.
translation.en: Neudorf was vindicated in Berlin as well, as their first victory against Spora was validated, and since Spora was now eliminated and Stade outclassed, the game Rapid-Niederkorn took place.

translation.lb: RONDEM DE PROZESS GOMAND Mir hun a lèsehtec zeit verschiddcntlech zo'schrëlte krltt vn leidd, de* seeli durch zeienaussoen ain prozess Gomand belédegt fillen.
translation.en: AROUND THE GOMAND PROCESS We have recently received various writings from people who feel insulted by witness statements in the Gomand process.

translation.lb: Si berufte seeh dann np d'pressgesetz. fir an onser zeidong de" iait'en ze widderrtiffen.
translation.en: They then referred to the press law to have their statements refuted in our newspaper.

translation.lb: D'jurisprudenz geseit nun «wer net vir, datt en objective compte-rendu vu gerichtsverhandlongen eng e m genannten d'iintwertrecht zo'gestét.
translation.en: The jurisprudence does not foresee granting a right of reply for an objective account of court proceedings to those named.

translation.lb: Mir hun dofir bis elo ail de' zn'- schrëfie refuse'ert a refuse'ere se oeh an zo'konft.
translation.en: We have therefore refused to publish them until now and will continue to refuse in the future.

translation.lb: Mir gesin dorau absolut keng oncorrecthrft.
translation.en: We see absolutely no incorrectness in this.

translation.lb: mé mir wellen am ge'gendél den décisio'ne vum gerîcht net virgreifen.
translation.en: But on the contrary, we do not want to preempt the decisions of the court.

translation.lb: Mir bestriéwen ons, ons beriehter eso' objcetiv wc' me'glech ze mâeben.
translation.en: We strive to make our reports as objective as possible.

translation.lb: D'gcricht, an dat mir volit vertraue n hu n, ass dofir do, tir crauszefanne, wat recht an onrccht ass.
translation.en: The court, in which we have full confidence, is there to determine what is right and wrong.

translation.lb: Jidderén. dé sech zu onreeht ugcgraff fillt, dé soll sech duer verfintwerte goen, wo' e genannt gin ass: virun de grengen dësch vum rîchtcr!
translation.en: Everyone who feels wronged should answer where they are named: before the green table of the judge!

translation.lb: Entge ’ ntkomme vun der Cegedel Esch-Sau er.
translation.en: Response from the Cegedel Esch-Sauer.

translation.lb: D'Cegedcl wellt an zo'konft onst duerfnetz ganz matt wiésselstrôm speisen cso' wc' et bis clo schons an e puer dclcr vum uert de fall war.
translation.en: In the future, the Cegedel intends to supply our village network entirely with alternating current, as has already been the case in some parts of the area.

translation.lb: D'awunnerschaft gct opgcfucrdcrt dcrfir ze suergcn, datt hir hausinstallatio'ncn an der rei sin, datt keng onnc deg sebwiregketen entstin.
translation.en: The residents are urged to ensure that their home installations are in order to prevent any inconveniences.

translation.lb: All de', de elektromotoren an -apparaten hun müssen zur zeit einbauen.
translation.en: Anyone who has electric motors and devices must install them at the time.

translation.lb: All frënn vu sche'ncr radiomusek werden de' definitiv regelong wuel am méschtc begre'ssen.
translation.en: All friends of beautiful radio music will probably welcome this definite arrangement the most.

translation.lb: Et gét viru matt der reconstructio ’ n Lclz-Ensber.
translation.en: The reconstruction of Lclz-Ensber is progressing.

translation.lb: Hei schcngt et dach wellen éscht ze gin mam bauen trotz déne ville schwiregkcten.
translation.en: Here it seems to want to truly proceed with building despite the many difficulties.

translation.lb: Ons sehe' saucrbréck am Pull de' leider och zerste'ert gi war vun de Preisen war gewëss a recordzeit ncs durch eng passend no'tbrcck ersat gin
translation.en: We see the Saucer Bridge in Pull, unfortunately also destroyed by the Prussians, was certainly replaced in record time by a suitable emergency bridge.

translation.lb: an eio gesi mir we' och d'reconstructio'n vun denen 80—100 prozent beschiédcgte gebeier nach zeiteg genuch asetzt,
translation.en: and we see how the reconstruction of the 80-100 percent damaged buildings is also timely enough begun,

translation.lb: datt fir de wantcr dat no'twendegst cnner dag ka sin.
translation.en: so that for the winter the necessities can be under roof.

translation.lb: Un e puer gebeier get gleichzciteg geschafft
translation.en: Work is being done simultaneously on a few buildings,

translation.lb: an eso' de beweis erbruecht datt de' kleng ofgclécn dierfer net als ste'fkanner behandelt gin.
translation.en: and thus proving that the small remote villages are not treated as stepchildren.

translation.lb: Am ge'gendél, si sin net de' lescht de' werde soe kennen: ..D'sâch ass an der rei."
translation.en: On the contrary, they are not the last to be able to say: 'The matter is in order.'

translation.lb: Denen zo'stännegcn instanzen gcbirt den dank vun allen Interessenten.
translation.en: The responsible authorities deserve the gratitude of all interested parties.

translation.lb: De Franck soll 14 mol démissionne’ert hun
translation.en: Franck is said to have resigned 14 times.

translation.lb: Den affekot vum Hans Franck, dén de' lescht woch Witt sengen uspillongen op de Versaillcr vertrag erausgeheit gi wor, könnt gëschter exem «chwètzen.
translation.en: The lawyer of Hans Franck, who was dismissed from his position last week due to his statements on the Versailles Treaty, spoke yesterday.

translation.lb: En huet des ke'er nemimen émoi op de Vcrsai'ller vertrag uge&piMt.
translation.en: This time he did not make any emotional remarks about the Versailles Treaty.

translation.lb: Virun drei nie'nt hât de Franck sech als „terribel schëlleg fond", mé gëschter wor hién e mann, dé 5 joer lâg ge'nt de naziterror a ge'nt d'polizei-mesure gekämpft liuet, de' a Polen ergraff sollte gin,
translation.en: Three months ago, Franck found himself 'terribly guilty', but yesterday he was a man who had fought against Nazi terror and police measures for 5 years, who was to be arrested in Poland,

translation.lb: an dé net manncr we' 14 mol seng demissio'n agerécht hätt.
translation.en: and who had submitted his resignation no less than 14 times.

translation.lb: Hién hält sech ugelbueden, an d'Wehrmacht anzetriéden, mé den Hitler hält weder sein e'schte nach sein zwéte wonsch erfëllt.
translation.en: He had offered to join the Wehrmacht, but Hitler fulfilled neither his first nor second wish.

translation.lb: De 9. juni 1943 hätt hién den Hitler an engem mémorandum op d'masscmuerden a Polen opmirksam gemâch, mé dese protest wir net ugeiholl gin.
translation.en: On June 9, 1943, he brought the mass murders in Poland to Hitler's attention in a memorandum, but this protest was not accepted.

translation.lb: Hién hätt net zu de „verre"- der" gehe'ert, de' den Hitler beseitege wollten an och net zu dem Hitler sengen enke mattarbechter.
translation.en: He did not belong to the 'others' who wanted to remove Hitler, nor was he among Hitler's close associates.

translation.lb: Hién hätt nemmen dem Himmler a gewësse restrictio'ne vun der Wehrmacht cnnerstanen:
translation.en: He had only complied with Himmler and certain restrictions from the Wehrmacht:

translation.lb: a vun ufank un hütt hié schon de' gre'sst schwieregkt'te matt der SS. gehat.
translation.en: and from the beginning, he had the greatest difficulties with the SS.

translation.lb: De nexte schilussplaidoyer ass dé vum F r i c k, dem fre'ere preiseschen inneministcr.
translation.en: The next closing argument is from Frick, the former Prussian interior minister.

translation.lb: Hié wir den typ vun engem fonctionnaire vum inneministerium gewiéscht an hält sech em d'aussepolitik net gekëmmert.
translation.en: He was the type of official from the Ministry of the Interior and did not concern himself with foreign policy.

translation.lb: Fir d'krichsverbriéchcn, de' an den occupe'erte länner ausgefe'ert wir« gin, wir hié net verantwortlech ze mächen.
translation.en: For the war crimes committed in the occupied countries, he was not to be held responsible.

translation.lb: Als verdédeger vum Streicher fe'ert den Dr. Hans Marx de schlus&plaidoyer.
translation.en: Dr. Hans Marx gave the closing argument as the defender of Streicher.

translation.lb: De Streicher wor vun den AHie'erten als de feind nr. 1 vun de judde bezéchent gin, o'ni dén d'oprichte vun de konzentratio'nslagere net Stattfond hätt.
translation.en: Streicher had been designated by the Allies as enemy number 1 of the Jews, claiming that without him, the establishment of concentration camps would not have happened.

translation.lb: Mé hié wir net den ustêfter vun de massemuerden un de judden, erklärt sein affekot, an hicn hätt net me' verantwortong ze droen we' de' aner.
translation.en: But he was not the instigator of the mass murders of the Jews, his lawyer explained, and he bore no more responsibility than the others.

translation.lb: E minenongléck Knapho'schend.
translation.en: A mining accident in Knapho'schend.

translation.lb: — Beim loseh'tissen ass de iugendleche Bloin vun he: onversinns op e sprengkierper gesto'ss, dén explode'ert ass.
translation.en: While tinkering, the young fellow incidentally stumbled upon an explosive device, which then detonated.

translation.lb: Duerch d'splitter ass de jonge mënsch schwe'er ■blesse'ert gin.
translation.en: The young man was severely injured by the shrapnel.

translation.lb: Hién huet misse gleich an d'klinik op WoJtz iwerfe'ert gin.
translation.en: He had to be immediately transferred to the clinic in Wiltz.

translation.lb: Sein zo'sland soll icwer net liéwensgefe'erlech sin.
translation.en: His condition is reportedly not life-threatening.

translation.lb: Zaldotegriewer D'administratio'n vu m Hammer militärkirfeeht ass run demanden dèrmôssen iwerlaf, datt se matt der beä ntwerong kaum nach no kennt.
translation.en: Soldier graves The administration of Hammer military cemetery is now overwhelmed with requests, so that they can hardly keep up with responding.

translation.lb: Ons nèxt lëscht vu griewer kann dofir ere'scht muer publize'ert gin.
translation.en: Therefore, our next list of graves can only be published tomorrow.

translation.lb: Net ufroe gl nach emmer ugeholl.
translation.en: Not all requests can still be accepted.

translation.lb: Gidd ons èr adressen.
translation.en: Give us your addresses.

translation.lb: mir léden se un d'amerikaneseh verwaltong weider, au déien iéch d'bczéchnong vun èrem adopte'erte graw matt.
translation.en: We will forward them to the American administration, along with the designation of their adopted grave.

translation.lb: AH déncn, de' sech bedélegt hun, soe mer schon elo am numm vun onse libérateuren hèrzlech merci.
translation.en: To all those who have participated, we already say a heartfelt thank you in the name of our liberators.

translation.lb: Canoe Canoeisme De Canoc Club Letzeburg ass e sonndeg, den 12. me, zu Bre'ssel an der beseitender paddelcourse vu Belgien der „Traversée de Bruxelles" gestart.
translation.en: Canoe Canoeing of the Canoc Club Luxembourg started on Sunday, the 12th of May, in Brussels in the major Belgian paddling race, the 'Traversée de Bruxelles'.

translation.lb: Um départ wore 5 franse'sch vereiner, 15 beischer, eng schweizer selektio'n, 1 holländeschen an e letzeburger verein.
translation.en: At the start were 5 French clubs, 15 Belgian, one Swiss selection, one Dutch, and one Luxembourgish club.

translation.lb: D'course vun de sport- an tourebooten ass vun 106 boote bestridde gin an d'équipe Mme an hèr Vestibule (Belgien) hu gewonn.
translation.en: The race of the sport and touring boats was contested by 106 boats and the team Mme and Mr. Vestibule (Belgium) won.

translation.lb: D'Letzeburger Treinen-Hanrion woren 32. a Marc. Lentz 35.
translation.en: The Luxembourgers Treinen-Hanrion were 32nd and Marc. Lentz 35th.

translation.lb: D'course vun de rennbooten ass vun der mixte-équipe van Marche-Massy (Belg.) vrum Ener van Marche (Belg.) gewönne gin.
translation.en: The race of the racing boats was won by the mixed team of Marche-Massy (Belgium) from Ener van Marche (Belgium).

translation.lb: D'Letzeburger woren: Kayser P. 16., Lentz Robi 23., a Fonk-Bellion 24.
translation.en: The Luxembourgers were: Kayser P. 16th, Lentz Robi 23rd, and Fonk-Bellion 24th.

translation.en: Marie says to Josephine that Monty for your kitchen machine, you don't need any instructions and the kitchen machine shines like a sun.

translation.lb: Du brauchs nei vill, a kleng sin d'kèschten Eweil Monty ass dai beseht vum beschien
translation.en: You don't need much, and the costs are small because Monty is your best choice among the best.

translation.lb: Wien émoi Monty huei probe'eri, Dén huet et och schons adopie'ert.
translation.en: Whoever has tried Monty once, has already adopted it.

translation.lb: Monty ass ze kre'en an den épicérisn, ustreicher-geschäften a quincaillerien
translation.en: Monty is available in grocery stores, paint shops, and hardware stores.

translation.lb: Monty ass e fnbrikat vun den Usines „LUXELL AS" Forest 965
translation.en: Monty is a product from the LUXELL AS factories, Forest 965.

translation.en: LARGE SHIPMENT of electric motors of 7 and 10 horsepower.

translation.en: SPECIALTY: Electrical and mechanical repair of electric motors.

translation.en: A. MÜLLER & SONS * 8-10-12, rue du Chemin de Fer - Telephone: 21-83 Luxembourg-Gare.

translation.lb: Weimart zu Re’mech E fällt dest joer op de 27. mé, op e me'udeg.
translation.en: The wine market in Remich falls on May 27 this year, on a Monday.

translation.lb: T géng é soen, et war net me'gleçh, datt et hei am ilanid eso'eng gewalteg mass vu weifervente get, de' frei zum muselwein halen.
translation.en: You could say it was not possible for such a large mass of wine enthusiasts to gather here in the country, eager to purchase Moselle wine.

translation.lb: Dat huet de mart zu Gre'vemâcher bewisen.
translation.en: This was proven by the market in Grevenmacher.

translation.lb: De' Jeidd müssen sech dach hal so'en, et kann ons ké portugieseschen an och eso'guer kén Trittenheimer de gudde, gesonde gréchen ersetzen!
translation.en: People must admit that neither Portuguese nor even Trittenheimer wine can replace the good, healthy Greek wine!

translation.lb: Mé wann en ail net grad eso' deier wier!
translation.en: But if only it weren't so expensive!

translation.lb: En ass ze rar; et hun viilzeviH uertschaftën 1945 ké wein we'nt dem erkâle recolle'erl.
translation.en: It's too rare; too many communities didn't produce wine in 1945 due to the poor harvest.

translation.lb: D'natur hucl ower dest joer d'l'irma „Pancrace, Servais & Cie" net zu enger exhihitio'n zo'geilôss an duerfir soll jidderén sech op de Re'mecher mart iwerzége kommen, we' de preis sech-den dag entwickelt a we' weit datt d'inlännescli produclen dénen auslänneschen d'stâng halen.
translation.en: Nature, however, did not allow the firm 'Pancrace, Servais & Cie' to make an exhibition this year, so everyone should come to the Remich market to find out how prices develop that day and how well domestic products compete with foreign ones.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schiltges: Ké redressement vun der économie o’ni redressement vum outillage
translation.en: Mr. Schiltges: No recovery of the economy without recovery of equipment

translation.lb: Et ass eng economesch a sozial flicht, ze reconstrue'eren, eso' gudd an eso' schnell we' nemme me'glech.
translation.en: It is an economic and social duty to rebuild, as well and as quickly as possible.

translation.lb: Economesch gesin ass et onme'glech opschwonk ze kre'en, wa mer net fir d'e'scht erem den outillage opbaucn.
translation.en: Economically speaking, it is impossible to create growth if we do not first rebuild the equipment.

translation.lb: Dat gellt net nemme fir d'industrie, d'handels- a geschäftsweit mé och fir d'productio'u an der landwirtschaft.
translation.en: This applies not only to industry, commerce, and business but also to production in agriculture.

translation.lb: Do dierf et z. b. net me' virkommen, datt récollen verfaulen, well d'Reconstructio'n versäumt huet, schcieren ze bauen.
translation.en: For example, it should no longer happen that harvests rot because reconstruction failed to build sheds.

translation.lb: D'reconstructio'n ass awer och eng sozial flicht, d'flicht, denen ze hc-llefen, de' onverscheMt a no't geroden.
translation.en: Reconstruction is also a social duty, the duty to help those who have unexpectedly and in need find themselves in need.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schiltges présente'ert dann eng ganz rei vu propositio'nen, de' den zweck vise'eren, der privatinitiativ op d'bén ze hëllelen an d'organisatio'n vun der Reconstructio'n ze verbesseren.
translation.en: Mr. Schiltges then presents a whole series of proposals aimed at helping private initiative get on its feet and improving the organization of reconstruction.

translation.lb: Eso' misst zum beispill och den architekt sech der privalinitiativ zur pro'w stellen, fir datt och do de' beseht op d'längst sech durchsetze kënnten.
translation.en: For example, the architect should also prove himself to the private initiative, so that the existing structure can prevail in the long run.

translation.lb: Regional commissären sollten agesât gin, de' an der lag wieren direct matt de „Conférences communales'' zesummen ze schaffen.
translation.en: Regional commissioners should be deployed who would be able to work directly with the 'municipal conferences'.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schiltges ass <ler mcnong, -datt d'biiropersonal vun der econstructio 11 numeresch vleicht gro'ss genuch awer qualitativ net stärek genuch ass.
translation.en: Mr. Schiltges believes that the office staff of the reconstruction may be large enough numerically but not strong enough in quality.

translation.lb: Hié propose'ert, technesch Spezialisten durch en he'cht gehalt, dal liire capacite'len entsprecht, an d'servicer vun der Reconstructio'n ze ze'en, well dat wiere grad de', de' seeh am beschien de'te bezuelt man
translation.en: He proposes to pay technical specialists a high salary that corresponds to their capabilities to strengthen the services of reconstruction because those are precisely the ones to be paid the best.

translation.lb: Et wier och vleicht besser a me' bëlleg — eso' mengt den her Schiltges — de' kleng dierfer als ganzt a vun engem entrepreneur opbauen ze lössen.
translation.en: Mr. Schiltges thinks it might also be better and cheaper to have small villages rebuilt as a whole by an entrepreneur.

translation.lb: Do, wo' et net grad bei der reconstructio'n an engems gét, soll och net zevill vbn urbanise'erong geschwat gin —dofir ass haut d'no't vill ze vil! um mann.
translation.en: Where reconstruction does not succeed simultaneously, there should not be too much talk of urbanization either — today the necessity is far too urgent!

translation.lb: Et gét och net, datt énzelner sichen op staatskäschten ze profitc'eren.
translation.en: It is also unacceptable for individuals to try to profit at the state's expense.

translation.lb: Wien sein haus me' gro'ss opgebaut wellt hun,. we' et wor, soll och wannechgelifft den ënnerschéd sehver berappen.
translation.en: Whoever wants to have their house rebuilt larger than it was should cover the difference themselves, please.

translation.lb: Ofschle'ssend vertrëtt den her Schiltges de standponkt, datt d'reconstructio'n net dierft stoe bleiwen aus finanzielle grënn.
translation.en: In conclusion, Mr. Schiltges holds the position that reconstruction should not be halted for financial reasons.

translation.lb: Sollten d'krcditer virzeileg erschöpft sin, missten éventuel! aner budgetposten op d'Reconslructio'n iwerschri we gin,
translation.en: If the credits are prematurely exhausted, then possibly other budget items should be transferred to reconstruction,

translation.lb: wa net — 110 enger neier propositio n vum her Schiltges — de' gre'sser gemengen aus dem Zentrum a Süden secli hirgin, kleng dierfer oder gemengen z'adopte'eren an hinne bei der reconstructio'n matt rot an dot an och matt gcldfongcn ënnert d'ärem greifen — oder we'negstens d'geldmëtlel avance'eren.
translation.en: if not — according to a new proposal by Mr. Schiltges — the larger municipalities from the center and south should volunteer to adopt small villages or municipalities and assist them with advice and action and also extend financial help or at least advance the financial means.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schiltges schle'sst matt engem wonsch no engem neie reconstructio'nsprogramm a matt engem appell zum schaffen.
translation.en: Mr. Schiltges concludes with a wish for a new reconstruction program and an appeal to work.

translation.lb: Statistik iwer d’tschechesch wahlen
translation.en: Statistics about the Czech elections

translation.lb: An der Tschechei d’kommunisten a fe’erong • An der Slowakei d’democraten
translation.en: In the Czech lands, the communists are in the lead • In Slovakia, the democrats hold sway

translation.lb: D’kommuniste wielen de ministerpresident
translation.en: The communists elect the prime minister

translation.lb: D'vergleichong vun de walilrcsultater vu virgëschter matt déne vum joer 1935 beweist,
translation.en: The comparison of the election results from yesterday with those of the year 1935 shows,

translation.lb: datt d'stëmme vun de neie wiéler an de' vun de wiéler,
translation.en: that the votes of the new voters and those of the voters,

translation.lb: de' enger partei ugehe'ert hun, de' elo verbueden ass,
translation.en: who belonged to a party that is now banned,

translation.lb: scch méschtens op de' drei Parteien: kommunisten, sozial nationalisten a katholiken verdélen.
translation.en: are mainly distributed among the three parties: communists, social nationalists, and Catholics.

translation.lb: Nemmen d'sozial-democraten hun am verglach zu 1935 stemme verluer.
translation.en: Only the social democrats have lost votes compared to 1935.

translation.lb: D'kommunisten hun hir stëmmenzuel vu 571.000 op 1,617.000 stemmen erhe'cht,
translation.en: The communists have increased their number of votes from 571,000 to 1,617,000 votes,

translation.lb: d'sozial nationalisten hir vu 692.000 op 1.003.000 an d'katholiken hu gc'nt 1935, wo' se 559.000 haten, der elo 897.000 op sech verénegt.
translation.en: the social nationalists from 692,000 to 1,003,000, and the Catholics, against 1935, when they had 559,000, now have united 897,000 on their side.

translation.lb: D'sozial-democraten haten am joer 1935 1818.001 men, wo'vunner si der nemme me' 656.000 behalen hun.
translation.en: The social democrats had in the year 1935, 1,818,001 votes, of which they have retained only 656,000.

translation.lb: Des zuele beweisen, datt d'tscbcchescht vollek an der gro'sser majorite't fir d'marxistesch Parteien opte'ert huet,
translation.en: These numbers prove that the Czech people have opted in large majority for the Marxist parties,

translation.lb: well de' zesummen 2.284.000 stëmmen am ganzen op sech verénege konnten,
translation.en: as they were able to unite a total of 2,284,000 votes,

translation.lb: de' pet-marxistesch parteie kruten derge'nt nuren 1.900.000 stemmen.
translation.en: while the non-Marxist parties, on the contrary, only received 1,900,000 votes.

translation.lb: (D'marxistesch parteie sin d'kommunistesch an d'sozial-democraten. net-marxistesch agestallt sin d'sozial-nationalisten an d'katho'lesch partei).
translation.en: (The Marxist parties are the communist and the social democrats. Non-Marxist aligned are the social nationalists and the Catholic party).

translation.lb: An anere wiérder, d'tschcchcscht vollek huet sech an der gro'sser majorite't fir eng sozialistesch politik matt sozialistesche le'songen entschéd.
translation.en: In other words, the Czech people have decided in a large majority for a socialist policy with socialist solutions.

translation.lb: Ennert déne leschtc verstin d'Tschechen haptsächlech d'nationalisatio'n vun den Industrien.
translation.en: Among these, the Czechs mainly understand the nationalization of industries.

translation.lb: De' énzeg partei, de' net matt dem sozialistesche programm d'accord wor a sech eleng als „net-sozialistesch partei" bezéchcnt hat, d'katholiken,
translation.en: The only party that did not agree with the socialist program and labeled itself alone as a "non-socialist party," the Catholics,

translation.lb: kruten dofir nemmen 897.000 stëmmen wärend de' aner sozialistcsch parteien zesummen der 3.278.000 kruten.
translation.en: therefore received only 897,000 votes while the other socialist parties together received 3,278,000 votes.

translation.lb: Op der anerer seit huet d'slowakescht vollek sech ganz am ge'gendél ausgesprach.
translation.en: On the other hand, the Slovak people have expressed themselves quite the opposite.

translation.lb: D'définitiv resultatcr hun de' provisoresch confirme'- ert,
translation.en: The definitive results have confirmed the provisional ones,

translation.lb: d. h. datt d'slowakesch democraten 60% vun alle stemme kritt hun wärenddem an desem landcsdél d'kommunisten der nemmen 30% kruten.
translation.en: i.e., that the Slovak democrats received 60% of all votes while in this part of the country the communists received only 30%.

translation.lb: De succès vun de slowakeschen democraten wèrd also de net-marxistesche parteien am parlement zur majorite't verhëllefen.
translation.en: The success of the Slovak democrats will thus help the non-Marxist parties achieve a majority in parliament.

translation.lb: Allerdéngs kennen d'définitiv wahlresultater vun der ganzer Tschechoslowakei net viru muer bekannt gemâch gin,
translation.en: However, the definitive election results for the whole of Czechoslovakia cannot be made known before tomorrow,

translation.lb: well vill vun den tschecheschcn zaldoten, de' bei der seiberong vun déne vu bande verseichte gebidder nach net an der lag woren, stemmen ze goen.
translation.en: because many of the Czech soldiers who were involved in the liberation of those encroached areas were not yet able to go to vote.

translation.lb: Mé et get ugeholl, datt des nachziiglcr net me' vill un de resultater, we' se bis elo virleien, ännere kënnen.
translation.en: But it is assumed that these latecomers will not be able to change much about the results as they currently stand.

translation.lb: Hei sin de' loscht resultater, de' d'norichtenagentur Ceteka bekannt gin huet:
translation.en: Here are the latest results as announced by the news agency Ceteka:

translation.en: The rubble lies 35 billion meters high.

translation.en: Furthermore, completely destroyed: 666,000 cars,
