translation.en: 5—6000 merchant ships with 30 million gross register tons.

translation.lb: Attentat am Hofbräukeller Bekannllech wor am november 1939 e „wonner" zu München geschitt, we' de Führer matt héler haut dem berüchtegle bommenattentat entging wor.
translation.en: Attack at the Hofbräukeller It is well known that in November 1939 a "miracle" happened in Munich when the Führer narrowly escaped the infamous bomb attack.

translation.lb: Des geschieht huet scho vil 1 pabeier geschwärzt, an dach wosst kc mensch, wat eigentlech passe'ert wor.
translation.en: This event has already filled a lot of paper, yet no one truly knew what actually transpired.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Lothar Rohde huet de geheimnesvolle Schleier gelëft.
translation.en: Dr. Lothar Rohde lifted the mysterious veil.

translation.lb: D'Englänner hun hién ausgefrot iwer d'événementer an Deitschland no der krichserkilärong.
translation.en: The English interrogated him about the events in Germany after the declaration of war.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Rohde erklärt: „D'bomra vu München go'f op uerder vum Hitler an den Hofbräukeller place'ert.
translation.en: Dr. Rohde explained: "The bomb in Munich was placed on Hitler's orders in the Hofbräukeller.

translation.lb: Si sollt 5 minutte no seiigem discours explode'eren, fir dem Goebbels fudder fir seng Propaganda ze liweren.
translation.en: It was supposed to explode 5 minutes after his speech to provide fodder for Goebbels' propaganda.

translation.lb: D'attentat ass nämlech den Englänner an d'schong gescho'stert gin.
translation.en: The attack was then supposed to be blamed on the English.

translation.lb: Doniéwt go'f dann ower och crvirgehuewen, datt den Hèrgott perse'nlech gudd frënd matt dem Führer wor, well en hién am leschten abléck duerch e wonner virum sedieren do't gerett huet.
translation.en: Furthermore, it was emphasized that God was personally a good friend of the Führer, as he saved him at the last moment through a miracle from the sedition.

translation.lb: D'bomm wor vum Georg Elser fabrize'- ert gin.
translation.en: The bomb was manufactured by Georg Elser.

translation.lb: Gleich no der explosio'n huet hién den zuch fir d'Schweiz geholl.
translation.en: Immediately after the explosion, he took the train to Switzerland.

translation.lb: Hién huet nämlech zevill gewosst vun der geschieht, an dat wor eng gefe'erlech säch, hién huet dem hausfridde net me' recht getraut.
translation.en: He knew too much about the event, and that was a dangerous thing, he no longer trusted the peace at home.

translation.lb: D'polizei huet hién ower nach zur zeit gepléckt.
translation.en: But the police caught him just in time.

translation.lb: De Georg Elser ass op Dachau gewandert, wo' ni é mënsch hién ze gesi nach matt him ze schwètze krut Am ahrël 1945 go'f hién ermuerd.
translation.en: Georg Elser was sent to Dachau, where no one ever saw him or spoke to him again until he was murdered in April 1945.

translation.lb: Den Dr. Lothar Rohde wor och um courant vun der geschieht.
translation.en: Dr. Lothar Rohde was also aware of the incident.

translation.lb: Hié ko'm matt dem liéwen dervun, well d'Preisen hié fir hir krichszwecker drängend ne'deg gebraucht hun.
translation.en: He survived because the Prussians urgently needed him for their war purposes.

translation.lb: Hié wor nämlech den énzegen deitsche wëssensehaftler, dé fäheg wor.
translation.en: He was the only German scientist who was capable.

translation.lb: e radar zc Schafen, ältn'lech déni, dén d'Allie'ert am krich matt eso' vill erfoHeg agesat hun.
translation.en: of creating a radar, similar to the one that the Allies used so successfully in the war.

translation.lb: „Kiéwerlék fle’!“ Walfer.
translation.en: "Beetle plague!" Walfer.

translation.lb: Ewell hu mer et malt onsem sangen: „Kiéwerlék komm", ewell ass en do, de gromperekiéwerlék.
translation.en: Already we have sung about it: "Beetle come", now it is here, the potato beetle.

translation.lb: A wc' ass en do.
translation.en: And yes, it is here.

translation.lb: Mir brauche keng sich-actio'n me' anzelédcn fir en ze fannen, nén, mir kenne scho ro'eg eng prim aussetzen, fir déje'negen, dén e stéck fënd, wo' e nach net dran ass.
translation.en: We no longer need search actions to find it, no, we can calmly offer a reward for anyone who finds a piece where it hasn't been yet.

translation.lb: Um fehl ass* e méschter grad we' am gard.
translation.en: In the field, it is a master just like in the garden.

translation.lb: A rei a glidd krécht en iwer d'wéen, frech a gefrc'sscg we' 1940 d'Preisen.
translation.en: In a line and swiftly, it creeps over the paths, bold and voracious like the Germans in 1940.

translation.lb: Wo' ass d'autorite't, de mann et dèrf kc Schlappschwanz sin dén de gromperemued coventre'ert.
translation.en: Where is the authority, the man who won't be a coward to fight the potato moth?

translation.lb: We' war et, wa mer d'PG an d'PW gongen druspânen.
translation.en: What was it like when we took on the PG and the PW.

translation.lb: Si hu jo 5 joer läng sech <jichteg fir d'hémecht agesat, vleicht géng et spâss mächen, sech elo nëtzlech z'erweisen.
translation.en: They have committed themselves to the homeland for 5 years, maybe it would be fun now to prove useful.

translation.lb: Wel'l wann et det joer keng grompere gin, malt wurscht kenne mir s e dach och net ustrécken.
translation.en: Because if there are no potatoes this year, we can't spread the sausages after all.

translation.lb: A fir wat soll <ja net och emol e giélen e giélgestreiften ausmerzen.
translation.en: And why not eliminate a yellow and a yellow-striped one once in a while.

translation.lb: Op jiddefall get et hc'ch zeit fir anzegreifen.
translation.en: In any case, it is high time to take action.

translation.lb: E’erong vun onse nationalhelden W u e 1 e s s e m.
translation.en: Reverence to our national hero, W u e 1 e s s e m.

translation.lb: — Nodém mer eng rei vu ment matt sehnen op d'stierwlech iwerrèschter vun engem vun onse bèschten, dem Jängi Serres, dén de 19. 9. 44 zu Dietz un der Lahn matt nach 13 senger komerodcn higericht go'f, gewart hun, so' hüte mer e sonndcg, den 12. nié d'c'er, onse nationalhe'ld,
translation.en: — After we had for some time awaited with longing at the mortal remains of one of our best, Jängi Serres, who, on 19th September 1944, was executed in Dietz on the Lahn along with 13 of his comrades, we will hold a Sunday on 12th of December this year for our national hero,

translation.lb: dén als énzege märlyrer vu Wuelessem duerch seng gro'ss le'ft zur hémecht a seng onverbriéchlech trei zum glaw an zum tro'n,
translation.en: who, as the only martyr of Wuelessem through his great love for the homeland and his unbreakable loyalty to faith and the throne,

translation.lb: de preisesche kugelen zum affer gefall ass, d'lescht gelét ze gin.
translation.en: fell victim to the Prussian bullets, to honor him one last time.

translation.lb: Vi 11 leidd aus alle ge'gende vum land worc komm,
translation.en: Many people from all regions of the country came,

translation.lb: fir de Jängi op sengem lesehlc wé ze begléden,
translation.en: to accompany Jängi on his final journey,

translation.lb: an d'hèren David a N'eamann hun eng ergreifend grawriéd gehalen,
translation.en: and gentlemen David and Neumann held a moving eulogy,

translation.lb: de' a kuerzc wicrder den traurege kreizwé vu 16 echten an dapcre letzeburger jonge geschildert huet,
translation.en: which in short words described the tragic path of 16 true and brave Luxembourgish boys,

translation.lb: an trotzdém e le'wen Iro'scht l'ir d'elteren an d'hannerbliwe wor.
translation.en: and yet it was a living comfort for the parents and those left behind.

translation.lb: E länge leidenswc huet de Jängi hanner sech.
translation.en: Jängi had a long path of suffering behind him.

translation.lb: An d'preisesch Wehrmacht gcpresst, huet hién sech duerno eng rei vu me'nt hei am land verstoppt gehal,
translation.en: Forced into the Prussian Wehrmacht, he then hid himself for a while here in the country,

translation.lb: ko'm an d'Frankreich virun, wo' hién duerch d'spürnues vun engem feige verre'der der gestapo an d'hänti gespiltt go'f.
translation.en: went to France, where he was handed over to the Gestapo by the cunning of a cowardly traitor.

translation.lb: Prisong a KZer hun der rei no gewiésselt an endlech de 19. 9. 44 zu Dielz huet de Jängi d'sonn fir d'lescht gesi blénken.
translation.en: Prisons and concentration camps followed in succession until finally, on 19th September 1944 in Dietz, Jängi saw the sun blink for the last time.

translation.lb: D Preise wollten eng bluddeg revanche fir dat, wat si sollte verschëllt hun.
translation.en: The Prussians wanted a bloody revenge for what they supposedly owed.

translation.lb: niimlech, well si sech dem groe verhâsste wafierack fern gehalen hun —
translation.en: namely, because they kept themselves distant from the greatly hated warfare —

translation.lb: stell an o ni ge'genäntwert hun si d'schicksal iwer sech ergoe gelöss,
translation.en: silent and unanswering they allowed fate to take its course upon them,

translation.lb: hu nach kuerz virun hirem do'd d'letzeburger nationalhymne gesongen,
translation.en: sang the Luxembourgish national anthem shortly before their death,

translation.lb: a nodém si nach emol zesummen de' lescht Zigarette gefömmt bäten,
translation.en: and after they smoked the last cigarette together again,

translation.lb: an op der hirlehtongsplaz opgestallt go'- wen,
translation.en: and were positioned at the site of execution,

translation.lb: hun si nach emol ausgeruff „Vive ons Grande-Duchesse" a „Vive onse Prënz Jean",
translation.en: they once more called out "Vive ons Grande-Duchesse" and "Vive onse Prënz Jean",

translation.lb: et woren de lescht wiérder ir si durch d'preisesch kugele niddergestreckt go'wen.
translation.en: these were the last words before they were brought down by the Prussian bullets.

translation.lb: Do Jängi ass é vun déne jongen, de' trotz alle Schikanen a marier sech net vun «1er naziband beeinflusse gelöss hun,
translation.en: Jängi is one of those youths who, despite all the harassment and abuse, did not let themselves be influenced by the Nazi band,

translation.lb: an de trotz péng a quälen hir trei zur hémecht och bis zum leschten otemzuch net veriégent hvn.
translation.en: and who, despite pain and torment, did not deny their loyalty to the homeland even to the last breath.

translation.lb: Als beide vun der geschieht, an als märlyrer trei zu hiieai g'law, hun si och net eng énzeg minuit zréckgeschrèckt virun dem, wat hinne bevirstong.
translation.en: As witnesses of history and martyrs loyal to their faith, they did not recoil even for a single minute from what lay ahead of them.

translation.lb: An am numm vun alle gudde Letzeburger soe mir dir, Jängi, an allen denge komeroden, de' matt dir gelidden hun a gestuerwe sin.
translation.en: And in the name of all good Luxembourgers we say to you, Jängi, and all your comrades who suffered and died with you.

translation.lb: hèrzlech merci fir all èr trei an èr hémechlsle'wt —
translation.en: Heartfelt thanks for all your loyalty and your love for the homeland —

translation.lb: matt èrem hèrzbludd hutt dir ons d'freihét erkaft,
translation.en: with your heart's blood you have bought us freedom,

translation.lb: fir de' dir eso" daper gestridden huit.
translation.en: for which you fought so valiantly.

translation.lb: An onsem gesellt liéwt dir weiderhi virun als hekle vun heroeschcr bewonnerong,
translation.en: In our society you live on as a beacon of heroic admiration,

translation.lb: de' ons malt engem beispill vun opriehteger an de'wer hémechlsle'wt viraus an den do'd gânge sin.
translation.en: that set an example of upright and noble love for the homeland forward and went into death.

translation.lb: Jängi. malt gëllene buslawe stés du agedroen am buch vum kämpf fir ons freihet,
translation.en: Jängi, in golden letters, you are inscribed in the book of the fight for our freedom,

translation.lb: an dein heldenhaft undenke liéwt l'ir ons an e'er woider.
translation.en: and your heroic memory lives on for us and forever.

translation.lb: We’ e gudde letzeburger verein empfange go’w.
translation.en: What a good Luxembourgish club was received.

translation.lb: De Schwéeherdall get, we' et schengt, emmer me' berühmt.
translation.en: The Schwéeherdall seems to be becoming more famous.

translation.lb: Viru kurzem hu mir onse fre'eren ortsbauernführer an der kirch vun dem harmonium erofgeékelt a scho leit eng aner sach vir, de' hiresgleiche sieht.
translation.en: Recently, we disgusted our former local farmers' leader in the church with the harmonium, and something else immediately came up that looks similar.

translation.lb: De leschte sonndeg, 19. mé, huet ons musekgesellsehaft en tour durch den dall gemach a si huet d'geléenhét benotzt fir all wirt e besuch zu mächen.
translation.en: Last Sunday, the 19th of May, our music society made a tour through the valley and took the opportunity to visit every innkeeper.

translation.lb: Op der Hueweler-halt ko'men ons musekjongen dann och bei de wirt, den hèr Hubert Even.
translation.en: At the Hueweler stop, our music lads also went to the innkeeper, Mr. Hubert Even.

translation.lb: Kaum dobannen gong de spektakel lass.
translation.en: Barely inside, the spectacle began.

translation.lb: D'jofferen aus dem haus, vun dénen de' Zöllner besser empfange go'wen, \W de' letzeburger jongen aus der musek, hun du gleich de Schartz Louis, dé we'nt senger patriotescher haltong eng zeit läng am Gronn so'tz, opgefuerdert, hirt lokal ze verlössen.
translation.en: The young women from the house, who had welcomed the customs officers better than the Luxembourgish boys from the music, immediately urged Schartz Louis, who had sat in the Grund for a while due to his patriotic stance, to leave their premises.

translation.lb: Wo'fir?!
translation.en: Why?!

translation.lb: De Louis, dén a geschlossener gesellschaft d'lokal betrueden hat, huet sech drop versteipt, als gudde Letzeburger an der gesellschaft ze bleiwen.
translation.en: Louis, who had entered the premises in a closed society, insisted on staying as a good Luxembourger in the company.

translation.lb: „Da wurden Weiber zu Hyänen."
translation.en: "Then women turned into hyenas."

translation.lb: We' e wëld de'er ass du d'Mme Mergen, gebuere Lisi Even, an der preisenzeit an der N.S.F. ageschricwen, an d'ganz firma op de Schartz lassgangen, an hun hién no alle regele vun der konscht, bluddürsteg gemach.
translation.en: As if wild, Mme Mergen, born Lisi Even, registered during the Prussian times with the N.S.F., and the whole company pounced on Schartz and made him bloodthirsty according to all the rules of art.

translation.lb: D'museksjongen hu geschlossen dem Schartz seng partei ergraff.
translation.en: The music boys collectively took Schartz's side.

translation.lb: An engem tumult sonnergleichen, wo' de patron, den édem an de' fre'er kandidatin fir an de conseil, d'joffer Ketty, sech era gemëscht hun, huet d'ganz musek de lokal verlôss, nodém âner gudd letzeburger jongen, önner fineren refraetären an ömgesiedelter och schwe'er Patriotesch beledigongen duergeworf kruten.
translation.en: In an unparalleled tumult, where the patron, the manager and the former candidate for the council, Miss Ketty, got involved, the whole music left the premises after other good Luxembourgish boys among fine referees and resettled ones also received heavy patriotic insults.

translation.lb: Wat denkt dir vun der sâch, hèr Arthur Waxweiler, chef vun der L.P.P.D.?
translation.en: What do you think of the matter, Mr. Arthur Waxweiler, head of the L.P.P.D.?

translation.lb: Dir wart jo nach e me'ndeg, den 20. 5. als gudde client am café Hubert Even.
translation.en: You were there on Monday, the 20th of May, as a good client at Café Hubert Even.

translation.lb: We' huet dir do ère getreie member Schartz verdédegt?
translation.en: How did you defend your loyal member Schartz there?

translation.lb: Mir sin der ménong, datt e wirt, dén seng gäscht eso' empfängt, o'ni bedauere kennt pensionne'ert gin.
translation.en: We believe that an innkeeper who treats his guests like that can be retired without regret.

translation.en: Sunday service of the doctors in Luxembourg

translation.en: The pharmacy Müller, 52, Grand Rue, has Sunday service and night service until the 8th of June.

translation.en: The pharmacies Bichel, Aldringer Street and Knaff, Bonneweg Street have Sunday service and until June 1st, night service.

translation.en: FILM MARIVAUX: To Have and Have Not.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch resistenz huet net nemmen a Frankreich mé och an iwerse' gewirkt.
translation.en: The French resistance operated not only in France but also overseas.

translation.lb: Dese film fe'ert ons matten an d'événementer, we' se nom fall vu Frankreich am juni 1940 op der franse'scher ënsel Martinique sech erégent hun.
translation.en: This film takes us right into the events that took place after the fall of France in June 1940 on the French island of Martinique.

translation.lb: Och hei hât d'franse'sch Gestapo hir beschäftegong, mé d'Resistenz huet hire mann gestallt, et ass hir eso'.gelongen matt hëllef vun engem amerikanesche fëscherboot- capitaine si schachmatt ze setzen.
translation.en: Even here, the French Gestapo was at work, but the Resistance held their ground, managing with the help of an American fishing boat captain to checkmate them.

translation.lb: We' si dat ugestallt huet weist ons de film, dén u spannong ké moment nole'sst.
translation.en: How they accomplished this is shown by the film, which does not let up in tension for a moment.

translation.en: Belgrade: Radio Belgrade refers to the request of the American government to allow American soldiers to appear as witnesses in the trial against Mihaiilovic as 'an interference in Yugoslavian affairs'.

translation.en: Nanking: The Chinese national troops have taken Liaoyuan, which is located on the railway line near Manchuria.

translation.lb: Copenliagen: Durch e projet de loi ass dem streik vu 60 000 net qualifize'ert arbechter enenn gesät gin.
translation.en: Copenhagen: A strike by 60,000 unqualified workers has been ended by a draft law.

translation.en: Budapest: The Hungarian police have uncovered a monarchist conspiracy in the city of Dwsadomy.

translation.lb: Bre'ssel: Den 1. mé 1946 hât Belgien 55.466 milizmänner vun de klassen 1940 bis 1944 ënnert de waffen.
translation.en: Brussels: On May 1, 1946, Belgium had 55,466 militiamen from the classes of 1940 to 1944 under arms.

translation.en: Prague: No Russian troop movements will take place until May 27.

translation.en: Moscow: Moscow is now in direct radio connection with Chukotka, which is located 4,500 miles away behind Moscow in Siberia.

translation.en: Madrid: Radio Madrid has included a broadcast in Russian in its program that 'is supposed to inform the world about the truth over Spain'.

translation.en: The hat plays again a big role in the spring fashion, and that is to be welcomed, because, as one says: "A nice hat, beautiful shoes, and elegant gloves make a lady's chic.

translation.en: Our youth indeed wanted to go radically and mercilessly against all hats, whether they were big or small.

translation.en: They are styled from approximately the same material as silk stockings.

translation.en: Now, if a lady puts such a hat on her shy, wavy head, no little breeze can disturb a hair, and at the same time, one can admire her curls and waves.

translation.lb: Totalerle's vun der sté: 525 200 frang.
translation.en: Total proceeds from the auction: 525,200 francs.

translation.lb: Indépendants (12 tir 98.4 km) 11 coureuren um départ.
translation.en: Independents (12 laps 98.4 km) 11 riders at the start.

translation.lb: Et félen M. Eies, H. Mander an M. Metzger.
translation.en: M. Eies, H. Mander, and M. Metzger are missing.

translation.lb: Beim e'schte passage leien de' élef coureuren beienaner.
translation.en: At the first pass, the eleven riders are together.

translation.lb: Dat schlecht wiéder ass agetratt an no der 7. ronn leien an der spëtzt Goldsehmit, Poiré a Wang;
translation.en: The bad weather has set in and after the 7th lap, Goldsehmit, Poiré and Wang are in the lead;

translation.lb: me' spe't komme Jacobs, Igel.
translation.en: later come Jacobs, Igel.

translation.lb: An der 10. ronn creve'ert de Poiré.
translation.en: In the 10th lap, Poiré gets a flat tire.

translation.lb: De Goldsehmit — Wang gin an de sprint, an hei beweist de Wang datt e schneller ass we' de Goldsehmit.
translation.en: Goldsehmit and Wang go into the sprint, and here Wang proves that he is faster than Goldsehmit.

translation.lb: Klassement: 1. M. Wang an 2.52.38 st.; 2. Goldsehmit, s. zeit; 3. Poiré an 2.53.02;
translation.en: Classification: 1. M. Wang in 2.52.38 hrs; 2. Goldsehmit, same time; 3. Poiré in 2.53.02;

translation.lb: 4. Jacobs an 3.01.14; 5. Igel an 3.03.22.
translation.en: 4. Jacobs in 3.01.14; 5. Igel in 3.03.22.

translation.lb: Ze bemirke bleiwt, datt ons Indépendant'en an der 6. ronn ons junioren ageholl hun.
translation.en: It should be noted that our Independents overtook our juniors in the 6th lap.

translation.lb: Cadets 20 mann um départ ‘5 tir 41 km):
translation.en: Cadets, 20 men at the start '5 shots 41 km):

translation.lb: 'Arrivée: X. J. Goedert an 1.16.09 st.;
translation.en: 'Arrival: X. J. Goedert in 1.16.09 hr.;

translation.lb: 2. Laroche;
translation.en: 2. Laroche;

translation.lb: 3. Maret;
translation.en: 3. Maret;

translation.en: 4. Wagner;

translation.en: 5. Maas;

translation.lb: 6. Kratz an 1.1621;
translation.en: 6. Kratz in 1.16.21;

translation.lb: 7. Krier;
translation.en: 7. Krier;

translation.en: 8. Moes;

translation.lb: 9. Millier;
translation.en: 9. Millier;

translation.lb: 10. Kerschen;
translation.en: 10. Kerschen;

translation.lb: 11. Heisbourg;
translation.en: 11. Heisbourg;

translation.en: 12. Hansen.

translation.lb: Ei sin der nach vill, de net wëssen — datt den hellege Willibrord Haut nach an démselwechte stésarg (net de sarcophage) leit we' am joer 739.
translation.en: There are still many who do not know — that Saint Willibrord lies today in the same stone coffin (not the sarcophagus) as in the year 739.

translation.lb: — datt de grof Siegfried vu Letzeburg d'abtei vun Iéchternach nés o.p d'he'cbt bruecht huet.
translation.en: — that Count Siegfried of Luxembourg restored the Abbey of Echternach.

translation.lb: — datt de konschtatelier vun der Iéchternacher abtei eng zeit dé bèschte vun Europa wor.
translation.en: — that the art workshop of the Echternach Abbey was once the best in Europe.

translation.lb: — datt de Jang de Biannen der stad Iéchternach fënnef mol e besuch gemàch huet.
translation.en: — that Jang from Biannen visited the city of Echternach five times.

translation.lb: — datt d'Maximiliansklack keng 70, mé nuren 58 zenner schwe'er wor (si ass durch d'Rndstedt offensiv zerste'ert gin a get nés nei gegoss).
translation.en: — that the Maximilian's bell weighed not 70, but only 58 hundredweight (it was destroyed during the Rundstedt offensive and will be recast anew).

translation.lb: — datt bis zur franse'scher Revolution dem hellege Sebastian sei kapp zu Iéchternach opbewahrt go'f an immens vi 11 pilger vu weithir hién dohi vere'ere ko'men (duerfir d'St. Sebastiansprozessio'n).
translation.en: — that until the French Revolution the head of Saint Sebastian was kept in Echternach and countless pilgrims from afar came there to venerate it (hence the St. Sebastian procession).

translation.lb: — datt de kinnek Jak II vun England 1697 incognito no Iéchternach ko'm.
translation.en: — that King James II of England came incognito to Echternach in 1697.

translation.lb: — datt nuren eng ke'er e gebirtegen Iéchternacher abt vum Willibrordusklo'schter wor (de Math. Hartz).
translation.en: — that only once was a native of Echternach an abbot of the Willibrord monastery (Math. Hartz).

translation.lb: De revide’erten armistice matt Italien * No der zeidong „L'Italia" setzt sech dé neien armistice matt Italien aus enger préambel an aus 12 artikelen zesummen.
translation.en: The revised armistice with Italy * According to the newspaper 'L'Italia', the new armistice with Italy is composed of a preamble and 12 articles.

translation.lb: An der préambel gin d'tatsâchen duergeluegt, de' d'allie'ert gro'ssmächten derzo' gefo'- ert hun, den armistice matt Italien ofzeänneren;
translation.en: In the preamble, the facts are presented which have compelled the allied great powers to agree on the armistice with Italy;

translation.lb: d'astellong vun den hostilite'ten, den italienesche krichsbeitrag ge'nt d'Preisen, d'tatsäch, datt verschidde klauseien vum armistice, dén elo nach a kr&ft ass, iwerholl sin a schliesslech d'italienesch demande, den armistice ofzeämveren.
translation.en: the cessation of hostilities, the Italian military contribution against the Prussians, the fact that certain clauses of the armistice, which is still in force now, are maintained and finally the Italian demand to conclude the armistice.

translation.lb: Niéwt verschidden aner änneronge vu niewesächlecher fcedeitong geseit den Artikel 3 d'ofschafong vun • der allie'erter controllcommissio'n an Italie vir.
translation.en: Alongside various other changes of secondary importance, Article 3 provides for the abolition of the allied control commission in Italy.

translation.lb: Am Paragraph a) dervun get eng spezialsectio'n vum allie'erten haptquarte'er virgeschloen, de' d'italienesch arme'en an d'krichsproductio'n dirige'eren a controlle'ere soll.
translation.en: In Paragraph a), a special section of the allied headquarters is proposed to direct and control the Italian armies and war production.

translation.lb: De Paragraph b) le'sst d'italienesch flott weider ënnert allie'ertem commando stoen an de par.
translation.en: Paragraph b) allows the Italian fleet to remain under allied command and in par.

translation.lb: c) le'sst d'regironge vu Venetia Julia a vun der provënz Udine weider an hirem amt, Jus datt dé neien armistice ënnërzéehenl ass.
translation.en: c) allows the governments of Veneto Julia and the province of Udine to continue in their office until the new armistice is signed.

translation.lb: Wichteg ass och den artikel 6, no dém de' 4 gro'ssmächten sech verpflichten, all italienesch krichsgefängener, de' nach an hiren hänn sin, eso' schnell we' me'glech ze rapatrie'eren.
translation.en: Important is also article 6, according to which the 4 great powers commit to repatriate all Italian prisoners of war still in their hands as quickly as possible.

translation.lb: Den art. 7 oblige'ert Italien, keng actio'nen z'ënnerhuelen, de' den intressen vun den allie'erte schuede kënnten.
translation.en: Article 7 obligates Italy not to undertake any actions that could harm the interests of the allies.

translation.lb: Am art. 8 verpflicht Italien sech, krichsverbriécher vu fre'ere feindmächten hëllefen opzesiehen.
translation.en: In Article 8, Italy commits to help extradite war criminals from former enemy powers.

translation.lb: Datselwecht gëlt fir d'preisescht guddha-, ben, wat nach am land ass. (art. 9).
translation.en: The same applies to Prussian goods that are still in the country. (Article 9).

translation.lb: Den art. 11 prézise'ert, datt dé neien armistice net d'ausschle'ssong vun eventuelle revendicatio'nen vun allie'erte natio'nen bedeite ge'f.
translation.en: Article 11 specifies that the new armistice does not exclude potential claims by allied nations.

translation.lb: Den italieneschen ausseminister huet gëschter d'ponkte vun dém neien armistice matt Italien confirme'ert.
translation.en: The Italian foreign minister confirmed yesterday the points of the new armistice with Italy.

translation.lb: Motorcyclissem Am Pfingstmontag im Scheuerberg bei Remich Internationaler Rekordtag für Automobile und Motorräder Pfingstmontag um 14.30 Uhr findet im Scheuerberg bei Remich ein internationaler Rekordtag für Autos und Motorräder statt.
translation.en: Motorcycling On Whit Monday in Scheuerberg near Remich An International Record Day for Automobiles and Motorcycles. On Whit Monday at 2:30 PM, an international record day for automobiles and motorcycles will take place in Scheuerberg near Remich.

translation.lb: Die Veranstaltung steht unter dem Protektorat der sportlich recht gut eingestellten Gemeindeverwaltung der Stadt Remich, welche beiden Organisationen äusserst hilfreich zur Seite steht und in derem neurestaurierten Hôtel de Ville um 20.30 Uhr die offizielle Preiseverteilung stattfinden wird.
translation.en: The event is under the patronage of the sports-oriented municipal administration of the city of Remich, which provides excellent support to both organizations and the official prize distribution will take place at 8:30 PM in their newly restored Town Hall.

translation.lb: Die komplette Rennstrecke, zu Weiden Seiten abgesperrt, kann von den Tribünenbesuchern'vom Startplatz bis zur Arrivée übersehen werden.
translation.en: The entire race track, cordoned off on both sides, can be viewed by the grandstand spectators from the starting point to the finish line.

translation.lb: Die neuangelegte Musterkurve lässt alle Geschwindigkeiten ohne Abstoppen zu.
translation.en: The newly designed model curve allows all speeds without stopping.

translation.lb: Zum Auslauten stehen den Fahrer über 600 Meter zur Verfügung.
translation.en: Drivers have over 600 meters available to decelerate.

translation.lb: Die Strecke wird gesperrt: 1. am 9. Juni von 15 bis 18 Uhr für Training; 2. am 10. Juni, ab 13 Uhr.
translation.en: The track will be closed: 1. on June 9 from 3 PM to 6 PM for training; 2. on June 10 from 1 PM onwards.

translation.lb: Eintrittskarten (auch im Vorverkauf): Tribüne 50 Fr., Stehplätze 20 Fr.
translation.en: Tickets (also in presale): Grandstand 50 Fr., Standing places 20 Fr.

translation.lb: Das Programm, welches 50 Seiten umfasst und allerlei Interessantes für Motorsportler enthält, ist als Auto-Nachschlagebuch gedacht und enthält nur Anzeigen betreffend die Automobil- und Motorradbranchen.
translation.en: The program, which consists of 50 pages and contains a variety of interesting details for motorsport enthusiasts, is intended as an automotive reference book and only contains advertisements related to the automobile and motorcycle industries.

translation.lb: Die Konkurrenten sind gebeten, Anmeldungstermine genau einzuhalten, da in dieser Hinsicht diesmal keine unverdiente Nachsicht walten gelassen wird.
translation.en: The competitors are asked to adhere strictly to the registration deadlines, as no undue leniency will be granted this time.

translation.lb: Die Rennstrecke wird ab 13.30 Uhr vollständig abgesperrt.
translation.en: The race track will be completely closed off from 1:30 PM.

translation.lb: Bis zu diesem Zeitpunkt können Fahrzeuge auf einem auf dem Scheuerberg gelegenen Feldplatz abgestellt werden.
translation.en: Until this time, vehicles can be parked in a field area located in Scheuerberg.

translation.lb: Gebühr 10 Fr.
translation.en: Fee 10 Fr.

translation.lb: Später eintreffende' Fahrzeuge dürfen abgestellt werden: 1. am Moselquai; 2. Strasse Mondorf- Wintringerwald (scharf rechts in Schiefstellung); 3. Strasse Hôtel Belle-Vue- Kleinmacher (scharf rechts in Schiefstellung).
translation.en: Later arriving vehicles may be parked at: 1. Mosel Quay; 2. Mondorf-Wintringerwald road (sharp right at a slant); 3. Hôtel Belle-Vue-Kleinmacher road (sharp right at a slant).

translation.lb: Die hachmittags in Luxemburg abfahrenden Züge werden verstärkt.
translation.en: The trains departing for Luxembourg in the afternoon will be reinforced.

translation.lb: Abends, 21.30 Uhr fährt ein Extrazug von Remich nach Luxemburg.
translation.en: In the evening, at 9:30 PM, a special train will run from Remich to Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Absolutes Verbot Hunde auf die Rennstrecke mitzubringen.
translation.en: An absolute prohibition on bringing dogs to the race track.

translation.lb: Sehr interessante Prämien von Caves St. Martin. Wintringen, Bech-Kleinmacher und Krier Frères.
translation.en: Very interesting prizes from Caves St. Martin. Wintringen, Bech-Kleinmacher, and Krier Frères.

translation.lb: Bre’f vun Esch am Lach Geschwënn ass de ginster verbie t Heiantdo tuest dann nach e putsch dèr goldeger ble'eh aus dem donkele gréng vun do biérger, als löschte gro'ss vuu engem gadbe frënd, dén, obschon hién ëmmer matt de gleiche farwe môlt, ail joer openneis onerrécht sehe' bil'.ertcppecfcer virun onsen aen ausbrét.
translation.en: Letter from Esch in the ditch Soon the broom is banned Here you then make a shake of the golden foliage from the dark green of the mountains, as the last greeting from a good friend, who, although he always paints with the same colors, unfolds a new and unseen picture before our eyes every year.

translation.lb: Als ersatz fix de' geschwonne pracht get et dann ower ofwiésselongen a mass.
translation.en: As a replacement for the vanished splendor, there are, however, diversions in abundance.

translation.lb: Bëscher, wîsen àn liecke stin a vollem sâft an de' sche'nste promenaden ze'en ons touristen un.
translation.en: Forests, meadows, and streams stand in full lushness to present the most beautiful promenades to our tourists.

translation.lb: An den hecke gesi si d'lo'schleisser bei hirer schwe'erer, an dëser zeit ower net onrentabler arbecht.
translation.en: In the hedges, they see the snail gatherers at their hard, but in this time not unprofitable, work.

translation.lb: An den harzdoftenden dennebëscher lauschteren si ganz stëll déne gefiéderte säager no, an he'ch uewen op brédem plateau hu si de' wonnerbarste vue'en.
translation.en: In the resin-scented pine forests, they quietly listen to the feathered sawyers, and up high on the broad plateau, they have the most wonderful views.

translation.lb: Echen, de' eleng stin, erënneren si och hei drun, we' ons virfahren am mëttelaller an eiserner Zwangsherrschaft hu fre'ne missen.
translation.en: Oaks, standing alone, remind them here of how our ancestors in the Middle Ages had to find joy under iron tyranny.

translation.lb: De' échen „frénbém" genannt woren d'grenz tëschend dén énzelne fre'- ner hire parzeillen.
translation.en: The oaks called "boundary trees" were the borders between the individual peasants' parcels.

translation.lb: Touriste mellen sech zimlech vill un an Ons hôtellen werden se an den haptzeite kaum fâsse kënnen.
translation.en: A considerable number of tourists are registering, and our hotels will hardly be able to accommodate them during peak times.

translation.lb: Dat ass besonnesch de fall fir da' gäscht, de' hir vakanz hei a ro' verbringe wellen.
translation.en: This is especially the case for guests who want to spend their holiday here in rest.

translation.lb: Fir de' frënn vun Esch- Sauer ower, de' régelme'sseg hir excursio'nen heihi gemäch hun, sin d'communicatio'nen nach vëlleg schlecht.
translation.en: However, for the friends of Esch-Sauer, who regularly make excursions here, communications are still quite poor.

translation.lb: Onsen her transporlminister, den zu gleicher zeit d'dépaTtement vum tourissem matt verwalt, soll eso' gudd sin, derfir ze suergen, datt de' streck Giéwelsmille —Esch-Sauer och nés régelme'sseg befuer get, well si de' énzeg richteg direct verbindong matt der bunn ass.
translation.en: Our transport minister, who simultaneously manages the tourism department, should be so good as to ensure that the route Giéwelsmille — Esch-Sauer is regularly served again, as it is the only real direct connection with the railway.

translation.lb: Wann én dem tourissem ënncil d'ärm greife wellt, dann ass de' e'sclw conditio'n dach gewëss: schnell a bequem verbindongen.
translation.en: If one wants to support tourism, then there is indeed one condition: fast and convenient connections.

translation.lb: An onser reconstructio'n wor et elo op émoi ro'eg, nëmmen zevill ro'eg gin.
translation.en: In our reconstruction, it was suddenly calm, but only too calm.

translation.lb: Duerfir könnt én de' begrënd kloen, vun denen de' getraff si gin, ower besser he'eren.
translation.en: Therefore, complaints from those affected can be heard more clearly.

translation.lb: No all dénen discussio'nen an der Chamber iwer de reconstructio'nsprohlém könnt én da gesin we' d'gemidder sech nés me' bero'egt hun.
translation.en: After all those discussions in the Chamber about the reconstruction problem, one could then see how the temperaments have calmed down again.

translation.lb: We' d'arbecht du beim ausgebranntene café Nicks ugo'ng ko'm d'hoffnong nés me' op.
translation.en: When work started at the burned café Nicks, hope arose again.

translation.lb: Hoffe mer datt et elo viru gét an datt besonnesch och de' sinistre'ert gehollef kre'cn, dénen et nach op d'bett, jo eso'guer bis an d'stuff rént, well ni reu dâch nach ëmmer net an der rei ass.
translation.en: Let's hope it progresses now and that especially the affected ones receive help, who are still suffering in their beds, even into the rooms, as their roof is still not repaired.

translation.lb: De' leidd musse wirklich noKticken ewe' d'plafongen an d'fo'ssbiédem an hirer wunneng ganz zu grond gin.
translation.en: The people truly have to watch as the ceilings and floorboards in their homes completely deteriorate.

translation.lb: Wo’sst dir dat schon?
translation.en: Do you know this already?

translation.lb: An onser zeidung hu mir elo zënter engem joer emincr re'gelme'sseg ail 3 ment eng déta'ille'ert opstel'long iwer de' giéiemânnercher a collaborateure bruecht, de' op onsem Spezialgericht d'letzeburger nationalite't entzu kritt hun.
translation.en: In our newspaper, we have been publishing a detailed report about the traitors and collaborators every three months for a year now, who have had Luxembourg nationality revoked by our special court.

translation.lb: Mé datt vun deser band elo schon erem eng ganz partie d'letzeburger nationalite't erem zo'gesprach kritt hun, wessen de' méscht leidd wahrscheinlech nach net.
translation.en: But most people probably do not know that a good number from this group have already been granted Luxembourg nationality again.

translation.lb: Leider ass dat ower de fall well ons schon eng gewëssen zuel dèr Sali bekannt sin, an ons polizei dese moment se'er vill arbecht matt den enquêten iwer d'dossiée vun dénen,,net me tetzeburger" huet, de' elo eng demande agerécht hun, fir d'letzeburger nationalite't, de' si,jo all am krich verléchent hun a folgt ech och matt recht entzu kritt hun, eilo erem ze kre'en.
translation.en: Unfortunately, that is indeed the case, as a certain number of those cases are already known to us, and our police are currently very busy with the investigations into those 'non-Luxembourgers' who have now applied to regain Luxembourg nationality, which they lost during the war and rightly had taken from them.

translation.lb: Ail Letzcburger rëseit de kapp doriwer a fret sech matt recht: Ass dat nach dran?
translation.en: Every Luxembourger shakes their head in disbelief and rightly wonders: Is that even possible?

translation.lb: Mir menge jidde fal'ls, datt z. b. e verre'der, dén zo' 5 joer prisong, 100 000 frang geldbo ss an zum verloscht vun der letzeburger nationalite't condamne'ert go'f, schon en zimlech schlëmme brudder war, an datt ons polizei eîo bestëmmt vill aner me wichleg arbechten ze mächen hält, ewe elo dég läng eso' eng enquête ze mächen iwer de' ageschéckten demande vun dem verre'der, dén d'letzeburger nationalité l elo gèren erem hält.
translation.en: We believe that, for instance, a traitor sentenced to 5 years in prison, a fine of 100,000 francs, and loss of Luxembourg nationality, was already a rather bad guy, and that our police surely have many more important tasks than conducting a lengthy investigation into this traitor's application to regain Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: Fre'er könnt zwar z. b. én. dén zo enger geldbo'ss condamne ert war, a net bezuele wollt, seng strof am kittchen ofsëtzen, wärend ower ni én seng prisongs strof durch bezuelen ersetze könnt.
translation.en: Previously, someone sentenced to a fine who did not want to pay could serve their sentence in jail instead, but no one could ever replace their prison sentence by paying a fine.

translation.lb: Bei onse giéiemânnercher ass dat ower och alt erem aneschter.
translation.en: With our traitors, however, it's different yet again.

translation.lb: En dén z. b nach eng zeit ze..brömmen" huet, mecht, wann et him gefällt, eng demande, de' alt erem a ville fäll ugcholl get, berappt dann eng gewëssen zonim geld, a get am „grendclien" entlôss.
translation.en: Someone who still has time to 'serve' can, if they wish, submit an application that in many cases gets accepted, pays a certain sum of money, and is released 'prematurely'.

translation.lb: Also ass dat och nach dran!
translation.en: So it's still possible!

translation.lb: Mir mengen, matt deser prozedur si beslëmint de' méscht Letzeburger net d'accord.
translation.en: We believe most Luxembourgers do not agree with this procedure.

translation.lb: Eng prpposiiio'n ge'we mir jiddefal'ls déne compétente plaze mâehcn an dat ass des:
translation.en: We will make a proposal to the relevant authorities, and it is as follows:

translation.lb: A sämtlechcn dageszeidongen gin d'nimm vun délie collaborateure bruecht, de' d'letzeburger nationalite't entzu kritt huit, an dofir hätte mir och gèren.
translation.en: In all daily newspapers, the names of those collaborators who lost Luxembourg nationality are published, and for this reason, we would also like the names of the traitors who regained it to be published as well.

translation.lb: wann d'nimm vun dene verre'der och an onser press bruecht ge'wcn, de' d'letzeburger nationalite't elo erem kriit hun, fir datt mir dach beschéd wëssen, datt dat erem richteg Letzeburger sin, a mir ons dann och vis-à-vis vun déne „gudde Patrioten? erem ganz aneschter behuele müssen?
translation.en: If the names of those traitors who have now regained Luxembourg nationality are also brought into our press, so that we are informed whether they are rightfully Luxembourgers again, and that we should also behave differently towards those 'good patriots'?

translation.lb: Wann dat net geschitt, dann intresse'ert et ons och net me' wién d'nationalite't entzu kritt huel, well mir da ni e richtegt bild vun dèr zort hun, wann erem nb a no desen an dén d'nationalite't erem kritt.
translation.en: If that doesn't happen, we're not interested in who has had their nationality revoked anymore, because we'll never have a true picture of who later gets it back anyway.

translation.lb: Dat allerschlëmmst bei deser geschieht iss jiddefalls, we' ons bekannt ass, datt c Preiss, den als Letzeburger naturalisc'- ert war, we'nst senger nazistescher hallong wärend dem krieh d'letzeburger outionali'te't virun eugem Joer ofgespracli kritt liât, an elo fir d'zwét d'letzeburger nationalité'! crem zo'gesprach kritt huet.
translation.en: The worst part of this event is that we know a Prussian, who was naturalized as a Luxembourger, had his Luxembourg nationality revoked a year ago due to his Nazi activities during the war and has now been granted it again for the second time.

translation.lb: Mir mengen, datt dach ké mëiisch ower eso' en typ nach jé eng ke'er als Letzeburger betruechte kann.
translation.en: We think that no person could ever again consider such a type as a Luxembourger.

translation.lb: E réusse’ert volleksfest Lëntgen.
translation.en: A successful folk festival Lëntgen.

translation.lb: — Den 30. mê hât d'ligue „Ons Jongen'' e wisefest organise'ert, dat bei détn hèrleche wiéder vidi jong leidd ugezun hât.
translation.en: — On May 30th, the league 'Our Boys' organized a festival, which attracted many young people in that beautiful weather.

translation.lb: Bis spe't an d'nuecht eran go'f gesongen a gedanzt.
translation.en: Singing and dancing continued late into the night.

translation.lb: ViM friém passanten hu matt autoen a veloen en arrêt gemâch, fir sech un dem sche'ne volleksfest ze bedélegen.
translation.en: Many passing travelers stopped with cars and bicycles to participate in the beautiful folk festival.

translation.lb: Pompjésfest Heischend.
translation.en: Fire Brigade Festival in Heischend.

translation.lb: — Fir d'e'scht nés eng kc'er no länge jocre vu schmod a léd go'f hei hei ons d'cantonalpompjésfest gefeiert.
translation.en: — For the first time in many years, after hardship and suffering, our cantonal fire brigade festival was celebrated here.

translation.lb: De' art vu feieren, de' secli all joer widerhuel hun — ofwiésselnd a verschidden uertschaften — wor fre'er a'll ke'er en ©régnes a konnten aus onsem landliêwe net ewechgeduecht gin.
translation.en: The way of celebrating, which they repeated each year — alternating in different localities — was once a regular occurrence and could not be imagined away from our rural life.

translation.lb: Muencheré vun der aler garde wor ducrfir bestëmmt duebet fro', op dem e'schten friddcnsrendez-vons derbei kennen ze sin an alléguer hun si ower och stolz hir verdéngten décora lio'nen als hetzeburger pompjée gedroen.
translation.en: Some from the old guard were determined to be part of the first peace meeting and all of them proudly wore their well-deserved decorations as Luxembourgish firefighters.

translation.lb: D'réceplio'n vun déne ville gesellschaftè wor, we' et hei <ie gebrauch ass, offen an hèrzlech.
translation.en: The reception of the many societies was, as is customary here, open and heartfelt.

translation.lb: En imposante cortège go'f em drei auer vun der m usekge Seilschaft von Esch- Sauer durch d'duerf gefo'ert an op der gro'sser plaz, wo' vit! virwëtzeger sech afond hâlen, buet de président vum Wëltzer canton, den hèr Klein P., eng kieng usprôch gehalen, an dèr hie gleich ufanks ervirgehuewen huet, we' f r b' de gesamte pompjéscorps war, al traditio'ne nés opzehuelen a no batterer zeit sech frr d'e'scht nés hei ze treffen.
translation.en: A grand procession was led at three o'clock by the musical group from Esch-Sauer through the village and on the large square, where many curious people had gathered, the president of the Wëltzer canton, Mr. Klein P., made a small speech, in which he immediately highlighted how important it was for the entire fire brigade corps to revive old traditions and, after difficult times, to meet here again for the first time.

translation.lb: De riédner huet dann op de' mess'lech situatio'n vu muencher corps higewisen, dénch alles i'élt, d'gêschir an d'uniform.
translation.en: The speaker then pointed out the dire situation of some corps, which lack everything, equipment and uniforms.

translation.lb: Hei ze hël- Jefen, eso' sot de président, war sënn an zill vun der assemblée vun haut.
translation.en: Helping here, as the president said, was the purpose and goal of today's assembly.

translation.lb: Den hèr Klein huet dann ofschle'ssend all déne merci gesot de' gehPllef hun, d'fest ze verschö neren a ganz besonnesch den Heischenter médercher an der znusek vun Esch-Sauer.
translation.en: Mr. Klein then finally thanked all those who helped to beautify the festival and especially the young women from Heischend and the music from Esch-Sauer.

translation.lb: Uschle'ssend go'wen e we'ncg übonge gemäch enner matthëllef vun den Ettelbréckcr pompjéen.
translation.en: Subsequently, some exercises were performed with the assistance of the Ettelbruck firefighters.

translation.lb: An der assemblée go'wen dann organisatio'nsfroe besprach an enner anerem fir de nexte rendez-vous (1947) Eschduerf bezéchent
translation.en: In the assembly, organizational questions were then discussed, and among other things, Eschduerf was designated for the next meeting (1947).

translation.lb: No der feier hun sech dann ons fo' ss. balléquipe matt der Esch-Sauerer équipe getraff.
translation.en: After the celebration, our football team met with the Esch-Sauer team.

translation.lb: Eis Escher frënn hun dobei verdengt gewonn.
translation.en: Our friends from Esch deservedly won.

translation.lb: Den hèr MOES ass ngt zefridde matt dem gesetzprojet, well e keng wirklech a courage'ert soziatreförm duersteMt.
translation.en: Mr. MOES is not satisfied with the legislative proposal because it does not truly represent a bold social reform.

translation.lb: Hien trëtt besonnesch a fir d'erofsetzong vun der alterscrenz a biéd d'Chamber, de entspnéchend verantworten!« op sech ze huelen.
translation.en: He specifically advocates for lowering the age limit and urges the Chamber to take appropriate responsibility upon itself.

translation.lb: D'Chamber sollt net bei halwer mesure stoe bl ci wen an d'arbechterschaft bis an d'onendlecht vertre'schten, well <1 arbechterschaft wir de versprachen eso nndd wc- den hond de kailen iérbsen.
translation.en: The Chamber should not settle for half measures and indefinitely pacify the workforce because the workforce would be promised like the dog is with cold peas.

translation.lb: W a net f>eschwënn ganz arfoecht getischt ge, a wir viraus ze gesin, datt d arbechterschaft me' hârt wierder ge f schwètzen.
translation.en: If things do not improve very soon, it is foreseeable that the workforce will start to speak harsher words.

translation.lb: Den hèr WAGENER fëntl, datt de gesetzprojet net vollkommen ass, datt hién awer dach e gewësse soziale fortschrëtt duerstöllt.
translation.en: Mr. WAGENER finds that the legislative proposal is not perfect, but that it nevertheless represents a certain social progress.

translation.lb: Wann d'handwierkerschaft Sicht bedenke ge'nt de projet huet, dann ass dat beileiwe keng sabotage, mé eng berechtegt suetg, well vill handwierker d,'zo'- konft net zevill roseg gesin an eng iwerme'sseg belâschtong fèrten.
translation.en: If the craftsmen have concerns about the project, then that is by no means sabotage, but a justified worry, because many craftsmen do not see the future as too rosy and fear an excessive burden.

translation.lb: Et ass duerfir och ze begre'ssen datt handwierker, de' sech selbstänneg man, hir abezuelt versécherongsbcitrâg kenne rembourse'ert kre'en.
translation.en: It is therefore also to be welcomed that craftsmen who become self-employed can have their paid insurance contributions reimbursed.

translation.lb: Ofschle'ssend trëlt den her Wagener a fir eng large duerchfe'erong an appSicatio'n bei de Sandwirtschaftlechen onfallversécherongen resg. -renten.
translation.en: Finally, Mr. Wagener advocates for a broad implementation and application in the agricultural accident insurance sector regarding pensions.

translation.lb: Den hèr Wirtgen: verschidde coëfficiente sin ze he’ch.
translation.en: Mr. Wirtgen: some coefficients are too high.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech bei der kapitalsteier cm eng kapilalabgab, em eng mesür also, de' an d'privatégentom eraschneid.
translation.en: It concerns the capital tax, a levy that encroaches on private wealth.

translation.lb: Eso' mesüren dierfen awer nemmen cxceptionefl an temporär sin, well si hu nemmen dann existenzberechtegong, wann duerch anormal verhältnesser (krichsschued, reconstructio'n aew. bedéngt sin.
translation.en: Such measures should only be exceptional and temporary, as they are only justifiable in the case of abnormal circumstances (war damage, reconstruction, etc.).

translation.lb: D évaluatio'n vun de werter fir d'kapitalsteier gesehitt elo eso', <Iatt den „Einheitswert", dén d'Prcise fixe'ert haten, matt engeTn bestëmmle coëfficient multiplize'ert gel.
translation.en: The evaluation of values for the capital tax is now done in such a way that the 'Einheitswert', which was set by the prices, is multiplied by certain defined coefficients.

translation.lb: Verschidde cocfficienlen sin awer dobei ze he'ch gegraff, well net nom ertragsmé nom verkafswèrt gerechent get, no engem wèrt also, dén oft iélelâng iwer de reale wèrt ewechgét (.Spekulatio n „Flucht in die Werte".)
translation.en: However, some coefficients are set too high because they are not calculated based on yield but on sales value, which often exceeds the real value for a long time (speculation 'flight into values').

translation.lb: Gesondhét vu mamm a kand We' den her gesondhétsminister schon de 17. abröl an der pressconferehz gesol huet, fir d'volleksgcsondhct vun der wuerzel un ze befreien, get e „Conseil national pour la protection de la mère et de l'enfant" crée'ert.
translation.en: Health of mother and child As the health minister already announced on April 17th in the press conference, to liberate public health from the roots up, a "National Council for the Protection of the Mother and Child" is being created.

translation.lb: llese conseil ass duerch en arrêté vum 11. märz geschaf.
translation.en: This council was established by an act on March 11th.

translation.en: Through a new act on May 20th, Minister Dr. Charles Marx appointed the following people as members of the council:

translation.lb: Mammendag Béteburg.
translation.en: Mother's Day Bettembourg.

translation.lb: De nexle sonndeg fend zu Béteburg d'mammendagfeier statt no folgendem programm:
translation.en: Next Sunday, the Mother's Day celebration will take place in Bettembourg according to the following program:

translation.lb: E samschdeg, de lö. jlini em 20.80 auer, concert vun der musekgesetllschaft.
translation.en: On Saturday, June, at 8:30 PM, concert by the music society.

translation.lb: E sonndeg de muergen em O.lö auer, hl. mess fir al! liéwend a verstuerwe mamme vun der uertschaft.
translation.en: On Sunday morning at 10:00 AM, holy mass for all living and deceased mothers of the locality.

translation.lb: Duerno versainmelen sech d'vereiner bei der kirch a gin am cortège op de kirfecht.
translation.en: Thereafter, the associations gather at the church and proceed in a procession to the cemetery.

translation.lb: Do get dann um graw vun der Jèscht verstuerwener mamm eng gerbe niddergeluegt.
translation.en: There, a wreath is laid on the grave of the most recently deceased mother.

translation.lb: D'musek an de gesank droen e grawlidd vir.
translation.en: The music and song present a burial hymn.

translation.lb: No deser feier get eng gerbe niddergeluegt op d'grasv vum her Hublé, dén de grënner vun deser mammendagfeicr war.
translation.en: After this ceremony, a wreath is laid on the grave of Mr. Hublé, who was the founder of this Mother's Day celebration.

translation.lb: E samschdeg an e sonndeg gin an der uertschaft ofzéchç verkaft „Hai deng mamm an e'eren".
translation.en: On Saturday and Sunday, pins are sold in the locality with the phrase "Honor your mother".

translation.lb: De rengerle's vun desern verkaf krilt de comité fir d'oprichte vun engem Monument aux Morts.
translation.en: The proceeds from this sale go to the committee for the establishment of a War Memorial.

translation.lb: Sonndes owes em 8 auer ass bei Braun-Deifeld eng versammlong vum Amis de la Fleur matt enger mammendagfeier an enger sche'ner tombola.
translation.en: On Sunday evening at 8 o'clock at Braun-Deifeld, there is a meeting of the Friends of the Flower with a Mother's Day celebration and a lovely tombola.

translation.lb: Den hèr Urbany: dé projet le’sst hanner diren op fir de’ déck.
translation.en: Mr. Urbany: the project leaves a backdoor open for the wealthy.

translation.lb: D'kapitalsteier ass eng belâschtong.
translation.en: The capital tax is a burden.

translation.lb: De belâschtong get zum gro'ssen dél gedroe vum schaffende vollek, während de' ganz déck hannerdire fannen.
translation.en: The burden is largely borne by the working people, while the wealthy find loopholes.

translation.lb: D'national solidarite't awer muss sech och bei der kapitalsteier an der praxis weisen.
translation.en: National solidarity must also manifest in the practice of capital taxation.

translation.lb: Et dierf vir allem net sin, datt de klenge mann, dé seho so'wc'so 1 de gre'ssten dél vuii den direkten an indirekte steiere blecht, och nach erem eng ke'er bei der kapitailsleir muss duerhalen.
translation.en: Above all, it cannot be that the little man, who already pays the largest share of direct and indirect taxes, has to bear more with the capital tax.

translation.lb: D'kapitalsteier muss vir allem de' deck égentëmer treffen, un denen hircin éger.lom wuel och schwéss kliéwt, awer net den égenen.
translation.en: The capital tax must mainly affect the wealthy owners, on whom the sweat of others sticks, but not their own.

translation.lb: Et wir duerfir ubruecht, d'kapitalsteier no gestaffeiltcm taux ducrchzefe'eren.
translation.en: It would therefore be appropriate to implement the capital tax with a graduated rate.

translation.lb: Op de' mane'er kennt de mettelstand gescho'nt gin an d'gro'sskapita'lislen missten duerhalen.
translation.en: In this way, the middle class can be spared and the large capitalists would have to bear more.

translation.lb: Den hèr Urbany propose'ert fir d'kapitalsteier e progressiven taux: 1 proz. bis 500 <ÄK) frang, 2 proz, vu 500 000 bis 1 miillio'n, 5 proz. vun 1 bis 5 millio'nen, 10 pro-zent vu 5 bis 25 millio'nen an '20 prozent fir verme gen iwer 25 000 000.
translation.en: Mr. Urbany proposes a progressive rate for the capital tax: 1 percent up to 500,000 francs, 2 percent from 500,000 to 1 million, 5 percent from 1 to 5 million, 10 percent from 5 to 25 million, and 20 percent for wealth over 25,000,000.

translation.lb: An dém fall, wo' d'Chambcr eng slaffelong vu m laux oflént, muss den abattement cropgesat gin an zwar op: 100 000 frang tir de chef de ménage, 30 000 fr. fir d'fra, 20 000 fir aJl kand.
translation.en: In the case where the Chamber approves a tax deduction, it must be set at: 100,000 francs for the head of the household, 30,000 for the wife, 20,000 for each child.

translation.lb: Verschidden évaluatio'nscoëfficientcn sin ze he'cli, well amplaz de reale wèrt spekulativ preisser bei der kalkulatio'n als basis gedéugt hun.
translation.en: Certain evaluation coefficients are too high, as speculative prices instead of real values are used as a basis in the calculation.

translation.lb: De projet geseit fir kleng- a mëttelverdinger en uniformen taux vir, an d'steier muss bor berappt gin.
translation.en: The project foresees a uniform rate for small and medium earners, and the tax must be paid in cash.

translation.lb: D'aktiegesellschaften awer kre'en eng extrawurscht: si erhe'gen hir aktien ein 1/20 an offre'eren den 20stel dem Staat.
translation.en: However, joint-stock companies receive a special treatment: they increase their shares by 1/20 and offer the twentieth to the state.

translation.lb: Dobei könnt awer de staat schlecht ewèch, well d'aktiekapital ass méschtens bei weitem net eso' he'ch we' de reale wèrt vun der entreprise.
translation.en: However, the state could fare poorly, as the share capital is mostly not nearly as high as the real value of the enterprise.

translation.lb: D'gcsellschafte kre'en also Privilegien, obscho grad si et sin, de' am méschten an am beschte bezuele kennten a missten.
translation.en: The companies thus receive privileges, even though they are the ones who could and should pay the most and best.

translation.lb: Wann awer é muss gescho'nt gin, dann ass el d'vollek, wat an; krich gelidden a ge'stridden, während d trusthtren duerch d'biink gudd geschälter gemäch hun.
translation.en: But if anyone must be spared, it is the people, who suffered and struggled during the war, while the trust funds were well managed through the banks.

translation.lb: Splitterfreit glas Zënter geraumer zeit verwennen d'Amerikaner eng speziell art vu splitterfreiem glas, besonnesch fir d'autosindustrie.
translation.en: Shatterproof glass For quite some time now, Americans have been using a special kind of shatterproof glass, especially for the automotive industry.

translation.lb: Dest glas héscht matt sengem wëssenschaftleche numm „plyvinyl".
translation.en: This glass is called by its scientific name "plyvinyl."

translation.lb: Seng haptégeschaft bestét an senger élasticite't.
translation.en: Its main property consists of its elasticity.

translation.lb: Et go'f an de laboratorie vun enger gro'sser planzong zu Toledo (Ohio) entwëckelt.
translation.en: It was developed in the laboratories of a large plant in Toledo, Ohio.

translation.lb: Elo huet den Dupont-Nemour- Konzern eng nei art vu splitterfreiem glas erfond.
translation.en: Now the Dupont-Nemour company has invented a new type of shatterproof glass.

translation.lb: de' all ähnlech produkter, de' bis elo bestanen hun, nach iwertrëfft.
translation.en: that surpasses all similar products that have existed until now.

translation.lb: Des nei matière kann eso'guer matt engem hummer bearbecht gin, o'ni a stécker ze fueren, et get héxtens vexbe't.
translation.en: This new material can even be worked with a hammer without breaking into pieces, it becomes only slightly scratched.

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch industrie beabsichtegt, matt dem neie produkt autoskarosserien hirzestellen.
translation.en: The American industry intends to manufacture car bodies with the new product.

translation.lb: Haus- a grondgiddersté D i d e 1 e n g.
translation.en: House and land auction in Dudelange.

translation.lb: — Dé lesehte mëttwoçh, de 5. juni halcn d'iérwe vun déne verstuerwene leidd Meyers-Lies aus Dideleng am café Forty eng ëffentlecl) haussté annonce'ert.
translation.en: — Last Wednesday, the 5th of June, the heirs of the deceased Meyers-Lies from Dudelange announced a public house sale at Café Forty.

translation.lb: A leschter minuit go'f d'sté ower ofgesôt welà den hèr zänndocter Aloys Michels d'haus aus freier band kâft liât.
translation.en: At the last minute, however, the sale was canceled because Mr. Dentist Aloys Michels had bought the house privately.

translation.lb: Et handelt sicli cm e vvunn- a geschäftshaus, geléen zo' Dideleng, an der scho Istrôss nr. 2 bis, a gro'ss 1,50 ar.
translation.en: It concerns a residential and commercial building, located in Dudelange, at the Rue de la Gare No. 2 bis, with a size of 1.50 ares.

translation.lb: D'haus enthält 11 zëmmer, 2 mansaren, keller a Speicher.
translation.en: The house contains 11 rooms, 2 attics, a cellar, and a storage space.

translation.lb: De kâfpreis ass onbekannt.
translation.en: The purchase price is unknown.

translation.lb: Eng grondgi l'iersté vu verschiddene requit enten, de' uschle'ssend un de' net ol'gehale sic stattfanne sollt, ass op dé nexte mëttwoch, den 12. juni an den hôtel llitd vertaegt gin,
translation.en: An auction of various items, which was supposed to occur following the now-canceled sale, has been postponed to next Wednesday, the 12th of June, at Hôtel llitd.

translation.lb: wo' déselwcchten dag d'iérwe Wagner-Koster e wunnhaus, geléen zo' Dideleng au der Eisehunnstrôss nr. 2 iwergoe lôssen.
translation.en: On the same day, the heirs Wagner-Koster are letting a residential house, located in Dudelange on the Rue du Chemin de Fer No. 2, to be transferred.

translation.lb: Kurz bemierkt: Hamburg: De fre'ere commandant vum konzcntratio'nslager Struthof, Marjonstein, ass vum militärgericht vu Wupperthal zum do't verurtélt gin.
translation.en: Briefly noted: Hamburg: The former commander of the concentration camp Struthof, Marjonstein, has been sentenced to death by the military court of Wupperthal.

translation.lb: Drei ancr ugeklote go'wen och zum do't ducrch de sträng verurtélt.
translation.en: Three other accused were also sentenced to death by the court.

translation.lb: Buenos Aires: Argentinien hëllt seng diplomatcsch bcze'onge matt Russland erem op.
translation.en: Buenos Aires: Argentina is resuming its diplomatic relations with Russia.

translation.lb: Biaritz: De „Journal de Biaritz" mellt, 2 membere vun der Eranco-regirong hätte secb op franse'schcm buedem matt engem vertriéder vun der regirong Giral getraff.
translation.en: Biarritz: The "Journal de Biarritz" reports that 2 members of the Franco-government have met on French soil with a representative of the Giral government.

translation.lb: Nimm si keng bekannt.
translation.en: No names are known.

translation.lb: Des nouvelle go'f awer vun der spuenescher exilregirong demcnte'ert.
translation.en: However, this news was denied by the Spanish exile government.

translation.lb: Bilbao: An deser stad warden ongefe'er 200 Preisen op hirç rapatriement no Deitschland.
translation.en: Bilbao: In this city, about 200 prisoners are waiting for their repatriation to Germany.

translation.lb: Den Haag: Den approvisionnement vun zokker an Holland get emmer me' schlecht.
translation.en: The Hague: The supply of sugar in Holland is getting progressively worse.

translation.lb: Oslo: We' et schéngt soll den Dr. Giral eng demande un d'norwegesch regirong richten, datt si sollt seng regirong unerkennen.
translation.en: Oslo: It seems that Dr. Giral should make a request to the Norwegian government for them to recognize his government.

translation.lb: München: Frankreich krut geschîr a maschinen an engem wèrt vun ongefe'er 60 millio'ne frang zur verfügong gestallt.
translation.en: Munich: France was provided with tools and machinery valued at approximately 60 million francs.

translation.lb: Dest material wor vun de Preisen zu Pareis an zu Clermont- Ferrand gestuel an a Bayern verschléft gin.
translation.en: This material was stolen by the prisoners in Paris and Clermont-Ferrand and transported to Bavaria.

translation.lb: Teheran: D'onmc'glcchkét mam Pishevari zu engem accord ze kommen, ze'en d'pcrsesch crise emmer me' an d'längt.
translation.en: Tehran: The impossibility of reaching an agreement with Pishevari extends the Persian crisis ever further.

translation.lb: Den Haag: Eng partie vun den hafenarbeehter hun hir arbecht erem opgeholl, engerseits, well der vill aus finanzielle grënn derzo' gezwonge go'wen an anerseits, well e.verlängerte streik dem ganzen hollännesche vollek sehuède ge'f.
translation.en: The Hague: Some of the dockworkers have resumed work, partly because many were forced for financial reasons and partly because a prolonged strike would harm the entire Dutch people.

translation.lb: Nankin: D'chinesejch regirongstruppen hu Kharbin besât an avance'eren a richtong norden.
translation.en: Nanking: The Chinese government troops have occupied Harbin and are advancing northward.

translation.lb: An der genannter stad baten d'kommunisten sech no der evacue'erong vun de russeschen truppe festgesat.
translation.en: In the aforementioned city, the communists entrenched themselves after the evacuation of Russian troops.

translation.lb: London: Radio Budapest mellt, d'politesch crise, de' durch den „ultimatum" vun der partei vun de klenge propriétairen ervirgeruff wor gin, wir an enger aussergewe'nlecher sëtzong gele'st gin.
translation.en: London: Radio Budapest reports that the political crisis, triggered by the "ultimatum" from the party of small landowners, was resolved in an extraordinary session.

translation.lb: D’Margaret O’Brien „Pin up girl”
translation.en: Margaret O'Brien "Pin up girl"

translation.lb: An enger dre'paus schenkt d'Margaret sengem gro'sse frënd a partenaire aus „Tenth Avenue Angel", dem George Murphy, en egenhänncg gcmolte portrait vu sech.
translation.en: In a break, Margaret gives her great friend and partner from "Tenth Avenue Angel", George Murphy, a self-painted portrait of herself.

translation.lb: Wc' de Murphy sech d'bild ukuckt, ass e platt.
translation.en: When Murphy looks at the picture, he's astonished.

translation.lb: Vun dem klengc Margaret keng spur.
translation.en: Not a trace of little Margaret.

translation.lb: En huet e richtegt Pin-up-girl viru sech.
translation.en: He has a real pin-up girl in front of him.

translation.lb: E ka sech net enthalen a sét zo' senger Partnerin: Ma mei klengen, dat do gleicht dir ower och net de' bo'n.
translation.en: He can't resist and says to his partner: But my dear, that doesn't look like you at all.

translation.lb: „Et ass jo och net, we' ech sin", äntwert de' kleng gro'ss vedette, „ma we' ech gi well!"
translation.en: "It's not how I am," answers the little big star, "but how I want to be!"

translation.lb: Gro’ss festlechkéten zu Charleville, Mézières a Sedan
translation.en: Big celebrations in Charleville, Mézières, and Sedan

translation.lb: Den 22. an 23. juni gin zu Mézières, (.haiScville a Sedan gro'ss fesllechkélen ofgchal, un déne lelzehurger a belsch delcgatio'nen délhuelen.
translation.en: On June 22nd and 23rd, big celebrations are taking place in Mézières, (Charleville and Sedan, with Luxembourgish and Belgian delegations participating.

translation.lb: Zu Mézières get d'denkriia! vum kinnek Albert agcweiht, dat vun de Preisen zersle'ert gi wor.
translation.en: In Mézières, the monument to King Albert, which was destroyed by the Prussians, is being inaugurated.

translation.lb: Am cader vun dese festivite'ten gel d'musek vun der Garde Républicaine e galaconeerl, d'Opéra vu Parcis an d'Monnaie vu Bre'ssel fe'ercu Ihealerstécker op.
translation.en: As part of these festivities, the music of the Garde Républicaine will give a gala concert, the Paris Opera and the Brussels Mint will put on their respective productions.

translation.lb: Keng preisconiroll me an Amerika * 2 dég nodém d'preiscontroll an Amerika opgehe'crt huet z'existe'eren, ass et nach schwe'er zc son, a watfir engem môsstab d'iiéwe me' deier get.
translation.en: No more price control in America * Two days after price control in America ceased to exist, it is still hard to say by what measure life will become more expensive.

translation.lb: D'enn vun der preiscontroll huet eso'wuel d'verkéfer we' och d'kéfer complett iwerrascht, allebe'd zécken se fir geschäfter ze mächen.
translation.en: The end of price control has completely surprised both sellers and buyers, they both hesitate to do business.

translation.lb: Et wire jo alt geschäftsleidd, de' gèren hir preisser erhe'ge ge'wen, wann si net fèrte ge'wen, d'preiscontroll kennt erem agefo'ert gin an da wiren si hire client'e lass.
translation.en: There would indeed be business people who would like to raise their prices if they were not afraid that price control might be reintroduced, and then they would lose their clients.

translation.lb: D'metzlereien hu nach cmmer ké flésch an d'confectio'nsgeschäfter hu net yill weider.
translation.en: The butcher shops still have no meat and the clothing stores don't have much more.

translation.lb: An tauchen elo reclammen pp we' „Ob prelscontroll oder net, mir änneren ons preisser net".
translation.en: And advertisements are now appearing like "Whether price control or not, we are not changing our prices."

translation.lb: Den 12. september... El miérkt en elo sciions oft, we' de Francis eppes matt iwerléong mèteht.
translation.en: On September 12th... He often noticed now that Francis was up to something.

translation.lb: De ■nuergen Ii net en e richtete Babelsturem op e Stull gebaut.
translation.en: The next morning, he had built a tower of Babel upon a chair.

translation.lb: Dat war net eso' einlach, et huet an allen ecke gewackelt, an ass me' we' eng ke'er crem an d'bréch gângen.
translation.en: That wasn't so simple, it wobbled at every corner and collapsed more than once.

translation.en: But "just stay calm"

translation.en: Francis thought, and caught every fall anew until he had a beautiful tower standing.

translation.en: At the bottom was a kitchen pan containing: a ball, a rubber duck, a spoon, paper, a stopper, and a peg for hanging laundry.

translation.en: For the second floor he had: a lid, a plush dog, a little horse, an oilcloth bag, and a box with all kinds of collected rusks and paper crumbs.

translation.lb: We' e fèrdeg wor, huet e sei wiérk nieglechst stolz bewounert, a we' de papa en ere'scht gelucwt huet, do war en ausser sech vu fred.
translation.en: When he was finished, he proudly admired his work, and when his father praised him, he was overjoyed.

translation.lb: Vus lauter dankbarkét krut en do ower oeb stéck fir steck beim ofbaueu vun dem krap|)ert bruecht.
translation.en: Out of sheer gratitude, he ended up dismantling the tower bit by bit.
