translation.lb: En ausflug vun de Kèrcher sportsfrënn
translation.en: An outing by the Kèrcher sports friends

translation.lb: Datl de Sporlleche gésclit beim Kèrcher jonklem nach begcschlerong ervirbréngt, go f an desem joer bei ville geléenhéte bewisen.
translation.en: The athletic spirit that the Kèrcher youth still encourages has been proven on many occasions this year.

translation.lb: Ons fo'ssball-équipe huet ail de' nom leschte championnat ausgedroe matcher gewonnen, an do drënner woren der, de' gc'nt stârk équipai!
translation.en: Our football team won all the matches played after the last championship, including against some very strong teams!

translation.lb: (Red Boys II a muiinech mannschaft vun der zweier divisfo'n) gespillt go'fen.
translation.en: (Red Boys II and another team from the second division) were played against.

translation.lb: En énzege match hun de' Kèrcher verluer, de coupc-liiiale-match ge'nl de' slârk Miérscher équipe.
translation.en: Kèrcher lost only one match, the cup final match against the strong Miérscher team.

translation.lb: N'atirlech, well eng coupe soll jo aus dem duerf crausgoen!
translation.en: Naturally, for a cup should go out of the village!

translation.lb: Dobei hun de' Kèrcher »wer wël- Ics, de' coupe aus depb-Schwecherdall, de' elo geschwënn ausgedroe gel, crop op de Wacdhaff ze breiigen.
translation.en: Meanwhile, Kèrcher wanted to bring the cup from the depb-Schwecherdall to Wacdhaff, which will be displayed soon.

translation.lb: De' Kèrcher hun de sporlleche géscht vun de Miérscher awer net vergiess.
translation.en: However, Kèrcher did not forget the sporting spirit of the Miérscher.

translation.lb: De lèschleisonndeg hun d'sporlsfrcnn a -frëndinnen vu Kèrch en ausflug gemâch, den se iwer de Napoleonsgari, Esch am Lach, Woltz, DoM, Nacher, Dikerech, Fiels op Miersch gefo'ert huet.
translation.en: Last Sunday, the sports friends of Kèrch went on an outing that took them over the Napoleonsgari, Esch am Lach, Woltz, DoM, Nacher, Dikerech, Fiels to Miersch.

translation.lb: Do go'f eng komerodschaft erneiert, de' e mo nt virdrun um sportsfeld um Wandhaff hiren ufank fond liât.
translation.en: There, a comradeship was renewed that had begun a month earlier at the Wandhaff sports field.

translation.lb: Bei spill, gesank an danz go'f sech nach émoi de' sehe' coupe ugokuckt an un de' sportlech dég zTéckgcduechl.
translation.en: With games, singing and dancing, the beautiful cup was admired once more and the sporting days reminisced.

translation.lb: Et wor sche'n, we' durch d'nuecht d'lidder gek'lonk hun an e sportleoht vo'.lek arem an arem zu den autoen zréckgângen ass, de' se lanscht d'Eisch erof erem hem gefo'ert hun.
translation.en: It was nice how the songs echoed through the night and the sporty crowd, arm in arm, returned to the cars, driving them back home along the Eisch.

translation.lb: Eng nei waff: d’atomfusée * De moment get vun der amerikanescher arme' eng atom-fusée durchstode'ert, de' vum radar a vum radio controlle'ert ka gin an de' matt enger vitesse vun 3200 kilometer an der stonn an d'lücht ste'sät a matten an enger formatio'n vu bommeren explode'ert.
translation.en: A new weapon: the atomic missile * At the moment, an atomic missile is being tested by the American army, which can be controlled by radar and radio, and is launched into the air at a speed of 3200 kilometers per hour to explode in the midst of a formation of bombers.

translation.lb: De chef vun desem service, de generol Evereit Hughes, huet bekannt gemâch, datt d'me'glechkéte vun deser neier verdédegongswaff onbegrenzt wiren.
translation.en: The head of this service, General Everett Hughes, announced that the possibilities of this new defensive weapon are limitless.

translation.lb: an hié geseit schon elo viraus, datt et me'glech get, eng atom-fusée zc construo'- eren, de' 32 000 kilometer zrécklée kann.
translation.en: And he already foresees that it will be possible to construct an atomic missile that can travel 32,000 kilometers.

translation.lb: Hién huet och drop opmierksam gemäch, datt des atom-fusée'en an enger he'cht explode'eren, wo' ké geschoss vun enger D. C. A. me' hirécht.
translation.en: He also pointed out that these atomic missiles explode at such a height where no shot from an anti-aircraft gun can reach.

translation.lb: D'commissio'n, de' des atom-fusée ausprobe'ert, sieht elo scho no enger geégneter ge'gend an Amerika an am Pazifik, wo' des nei waff ausprobe'ert kennt gin.
translation.en: The commission that is testing this atomic missile is already looking for a suitable area in America and the Pacific where this new weapon can be tested.

translation.lb: Definitive Programm vum ex-schachweltméschter Dr. Max EUWE sengem optriéden zu Esch-Uelzecht, Letzeburg
translation.en: Definitive program of former chess world champion Dr. Max EUWE's appearance in Esch-sur-Alzette, Luxembourg

translation.lb: 1. Simultanvirstellong zu Esch-Uelzecht e mëttwoch, de 17. juli 1946 nomëttes em 4.30 am Casino vun der Arbed-Terres- Rouges ënnert dem protectorat vun den autorite'te vun der stad Esch.
translation.en: 1. Simultaneous display in Esch-sur-Alzette on Wednesday, July 17, 1946, at 4:30 PM at the Casino of Arbed-Terres-Rouges under the protection of the authorities of the city of Esch.

translation.lb: 2. Simultanvirstellong zu Letzeburg en donneschdeg, den 18. juli 1946 owes em 6,30 an der Enncschtergâss ënnert dem protectorat vun den autorite'te vun der stad Letxeburg.
translation.en: 2. Simultaneous display in Luxembourg on Thursday, July 18, 1946, at 6:30 PM in Enncschtergâss under the protection of the authorities of the city of Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Den hèr Dr. Max EUWE kënnt am laf vum dënsehdeg, de 16. juli 1946 zu Letzeburg un.
translation.en: Mr. Dr. Max EUWE will arrive in Luxembourg during the course of Tuesday, July 16, 1946.

translation.lb: Sàmsehdes muerges muss en ons da schon erem verlôsse, fir an d'Schweiz weider ze fueren, wo' op engem congress vun der F. I. D. E. (weltschachbond) seng candidatur fir d'weltméschterschaft besprach get.
translation.en: By Saturday morning, he must already leave us again to continue to Switzerland, where his candidacy for the world championship will be discussed at a congress of the F.I.D.E. (World Chess Federation).

translation.lb: Seng seriöst ge'gner fir desen titel wèrten den Amerikaner Fine, d'Ruase Botwinnik a Keres a nach vleicht e puer aner sin.
translation.en: His serious opponents for this title will be the American Fine, the Russians Botvinnik and Keres, and perhaps a few others.

translation.lb: Mir denke vum hèr Dr. Euwe en interview iwer dese spannenden, internationale schachturne'er ze kre'en, dé mir onse liéser dann ënnerbréden.
translation.en: We hope to conduct an interview with Mr. Dr. Euwe about this exciting, international chess tournament, which we will then share with our readers.

translation.lb: We’ liewt de Pétain?
translation.en: How does Pétain live?

translation.lb: Op ufro vum Pétain senger verdédcgong, we' hién am fort vu Yeu liêwe ge'f, huet d'verwaltong vum fort der regirong folgende rapport ageschéckt:
translation.en: In response to the request from Pétain's defense about his living conditions in the fort of Yeu, the administration of the fort sent the following report to the government:

translation.lb: De prisonne'er ass net am rèz-dechaussée ënnerbruecht, we' emol behapt gi wor, mé um e'schte Stack, wo' en én Zemmer matt engem büro, e cabinet de toilette matt fle'ssendem wâsser an e WC zur verfiigong huet.
translation.en: The prisoner is not housed on the ground floor as was once claimed but is on the first floor, where he has a room with an office, a bathroom with running water, and a toilet at his disposal.

translation.lb: Alt des reimlechkéte sin an engem perfecten hygieneschen zo'stand.
translation.en: All these facilities are in a perfect hygienic condition.

translation.lb: Wann de Pétain mueres sëi bett wëllt" mächen, so' sin dat senger sâcnen, „en zaldot muss wessen sech eleng ze débrouille'eren'
translation.en: If Pétain wants to make his bed in the morning, that's his business, 'a soldier must know how to fend for himself,' he supposedly told his guards.

translation.lb: soll hién zu senge wiéchter gesôt hun.
translation.en: he allegedly said to his guards.

translation.lb: Sei bett ass en einfactit feldbett matt enger elastescher matrass dé* gîter net matt de better vun dénen aneren häfWengen ze verglei(4hen ass.
translation.en: His bed is a simple field bed with an elastic mattress that cannot be compared with the beds of other prisoners.

translation.lb: Hién huet weider e büro a genuch stiD fir seng déglech gäscht z'empfänken:
translation.en: He also has an office and enough space to receive his daily visitors:

translation.lb: d'marschallin kennt all dag eng stonn bei en, den doctor könnt och all dag fir no senger gesondhét ze • kucken.
translation.en: the marshall's wife can visit him for an hour every day, and the doctor also comes daily to check on his health.

translation.lb: De Pétain huet déselwechte kascht, we' seng wiéchter.
translation.en: Pétain receives the same meals as his guards.

translation.lb: Wann den docter uerder derzö' g e, f da kritt hién e spezialregime accorde'erf'
translation.en: If the doctor orders it, he will be given a special diet.

translation.lb: Et muss é bedenken, datt hié scho 9p joer Al ass a seit joren un enger krankhét leid.
translation.en: It must be considered that he is already 95 years old and has been suffering from an illness for years.

translation.lb: Hié verbréngt seng freizeit domadder, datt en englesch le'ert an zej. donge liést.
translation.en: He spends his free time learning English and reading various things.

translation.lb: Et go'f villi kfitize'ert, schle'sst de capport, de Pétain wir ze vHl schärf b e. wâcht.
translation.en: There was much criticism, concludes the report, that Pétain was kept too heavily guarded.

translation.lb: Des iwerwâchong ass awer se"cr no'fwendeg,
translation.en: This surveillance is however very necessary,

translation.lb: well de prisonne'er e mann vu rang a quailite't ass,
translation.en: because the prisoner is a man of rank and quality,

translation.lb: dém seng flucht zu schwe'eren onro'en ulass kënnt gin wo'fir dann seng wiéchter verantwortlech gcmâch ge'we gin.
translation.en: whose escape could lead to serious unrest for which his guards would be held responsible.

translation.lb: Iwregens crdre't de Pétain seng gefângenschaft matt philosophie
translation.en: Besides, Pétain endures his imprisonment with philosophy.

translation.en: From the Union Union section Peteng. — The candidate declarations for the new section committee are still being accepted until Tuesday.

translation.lb: E gro’sse schlâg Ons lichtathletik hält zu engem gewaltege schlâg aus.
translation.en: A great event Our athletics is in for a tremendous event.

translation.lb: Gleich zwo' auslännesch nationaléquipen zu Letzeburg ge'nt ons fârwcn untriéden ze lôssen, dèrf schon als kolossal léschtong ugesprach gin.
translation.en: Having two foreign national teams come to Luxembourg to compete against our colors can already be deemed a colossal achievement.

translation.lb: Bis haut wor nach ni eppes ähnleches hei zu Letzeburg lass.
translation.en: Until today, there was never anything like this happening in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Gewe'nlech treffe nuren zwo' équipcn zcsummen.
translation.en: Usually, only two teams meet.

translation.lb: De spezielle reiz vun der sportsveranstaltong vun e sonndeg reside'ert dann och an dem pikanten entstand, datt fir d'e'schte ke'er an onser sportgeschicht drei ge'gner zugleich a competitio'n stin.
translation.en: The particular appeal of Sunday's sports event also lies in the exciting fact that for the first time in our sports history, three opponents are simultaneously in competition.

translation.lb: Op descm énzcgartege meeting hu mir dann crnol geléenhét festzestellen, we' ons athlete sech e weltbekanntem an internationalem cader aushuelen.
translation.en: In this unique meeting, we will have the opportunity to see how our athletes fare in a world-renowned international setting.

translation.lb: Mir dèrfen ons net zevill illusio'ne mächen, well a verschiddenen épreuve brauche mir ons emol guer net midd ze mâche fir op d'siegespalm ze laueren.
translation.en: We should not have too many illusions, as in certain events we should not even bother trying for the victory podium.

translation.lb: Mé doniéwt get et ower och ponkten, wo' ons farwe bestëmmt prima vertrau sin, a wo' ons assen den auslänner ganz gehe'ereg anhetzen.
translation.en: But there are certainly also fields where our colors are rightfully trusted, and where our aces can fiercely challenge the foreigners.

translation.lb: Da get bestëmmt nach jux.
translation.en: That will certainly be exciting.

translation.lb: Dese meeting soll dann och als échelle fit ons selectio'n vun der Europa-méschterschaft zu Oslo déngen.
translation.en: This meeting will also serve as a scale for our selection for the European Championship in Oslo.

translation.lb: Bestëmmt befanne sech ênnert den auslänner elementer, de' och fir Oslo selectionne'ert gin, an de' ons vedetten do erem ze gesi kre'en.
translation.en: There are certainly among the foreigners those who are also selected for Oslo, and who will see our stars there again.

translation.lb: Si kënne sech)o dann am viraus e bild vun hirer form mächen a sech ausmolen, matt wellechen aussichten op erfolleg si zu Oslo starten derfen.
translation.en: They can thus make an advance assessment of their form and envision with which prospects they are allowed to start in Oslo.

translation.lb: Et ass keng verlueren zeit Wann dese meeting zu Bre'ssel oder zu Pareis stattfanne ge'f, so kennt licht matt 15—20 000 Zuschauer gcrèchent gin.
translation.en: It is not wasted time if this meeting takes place in Brussels or Paris, then it can easily be expected to have 15—20,000 spectators.

translation.lb: Zu Metz oder zu Strôssburg ge'wen der nach emmer tëschent 5—6000 kucke goen.
translation.en: In Metz or Strasbourg, there would still be between 5,000 to 6,000 who come to watch.

translation.lb: Hei am land dérf net matt desen zuele gerèchent gin, well d'iîchtathletik huet d'vollek nach net matt sech fortgerass.
translation.en: Here in the country, such numbers cannot be expected, as athletics has not yet swept the populace away.

translation.lb: Dat kennt dohir, well de' méscht nach ni eppes âhnlechcs gesin hun, a well si net wëssen, datt des sportart 100-prozenteg konscht a léschtongsfâhegkét presente'ert.
translation.en: This is because most have never seen anything similar, and because they do not know that this sport presents 100 percent art and performance capability.

translation.lb: Duerfir eleng ge'î et sech scho lo'nen, op 'de Stadion zc kommen.
translation.en: For that reason alone, it would already be worthwhile to come to the stadium.

translation.lb: Mir wëlle Sportler sin a mir denke leider dobei nuren u fo'ssball oder velo.
translation.en: We wish to be athletes and unfortunately only think of football or cycling.

translation.lb: Mé och d'lichtathletik ka fcsselen, si kann cnthousiasmc'eren, si ka glanzvoll niéwt dén anere sportarte bestoen.
translation.en: But athletics can also captivate, it can enthuse, it can stand splendidly alongside other sports.

translation.lb: Si ass zwar net eso' spectaculär, mé erze'eresche wert leit hir zu gronn.
translation.en: It is indeed not as spectacular, but its intrinsic value will win people over.

translation.lb: Internationale Frae-congress zu Letzeburg
translation.en: International Women's Congress in Luxembourg

translation.lb: D'international organisation vun de fraen, de' fir de fridden an d'freihét astin, an de' am joer 1015 vu frae gegrënd go'f, de' aile kriclife'rehde länner vuni kricli 1014—18 an och neutrale 'lau■1er ugehe'crt hun, hüllt vuni 4. bis de 0. august zu Letzeburg sein 11. internationale congress of.
translation.en: The international organization of women, which stands for peace and freedom, and was founded by women in the year 1015, and which has included all belligerent countries from 1014-18 and also neutral ones, will hold its 11th international congress in Luxembourg from the 4th to the 0th of August.

translation.en: Approximately 1100 delegates from 20 countries have reportedly registered their participation.

translation.en: During the last war, the association continued its activities in America, England, and other warring countries.

translation.lb: Fanfare Municipale de Hollerich-Luxembourg-Gare E sonndeg, de 4. august 1946, mecht d'Hollerecher musek hiren traditionellen ausflug.
translation.en: The Municipal Band of Hollerich-Luxembourg-Gare on Sunday, the 4th of August 1946, is making their traditional excursion.

translation.lb: Trajet: Letzeburg-Dickerech-Iechternach-Gre'vemâcher-Letzeburg.
translation.en: Route: Luxembourg-Diekirch-Echternach-Grevenmacher-Luxembourg.

translation.lb: De preis fir inactiv memberen fir d'mëttegiéssen zu Iechternach an e schnittchen zu Gre'vemâcher inclusiv autocar, ass 160, — frang.
translation.en: The price for inactive members for lunch in Echternach and a snack in Grevenmacher, including the coach, is 160 francs.

translation.lb: Départ sonndes muerges ponkt 8 auer bei der âler Hollerecher scho'l.
translation.en: Departure on Sunday morning precisely at 8 o'clock at the old Hollerich school.

translation.lb: Umeldongen, so'weit plaz ass, gin entge'nt geholl beim secrétaire Eug. Mackel, 123, H-dlerecher stôss, oder bei sos engem member vum cgmité, bis e freideg, de 26. juli.
translation.en: Registrations, as long as there is space, will be accepted by the secretary Eug. Mackel, 123, Hollerich street, or by another member of the committee, until Friday, 26th July.

translation.lb: Kîschtefest Bläschend. — De lèschte sonndeg go'w hei fir d'e'scht nom kricli onst tradilionnel'lt kischtefest gefeiert.
translation.en: Kischtefest Bläschend. — Last Sunday, for the first time after the war, our traditional Kischtefest was celebrated here.

translation.lb: De' säfteg zockerse'ss kischten, de' dest joer am iwerfloss hei gewuess sin, hu filotten ofsaz fond.
translation.en: The juicy, sugary cherries, which grew in abundance here this year, found eager buyers.

translation.lb: D'Hiélemer musek huet bei dèr geléenhét onst duerf matt hirem besuch bee'ert an ons durch hire sche'ne concert erfrét.
translation.en: The Hiélemer music band honored our village with their visit on this occasion and delighted us with their beautiful concert.

translation.lb: All me'glech attractio'ne go'we gebueden, so'datt dat jonkt voilek vun de nopeschdiérfer, de' stark vertruede woren, op seng rechnong kom-
translation.en: All kinds of attractions were offered, so that the young people from the neighboring villages, who were well represented, got their money's worth.

translation.lb: Bis spe't an d'nuecht huet dat dreiwen ugedauert.
translation.en: The hustle and bustle lasted until late into the night.

translation.lb: Expérimenter op der Musel G r e v e m â c h e r.
translation.en: Experiment at the Moselle Grevenmacher.

translation.lb: — E samschdeg den owend go'f dén e'schte pont ageweit.
translation.en: — On Saturday evening, the first bridge was inaugurated.

translation.lb: Fir prff'w ass en auto iwer an eriwec gefe'ert gin.
translation.en: As a test, a car was driven back and forth over it.

translation.lb: Durch dat schwe'ert gefall wor d'maschin bfil an d'Muset gerutscht, et ass ower alles nach gudd gangen.
translation.en: Due to heavy impact, the machine nearly slipped into the Moselle, but everything turned out fine in the end.

translation.lb: Petler vum ncie pont, dé „Mâcher"' gedéwt go'f.
translation.en: The pillar of the new bridge, called 'Mâcher,' was presented.

translation.lb: ass den hèr Victor Prost, burgerméschter vu Mâcher.
translation.en: The gentleman Victor Prost, mayor of Mâcher.

translation.lb: No der feier um wâsser wor an der gârdewirtschafl Schneider-Conter e lëschtege bâi.
translation.en: After the ceremony on the water, there was a cheerful gathering at the Schneider-Conter garden restaurant.

translation.lb: Gro’sst waldfest M e r l z e g.
translation.en: Grand forest festival Merlzeg.

translation.lb: — Fir e sonndeg de 14. juli, 2 auer numëtles, hun ons musek- a fc'ssballgescHschaft „an der Scitert" un der Mechelhucherstrôss e gro'sst waldfest •jrganise'erl.
translation.en: — For Sunday the 14th of July, at 2 o'clock in the afternoon, our music and football society "an der Scitert" on the Mechelhucher street has organized a grand forest festival.

translation.lb: All me'gtlech attractio'neii, concert, dancing, glécksrad, kélebunn, kutschbunn aew. gi gebueden fir ons gäscht gudd z'.imuse'cren.
translation.en: All kinds of attractions, concert, dancing, wheel of fortune, skittle alley, carriage ride, etc., are offered to entertain our guests.

translation.lb: Fir iéssen an drénken ass och vjrgesuergt.
translation.en: Food and drink are also provided for.

translation.lb: Am krich.
translation.en: In the war.

translation.lb: 19-10 luiet de ministerpresident Konoye d'fusio'n vun den zwo' h.aptpurteien durchgefe'ert.
translation.en: On October 19, Prime Minister Konoye carried out the merger of the two main parties.

translation.lb: D'I.énkspartei go'f opgele'st.
translation.en: The Left Party was dissolved.

translation.lb: Iiir vertriéder wollten der fusio'nspartei net beitriéden, si blo'wen zwar als onofhüngeg depute'- ert am Parlament, baten ower guer kén afloss.
translation.en: Their representatives did not want to join the merger party and remained as independent deputies in the Parliament but had no influence at all.

translation.lb: 1942 Iniol den To.jo nei wählen organise'ert.
translation.en: In July 1942, Tojo organized new elections.

translation.lb: Et huet ower nure fir d'iëscht vun der régirons dèrfe gestemmt ze gin.
translation.en: However, it was only allowed to vote for the government's list.

translation.lb: Dest seheinparlament huet bis zum krichsenn existe'ert an ail gesetzer ugeholl, de' et virgeluegt krut.
translation.en: This puppet parliament existed until the end of the war and accepted all the laws that were proposed to it.

translation.lb: Wir dankten Nun Warnen wir!
translation.en: We thanked Now we warn!

translation.lb: Nach stl mir all am bann vun de wonuersche'ne momenter, de' mir mam englesche Premier hei zu Letzeburg erliéwt hun, nach he'cre mir den ongeheierc jubel, den iwerall am ländchcn de gro'ssen Churchill bei senger visite hegre'sst huet,
translation.en: After we all still bask in the wonderful moments we experienced here in Luxembourg with the English Premier, where we still hear the immense jubilation that welcomed the great Churchill all over the country during his visit,

translation.lb: a scho bréngt d'organ vun der kommunistescher partei, „D'Zeitung", gësehter a virgëschler eng scrie arllkelen, de' op jidde fall gelunge wirken.
translation.en: and already the organ of the Communist party, "The Newspaper," brings a series of articles that in any case appear effective.

translation.lb: Mir wëllen onse liéser verschidde passagen aus de lelartikeleu: „Wir dankten. Nun warnen wir!" a „Mr. Churchill commis voyageur der Wcstbloek-Polillk" breiigen:
translation.en: We want to present to our readers some passages from the articles: "We thanked. Now we warn!" and "Mr. Churchill, traveling salesman of the Westblock polity":

translation.lb: „Der alte Haudegen Churchill, vom Stamm der Marlborough s'en va-t-cn guerre, ist wieder auf dem Kriegspfad...
translation.en: "The old warhorse Churchill, of the Marlborough line s'en va-t-en guerre, is on the warpath again...

translation.lb: Die Wcstbiock-Politik, deren Commis voyageur heute Mr. Churchill Ist, im vereinten Auftrag der Flnanzgewattigen der Londoner City und der Wall Street, hat nichts mit unseren nationalen Interessen und unserer demokratischen Entwicklung gemein...
translation.en: The Westblock Policy, whose traveling salesman Mr. Churchill is today, on the united mandate of the financial powers of London City and Wall Street, has nothing in common with our national interests and democratic development...

translation.lb: Doch wir können nicht vergessen, dass Churchill nur einmal in seinem Leben — und zwar gczwuugenermassen — ein Mann des Fortschritts war.
translation.en: Yet we cannot forget that Churchill was only once in his life - and indeed obligatorily - a man of progress.

translation.lb: als fiir England die „Nacht der langen Messer" dämmerte.
translation.en: when for England the "Night of the Long Knives" dawned.

translation.lb: Sonst war und ist Churchill die Verkörperung der Reaktion.
translation.en: Otherwise, Churchill was and is the embodiment of reaction.

translation.lb: Er stand immer im Dienst des inncrpolitlschcn Rückschritts, der Viilkcrunterdriickung, der rücksichtslosen Intcressevertretung der Londoner City.
translation.en: He always served domestic political regression, the oppression of peoples, and the ruthless representation of the interests of London City.

translation.lb: Deshalb müssen wir unserrn Luxemburger Volk sagen: „Traue Churchill nicht, auch wenn er Geschenke bringt!"
translation.en: Therefore, we must tell our Luxembourg people: "Do not trust Churchill, even when he brings gifts!"

translation.lb: Den Churchill hurt also als énzcgt liéwenswirk ozeweisen, dall hié reaktionär wor.
translation.en: Thus, Churchill can be proven as undoubtedly reactionary.

translation.lb: Als reaktionär huet hién de kämpf ge'nt de Preiss opgeholl an als reaktionär huet hién de krich gewon Gezwiingenermassenlü!
translation.en: As a reactionary, he took up the fight against the Prussians and as a reactionary, he won the war by necessity!

translation.lb: Wahlcampagne an der Tirkei *
translation.en: Election campaign in Turkey *

translation.lb: An der Tirkei fannen de nexte sonndeg wähle fir d'parlament statt.
translation.en: In Turkey, next Sunday, elections for the parliament will take place.

translation.lb: D'wahlcampagne huet schons elo hiren he'ponkt errécht.
translation.en: The election campaign has already reached its peak now.

translation.lb: Fir d'e'schte ke'er an der geschieht vun der tirkescher republik sin des ke'ei all Parteien zu de wählen zo'gelôss.
translation.en: For the first time in the history of the Turkish Republic, all parties are allowed to participate in the elections.

translation.lb: Fre'et huet emmer nemmen eng partei, nämlech d'republikanesch vollekspartei, candidaten dèrfen opstellen.
translation.en: Previously, only one party, namely the Republican People's Party, was allowed to nominate candidates.

translation.lb: Als de' stärkst oppositio'nspartei get d'democrateseh partei bezéchent, dèr hire chef viru kurzem zu Smyrna virun 30.000 perso'nen eng wahlriéd gehalen huet.
translation.en: The Democratic Party is considered the strongest opposition party, whose leader recently held an election speech in Smyrna in front of 30,000 people.

translation.lb: Aerodrome Findel D'inscriptio'n, de' op den e'schte stén vum aérodrome um Findel agrave'ert get.
translation.en: Aerodrome Findel The inscription, which is engraved on the first stone of the aerodrome at Findel.

translation.lb: Si ass vuin professer Jules Prussen aus dem colle'sch vu Letzeburg verfâsst gin:
translation.en: It was composed by Professor Jules Prussen from the college of Luxembourg:

translation.lb: Pucalas semper visant alae regiones Hinc Luxemburgo fidei pacjsque memore Portus Luxemburgensis Aeronautici consecralio facta est a. d. XII Kai. Aug. MCMXLVI primo lapide pôsilo a Dominé Victore Bodson conimeatuum operumque publicorum minislro
translation.en: With wings always aiming at distant regions. Here, mindful of the faith and peace of Luxembourg, the consecration of the Luxembourg Aeronautical Port was made on the 21st of July, 1946, with the first stone laid by Minister of Public Works Victor Bodson.

translation.lb: Wetterlage.
translation.en: Weather situation.

translation.lb: — L'eber den Azoren hat sich ein neues Hochdruckgebiet entwickelt, das seinen Einfluss bald über unserm Gebiet geltend machen wird.
translation.en: — Over the Azores, a new high-pressure area has developed that will soon assert its influence over our area.

translation.lb: Nach vorübergehender Bewölkung, die uns möglicherweise etwas Regen bringt, baldige Welterbesserpng.
translation.en: After temporary cloudiness, which may bring us some rain, soon weather improvement.

translation.en: w.

translation.lb: Primizfeier De'fferdeng. — E sonndeg, den 21. juli, go'f hei zu De'fferdeng d'priiniz vum IIw. her Marcel Schneider gefeiert.
translation.en: First Mass Celebration Differdange. — On Sunday, July 21st, here in Differdange, the first mass of Rev. Marcel Schneider was celebrated.

translation.lb: Sclio samschdes owes go'f d'feier durch e concert vun der stadmusek ënnert der directio n vum lier Camille Roilgcn, dé vun de villen erschéngene leidd stärk applaude'ert go'f.
translation.en: Already on Saturday evening, the celebration was opened by a concert from the city music under the direction of Mr. Camille Roiligen, who was strongly applauded by the many people present.

translation.lb: Sonndes mueres wor d'Alois Kayserströss, wo' d'elternhaus vum hèr Schneider stét, c mir vu fuendelen, blummen, an dennegréngs.
translation.en: On Sunday morning, the Alois Kayser Street, where Mr. Schneider’s parental home is located, was beautifully decorated with flags, flowers, and evergreens.

translation.lb: Ennert de klang vun engem primizlidd, gesonge vum Cäcilieverein, huet d'schwësler vu senger mamm, de' am krich gestuerwen ass, den e'erendag vun liirern jong net me' erliéwe könnt, de weisse ro'sckranz op d'boer gedréckt.
translation.en: Amidst the sound of a first mass hymn sung by the Cecilian Choir, the sisters of his mother, who died during the war and couldn’t witness the honorary day of her son, placed the white rosary on the pew.

translation.lb: Am cortège vun de katli. vereiner matt de pompjéen an der stadmusek un der spëtzt go'f de primiziant durch d'festicch garnc'ort strôssen, de' vu ville leidd emsémt woren, an d'kirch gefo'erl, wo' eu a feierlecher weis seng e'scht mëss gehalen huet.
translation.en: In the procession of the Catholic associations with firefighters and the city music at the forefront, the new priest was led through the festively adorned streets, crowded with many people, to the church, where he held his first mass in a solemn manner.

translation.lb: De' gro ss popularite't ass besonnesch durch den emsland ze verstoen, datt den hèr Schneider wärend dem krich, ënnert der nazityrannci, actif an der resistenz täteg wor.
translation.en: The great popularity is mainly understood by the fact that Mr. Schneider was actively involved in the resistance during the war, under the Nazi tyranny.

translation.lb: Mnench refractaire wësse vu senger hëllefsbcrélschaft a seligem entschlossenen handien e liddehen ze sangen,
translation.en: Many defiant ones know of his helpfulness and his blessed determined actions a little song to sing,

translation.lb: a muench politesche fliichtleng huet dem hèr Schneider e sécheren asyl ze verdanke gehât.
translation.en: and many political refugees owe Mr. Schneider a safe asylum.

translation.lb: Nomëttes go'f dem primiziant vu seite vun der gemeng eng hèrzlech ovatio'n duerbruecht.
translation.en: In the afternoon, the new priest received a heartfelt ovation from the community.

translation.lb: E vertriéder vun der jugend begre'sst den hèr Schneider, wïnscht him a sengem zo'kënftegen wirkongskrés vill gléck.
translation.en: A representative of the youth greeted Mr. Schneider, wishing him much happiness in his future area of work.

translation.lb: an offre'ert him am numm vun der populatio'n eng sehe' büroarichtong.
translation.en: and offered him a new office setup in the name of the population.

translation.lb: Den hèr paschlo'er sét den De'fferdcnger merci fir hir tatkräfteg'ëllef a get dem primiziant de' bèschte glcckv '"scli mall <;> de wé.
translation.en: Mr. Pastor thanked the people of Differdange for their active help and wished the new priest the best of luck on his way.

translation.lb: De'f gerc erl ergreift dann den her Schneider d'wuerl.
translation.en: Finally, Mr. Schneider took the word.

translation.lb: E sét allen, de' zu sengem e'erendag uialtgehollef hun en dc'we merci a niengl, dalt en dal fest hei, an de' De'fferdenger nimols vergiésse gc'f.
translation.en: He thanked everyone who helped on his honorary day and promised never to forget this celebration and the people of Differdange.

translation.lb: Malt dem ofsange vun der „Hémecht" huel de sche'n an androcksvoll primizfeier en enn fond.
translation.en: With the singing of the 'Hémecht', the beautiful and impressive first mass celebration came to an end.

translation.en: Saturday, July 20 — A new government is being formed in Bolivia.

translation.lb: wo' och jonk offize'er aus der arme' dra sin.

translation.lb: — E wupn- a geschäftshaus, geléen an der Letzehurger strôss nr. 6, dat dem hèr J. P. Schon- Meyianqer gehe'ert, ass durch verkaf an «Thann vum hèr P. Weber-Bomb, schreinefméschter vun hei, iweigângu..
translation.en: — A commercial building, located at Luxemburger Street No. 6, which belonged to Mr. J. P. Schon-Meyianqer, was sold to Mr. P. Weber-Bomb, a master carpenter from here.

translation.lb: De verkifspreis ass onbnkannt.
translation.en: The selling price is unknown.

translation.lb: — De fëscherverein „Fëscherfrënn" vu Schëffleng organse'ert e sonndpg, den 28. juii, hei zu Gre'vemâcher e coupefësc.ten ëijnert dem numm „Coupe Eug. Bir;
translation.en: — The fishing club "Fisher Friends" from Schifflange is organizing a fishing competition here in Grevenmacher on Sunday, July 28th, under the name "Coupe Eug. Bir;".

translation.en: The trophy

translation.en: — a magnificent piece

translation.en: — is displayed in the window of the Kess-Konter house on Trier Street.

translation.lb: E samschdeg de 27. juli 1946 ass um 7 auer owes op der Aris e gro'sse match tëechent denen alen hèren vun der Aris an déne vun der Union Letzeburg.
translation.en: On Saturday, July 27, 1946, at 7 o'clock in the evening, a big game will take place at Aris between the old gentlemen of Aris and those of Union Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Et ass schons läng hir, datt des âl spiller sech an engem match ge'ntiwer stongen.
translation.en: It has been a long time since these old players stood against each other in a match.

translation.lb: D'qua- lite'ten an capacite'ten vun dénen zwo' équipe sin alle sportsleidd bekannt.
translation.en: The qualities and capabilities of these two teams are well known to all sports enthusiasts.

translation.lb: Et get eso'guer geschwat, we' wann e neutralen arbiter do wir, fir dese gro'sse noperstreit ze peifen.
translation.en: It is even being said that a neutral referee would be there to officiate this big neighborhood struggle.

translation.lb: Datt de betreffenden hèr kén eso' e lichte stand huet, dat kann én sech schons virstellen.
translation.en: That the concerned gentleman has such an easy stance can be easily imagined.

translation.lb: Fir 22 mann an 2 linienrichter an der Bo'neweger arena an der rieht ze halen, muss é schons sein handwiérk aus dem ff kennen.
translation.en: To keep 22 men and 2 linesmen in line at the Bonneweg arena, one must really know their craft thoroughly.

translation.lb: Datt d'leidd net an den terrain lafe können bei engem event.
translation.en: That people cannot run onto the field during an event.

translation.lb: ugrëff op de Schiedsrichter, huet é gro'ssen uerdnongsdengscht sech freiwëlleg zur verfiigong gestallt (fir 6 humpen an e pur schnittercher).
translation.en: Regarding attacks on the referee, a large orderly service has voluntarily made itself available (for 6 pints and a couple of sandwiches).

translation.lb: Datt trotzdem awer ritterlech gekämpft get, denke mir dach allegurten.
translation.en: We all think that a chivalrous fight will still take place.

translation.lb: All supporter, vun der Aris oder vun der Union werde matt enger zefriddener minn aus der arena eraus klammen.
translation.en: Every supporter, whether from Aris or Union, will leave the arena with a satisfied expression.

translation.lb: D'équipe si nach bis elo e gro'sst geheimnes, an et wèrd é staunen, wann én um terrain stét an geseit én de' männer de' viru 15 joer de fo'ssball an der stad an am ganze land domine'ert hun.
translation.en: The teams are still a great mystery, and one will be amazed when standing on the field to see the men who dominated football in the city and across the country 15 years ago.

translation.lb: Alles ass an enger gro'sser form vun den hèren.
translation.en: Everything is in great form from the gentlemen.

translation.lb: Den tubak an den alcohol ass seit enger woch hinne streng verbuede gin vun hiren respect, trainern.
translation.en: Tobacco and alcohol have been strictly forbidden to them for a week by their respected trainers.

translation.lb: We' et schéngt soll eso'guer den trainer vun der Union, de fre'eren internationale Nuic vu Metz mattspillen.
translation.en: It seems that even the trainer of Union, the former international Nuic from Metz, may play.

translation.lb: Garante'ere kann én et jo net.
translation.en: One cannot guarantee it, of course.

translation.lb: D'preisser si ganz kleng gehalen, an et werd och kengem vun de Zuschauer fir sei geld léd doen.
translation.en: The prices are kept very low, and no spectator will regret spending their money.

translation.lb: Dofir sportsleidd alles muer op d'Aris op dé gro'sse match Aris—Union (Veteranen).
translation.en: Therefore, sports enthusiasts, everyone to Aris tomorrow for the big match Aris—Union (Veterans).

translation.lb: Ado BAITO Den Aldo Baito huet de' e'scht etape vum Tour de France 1946 gewonn.
translation.en: Aldo Baito won the first stage of the 1946 Tour de France.

translation.lb: Et ass e numm, dé bei ons nach kaum bekannt ass.
translation.en: It is a name that is hardly known to us yet.

translation.lb: Hién erënnert un seng komerode Breschi a Bertocchi: 25 joer, athletesch gebaut, 67 kilo, 1.67 m gro'ss.
translation.en: He reminds us of his comrades Breschi and Bertocchi: 25 years old, athletically built, 67 kilos, 1.67 meters tall.

translation.lb: De Baito „léft" zbnter 8 joer, d. h. am eigentleche sënn „practice'ert" hién ower ere'scht 4 joer, well am krich huet hién seng carrière ënnerbriéche missen.
translation.en: Baito has been 'racing' for 8 years, which means in the real sense he has been 'practicing' for only 4 years, because he had to interrupt his career during the war.

translation.lb: Hién ass professionnel zënter desem joer, an Italien léft hié fir de velo-club vu Bostese.
translation.en: He has been a professional since this year, and in Italy he races for the cycling club of Bostese.

translation.lb: Bostese ass en duerf bei Mailand, wo' nure millionnäre wunnen, et ass zesoen dat italiénescht monaco.
translation.en: Bostese is a village near Milan, where only millionaires live, so to speak, it is the Italian Monaco.

translation.lb: De baito ass den ärmsten awunner an desem aristoeratenduerf.
translation.en: Baito is the poorest inhabitant in this aristocratic village.

translation.lb: „Ech hu le'wer mei velo we' ganz ke'p vu geldscheiner, dann huet é manner suergen," sét hién.
translation.en: "I'd rather have my bike than piles of money, then one has fewer worries," he says.

translation.lb: De Baito ass ausgezéchnete sprinter, mé och als lângstreckeléfer an als bidrgsteiger léscht hié gudd arbecht.
translation.en: Baito is an excellent sprinter, but he also does good work as a long-distance runner and as a mountain climber.

translation.lb: Theatercoup an der belscher regirongskris: De Spaak verhandelt mam P. S. C.
translation.en: Theatrical coup in the Belgian government crisis: Spaak negotiates with the P. S. C.

translation.lb: Em 13.15 auer könnt de Spaak de journaliste net vill mattdélen, well d'situatio'n se'er kritesch a complize'ert wor.
translation.en: Around 1:15 PM, Spaak couldn't share much with the journalists because the situation was very critical and complicated.

translation.lb: En hätt awer wëllcs an senge beme'onge virunzefueren, obschons e weder ugeholl nach refüle'ert hätt, de' nei regirong ze forme'eren.
translation.en: He had, however, wanted to continue with his efforts, although he had neither accepted nor refused to form the new government.

translation.lb: Gëschter mëtteg huet de Spaak seng consultatio'ne virugesat a fir d'e'scht d'liberal ministeren Buisseret a Godding empfângen.
translation.en: Yesterday afternoon, Spaak continued his consultations and first received the liberal ministers Buisseret and Godding.

translation.lb: D'liberal partei ass der mënong, d'beme'ongen em eng lénksregirong misste virugesat gin, obschons den De Voghel an den De Smaele hire refus gin hätten.
translation.en: The liberal party is of the opinion that efforts towards a left-wing government should continue, although De Voghel and De Smaele had refused.

translation.lb: Duerno huet de Spaak matt de kommunistesche ministère confere'ert, nämlech mam Lahaut an Terfve.
translation.en: Afterwards, Spaak conferred with the communist ministers, namely Lahaut and Terfve.

translation.lb: D'regirongskris ass gëschter durch en theatercoup marke'ert gin.
translation.en: The government crisis was marked by a theatrical coup yesterday.

translation.lb: Wärenddem nämlech nach alles drop higerlcht wor, eng lénksregirong ze forme'eren, huet de Spaak plötzlech d'richtong change'ert an annonce'ert, e ge'f en erneite versuch ënnerhuelen, fir de P. S. C. ze bewegen, an de' nei regirong anzetriédon.
translation.en: While everything was still pointing towards forming a left-wing government, Spaak suddenly changed direction and announced he would make another attempt to persuade the P. S. C. to join the new government.

translation.lb: Des démarche soll haut de muere stattfannen.
translation.en: This approach is supposed to take place this morning.

translation.lb: D'iédend perse'nlechkéten vum P. S-. C. si fir 10 auer beim Spaak agelueden.
translation.en: The individual personalities of the P. S. C. are invited to Spaak at 10 o'clock.

translation.lb: OSSU— LASEL D'OSSU-équipe (Office des Sports Scolaires Universitaires) ass gëschtcr owend mam Pareisser zuch ukomm.
translation.en: OSSU— LASEL The OSSU team (Office of School and University Sports) arrived last night by train from Paris.

translation.lb: Si waren alléguer me' oder we'neger vun der langer rés mattgeholl, mê den hèrzlechen empfank vun der LASEL huet schnell all middegkét verdriwen.
translation.en: They were all more or less tired from the long journey, but the warm welcome from LASEL quickly dispelled any fatigue.

translation.lb: Owens em 7 auer woren de' zwo' équipe bei engem banquet amical versammelt.
translation.en: The two teams gathered together at 7 PM for a friendly banquet.

translation.lb: De' franse'sch mannschaft médit en äusserst stärken androck.
translation.en: The French team gave an extremely strong impression.

translation.lb: Aus hire gespre'cher erseit én, datt et hinnen un internationalen treffe net félt, an datt si dobei emmer beile'eren.
translation.en: From their conversations, it appears that they do not lack international experience and always learn from it.

translation.lb: Et si verschidde franse'sch champion'en ënnert hinnen, de' et onsen athleten haut de nomëtteg eventuell stärk anhëtze wèrden.
translation.en: There are some French champions among them, who might give our athletes strong competition this afternoon.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schleimer begre'sst de' auslänncsch gäscht an enger hèrzlechor a stärk applaude'erter usproch.
translation.en: Mr. Schleimer welcomes the foreign guests with a heartfelt and strongly applauded speech.

translation.lb: Hién apprécie'crt si. als Sportler vu format, als member vun der OSSU, vun enger organisation also, de' alle studentesportsverbänn aus alle länner als modèle ka virgestallt gin, als birger schliesslech vun desem gro'sse noperstaat Frankreich, dé fir ons d'symbol vun der freihét ass.
translation.en: He appreciates them as athletes of stature, as members of the OSSU, an organization that can serve as a role model for all student sports associations from all countries, and finally as citizens of this great neighboring state France, which for us is the symbol of freedom.

translation.lb: Hién erënnert un de séjour vun der OSSU-fo'ssballéquipe, de' an de letzeburger sportskréser e mächtegcn androck hannerlôss huet.
translation.en: He recalls the stay of the OSSU football team, which left a powerful impression in Luxembourg's sports circles.

translation.lb: De président vun der OSSU-mannschaft äntwert a kurze wiérder, hié sét villmols merci fir den hèrzlechen empfank hei zu Lctzeburg an ass iwerzégt, datt seng équipe e sche'nen souvenir vun onser hémecht matt zrëck a Frankreich hellt.
translation.en: The president of the OSSU team responds in brief words, expressing heartfelt thanks for the warm welcome here in Luxembourg and is convinced that his team will take back beautiful memories of our homeland to France.

translation.lb: „Muer mächen alléguer hirt beseht", sét hién, „an de' stärkst solle sieger gin."
translation.en: "Tomorrow everyone will do their best," he says, "and the strongest shall win."

translation.lb: Boxen Joe Lotus — Tami Mauriello Den italo-amerikanesche schwe'ergewichtler Tami Mauriello huet sei contract fir de match ge'nt de Joe Louis matt senge frënn gefeiert.
translation.en: Boxing Joe Louis — Tami Mauriello, the Italian-American heavyweight, celebrated with his friends after signing the contract for the match against Joe Louis.

translation.lb: Hién erklärt: „De Mike Jacobs huet mir meng liéwenschance gin, ech wèrd beweisen datt ech sei vertraue verdéngen.
translation.en: He declared: 'Mike Jacobs has given me my life's chance, I will prove that I deserve his trust.

translation.lb: Duerfir w611 ech sacrificer bréngen a mei lëschtegt liéwen astellen.
translation.en: For that, I will make sacrifices and adjust my carefree life.

translation.lb: Ech wôll op de be'er verzichten, obschon ech e gèr drénken, an ech wèrd mech schärf entraine'eren.
translation.en: I want to give up beer, even though I like to drink it, and I will train hard.

translation.lb: D'veterane si meng säch: ech hun de 34järege Steve Dudas k. o. geschloen, de Joe Louis huet der 32, hién ass me' jonk a me' stärk we' den Dudas.
translation.en: The veterans say to me: I knocked out the 34-year-old Steve Dudas, Joe Louis is 32, he is younger and stronger than Dudas.

translation.lb: Mé dat mécht neischt, ech klôteren an de ring fir ze kämpfen, an de Joe soll oppassen, datt sei kënn net zevill no u mei riétsen hôke könnt.
translation.en: But that doesn't matter, I will step into the ring to fight, and Joe should be careful that his chin doesn't get too close to my right hook.

translation.lb: De Mauriello ass dermôsse begéschtert vu sengem zo'kënftege match, datt e sech d'phase vum Billy Conn sengem k..0. op d'stîr huet tätowe'ere lôssen.
translation.en: Mauriello is so enthusiastic about his upcoming match that he had the moment of Billy Conn's knockout tattooed on his forehead.

translation.en: The English news agency Reuter released a statement the day before yesterday, in which it addresses certain American magazines.

translation.lb: Des zeitschrëften hate publize'ert, datt d'agence Reuter vun der englescher regirong controlile'ert ge'w gin an och finanziell vun hir ofhängeg wir.
translation.en: These magazines had published that the Reuter agency had been controlled by the English government and was also financially dependent on it.

translation.lb: Dorophin huet Reuter dé communiqué crausgin, wo'ranner si confirme'ert, datt si d'norichtenagentur vu sän.tlechen engLeschen zeidonge wir, o'ni politesch anschauung, oncfhängeg vun der regirong an iwerhapt net a verbindong matt hir.
translation.en: Following this, Reuter issued the communiqué, in which they confirm that they are the news agency for all English newspapers, without political views, independent of the government and not at all connected to it.

translation.lb: Socketten Wat mengt Dir, meng le'w liéserinnen, wa mir ons haut ge'wen drugin fir ons e puer gudd warem socketten ze strécken?
translation.en: Socks What do you think, my dear readers, if we started today to knit ourselves some good warm socks?

translation.lb: Zu der tan-' ger box gehe'ere si jo onbedéngt.
translation.en: Indeed, they certainly belong with the dancer's outfit.

translation.lb: Vleicht hu mir chance fir 100 gr nei woll an engem geschäfl ze erwëschen; wa net, da we'sst ech gèr wat fir eng gudd hausfra net nach an irgend engem eck al opgezuge woll ieien huet.
translation.en: Maybe we have a chance to catch 100 grams of new wool in a store; if not, I know well what a good housewife still has sitting in some corner of old saved wool.

translation.lb: de' én eso' fein fir desen zweck gebrauche kann.
translation.en: that one could use just fine for this purpose.

translation.lb: Mir fänken also un, am beachte matt 5 eisen, well én da seng arbecht besser andéle kann, an zwar matt eisen nr 2% wann d'woH nel ze déck ass, a malt 60 maschen Dat einfachst an dat bele'wst ass a bleiwt dat musler 2 rechts 2 lénks, oder 3 rechts 3 lénks.
translation.en: So we start, considering with 5 needles, because then one can distribute the work better, and indeed with needles no. 2% if the wool is not too thick, and make 60 stitches. The simplest and most popular is and remains the pattern 2 right 2 left, or 3 right 3 left.

translation.lb: Dese bord stréckt én ongefe'er 16 cm he'ch; da fänke mir d'fiescht un matt der halschecht vun de maschen, also 30 D'fiescht stréckt én eso' vill tir he'ch ewe se maschen huel, 30 tir an desem fall, mit strecke se ganz glflt, 1 eise rechts 1 eise lénks.
translation.en: This cuff is knitted about 16 cm high; then we start the heel with half the stitches, so 30. One knits the heel as high as it has stitches, 30 rows in this case, knitting them completely flat, 1 needle right, 1 needle left.

translation.lb: Duerno gel an engem lénken tour d'kBppchen ugefâng: et stréckt én 2 maschen iwert d'halschecht, de' 2 nächst masche lénks zesummen.
translation.en: Then one starts the heel cap on a left round: knit 2 stitches over the half, knit the next 2 stitches together left.

translation.lb: I masrh lénks. dann dre't én: de" e'scht masch ofhléwen, also net strécken, da 5 niasche rechts strécken, 2 maschen rechts zesummestrécken, 1 rechts, dre'en; de" e'scht masch ofhiéwen, 6 masche •lénks strécken, de' 2 nächst lénks zesumraeslrécken.
translation.en: 1 stitch left. Then turn: slip the first stitch, so do not knit it, then knit 5 stitches right, knit 2 stitches together right, 1 right, turn; slip the first stitch, knit 6 stitches left, knit the next 2 stitches together left.

translation.en: 1 left, turn; one continues like this knitting the gusset, always knitting 1 stitch of the cap together with one stitch of the heel until the cap is finished.

translation.lb: Dann hiéwt én de' masche lânscht d'fiescht op. erréngt aW 3. tour bis datt én crem eso' vill maschen huet ewe' en der am ufank hât, also 60.
translation.en: Then one picks up the stitches along the heel. Decrease every 3rd round until you have as many stitches as at the beginning, so 60.

translation.lb: a streckt gläi virun (oder oeb nach 2 rechts 2 lénks e stéckelchen iwert de fo'ss virun), bis én ongefe'er d'längt vum fo ss huet, a fänkt dann un ze errenge fir d'spëtz
translation.en: and knit plain (or optionally 2 right 2 left a little over the foot), until you approximately reach the length of the foot, and then start decreasing for the toe.

translation.lb: Dofir streckt én a44 2. tour de' 2 Iescht maschen vun all eisen zesummen.
translation.en: For this, knit together the last 2 stitches of every 2nd round.

translation.lb: De' Iescht 8 maschen ze't é matt engem fuedem zesummen a verne'l de fuedem.
translation.en: The last 8 stitches you sew together with a thread and fasten the thread.

translation.en: LONDON CONFERENCE Persia wants a solution.

translation.lb: De perseschen bei der vollversammlong vun der UNO huet vun senger regirong uweisong kritt, d'persech fro vi; un d'UNO ze bréngen.
translation.en: The Persian representative at the UN General Assembly has been instructed by his government to bring the Persian question to the UN.

translation.lb: Fir dese schrëtt get et zwo' me'glechketen: Et get en antrag an der vollversammlong gestallt oder d'persesch fro kënnt virun de weltsecherhétsrot.
translation.en: For this step, there are two possibilities: A motion is made in the General Assembly, or the Persian question goes before the Security Council.

translation.lb: wo'hin se eigentlech och gehe'ert.
translation.en: where it rightfully belongs.

translation.lb: Et ass och me'glech, datt schon diplomatesch bespriéchonge stattfannen, ir iwerhapt e schrëtl ennerholl get.
translation.en: It is also possible that diplomatic discussions are already taking place before any step is even taken.

translation.lb: De norwegeschen ausseminisler Lie huet erklärt: D'norwegesch delegatio'n stét um stand- datt de fridden énhétlech an ondélbar muss sirç, wann e läng dauere soll.
translation.en: The Norwegian Foreign Minister Lie has stated: The Norwegian delegation is of the opinion that peace must be unified and indivisible if it is to last.

translation.lb: En huet de' aner delege'ert virun enger machtpolitik an der blockbildong vu mächte gewarnt.
translation.en: He warned the other delegates against power politics and the formation of power blocs.

translation.lb: De' gro'ss mächten, sot hién, hu jo de' gre'sste verantwortong, mé si dèrfen awer net eng machtpolitik dreiwen, de' nemmen an hirem intresse wir.
translation.en: The great powers, he said, have the greatest responsibility, but they must not pursue a power policy that is only in their own interest.

translation.lb: Mir müssen och der tatsâch an d'ae kucken, datt d'politesch an territorial le'- songen, de' vun allerhéxter drénglechkét sin. o'ni läng emschweif erbeigefo'ert gin.
translation.en: We must also face the fact that political and territorial solutions are of utmost urgency and should be immediately pursued without delay.

translation.lb: Zum schluss wënscht de vertriéder vu Norwegen, datt och de' aner scandinavesch länner an der UNO vertruede gin.
translation.en: In conclusion, the Norwegian representative wishes that the other Scandinavian countries also be represented in the UN.

translation.lb: D'nomëttessëtzong ass vum argentineschen delege'erten erëffent gin.
translation.en: The afternoon session was opened by the Argentine delegate.

translation.lb: Argentinien ass e richtegt démocratescht land ân sei vollek ass voll a ganz matt der UNO a matt der Charta vun de Verénte Natio'nen averstanen.
translation.en: Argentina is a truly democratic country, and its people fully agree with the UN and the Charter of the United Nations.

translation.lb: Fir de fridden ze sécheren get Argentinien sei beitrag we' de' aner länner.
translation.en: To secure peace, Argentina contributes as do other countries.

translation.lb: Wann d'versammlong beschle'sst, fléschlisverongen an Europa ze schécken, da spréngt Argentinien an.
translation.en: If the assembly decides to send troops to Europe, Argentina will jump in.

translation.lb: Och de vertriéder vu Columbien huet dénen aneren delege'» erte verséchert, datt Columbien d'UNO matt all hire kräften ennerstëtze ge'w.

translation.en: The British ambassador to Moscow arrived in London yesterday and is available for discussions on issues that will be discussed in the UN meetings.

translation.en: - The American Secretary of the Treasury, Snyder, declared yesterday that the dollar will not be devalued, and that it will remain valued as it was established by the presidential decision of January 31, 1934.

translation.lb: De Snyder sot, hié ge'f op eng ufro vum CamHiie Gutt, dem directer- Verwalter vum internationale geldfong, äntweren.
translation.en: Snyder said he was responding to a request from Camille Gutt, the managing director of the International Monetary Fund.

translation.en: Furthermore, Snyder said: "The American government considers it unnecessary to enter into discussions with the fund regarding a change in the parity of the American dollar."

translation.lb: Gefrot. cb hién des déclaratio'n gemâcli tiätt, fir d'gcrüchter, de" iwer eng eventuell cfwèrtong vum dollar zirkuliert sin, ze deinente'eren. sot de soha-tzj secrétaire;o.
translation.en: Asked whether he made this declaration to deny the rumors circulating about a possible devaluation of the dollar, the Treasury Secretary said no.

translation.en: Medal of Freedom ceremony... — Among the Luxembourgish patriots honored last Wednesday by the American envoy, His Excellency Mr. P. Waller, with the 'Medal of Freedom,' there are 2 women from Wiltz: Mrs. Charel Hansen, born Margot Kremer, and Mrs. Jules Kuhn, born Céline Fabar.

translation.lb: Gleichzeitcg matt der médaille go'f hinnen en unerkennongssclireiwe vum generol Eisenhower iwerrécht iwer de gross dengschter, de' hir männer der sâch vun den Atlie'erte gcléscht, a we de' déngscbter ziini endsieg beigedroen hun.
translation.en: At the same time as the medal, a letter of recognition from General Eisenhower was handed to them for the great services their husbands rendered to the Allied cause and how these services contributed to the final victory.

translation.lb: De Charel Hansen erlo g am dezember 1943 zu Hinzert der onmenschJechei behandlung, matt der eng sadistesch Gestapo h im zo'gesat huet, an de Jules Kuhn go'f am februar 1944 oeh zu Hinzert am verein matt 23 letzeburger komeroden erschoss.
translation.en: Charel Hansen died in December 1943 in Hinzert due to inhumane treatment inflicted by a sadistic Gestapo officer, and Jules Kuhn was also shot in February 1944 in Hinzert along with 23 Luxembourgish comrades.

translation.lb: Dieich vum hèr Kuhn go'f am tnärz vun desem joer malt onse nationalhelden 110 der hémecht iwerfe'ert an um kirfecht Notre-Dame zu I.etzeburg beigesat.
translation.en: The body of Mr. Kuhn was transferred home in March of this year as one of our national heroes and buried at the Notre-Dame cemetery in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Den hèr Hansen schle'ft emmer nach sei lèschtc schlof an deser eillener Hinzerter iérd, weB et fir de moment onme'glech ass. d'iwerrèschter vun déne Letzeburger, de' nach zu Hinzert Ieien, an d'hcmecht eriwer ze huelen.
translation.en: Mr. Hansen still rests his last sleep in this isolated Hinzert grave, as it is currently impossible to bring back the remains of the Luxembourgers still lying in Hinzert to their homeland.

translation.lb: D’fliegerongleck bei Gander
translation.en: The plane crash near Gander

translation.lb: New York, 24. sept. — Autorise'ert amcrikanesch pcrse'nlechkéten hu bekannten, datt d'amerikanesch autorite'te net un der enquête iwer d'fliegerongleck bei Gander délhuelen, datt »i awer, wann et gewénacht ge'f gin, matt rotschle' hëllefe ge'wen.
translation.en: New York, September 24th. — Authorized American individuals have stated that the American authorities are not participating in the investigation of the plane crash near Gander, but they will help with advice if it is requested.

translation.lb: De spezialcorrespondent vum * „Daily Mail" huet senger zeidong gekabelt, datt et beim flicgerongléck vu Gander e goheimnes ge'f i gin.
translation.en: The special correspondent of the * 'Daily Mail' has wired his newspaper that there seems to be a mystery surrounding the plane crash at Gander.

translation.lb: An den trümmer vum avion ass nämicch eng leich entdeckt gin, de' net identifize'ert könnt'gin.
translation.en: Among the wreckage of the plane, a body was found that could not be identified.

translation.lb: De geheimnosvollen do'degcn, dé ké pasl. ké geld an iwerhapt keng pabeiere bei sech hât, wor den iwerliéwendo vollkommen onbekannt.
translation.en: The mysterious deceased, who had no passport, no money, and indeed no papers on them, was completely unknown to the survivor.

translation.lb: E vun den expert'en, de' d'enquête iwer d'ongléck fe'eren, huet erklärt, datt, wanji d'ursâch vum ongléck festgestallt kennt gin, si net vlrun 30 dég publize'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: One of the experts conducting the investigation of the accident has stated that when the cause of the accident is determined, it will not be published for 30 days.

translation.lb: Et schéngt awer schon elo festzéstoen, datt den apparat am moment, wo' en eng schléf gezun huet fir ze landen, an dém moment gc'nt en hiwel gerannt ass.
translation.en: However, it already seems certain that the aircraft hit a hill at the moment it made a circuit to land.

translation.lb: De flieger wor ongefe'er an der he'cht vu 700 meter, mé we'nt der schlechter sieht hätt en onbedengt an der he'cht vun 1300 meter misse »in.
translation.en: The plane was approximately at an altitude of 700 meters, but due to poor visibility, it absolutely should have been at an altitude of 1300 meters.

translation.lb: Eso'bal we' e flieger matt der buedemstatio'n a contact trëtt, stellt der Chefpilot sein altimeter an.
translation.en: As soon as a plane makes contact with the ground station, the chief pilot adjusts his altimeter.

translation.lb: D'indicatio'nen, de' hié vun der buedemstatio'n vu Gander krut, go'wen an englescher sprOch gemäch, so'datt ugeholl ka gin, datt de capitaine, obsehon hié läng an der RAF activ wor, sc falsch verstauen huet a sein altimeter op eng verke'ert he'cht agestallt huet.
translation.en: The indications he received from the ground station at Gander were made in English, so it can be assumed that the captain, even though he was active in the RAF for a long time, misunderstood and set his altimeter to an incorrect altitude.

translation.lb: Des hypothés ge'f d'ursâch erklären, fir wat de flieger relativ niddreg gefiun ass.
translation.en: This hypothesis would explain why the plane was flying relatively low.

translation.lb: Eng aner ursâch kann och de' sin, datt d'mannschaft duerch dat schlecht wléder aussergewe'nlech midd wor.
translation.en: Another reason could be that the crew was exceptionally tired due to the bad weather.

translation.lb: Am allgemengen ass d'iwerflc'e vum Atlantic a richtong vum oste no westen emmer me' schwe'er, we' an der emgeke'erter richtong.
translation.en: In general, crossing the Atlantic from east to west is always more difficult than in the opposite direction.

translation.lb: Jiddefalls get aus den e'schten indicatio'ne vun der enquête ervir, datt d'ursâch nimols gené festgestallt wèrt gin.
translation.en: In any case, the initial indications from the investigation suggest that the cause will never be precisely determined.

translation.lb: Beim ongléeksuert ass e graw gegruewe gin, an dém de' 26 victimer e mëttwoch beigesat gin.
translation.en: A grave was dug at the crash site where the 26 victims were buried on Wednesday.

translation.lb: D'kirchlech feier get a fliegeren ofgehalen, de' «tänneg iwer dem ongléeksuert krésen..Virdru fënd an der kapeil vum aerodrom vu Gander e requiem statt.
translation.en: The church service is held in airplanes that constantly circle over the crash site. Before that, a requiem takes place in the chapel of the Gander aerodrome.

translation.lb: 9 iwarlicwend kennen en donneschdeg schon aus dem spidol entlôss gin an hir rés no New York fortsetzen.
translation.en: 9 survivors can already be released from the hospital on Thursday and continue their journey to New York.

translation.en: Reports, both from Russian and American sources, suggest that Korean bands, sympathizing with the communists, have initiated a significant guerrilla war against the police forces in the south of the province.

translation.en: Since then, all traces of him and his bicycle, which he had with him, have disappeared, and although his family has done everything possible to find him or a body, it was all in vain.

translation.en: A few weeks ago, a bicycle was found in a forest called "the round forest," which apparently belonged to the missing person.

translation.en: Last Friday, Mr. Frising from the Fiels and a friend were hunting and found a body in our "a Bruch," which was already quite decomposed.

translation.en: During the strike of the French customs officers, the value of the French franc fell to 20.

translation.en: After the strike was lifted, the value rose again to 25.

translation.en: At the French-Swiss border, the end of the strike apparently came as a surprise to the smugglers, because within a single day, the customs officers at the border caught so many smugglers,

translation.en: that the prisons in the surrounding area were filled beyond capacity.

translation.en: Among them were both amateur and professional smugglers.

translation.lb: PRENZ FELIX, So' we' onst letzeburger vollek Iéch nennt, wann et volfer vere'erong vun Iéch schwètzt, Prënz, so' wëllen och mir Iéch uriéden, wa mer Iéch zu Erem geburtsdag op descm wé d'gléckwënsch vun der Unio'n entge'ntbréngen.
translation.en: PRINCE FELIX, As our Luxembourgish people call you with respect when they speak of you, Prince, we also wish to address you when we bring you the congratulations of the Union on this way to your birthday.

translation.lb: De' Letzeburger, de' scho viru joerhonnerten als „bons féaulx luxembourgeois" eleng hiren treiéd matt engem fanger geléscht hun, de' sin och nach haut keng natio'n vu kre'cher.
translation.en: The Luxembourgers, who centuries ago performed their loyalty with a finger, are still today not a nation of cowards.

translation.lb: Wann si Iéch gratule'eren, da wëllen si Iéch ffank a frei an d'ae kucken, well un hinne ké falsch ass.
translation.en: When they congratulate you, they wish to look you frankly and freely in the eye, because there is nothing false about them.

translation.lb: A well mir Iéch kennen a wëssen, datt Dir selwer de' veruecht, de' hir wënsch op de lëppen hun, déncn hirt hèrz awer net mattfillt, dofir ass et ons eng stolz fréd, Iéch op Erem dag zugleich matt onse gratulatio'nen onsen oprîchtege merci nnzebidde fir alles, wat onst land Iéch schëlleg ass.
translation.en: And because we know you and understand that you yourself disdain those who have wishes on their lips that their hearts do not share, it is a proud joy for us to offer you our sincere thanks along with our congratulations for everything our country owes to you.

translation.lb: Mir soen Iéch merci, datt Dir ons Grandc-Duchesse an der batterer zeit vum exil eso' gudd versuergt an ons se als vénére'ert mamm erembruecht hutt.
translation.en: We thank you for taking such good care of our Grand Duchess during the bitter time of exile and bringing her back to us as a venerated mother.

translation.lb: Sidd Dir Hire kinnekleche paladin, dén ons Souveraine och weider trei behitt!
translation.en: Be her royal paladin, who further faithfully protects our Sovereign!

translation.lb: Mir soen IécH merci, datt Der onsem Prënz Jean de richte wé vun enger gro'sser tradition gewiscn hutt.
translation.en: We thank you for showing our Prince Jean the right path of a great tradition.

translation.lb: Berot Dir Hién och weider bei senge vleicht nach tâschlende schrëtt um wé op de Kinnekstro'n vu Letzeburg.
translation.en: Continue advising him in his still uncertain steps on the way to the throne of Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Mir soen Iéch merci, datt Dir als kämpfende Prënz iwert d'stirmescht mier an durch den dreck vun den normannesche schluechtfelder komm sidd, fir Letzeburg seng freihét erem ze schenken, fir de' d'vollek op deser seit gestridden huet.
translation.en: We thank you for coming as a fighting Prince over the stormiest seas and through the dirt of Norman battlefields to restore Luxembourg's freedom, for which the people fought on this side.

translation.lb: Mir hun Iéch ons oprîchteg bewonnerong entge'ntgejubelt, we' Dir virun zwé joer enger neigebuerener natio'n vun èrcm wôn erof frédeg zo'gewénkt hutt.
translation.en: We sincerely cheered you for your achievements when two years ago you waved peacefully at a newly born nation from your flat.

translation.lb: A we' mer Iéch a stëller bewonnerong d'hand drécke konnten, a fir é moment Ere bléck matt onsem sech verénegt huet, do hu mir gespiert, datt Dir a mir zesumme gehe'eren.
translation.en: And when we could silently shake your hand and for a moment our gaze united with yours, we felt that you and we belong together.

translation.lb: Et wäre kaum wierder ne'deg fir ze verstoen, datt 5 joer treunong Iéch ons nemme me' no bruacht haten.
translation.en: Few words would be necessary to understand that five years of separation only brought us closer to you.

translation.lb: Fir all dat soe mir Iéch merci, Prënz, a mer biéde Gott, datt en ons Iéch nach läng erhale soll.
translation.en: For all this, we say thank you, Prince, and we pray to God that He may keep you with us for a long time.

translation.lb: Onst vollek brauch Iéch!
translation.en: Our people need you!

translation.lb: Eng propositio’n un den hèr Finanzminister an un d’Chamber
translation.en: A proposition to the Finance Minister and the Chamber

translation.lb: Am moment, wo' eis steierverwaltong am gâng ass, den illégale krichsgewënn anzeze'en, erlaben de' ënnerzéchent sech, folgend propositio'n ze mâehen:
translation.en: At the moment, as our tax administration is busy prosecuting illegal war profits, the undersigned allow themselves to make the following proposal:

translation.lb: An alle vbrwaltonge so'tze warend dem krich leidd, de' vis-à-vis vun enger ganzer partie hirer collégen als chansard'e kenne betruecht gin.
translation.en: In all administrations, there were during the war individuals who, compared to many of their colleagues, could be considered fortunate.

translation.lb: Wârenddém de' eng /we'nt hirer patrioteschcr haltong alle me'gleche ehicanen ausgesat wonen, we': dienstenthiéwong, dégradatio'n, dienstverpflichtong an d'Reich, KZ oder emsiedlong, sin de' aner durch hirt mustergiiltegt bedroe net nemmen op hire poste gelöss gin, me si sin och nach an en he'ere grad befördert gin, wo'durch hinnen e se'er sensibele finanziellen avantage entstanen ass.
translation.en: While some, due to their patriotic stance, were subject to all kinds of adversities, like conscription, demotion, service obligations to the Reich, concentration camps, or relocation, others not only kept their positions thanks to their exemplary behavior but were also promoted to a higher rank, gaining a considerable financial advantage.

translation.lb: Zuni beispill bei der eisebunn sin eng ganz partie zuchführer zum oberzuchführer, lokführer zum obcrlokfiihrer, inspecteren zu oberinspecteren asw. avance'ert, an wecht wor de fall bei bal allen anere verwaltongen.
translation.en: For example, many train drivers were promoted to senior train drivers, locomotive operators to senior locomotive operators, inspectors to senior inspectors, and so forth, which was also the case in almost all other administrations.

translation.lb: Mir sin der ansieht, datt eso' e mehreinkommen integral als onrechtme'sseg erwuerbene krichsgewënn ze betruechten an anzeze'en ass.
translation.en: We are of the opinion that such income should be considered as illegally acquired war profits and be reported as such.

translation.lb: Iwregens huele mir un, datt en zimlech gro'sse prozentsaz vun dé betreffende sech eng e'er draus mécht, dem Staat freiwëlleg dat geld zur verfügong ze stellen, fir datt endlech de' krichsgeschiédegt zu hirem recht kommen.
translation.en: By the way, we assume that a considerable percentage of those concerned will see fit to voluntarily make this money available to the state so that the victims of the war can finally gain their rights.

translation.lb: Eng grupp steierzueler vu Pe'teng.

translation.lb: Un de’ hèren aus dem Comité Central vun der L. P. P. D.

translation.en: In the meeting on a Friday afternoon, the committee, with the exception of Mr. Albrecht naturally, decided to organize a demonstration in favor of Mr. Wingert and to call for the government's resignation.

translation.lb: We' dat nun ower komm ass, datt déselwechte comité (a wién?) durch de Radio muss bekannt gin, datt si neischt matt deser actio'n ze din hätten, dat ass e besehen onverständlech.
translation.en: How it has now come about that the same committee (and who?) has to announce over the radio that they had nothing to do with this action is somewhat incomprehensible.

translation.lb: Mir fuerderen opkle'erong durch d'press an durch de radio.
translation.en: We demand clarification through the press and through the radio.

translation.lb: Fir de' 500 ënnerzéchner vun der pétitio'n: s. Mme Arensdorff,

translation.en: Editorial rem: We have omitted from Mme Arensdorff's letter the passages that seemed of a more personal nature to us and do not directly relate to the explanation by the president of the L. P. P. D., which was published on Monday.

translation.lb: Ongarn Grenzen: D'grenzen tëschent Ongarn an E'streich a Jügoslawie bleiwe, we' se den 1. janùar 1938 béstanen hun.
translation.en: Hungarian Borders: The borders between Hungary and Austria and Yugoslavia remain as they were on January 1, 1938.

translation.lb: D'décisio'ne vun der Wiener conferenz virai 30. august 1940 sin als null erklärt an d'grenz, we' se den 1. januar 1938 tëschent Ongarn a Rumänien bestanen huet, get erem hirgestallt.
translation.en: The decisions of the Vienna conference before August 30, 1940, are declared null, and the border as it existed between Hungary and Romania on January 1, 1938, is reinstated.

translation.lb: D'grenz tëschent Ongarn a Russland gét un dém ponkt un, wo' des zwé Staate matt der Tschechoslowakei eng grenz bilden a verléft längs der aler grenz tëschent Ongarn an der Tschechoslowakei, we' se den 1. januar 1940 bestanen huet.
translation.en: The border between Hungary and Russia starts at the point where these two states form a border with Czechoslovakia and follows the old border between Hungary and Czechoslovakia, as it existed on January 1, 1940.

translation.lb: Weider gin d'décisio'ne vun'der Wiener conferenz vum 2. november 1938 als null erklärt an d'grenz tëschent der Tschechoslowakei an Ongarn vun dem ponkt u fixe'ert, wo' se E'streich bere'eren bis zu dem ponkt, wo' des zwé Staaten zesummen eng grenz matt Russland forme'eren.
translation.en: Further, the decisions of the Vienna conference of November 2, 1938, are declared null, and the border between Czechoslovakia and Hungary is fixed from the point where it touches Austria to the point where these two states together form a border with Russia.

translation.lb: (Desen text ass allerdéngs nach nemme provisoresch, bis datt d'Tschechoslowakei an Ongarn hir respeetiv standponkten op der friddenscoriferënz oder den ausseministere kloer gemach hun).
translation.en: (However, this text is still provisional until Czechoslovakia and Hungary have clarified their respective positions at the peace conference or at the foreign ministers).

translation.lb: Arnte': 65.000 mann; aviatio'n: 90 apparaten, vun denen der 70 chasseure kenne srriy gesamtpersonal fir d'aviatio'n: 5.000 ntann.

translation.lb: Rapport iwer d’nidderlag vun Anzio a Cassino
translation.en: Report on the defeat of Anzio and Cassino

translation.lb: An engem rapport un den état major liuet de marschall Lord Wilson de' zwo' délnidderlagen vun Anzio a Cassino ufanks 1944 analyse'ert.
translation.en: In a report to the command, Marshal Lord Wilson analyzes the two defeats at Anzio and Cassino at the beginning of 1944.

translation.lb: De Wilson kënnt dobei op de' vill discute'ert bombarde'erong vu Cassino ze spriéchen.
translation.en: Wilson speaks of the much-discussed bombing of Cassino.

translation.lb: Bei desem bombardement hu me' we' 1000 fiieger eng bommelâscht vu bail 1100 tonnen op d'stad erofgeheit.
translation.en: In this bombardment, more than 1000 aircraft dropped a load of nearly 1100 tons of bombs on the city.

translation.lb: Des ganz operatio'n huet 3 stonnen an eng hallef gedauert.
translation.en: The whole operation lasted three and a half hours.

translation.lb: Duerno go'f d'stad da nach 4 stonne läng vun der artillerie beschoss, wärend wellecher zeit 1200 granaten d'zill pifllonne'ert hun.
translation.en: Afterward, the city was shelled by artillery for another 4 hours, during which time 1200 shells hit the target.

translation.lb: Wcider héscht et am rapport vum Wilson:
translation.en: Further, it is reported in Wilson's account:

translation.lb: „Obschons ons infanterie hätt avance'ere kennen, wor et onme'glech hinnen tanken zur ënnerslëtzong mattzegin, well den terrain iwerall bommecratere vu 15 meter bréd, opgefëllt matt wâsser, opgewisen huet.
translation.en: "Although our infantry could have advanced, it was impossible to provide them with tank support because the terrain was riddled with bomb craters 15 meters wide, filled with water.

translation.lb: D'tanke konnten ere'scht 30 stonne me' spe't norécken, nodém den terrain vun de „bulldozers" derzo' virberéd gi wor.
translation.en: The tanks could only advance 30 hours later, after the terrain had been prepared by the bulldozers.

translation.lb: ° > Fir ons nidderlag get et verschidden Ursachen:
translation.en: There are various reasons for our defeat:

translation.lb: D'infanterie an d'tanke konnte net we' virgesin agreifen, gleich vun ufank un hu se verspe'dong kritt a schle'ssilech wor et hinne net me'glech d'zill vun der attack z'erréchen.
translation.en: The infantry and tanks could not attack as planned, they were delayed from the start, and ultimately it was impossible for them to reach the objective of the attack.

translation.lb: D'obstaceten, de' onst bombardement ervirgeruff hat, wore schwe'er ze huelen, weider hun d'schlecht wiéder so'we' d'hârt Tesistenz vum feind, verbonne matt der beschafong vum terrain, d'verdédegong begënschtegt.
translation.en: The obstacles created by our bombardment were difficult to overcome, furthermore, the bad weather and the enemy's hard resistance, combined with the terrain's nature, favored the defense.

translation.en: Despite everything, the enemy's efforts to destroy the bridgehead were made futile by the courage of the allied troops in those hard battles.
