translation.lb: D’russesch fuerderong op d’Dardanellen
translation.en: The Russian demand on the Dardanelles

translation.lb: Bekanntlech huet d'russesch regirong der tirkescher eng note geschéckt, an dèr si d'revisio'n vu gewësse klauseien am vertrag vu Montreux fuerderen.
translation.en: As is known, the Russian government sent a note to the Turkish, in which they demand the revision of certain clauses in the Treaty of Montreux.

translation.lb: Des note soll dem tirkeschen ausseminister nemmen e puer stonne virum oflafe vum délai, we' d'conventio'n e festgesat hât, iwerrécht si gin.
translation.en: This note was supposedly sent to the Turkish foreign minister only a few hours before the deadline set by the convention expired.

translation.lb: D'tirkeseh regirong huet sech direct versammelt fir stellong zur russescher fuerderong ze huelen.
translation.en: The Turkish government immediately convened to take a position on the Russian demand.

translation.lb: Russland fuerdert, datt d'Dardanellen vun tirkeschen a vu russeschen truppe controlle'ert misste gin.
translation.en: Russia demands that the Dardanelles be controlled by both Turkish and Russian troops.

translation.lb: Och d'engleseh regirong go'f vun der russescher fuerderong a kenntnes gesat.
translation.en: The English government was also informed of the Russian demand.

translation.lb: De vertrag vu Montreux ass seit 1936 a krâft an e regelt de schëfasrverke'er durch d'Dardanellen.
translation.en: The Treaty of Montreux has been in effect since 1936 and governs ship traffic through the Dardanelles.

translation.lb: Hién ass gëlteg bis zum 9. november 1956 also 20 joer lâng.
translation.en: It is valid until November 9, 1956, therefore for 20 years.

translation.lb: Mé et ass virgesin, datt no ail 5 joer no der ratifize'erong vum vertrag jidler signatärmacht en amendement abrénge ksnn, virausgesat, datt en 3 me'nt virum oflafe vun deser period vu 5 joer gestallt get.
translation.en: But it is foreseen that after every 5 years since the ratification of the treaty, each signatory power can introduce an amendment, provided it is submitted 3 months before the end of this 5-year period.

translation.lb: D'russesch regirong huet hir note de 9. august iwerrécht, also 3 me'nt virum oflafe vun der zwéter 5-joeresperiod.
translation.en: The Russian government submitted their note on August 9, thus 3 months before the end of the second 5-year period.

translation.lb: Et get ugeholl, datt elo eng versammlong vun aile signatärmächten ageruff get, un dèr och Amerika net awer Japan délhuelc wèrten.
translation.en: It is assumed that now a meeting of all signatory powers will be called, in which even America, but not Japan, is expected to participate.

translation.lb: Folgend länner hun de vertrag vu Montreux ënnerzéchent: Bulgarien, Frankreich, England, Griechenland, Japan, Rumänien, Tirkei, Russland a Jugoslawien.
translation.en: The following countries signed the Treaty of Montreux: Bulgaria, France, England, Greece, Japan, Romania, Turkey, Russia, and Yugoslavia.

translation.en: A risky operation, a young girl who has been blind for over 10 months, had to undergo an operation in a hospital in Manchester.

translation.en: The operation consisted of giving the girl the eyes of two other blind individuals, and this peculiar operation was so successful that the girl can not only see with the new eyes, but is even able to thread a needle.

translation.en: On July 12th, an American delegation from a relief organization was invited to Russia to ascertain on-site how the food supplies sent there over the past five years had been distributed.

translation.en: The Russian people want no new war, and they do not speak of war.

translation.en: Everywhere one hears of nothing but striving for peace.

translation.en: I mean here the Russian people, not the Russian politicians and diplomats.

translation.en: The Russians indeed have no surplus of food, but they seem to be well nourished with what they have.

translation.en: Decorating sweets: They should not only taste good but also look nice and appetizing.

translation.en: Every bought sweet is somehow artistically decorated.

translation.en: They are colored or lacquered, sprinkled, wrapped, and packaged.

translation.lb: Oft gin do chemesch produkte verbraucht, de' besonnesch der gesondhét vun onse kanner net grad profite'eren.
translation.en: Often, chemical products are used that are not particularly beneficial to the health of our children.

translation.lb: Verschidde vun déne versche'nerongsmethode sin an engem stôt net nozemâchen.
translation.en: Some of these decoration methods cannot be reproduced at home.

translation.lb: Do félt dat ne'degt handwiérksgeschir an dén erfuerderte geschéck.
translation.en: The necessary tools and required skill are lacking.

translation.en: Therefore, the sweets we make ourselves should not look clumsy or 'homemade.'

translation.en: There remain some simple and easy means with which we can help ourselves.

translation.en: Let's start with coloring.

translation.en: Let's move on to glazing.

translation.lb: Matt oder rauh schnékereien we' marzipan z. b., gin a gekachtem, eventuell gefiérwten zocker (4 grad) oder a caramelle-zocker (7 grad) gezappt an da gedréchent.
translation.en: Matte or coarse sweets like marzipan, for example, are dipped in boiled, possibly colored sugar (4 degrees) or caramel sugar (7 degrees) and then dried.

translation.lb: Eng duerch ro'sewâsser verdënnt marzipansmass égent sech och wonnerbar, fir ze versche'neren.
translation.en: A marzipan mass thinned with rose water is also wonderful for decorating.

translation.lb: De' a fro kommend se'ssegkéte gin einfach drageluecht.
translation.en: The sweets in question are simply incorporated.

translation.lb: (Gerappt mandelen a nëss, reng gemachte chocolat, cacao, gehakt a geschniddenen citronat, orangeat, kîschten asw. hëllefen, soss onopfälleg se'ssegkéten gefälleg mächen.
translation.en: (Grated almonds and nuts, pure made chocolate, cocoa, chopped and cut citronate, orange peel, cherries, etc., help make otherwise inconspicuous sweets appealing.

translation.lb: D'garne'ersprëtz ass besonnesch net ze verwerfen.
translation.en: The decorating syringe is especially not to be dismissed.

translation.lb: So' kann z. b. eng nougat-fëllong an d'dattele gesprëtzt gin, amplâz se nemme matt de fanger dran ze drécken.
translation.en: For example, a nougat filling can be injected into dates instead of just pressing it in with fingers.

translation.en: Finally, we have silver paper, cellophane, colored paper, paper cups for the treats, candy boxes, and clips that give our 'home production' a final touch.

translation.en: — The Bengal government states that the police were forced to use their weapons during incidents that broke out in the city and suburbs.

translation.en: Here, the victim count stands at 37 dead and a few injured.

translation.en: In Calcutta, 5 bombs exploded and 57 others were discovered in time by the police.

translation.en: Furthermore, 22 people were stabbed, and 8 others were burned with vitriol.

translation.en: Later, she had intimate relations with Goebbels in order to advance her career.

translation.lb: Ausseministerconferenz Jugoslawesch an italienesch kritik
translation.en: Foreign Ministers Conference Yugoslav and Italian criticism

translation.lb: De' 4 ausseministeren hu gëschter d'exposé'e vun der jugoslawescher delegatio'n an den italienesche vertriéder iwer de friddenvertrag matt Italien ugehe'ert.
translation.en: The 4 foreign ministers yesterday listened to the presentations of the Yugoslav delegation and the Italian representatives about the peace treaty with Italy.

translation.lb: D'jugoslawesch delegatio'n huet dobei eng se'er schärf stellong bezun an huet ail ponkte vum friddensvertrag, de' vun der Pareisser friddensconferenz décide'ert wore gin, kritize'ert.
translation.en: The Yugoslav delegation took a very sharp stance and criticized all points of the peace treaty that were decided by the Paris peace conference.

translation.lb: E commentator vun der ausseministerconferenz huet d'situatio'n, de' d'jugoslawesch delegatio'n doduerch geschaf huet, matt folgende wiérder charactérise'ert: „D'haltong vun der jugoslawescher delegatio'n huet erem ailes op d'kopp geheit."
translation.en: A commentator from the foreign ministers' conference characterized the situation created by the Yugoslav delegation with the following words: "The attitude of the Yugoslav delegation has turned everything upside down."

translation.lb: Allerdengs huet Jugoslawien e puer kleng modificatio'nen vu senger fre'erer ugeholl:
translation.en: However, Yugoslavia accepted a few minor modifications of its previous positions:

translation.lb: 1. d'rectificatio'n vun der grenzze'ong mam freistaat Triest, rectificatio'n, de' der franse'scher propositio'n entsprecht.
translation.en: 1. the rectification of the border demarcation with the Free State of Trieste, a rectification that corresponds to the French proposal.

translation.lb: 2. d'modificatio'n vum politesche statut vun Triest.
translation.en: 2. the modification of the political status of Trieste.

translation.lb: Des zwé zo'geständnesser sin allerdengs nemme vun ennergeuerdenter bedeitong, well si d'haltong vun den ausseministere guer net influenze'eren.
translation.en: These two concessions, however, are of minor importance, as they do not influence the stance of the foreign ministers at all.

translation.lb: Op der anerer seit hun d'vertriéder vun Italien eng me' allgemeng erklärong ofgin, an der och si d'décisio'ne vun der Pareisser conferenz krîtize'eren, de' si enner kengen emstänn unzehuele gewellt wiren.
translation.en: On the other hand, the representatives of Italy gave a more general statement, in which they also criticized the decisions of the Paris conference, which they were unwilling to accept under any circumstances.

translation.lb: D'italienesch vertriéder hun op dèr anerer seit zwo' concret propositio'ne gemâch:
translation.en: The Italian representatives, on the other hand, made two concrete proposals:

translation.lb: 1. e plébiscite an der Triester ge'- gend,
translation.en: 1. a plebiscite in the Trieste region,

translation.lb: 2. lângunhalend wirtschaftlcch ga-< rantie fir Italien.
translation.en: 2. long-term economic guarantee for Italy.

translation.lb: Em 12.30 auer woren d'italienesch vertriéder matt hiren aussoe fèrdeg.
translation.en: By 12:30, the Italian representatives had finished their statements.

translation.en: 2. the validity period of negotiable securities that have not been declared invalid and that are in foreign hands since the beginning of the war.

translation.en: 3. Revision of the judgments made by Italian courts against citizens of the allied nations.

translation.en: Three people could be detected in the vicinity of the plane.

translation.lb: Nobelpreis fir literatur -Hermann Hesse

translation.lb: De Nobelpreis fir literatur ass dem Peitschen Hermann Hesse, dén an der Schweiz liéwt, zo'gespraeh gin.

translation.en: He was first a mechanic and then a bookseller in Basel.

translation.en: But it was his novel "Peter Camenzind", which he published in the year 1901, that made him famous.

translation.lb: En huet dann historesch wirker geschriwen a sech matt der philosophie vum Orient befâsst.
translation.en: He then wrote historical works and engaged with the philosophy of the Orient.

translation.en: For our heavily affected village, these dates are important milestones on the path of reconstruction.

translation.en: Currently, the walls of the damaged Gilten and Rippinger and the house Steichen are being rebuilt.

translation.en: In the coming months, the work for various other constructions should be announced.

translation.en: Our heavily damaged school building is already under the roof and can be utilized in the summer.

translation.en: Hopefully, the reconstruction of our damaged church will soon be initiated to save it from complete decay.

translation.lb: Enegong iwer d’stellong vum polizeipresident vun Triest
translation.en: Discussion about the position of the police president of Trieste

translation.lb: D'ausscminister si sech an hirer sëtzong vu gëschter owend iwer d'stellong: vum polizeipresident vum freistaat Triest vis-à-vis vum gouverneur éneg gin.
translation.en: The foreign ministers discussed in their meeting last night the position: of the police president of the free state of Trieste in relation to the governor.

translation.lb: Verschidde modificatio'ne solle nach vun hire stellvertriéder ausgeschafft gin.
translation.en: Various modifications should still be worked out by their representatives.

translation.lb: No der décisio'n, de' zustand komm ass, soll de polizeichef aus de candidaten erausgewiélt gin, de' vum regirongsrot vun Triest virgeschloe wire gin.
translation.en: Following the decision that has been reached, the police chief should be selected from the candidates recommended by the governing council of Trieste.

translation.lb: E kann no berodongen am selwechte regirongsrot och erem ofgesat gin, wann dat erfuerdert soll gin.
translation.en: He can also be dismissed by the same governing council after consultations if that should be necessary.

translation.lb: D'stellvertriédend ausseminister versammele sech muer, fir dem gouverneur seng pouvoire festzesetzen.
translation.en: The deputy foreign ministers will meet tomorrow to determine the governor's powers.

translation.lb: Viléfeg nach keng nei deitsch währong Berlin.
translation.en: For the time being, no new German currency in Berlin.

translation.lb: — De chef vun der finanzabteilong virai allie'erte controllrot vu Berlin huet gëschter bekanntgemâch, datt eng nei deitsch währong virléfeg nach net geschaf get.
translation.en: The head of the financial department before the Allied Control Council of Berlin announced yesterday that for the time being no new German currency will be created yet.

translation.lb: Des déclaratio'n go'f de pressvertriéder an enger conferenz gemäch.
translation.en: This declaration was made to the press representatives at a conference.

translation.lb: Wann eng nei deitsch währong wirklech sollt agefo'ert gin, da ge'f et we'negstens nach e puer me'nt dauere bis et eso weit ass, sot de spriécher weider.
translation.en: If a new German currency were really to be introduced, it would take at least a few months until it is so far, the spokesman further said.

translation.lb: D'erklärong huet de spriécher am averständnes matt senge franse'schen, amerikaneschen a russesche College gemäch.
translation.en: The explanation was made by the spokesman in agreement with his French, American, and Russian colleagues.

translation.lb: Weider sot hién, d'mark misst erem gesond gin, datt sc enges dags dem dollar an dem pond sterling wirdeg entge'nt triéde kennt.
translation.en: He further said that the mark must become healthy again so that one day it can stand worthily against the dollar and the pound sterling.

translation.lb: De generol Marshall huet es genuch Nanking.
translation.en: General Marshall has had enough of Nanking.

translation.lb: — We' eng gudd ënnerrîcht chinesesch quell ze melle wéss, soll den anierikanesche generol Marshall, dén tëscht de kommunisten an der nationalregirong den intermédiaire gespillt huet, he'ge chinesesche cheffen erklärt hun, hié géng nach enn deses mo'nt an Amerika zréckgoen.
translation.en: According to a well-informed Chinese source, the American General Marshall, who acted as an intermediary between the communists and the national government, is reported to have informed Chinese leaders that he will return to America at the end of this month.

translation.lb: De'selwecht quell mellt och, datt den amerikanesche botschafter Leighton Stuart de'iselwecht absichten hätt.
translation.en: The same source also reports that the American ambassador Leighton Stuart has the same intentions.

translation.lb: Den départ vum generol Marshall ass gleichbedeitend domatt, datt d'amerikanesch regirong hir beme'ongen, d'nationaliste matt de kommunisten ze verse'nen, astellt, de' si am dezember IMS ugefâng hât.
translation.en: The departure of General Marshall signifies that the American government is ending its efforts to reconcile the nationalists with the communists, which it had started in December of last year.

translation.lb: Obschons den départ vum generol Marshall nach net offiziell ass, so' kënnt en dach an engem moment, wo' d'ofbriéchong vun de relatio'nen tëscht de kommunisten an der chinesescher regirong définitiv ass an domatt d'amerikanesch "misaio'n hir aufgab als gescheitert betruechte aus«.
translation.en: Although General Marshall's departure is not yet official, it comes at a time when the breakdown in relations between the communists and the Chinese government is definitive, and thus the American mission considers its task to have failed.

translation.lb: Versetzongen E'tor. — Den eisebunuassistent J. P. Conteir vun hei go'f den 1. november 1946 an dèrselwegler egenschaft no Lelzeburg versât.

translation.en: Mersch. — The railway assistant Guill. Muller from here has been transferred to Luxembourg and to the management of the C.F.L., service for the control of expenses.

translation.lb: Joresdâg vun de kämpf a Wien * Geseilter wor den 12. joresdag vun de kämpf, de' den 12. Februar 1934 zu Wien tëschenl den unhänger vum Dollfuss an den unhänger vun der republikanesch-democratescher partêi stattfond hun.
translation.en: Anniversary of the battles in Vienna * It was the 12th anniversary of the battles that took place on February 12, 1934, in Vienna between the supporters of Dollfuss and the supporters of the republican-democratic party.

translation.lb: Den e'streichesche ministerprésident Figl huet erklärt, datt d'familljen vun déne gefalenen eng extra ënnerstëtzong kre'gen.

translation.lb: Den D. T. Ho'wald huet missen op zwé senger beschter verzichten (Steinmetz, Schneider) a speziell d'féle vum Steimetz huet sech beim l'lo'wald bemierkbar gemât, an eso' könnt de P. P. L. ziemlech secher matt 8: 5 gewannen.
translation.en: D.T. Howald had to do without two of its best (Steinmetz, Schneider) and the absence of Steinmetz was particularly noticeable at Howald, thus enabling P.P.L. to win convincingly with 8:5.

translation.lb: Beim Ho'wald huet de Wiltzius seng rentré gefeiert an huet é gudde ândrock hannerloss, wärend de Lamesch scho besser gespült huet.
translation.en: At Howald, Wiltzius made his return and left a good impression, while Lamesch played better.

translation.lb: Beim sieger huet de Wilmes a Wirtz matt je 3 siegen ervirgestach.
translation.en: For the winners, Wilmes and Wirtz stood out with 3 victories each.

translation.lb: De match u sech huet bewisen datt hei ongefc'er de' am moment zwo' stärkst équipen aus dem land ge'nt en âner stongen, a matt vill Spannung get d'zesummentreffen vun dénen zwo' komplette mannschaften an dem e'schten offizielle match erwârd.
translation.en: The match itself proved that without a doubt, the two strongest teams in the country faced each other, and there is great anticipation for the encounter of these two complete teams in the first official match.

translation.lb: Hei d'technesch resultater: (d'spiller vum Ho'wald si virgenannt)
translation.en: Here are the technical results: (the players from Howald are named first)

translation.lb: P. P. Hesper — D. T. Ho ’wald 4: 8
translation.en: P. P. Hesper — D. T. Ho 'wald 4: 8

translation.lb: En donneschdeg den owend ass dé nei gegrënnten P. P. Hesper fir d’e’scht an d’offentlechkét getratt.
translation.en: On Thursday evening, the newly founded P. P. Hesper made its first public appearance.

translation.lb: Als e’schte ge’gner baten de’ Hesper de’ spillstärk zwét équipe vum Ho’wald invite’ert.
translation.en: As their first opponent, Hesper invited the strong second team from Ho'wald.

translation.lb: Hesper huet matt desem match e gro’sse publikumserfolg ze verzéchnen, dat beweisst, datt zu Hesper d’leidd sech vill fir dén hinne bis elo onbekannte sport interesse’eren, an de P. P. Hesper wert nach vill vun sech he’re lossen.
translation.en: Hesper recorded great public success with this match, proving that in Hesper, people are much interested in the sport that was previously unknown to them, and P. P. Hesper will continue to make a big impression.

translation.lb: Trotzdém datt den Ho’wald matt 8:,4 gewonnen huet, konnten de’ Hesper gudd gefälen.
translation.en: Despite Ho'wald winning with 8:4, Hesper managed to please.

translation.lb: Bei Hesper huet den Hilbert matt zwé siegen an de Krecké J. P. matt engem sieg é gudden androck hannerloss, speziell an der dubbel hun se gudd gefall ä konnten des no härdem kämpf gewannen.
translation.en: At Hesper, Hilbert with two victories and Krecké J. P. with one victory left a good impression, especially in the doubles they performed well and could win after a hard fight.

translation.lb: Beim Sieger könnt ganz épuiqe gefälen.
translation.en: The winner was particularly impressive.

translation.lb: Hei d’technesch resultater: (d’spiller vun Hesper si virgenannt)
translation.en: Here are the technical results: (the players from Hesper are named first)

translation.lb: Bâlkléder Jo, se sin erem do, de' sehe' bâlen, an de' läng kléder!
translation.en: Ball gowns, yes, they are back again, the beautiful balls, and the long dresses!

translation.lb: Zwar slét nach munchmol op den invitatio'nen, datt d'tenue de soirée net de rigueur ass...
translation.en: Though it sometimes still says on the invitations that evening attire is not required...

translation.lb: Mé wién, dén e längt kléd huet, ge'w et net fir eso' eng geléenhét undoen?
translation.en: But who, having a long dress, wouldn't wear it for such an occasion?

translation.lb: De' eng oder de' aner vun de joffere mécht sech sécher schwe'er suerge we'gens hirer soiréestoilette a wëllt vleicht dodurch net op de bâl goen, well se mengt hirt kléd war net modem genug.
translation.en: Some ladies might be quite worried about their evening attire and perhaps don't want to go to the ball because they think their dress is not modern enough.

translation.lb: Abé, le'w joffer, dèr suerg sidd Dir se'er enthuewenl
translation.en: But dear lady, you can dismiss that concern!

translation.lb: Modernise'ert Ert kléd ewe'neg, an Dir wärt gesin, datl Dir vill me' sche'n dra sitt ewe' virun 1940.
translation.en: Modernize your dress a little, and you will see that you look much more gorgeous than before 1940.

translation.lb: Schon eleng de' fréd, datt Dir selwer den arrangement fèrdeg bruecht an doduerch vill geld gespurt hutt, lfcht léch aus den aen eraus wann Dir dat transforme'ert kléd unhutt, a mécht léch vill me' le'w ewe' Er frëndinnen, de' z. b. well se mengen se sténge sech besser, e fonkelneit kléd vu Bre'ssel hun.
translation.en: The joy alone that you have completed the arrangement yourself and saved a lot of money shines from your eyes when you wear that transformed dress, and makes you much happier than your friends, who, for example, think they stand out better with a brand new dress from Brussels.

translation.lb: (Niéwebei bemierkt sin Er frëndinne keng gudd Lel7eburgerinne wann se an d'ausland kâfe gin.
translation.en: (By the way, your friends are not good Luxembourgers if they go shopping abroad.

translation.lb: Mir aner, mir bleiwen onse bra've geschäfter, de' am krich eso' vill fir de' Ietzeburger de' a no't wäre gemäch hun, an onse gudde ne'deschen a schneideren trei!)
translation.en: We, on the other hand, stick to our good shops, which did so much for the Luxembourgers in need during the war, and stay loyal to our good tailors and seamstresses!)

translation.lb: Et genügt z. b., datt Dir Ert âlt bâlkléd ve'ereckeg ausschneit an den décolleté matt paillette garne'ert, a schon ass aus dem âlen e neit gin.
translation.en: It's enough, for example, if you cut your old ball gown square and embellish the décolleté with sequins, and suddenly the old has become new.

translation.lb: An dobei könnt Dir da nach d'hëffe matt paillette besetzen an de' paillette bis ennen an d'jupe eso' verénzelt fâ'le lôssen.
translation.en: And with that, you can embellish the hips with sequins and let the sequins fall sporadically to the bottom of the skirt.

translation.lb: Dat méclit ganz chic.
translation.en: That looks very chic.

translation.lb: Fir ons sporllech jong médercher, de' mengen e längt kléd ge'w hirem genre guer net stoen, get eng flott chemisette recommande'ert, de' hinne jo schon oft complimenten abruecht huet, a bei des seide chemisette gel eng läng godés jupe aus carre'ertem taffeta gedroen.
translation.en: For our sporty young ladies who think a long dress does not suit their style at all, a nice blouse is recommended, which has already earned them many compliments, and with this silk blouse, they wear a long gored skirt made of checkered taffeta.

translation.lb: Des toilette ass och licht selwer ze mächen.
translation.en: This outfit is also easy to make yourself.

translation.lb: An Dir wärt emol gesin, sportsmédercher, we' flott datt se Iéch stét: fir an Iéch ze beissenl
translation.en: And you will see, sporty girls, how great it looks on you: to die for!

translation.lb: • Wat soso d'owendkléder ubelângt, do domine'eren d'drapéen, l)âl em d'schëlleren oder em d'broscht, em d'taille oder era d'hëffen; ganz weit jupe sin den hâptcharacleT vun den owendkléder vun deser saison.
translation.en: As for evening dresses, drapery dominates, whether around the shoulders or chest, waist, or hips; very wide skirts are the main characteristic of this season's evening dresses.

translation.lb: Durch fronsen, plien, godée get de gro'ssen tour errécht, den d'jupen ënnen hun.
translation.en: By fringing, pleating, and goring, the large circumference achieved, which the skirts have at the bottom.

translation.lb: De' kléder, de' de' vill fronsen an der taiHe hun, erëuneren un de' stil- Jcléder aus der Stuart- an rie-AnloinettezeiL
translation.en: The dresses with many fringes at the waist resemble the style of dresses from the Stuart and Marie-Antoinette era.

translation.lb: Den décolleté ass méschtens ve'ereckeg, awer och spatz an da ganz läng gezun; oder, wann d'kléder läng oder kurz xrem hun, get de neien ausschnëtt vill gemäch: trapezförmeg matt 3 spëtzen, eng no rechts an eng no lénks op der he'cht vum arem, an eng no ënnen, de' eventuell matt Olipsen oder schläppercher besät gin.
translation.en: The décolleté is mostly square, but also pointed and very long; or, if dresses have long or short sleeves, the new neckline is often made: trapezoidal with 3 points, one to the right and one to the left at the top of the arm, and one downwards, possibly decorated with clips or little bows.

translation.lb: Eso' e sche'nt weit längt kléd, e gudden dänzer a!s cavalier, da kënnt é schon an de' richteg bâlstëmmong.
translation.en: Such a beautiful wide long dress, a good dancer as a partner, and you're already in the right ball mood.

translation.lb: A wann dann och nach eng flott walz gespillt get... Claudine.
translation.en: And when then a wonderful waltz is played... Claudine.

translation.lb: Sport Cycle-Cross Cyclo-Cross zu Béteburg E sonndeg den 3. Februar organise'ert du Velo-Club „La VLteäse" Beteburg e cyclo-cross.
translation.en: Sport Cycle-Cross Cyclo-Cross in Beteburg On Sunday, February 3, the Velo-Club 'La Vltéäse' Beteburg is organizing a cyclo-cross.

translation.lb: Nom beschloss vum kongress vun der F. S. C. L. get desen cyclo-cross als championnat vu Letaeburg gezielt.
translation.en: According to the decision of the congress of the F. S. C. L., this cyclo-cross is considered the championship of Luxembourg.

translation.lb: D'streck, de' mer muer bekannt gin, huet 13 kilometer.
translation.en: The track, which will be announced tomorrow, is 13 kilometers long.

translation.lb: No desen umeldonge versprecht desen cycîo-cross en. interessante verlâf ze kre'en,
translation.en: Based on these registrations, this cyclo-cross promises to have an interesting course,

translation.lb: Me' an onser nommer vun e samschdeg.
translation.en: More in our issue on Saturday.

translation.lb: Et féhlt un zivilcourage
translation.en: There is a lack of civil courage.

translation.lb: Den Zivilcourage ass eng ganz spezifesch art vu courage.
translation.en: Civil courage is a very specific type of courage.

translation.lb: Et ass d'dugend, bei den zivilen an ëffentlechen affairen o'ni parti-pris an onparteiesch d'wo'recht ze soen, an zwar iwerall do, wo' se ze soen ass.
translation.en: It is the virtue of speaking the truth in civil and public affairs without bias and impartially, wherever it needs to be said.

translation.lb: Dat lèscht ass se'er wichteg, well et ass praktesch me'glech, d'wo'recht'net ganz ze soen o'ni dofir direkt brauchen ze le'en; dovun hate mer iwregens jo scho riéds.
translation.en: The latter is very important because it is practically possible to not fully speak the truth without directly having to lie; by the way, we have already spoken about this.

translation.lb: Et ass vleicht me'glech, datt mir ons iren, awer mir sin der fester ménong, datt de malaise am land zum gro'ssen dél op de manktem un Zivilcourage zréckzefe'eren ass.
translation.en: It is perhaps possible that we are mistaken, but we firmly believe that the unease in the country is largely due to the lack of civil courage.

translation.lb: Mer denken hei speziell un zwo' zorte vun Zivilcourage: den Zivilcourage vun denen, de' ënnert dem preiseschen terror d'pro'w bestan hun, an den Zivilcourage vun dénen, de' versot hun.
translation.en: We are specifically thinking of two types of civil courage: the civil courage of those who passed the test under Prussian terror, and the civil courage of those who failed.

translation.lb: Matt dem e'schten ass et net iwerall zum bèschte bestallt, a matt dém zwéte nach viH manner.
translation.en: With the first, it is not everywhere at its best, and with the second even less so.

translation.lb: Eigentlech miçst é sech bal wonneren, datt de', de' am krich courage bewisen liun — oder bewise wëllen hun, — haut läppen a sech hanner wueremstécheg excuse verschanzen.
translation.en: One might almost wonder that those who showed courage in the war — or wanted to show — now hide timidly behind lame excuses.

translation.lb: Lôsse mer ons gudd verstoenl Mir sin der ménong, datt recht recht ass an och soll bleiwenl A well dat ons iwerzégong ass, si mir derfir, datt d'onrecht gestroft get; a mir betruechten et duerfir net nemmen als d'recht, mé och als pflicht vun ail oprechte Letzeburger, datt hié ge'nt collaborateuren, de' sech.grav delikter zuschëlle komme gelôss hun, plainte arécht a üru gertcht der wo'recht entspriéchencf zeitl
translation.en: Let us be clear: We believe that right is right and should remain so! And because of this conviction, we are in favor of punishing injustice; therefore, we see it not only as the right but also as the duty of all honest Luxembourgers to file complaints against collaborators who have committed serious offenses and bring them to justice in a timely manner.

translation.lb: Leider ass dat nu net emmer de fall.
translation.en: Unfortunately, that is not always the case.

translation.lb: Et kennt allzevill das vir, datt plainten, de' onbedéngt misste gemach gin, net gemach gin, an et kennt weider zevill oft vir, datt vru gerîcht wuel net gelunn, awer trotzdém d'wo'recht net ganz gesot get.
translation.en: It happens far too often that complaints that absolutely should be made are not made, and it also happens far too often that in court, while not lying, the whole truth is nevertheless not told.

translation.lb: Et ass me'glech a wahrscheinlech, datt dorunner verschidden ursâche schold sin, awer grad de' direkt an indirekt hemmonge misst den Zivilcourage iwerwannen!
translation.en: It is possible and probable that various causes are to blame for this, but civil courage should directly and indirectly overcome them!

translation.lb: En zéchc vun Zivilcourage ass et och net, nodréglech iwer en urtèl ze krege'len, dat ze mëll ausgefall soll sin, wann é perse'nlech de courage net bât, de' plainte anzeréchen an ze bezeien, de' den délinquent wahrscheinlech am méschte belâscht hätt,
translation.en: It is also not a sign of civil courage to retrospectively complain about a verdict that was supposedly too lenient when one personally did not have the courage to file a complaint and testify, which would have likely been most incriminating for the delinquent.

translation.lb: — dat siéf en passant ail déne gesot, de' un ailes auszesetzen hun, awer beileiwe net de mutt och emol fir d'e'erlechkét a ge'mt d'one'erlecbkét anzetriéden, perse'nlech, offiziell an ëffentlech!
translation.en: — that is said in passing to all those who have something to criticize, but certainly do not have the courage to stand up for honesty and against dishonesty personally, officially, and publicly!

translation.lb: Manktem un Zivilcourage!
translation.en: Lack of civil courage!

translation.lb: Äwer och de' fre'er collaborateure weisen haut duerch d'bank nach net me' e'erleche weil we' démols an hirer glanzzeit.
translation.en: But even the former collaborators today display no more honesty than they did back in their heyday.

translation.lb: Mir wore nach niemols gesënnt, hinnen c'weg an én dag de bockel ze dreschen, nên, mer wären — nodéni se hir strof ofgesiéss an ofgeschafft hätten — cso'guer berét gewitscht, ze vergiéssen an se neischt me' fillen ze lôsse vun onsem fre'ere mépris, wann...
translation.en: We have never intended to beat them senseless from one day to another, no, we would have even been ready, after they had served and endured their punishment, to forget and no longer let them feel our previous contempt if...

translation.lb: Jo, wann se den Zivilcourage opbruecht hätten, hir strof als gerecht rechnong unz'erkennen a se net als ongerechte jugement taxe'ert hätten;
translation.en: Yes, if they had shown civil courage, acknowledged their punishment as a fair account, and not denounced it as an unjust judgment;

translation.lb: wa se sech net nach nodréglech als „onschëlleg verfollegt" opgespillt a matt impertinenter arroganz sech als hère vun der strôss am parademarsch virgefe'ert hätten..;
translation.en: if they had not later portrayed themselves as 'innocently persecuted' and with impertinent arrogance paraded themselves as masters of the street..;

translation.lb: De' fre'er collaborateuren, si fille sech nämlech haut nach bal me' we' gëscht als hère vun der situatio'n.
translation.en: The former collaborators, they indeed still feel almost more than yesterday like masters of the situation.

translation.lb: Gëscht hu se profite'ert vun der gestapoprotectio'n, haut wëlle se profite'ere vum gudde weil vun den e'erlfeche Letzeburger, de' berél wo reu ze verzeien an zc vergiéssen, wann...
translation.en: Yesterday they profited from Gestapo protection, today they want to profit from the benevolence of the honest Luxembourgers, who are willing to forgive and forget, if...

translation.lb: Jo, wann d'collaborateuren den Zivilcourage opbruecht hätten, hirt onreoht unz'erkennen an de wëll gewisen hätten, sech ze besseren.
translation.en: Yes, if the collaborators had shown the civil courage to acknowledge their wrongdoing and shown the will to improve.

translation.lb: Si hun dé courage net gewisen!
translation.en: They did not show that courage!

translation.lb: Wann e réckschlag kënnt, dann hu se sech selwer en zo'zeschreiwen.
translation.en: If a setback comes, they have only themselves to blame.

translation.lb: Hirem manktem un ziviler e'erlechkét!
translation.en: Their lack of civil honesty!

translation.en: K.

translation.lb: Indonesien England proteste'ert ge'nt d'beschëllegong vun der Ukraine, de' England der ameschong uklot.

translation.en: Brussels: The correspondent of the 'Daily Mail' in Sweden reports that a Swedish mission, comprised of four experts, has left Stockholm for London to purchase new English aircraft models with jet engines there.

translation.en: Tokyo: On the invitation of General Mac Arthur, high-ranking personnel from the American police will come to Japan to give lectures to the Japanese.

translation.en: Mr. Wilwertz argues that the planned legislations on war damage regulation and reconstruction must be coordinated.

translation.lb: Da z. Z. 4 Instanzen, nämlich die Staatliche Bauverwaltung, der Staatsbautendienst, das Generalkommissariat für den Wiederaufbau und die' Schöffenkollegien, für die verschiedenen Arten von Baufragen zuständig sind, sei es angebracht, für die Zeit der Bekonstruktion die betreffenden gesetzlichen Bestimmungen aufeinander abzustimmen, um so eine reibungslose Wietjeraufbauarbeit zu gewährleisten.
translation.en: Currently, four entities, namely the State Building Administration, the State Building Service, the General Commissariat for Reconstruction, and the Lay Judge Panels, are responsible for different types of construction issues, so it is appropriate to align the relevant legal provisions during the reconstruction period to ensure smooth reconstruction work.

translation.lb: Hr. Minister Krier befürwortet die Schaffung einer Spezialgesetzgebung über die Vereinfachung der Enteignungsprozedur, die durch die Verwirklichung der Urbanisierungspläne bedingt werde, denn der Wiederaufbau dürfe keinesfalls durch langwierige Prozesse verzögert werden.
translation.en: Minister Mr. Krier supports the creation of a special law to simplify the expropriation procedure, which is necessitated by the implementation of urbanization plans, because reconstruction must not be delayed by lengthy processes.

translation.lb: Der geplante Ausschuss für Streitsachen solle auch über alle diesbezüglichen Klagen und Beschwerden befinden; das in Ausarbeitung begriffene Vorprojekt werde demnächst dem Conseil Supérieur unterbreitet werden.

translation.lb: DE NÜRNBERGER PROZESS
translation.en: THE NUREMBERG TRIAL

translation.lb: Leningrad a Moskau sollte verschwannen
translation.en: Leningrad and Moscow were meant to disappear

translation.lb: * Et wor net ëmmer lîcht fir d'rîchteren am Nürnberger prozess z'ënnerschéden ënnert wat fir eng rubrik si de' énzel zerste'erongen, de' d'Preisen an den occupe'ert* lanner a gro'ssem môsstab durchgefe'ert hun, ze klasse'ere wären.
translation.en: * It was not always easy for the judges at the Nuremberg trial to distinguish under what category the individual destructions executed by the Germans in the occupied territories on a large scale should be classified.

translation.lb: Dat huet sech och an der 65. Verhandlung erausgestallt.
translation.en: This was also apparent at the 65th trial.

translation.lb: Et huet a rnunche fäll net Moer geschengt ze sin, ob gewëssen zerste'erongen op konto vun de krichsévénementer ze verbuche worcn, oder ob d'Preisen muddwëlleg zerste'ert hun.
translation.en: In some cases, it did not seem possible to ascertain whether certain destructions should be accounted as a consequence of war events or if the Germans destroyed deliberately.

translation.lb: An deser verhanddong go'w vum russeschen ukléer e film op d'weisst duch projecte'ert, dén zwar zersle'eronge vun de Preise gewisen huet net awer de motiv, fir wat si et gemâch hun.
translation.en: During this trial, a film was projected by the Russian prosecutor, which showed destructions by the Germans but did not reveal the motive behind their actions.

translation.lb: Awer dat huet de russeschen ukléer nogeholl a matt documenter bcluegt, de' d'sâch nëmmen ze vidi an dat richtegt flicht récken.
translation.en: But the Russian prosecutor supplemented this with documents that aimed to clarify things and put them in the right perspective.

translation.lb: Enner aneren huet en e befehl vum OKW un d'Heeresgruppe ord an un d'preisesch marine bei Leningrad, date'ert vum 29. 9. 41 torgefluegt.
translation.en: Among other things, he presented an order from the OKW to the army group order and to the German navy near Leningrad, dated 29th September 1941.

translation.lb: Doranner héscht et:
translation.en: In it, it states:

translation.lb: De Führer ass entschloss Leningrad dem erdbuedem gleichzemâchen, well eso' guer hei der eruewerong vun onsen truppen der fe'erong un engem fortbestand vun der stad net v ül me' leit.
translation.en: The Führer is determined to level Leningrad to the ground, because even here the capture by our troops does not guarantee the persistence of the city.

translation.lb: Den admirolsstaw huet op gewëssen instaldatio'nen a Leningrad opmirksam gemâch, de' d'preiscsch marine ganz gudd gebrauche kënnt, mé och des consideratio'n sa neischt um entschloss vum OKW ânneren.
translation.en: The admiral's staff made note of certain installations in Leningrad that the German navy could use very well, but these considerations did not change the OKW's decision.

translation.lb: Wat matt Leningrad (am befehl héscht et ëmmer Petersburg) gesche'e sollt, dat sollt och fir Moskau gellen, eso'guer wa be'd stiéd capitule'ere wellten.
translation.en: What was to happen with Leningrad (in the order it's always called Petersburg), should also apply to Moscow, even if both cities were willing to capitulate.

translation.lb: Fir ze beweisen, datt d'Preisen konschtgebeier muddwëlleg zerste'ert hun, huet de russeschen ukléer en zeie mattbruecht, dé bei der belagerong vu Leningrad an der stad geliéwt huet.
translation.en: To prove that the Germans intentionally destroyed cultural buildings, the Russian prosecutor brought in a witness who had lived in the city during the siege of Leningrad.

translation.lb: Hién hât niim'lech festgestallt, we' d'preisesch artillerie drop aus wor, fir de berühmte wanterpalast ze zerste'eren a we' si sech ageschoss huet, bis datt se matten an de palast geroden hun.
translation.en: He had observed how the German artillery was intent on destroying the famous Winter Palace and how they targeted it until they hit the middle of the palace.

translation.lb: Eng bréck ander ge'gend vum palast go'w doge nl nëmmen 1 mol getraff.
translation.en: A bridge nearby the palace was hit only once.

translation.lb: An der ganzer ge'gend v, ore keng fabreken a. e. w.
translation.en: In the entire area, there were no factories, etc.

translation.lb: Engem kreizverhe'er durch d'verdédegong huet den zeie standgehalen an durch seng logik d'ganz versammlong vun der muddwëlleger zerste'erongswut vun de Preisen iwerzégt.
translation.en: Despite a cross-questioning by the defense, the witness stood his ground and with his logic convinced the entire assembly of the deliberate destructive rage of the Germans.

translation.lb: En erbeute preisesche film huet den ugekloten an den ukléer gewisen, we' SS-männer an den iwerreschter vum zerste'erten duerf Lidice geschafft hun, fir all spuren ze verwëschen.
translation.en: A captured German film showed the defendants and the prosecutor how SS men worked in the remnants of the destroyed village of Lidice to erase all traces.

translation.lb: D’onro’en an Indien * Iwcrt dat thema huet gëschter den englesche Premierminister Attlee erklärongen ofgin.
translation.en: The unrest in India * Yesterday, the English Prime Minister Attlee made statements on this topic.

translation.lb: England, so' sot en, huet am räum vu Caratschi a Bombay genuch truppen zur verfligong fir datt et hèr iwer d'situatio'n kënnt gin.
translation.en: England, he said, has enough troops stationed around Karachi and Bombay to gain control over the situation.

translation.lb: Iwer d'meuterei vun den indesche marinen, get eng enquête durchgefe'ert.
translation.en: An investigation is being conducted into the mutiny of the Indian navy.

translation.lb: Jiddcfalls wäre virun der mcuterei keng fuerde„ronge vun de meuterer virbruecht gin.
translation.en: In any case, no demands were made by the mutineers before the mutiny.

translation.lb: Den Attlee bedauert et, datt et grad indesch matro'se sin, de' meuteren, well si enger flott ugehe'eren, de' am krich England eso' gudd dcngschter gelöscht hätt.
translation.en: Attlee regrets that it is Indian sailors, of all people, who are mutinying because they belong to a fleet that rendered such good service to England during the war.

translation.lb: D'meuterer wèrte schons no gudder iwerléong zum sehluss kommen, datt et dat beseht ass sech z'ergin.
translation.en: The mutineers will surely, after due consideration, come to the conclusion that it is best to surrender.

translation.lb: Virdrun awer misste ro' an uerdnong hirgestallt gin.
translation.en: However, first peace and order must be restored.

translation.lb: Zu Bombay gin d'zwësehefâll virun.
translation.en: In Bombay, the incidents continue.

translation.lb: D'populatio'n huet sech zu gonschte vun de meuterer ausgesprach.
translation.en: The population has expressed support for the mutineers.

translation.lb: E chef vun der indescher congresspartei huet eng riéd un d'meuterer gehalen an si opgefuerdert hir Waffen nidderzeléen.
translation.en: A leader of the Indian Congress Party gave a speech to the mutineers, urging them to lay down their arms.

translation.lb: Radio Nei Deihi huet gemellt, datt op enger plaz d'fe'rer vun der meuterei desem rot gcfollegt sin, hir waffe niddergeluegt hun a wëlles hun hiren dengscht erem opzehuelen.
translation.en: Radio New Delhi reported that in one place the leaders of the mutiny followed this advice, laid down their arms, and intend to resume their duties.

translation.lb: Amtlech communiquéen iwer d'verloschter, de' durch des meutereien entstâne sin, si nach keng bekanntgemâch gin.
translation.en: Official communications about the losses caused by these mutinies have not yet been announced.

translation.lb: No inoffizielle norichten solle bis elo 18 perso'nen den do't fond hun, 2S0 sollen der blesse'ert gi sin.
translation.en: According to unofficial reports, so far 18 people have been found dead, 250 are said to have been wounded.

translation.lb: Englesch verstärkongen a form vun artillerie a panzeren sin ënnerwé.
translation.en: English reinforcements in the form of artillery and tanks are on the way.

translation.lb: Am hafe vu Bombay sin d'kano'- nen vun de rebellesche flottcnénhéten op hafen a stad gertcht.
translation.en: In the harbor of Bombay, the cannons of the rebel fleet units are directed at the harbor and city.

translation.lb: D'Englänner hun iwer Bombay en ansganksverbued vu 15 dég verhängen.
translation.en: The English have imposed a 15-day entry ban on Bombay.

translation.lb: An der ge'gend vu Caratschi huet eng flottenénhét no engem artillerie a loftbombardement, dat 25 minutten gedauert huet, sech missen ergin.
translation.en: In the Karachi area, a fleet unit had to surrender after a 25-minute artillery and aerial bombardment.

translation.lb: An enger anerer ge'gend op der ostküst vun Indien, hu 600 matro'sen den dengscht versot.
translation.en: In another region on the east coast of India, 600 sailors refused to perform their duties.

translation.lb: Holland e'ert seng heroesch resistenz
translation.en: Holland honors its heroic resistance

translation.en: in Amsterdam, March 1, 1946.

translation.lb: Frankreich, Belgien, Dänemark a Letzeburg hun der Ouverture vun der gro'sser ausstellong „Weerbare Démocratie" beigewunnt.
translation.en: France, Belgium, Denmark, and Luxembourg attended the opening of the large exhibition "Resistant Democracy."

translation.lb: D'diplomaten vun Amerika, England, der Tschechoslowakei, Dänemark, Frankreich a Belgien hun un der offizieller feier délgeholl.
translation.en: The diplomats from America, England, Czechoslovakia, Denmark, France, and Belgium participated in the official ceremony.

translation.lb: Den hollänncsche ministerpresi<lent, den hèr professer Schermerhorn, huet ducrch seng eröffnongsusprôch virun dausenden resistenzler den zweck vun der aussteMong duergeluegt an iwer d'resistcnz an Holland an allen âueren ënnerdreckte länner geschwât.
translation.en: The Dutch Prime Minister, Mr. Professor Schermerhorn, explained the purpose of the exhibition in his opening speech before thousands of resistors and spoke about the resistance in Holland and all other oppressed countries.

translation.lb: D'massacren vun Rotterdam an Amsterdam, d'heroesch resistenzactio'nen zu land an um svâsser go'wen dein hollännesche voMek duerch dokumentaresch biller a pholo'en virgcfo'ert.
translation.en: The massacres of Rotterdam and Amsterdam, the heroic resistance actions on land and water, were presented to the Dutch people through documentary pictures and photos.

translation.lb: D'millio'nestâd Amsterdam am trauer fir seng nafional-helden, de gro'sse conseil vun der holläncscher resistenz uu der spëtzt d'hollännesch regirong, e'eren virum ganze land d'resistenz vum ënnerdreckten Europa.
translation.en: The metropolis of Amsterdam mourns its national heroes, with the great council of the Dutch resistance at the forefront, the Dutch government honors the resistance of oppressed Europe before the entire country.

translation.lb: H'Ietzeburger resistenzdelegatio'n go'f offiziell vum hollännesche slaatsminisler a vun der regirong empfang.
translation.en: The Luxembourgish resistance delegation was officially received by the Dutch state minister and the government.

translation.lb: E gené e rapport an onscr nèxter nummer.
translation.en: A detailed report will follow in our next issue.

translation.lb: CHINA Tschungking: D'kommunistesch zeidong „Hsin-Houa-Jih-Pao" confirme'ert trotz dem démenti vu regirongskréser, datt an der Mandschurei de 14. dézember 1945 29 kommunisten erschoss wire gin.
translation.en: CHINA Chongqing: The communist newspaper "Hsin-Houa-Jih-Pao" confirms, despite denials from government circles, that in Manchuria on December 14, 1945, 29 communists were shot.

translation.lb: Datselwecht blad versechert, datt de generol Tu Li Min, de commandant vun de regirongstruppen an der Mandschurei, den 30. januar 8 agente vum lcommunistesche propagandadengscht ersche'sse gelôss huet.
translation.en: The same paper assures that General Tu Li Min, the commander of the government troops in Manchuria, ordered the execution of 8 agents of the communist propaganda service on January 30.

translation.lb: Weider solle 16 aner agenten agespart si gin.
translation.en: Furthermore, 16 other agents are said to have been imprisoned.

translation.lb: Wat matt hinne geschitt ass, ass nach net bekannt.
translation.en: What has happened to them is not yet known.

translation.lb: Dat elei an dat elo.
translation.en: This back then and this now.

translation.lb: ’ T kënnt é bal mengen, ’ t wär net me ’ glech, an dach.
translation.en: One could almost think it's not the same, and yet.

translation.lb: Gëschler muerend ko'm ech zo'- fälleg eppes me' fre' duerch d'nei avenue, et war 'AS, do kënnt jo en trapp gcfânge Preise gewenzelt.
translation.en: Yesterday morning I happened to go through the new avenue, and lo and behold, a group of captured Prussians came along.

translation.lb: We' et sech jo gehe'ert, sin de'selwecht an der rei spaze'ert, nëmmen net grad a'M, well um lénken trëttoir, ech wollt mengen aen net trauen, bonzele gemittilech zwé feldgroer an hu gete'nt, datt d'trommelfell engem bal geplatzt ass.
translation.en: As it should be, they walked in line, just not in step, because on the left sidewalk, I could hardly believe my eyes, two officers strolled leisurely and were shouting so loudly that one’s eardrums almost burst.

translation.lb: (Neischt fir ongudd, 't war jo nach emmer hir mane'er).
translation.en: (No offense, it was still their manner).

translation.lb: Ech kucken nach ne' gené, well ech duecht, 't kënnt net me'glech sin, a sche'n hun u jépercher P. W. um réck sloen.
translation.en: I looked again closely because I thought it couldn't be possible, and they cheerfully patted a certain P. W. on the back.

translation.lb: Du hun ech un de' zeit zréckgeduecht, wo' d'bonzen nach hei waren an ons jongcn, de' wirklech neisch' verbrach haten, duerch d'avenue gefo'ert si gin a rei a glidd, zerfatzt, zerlompt a neischt am leiw, de' hèren hei natirlech waje glat rase'ert, flott gekléd a binetten, et huet é gemengt, si ge'wen ail muerges frësch opgepompelt gin.
translation.en: Then I thought back to the time when the big shots were still here, and our young men, who had really committed nothing wrong, were driven through the avenue in line, tattered, ragged and with nothing on their bodies, while the gentlemen here were, of course, smoothly shaven, well-dressed and polished, it seemed they were freshly inflated every morning.

translation.lb: Nén, da verwonnere mir ons nach, wa geklaut, gerawt a gemeutert get, dat ass dach de' firma, de' des kre'llen an hirem rasseschen deitsche blutt fle'ssen huet.
translation.en: No, then we are surprised when there is stealing, robbing and murdering, after all, this is the company that has these traits flowing in their racial German blood.

translation.lb: De Jißo.
translation.en: The Jesus.

translation.lb: Kurz bemiérkt: — Am mëttelmier bleiwe nach 50.000 minen, am Aegäesche mier ongefe'er 10.000 opzeraumen.
translation.en: Briefly noted: — In the Mediterranean Sea, there are still 50,000 mines to clear, approximately 10,000 in the Aegean Sea.

translation.lb: — No kuerzer zeit sollen d'international postverbindonge matt Deitschland nés opgeholl gin.
translation.en: — Soon, international postal connections with Germany should be resumed.

translation.lb: — No der New York Herald Tribune soll fir 1950 den dictionnaire matt allen afrikaneschen dialekte fèrdeg gestallt gin.
translation.en: — According to the New York Herald Tribune, by 1950, the dictionary with all African dialects should be completed.

translation.lb: — Zu Wien ass dem britesche commandant vun den occupatio'nstruppe seng Daimler-luxmaschin geklaut gin.
translation.en: — In Vienna, the Daimler luxury car of the British commander of the occupation troops was stolen.

translation.lb: D'maschin soll zu Budapest geland sin, fir do am Schwärzhandel ofgesat ze gin.
translation.en: The car is said to have ended up in Budapest to be sold on the black market there.

translation.lb: — England wëllt dest joer 2,5 millio'ne velo'e fabrize'eren.
translation.en: — England intends to manufacture 2.5 million bicycles this year.

translation.lb: Zwé drëttel sin der fir den export bestëmmt, Frankreich eleng huet eng commande vun 20.000 stéck opgin.
translation.en: Two-thirds are intended for export, with France alone having placed an order for 20,000 units.

translation.lb: — A Japan fannen d'wahle net den 31. märz, mé den 10. abrël statt.
translation.en: — In Japan, the elections are not taking place on March 31 but on April 10.

translation.lb: — No enger rés vun 2 woche sin de' e'scht Franso'sinnen, de' matt amerikaneschen zaldote bestuedt sin, zu New York ukomm.
translation.en: — After a journey of 2 weeks, the first French women married to American soldiers have arrived in New York.

translation.lb: — De generol Anders get zu London erward, fir matt den engleschen autorite'ten iwer d'zo'konft vun der polnescher arme' ap Italien ze diskute'eren.
translation.en: — General Anders is expected in London to discuss with the English authorities the future of the Polish army in Italy.

translation.lb: — Den Tamborini ass iwerzégt, datt seng partei an den argentinesche wähle gewonnen huet.
translation.en: — Tamborini is convinced that his party has won in the Argentine elections.

translation.lb: D’indesch zwëschefäll am englesche parlament
translation.en: The Indian incidents in the English parliament

translation.lb: De Premierminister Atllee huet am parlament erklärongen ofgin iwer d'onro'en an Indien.
translation.en: Prime Minister Attlee has given explanations in parliament about the unrest in India.

translation.lb: En huet zo'gesot, datt eng grëndlech ennersichong iwer d'ursâch vun de rebellio'nen, den urspronk vun der disciplinlo'segkét an iwer d'reolamatio'nen vun den indeschen offize'eren agelét get.
translation.en: He said, so to speak, that a thorough investigation into the causes of the rebellions, the origin of the lack of discipline, and the complaints of the Indian officers has been initiated.

translation.lb: Des ennersichong get vun engem ausschoss durehgefe'ert, dé vun der indescher regirong ernannt get.
translation.en: This investigation is being conducted by a committee appointed by the Indian government.

translation.lb: D'onro'en zu Bombay sin eso'- wuel vun de gheffen vun der congresspartei we' vun dénen vun der Moslemliga verurtélt gin.
translation.en: The unrest in Bombay has been condemned both by the leaders of the Congress Party and those of the Muslim League.

translation.lb: Am allgemengen ass d'situatio'n an Indien 6lo ro'eg, bis op Madras, wo' 10 000 leidd en expresszuch ophale wollten.
translation.en: In general, the situation in India is now calm, except in Madras, where 10,000 people tried to stop an express train.

translation.lb: Si go'wen awer vun der polizei, de' hir waffen huet misse gebrauchen, verdriwen.
translation.en: However, they were dispersed by the police, who had to use their weapons.

translation.lb: t REQUIEM En donneschdeg, den 28. februar, em 10 auer, lôssen d\,Unio'n" an d'ligue „Ons Jongen" vu Letzeburg- Gare an der Herz-Jesu-kirch e feierleche Requiem liése fir ail ons victime vum krich.
translation.en: REQUIEM On Thursday, February 28, at 10 o'clock, 'Union' and the league 'Our Boys' from Luxembourg-Gare will have a solemn Requiem read in the Sacred Heart Church for all our victims of the war.

translation.lb: Gleichzeiteg denke mir un all ons vermësste leidd.
translation.en: At the same time, we remember all our missing loved ones.

translation.en: PROTEST ... further dispositions align with: Municipality of Flaxweiler.

translation.lb: Resolutio ’n Mir verlangen:
translation.en: Resolution, We demand:

translation.lb: 1. D'ausfc'erong vun de gesetzer eso' we' se "um gouvernement vu London aus proiiame'ert si gin.
translation.en: 1. The implementation of the laws as they were proclaimed by the government in London.

translation.lb: 2. Datt endlecb éncrgesch mesiiren ergraff gin ge'nt d'collaborateureu an d'landesverre'der, de' clo erem matt der gleicbcr frcchbét wc' am krieb secb an der ëffcnliccbkét bewegen an domalt d'ménong vun alle gudde Letzeburger provoze'ercn.
translation.en: 2. That finally energetic measures are taken against collaborators and traitors to the country, who still move in public with the same brazenness as during the war, thereby provoking the opinion of all good Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: 3. Direct ausweisong vun allen nazicn a faschisten aus dem land, an zo'gleich d'anze'ong vun hircin gesamte verme'gen.
translation.en: 3. Direct expulsion of all Nazis and Fascists from the country, and at the same time seizure of all their assets.

translation.lb: 4. Direct entze'ong vu geschäftsan handeisermächtegonge vun de nazi- a faschislen-auslänner an uschie'ssend vun aile Letzeburger verre'dcr.
translation.en: 4. Direct revocation of business and trading powers of Nazi and Fascist aliens and those of all Luxembourger traitors.

translation.lb: 5. Eriâssong an iwcrfe'erong vu sämtleche wlrtscbafts-collaborateuren an anze'nng vun hirem gesamte kricbsgcwënn.
translation.en: 5. Arrest and prosecution of all economic collaborators and confiscation of their entire war profits.

translation.lb: F An de'wer trauer déle mir alle verwandte, frënn a bekannte matt, datt de' stiérwlech iwerrèschtervu mengem mann, onsem le'we jong, brudder, enkel, edem, schwoer, neveu, monni a coseng, dem hèr Nicolas BETZ mann vum Maria Uaupert,'a seng hémecht erembruecht si gi fir hei hir lèscht ro' ze fannen.
translation.en: In deep mourning, we share with all relatives, friends, and acquaintances that the mortal remains of my husband, our dear son, brother, grandson, godson, brother-in-law, nephew, uncle, and cousin, Mr. Nicolas BETZ, husband of Maria Haupert, have been brought back home to find their final rest here.

translation.lb: Hién ass am alter von 28 joer den 3. September 1942 zu Hinzert matt nach 8 komerôde vum Standgericht fir seng hémecht erschoss gin.
translation.en: He was executed at the age of 28 on September 3, 1942, in Hinzert with 8 comrades by the court-martial for his homeland.

translation.lb: D'begriéwnesfeier war e sonndeg zu Letzeburg um kirfecht Notre-Dame.
translation.en: The funeral service was on a Sunday in Luxembourg at the Notre-Dame cemetery.

translation.lb: De leichendengscht ass e samschdeg, de 16. März em 10 auer zu Köhler.
translation.en: The memorial service is on a Saturday, March 16, at 10 o'clock in Köhler.

translation.lb: An de'wer trauer: D'madame Betz-Haupert, den hèr an d'madame Nie. Betz-Reisdorf, den hèr Alfred Betz, den hèr J. P. Betz, d'madame veuve Haupert-Becker, hir kanner, kannskanner au d'ganz familjen.
translation.en: In deep mourning: Mrs. Betz-Haupert, Mr. and Mrs. Nie. Betz-Reisdorf, Mr. Alfred Betz, Mr. J.P. Betz, Mrs. widow Haupert-Becker, her children, grandchildren and the entire families.

translation.en: It can calmly be regarded as an event in sports because we have some people here who can quietly make an international appearance.

translation.en: The entire excitement culminates in the duel Schmit Nie-Heirendt and in the rivalry between Dudelange and Schifflange for the club championship.

translation.en: Last Sunday, Schmit managed to clearly beat Heirendt and the Dudelange team celebrated a narrow point victory against Schifflange.

translation.en: The gas company of Dudelange informs its consumers that due to an operational repair, which cannot be further postponed in the interest of a regular gas supply next summer, it is compelled to slightly restrict the gas delivery from Monday, March 4th, for approximately 3 weeks.

translation.en: Normal pressure is only available in the morning from 5—8, midday from 11—3, and evenings from 6:30—8 o'clock.

translation.lb: We'nt dénen domatt verbonnene geforen ass et verbueden, ausser déne genannte stonnen d'gaskrunnen opzemâchen an ze versieben, gas ze benotzen.
translation.en: Due to the dangers associated with this, it is forbidden to open and use the gas taps outside the specified hours.

translation.lb: D'gaswiérk hofft, datt seng konsumenten verständnos opbréngen fir eng situatio'n, de' durch de krich entstânen ass an durch d'spuersamkét um verbrauch derzo' beidroen, datt d'iiwerong wärend de genannte stonnen oprecht erhâle ks gin.
translation.en: The gas company hopes that its consumers understand a situation caused by the war and will contribute to maintaining supply during the specified hours through economical consumption.

translation.lb: Duerhalen Mir wëssen, datt et leidd get.
translation.en: Repeating, we know that there is suffering.

translation.lb: de 1 de mond kromm ze'en, wa vun der Vnlo'nszeidong riéds ass.
translation.en: They twist their mouths when speaking of the Unionszeitung.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, datt et der nach cmmer gel, de' hoffen, matt der zeit ge'w et och „emol nés anescht gin".
translation.en: We know that there are always those who hope that with time, things might once again change.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, datt d'zuel vun denen all dag zo'zehuelen drét, de' — egal aus wellechen Ursachen — sech matt der iddi Tum..grand pardon" famillarise'eren.
translation.en: We know that the number of those is increasing daily, who — regardless of the reasons — become familiar with the idea of a 'grand pardon.'

translation.lb: Awer mir si net op d'frëndschaft ru gewësse leidd aus, déne mer nemme gefaie ge'wen, wa mer e we'neg manuer nom gruedgewuessene letzeburger schniéwel peife géngen.
translation.en: But we do not seek the friendship of certain people whom we would only please if we were somewhat more in tune with the straightforward Luxembourgish style.

translation.lb: Mir gesln et als ons flicht un, de' douce hoffnong op e „retour des choses" matt dèr ons nnn émoi ugcbuerener clefanteplompbét ze zertrampelen.
translation.en: We see it as our duty to crush the sweet hope of a 'return of things' with our newly born clumsy determination.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, datt d'gro'ss mas« vuu de Letzeburger neischt vun engem allgcmenge pardon he'ere wëiit.
translation.en: We know that the great mass of Luxembourgers wants nothing to do with a general pardon.

translation.lb: Ons zeidoug ënnerstëtzt dofir réckbaltlo's ail bestriéwongen, fir endlecb propperen dësch zc man ënncrt déncn.
translation.en: Our newspaper supports all efforts unreservedly to finally make a clean slate among those.

translation.en: It is often said: They should stop with the eternal quarreling, so that peace may come to the country.

translation.en: The more we are spread, the stronger influence we have on public opinion, and the better we can assert our ideas.

translation.en: We bring here all kinds of important information for our sports fans who will watch the international match Luxembourg—Holland.

Dezember 1944, am schc'nsten alter vu 25 joer.
translation.en: Hard and bitter is the news, unfortunately, to share that our dear, unforgettable young man, brother, nephew, and cousin Nicolas OSWALD had to leave his young life for homeland and family, during a bombing at the concentration camp of Wiesbaden, on December 18, 1944, at the beautiful age of 25 years.

translation.lb: "D'iwerfe'erong vun der leich an d'begricwnes matt leichendengscht sin zu STENDEFORT, de 27. tebruar 1946, em 8,45 auer mueres.
translation.en: "The transfer of the body and the burial with funeral service is in STENDEFORT, on February 27, 1946, at 8:45 in the morning."

translation.en: In grief: Mrs. Emile Oswald-Frisch; Mr. René Oswald; Mr. Albert Oswald; his fiancée and the whole family.
