translation.lb: Tagong vun de Liberalen Regirongscrise ongele ’ st (vun on sem correspondent) Bre ’ssel Gewehter muergen ass de congress vun der liberaler partei zu llre'ssel ofgehale gin.
translation.en: Report of the Liberal Government Crisis addressed (by our correspondent) Brussels Yesterday morning the congress of the liberal party was held in Brussels.

translation.lb: De congress huet den entschéd vum büro nëmmen délweis oprecht gehal, andern en d'bedélegong un enger leuksregirong net me' kalegoresch of- Ichnt.
translation.en: The congress only partially upheld the decision of the bureau and no longer categorically rejected participation in a coalition government.

translation.lb: Allerdengs huet en éstëmmeg d'propositio'nen vum P. H Spuak zréckgcwisen, an et fret c sech, we' de Spaak eilo nach e kabinett bilde kann.
translation.en: However, they unanimously rejected the proposals of P. H. Spaak, and the question arises as to how Spaak can now form a cabinet.

translation.lb: No enger ver.sammmong vun der sozialistescher partei geseilter mëtteg, op der de refus vun de liberale besprach gin ass, huet de Spaak erklärt, hié ge'w trotz allem eng regirong op d'beu setzen an zwar aus sozialistcsche politiker a neutrale fachleidd, an hién huet de journaliste versprach, hinnen d'le'song vun der crise an -18 stonne maltzedélen.
translation.en: After a meeting of the socialist party that afternoon, where the liberals' refusal was discussed, Spaak declared that he would nevertheless set up a government consisting of socialist politicians and neutral experts, and he promised journalists to announce the solution to the crisis within 18 hours.

translation.lb: Aus desen erkläronge gét ervir, dalt de Spaak op d'inaUarbechl vun de kommuniste verzieht huet, an eflo nach hofft, d'liberal heiduerch op seng seit ze kre'en.
translation.en: From these statements, it appears that Spaak has refrained from involving the communists and still hopes to bring the liberals to his side in this way.

translation.lb: Wc' hié sech aillerdengs eng ofstëmmong an der Chamber an am Senat virslellt, bleiwt ofzewarden.
translation.en: How he envisions a vote in the Chamber and Senate, however, remains to be seen.

translation.lb: Do P. S. C. ass iwerzécht, datt de gre'ssten dél vun de fachleidd aus frc'ere Politiken zesummegesat ass, an datt d'UDB crem soll erugezu gin.
translation.en: The P. S. C. is convinced that the majority of the experts are composed of former politicians, and that the UDB should be brought in.

translation.lb: An dem fall wir d'stpllong vum PSC vu virerof festgduecht.
translation.en: In that case, the PSC's position would be predetermined.

translation.lb: Enncr dem litel „M. Spaak voudrait-il duper le Suffrage Universel?" hëMt d'Nation Belge schärf heizo' stellong.
translation.en: Under the headline "M. Spaak, would you deceive the Universal Suffrage?" the Belgian Nation takes a sharp stance.

translation.lb: Si mengt zwar am e'schien dc4 vun hirem artikefl, de bemc'onge vum belschcn ausseminister wir net vitl bedeilong beizemiéssen, well si vu virerof e Fiasko misste gin, gét e we'neg weider dann awer ausfe'erlech drop an an erkennt un, datt eng le'song ,vun der crise dach me'glech wir.
translation.en: They opine, although at the beginning of their article, that the remarks of the Belgian Foreign Minister should not be afforded much importance, as it would inevitably lead to a failure, but they then elaborate extensively and acknowledge that a solution to the crisis might indeed be possible.

translation.lb: D ’ Queen Elisabeth a flamen *
translation.en: The Queen Elisabeth in flames *

translation.lb: Virun enger woch ass gcincllt gin, Scotland Yard ge'w juegd mächen op eng gangsterband, de' syslemalesch gro'ss englesch scheffer sabote'ere ge'w, fir d'britesch scemuecht sei schwächen.
translation.en: A week ago, it was announced that Scotland Yard would hunt a gang that systematically sabotages large English ships to weaken the British fleet.

translation.lb: Elo huet och feier sech op der „Queen Elisabeth" dcölare'ert, an zwar fir d'e'scht am schëffsspidol.
translation.en: Now, a fire broke out on the 'Queen Elisabeth', first in the ship's hospital.

translation.lb: D'pompiéen hu gleich agegraff, a no e puer stonnen haten si d'feier gelëscht.
translation.en: The firefighters intervened immediately, and after a few hours, they extinguished the fire.

translation.lb: De schued ass ne ganz bedeitend.
translation.en: The damage is not very significant.

translation.lb: D'„Queen Elisabeth" lug am hafe vu Southampton, we' d'feier ausgebrach ass.
translation.en: The 'Queen Elisabeth' was docked in the port of Southampton when the fire broke out.

translation.lb: D'schëff, dat bis elo zatdoten transporte'crt huet, soll l a nèxter zeit dcmobilise'ert gin an der zivilschëffahrt nés zo'gestatlt gin.
translation.en: The ship, which has so far been used for troop transport, is to be demobilized shortly and then used for civilian shipping again.

translation.lb: Dest ass de 6. fall vu feierausbréch op englesche schëffer.
translation.en: This is the 6th case of fires breaking out on English ships.

translation.lb: Den direcler vun der Cunard Line huet zwar behapt, dese virfall hâtt neischt matt sabotage te din.
translation.en: The director of the Cunard Line claimed that this incident had nothing to do with sabotage.

translation.lb: Trotzdem befâsst sech d'polizei matt der opklärong.
translation.en: Nevertheless, the police are dealing with the investigation.

translation.lb: Et get vun engem bre'f geschwat, dé viru kurzer zeit un eng zeidong gericht go'w a wo' dra behapt go'w, datt op engem gewëjsse schëff bei senger ausfahrt feier ausbriéche ge'w, wat du och zo'getraff huet.
translation.en: There is talk of a letter that was recently sent to a newspaper, claiming that a fire would break out on a certain ship upon its departure, which then actually happened.

translation.lb: D'polizei fuerscht no dem anonyme bre'fschreiwer an hofft, op des mane'er der sabotageband op de pelz ze récken.
translation.en: The police are searching for the anonymous letter writer and hope in this manner to get closer to the sabotage gang.

translation.lb: Verschiebong vun de griechesche wahlen
translation.en: Postponement of the Greek elections

translation.lb: * Mail enger definitiver Verschiebung vun de griechesche parlarnantswahlen, de' den 31. murz hätte- stnttfanne so-llen, get elo vun de Henksgerîchlen zeidongen a Griechenland gerechent.
translation.en: * After a definitive postponement of the Greek parliamentary elections, which should have taken place on March 31st, it is now reported in the Greek press.

translation.lb: De' technesch schwieregkéten, we'nl denen d'wahle net den 31. märz staltfanne kënnen, bestin doranner, datt net gen:h pobeier. dréekerschwärz acw. an den dréckereien opgedriwe ka gin fir d'wahllëschten an d'stëminziëdclen ze drecken.
translation.en: The technical difficulties, because of which the elections cannot take place on March 31st, lie in the fact that there is not enough paper, printing ink, etc., available in the printing shops to print the electoral lists and ballots.

translation.lb: Och ass d'opstellong vun de kandidatelëschten we'nst der herrschender onénegkét nach net ofgeschloss.
translation.en: Also, the preparation of the candidate lists has not yet been completed due to the prevailing disagreements.

translation.lb: De griechesche ministerpresident Sophulis huet an senger e'schter wahlriéd zu Saloniki och ugekënnegt, datt d'wafolen ongefe'er ein 14 deg verluegt musse gin.
translation.en: The Greek Prime Minister Sophulis also announced in his first election speech in Thessaloniki that the elections need to be postponed by approximately 14 days.

translation.lb: f engem énzelne merci ze soe, fir den hierzlechen a gro'ssen undél beim leichendengscht a begriéwnes vun onsem le'wen, onvergicsslechen, énzege jong, brudder, neveu a coseng Jempy SCHROEDER mort pour la Patrie, soe mir der famill, alle komerodon, bekannten a friinn villmols merci.
translation.en: To express a heartfelt and great thanks for the participation in the funeral service and burial of our beloved, unforgettable, unique son, brother, nephew and cousin Jempy SCHROEDER who died for the Fatherland, we say many thanks to the family, all comrades, acquaintances and friends.

translation.lb: E spezielle merci" dem gemengerot, der Unio'n, der ligue „Ons Jongen", der musek an dem gesank vu Bcrburg, aer L. P. P. D., der Unio'n, der ligue „Ons Jongen" vu Gre'vemächer; der Wecker musek an der ligue „Ons Jongen" vu Bech.
translation.en: A special thanks to the municipal council, the Union, the league 'Ons Jongen', the music and choir from Bcrburg, the L. P. P. D., the Union, the league 'Ons Jongen' from Grevenmacher; the Wecker music and the league 'Ons Jongen' from Bech.

translation.lb: Villmols merci fir de' sehe' kränz a gerben; merci och fir de' sehe' grâwriédcn.
translation.en: Many thanks for the beautiful wreaths and gifts; thanks also for the beautiful speeches.

translation.lb: Den hèr an d'madame Nie. Schroeder-Kersch, hir kanner Delphine a Juliette an d'ganz familjen.
translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Nie. Schroeder-Kersch, their children Delphine and Juliette and the whole family.

translation.lb: Deck loft op der spuenescher grenz *
translation.en: Thick tension at the Spanish border *

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch regirong huet d'regironge vun England a Frankreich opgefuerdert, eng provisoresch spuenesch regirong z'ennerstëtzen, de' d'plaz vun der Francoregirong anhuele soll.
translation.en: The American government has urged the governments of England and France to support a provisional Spanish government that should take the place of the Franco government.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch regirong huet zu London an zu Washington no der iwerréchong vun enger note iwer d'situatio'n a Franco-Spuenien gefuerdert, datt de Franco-régime als friddensste'rend virun de weltsecherhétsrot bruecht soll gin.
translation.en: The French government has requested in London and Washington, following the submission of a note regarding the situation in Franco-Spain, that the Franco regime be brought before the United Nations Security Council as a peace-disturbing entity.

translation.lb: De verke'er op der franse'schspuenescher grenz ass schon agestallt gin.
translation.en: Traffic at the French-Spanish border has already been halted.

translation.lb: D'spuenesch autorite'ten hun d'schle'ssong vun der grenz schon direct durchgefe'ert, wärend franse'sch gidderzich, de' no Spuenien ennerwé woren, vun de franse'schen eisebunnerten um weiderfuere verhënnert go'wen.
translation.en: The Spanish authorities have already directly executed the closure of the border, while French freight trains on their way to Spain were prevented from continuing by the French railway workers.

translation.lb: De generol Franco huet den truppen an de grenzgebidder all Urlaub gespart
translation.en: General Franco has canceled all leave for troops in the border areas

translation.lb: Chineseschen dementi * Zu Tschungking huet gëschter e spriécher vun der chinesescher regirong erklärt:
translation.en: Chinese denial * In Chongqing yesterday, a spokesman for the Chinese government declared:

translation.lb: De 29. 1. huet d'chinesescht aussenamt zu Moskau ugefrot, watfir plange Russland hätt fir seng truppen aus der Mandschurei zréckzeze'en.
translation.en: On January 29th, the Chinese foreign office in Moscow inquired about Russia's plans to withdraw its troops from Manchuria.

translation.lb: Bis elo ass awer nach keng äntwert vun der russescher seit komm.
translation.en: So far, however, no response has come from the Russian side.

translation.lb: De chineseschen informatio'nsminister demente'ert d'behaptong vun der russescher regirong, no dèr d'stodentendémonstratio'nen zu Tschungking ge'nt d'uwiesenhét vun de russeschen truppen an der Mandschurei vu chinesesehe regirongsplazen ugestiwelt an organise'ert wire gin.
translation.en: The Chinese information minister denied the claim of the Russian government that the student demonstrations in Chongqing against the presence of Russian troops in Manchuria were instigated and organized by Chinese government agencies.

translation.lb: De chef vun der Ro'der Arme' an der Mandschurei behäpt, datt schon e gudden dél vun de russeschen truppen aus der Mandschurei zréckgezu wir gin.
translation.en: The head of the Red Army in Manchuria claims that already a good portion of the Russian troops have been withdrawn from Manchuria.

translation.lb: Zur ofmontage vu maschinnen a fabriken an der haptstad Mukden sot hién, datt dat am averständnes matt dénen anere regironge geschitt wir, de' den accord matt Russland ënnerzéchent hätten.
translation.en: Regarding the dismantling of machines and factories in the capital Mukden, he said that this occurred in agreement with the other governments who signed the accord with Russia.

translation.lb: Den amerikaneschen ausseminister Byrnes bemirkt awer heiriwer, datt, wann de' klausel am accord wir, da misst hién dach bal eppes dervu wëssen.
translation.en: American Secretary of State Byrnes remarked, however, that if such a clause were in the agreement, he would almost certainly know something about it.

translation.lb: Senger ménong no wire nach keng russesch truppen zréckgezu gin.
translation.en: In his opinion, no Russian troops have yet been withdrawn.

translation.lb: EGYPTEN D’egyptesch stodente droe mam hl. krich * Zu Cairo ass d'situatio'n erem normal.
translation.en: EGYPT The Egyptian students are pushing for the holy war * In Cairo, the situation is normal again.

translation.lb: An de strôsse patrulle'eren egyptesch militär- a Polizeistreifen.
translation.en: In the streets, Egyptian military and police patrols are present.

translation.lb: D'stodente vun der universite't Cairo wunnen de virliésongen erem bei.
translation.en: The students of Cairo University are attending their lectures again.

translation.lb: De verénegten ausschoss vun den egypteschen arbechter- a stodente-gewerkschaften, de' bei de lèschten onro'en eso' eng wichteg roll gespillt hun, hun an enger resolutio'n matt der ausruffong vum hl. krich vum Islam ge'nt England, de' e frêideg soll sin, gedrét.
translation.en: The united committee of the Egyptian workers' and students' unions, which played such an important role in the recent unrest, has issued a resolution concerning the proclamation of a holy war of Islam against England, which should take place on Friday.

translation.lb: D ’croix de guerre fir belsch resistenzler.
translation.en: The 'Croix de Guerre' for Belgian resistance fighters.

translation.lb: Bre'ssel: En donneschdeg de muergen huet de Prënzregent am Palais zu Bre'ssel me' we' 200 resistenzler empfang.
translation.en: Brussels: On Thursday morning, the Prince Regent received more than 200 resistance fighters at the palace in Brussels.

translation.lb: Et wäre leidd aus allen déler vu Belgien, de' fir hir resistenzakten wärend der occupatio'n elo ëffentlech unerkennong kritt hun.
translation.en: They were people from all parts of Belgium, who were now publicly acknowledged for their acts of resistance during the occupation.

translation.lb: Et wore Saboteuren aus dem groupe G, arbechter, beamten, baueren an zaldoten, de' allie'erte krichsgefângene, ofgestirzte flieger viru gehollef haten.
translation.en: They were saboteurs from group G, workers, officials, farmers, and soldiers, who had helped allied prisoners of war and downed pilots.

translation.lb: De Prënzregent huet si all matt der Croix de Guerre ausgezéchent an hât fir jidderén en unerkennend wuert.
translation.en: The Prince Regent honored them all with the Croix de Guerre and had a word of acknowledgment for each one.

translation.lb: D ’ pers. delegatio ’ n verle ’ sst Moskau
translation.en: The Persian delegation leaves Moscow

translation.lb: * De persesche ministerpresident Sultane huet gëschter mueren matt dénen aneren delege'erten vun senger missio'n Moskau mam flieger verlôss fir no Teheran ze fle'en.
translation.en: The Persian Prime Minister, Sultane, left Moscow yesterday morning by plane with the other delegates from his mission to fly to Tehran.

translation.lb: Virgëschter owend hât e nach.d'resultat vun de Moskauer verhandlonge publire'ere gelôss.
translation.en: The day before yesterday evening, he still had the result of the Moscow negotiations published.

translation.lb: We' et doranner héscht, wor den haptge'genstand vun de bespriéchongen froen, de' d'intresse vu be'de tanner ugànge sin.
translation.en: According to it, the main subject of the discussions were questions concerning the interests of both parties.

translation.lb: D'verhandlonge sollen an engem frëndschaftleche géscbt verlaf sin.
translation.en: The negotiations are said to have proceeded in a friendly manner.

translation.lb: D'persescb de4egatio'n huet ailes gemâcb fir op eng gudd énegong matt de Russen ze kommen.
translation.en: The Persian delegation has done everything to reach a good agreement with the Russians.

translation.lb: Wién huet e faibel fir de CLARK GABLE???
translation.en: Who has a fondness for CLARK GABLE???

translation.lb: Da Iauschtert elo emol gudd, a s6t ons op et stemmt!
translation.en: Then listen well now, and tell us if it's true!

translation.lb: Dir sid omn-.er fro' a lëschteg.
translation.en: You are always happy and cheerful.

translation.lb: Dir huelt d'iiéwen op de' lîcht schëller, iwerzégt, datt zum schlnss dach nach alles zum gudde gét.
translation.en: You take things lightly, convinced that in the end, everything will turn out well.

translation.lb: Aeusserlech sidd der ganz nett, emmer wiélt der de' passend klengegkét, siéw et eng blumm oder eng fiéder, de' èrem typ entsprecht.
translation.en: Outwardly, you are very nice, always choosing the suitable trinket, be it a flower or a feather, that suits your type.

translation.lb: Dir contrarie'ert ni e mënsch.
translation.en: You never contradict anyone.

translation.lb: Dir hutt eppes vun èrem liéwen.
translation.en: You have something lovable about you.

translation.lb: .... oder de JEAN GABIN???
translation.en: .... or JEAN GABIN???

translation.lb: E ro'egt a geregelt liéwe langweilt iéeh.
translation.en: A calm and orderly life bores you.

translation.lb: Iéch reizt de risiko, iwerstierzt an hardi décisio'nen, onerwârt événementer, de' èrem hèrz e sto'ss gin.
translation.en: Risk attracts me, rash and bold decisions, unexpected events that make the heart pound.

translation.lb: Démno hutt der ère beruff gewiélt oder iéch be3tued.
translation.en: Therefore, you have chosen or reconsidered your profession.

translation.lb: Dir schwärmt fir gro'ss résen matt Villen erliéwnesser.
translation.en: You are enthusiastic about great travels with many experiences.

translation.lb: fir e verwegenen 2-sëtzer, dén 150 km à l'heure mécht a fir kriniinalromanen.
translation.en: for a daring 2-seater that goes 150 km per hour and for crime novels.

translation.lb: ... oder ass et fir de ROBERT TAYLOR wo' der schwärmt,??
translation.en: ... or is it for ROBERT TAYLOR that you are pining,??

translation.lb: Dann drémt der emmer, ni kommt der au 3 de wollécken eraus.
translation.en: Then you are always dreaming, never coming down from the clouds.

translation.lb: Dir lauschtert gèren douce musek (eso' à la Tino Rossi),
translation.en: You like to listen to gentle music (like Tino Rossi),

translation.lb: op èrem nuetsdësch leit bestänneg e band gedichter,
translation.en: there is always a book of poems on your nightstand,

translation.lb: an owends schlot dir eng promenade au clair de lune net of.
translation.en: and in the evenings, you don't miss a stroll in the moonlight.

translation.lb: Iwert engem traureg-zärtleche roman kennt der iech verauen.
translation.en: You confide in a sad-tender romance.

translation.lb: Soss schengt èrt liéwen iech monoton a langweileg,
translation.en: Otherwise, your life seems monotonous and boring,

translation.lb: an der wart op dat gro'sst gléck.
translation.en: and you await the greatest happiness.

translation.lb: DE NÜRNBERGER PROZESS
translation.en: THE NÜRNBERG TRIAL

translation.lb: Konflikt Hitler-Jodl
translation.en: Conflict Hitler-Jodl

translation.lb: An der sëtzong vun e samschdeg huet de Goering weider aussoe geraâch an zwar iwer de konflikt, dén tëschent dem Hitler an dem Jodl entsfane wor.
translation.en: At the session on a Saturday, Goering further testified about the conflict that had arisen between Hitler and Jodl.

translation.lb: Sengen aussoe no ass de conflikt beim feldzuch am Kaukasus entstanen.
translation.en: According to his statements, the conflict arose during the campaign in the Caucasus.

translation.lb: Démols huet den Hitler dem Jodl virwërf gemâch, datt e net matt konzenlre'erte krâften a richtong Tuapse virgedrongen ass.
translation.en: At that time, Hitler accused Jodl of not advancing with concentrated forces towards Tuapse.

translation.lb: De Jodl wor net faul an huet dem Hitler eremgeântwert, datt hié jo selwer de piang matt him an senge durchgesprach hält.
translation.en: Jodl was not idle and replied to Hitler that he himself argued this plan with him and his discussions.

translation.lb: Den Hitler huet emmer erem dé betreffende generol, dén de' operatio'n durchgefe'ert hijet, ugegraff an de Jodl huet en all ke'er gedeckt.
translation.en: Hitler repeatedly attacked the particular general who carried out the operations, and Jodl always covered for him.

translation.lb: Dorophin huet den Hitler sech beim Goering doriwer beschwe'ert an dervu geschwat, fir de Jodl ofzesetzen an en durch de Paulus z'ersetzen, an dén den Hitler emmer vill vertraue gesät huet.
translation.en: Subsequently, Hitler complained to Goering about it and talked about replacing Jodl with Paulus, in whom he had always placed much trust.

translation.lb: Am leschte moment ower huet den Hitler dach erkannt, datt et besser wir, de Jodl op sengem posten ze lôssen, we' erem aner gesichter em sech ze gesin, wat hién emmei évite'ert huet, wann et nemme gong.
translation.en: In the last moment, however, Hitler realized that it would be better to leave Jodl in his position, rather than seeing new faces around him, which he always avoided whenever possible.

translation.lb: Am äaf vun de joren huet sech dem Hitler sei vertrauen an d'taktik vum Jodl gefestegt, wann e perse'rlech och ni me' enk matt em a relatio'ne ko'm.
translation.en: Over the years, Hitler's trust and stance in Jodl's tactics solidified, even if personally he never came into a close relationship with him.

translation.lb: Am joer 1945 huet den Hitler dervu geschwat fir d'Genfer conventio'n ze kënnegen, wo'ge'nt (nom Goering sengen aussoen) de Goering sech gewirt hätt.
translation.en: In the year 1945, Hitler spoke of canceling the Geneva Convention, against which (according to Goering's statements) Goering would have opposed.

translation.lb: Den Hitler wor der ménong, wann d'preisesch zaldote we'ssten, datt si an der allie'erter gefâugeschaft gudd behandelt ge'we gin, da ge'we si net me' daper kämpfen, mé zum feind iwerlafen.
translation.en: Hitler was of the opinion that if the Prussian soldiers knew that they would be treated well in Allied captivity, they would no longer fight bravely but would rather defect to the enemy.

translation.lb: De Goering wor derge'nt der ménong, datt d'kënnegong vun der Genfer conventio'n ennert der hevëflkerong vun Deitschland eng gro'ss onro' ervirruffe ge'w, well d'familje vun de krichsgefângenen sech da nach me' suerge mâche ge'wen.
translation.en: Goering was of the opposite opinion, that the cancellation of the Geneva Convention would cause great disturbance among the German population, because the families of the prisoners of war would then worry even more.

translation.lb: Spuenien: Frankreich a Russland fuerderen, datt de Franco endlech liquide'ert soll gin.
translation.en: Spain: France and Russia demand that Franco should finally be eliminated.

translation.lb: England an Amerika approuve'eren, mé Jössen et bei e puer diplomatesche note bleiwen.
translation.en: England and America approve, but let it remain with a few diplomatic notes.

translation.lb: De G irai wëllt eng lénksregirong opbauen, den Don.Tuan beabsichtegt, d'monarchie nés hîrzestellen.
translation.en: The G irai wants to build a left-wing government, Don Tuan intends to restore the monarchy.

translation.lb: D'resistenz organise'ert sech.
translation.en: The resistance is organizing itself.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch-spuenesch grenz ass zo\
translation.en: The French-Spanish border is tight.

translation.lb: D'Russe mellen, de Franco ge'f waffen a munitio'n aus der Schweiz beze'en, an d'Allie'ert ge'wen des transporter duerch Italien duerchgoe lössen.
translation.en: The Russians report that Franco obtains weapons and munitions from Switzerland, and the Allies allow these transports to go through Italy.

translation.lb: 3. Triest: Den Tito, gestëtzt duerch Russland, reclame'ert Triest fir Jugoslawien.
translation.en: 3. Trieste: Tito, supported by Russia, claims Trieste for Yugoslavia.

translation.lb: Italien, vun England gestëtzt, steipt sech ge'nt des annexio'n.
translation.en: Italy, supported by England, opposes this annexation.

translation.lb: Amerika propose'ert, Triest zu Italien ze lössen an den hafen z'internationalise'eren.
translation.en: America proposes to leave Trieste with Italy and to internationalize the port.

translation.lb: Momentan ass eng allie'ert kommissio'n dermatt beschäftegt, d'grenzen ze ze'en.
translation.en: Currently, an allied commission is occupied with drawing the borders.

translation.lb: Russland verlängt d'controll vun der fre'erer italienescher kolonie.
translation.en: Russia extends control over the former Italian colony.

translation.en: England sees a threat to its position in the Mediterranean and its connections with India in this.

translation.lb: D'fro ass weider nach net ëffentlech zur discussio'n komm,
translation.en: The issue has not yet been brought to public discussion,

translation.lb: „Acht und Acht: 88“.
translation.en: „Eight and Eight: 88“.

translation.lb: Zu Nürnberg, der zitadell vum nazismus, könnt én op ville maueren d'zuel 88 liésen.
translation.en: In Nuremberg, the citadel of Nazism, one can read the number 88 on many walls.

translation.lb: An der stross hun d'Preisen sech matt „acht und acht" gegre'sst a gespre'cher gefo'ert, de' neischt matt mathematik ze din hâten.
translation.en: In the street, the Germans greeted each other with 'eight and eight', and asked questions that had nothing to do with mathematics.

translation.lb: Wat stecht hannert der zuel 88?
translation.en: What lies behind the number 88?

translation.lb: Am abc ass den „H" den 8. bustaw.
translation.en: In the alphabet, 'H' is the 8th letter.

translation.lb: „Heil Hitler" get also „acht und acht".
translation.en: 'Heil Hitler' is thus 'eight and eight'.

translation.lb: E rechewonner.
translation.en: A computing marvel.

translation.lb: Fir d'trajectoire vu fusée-bommen auszerechnen.
translation.en: To calculate the trajectory of missile-bombs.

translation.lb: hun drei amerikanesch techniker, den Dr. Mauchy, den ing. Exkert an de capt. Godstine eng enorm rechemaschinn gebaut: d'E. N. I. A. C. (Electric Numerica Integrator and Computer).
translation.en: three American technicians, Dr. Mauchy, Ing. Exkert, and Capt. Godstine have built an enormous calculating machine: the E. N. I. A. C. (Electric Numerical Integrator and Computer).

translation.lb: Des maschin kann d'trajectoiren an zeit vu 5—30 Sekunden ausrechnen.
translation.en: This machine can calculate trajectories in a time of 5—30 seconds.

translation.lb: Am universite'tslaboratorium vu Pennsylvania stét des maschin, 3 meter he'ch a 35 m Iâng.
translation.en: In the university laboratory of Pennsylvania, this machine stands, 3 meters high and 35 meters long.

translation.lb: Si bestét aus 18 000 tuben, weit 30 tonnen a kascht 400 000 dollar.
translation.en: It consists of 18,000 tubes, weighs 30 tons, and costs 400,000 dollars.

translation.lb: Si get vun 2000 neon- Iuchte gespeist (am radio sin der 10, am gre'sste radarapparat 400, an de prezisio'nsapparate vun de „fliegende festongen" 800).
translation.en: It is powered by 2,000 neon lights (in the radio there are 10, in the largest radar apparatus 400, and in the precision instruments of the 'flying fortresses' 800).

translation.lb: D'ENIAC schafft 1000 mol me' schnell we' de' beseht rechemaschin, de' bis elo op der Harvarder universite't stong.
translation.en: The ENIAC works 1,000 times faster than the best calculating machine, which until now stood at Harvard University.

translation.lb: De mathematiker analyse'ert sei problem, setzt en an equatio'n, stecht des equatio'n an en tube an da kënnt si fèrdeg eraus.
translation.en: The mathematician analyzes his problem, transforms it into equations, inserts these equations into a tube, and then they come out solved.

translation.lb: Des message gin den elcktreschen seile matt lichtvitesse zo'gefe'ert.
translation.en: These messages are transmitted through electrical wires at the speed of light.

translation.lb: Beim radar gét et matt enger 5000stel sekund, am nervensystem matt enger 10. sekund.
translation.en: In radar, it goes within a 5000th of a second, in the nervous system within a 10th of a second.

translation.lb: D'ENIAC schafft also 400 000 mol me' schnell we' de mensch.
translation.en: The ENIAC thus works 400,000 times faster than a human.

translation.lb: An zeit vu 5 minute kënnen 10 000 additio'nen a soustractio'ne vun 10 zuelen erofgedrummt gin.
translation.en: In a time of 5 minutes, 10,000 additions and subtractions of 10 numbers can be completed.

translation.lb: Eng multiplicatio'n brauch eng 360stel sekund, eng divisio'n vun 9 chifferen mecht sech an enger 38stel sekund.
translation.en: A multiplication takes a 360th of a second, a division of 9 digits is done in a 38th of a second.

translation.lb: — Des maschin ass nach emmer militärgeheimnes.
translation.en: — This machine is still a military secret.

translation.lb: Keng kloer situatio’n a Persien
translation.en: No clear situation in Persia

translation.lb: E samschdcg huet de persesche krichsminister bestridden, datt d'russesch panzer a richtong Teheran virgesto'ss wiren.
translation.en: On Saturday, the Persian Defense Minister denied that Russian tanks had advanced towards Tehran.

translation.lb: De' noricht, de' a Wer vu ville radioslatio'- nen an emlaf gesät wir gin, wir ow en irtom vu sengem dwlmetscher zréckzefe'eren, dén en ofschnëlt vun der mcldong falsch interprete'ert hätt.
translation.en: The news, which had been broadcast by many radio stations, was attributed to a mistake by his interpreter, who had incorrectly interpreted a part of the message.

translation.lb: — De persesche krichsminister demente'ert weider d'noricht, no dêr d'persesch regirong d'absictit hätt, de perseschrussesche Streitfall de 25. rnärz virun de weltsecherhétsrot zu New- York ze brengen.
translation.en: The Persian Defense Minister further denied the report that the Persian government intended to bring the Persian-Russian conflict before the United Nations Security Council on March 25th in New York.

translation.lb: Op des noricht hin huet d'Ümerikanescht ausseministerium erklärt, wann dat de fall wir, da ge'f d'amerikanesch dclegalio'n dat mächen.
translation.en: In response to this news, the U.S. State Department stated that if this were the case, the American delegation would act accordingly.

translation.lb: Vun anerer seit get gemellt, datt de persesche botschafter zu Washington nach emmer op uerdere vun scnger regirong wärt, fir dem weltsecherhétsrot de fall z'ennerbrédcn.
translation.en: On the other hand, it is reported that the Persian ambassador in Washington is still waiting for orders from his government to bring the case before the UN Security Council.

translation.lb: De rot kënnt muer iwer eng woch zu Washington zesummen.
translation.en: The council will meet a week from tomorrow in Washington.

translation.lb: All anträg, de' op der e'schter sëlzong besprach solle gin, musse bis e mëttwoch dem secrétariat vum rot gemellt si gin.
translation.en: All proposals to be discussed at the first session must be submitted to the secretariat of the council by Wednesday.

translation.lb: No meldonge vu gëschter soll d'fro an der form vun amëschong durch Russland an d'intern affaire vu Persien an d'verletzong vun der Charta vun de Verénte Natio'- nen virgeluegt gin.
translation.en: According to yesterday's reports, the issue is supposed to be presented in the form of interference by Russia in Persia's internal affairs and violation of the United Nations Charter.

translation.lb: De russesehe geschäftsdre'cr zu Teheran huet d'persesch regirong drop higewisen, datt, wann si d'persesch fro virun de weltsecherhétsrot brenge ge'wen, d'russesch regirong dat als en onfrëndlechen act vis-à-vis vu Russland opfâsse ge'w an dementsprechend och handele ge'w.
translation.en: The Russian chargé d'affaires in Tehran pointed out to the Persian government that if they were to bring the Persian issue before the UN Security Council, the Russian government would perceive this as an unfriendly act towards Russia and would act accordingly.

translation.lb: Dorophin huet d'amerikanesch regirong hirem botschafter zu Teheran uweisong gin, der persescher regirong ze versecheren, datt si ennert allen emstänn matt der voller ennerstëtzong vun Amerika rechne kennt an datt si gewëllt sin d'bestëmmonge vun der Charta durchzefe'eren bis zum leschten.
translation.en: After that, the American government instructed its ambassador in Tehran to assure the Persian government that they could count on full support from America under all circumstances and that they were willing to enforce the provisions of the Charter to the fullest extent.

translation.lb: Des instructio'nen huet den amerikanesche botschafter zu Teheran zo'- gestaillt kritt.
translation.en: These instructions were given to the American ambassador in Tehran.

translation.lb: Den amerikaneschen entworf, fir de Streitfall virun de weltsecherhétsrot ze brengen ass scho fèrdeg gestallt.
translation.en: The American draft to bring the conflict before the UN Security Council has already been completed.

translation.lb: Doranner get d'russesch regirong beschëillegt, de pact, dén lëschent England, Amerika, Russland a Persien we'nst der raumong vum perseschen territoire getraff wor gin, gebrach ze hun.
translation.en: In it, the Russian government is accused of breaking the pact that had been made between England, America, Russia, and Persia concerning the evacuation of Persian territory.

translation.lb: Weider héscht et am entworf virun, datt d'russesch regirong d'bestëmraonge vuti der Charta vun der UNO net erfëllt hätt.
translation.en: Furthermore, the draft states that the Russian government had not fulfilled the provisions of the UNO Charter.

translation.lb: Et wor den e'schte match, dén d'lechternaeher seit der liberatio'n presente'ert kruten.
translation.en: It was the first match the people of Echternach were able to present since the liberation.

translation.lb: Am krich wor den lechternacher club opgele'st gin.
translation.en: During the war, the Echternach club had been dissolved.

translation.lb: mé en huet sech erem zesummefond, fir de sche'ne sport erem opliéwen ze lôssen.
translation.en: But they regrouped to revive the beautiful sport.

translation.lb: Obschon d'Ho'walder iwerlée woren, hun d'lechternaeher e puer sehe' spiller virgefo'ert a bewisen, datt si matt engem gudd durchgefe'erten training bis op eng gewëssen he'cht komme kennen.
translation.en: Although the Ho'wald team was superior, the Echternach team brought forth a few good players and proved that with well-conducted training, they can reach a certain height.

translation.lb: Wir wënschen hinne weider volle succès a wârde matt spannong op dé nèxte match.
translation.en: We wish them continued success and eagerly await the next match.

translation.en: * The food crisis - Regarding the upcoming famine in various countries in Europe and Asia, yesterday four prominent figures in global politics gave statements in London, Atlantic City, and Paris.

translation.lb: Zu London huet den erzbeschof vu Canterbury, Fisher, gesot: „Fir d'hongersno't an Indien, China an an Deitschland z'évite'eren, müssen d'AUie'- ert zesumme virgoen,
translation.en: In London, the Archbishop of Canterbury, Fisher, said: "To avoid famine in India, China, and Germany, the Allies must proceed together,

translation.lb: si müssen d'iiéwensmëttclstocken zesummefâssen, d'verdôlong gerecht organi- an och de' um schluss vun der verdélong stin, berécksichtigen.
translation.en: they must consolidate food supplies, organize distribution fairly and ensure the end result of the allocation, considering.

translation.lb: Op der tagong vun der Unrra zu Atlantic City huet den ausschédendc léder, Lehmann, gefuerdert, datt d'ratione'erong vun de liéwensmëttel an Amerika erem agefo'ert misst gin,
translation.en: At the UNRRA conference in Atlantic City, the outgoing leader, Lehmann, demanded that food rationing in America must be reintroduced,

translation.lb: well eng beschränkong vum eieng net duer ge'w goen, fir denen hongrege länner ze hëllefen.
translation.en: because a restriction on consumption would not be enough to help the hungry countries.

translation.lb: De Lehmann huet drop higewisen, datl de' dänner, de' d'Unrra em hëdlef gebiéden hun, lâng net dat kre'e konnten, wat se gebraucht hätten.
translation.en: Lehmann pointed out that the countries that asked the UNRRA for help had long not been able to get what they needed.

translation.lb: Am e'schte ve'erel vun desem joer hätt d'Unrra 31 niillio'nen tonne liéwensmë.'tel gebraucht, si krut der awer nemme 17 millio'ne geliwert.
translation.en: In the first quarter of this year, UNRRA needed 31 million tons of food, but it received only 17 million tons delivered.

translation.lb: Op dèrselwechler tagong huet och de briteschen delege'erten. de staatsminister Noei Baker gesehuat.

translation.en: — In Paris, the head of the Relief Commission, Herbert Hoover, stated that approximately 500 million people worldwide do not have enough to eat.

translation.lb: 9. märz, hellegen erënnerongsvollen dag, wo' ons héroen, de' fir d'hémecht gestuerwe sin, aus dem verfluchte, verhâssle preisesche buedem erem an hir hémechtsscholl iwerfe'ert si gin, a wo' d'klacken am ganze land d'pe's gelaut hun, wo' un all letzeburger haus d'tricolore getrauert hun, wo' ons Garde d'gewir virun hinne présente'ert liuet.
translation.en: 9th March, a sacred day full of remembrance, when our heroes, who died for the homeland, were carried back from the cursed, hated Prussian soil to their homeland’s bosom, and when the bells throughout the country tolled peace, when the tricolor mourned at every Luxembourg house, when our Guard presented arms before them.

translation.lb: huet ons gemeng et net fir ne'deg fond d'gemengenhaus ze beflaggen.

translation.lb: (Et waren nämlech sengerzeit, op unuerdnong vun onsem secrétaire, de' sehe' letzeburger fendelen matt de bit'er vun der Grande-Duchesse un d'Preisen ofgetiwert gin, well d'ménong war, si ke'men net me' an de mo'd.l Senger würde s liuet den efter hei zite'erte burgerméschter P.
translation.en: (At that time, by order of our secretary, the beautiful Luxembourg flags with the letters of the Grand Duchess were handed over to the Prussians, because the opinion was, they were no longer in fashion. His sayings were once again echoed by the mayor mentioned here, P.

translation.lb: 5. D'zielweis: E saz gewënnt dé spiller, dé fir d'e'scht 21 ball gewännt.
translation.en: 5. The objective: A game is won by the player who first wins 21 points.

translation.lb: Hun awer de' zwe' spiller 20 ball gewonn, da gewännt ere'scht dén de saz, dén zwe' bäll me' gewännt we' sei gegner.
translation.en: However if both players have won 20 points, then the game is won by the one who wins two more points than the opponent.

translation.lb: 6. Seiten an Service-wiél: Iwert d'seitewiél an d'recht tëschent dem opschlag an dem réckschlag ze Wielen, entschéd d'lo's.
translation.en: 6. Side and Service Choice: The choice between serve and return, as well as side selection, is decided by lot.

translation.lb: Wann de lo'sgewënner den opschlag oder de réck schlag wiélt, dann huet sei ge'gr.er d'recht d'seitewahl ze huelen: emgeke'ert, kann de gegner den opschlag oder de réckschlag wiélen.
translation.en: If the lot winner chooses the serve or return, they have the primary right to choose the side: Conversely, the opponent can choose the serve or return.

translation.lb: De gewënner vum lo's kann och verlangen, dass de gegner de' 1. wähl trëfft.
translation.en: The winner of the lot can also demand that the opponent make the first choice.

translation.lb: De joergank 43 get agezun.
translation.en: Year group 43 is being drafted.

translation.lb: Am laf vum abrël get de joergank 43 agezun.
translation.en: During the course of April, year group 43 is being drafted.

translation.lb: Ausgeholl sin all jongen, de' sech virum 1. abrël bestued hun, a'lil de', de' am laf vum krich e membervun der familil verluer hun duerch bombardementer, duefch d'e'mbréhgén an de kzer oder un der front.
translation.en: Excluded are all young men who were married before April 1st, and those who lost a family member during the war due to bombings, through the embatkation to the front line or on the front itself.

translation.lb: Virléfech gin all de' net erfâsst de' e brudder hun, dén agezu wor oder eilo nach an uniform ass.
translation.en: For the time being, not registered are those who have a brother who was drafted or is still in uniform.

translation.lb: Letzeburg—England Dese match versprecht e grossereignes e'schter giite ze gin.
translation.en: Luxembourg—England This match promises to be a significant event.

translation.lb: D'victoire ge'nt d'franse'sch militaireéquipe (3:1) huet den intérêt op de gipfel gesteigert.
translation.en: The victory against the French military team (3:1) has heightened interest to a peak.

translation.lb: Am virverkäf sin billéen bal all verkâft.
translation.en: In the presale, tickets are almost all sold out.

translation.lb: D'englesch équipe ass komplett matt dem Lawton geschter um 11.30 auer vu Pareis ukom.
translation.en: The English team arrived complete with Lawton yesterday at 11:30 from Paris.

translation.lb: Sämtlech spiller sin a militaire-uniforme.
translation.en: All players are in military uniform.

translation.lb: Et dèrf erwârt gin, dat e sonndeg d'Englänner eng gro'ss performence opdëschen an datt eis équipe, de' ganz so'rgfälteg virberét go'w, alles gi muss fir e'revoll ze beston.
translation.en: It is expected that on Sunday the English will deliver a great performance and that our team, which has been very carefully prepared, must give everything to succeed honorably.

translation.lb: Nicolas MATHIEU † Zu De'erbech ass haut en oprechte Letzeburger, dén dem land gro'ss dengschter geléscht huet, zu graw gedroe gin: den depute'erten Nicolas Mathieu.
translation.en: Nicolas MATHIEU † In Diekirch, a true Luxembourger, who has rendered great services to the country, has been carried to the grave today: the deputy Nicolas Mathieu.

translation.lb: Aus aJle ge'genden vum Hand, besonnesch awer aus dem E'sleck selwer, waren seng onziéleg frënn erbeikomm, fir em dé leschte gro'ss mattzegin.
translation.en: Friends from all corners of the land, especially from Oesling itself, had come to pay him the last tribute.

translation.lb: Enner anerem hu mer vill vertriéder vun der rcgirong, der chaœber, dem conseil an de vereiner gesin.
translation.en: Among others, we saw many representatives from the government, the chamber, the council, and associations.

translation.lb: Wonnerbar kränz a gerben hun d'graw busliéwlech iwerdeckt.
translation.en: Wonderful wreaths and garlands literally covered the grave.

translation.lb: Um offene graw huet als e'schten de gcmcngesecretär, den her Wenkin, am numm vum conseil a vun der gemeng d'verdengschter vum hèr Mathieu als conseiljé gewirdegt.
translation.en: At the open grave, the municipal secretary, Mr. Wenkin, was the first to pay tribute to Mr. Mathieu's achievements as a council member on behalf of the council and the municipality.

translation.lb: Duerno huet den hèr Chamberpresident Reuter an treffende wierder den depute'erte Mathieu geschildert, dén zënter 1922 o'ni ënnerbriéchong der Chamber ugehe'ert huet.
translation.en: Then Mr. Chamber President Reuter, in fitting words, described the deputy Mathieu, who had belonged to the chamber uninterrupted since 1922.

translation.lb: Den her depute'erte Wenkin, selwer en intime frënd vum verstuerwenen, huet en de'fgefillten noruff gehalen, wo' en zo'gleich am numm vum Gruppement, dém den hèr Mathieu ugehe'ert huet, de character vum Nie.
translation.en: Mr. Deputy Wenkin, himself an intimate friend of the deceased, delivered an emotional eulogy, while at the same time, on behalf of the group to which Mr. Mathieu belonged, he described Mr. Mathieu's character.

translation.lb: Mathieu nogezéchent huet, natirlech a fest we' d'E'slecker bierger, o'ni schmink, o'ni fassad, o'ni falschhét.
translation.en: Mathieu was portrayed as natural and steadfast like the Oesling citizens, without embellishment, without facade, without falsehood.

translation.lb: Als leschten buet am numm vum wâssersyndicat den hèr deputierte Simon geschwat.
translation.en: Lastly, Mr. Deputy Simon spoke on behalf of the water syndicate.

translation.lb: Aus alle riéden huet emmer nés dat ént eraus geklongen:
translation.en: From all the speeches one theme always emerged:

translation.lb: Den Nicolas Mathieu war e mënsçh, un dém jidderén dat fond huet, wat mir eso' g|r sichen:
translation.en: Nicolas Mathieu was a man in whom everyone found what we so often seek:

translation.lb: den on verfälschten ausdrock vun echt letzeburger art.
translation.en: the unadulterated expression of true Luxembourgish character.

translation.lb: Mëttwoch, den 20. märz — A Belgien trëtt d'regirong Spaak zréck.
translation.en: Wednesday, March 20 — In Belgium, the Spaak government resigns.

translation.lb: — D'Russe wellen d'conferenz vum weltsecherhétsrot op den 10. abrël zréck verléen.
translation.en: — The Russians want to postpone the conference of the World Security Council to April 10.

translation.lb: — Séparatiste ruffen a Persien d'Kurdesch Republik aus.
translation.en: — Separatists in Persia proclaim the Kurdish Republic.

translation.lb: Cardinol Preysing zu Berlin * De cardinol Preysing ass vu Ro'm erem zu Berlin ukomm, wo d'katholikcn him e feicrlechen empfank berét hun.
translation.en: Cardinal Preysing in Berlin * Cardinal Preysing has returned from Rome to Berlin, where the Catholics are preparing a festive reception for him.

translation.lb: D'Berliner katholike wessen d'unerkennong vum popst, den de Preysing we'nst senger kinger haltong ennert der naziherrschaft zum cardinol ernannt huet, wuel ze schätzen, wat se durch eng feierlech manifestatio'n an der Berliner Staatsoper zum ausdrock bruecht hun.
translation.en: The Catholics of Berlin know well to appreciate the recognition by the Pope, who appointed Preysing as cardinal for his unwavering stance under the Nazi regime, which they expressed through a solemn manifestation at the Berlin State Opera.

translation.lb: * An der britescher zon vun DeitschJand erschengt a nèxter zeit eng nei monatszeitschrëft „Die Brücke".
translation.en: * In the British zone of Germany, a new monthly magazine "Die Brücke" will be published soon.

translation.lb: Si ass op deilscti an op engilesch geschriwen a si soll d'bréck bilden zum verständncs tëschent Deitschland an England.
translation.en: It is written in both German and English and aims to build a bridge for understanding between Germany and England.

translation.lb: * De generolleitnant Clav, de militäresche generolgouverneur vun der amerikanescher zon an dem amerikanesche secteur vu Berlin, huet gëschter iwer d'thema vun der fusio'n tëschent der sozialdemocratescher an der kommunislescher partei an der amerikanescher zon gesehwat.
translation.en: * General Lieutenant Clay, the military governor of the American zone and the American sector of Berlin, spoke yesterday about the topic of the merger between the socialist and communist parties in the American zone.

translation.lb: Eng fusio'n tëschent der kommunistescher an der sozialdemocralescher partei kennt an der amerikanescher zon nuren a betracht, wann d'amerikanesch autorite'ten d'complett iwerzégong huet, dalt d'majorite't vun dénen zwo' Parteien sech doriwer éneg sin.
translation.en: A merger between the communist and social democratic parties in the American zone can only be considered if the American authorities are completely convinced that the majority of the two parties agree on it.

translation.lb: Aus der UNIO’N iMr invite'eren Iéch heiraalt zo" der gro'sser Versammlung vun all sectin'nsprésidenten.de' en dënschdeg.
translation.en: From the UNION I cordially invite you to the large assembly of all section presidents on Tuesday.

translation.lb: den 26. märz 1946 nomëltes um 15.30 aucr am Hôlel Luxembourg, propr. Theisen, WäsSergâss, Letzeburg, olgehale gët.
translation.en: This will take place on March 26, 1946, at 3:30 PM at Hotel Luxembourg, owned by Theisen, Water Street, Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Ordre du jour: a) Virberédong rurn Congress; bl Ons zeidong; c) Verschiddenes.
translation.en: Agenda: a) Preparation for the Congress; b) Our newspaper; c) Various topics.

translation.lb: AU sectio'nsprésident soll dëser wichteger ver.ammlong beisvunnen.
translation.en: All section presidents should attend this important meeting.

translation.lb: Wann hién perse'nlech verhönnert ass, kann hién e remplacang delegue'cren.
translation.en: If he is personally prevented from attending, he can appoint a replacement delegate.

translation.lb: D'sécretariat général.
translation.en: The general secretariat.

translation.lb: Pignon Bo’neweg.
translation.en: Pignon Bonneweg.

translation.lb: Den 1. mé organise'ert de „Pignon" Bo'neweg 4 coursen, an zwar fir d'indépendants, d'juniors, d'débutants an d'cadets.
translation.en: On May 1st, Pignon Bonneweg organizes 4 races, specifically for the independents, juniors, beginners, and cadets.

translation.lb: Well des coursen fir d'champlonnat du monde vun der fédératio'n als selectio'n bewärt gi sin, huet den organisateur drop geha'.en de' coursen awer och spannend an interessant zu mächen.
translation.en: Since these races are considered as selection for the world championship by the federation, the organizer has also made an effort to make the races exciting and interesting.

translation.lb: D'strecke vun den énzclne coursen gln an deser rubrik bekannt gemäch, d'kilometerzuel fir de' resp. catégorien sin 140, 117. 80 a 40 km.
translation.en: The courses of the individual races are made known in this section, the distances for the respective categories are 140, 117, 80, and 40 km.

translation.lb: Mir biéde schon haut d'vcroincr, hir courcure fir de' renne bei folgender adress unzemellen: Jean Kcuter, rue Sicgcfroi, 16, Luxbg.
translation.en: We already invite today the clubs to register their racers for the races at the following address: Jean Keuter, rue Sigefroi, 16, Luxembourg.

translation.lb: PROTEST ...weider uertschafte schle’ssen sech un: De’ gemengen- a schefferot, d’L.P.P.D., d’Pi-Men, d’Ligue „Ons Jongen“ an d’Unio’n vu Béteburg.
translation.en: PROTEST ...continue to attach themselves: The municipal council and town officials, the L.P.P.D., the Pi-Men, the League 'Ons Jongen' and the Union of Bettembourg.

translation.lb: Resolutio’n Mir verlängern
translation.en: Resolution We extend

translation.lb: 1. D'ausfe'erong vun de gesetzer eso' we' se "um gouvernement vu London aus prodame'ert si gin.
translation.en: 1. The execution of the laws as they have been proclaimed by the government in London.

translation.lb: 2. Datt endlech énergescli mesiiren ergraff giu ge'nl d'coilaborateuren an d'landesverrc'der, de' elo erem matt der gleicher frechbét we' am krich secb au der ëffentlechkct bewegen an dnmatf d'ménong vun alle gudde Letzeburger orovoze'eren.
translation.en: 2. That finally energetic measures are taken against the collaborators and traitors to the country, who now again with the same insolence as during the war move in public and thus provoke the opinion of all good Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: 3. Direct ausweisong vun allen nazien a faschisten aus dem land, au zo'gleich d'anze'ong vun hirem gesamte verme'geD.
translation.en: 3. Immediate expulsion of all Nazis and fascists from the country, as well as the seizure of all their assets.

translation.lb: 4. Direct entze'ong vu gesebäftsau handclsermäcbtegonge vun de nazi- u fasebisten-auslänner an uschle'ssend vun alle Lctzeburger verre'der.
translation.en: 4. Immediate revocation of business and trade authorizations from Nazi and fascist foreigners and subsequent expulsion of all Luxembourg traitors.

translation.lb: 5. Erfâssong an iwerfe'erong vu sämtleche wirtscbafts-collaburateuren au auze'ong vun birem gesamte krichsgewënn.
translation.en: 5. Capture and transfer of all economic collaborators and confiscation of all their wartime profits.

translation.lb: De geniengen- a schefferot, d'L. P. P. D.. d Pi-Men, d'Ligue „Ons Jongen" an d'Unio'n vu Béteburg,
translation.en: The municipal council and officials, the L. P. P. D., the Pi-Men, the League 'Ons Jongen' and the Union of Bettembourg,

translation.lb: Dësch-Tennis Sensation zu London
translation.en: Table Tennis Sensation in London

translation.lb: We' bekannt, huet zu London vum 20. bis de 24. märz den internationale championnat am dësch-tennis stattfond.
translation.en: As known, from the 20th to the 24th of March, the international table tennis championship took place in London.

translation.lb: De beseht spiller aus alle länner woren um Start ë. a. Barna an Vania (Ungarn), Bergmann, Ehrlich, Haguenauer, Amouretti, Agopoff, Evalenko, Lejeune, Marinko, Blower, Sparke, Bodrez, Wine, Oellen asw.
translation.en: The best players from all countries participated, including Barna and Vania (Hungary), Bergmann, Ehrlich, Haguenauer, Amouretti, Agopoff, Evalenko, Lejeune, Marinko, Blower, Sparke, Bodrez, Wine, Oellen and so on.

translation.lb: D'sensatio'n vum owend wor en 3-0 sieg vum Amouretti (Frankreich) ge'nt Harold Archeg (England); den Amouretti huet de' 3 sätz op 21-0 gewonn.
translation.en: The sensation of the evening was a 3-0 victory by Amouretti (France) against Harold Archeg (England); Amouretti won the 3 sets with 21-0.

translation.lb: Ebenfalls de Vania könnt 1 sätz ge'nt den Robert Blower 21-0 gewannen.
translation.en: Similarly, Vania could win 1 set against Robert Blower 21-0.

translation.lb: Ass dat nach dran; me' he'ch hätten ons letzeburger spiller och net kenne verle'eren.
translation.en: Is that still possible; but we might not have lost our Luxembourgish players either.

translation.lb: Vun iwer 100 spiller konnten sech an der 1/4 finale klasse'eren: Vania, Ehrlich, Evalenko, Barna, Hondar, Haguenauer, Clar a Bergmann.
translation.en: Out of over 100 players, those who could qualify for the quarter-finals were: Vania, Ehrlich, Evalenko, Barna, Hondar, Haguenauer, Clar, and Bergmann.

translation.lb: D ’productio ’ n vun der deitscher industrie festgesat *
translation.en: The production of the German industry determined *

translation.lb: Den allie'erte controlrot fir Deitschland zu Berlin huet an enger sondersëtzong d'productio'nspotenlial vun der deitscher industrie festgelegt.
translation.en: The Allied Control Council for Germany in Berlin has determined the production potential of the German industry in a special session.

translation.lb: Enzelhéten doriwer si nach net publize'ert gin.
translation.en: Details about this have not yet been published.

translation.lb: E reporter vum englesche radio meldt awer, datt se haut nach veröffentlecht solde gin.
translation.en: However, a reporter from the English radio reports that they are expected to be published today.

translation.lb: Aus engem communiqué, den de controllrot no der sëtzong erausgin huet.
translation.en: From a communiqué released by the Control Council after the session.

translation.lb: gét ervir, datt de plang an zwé haptponkten agedélt ass:
translation.en: It is clear that the plan is divided into two main points:

translation.lb: 1. Sold festgestaldt gin.
translation.en: 1. It is determined which German industry is absolutely necessary for domestic production needs.

translation.lb: wat fir deitsch industrie fir d'productio'n vum deitschen égebedarf onbedéngt no'twendeg sin.
translation.en: Which German industry is essential for the production of domestic needs.

translation.lb: De diéwensstandard vum deilsche voldek soll op démselwechte niveau gehale gin, we' den durchschnëttsniveau an dt: en aneren europäesche länner.
translation.en: The standard of living of the German people should be maintained at the same level as the average in other European countries.

translation.lb: AH fabriken, de' durch des mesuren iwerfdësseg gi sin, sollen ofmonte'ert an als reparatio'nszue- Iongen verrechent gin.
translation.en: All factories that become redundant due to these measures are to be dismantled and accounted as reparations.

translation.lb: Eng lëscht vun déne fabriken gel a nèxter zeit opgestallt.
translation.en: A list of those factories will be prepared shortly.

translation.lb: 2. Soll eng revisio'n vum plang me'glech sin.
translation.en: 2. A revision of the plan should be possible.

translation.lb: Dat trëfft zo', wann durch emstänn, de' elo nach net iwerkuckt kënne gin, eso 1 eng verännerong no'twendeg gemäch get,
translation.en: This applies if circumstances, which cannot yet be foreseen, make a change necessary,

translation.lb: z. b. wann d'statut vum Rheinland oder vum Ruhrgebidd emgeännert get.
translation.en: for example, if the status of the Rhineland or the Ruhr area is changed.

translation.lb: Et ass kloer, datt eso' eng struetur ännerong an dém wichlegsten industriegebidd, dat Deitschland huet, mirklech folgen op d'gesamt wirtsehaftsliéwen vum deilsche vollek no.sech zitt.
translation.en: It is clear that such a structural change in Germany's most important industrial area will have real consequences for the overall economic life of the German people.

translation.lb: Kurz bemiérkt: Madrid: A Spuenien ass en décret publize'ert gin, no dém de' besser klassen taxe'ert gin, fir datt de' niddreg klassen eng me' bëlleg liéwenshaltong garante'ert krc'en.
translation.en: Briefly noted: Madrid: In Spain, a decree has been published whereby the higher classes are taxed to ensure that the lower classes can receive cheaper living expenses.

translation.lb: London: De marschall Titc huet op enger pressconferenz zu Warschau erklärt, datt de generol Mihailowitsch, fre'ere jugo3lawesche krichsminister, a nèxter zeit a schutzhaft geholl get.
translation.en: London: Marshal Tite stated at a press conference in Warsaw that General Mihailowitsch, the former Yugoslavian Minister of War, will soon be taken into protective custody.

translation.lb: Ankara: De' lescht norichten aus dem Asserbeidschan mellen, datt d'meldonge vun de russesche verstärkongen iwerdriwe go'wen.
translation.en: Ankara: The latest news from Azerbaijan reports that claims of Russian reinforcements have been exaggerated.

translation.lb: Washington: D'amerikanescht marine-amt get bekannt, datt d'besatzong vum „Prinz Eugen", dé bei den atombomm-experimenter am Pazifik agesat get, 100.000 dollaren ausbezuelt kritt.
translation.en: Washington: The U.S. Navy announces that the crew of the 'Prinz Eugen', which was used in atomic bomb experiments in the Pacific, has been paid 100,000 dollars.

translation.lb: Jaffa: Eng partie leidd, de' anonym drobre'wen un egyptesch personalite'te geschriwen haten, a6s verhaft gin.
translation.en: Jaffa: A group of people who had written anonymous threatening letters to Egyptian personalities have been arrested.

translation.lb: Herford: De Rudolf Hoess, fre'ere commandant vum konzentratio'nslager Auschwitz, huet zo'gin, op u erder vum Himmler, inhafte'erter vergast ze hun.
translation.en: Herford: Rudolf Hoess, former commandant of the Auschwitz concentration camp, confessed to having gassed detainees on Himmler's orders.

translation.lb: Tschungking: D'chinesesch regirong huet wëlles, eng divisio'n vu chineseschen truppen a Japan ze Schecken, fir ze besetzen.
translation.en: Chungking: The Chinese government intends to send a division of Chinese troops to Japan for occupation.

translation.lb: Buenos Aires: De' lescht resultater Tun der stad Buenos Aires an de presidentschaftswahle sin: 169.799 stemme fir de colonel Peron an 142.892 stemme fir den Dr. Tamborini.
translation.en: Buenos Aires: The latest results in the city of Buenos Aires from the presidential elections are: 169,799 votes for Colonel Peron and 142,892 votes for Dr. Tamborini.

translation.lb: Saigon: De kinek vum Cambodge ass zu Saigon ukomm. De kinek huet bekanntgln, datt e nèxtens no Pareis gét.
translation.en: Saigon: The king of Cambodia has arrived in Saigon. The king announced that he will soon travel to Paris.

translation.lb: Tokio: 20.000 japanesch zaldote wësse nach net, datt Japan capitule'ert huet, a fe'eren e guérilla- krich op de Philipinne virun. Si si vun alle verbindongen ofgeschnidden a kämpfen op verluercnem poste virun.
translation.en: Tokyo: 20,000 Japanese soldiers still do not know that Japan has capitulated and continue a guerrilla war in the Philippines. They are cut off from all communication and continue fighting on lost fronts.

translation.lb: Washington: De prozentsaz vun de verbriéchen huet an 2000 amcrikanesche stiéd em 12 prozent zo 'geholl.
translation.en: Washington: The crime rate has increased by 12 percent in 2,000 American cities.

translation.lb: Juddeversammlong zu Mexiko Mexiko, 27. august.
translation.en: Jewish assembly in Mexico Mexico, August 27.

translation.lb: — D'judden hun absolut weites, Palestin a erem z'erueweren,
translation.en: — The Jews absolutely intend to reconquer Palestine again,

translation.lb: Fir dat zill z'errécheu, sin hinnen all mëltel helleg.
translation.en: To achieve that goal, all means are sacred to them.

translation.lb: Emso' schlëinuier, wann d'mëttelen derzo' aus boninien, ex,ploxio'- nen a mëiischeverloschter hestin",
translation.en: Even more dangerous, if the means consist of bombs, explosions, and human losses,"

translation.en: said Oscar Schuermann, delegate of the Jewish committee for the liberation of Palestine, which is based in New York.

translation.en: said.

translation.en: These declarations, made before a large audience of Mexican Jews and representatives of the press,

translation.en: have here provoked protests from the moderate elements of the Jewish-Mexican population.

translation.lb: Gouvernement An der nummer vu gëschter huet dk.Escher Tageblatt" folgend zeile publize'ert:
translation.en: Government In the issue from yesterday, the "Escher Tageblatt" published the following lines:

translation.lb: Wie verlautet, soll Herr Ackerbauminister Margue das Ernährungsministerium zugeteilt bekommen, während Herr Prof. Frieden das Unterrichtsministerium wieder übernehmen soll.
translation.en: As reported, Minister of Agriculture Margue is supposed to be assigned the Ministry of Nutrition, while Prof. Frieden should take over the Ministry of Education again.

translation.lb: Mir hun ons u competenter plaz in formiert a krutc mattgedélt, datt de' vum Tageblatt cnvisage'ert le'song net richteg ass.
translation.en: We have informed ourselves at a competent place and have been told that the solution envisaged by the Tageblatt is not correct.

translation.lb: W'ién de successeur vum her Konsbriiek am wirtscbaftsministerium get, stet nach net fest.
translation.en: Who the successor of Mr. Konsbruck at the Ministry of Economic Affairs will be is not yet determined.

translation.lb: D'rechtspartei hat den hèr Aioys Ilentgen, affekot, gcfrot, dén awcr anscheinend aus gesondhétsgrënn refuse ert huet.
translation.en: The right party had asked Mr. Aloys Ilentgen, a lawyer, but he apparently refused for health reasons.

translation.lb: Wirtschaftlech commissio’n fir de Balkan
translation.en: Economic commission for the Balkans

translation.lb: De président vun deser commissio'n stellt fir d'e'scht d'polnesch delegatio'n vir, de' ukomm ass.
translation.en: The president of this commission first introduces the Polish delegation, which has arrived.

translation.lb: D'diseussiio'ne solle seeh op d'reparatio'nszuelongen erstrekken, de' Rumänien ze bez Beten huet.
translation.en: The discussions are meant to extend to the reparations payments that Romania has to make.

translation.lb: Den australesclien deloge'erle schwätzt seeh ge'nt de' festgesaten zomm vun 300 millio'mendolilar aus, well se net juslific'ert wir.
translation.en: The Australian delegate speaks against the fixed amount of 300 million dollars, as it is not justified.

translation.lb: Op dèr aner seit wir Australie net ge'nt des reparatio'nszueilomjg, de' Rumänien a Russfland an u Polen ze léschten hätt, mé de' betreffend länner mission hir fuerderonge garnz gené détaille'eren.
translation.en: On the other hand, Australia would not be against the reparations that Romania has to pay to Russia and Poland, but the respective countries should detail their demands very precisely.

translation.en: Therefore, a reparations commission should be established to review the demands.

translation.en: It would also not be appropriate, the Australian further explains, for these reparations to be balanced by increases in Romanian production; rather, they should come through a certain percentage of the export, which the formerly hostile countries would generate.

translation.en: He is of the opinion that instead of Romania paying in pounds Sterling and dollars — which England and America favor — an agreement between Russia and Romania should be made.

translation.en: Another 'heavyweight', Charles Weber, who has been sentenced to 10 years in prison, confidently claimed, against it, that Hitler is dead, as he witnessed him collapse under machine gun fire in the Reich Chancellery.

translation.en: For two years, Gene Jackson cannot remember anything from the period from September 1944 to July 8, 1946.

translation.en: He was wounded by shrapnel in the head in France.

translation.lb: „Dat lèscht, un dat ech mech erënneren, ass, dalt ech op enger civière bei der Muse! transporte'ert si gin.
translation.en: "The last thing I remember is when I was transported on a stretcher at Muse!

translation.en: Afterwards, I knew nothing else, until July 8, 1946, when I suddenly discovered that I was walking alongside the railway in Sarrelouis.

translation.lb: Ech liât eng crkeiinongsplaqite op der brosoht hänken an de numni ass mir bekannt virkomm.
translation.en: I noticed a recognition plaque hanging on the front and the name seemed familiar to me.

translation.lb: Ech hu mech un zwe' franse'sch gendarmen adresse'erl, de' ower ké schwanz englescli verstau hun.
translation.en: I approached two French gendarmes, but they did not understand a word of English.

translation.lb: Duerno hun ech mech Un é médche gewand a gefrot:,,Wo' sin d' Amerikaner?"
translation.en: Then I turned to a girl and asked: 'Where are the Americans?'"

translation.lb: „An der amerikânescher zort", huét dmédche geäntwert.
translation.en: "In the American zone," the girl answered.

translation.lb: Ech hu gemengt, et ge'f de geck matt mir mächen."
translation.en: I thought they were making fun of me.

translation.lb: Duerno hun d'franse'scli gendarme sech seiiger ugeholl aii bien un d'amerikaiiesch autorite'te weider gelét.
translation.en: Afterwards, the French gendarmes took care of it and guided me to the American authorities.

translation.en: He is currently under observation in Wiesbaden.

translation.en: "The terrible part of this situation," Jackson continues, "is that I have been officially reported dead.

translation.lb: Ech ka mech absolut net erënneren, wat de' ganzen zeit matt mir geschidd ass.
translation.en: I absolutely cannot remember what happened to me during that whole time.

translation.lb: An ech hun e klenge sträppchen zeit ne'deg gehàt, fir mech u meng eitern an u meng „vvitfra" z'erënneren.
translation.en: And I needed a little bit of time to remember my parents and my 'widow.'"

(Direction Générale des Etudes et des Recherches) get elo aus der franse'scher arme' erausgeheit, aus der Légion d'Honneur gestrach a kritt den ordre de la Libération entzun, huet geseilter de Conseil des Ministres beschloss.
translation.en: — Colonel Dewavrin, better known under the name Passy, former head of the D.G.E.R. (Direction Générale des Etudes et des Recherches), is now thrown out of the French army, struck from the Legion of Honor and has the Order of Liberation revoked, decided the Council of Ministers.

translation.lb: D'enquête ass elo cso'weit ofgeschloss an et stét fest, datt de col. Pasy bedeitend somme geld ënnerschlo hùet.
translation.en: The investigation is now largely concluded and it is established that Col. Passy embezzled significant sums of money.

translation.lb: Am weltsecherhéisrot Russland weider an oppositio’n Transjordanien, Irland a Portugal haten ugefrot fir an d'UNO opgeholl ze gin.
translation.en: In the UN Security Council, Russia continues opposing Transjordan, Ireland, and Portugal's requests to join the UN.

translation.lb: Doriwer ass gëschter debatte'ert gin.
translation.en: This was debated yesterday.

translation.lb: Den hèr Gromyko, de vertriéder vun den URSS huet sech kategoresch ge'nt d'admissio'n ausgesprach, wat natirlech hefteg discussio'nen ausgele'st huet.
translation.en: Mr. Gromyko, the representative of the USSR, categorically spoke against admission, which naturally sparked heated discussions.

translation.lb: Als énzege grond hât Russland ugin, des länner hätte keng diplomatesch relatio'ne matt Moskau.
translation.en: Russia gave as the sole reason that these countries had no diplomatic relations with Moscow.

translation.lb: De Paul Hasluck, Australien, reit dorophin eng schärf attack ge'nt de Gromyko.
translation.en: Paul Hasluck of Australia then launched a sharp attack against Gromyko.

translation.lb: Ironesch sét hién, datt an der Charta vun de Verénte Natio'ne neischt driwer stét, datt e land misst a verbindong matt Moskau sin, fir an d'UNO opgeholl ze gin.
translation.en: He ironically stated that nowhere in the UN Charter does it say a country must have ties to Moscow to join the UN.

translation.lb: Russland soll weider erklärongen ofgin a stellong huelen, wo'rop de Gromyko behapt huet, hié war deitlech gewiéscht.
translation.en: Russia should further explain and take a stand, to which Gromyko claimed he had been clear.

translation.lb: Australie get vu Frankreich, England, Holland, Egypten an den USA ënnerstëtzt,
translation.en: Australia is supported by France, England, the Netherlands, Egypt, and the USA,

translation.lb: D'fro stellt sech, pp e land d'recht huet, d'admissio'n vun engem aneren ze verbidden, dat d'conditio'ne vun der Charta' erteilt.
translation.en: The question arises whether a country has the right to forbid the admission of another that meets the Charter's conditions.

translation.lb: Dat ass eng schwiereg rechtsfro, de' e'schter vun enger internationaler Cour gele'st misst gin.
translation.en: That is a difficult legal question that should preferably be resolved by an international court.

translation.lb: De brasilianeschen delege'erten ass iwerzégt, datt Russland ké recht huet, an desem fall sei veto anzeréchen.
translation.en: The Brazilian delegate is convinced that Russia has no right to exercise its veto in this case.

translation.lb: De président Oscar Lange vertrëtt de polnesche standponkt, dé net ge'nt Transjordanien ass, mé hié propose'ert d'décisio'n ere'scht an engem jor ze treffen.
translation.en: President Oscar Lange represents the Polish standpoint, which is not against Transjordan but suggests the decision be made in a year.

translation.lb: Och ge'nt d'zo'lôsse vun Irland a Portugal hëllt de Gromyko stellong ge'nt' Frankreich an England,
translation.en: Gromyko also opposes the admission of Ireland and Portugal against France and England,

translation.lb: Physesch erze’ong an arbecht Et ass net ze léchnen, datt dliéwensconditio'nen vun liant dem bediérfnes vun de physesehen iibongen, dat onmëttelbar matt onser natur verbonr.en ass, bâl guer net me' gerecht gin.
translation.en: Physical education and work It cannot be denied that the living conditions of many do not often meet the needs for physical exercise, which is directly connected with our nature.

translation.lb: Wuel kennt de bauer nach d'iiéwe vun der frëscher loft, mé seng arbechi l'uerdert ganz oft eng gro ss muskelustrengong vun him, de' sengem kiérper net emmer vu virdél ass.
translation.en: Certainly, the farmer still knows the life of fresh air, but his work often demands great muscular exertion from him, which is not always beneficial for his body.

translation.lb: D'entwéck long vum stad-liéwe verschaff dem mënsch emmer me eng existenz, durcli de den organissem nemme nach seien op seng rechnong kennt.
translation.en: The development of city life increasingly provides people with an existence in which the organism only reckons with itself.

translation.lb: Den intellectuelilen arbechlcr Intet bestënimt am méschten durch sedeularite't ze leiden.
translation.en: The intellectual worker is particularly prone to suffering from monotony.

translation.lb: D'énto'negkét vu senger arbecht stompt d'activile't so'xvuel vu kiérper we' vu gesellt of an hic bréngt et uo enger zeit kaum nach fèrdeg, irgend eppes ausser senger automateschcr beschäftegong z'ënnerhuelcn.
translation.en: The monotony of his work blunts the activity of both body and mind, and at some point, he hardly manages to undertake anything beyond his automatic tasks.

translation.lb: Enner de manuellen arbechter ass et trotz allem uschcin net besser bestallt.
translation.en: Among manual workers, the situation does not appear to be any better despite everything.

translation.lb: Siéwen dat nun: schwe'ernrbechter, fabrikarbechter oder me' gemiissegt arbechter.
translation.en: Whether they are heavy laborers, factory workers, or more balanced workers.

translation.lb: Vum schwe'crarbechter gin aussergewe'niech stärk lokal muskelujtrengonge verlângt, de' net seien déformatio'n {muskelhyperlrophie matt sech breiigen.
translation.en: The heavy laborer faces demands for unusually strong local muscular exertion, which can lead to deformation such as muscle hypertrophy.

translation.lb: A verschiddene fäll schallt hiéu eso'guer an enger ganz penibler hailong, a schlechter atmosphèr bei schlechlem geltcbts aew.
translation.en: In some cases, this may even occur in very cumbersome healing, in poor atmospheres with poor salaries, etc.

translation.lb: An de fabreken ass et oft net besser, a wer do fanne mer virun allem den arbechtcr, de maschinnen zc bedéngen huet.
translation.en: In factories, it is often not better, and there we mainly find the worker who has to operate machines.

translation.lb: De maschlnismus an d'andélong vun der arbecht hu wud d'uluerderong un d'muskelkrâfl' slârlc erofgesal.
translation.en: Mechanization and the division of labor have significantly reduced the demands on muscular strength.

translation.lb: axver duerge'nt d'nervenustrengong an engem aussergewe'nleche niôss erhe'cht.
translation.en: However, they have increased the nervous strain to an extraordinary degree.

translation.lb: De'selwccht oder ähnlech situalio'ne tanne mer bei dene me' gemässegten arbechter. we' coiffeur, hacker, chauffeur a. e. w.
translation.en: We find similar or identical situations among the more moderate workers, like hairdressers, hackers, chauffeurs, and so on.

translation.lb: Kurz a gudd, et niuss én unhuelen, du II den arbechler, ob intellectuel] oder manuell, eng ergänzend betätegong eso' nedeg huct, we' de kic-rper och seng ro' net entbiérc kann.
translation.en: In short, one must assume that both intellectual and manual workers need a complementary activity, as the body cannot do without its balance.

translation.lb: De' mcscht Jänner hun och d'no'twennegkét vum compensatio'ns-sport erkannt an an déne méschte fäll ass et eso'guer dprivatrnitiativ, de' dem beamten, dem le'erjong an dem arbechter des sportsbctätegong geschafen bue.t.
translation.en: Most men have also recognized the necessity of compensatory sports, and in most cases, it is even private initiative that has created these sports activities for civil servants, apprentices, and workers.

translation.lb: lit ass net ze léclinen.
translation.en: It cannot be denied.

translation.lb: datt d'physesch erze'ong um soziale plang eng ganz gro'ss roll spi'llt an doduerch ass et selbstversländlech an absolut no'twenneg, datt bei der organisalio'n vum arbechter senger freizcit, d'cultnre physique an de sport müssen d'basis sin.
translation.en: That physical education plays a very big role on a social level and therefore it is self-evident and absolutely necessary that in organizing the worker's free time, physical culture and sports must form the basis.

translation.en: A geographical map in the Mediterranean found among the manuscripts of the Saltykov-Schtschedrin city library (Russia) discovered a map from the Middle Ages.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech em e wicrk vum re'mesehe gele'erten a philosoph Macrob i u s.
translation.en: It concerns a work by the Roman scholar and philosopher Macrobius.

translation.lb: An engem vu senge commentaren iwert e wierk vum Cicero entwickelt de Macrobius seng opfâssong iwert den opbau vum Universum a vun onsem planet au illusfre'ert seng hvpothes matt enger landkârt.
translation.en: In one of his commentaries on a work by Cicero, Macrobius develops his concept of the structure of the universe and our planet and illustrates his hypothesis with a map.

translation.lb: Et ass de' kârt, de 'elo nö me' we' 1000 joer eremfond go'f.
translation.en: It is the map that has now been rediscovered after more than 1000 years.

translation.lb: Si illustre'ert eng gro'ss zuel vu fre'eren opfàssongen.
translation.en: It illustrates a great number of earlier concepts.

translation.lb: Nom Macrobius senger ménong könnt onse planet a 5 climatesch zonen agedélt gin, de' e fârwcg agezéchent huet: zwo' polarzwo' gemässegt an eng tropesch zon.
translation.en: According to Macrobius's opinion, our planet can be divided into 5 climatic zones, which he indicated with colors: two polar zones, two temperate zones, and one tropical zone.

These were won on the following numbers: 14t — 365 — 220 — 520 — 254 — 405 — 217 — 519 — 102 — 67 — 154 — 143 — 343.
