translation.lb: Fielse falen an e se’ St. Gallen.
translation.en: Rocks fall into Lake St. Gallen.

translation.lb: — Eng gewalteg uass vu fiélsen, de' op 300 000 m3 geschätzt get, huet sech de lèschten dënschdeg vun engem bierg gele'st, dén iwer d'nördlecht uter ,vum „Wallenstadterse"' gehangen huet.
translation.en: A massive quantity of rocks, estimated at 300,000 m3, detached last Tuesday from a mountain overhanging the northern shore of Lake Wallenstadt.

translation.lb: Beim opschlag vun der mass op d'wâsserfläch wer e firchterlecht gedausch ze he'eren an en he'ge wellegank huet direct agesat.
translation.en: Upon impact of the mass on the water surface, a terrible noise was heard, and a high wave surge immediately started.

translation.lb: Op den uferen hun d'wellen eng he'cht vu 5 bis 6 meter errécht.
translation.en: On the banks, the waves reached a height of 5 to 6 meters.

translation.lb: Kleng schëffer go'we vun de welle lassgerappt an entfe'ert, mauere sin a sech zesummegefall.
translation.en: Small boats were torn away by the waves and carried off, walls collapsed into themselves.

translation.lb: Eng fra, de' am moment vum ongléck um se' geruddert huet, go'f vun de welle verschlongen.
translation.en: A woman, who was rowing on the lake at the moment of the accident, was swallowed by the waves.

translation.lb: Hir leich könnt bis de moment nach net opfond gin.
translation.en: Her body has not yet been found until now.

translation.lb: Moskau iwert dem Montgomery seng Canadarés
translation.en: Moscow on Montgomery's Canadian visit

translation.lb: An engem coramentar iwer dem marschall Montgomery seng lés no Canada, huet de Moskauer sendet- erklärt:
translation.en: In a commentary on Marshall Montgomery's visit to Canada, the Moscow correspondent stated:

translation.lb: Ddeclaratio'nen, de' de Montgomery a Canada gemâch huet, beweisen deitlech, datt se e militäiresche sënn hun, dofir liweren och d'uertschaften, de' hié besieht huet, de beweis.
translation.en: The declarations made by Montgomery in Canada clearly show that they have a military intent, likewise, the places he visited provide the evidence.

translation.lb: Sei message un d'canadescht vollek wor neischt ancschtes, we':,,Wann dir de f'ridde wellt, da beréd iécli op de krich vir.
translation.en: His message to the Canadian people was nothing other than: "If you want peace, then prepare for war."

translation.lb: Verschidde canadcseh reidonge sin der ménong, datt aus den décilaratio'ne vum Montgomery erausfond könnt gin, datt Canada an de girenzgebidder vis-à-vis,,vu sengem nördleche" noper ganz éscht virberédongen trefft.
translation.en: Various Canadian reports suggest that from Montgomery's declarations, it can be inferred that Canada is making serious preparations in the border areas against its 'northern' neighbor.

translation.lb: „Mö et, wert schwt'er sin, dese „noper" z iwcrzégen, datt des mesuren harmlos sin an et brauch och ké sech ze verwonneren. wann dese „noper" da coniermesuren ergreift".
translation.en: 'Well, it will be difficult to convince this 'neighbor' that these measures are harmless, and it is no surprise if this 'neighbor' then takes countermeasures.'

translation.lb: D’maquisare feieren
translation.en: The maquisards celebrate.

translation.lb: Ons maquisaren huele munnechmal dat no. wat si am krich eso' lâng verseimt an entbirt hun.
translation.en: Our maquisards sometimes take what they missed and longed for during the war.

translation.lb: Dat ass flirt gudd recht, zemiol well s'et jo nttre mächen, fir nés alléguer zesummen ze kommen, fir bir frendschaft a.n hir komerodschafl aus newegter zeit ze feslegen, fir sech u vergangenes z'erënncren.
translation.en: That is completely fair, especially since they aim to come together again, to celebrate friendship and their camaraderie from past times, to remember the past.

translation.lb: a fir net ze schnell ze vergiéssen, wat én déni anere schêlleg ass.
translation.en: And to not too quickly forget what one owes the other.

translation.lb: DuerfiT haten si fir en dënsohdeg bir familjen a frënn zu engem lëschtegen owend an den ABC op d'schuelierfo er agelutden.
translation.en: Therefore, they had invited family and friends to a cheerful evening at the ABC on the school yard for Sunday evening.

translation.lb: Y'un ufank u wor hochbetrîeb ail d'stëmmong ausgezéchent intim.
translation.en: From the beginning, the activity was in full swing, and the atmosphere was particularly intimate.

translation.lb: Do go'f sech amese'ert, et go'f gesongen a gedanzt, et go'f erziélt a gelâcht, we' dat nuren am zéche vun echter frëndschaft an treier kosnerodsclvaft me'gleoh ass.
translation.en: There was entertainment, singing, and dancing, stories were told, and laughter was shared, as is only possible in the sign of true friendship and loyal camaraderie.

translation.lb: Den Orchester huet duerfir gesnergt, datt de geäeoikrbeuma aus der zeit vun de flehte bunker, VUTI de käle bescher a vun de verstëpste speicheren aus de glidder gezun ass.
translation.en: The orchestra provided the musical notes that were reminiscent of the time of fleeing the bunkers, of the cold shelters, and of the hidden storages.

translation.lb: E spezielle merci un tl'propriétaire vum ABC an un all de', de' zur versche'nerong vum owend beigetlroei; bun.
translation.en: A special thanks to the owner of the ABC and to all those who contributed to the beautification of the evening.

translation.en: Previously, Wallace had stated that he hoped the foreign ministers' conference would conclude before the congressional elections scheduled for November.

translation.lb: Pressattack ge’nt de president Truman New York.
translation.en: Press attack against President Truman in New York.

translation.lb: — D'zeidong „New Y'ork Sun" publize'ert op hirer e'schter seit e ilcitartiket vun 2 koloiuien, an denen eng altaek ge'nt de président Truman ausgele'st gel, we' Amerika se bis elo nach net erliéwt huet.
translation.en: — The newspaper 'New York Sun' publishes on its first page an article of 2 columns, in which an attack against President Truman is unleashed, as America has not yet experienced.

translation.en: Before the article appears a drawing depicting the president asleep.

translation.lb: malt enger notiz derbei:,,Erwècht lier Truman, Ert land ass a gefor."
translation.en: with a note next to it: 'Awaken Mr. Truman, your country is in danger.'

translation.lb: Ain artikel héscht et haptsächlech: „De président vun Amerika huet sech allem uschein no vun de suergen, der angscht an de préoccupatio'nen cwechgehaien, de' d'ganzt amerikanescht vollek ugin.
translation.en: In the article, it mainly states: 'The President of America has apparently shrugged off the worries, fears, and concerns that preoccupy the entire American people.

translation.lb: Würenddém de président d'sâche vun der lichter seit aus geseit, ass d'ganzt land krank an et get et emmer mc\ D'productio'n ass an damp opgângen, mé de président schle'ft emmer nach."
translation.en: While the president views matters from the bright side, the whole country is sick and it is deteriorating. Production has gone up in smoke, yet the president is still asleep.'

translation.en: The newspaper invites the president to get up, take a cold shower, and develop and proclaim a new program of practical action.

translation.lb: Bankiwerfall durch terroristen zu Jaffa Jerusalem.
translation.en: Bank robbery by terrorists in Jaffa Jerusalem.

translation.lb: — Terroristen hu gëschtor zu Jaffa d'banke Barclay an Ottoman attacke'ert.
translation.en: — Terrorists attacked the Barclay and Ottoman banks in Jaffa yesterday.

translation.lb: En arabeschen hëllefspolizist ass do't leie bliwen.
translation.en: An Arab auxiliary policeman was killed.

translation.lb: No engem kurze feiergefecht matt der polizei ass eng gewësscn zuel vun terroristen verhaft gin.
translation.en: After a brief firefight with the police, a certain number of terrorists were arrested.

translation.en: It seems as if part of the Barclay bank was blown up.

translation.en: English troops have been sent to Jaffa.

translation.en: A curfew was then enforced throughout the city of Jaffa and also in Tel Aviv.

translation.en: The police headquarters in Tel Aviv was also attacked by the terrorists.

translation.lb: 3 terroristen, de' verwond go'wen, konnten agefâng gin.
translation.en: 3 terrorists, who were wounded, were captured.

translation.lb: Bei der attack op d'bank Ottoman go'wc 9 judde vun enger polizeipatrull blessc'ert.
translation.en: In the attack on the Ottoman bank, 9 Jews from a police patrol were injured.

translation.lb: We' lescht norlchte besoen, ass et den ugreifer zwar gelpngcn, d'geld aus den tiroiren ze stiélen, mé si konnte net bis an d'kunimer vun de coffre-fort'e kommen.
translation.en: According to the latest reports, the attackers managed to steal the money from the drawers, but they could not reach the strong room.

translation.lb: D'jüddesch kreser zu Tel Aviv si revolte'ert iwert de' bandittenacten.
translation.en: The Jewish circles in Tel Aviv are revolted by the bandit acts.

translation.lb: de' d'ge'gesätz tëschent judden an Araber emmer me' vcrde'wen.
translation.en: which worsen the antagonism between Jews and Arabs more and more.

translation.en: It is assumed that the attackers are members of the "Stern Gang".

translation.lb: D'cheffe vun de geheimorganisatio'n,,Haganah" vcrl&ngen eng energesch bestrofong vun de schëllegen.
translation.en: The leaders of the secret organization "Haganah" demand a vigorous punishment of the guilty.

translation.lb: Et ass nach ze fre' virauszesoen, watfir eng stellong d'Araber anhuelen, mé e member vum arabeschen executif-comité, Emile Ghouri, huet déclare'ert:
translation.en: It is too early to predict what position the Arabs will take, but a member of the Arab executive committee, Emile Ghouri, declared:

translation.lb: „Wann de jiiddeschen terror sech un den arabeschen uertschafte vergreift an de verloscht vun arabesche menscheliéwen an arabeschem gudd erbeife'eren, da get et kloer, datt d'Araber net matt den hänn am scho'ss ro'eg bleiwen."
translation.en: "If the Jewish terror attacks Arab properties and causes the loss of Arab lives and goods, then it is clear that the Arabs will not sit idly by."

translation.lb: De generol Eisenhower kënnt an Deitschland
translation.en: General Eisenhower is coming to Germany.

translation.lb: New-York, 11. sept. — We' den amerikanesche Stabschef an Deitschland, generolmajo'er Huegner mattdélt, kënnt de generol Eisenhower a nexter zeit no Deitschland, wo' en d'amerikanesch truppen inspize'ert.
translation.en: New York, September 11 - As the American Chief of Staff in Germany, Major General Huegner, reports, General Eisenhower will soon come to Germany, where he will inspect the American troops.

translation.lb: Seng e'scht statio'n ass Frankfurt- Main a sein openthalt an Deitschland wèrt 10 dég daueren.
translation.en: His first stop is Frankfurt Main and his stay in Germany will last 10 days.

translation.lb: Duerno gét de generol Eisenhower och an d'amerikanesch zon vun E'streich.
translation.en: Then General Eisenhower will also go to the American zone of Austria.

translation.lb: We' weider bekanntgemâch go'f, sollen d'amerikanesch truppen an Europa op 1150.000 mann reduze'ert gin.
translation.en: As further announced, the American troops in Europe are to be reduced to 115,000 men.

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch militärregirong ass der ménong, datt des zuel duergét, fir hir autorite't ze stëtzen.
translation.en: The American military government believes that this number is sufficient to support their authority.

translation.lb: „Les Floralies“ De gemengerot vu Gent ge'w et begre'ssen, wann d'floralien am joer 1948 stattfanne ge'wen.
translation.en: „Les Floralies“ The city council of Ghent would welcome it if the floralies were held in the year 1948.

translation.lb: D'horticulteure sin ower der ménong, datt se net viru 1950 kennen ofgehale gin.
translation.en: However, the horticulturists are of the opinion that they cannot take place before 1950.

translation.lb: De' belsch horticulteure sin der ménong, datt ere'scht am joer 1950 alles eso' weit wir, fir datt och d'ausland sech kënnt richteg dru bedélegen, an datt de „Casino" och ere'scht fir da fèrdeg gebaut ka gin.
translation.en: The Belgian horticulturists are of the opinion that not until the year 1950 everything will be ready, so that foreign countries can properly participate, and that the 'Casino' can also only be completed by then.

translation.lb: Et wor nämlech am joer 1913 goplangt gin, eng gro'ss hâl aus stén ze bauen.
translation.en: It was planned back in the year 1913 to build a large hall out of stone.

translation.en: However, that project was not carried out back then because the war of 1914—1918 broke out.

translation.en: Malicious damage and unnecessary costs

translation.lb: A mengem haus ass de giéivel an d'hënnescht face ganz voller réss.
translation.en: In my house, the plaster and the back façade are full of cracks.

translation.lb: D'haus war nämleeh gestückelt gin.
translation.en: The house had been plastered after all.

translation.lb: Am october 44 hât ech den architect gefrot, fir et selwer machen ze lôssen, ech hätt arbechter fond, de' et gleich gemâch hätten.
translation.en: In October '44, I asked the architect to let it be done myself, as I had found workers who would have done it immediately.

translation.lb: Den hèr sot nén, dat gét net.
translation.en: The gentleman said no, that won't work.

translation.lb: Am februar 45 ko'me si de' nâss mauere kucken a fannen, datt et muss gemâch gin, eso'bâl d'wiéder sehe' get.
translation.en: In February '45, they came to look at the wet walls and found that it had to be done as soon as the weather turned better.

translation.lb: Am september gin ech perse'nlech bei den hèr T. fir eng crlabnes, ech kre'e gesot, ■ ech soll hannert den architcct.
translation.en: In September, I personally went to Mr. T. for a clearance; I was told to consult the architect.

translation.lb: Dén hèr sét mir, si sollen ons a ro' lôssen an hir rechnonge mächen.
translation.en: The gentleman told me they should let us know and make their calculations.

translation.lb: De summer ass ailes gcdréchent an de wanter erem nâss gin.
translation.en: The summer dried everything, and in the winter, it became wet again.

translation.lb: Vir engem mo'nt woren zwé héren hei, de' fond hun, datt de gips och faul ass, an elo wèrd et jo nés fir e joer dobei bleiwen.
translation.en: A month ago, two gentlemen were here, who found that the plaster is also rotten, and now it will likely remain like that for another year.

translation.lb: Net ze rechne matt der arbecht vun dém weissen dreck an den trapen all dag.
translation.en: Not to mention the work caused by the white debris on the stairs every day.

translation.lb: Eeh sin zwar eng fra, me ech hätt gemengt, wann se mech et démols selwer flécke gelôss hätten, da war mein haus elo net nach weider zerste'ert, ech hätt vill roserci, an de Staat vill geld gespucrt.
translation.en: I am indeed a woman, but I would have thought if they had let me repair it myself back then, my house wouldn't be further destroyed now, I would have had much less trouble, and the State would have saved a lot of money.

translation.lb: De Strôssburger prozess An der sëtzong vun e samschdeg huet d'dépositio'n vum Ecker urégong gin zu engem schärfe réquisitoire.
translation.en: The Strasbourg trial During the session on Saturday, Ecker's deposition turned into a severe indictment.

translation.lb: En huet zwar matt sengen aussoen e puer enlschéllgeongen ervirbruecht, mé en dreiwt d'sâch e bëssen ze weit, wann en dem Wagner merci dervir set, datt dén e begnodegt huet.
translation.en: He did bring some conclusions with his statements, but he takes it a bit too far when he thanks Wagner for pardoning him.

translation.lb: Dat huet awer net verhënnert, datt en de fre'ere gaujeifer belâscht huet, datsehvecht mecht, en och ge'nt de Schuppel an de Gaedecke, we' e sot, de' zw« hätten senger verurtélong beigewunnt.
translation.en: However, this did not prevent him from implicating the former district leader, and regrettably, he also accused Schuppel and Gaedecke, claiming the two had attended his trial.

translation.lb: Mé de Gaédecke Jéchent formell.
translation.en: But Gaedecke formally denied it.

translation.lb: D'fro kennt dann erem op d'déportatio'nen an op d'désertio'nen.
translation.en: The question then returns to the deportations and desertions.

translation.lb: „Jo oder nén. hu dir des uerder gin?" frét de commissaire vun der regirong.
translation.en: "Yes or no, did you give these orders?" asks the government commissioner.

translation.lb: „Jo", änhvert kloer an deitlBch de Wagner,,,mé nemmen op uerder vum Himmler."
translation.en: "Yes," answers Wagner clearly and distinctly, "but only on orders from Himmler."

translation.lb: „Wién des uerder un iéch gin huet, ass mir egal, sét de colonel Debisse, et ass de Wagner, dé responsabel gemâch muss gin.
translation.en: "Who gave you these orders, I do not care," says Colonel Debisse, "it is Wagner who must be held responsible.

translation.lb: Bei de nazien ass et emmer datsèlwecht, si hun emmer op uerder vun anere gehandelt.
translation.en: With the Nazis, it is always the same, they always acted on orders from others.

translation.lb: PROTEST ... weider uertschafte schle ’ ssen sech un: De gemengerot an d’Unio ’ n vu Waldbriedemes Resolutio ’n
translation.en: PROTEST ... further developments were joined: The municipal council and the Union of Waldbriedemes resolutions

translation.lb: Mir verlangen:
translation.en: We demand:

translation.lb: 1. D’ausfe’erong vun de geMtzer eso we’ sc vum gouvernement vu London aus prnclame'ert si gin.
translation.en: 1. The execution of the measures as proclaimed by the government of London.

translation.lb: 2. Dali endlech énergcseli mesüren ergralf gin gc'nt d'collaboralcuren an d’landesvcrre'der.
translation.en: 2. That finally energetic measures are taken against the collaborators and traitors of the country.

translation.lb: de’ elo erem mall der gleicher frcchhél we’ am krieh r.eli an der ëffenlleclikél bewegen an domatl d’ménnng vun alle guddc Letzeburger provoze’eren.
translation.en: Who now again with the same insolence as in the war are moving around in public and thereby provoking the opinion of all good Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: 3. Direct ausweisong vun allen nazien a faschisten aus dem land, an zo'gleich d'anzc'ong vun hirem gesamte verme'gen.
translation.en: 3. Direct expulsion of all Nazis and fascists from the country, and at the same time the seizure of their entire assets.

translation.lb: L Direct entzc'ong vu gcschäftsau handelsermächtcgoiigc vun de nazi- a faschisten-ausiiinner an uschlc'ssend vnn alle Letzcbnrgcr verre'der.
translation.en: 4. Direct withdrawal of business and trade licenses from Nazi and fascist foreigners and exclusion of all Luxembourgish traitors.

translation.lb: ö Erfassung an iwerfe'erong vu sämtleclie wlrtsehufts-collnborateuren an anze'ong vun hirem gesamte krichsgewënn.
translation.en: 5. Recording and transfer of all economic collaborators and confiscation of their entire war profits.

translation.lb: De gemengerot nn d'UNIO'N vu Waldbredemcs.
translation.en: The municipal council and the UNION of Waldbriedemes.

translation.lb: De friddens vertrag matt Italien Et wor veréiibart gin, datt d'expert'e vun de 4 gro'ssmächten direct ernannt sollte gin, fir nozesichen, wat fir matièren Italien disponibel huet datt récksicht dorobber, datt Italien net force'ert get, friém hëllef an usproch ze huelen.
translation.en: The peace treaty with Italy It was agreed that the experts from the 4 great powers should be directly appointed to investigate what resources Italy has, considering that Italy is not forced to take foreign help.

translation.lb: Desen accord ass als folleg vun enger mendlecher resolutio'n vum Bevin getraff gin, mé en offiziellen text ass dobei net opgesat gin.
translation.en: This agreement followed a verbal resolution by Bevin, but no official text was drawn up.

translation.lb: E fixen dag, un dém d'cxpert'cn liire rapport un d'ausseministeren ofgi müssen, ass net festgeluegt gin.
translation.en: A fixed day on which the experts must submit their report to the foreign ministers has not been specified.

translation.lb: D'décisio'n, e comité z'ernennen ass gefâsst gin, well eng ménongsverschiddenhét tëschent der russescher an der amerikanescher delegatio'n opkomm wor.
translation.en: The decision to appoint a committee was made because a disagreement arose between the Russian and the American delegation.

translation.lb: Nom russesche standponkt misst Italien eng zonim vun 300 millio'nen dollar (wèrt 1938) blechen.
translation.en: According to the Russian standpoint, Italy would have to pay a sum of 300 million dollars (value of 1938).

translation.lb: Vun deser zomm misst Russland 100 millio'ne kre'en als er.tschiédegong fir de schued, dén italienesch truppen a Russland gemat hun an 200 millio'nen do"ar misst Jugoslawie kre'en.
translation.en: Of this sum, Russia would receive 100 million as compensation for the damage caused by Italian troops in Russia, and Yugoslavia would receive 200 million.

translation.lb: Op dèr aner seit mengt d'amerikanesch delegatio'n Italien wir net amstand irgendeng zomm ze bezuelen.
translation.en: On the other hand, the American delegation believes Italy is not in a position to pay any amount.

translation.lb: Dese standponkt fo'sst op der tatsâch, datt Italien elo nach a gro'ssem môss op d'hëllef vun den Amerikaner ugewisen ass.
translation.en: This standpoint is based on the fact that Italy is still largely dependent on American aid.

translation.lb: Amerika huet Italien missen e prêt arîchten an et tt material ënnerstëtzen fir et der ziviler bevëlkerong me'glech ze mächen ze liéwen an e minimum vun de wichtegsten industrien erem op d'bén ze kre'en.
translation.en: America had to provide Italy with a loan and support it with material to make it possible for the civilian population to live and to get a minimum of the essential industries back on their feet.

translation.lb: De franse'schen ausseminister Bidault huet an dèr affaire keng besonnesch energesch positio'n ageholl, siéf et zu dèr enger seit nach zu dèr anerer.
translation.en: The French foreign minister Bidault did not take a particularly energetic position in this matter, neither on one side nor the other.

translation.lb: En huet awer op dem princip bestanen, datt Italien entschiédegonge schëlleg ass, an datt d'revendicatio'ne vu Frankreich op gleicher basis behandelt sollte gin, we' et matt anere froen och de fall wir.
translation.en: However, he insisted on the principle that Italy owes compensation and that France's claims should be handled on the same basis as other issues.

translation.lb: Onofhängeg vun desem préambule, liât d'Pareisscr conferenz nach zwo' aner „italienesch froen" op d'dagesuerdnong gesät.
translation.en: Independently of this preamble, the Paris conference added two other 'Italian questions' to the agenda.

translation.lb: Et get ugeholl, datt et sech em d'Triester fro an em grenzfroen handelt.
translation.en: It is assumed that it concerns the Trieste question and border issues.

translation.lb: D'reiefolg, an der de' aner froen. we' d'italienesch colonien, an d'schioksal vun der italienescher flott, ofgefèrdegt solle gin, get nach festgeluegt.
translation.en: The order in which other issues, such as the Italian colonies and the fate of the Italian fleet, are to be settled, is still being determined.

translation.lb: Et ass och nach net bestëmmt, we'ni d'deitsch fro zur sprôch kënnt.
translation.en: It is also not yet determined when the German question will be addressed.

translation.lb: FECHTEN De’fferdeng — Antwerpen 13—3
translation.en: FENCING Differdange — Antwerp 13—3

translation.lb: De fechtklub De'fferdeng könnt de leschte samschdeg crem eng ke'er e glänzende succès verbuchen.
translation.en: The fencing club Differdange was last Saturday able to celebrate a brilliant success once again.

translation.lb: Matt der mannschat't: Anen, Lamesch, Leischen, Wolter huet hién déne villen uwiésenden Zuschauer bewisen, datt d'fechten an onsem ländchen eng vun déne sportsrrten ass de' sech ge'nt d'auslännesch class matt am beschten erauszitt.
translation.en: With the team: Anen, Lamesch, Leischen, Wolter, they proved to the many attending spectators that fencing in our country is one of those sports that comes out best against foreign class.

translation.lb: De' stärk Antwerpener équipe, matt all hire champion'en huet des ke'er missen dru gléwen, an zwar an enger he'cht de' kén zweifei dpkomme lôsse kann.
translation.en: The strong Antwerp team, with all their champions, had to give in this time, undeniably.

translation.lb: Zwar muss én zu hirer entschëllegong unerkcnnen, datt si no der länger rés vun Antwerpen zimlech midd waren.
translation.en: Admittedly, one must acknowledge in their excuse that they were quite tired after the long journey from Antwerp.

translation.lb: Awer de succès vun dénen De'fferdenger ass verdéngt, wann en och e bësschen he'ch ausgefall ass.
translation.en: But the success of the Differdangers is well deserved, even if it was a bit exaggerated.

translation.lb: Hei sin d'resultater: (De'fferdeng ass virgenannt) Wolter-Peeters 3-1; Anen-De 3-0; Leischen-Uyttendaele 3-2; Lamcsch-Coppé 3-1; Wolter-De Meyer 3-0; Anen-Uyttendaele 3-1; Leisehcn-Coppé 1-3; Lamesch-Peeters 3-0; Wolter-Uyttendaele 3-2; Anen-Coppé 3-2; Leischen-Pceters 3-2; Lamesch-De Meyer 0-3; Woiter-Coppé 1-3; Anen-Peeters 3-1; Leischen-De Meyer 3-2; Lamesch-Uyttendaele 3-1.
translation.en: Here are the results: (Differdange listed first) Wolter-Peeters 3-1; Anen-De 3-0; Leischen-Uyttendaele 3-2; Lamesch-Coppé 3-1; Wolter-De Meyer 3-0; Anen-Uyttendaele 3-1; Leischen-Coppé 1-3; Lamesch-Peeters 3-0; Wolter-Uyttendaele 3-2; Anen-Coppé 3-2; Leischen-Peeters 3-2; Lamesch-De Meyer 0-3; Wolter-Coppé 1-3; Anen-Peeters 3-1; Leischen-De Meyer 3-2; Lamesch-Uyttendaele 3-1.

translation.lb: An enger exhibitio'n vevle'ert de Jost ge'nt de jongen talente'erten Fleuret-Fechter Maeyens matt 10-8.
translation.en: In an exhibition, Jost lost against the young talented foil fencer Maeyens 10-8.

translation.lb: Am säbel war den De Meu'.emcester, Antwerpen matt 10-6 besser we' den Hau, De'fferdeng, awer mer kennen den De'fferdenger nemmen zo' senger gudder haltong begl éckwcnschen.
translation.en: In saber, De Meucester, Antwerp was better with 10-6 than Hau, Differdange, but we can only congratulate the Differdange participant on his good attitude.

translation.lb: De'fferdeng gewännt also fir de' 2. ke'or de sche'ne pokal „Challenge de Meyer", awer Antwerpen huet sech geschwuer d'next joer revanche ze huele fir de' bluddeg nidderlag, de' De'fferdeng en des ke'er zo'gefügt huet.
translation.en: Differdange thus wins the beautiful trophy 'Challenge de Meyer' for the second time, but Antwerp has vowed to take revenge next year for the bloody defeat that Differdange inflicted on them this time.

translation.lb: Gauleiter Wagner zum do’t verurtélt
translation.en: Gauleiter Wagner sentenced to death

translation.lb: De fre'ere gauleiler vum Elsass, Robert Wagner ass gëschter vom Strôssburger militärgericht matt nach aner 4 ugekloten zum do't verurteil gin.
translation.en: The former gauleiter of Alsace, Robert Wagner, was sentenced to death yesterday by the Strasbourg military court along with four other accused.

translation.lb: Si wore fir schëlleg un den ermuerdcngen a fir den terror am Elsass vä rend der preisescher Qccupatio'n fond gin.
translation.en: They were found guilty of the murders and for terror in Alsace during the German occupation.

translation.lb: De' aner 4 zum do't verurtélt sin: de stellvertriédende gaujeiter Herman Roehn, de polizeichef Adolf Schuppel, de kreisleiter Hugo Gruener an de gauleiter-adjudant Waller Goedecke.
translation.en: The other four sentenced to death are: the deputy gauleiter Herman Roehn, the police chief Adolf Schuppel, the district leader Hugo Gruener, and the gauleiter adjutant Waller Goedecke.

translation.lb: Arn ganze woren dem gericht 144 froe gestallt gin.
translation.en: In total, 144 questions were posed to the court.

translation.lb: Den deitsche procureur, dé mattugeklot wor, ass zwar als schölleg befond gin, ass awer we'nst strofausschle'ssongsgrond op freie fo'ss gesät gin.
translation.en: The German prosecutor, who was also accused, was indeed found guilty, but was released due to grounds for exemption from punishment.

translation.lb: Begriéwnes vun der Mme Alb. Eberhard W o 11 z.
translation.en: Funeral of Mrs. Alb. Eberhard at 11 o'clock.

translation.lb: — Geseilter go'w op onsem kirfecht d'inadum Albert Eberhard, geb. Marie Kranlz, de' bei hirer Schwester zu Useldeng gestuerwen ass, zur leschter ro' gedroen.
translation.en: The late Albert Eberhard, née Marie Kranlz, who passed away at her sister's in Useldeng, was laid to rest in our cemetery.

translation.lb: Nodém vir ongefe'er engem joerzengt hir énzeg duechter gestueriyen ass, ass hire mann vir ongefe'er 7 me'nt engem schlag eriéen.
translation.en: After about a decade ago her only daughter died, her husband succumbed to a stroke around 7 months ago.

translation.lb: Elo ass hirt vu.battere schicksalsscble' gemartert fraenhiérz an den e'wege fridd agängen.
translation.en: Now her heart, tormented by bitter fate, has entered eternal peace.

translation.lb: Matt der madara Eberhard, venle'sst eng gro'sshiérzeg perso'n ons uertsehaft, de' stell an ergiéwen a Gottes hellege wëll hirt schwe'ert léd gedroen huet.
translation.en: With the passing of Mrs. Eberhard, a generous soul has left our community, who endured her heavy suffering with strength and submission to God's holy will.

translation.lb: Si hannerle'sst en e'erevolle souvenir bei all denen, de' si kannt h un.
translation.en: She leaves behind an honorable memory with all those who knew her.

translation.lb: D'iérd soll hir lichter sin ewe' hirt léd, dat si zeitliéwens gedroen huet, an dém si nun erlo'g.
translation.en: May the earth be gentle over her suffering, which she bore throughout her life and from which she is now released.

translation.lb: D’Pareisser conferenz * Am Palais du Luxembourg huet gëschter de franse'sche ministerpresident den delege'erten vun der friddensconferenz en iéssen offre'- ert.
translation.en: The Paris Conference * Yesterday at the Palais du Luxembourg, the French prime minister gave a dinner for the delegates of the peace conference.

translation.lb: Eng schwieregkét, de' d'nidderlag vun der Londoner conferenz erbeigefo'ert hât, huet d'conferenz scho vu vlrewech op d'seit geräumt, nämlech datt bei der ënnerzéchnong vun de friddensverträg nemmen de' Dinner a betracht kommen, de' matt dem Und, matt dém de vertrag önnerzéchent get, am krich musse gewiéscht sin.
translation.en: A difficulty, which the downfall of the London conference had brought about, had already been resolved by the conference in advance, namely that when signing the peace treaties, only those who were at war with the party with which the treaty is signed might be considered.

translation.lb: Bekanntlech hat op der Londoner ausseminlsterconferenz Frankreich gefuerdert, et misst bei de friddensverträg matt den osteuropäesche länner mattënnerzéchne können, wat vun der russescher delegatio'n ofgelént gi wor.
translation.en: As is known, at the London foreign ministers' conference, France had demanded that it must be able to co-sign the peace treaties with the Eastern European countries, which was rejected by the Russian delegation.

translation.lb: De fall ass elo eso' tranche'ert gin, datt all delege'ert zwar bei de berodongen derbei könne sin, awer net mattënnerzéchnen dèrfen, wann hirt land net am krièh wor matt dem land, dat de friddensverträg dicte'ert kritt.
translation.en: The case has now been decided in such a way that all delegates may participate in the consultations but are not allowed to co-sign if their country was not at war with the country dictating the peace treaty.

translation.lb: Démno ka Frankreich also nemmen de friddensvertrag matt Italien mattënnerzéchnen; Amerika d'vertiäg matt allen ausgeholl matt Finnland; England a Kussland bei de länner alleguerten.
translation.en: Thus, France can only co-sign the peace treaty with Italy; America with all except Finland; England and Russia with all countries.

translation.lb: MUSSOLINI De „Giornale d'Italia " ass der ménong, datt denr Mussolini seng leich ennerwé ass fir Spuenien.
translation.en: MUSSOLINI The 'Giornale d'Italia' believes that Mussolini's body is on its way to Spain.

translation.lb: D'prefectur vu Mailand soll en anonyme bre'f kritt hun, wo' des mattdélong dra stong.
translation.en: The prefecture of Milan is said to have received an anonymous letter containing this information.

translation.lb: D'enquête get matt alle mëttel weider bedriwen.
translation.en: The investigation continues with all available means.

translation.lb: Zënler 48 stonne befannen sech zwé fonctionnäre vun der gerîchtspolizei zu Bologna.
translation.en: Within 48 hours, two officials from the judicial police arrived in Bologna.

translation.lb: D'fra vum Mussolini sengem jong Bruno ass ersoff.
translation.en: The wife of Mussolini's son Bruno has drowned.

translation.lb: Si ass matt engem englesché ma.jo'er a matt zwo* anere fraen iwer de Como-sec gefuer.
translation.en: She was traveling on Lake Como with an English major and two other women.

translation.lb: D'boot ass an der mëtt vum wâsser ennergâng.
translation.en: The boat sank in the middle of the water.

translation.lb: De majo'er, dém sei numm net verëffentlecht go'f, an eng fra si gerett gin.
translation.en: The major, whose name was not published, and one woman were rescued.

translation.lb: Aus der UNIO ’N Unio’n Woltz Ail'l resistenzler vu WodtZ an aus <iem bezirk Woltz ass heimatt gebiéden, sech e sonndeg, den 12, mé 1946, dem dag vün der „Internationaler Resistenz" an der haptstad Letzeburg ze bedélegen.
translation.en: From the UNIO, a union of Woltz, all resistance fighters from Woltz and from the Woltz district are asked to attend the 'International Resistance' day in the capital Luxembourg, on Sunday, May 12, 1946.

translation.lb: — Ge'nt 11 auer fiert wahrscheialech en zuch.
translation.en: — Around 11 o'clock, a train will likely depart.

translation.lb: Du wars Letzeburger, du wärs och Letzeburger Meiwen.
translation.en: You were Luxembourgish, you would also be Luxembourgish in May.

translation.lb: Mir müssen ons solidarite't beweisen.
translation.en: We must show our solidarity.

translation.lb: Kommt a gro'sse massen.
translation.en: Come in large numbers.

translation.lb: De comité.
translation.en: The committee.

translation.lb: Problem Spuenien * Am englesche Parlament huet d'commissio'n zur ënnersichong vun der situatio'n a Spuenien eng erk'lärong publize'- ert.
translation.en: Problem Spain * In the English Parliament, the commission responsible for the investigation of the situation in Spain has published a declaration.

translation.lb: Dese bericht gel 1er UNO vun dem ënnerausschoss zur pre'fong virgeluegt.
translation.en: This report was submitted by the subcommittee for examination to the UNO.

translation.lb: Et get doranner och gefuerdert, d'nimm vun de krichsverbriécher, de' sech a Spuenien refuge'ert hun, ze publize'eren.
translation.en: It is also demanded therein to publish the names of the war criminals who have taken refuge in Spain.

translation.lb: De spueneschen aussei.iinister huet den auslandsjournaiiisten erklärt, datt d'spuenesch regirong der aillie'erter coramissio'n weder bei der opsichong vun de krichsverbriécher nach bei der feststellong iwer d'bestoe vun atomfnerschongsinslituter, an déne preisesch wëssenschaft'ler beschäftegt sollte sin, bchënnert hält.
translation.en: The Spanish Foreign Minister explained to foreign journalists that the Spanish government does not obstruct the allied commission in locating war criminals nor in determining the existence of nuclear research institutes where Prussian scientists are supposedly employed.

translation.lb: De ministerpresident vun der spuenescher exilregirong huet gëschter op enger pressconferenz zu London erklärt; seng regirong wir net derfir, de Francoregime a Spuenien matt militäresChe mëttelep ze beseitegen.
translation.en: The Prime Minister of the Spanish exile government stated at a press conference in London yesterday that his government was not in favor of removing the Franco regime in Spain by military means.

translation.lb: Et ge'w schon duergoen, wann de regim* moralesch verurtélt ge'w gin.
translation.en: It would already suffice if the regime were morally condemned.

translation.lb: Durch international mesüre kennt dann de regime zu fall bruecht gin.
translation.en: Through international measures, the regime could then be brought down.

translation.lb: Wann én énzeit land d'initiative heibei ergreife ge'w, da kennt et sech nemme schued mächen, d'initiaiive misst villme vun der UNO selwer ergraff gin.
translation.en: If any one country were to take the initiative here, it could only harm itself; the initiative should rather be taken by the UNO itself.

translation.lb: Am anere fall kennt a Spuenien erem de birgerkrich eropbeschwuer gin, wat awer verhënnert misst gin.
translation.en: In any other case, a civil war could be stirred up again in Spain, which must be prevented.

translation.lb: De Giral huet sech ge'nt eng oprichlong vun der monarchie ausgesprach, well de jelzege tro'nprétendent, Don Juan, sech am birgerkrich zu Burgos dem Franco zur verfügong gestallt hätt, fir a sengen arme'en ze dengen.
translation.en: Giral spoke against a restoration of the monarchy because the current throne pretender, Don Juan, had made himself available to Franco during the civil war in Burgos to serve in his armies.

translation.lb: Wann awer d'spuenescht vollek sech fir d'monarchie ausspriéche ge'w, da géng hicn dat och unhuelen.
translation.en: However, if the Spanish people were to express a desire for the monarchy, then he would also accept that.

translation.lb: A Spuenie wiren de moment adl de'jc'- neg, de' d'democratie an d'freihét gèren hun, an de prisongen a vu hirer seit wir eng aclio'n kaum z'erwârden.
translation.en: In Spain, currently all those who love democracy and freedom are in prisons, and from their side, an action is hardly to be expected.

translation.lb: Nemmen d'generél wiren amstand de Franco ze stîrzen, mé wién d'geschicht vu Spuenien an déne leschten 20 joer gelics huet, wéss, datt d'spuenesch generél alles aneschter sin, we' frënn vun der wirklecher démocratie.
translation.en: Only the generals would be capable of overthrowing Franco, but as the history of Spain in the last 20 years has shown, it is known that the Spanish generals are anything but friends of true democracy.

translation.lb: De Giral wèrd haut nach no Amerika ofrésen.
translation.en: Giral will depart for America later today.

translation.lb: D'commissio'n vum weltsëcherhétsrot, de* matt der durchslode'erong vun der spuenescher fro beoptragt gin ass, huet weidert material iwer des fro vu verschiddene ilänner zo'geschéckt kritt.
translation.en: The commission of the World Security Council, tasked with the resolution of the Spanish question, has received further material concerning this question from various countries.

translation.lb: Si weigert sech awer irgendwe' déclaratio'- nen iwer den inhalt an den ofsender vun desem material eppes bekanntzegin.
translation.en: However, they refuse to make any declarations about the content and the sender of this material known.

translation.lb: Persien ass geraumt
translation.en: Persia has been evacuated

translation.lb: De weltsëcherhétsrot trëtt haùt erem zu New York zesummen, fir seng berodongen iwer d persesch fro virunzefe'ren.
translation.en: The United Nations Security Council is meeting again today in New York to continue its deliberations on the Persian question.

translation.lb: Xo löschte meldongen soll Persien coniplett vu russeschen truppe geräumt sin.
translation.en: According to the latest reports, Persia is supposed to have been completely cleared of Russian troops.

translation.lb: Trotzdém vvèrt d'propositio'n, d'persesch fro ganz, vun der dagesuerdnong ze streichen, op hârde widderstand sto'ssen, well bis de moment weder d'persesch nach d'russesch regirong de' nouvelle confirme'ert hun.
translation.en: Nevertheless, the proposal to completely remove the Persian question from the agenda is likely to encounter strong resistance, as up to now neither the Persian nor the Russian government has confirmed the news.

translation.lb: Offiziell leie nemmen erkläronge' vum perseschen delege'erte vir.
translation.en: Officially, there are only statements from the Persian delegate.

translation.lb: no dénen de' 4 norddpersesch provënze geräumt sin.
translation.en: According to these, the 4 northern Persian provinces have been cleared.

translation.lb: Handelsofkommen Belgien-Letzeburg-Schweden * Den échange tëschent Schweden an der union économique belgo-luxembourgeoise be'léft sech op 380 millio'ne kro'- nen, wo'vuntier 210 millio'nen a Schweden importe'èrt gin an 170 an d'union économique.
translation.en: Trade Agreement Belgium-Luxembourg-Sweden * The exchange between Sweden and the Belgian-Luxembourg Economic Union amounts to 380 million kroons, of which 210 million are imported into Sweden and 170 into the economic union.

translation.lb: E ge'genseitege credit vun 100 millio'ne kro'nen (1 milliard a 45 miil'lio'ne frang) ass bewëllegt gin.
translation.en: A mutual credit of 100 million kroons (1 billion and 45 million francs) has been granted.

translation.lb: De cours ass op 10,45 frang fir d'kro'n feslgesat gin.
translation.en: The rate has been fixed at 10.45 francs for the kroon.

translation.lb: Op der aner seit ass en zo'saz zum belsch-finneschen handelsofkomme vum 6. november 1915 den 22. März 191 G ënnerzéchent gin.
translation.en: On the other side, an addition to the Belgian-Finnish trade agreement from November 6, 1915, was signed on March 22, 1916.

translation.lb: Desen zo'sazvertrag erbe'cht d'contingent vun holz aus Finnland, wo'ge'nt d'union économique me' nél a pneu'én ausfe'ert.
translation.en: This supplementary contract increases the quota of timber from Finland, while the economic union exports more tires.

translation.lb: Finnland huet sech och engage'ert, gewëssen holz-dériver a producten ze liweren.
translation.en: Finland has also committed to delivering certain wood derivatives and products.

translation.lb: Schle'sslecb figure'eren ënnert de belsch-letzëburgesche wueren, de' eigentlech no Spuenien exporte'ert soHte gin, 3 gramm radium.
translation.en: Finally, among the Belgian-Luxembourgish goods that were actually supposed to be exported to Spain, there are 3 grams of radium.

translation.lb: Den Asserbaidschan an de Kurdistan sin d’accord
translation.en: Azerbaijan and Kurdistan are in agreement.

translation.lb: De' méscht zeidonge v-un Teheran verëffentlechen d'terme vum accord, dén t>ëschent dem Asserbaidschan an der kurdescher nationalregirong ënnerzéchent gin ass.
translation.en: Most newspapers from Tehran publish the terms of the agreement that was signed between Azerbaijan and the Kurdish national government.

translation.lb: Am virwuert vum accord get iwer d'tyrannei geschwat, de' d'zentralregirong vun Teheran emmer ge'nt den Asserba'.dschan a ge'nt de Kurdistan ugewand huet.
translation.en: In the preface of the agreement, it talks about the tyranny that the central government of Tehran has always applied against Azerbaijan and against Kurdistan.

translation.lb: Duerno get op de faschisteschen terror am Iran higewisen.
translation.en: Then, it points to the fascist terror in Iran.

translation.lb: Fir d'freihét van den zwé gebidder secher ze stellen, sin den 23. àbrël d'kordesch leader matt de regirongscheffe vum Asserbaidschan zesumme komm, fir sech iwer folgend ponkten ze énegen:
translation.en: To ensure the freedom of the two regions, on April 23, the Kurdish leaders met with the heads of the government of Azerbaijan to agree on the following points:

translation.lb: 11 D'vertriéder vun den zwé vëlker huele kontakt mattenén, fir ge'geseiteg ménongen auszetauschen an sech renscignementer ze gin.
translation.en: 1) The representatives of the two peoples will maintain contact to exchange mutual opinions and provide information to each other.

translation.lb: 2) An alle gebidder vum Asserbaidschan, wo' Kurde liéwen, an an alle gebidder vum Kurdistan, wo' Asserbaidschaner liéwen, treffen de' zwo' regirongen all dispositio'- non, fir de friéme behëlleflech ze sin a fir si un der activité'! viin der regirong, vun dèr si of hangeie-ein, délhuclcn ze lôssen.
translation.en: 2) In all regions of Azerbaijan, where Kurds live, and in all regions of Kurdistan, where Azerbaijanis live, the two governments will make all arrangements to assist the inhabitants and to keep them away from the activities of the government to which they are subject.

translation.lb: 3) AU schwicregkcten, de' tëschent den zwo' nftio'nen eventuell optauche könnten, gi vu gcmëschte kommissio'ne "beigél'uêgt.
translation.en: 3) Any difficulties that might arise between the two nations will be resolved by mixed commissions.

translation.lb: 4) De' zwo' regironge verspriéchen sech ge'geseiteg militäresch hëllcf, wann et no'twenneg soll sin.
translation.en: 4) The two governments promise each other mutual military aid if it should be necessary.

translation.lb: 5) Wann de' zwo' nntio'nen sech op hirc standpockte geénegt hun, solle bespriéchonge n ait Teheran gcfo'ert gin.
translation.en: 5) When the two nations have agreed on their positions, discussions should be held with Tehran.

translation.lb: 6) Fir hir civilisatio'n an hir nationalsprôch ze pflegen, bleiwen defi Asserbaidschan an de Kurdistan a fortwärender verbinden;; mattenén.
translation.en: 6) To maintain their civilization and national languages, Azerbaijan and Kurdistan will remain continuously connected with each other.

translation.lb: 7) Alleguct'ten. de' d'frëndschaft tëschcnt de zwo' natio'nc sfëVrén oder er.g spannong crbcifc'cre Wellen, gi schwe'er bestroft.
translation.en: 7) Anyone who tries to disturb the friendship between the two nations or increases tension will be severely punished.

translation.lb: Séf vu mënscheflésch E vun déne kriminellste prozessen an der italienescher geschieht ass momentan zu Mailand am gâng.
translation.en: Soap from human flesh One of the most criminal trials in Italian history is currently taking place in Milan.

translation.lb: Eng fra, Leonardo Gianculli, ass ugeklot, drei vun hire frëndinnen zerschnidden ze hu fir d'flésch zur fabricatio'n vu séf ze gebrauchen.
translation.en: A woman, Leonardo Gianculli, is accused of having cut up three of her friends to use the flesh for the production of soap.

translation.lb: Nodéin se hir frëndinnen do't gemâch hat, huet se d'leich a I leng stécker geschnidden, de' se an e kessel matt Lachendem wâsser geworf huet.
translation.en: After she had done this to her friends, she cut the body into long pieces and threw them into a cauldron of boiling water.

translation.lb: An hire mémoiren, de' s'elo am prisong geschriwen huet,'sc, datt se gedrénks a kuch gemâch huet, de' se hire victimen offre'ert huet.
translation.en: In her memoirs, which she is now writing in prison, she states that she made drinks and cake which she offered to her victims.

translation.lb: „Ech hu mënschlecht bludd an de scliokela gemäch a matt aneis, vanille an aner gewîrzer vermëscht, wat em e besonnesch gudde goût gin huet.
translation.en: “I made chocolate with human blood and mixed it with anise, vanilla and other spices, which gave it a particularly good taste.

translation.lb: Heianlo hun.ech och pudder vu mënschleche knachen derbei gemâch."
translation.en: Moreover, I also added powder from human bones.”

translation.lb: Si erziélt da weider. we' se hir frëndin Francesca Soavi do'tgemâch huet:
translation.en: She then continues to recount how she did this to her friend Francesca Soavi:

translation.lb: „Wärendem meng victime den elixir gedronk huet, dat ""ch hir virgesal hun, hun ech mech hannert se gestallt an hun hir matt enger âxt an d'genéck gehaen, so'datt de kapp bat ganz erof gong.
translation.en: “While my victim was drinking the elixir I had prepared for her, I stood behind her and struck her in the neck with an axe, so that the head came completely off.

translation.lb: Ech hun da meng hänn an hirt bludd gedaucht au de kiérper a néng stécker geschnidden, de' ech dann an de kessel matt Lachendem wâsser geworf hun.
translation.en: I then dipped my hands in her blood and cut the body into nine pieces, which I threw into the cauldron of boiling water.

translation.lb: Dorophin hun ech dann eng ganz intressant experienz gemâch: We' ech de lèffel an dat Lachend gebrei g zappt an erem erausgezun hun, geso'ch ech eng Substanz am lèffel, de' der séf ganz ähnlech vvor.
translation.en: Afterwards, I had a very interesting experience: When I dipped the spoon into the boiling brew and pulled it out again, I saw a substance in the spoon, which was very similar to soap.

translation.lb: Et wor d'flésch, dat sech am wâsser an eng art wuess opgele'st hat.
translation.en: It was the flesh that had dissolved in the water into a kind of wax.

translation.lb: Doranner hun ech dann eng wick gezun an ech hat op de' mane'er eng sehe' kèrz fabrize'ert."
translation.en: In this, I then inserted a wick and thus manufactured a beautiful candle."

translation.lb: Eng patriotin get an der hémecht begruewen Dikerech.
translation.en: A patriot is buried in her homeland Dikrech.

translation.lb: — Op eng tragesch mane'er wor d'lescht joer am juni d'fra vum coiffeurmcschter J. P. Mergen vun hei em d'Iiéwe komm.
translation.en: — In a tragic manner, last year in June, the wife of master hairdresser J. P. Mergen from here lost her life.

translation.lb: Op der hémrés aus dem emsidelongslager Boberslein wor d'Mme Merten zu Sittard (bei Maastrich) an Holland ënner den zuch geroden, den si an d'hémecht brénge sollt, an zu do'd gefuer gin.
translation.en: On the return from the resettlement camp Boberslein, Mrs. Merten in Sittard (near Maastricht) in Holland was hit by the train that was supposed to bring her to her homeland, and she was killed.

translation.lb: Si wor zu Sittard begruewe gin.
translation.en: She was buried in Sittard.

translation.lb: E freideg nun huet de rapatriement d'Mme Mergen hémgeholl Si ass e sonndeg de mëtteg hei zu Dikerech um kirfecht beigesât gin.
translation.en: On Friday, the repatriation brought Mrs. Mergen home. She was buried here at the cemetery in Dikrech on Sunday afternoon.

translation.lb: Net nemme ganz Dikerech.
translation.en: Not only all of Dikrech,

translation.lb: well Mergens Jemp ass stad- a landbekannt, och vill deidd aus der emge'- gend a leidensgenossen aus der emsiedlong haten sech eng e'er draus gemäch, fir d'Mme Mergen op hirem leschte wê ze begléden.
translation.en: because Mergens Jemp is well-known in town and country, but also many people from the surroundings and fellow sufferers from the resettlement had made it an honor to accompany Mrs. Mergen on her last journey.

translation.lb: Dem hèr Mergen a sengem énzege jong, dem am krich refractaire wor, soll de sympathiebeweis e klengen tro'scht an hirem gro'sse déd sin.
translation.en: To Mr. Mergen and his only son, who was a war resister, the expression of sympathy is meant to be a small comfort in their great sorrow.

translation.lb: Zum prozess Anton Thill
translation.en: Regarding the trial of Anton Thill

translation.lb: An onser donneschdeg-ntommer war "am compte-rendu iwer d'défense de sënn net deitlech ne'ergeschriwe gin.
translation.en: In our Thursday issue, the 'account of the defense was not clearly written down.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schock weil er war net '-n den Thill erugetrueden, fir hién an d'VDB ze brengen.
translation.en: Mr. Schockweiler, because he had not appeared against Thill, to bring him to the VDB.

translation.lb: Et wore nemmen de' leschlgenannt Kons a Sinner, de' heiru belédegt woren.
translation.en: It was only the aforementioned Kons and Sinner who were offended by this.

translation.lb: Den hèr Schockweiler wor am ge'gendél en e'schtklassege patriot.
translation.en: Mr. Schockweiler was, on the contrary, a first-class patriot.

translation.lb: É wor 4 joer am (KZ a stong virum sondergerîcht.
translation.en: He was in a concentration camp for 4 years and stood before the special court.

translation.lb: Revue Technique Luxembourgeoise D'Revue Technique ass d'o gan vun der „Association des Ingénieurs et Industrieis Luxembourgeois".
translation.en: Revue Technique Luxembourgeoise is the organ of the "Association des Ingénieurs et Industriels Luxembourgeois".

translation.lb: Des associatio'n ass 1897 gegrënd gin an huet e schnellen opschwonk erfuer.
translation.en: This association was founded in 1897 and experienced rapid growth.

translation.lb: 1930 huet si 745 member geziélt, de' zum gro'ssen döl hei am land, a Belgien an an Frankreich geschafft hun, an zur rescht iwer d'ganz weit versprét woren.
translation.en: In 1930, it counted 745 members, the majority of whom worked here in the country, in Belgium and France, and the rest were scattered all over the world.

translation.lb: Vun 1901 un huet d'associatio'n e périodique erausgin, fir technesch a wëssenschaftlech ofhand'longen ze publize'eren.
translation.en: From 1901, the association published a periodical to disseminate technical and scientific treatises.

translation.lb: Des publicatio'n huet eng verdengschtvoll vergângenhét, well si d'zesummenarbecht an d'ménongsausteisch an der industriebr nche erfîchtert an ugespornt huet.
translation.en: This publication has a meritorious past because it facilitated and encouraged collaboration and exchange of ideas in the industrial sector.

translation.lb: Am krich huet d associatio'n sech net frei entwickele kennen, an hir reie sin décime'ert gin.
translation.en: During the war, the association could not develop freely, and its ranks were decimated.

translation.lb: De' e'scht nokrichsnummer vun Revue Technique ass erschengen, a propperer a gefälleger opmâchong.
translation.en: The first post-war issue of Revue Technique appeared with a neat and pleasing format.

translation.lb: Den haptartikel hält eng conferenz vum Prof. Dr. M. Ros, Zürich iwert d'thema: „Constructions du génie civil en Suisse".
translation.en: The main article features a lecture by Prof. Dr. M. Ros from Zurich on the topic: "Constructions of Civil Engineering in Switzerland".

translation.lb: Illustrationen a form vu fotoen a scbemaen si se'er opschlossreich.
translation.en: Illustrations in the form of photos and diagrams are particularly informative.

translation.lb: Ferner figure'eren e virwuert, eng chronique, eng nécrologie an en bibliographie.
translation.en: Additionally, a foreword, a chronicle, a necrology, and a bibliography are included.

translation.lb: Den amerikanesche senat vote’ert matt 46 ge’nt 34 stëmmen den emprunt fir England 45
translation.en: The American senate voted with 46 against 34 votes for the loan to England 45

translation.lb: D'debatten iwer den amerikàneschén emprunt un England, de' elo scho 4 Wochen am amerikanesche senat stattfond hun, si geseilter durch d'définitiv ofstëmîuong zu enn gefo'ert gin.
translation.en: The debates over the American loan to England, which have already taken place for 4 weeks in the American senate, were concluded by a definitive vote.

translation.lb: Matt 46 gc'nt 34 stemme go'w den emprunt un England ugeholl.
translation.en: The loan to England was accepted with 46 against 34 votes.

translation.lb: 29 democratesch a 17 republikanesch Senatoren hun sech fir den emprunt ausgesprach, op der aner seit hun Sech 19 ïepublikaner a 15 demoeraten, de' haptsächlech aus de süd-, west- an zentralstaate sin, derge'nt ausgeschwat.
translation.en: 29 democratic and 17 republican senators spoke in favor of the loan, whereas 19 republicans and 15 democrats, mainly from the southern, western, and central states, spoke against it.

translation.lb: D'stemmong huet genau 11 dég gedauert no dem de verstuerwene Lord Keynes an de secrétaire vun den amerikanesche finanzen de finanzvertrag ënnerzéchent hun.
translation.en: The voting took exactly 11 days after the late Lord Keynes and the secretary of American finance signed the financial agreement.

translation.lb: 'D'debatten iwer den emprunt sin de 15. abrël ugângen an de' ganzen zeit iwer hu stirmesch debatte stattfond.
translation.en: The debates over the loan started on April 15 and the entire time was marked by stormy discussions.

translation.lb: D'memberen vun der bankcommissio'n vun der Chamber fänken ufanks nexter woch matt hire sëtzongen iwer den emprunt un.
translation.en: The members of the banking commission of the Chamber begin their sessions on the loan early next week.

translation.lb: Et ass wahrscheinleeh, datt si net me' lang we' eng woch dauere werden.
translation.en: It is likely that they will not last more than a week.

translation.lb: Bis elo stét scho fest, datt 14 memberen vun der commissio'n fir den emprunt, 6 derge'nt a 7 nach net derge'nt a net derfir sin.
translation.en: It is already certain that 14 members of the commission are for the loan, 6 against, and 7 are still undecided.

translation.lb: So'bal we' d'commissio'n den emprunt guddgehéscht huet, sin d'debatten an der Chamber nemmen eng fro vun dég, well geme's de reglementer d'debatten an zeit vun drei dég da stattfanne müssen.
translation.en: As soon as the commission approves the loan, the debates in the Chamber are only a matter of days, because according to the regulations, the debates must then take place over three days.

translation.lb: Eng gleichläng period ass fir de' onvermeidlech zo'sazanträg virgesin.
translation.en: An equally long period is foreseen for the inevitable amendments.

translation.lb: Allgemeng bestêt d'ménong, datt d'chamber dem beispill vum senat folge wèrd an den emprunt nach virum enn vun der ac-" tueller sëtzongsperiod, de' am juli zu enn ass, ratifize'cren.
translation.en: There is a general opinion that the chamber will follow the senate's example and ratify the loan before the end of the current session period, which ends in July.

translation.lb: Den amerikaneschen emprunt un England beléft seçh op 4.400 millio'nen dollar, dat héscht 1 milliard an 100 millio'ne pond Sterling.
translation.en: The American loan to England amounts to 4,400 million dollars, which means 1 billion and 100 million pounds Sterling.

translation.lb: Vun desem betrag gi 650 millio'ne fir de prêt-bail of.
translation.en: Of this amount, 650 million are for the lend-lease.

translation.lb: Ech délen der werter awunnerschaft vun Esch an der emge'gend matt, datt ech eng HORLOGERIE-BIJOUTERIE an der rue de la gare 25, Esch-Uelzeeht haut, samschdeg, den 11. mé, opmachen.
translation.en: I share with the esteemed residents of Esch and the surrounding area that I am opening a HOROLOGY-BIJOUTERY at rue de la gare 25, Esch-Uelzeeht today, Saturday, May 11.

translation.lb: Ech si besir'ewl all bijouterie an auerereparature bèsçhtens an op réélis! auszefe'eren.
translation.en: I am dedicated to performing all jewelry and watch repairs excellently and conscientiously!

translation.lb: 1072 a Gaston BOCK-HOFFMANN diplom. auermecher vun der. r coie Nationale d'Horlegerie de Besangen !)
translation.en: 1072 Gaston BOCK-HOFFMANN, certified watchmaker from the National School of Horology of Besançon!

translation.lb: Den hèr Speck: Losst d’privatinitiativ bauen!
translation.en: Mr. Speck: Let private initiative build!

translation.lb: Den hèr Speck erënnert un de' verspriéchen, de' o,p der burgerméschterkonferenz gemâch go'wen a stellt fest, datt nodréglcch a wer we'neg gemâch go'w,.
translation.en: Mr. Speck recalls the promises made at the mayor's conference and notes that subsequently very little has been done.

translation.lb: Elo wir jo awer — we' et schéngc ge f — alle; do, geldmëttel, main d'oeuvre, expertisen a plangen, awer et wir wahrsoheinlech, datt d'Keconstruclio'n elo g'éng verzögert gin durch de' zeit, de' d'submissio'nen an usproch huelen.
translation.en: However, now it seems as if everything is there: funds, workforce, expertise, and plans, but it is likely that reconstruction will now be delayed by the time the tenders take.

translation.lb: Och den hèr Speck propose'ert, d'privatinitiativ bauen ze lössen an de sinistre'erte selwer d'initiativ an d'hänn ze gin.
translation.en: Mr. Speck also proposes to let private initiatives build and to place the initiative in the hands of those affected.

translation.lb: Dobei wir et dann uhruecht, de sinistre'erten e blocke'erte kont opzestel- Jen, dén débloque'ert ge'f, cso' se'er we' d'bauarbechte virugin.
translation.en: In doing so, it would be appropriate to set up a blocked account for those affected, which would be unlocked as soon as their construction work progresses.

translation.lb: Ofschle'ssend beto'nt den hèr Speck, datt de Staat ze vill e luesen an deiere bauméschter ass an datt neonmen d'privatinitiativ amstand ass, de schwe'ere Problem vun der reconstructio'n gudd, se'er a bëlleg ze ie'sen.
translation.en: In conclusion, Mr. Speck emphasizes that the state is too slow and expensive a builder, and that only private initiative is capable of solving the serious problem of reconstruction well, quickly, and cheaply.

translation.lb: Amerikaneschen emprunt u Frankreich * Gudd ennerrîcht kréser melJen ans Amerika, datt den amerikaneachen emprunt u Frankreich 1 milliard 270 millio'nen dollar he'ch ass.
translation.en: American loan to France * Good information circles report to America that the American loan to France is 1 billion 270 million dollars.

translation.lb: Des zomm setzt sech we' follegt zesummen: 1. e credit vu 700 millio'nen dollar vun der im- an export bank.
translation.en: This sum is composed as follows: 1. a credit of 700 million dollars from the import and export bank.

translation.lb: 2. e credit vun 300 millio'ne fir de „surplus" vun der amerikanescher arme' opzekafen.
translation.en: 2. a credit of 300 million to purchase the 'surplus' of the American army.

translation.lb: 3. Flëssegmâchong vun enger franse'- scher schold vun 130 millio'nen dollar fir den zivilverbrauch.
translation.en: 3. Liquidation of a French debt of 130 million dollars for civilian consumption.

translation.lb: 4. Flëssegmâchong vun enger franse'- scher schold vun 100 millio'nen dollar fir liweronge no Nord- Afrika.
translation.en: 4. Liquidation of a French debt of 100 million dollars for deliveries to North Africa.

translation.lb: 5. Verkaf u Frankreich vun amerikanesche schëffer fir 40 millio'nen.
translation.en: 5. Sale to France of American ships for 40 million.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech speziell em 70 oder 80 „Liberty"-schëffer, de' jidferént 500 000 dollar wert sin.
translation.en: It specifically concerns 70 or 80 'Liberty' ships, each worth 500,000 dollars.

translation.en: Sale at Wiltz.

translation.lb: Den hèr René Laux-Baustert vu Letzeburg huet am hôtel Ludig zwe'n dennebëscher an ëffentlecher sté ausbidde gelôss.
translation.en: Mr. René Laux-Baustert from Luxembourg has put two public plots up for auction at the Hotel Ludig.

translation.en: One of them.
