translation.en: Measuring 79.50 ares, 40 years old, located on the estate 'sur Hombernet', was sold for 45,000 francs to the brothers Hoffmann, sawmill from Mersch.

translation.lb: En aneren, dén op bann Berel leit, gro'ss 121.70 ar, 45 joer M, slong matt 5700Ü frang am rul'f, e go'f awer zo' dem preis net zöge-, schloen.
translation.en: Another one, located on the Berel estate, measuring 121.70 ares, 45 years old, with 5,700 francs floating in a fund, was not sold at the asking price.

translation.lb: Ennerhalt vum bann Birmereng.
translation.en: Maintenance of the area of Birmereng.

translation.lb: — Schon en etllech joer virum krich liât d'no'twennegkét vum ennerhalt vun onse flo'crwéen ons bauere force'ert, sech- zesummenzeschle'ssen an haptsächlech de' fre'er membere vun déne resp. syndicalsgenossenschaftcn hate munech sche'n arbecht op déni gobkld geléschl.
translation.en: — Already several years before the war, the necessity of maintaining our fields forced our farmers to unite, and primarily the earlier members of the respective syndicate cooperatives accomplished much good work in that area.

translation.lb: Nom krich huet de servi« agricole- d'sâcb erem an d'hand gcholl an duerch e ministeria'lbeschloss vum «12- abrë.1 1916 go'w de provisoresch siluatio'n elo definitiv op gesetzlecher basis regle'ert.
translation.en: After the war, the agricultural service had taken matters back into hand, and by ministerial decree of April 12, 1916, the provisional situation was now finally settled on a legal basis.

translation.lb: Fir de comité, dén ans 5 membere bestét. hâten sech de' hèren Claire B., Kayser.los., Kayser Nie., Kieffer René a Kellner Ferd. gemellt.
translation.en: For the committee, which consists of 5 members, the gentlemen Claire B., Kayser Jos., Kayser Nico, Kieffer René and Kellner Ferd signed up.

translation.lb: Et handelt sech em elaulcr duerfkënneger, de' ons situation gudd verstin; un arbecht félt et net.
translation.en: It concerns wise village residents who understand our situation well; there is no lack of work.

translation.lb: well se brauch net gesicht ze gin, onse tlo'er verdre't nach muenches.
translation.en: because it need not be sought, our land still endures much.

translation.lb: Vill ageschriwe meinher vun onser mélioralio'nsgenossenschaft droen sech mam gedanke fir duerch tausch eng me'glechst inlressant a rationell flo'erberengegong zustand ze hréngen.
translation.en: Many registered gentlemen of our improvement cooperative entertain the thought of bringing about a possible interesting and rational cultivation process through exchange.

translation.lb: Et héscht. de service agricole soll d'directiven definitiv nach ausarbechlen an da kann et lass goen.
translation.en: It is said that the agricultural service should still definitely work out the directives, and then it can go ahead.

translation.lb: Um gudde wëlle vun onse leidd félt et net.
translation.en: There is no lack of good will among our people.

translation.lb: D’persech fro vertagt * Ün der sëtzong vum weltsëcherhétsrot zu Xew York huet de russeschen delege'erten Gromiko net délgeholl.
translation.en: The Persian question postponed * At the meeting of the United Nations Security Council in New York, the Russian delegate Gromyko did not attend.

translation.lb: De virsëtzenden, Pascha, huet no erëffnong vun der sëtzong direct erklärt, et wiren iwer d'raumong vu Persien duercli d'russesch truppe nach keng berichter vu russescher seit agelaf.
translation.en: The chairman, Pascha, declared directly after the opening of the meeting that there were no reports from the Russian side regarding the presence of Russian troops in Persia.

translation.lb: De rot huet dann éstëmmeg en anfrag vum amerikaneschen delege'erte'n Stettinius ugeholl, d'persesch fro ze vertagen, bis datt 'persesch regirong e vollstännege bericht bis spe'testens den 20. mé agefécht hätt.
translation.en: The council then unanimously accepted a request from the American delegate Stettinius to postpone the Persian question until the Persian government had submitted a complete report by the latest of the 20th of May.

translation.lb: Bis zu dem datom soll d'persech regirong ail ihformatio'nen, de' se bis elo kritt huet, zesummefâssen.
translation.en: By that date, the Persian government should compile all the information it has received by now.

translation.lb: Den australeschen delege'erten Hasiak huet desen antrag besonnesch ënnerstëtzt an huet bedauert, datt de ru.sseschep delege'erten Gromiko net un der sëlzong détgeboll hätt.
translation.en: The Australian delegate Hasiak particularly supported this motion and regretted that the Russian delegate Gromyko had not participated in the session.

translation.lb: Hién huet gefuerdert, datt de Gromiko e grond fir seng ofwiésenhét am rot misst ugin, well et géng soss schéngen, we' warn e member vum, rot menge ge'w, duerch seng ofwiésenhét de ganze weltsëcherhétsrot rege'ereji ze kennen.
translation.en: He demanded that Gromyko must provide a reason for his absence from the council, as it might otherwise appear as if a member of the council, due to his absence, could control the entire Security Council.

translation.lb: Vun Teheran mellt Reuter: Iwej de réckzuch vun de russeschen truppe Ieie nach keng offiziell meldonge vir.
translation.en: From Tehran, Reuter reports: There are still no official reports on the withdrawal of Russian troops.

translation.lb: E spriécher vun der regirong sot, datt eng russesch handelsdelegatio'n wollt no Teheran goen, fir matt der persescher regirong a contact ze kommen, datt d'persesch regirong awer dat refuse'ert hätt, bis datt si eng kloer iwersîcht iwer d'situatio'n hätt.
translation.en: A spokesman for the government said that a Russian trade delegation wanted to go to Tehran to establish contact with the Persian government, but the Persian government had refused this until they had a clear overview of the situation.

translation.lb: De kämpf ge ’ nt den honger * Wärend den englesche lordpresident Morrison gëschter nach man président Truman iwer d'welternirongskris discute'ert huet,
translation.en: The fight against hunger * While the English Lord President Morrison still discussed the global food crisis with President Truman yesterday,

translation.lb: huet d'amerikanescht landwirtschaftsministerium nei lângfrësteg mesure bekannt gin, fir de kämpf matt der weltknapphét u liéwensmëttel opzehuelen.
translation.en: the American Department of Agriculture announced new long-term measures to tackle the global food shortage.

translation.lb: An deser bekanntmächong get gesot, datt d'amerikaneseh regirong é ve'erel vun der neier wéssrécolte confisque'ere wèrd.
translation.en: In this announcement, it is stated that the American government will confiscate a quarter of the new wheat harvest.

translation.lb: D'aschränkong vum früchtverbrauch fir be'er an alkohol bleiwt och nach am kommende summer bestoen.
translation.en: The limitation on fruit consumption for beer and alcohol will also continue in the coming summer.

translation.lb: Weider aas virgeschloe gin, d'flésch, d'brot an d'molkereiprodueter an Amerika erem ze rationne'- eren, fir kënnen den internationale bedarf ze decken.
translation.en: Further proposals suggest rationing meat, bread, and dairy products in America again to meet international demand.

translation.lb: Den englesche cabinettsminister Morrison, dén och eng conferenz man Hoover hât, wèrd haut iwer den amerlkanesche radio de standponkt vun der englescher regirong an der welternirongskris kloer léen.
translation.en: The English Cabinet Minister Morrison, who also had a conference with Hoover, will clarify the English government's position on the global food crisis over American radio today.

translation.lb: A senge bespriéchongen mam président Truman a mam Hoover buet bié speziell op de' éscht situatio'n an Indien an an der britescher ion* vun Deitsehland higewisen.
translation.en: In his discussions with President Truman and Hoover, he specifically pointed out the dire situation in India and in the British zone of Germany.

translation.lb: Den Hoover hât him e virschlag ënnerbrét, no dém d'englesch regirong weider 300.00(1 tonne frûcht an d'no'tgebidder afe'ere soll.
translation.en: Hoover suggested to him that the English government should deliver another 300,000 tons of fruit to the distressed areas.

translation.lb: De Morrison huet him riposte'ert, datt England schon 200.000 tonnen an de* gebidder agefo'ert hätt an et de moment net an der lag wir, weider exporter ze machen.
translation.en: Morrison replied that England had already delivered 200,000 tons to the areas and was currently unable to make further exports.

translation.lb: Den Hoover wèrd no Süd-Amerika goe fir an déne länner, de' liéwensmëttel ausfe'ere kennen, drop ze drängen, datt se hir exporter intensive'ere sollen.
translation.en: Hoover will go to South America to urge the countries there, which can export food, to intensify their exports.

translation.lb: Am laf vun haut gin d'begpriéchonge tëschent dem Morrison an den amerikaneschen ernirongsfachleidd virugesat.
translation.en: Today, the discussions between Morrison and the American nutrition experts will continue.
On the 23rd of August, 1943.

translation.lb: Op dem stützponkt, dén ech vu mengem stre'ko'p aus am a hât, blo'w et d'ganz nuecht fo'eg, mé d'Russe waren awer schons derhannert.
translation.en: At the stronghold, which I had in sight from my lookout, it blew throughout the whole night, but the Russians were already behind it.

translation.lb: Mir huet d'sâch scho besser gefall fir nozekucken.
translation.en: I felt better about checking it out.

translation.lb: Ge'nt de mëtteg gong et lass.
translation.en: Around noon, it started.

translation.lb: De' 7 Pd ass gleich ge'lâf an de Russ huet d'frontlinn opgerullt.
translation.en: The 7-pounder quickly went off and the Russians rolled up the front line.

translation.lb: We' de leschte Preiss matt den hänn an der lûcht aus dem stützponkt erausgong, hun ech mech och eso' lues op de wé gemâcli fir mer én anert „quarte'cr" ze sichen, well hei go'f et ongemittlech.
translation.en: When the last German left the stronghold with hands in the air, I slowly made my way to find another 'quarter' since it was getting uncomfortable here.

translation.lb: Em den owend sin ech den autoe vun onser kompanie an d'gräpp gelâf.
translation.en: In the evening, I came across the car of our company.

translation.lb: „Schütze Leick vom Stützpunkt 0,3 zurück, konnte dem Russen entwischen, aMe mussten sich ergeben, hatten keine Munition mehr"...
translation.en: 'Rifleman Leick from stronghold 0.3 fell back, managed to escape the Russians, but had to surrender, had no more ammunition...'.

translation.lb: „Wenn ich Sie sehe Leick, dann weiss ich, dass noch wenigstens einer von der Kompanie lebtl Sie müssen verdammt Schwein haben, wenn ich nicht irre ist es jetzt das achte Mal, dass Sic unter den „letzten Resten" sind." Wann dén alles gevvosst hätt.
translation.en: 'When I see you, Leick, I know at least one from the company is still alive! You must be incredibly lucky; if I'm not mistaken, this is the eighth time you've been among the 'last remaining.' If only he knew everything.

translation.lb: Ligue „Ons Jongen“
translation.en: League "Our Boys"

translation.lb: Den centralcomité vun der ligue „Ons Jongen" mécht nach eng ke'er all leidd, de' nach é jong fort hun, drop opmierksam, datt sämtlech donnée fir de' russech zeidong bis spe'destens den 20. mé 1946 am centralcomité virleie müssen.
translation.en: The central committee of the league "Our Boys" once again notifies everyone who still has a young one away that all information for the Russian newspaper must be submitted to the central committee by no later than May 20, 1946.

translation.lb: Och d'familje vun âneren déporte'erlen (K. Z., gendarmerie, douane, médercher aus dem RAD etc.) kennen ons de' donnéen eragin.
translation.en: Also, the families of other deportees (K. Z., gendarmerie, customs, medics from the RAD etc.) can submit the information to us.

translation.lb: We'nt dem aäphabetesche classement vun de photoen ass et ons onme'glech, no dem 20. mé nach umelldongen unzehuelen.
translation.en: Due to the alphabetical arrangement of the photos, it is impossible for us to accept any more registrations after May 20.

translation.lb: Ligue „Ons Jongen", comité central, Boulevard Royal 45, Letzeburg.
translation.en: League "Our Boys", central committee, Boulevard Royal 45, Luxembourg.

translation.lb: De Raeder iwer seng mattugekloten * Gëscht ass d'verdédegong vum fre'ere gro'ssadmirol Raeder zu enn gefo'ert gin.
translation.en: Yesterday, the defense of former grand admiral Raeder has come to an end.

translation.lb: En dramâtesche moment wor et, we' de russesclien ukléer erkläronge vum Raeder verlies huet, de' dén a senger krichsgefàngeschaft zu Moskau niddergeschriwen hât.
translation.en: It was a dramatic moment when the Russian interpreter read out Raeder's statements, which he had written during his war captivity in Moscow.

translation.lb: Des mémoire vum Raeder droen den titel: „Meine Beziehungen zu Adolf Hitler und zur- Partei".
translation.en: These memoirs of Raeder bear the title: 'My Relationships with Adolf Hitler and the Party'.

translation.lb: Iwer de G o e r i n g schreiwt de Raeder an dese mémoiren, hién hält a gro'ssem môss eng verhängnesvoll influenz op d'krichfe'erong vun Deitschland ausgeübt.
translation.en: In these memoirs, Raeder writes about Goering, stating that he exerted an extremely disastrous influence on the conduct of the war in Germany.

translation.lb: De Goering get beschriwen als e „masslos eitele mann matt ongeheirem „Strebertum a protzertum", e wir am hexte grad characterlo's, praktesche sënn hätt hié guer kén, weider wir hién habgiereg an zugleich verschwenderesch an en hätt en ofsto'ssend wéchlecht an onzaldotescht wiésen un den dag geluegt.
translation.en: Goering is described as a 'boundlessly vain man with immense ambition and ostentation', utterly devoid of character, lacking any practical sense, further being greedy and at the same time wasteful, and he displayed an off-putting effeminate and cowardly demeanor.

translation.lb: Den D o e n i t z ass, den erkläronge vum Raeder no, schrecklech agebild an o'ni taktgefill.
translation.en: According to Raeder's statements, Doenitz is terribly conceited and lacks tact.

translation.lb: We' e seng lescht riéd virun der Hitlerjugend gehalen hätt, du hätt en an der marine de spëtznumm „Hitlerjunge Doenitz" kritt.
translation.en: After he gave his last speech before the Hitler Youth, he received the nickname 'Hitler Youth Doenitz' in the navy.

translation.lb: De K e i t e 1 bezéchent de Raeder als e mann, dén e besonnesch schwäche Charakter hätt.
translation.en: Raeder describes Keitel as a man who had particularly weak character.

translation.lb: Eng schwe’er gepre’ft famill hëllt hiren higerîchte jong hém De'fferdeng.*
translation.en: A severely burdened family takes their executed son home to Differdange.*

translation.lb: — En donneschdeg, de 9- rné ass erem e jonge Letzeburger, dé sei liéwe fir d'hémecht gelôss huet, an de letzeburger buedem begruewe gin.
translation.en: — On Thursday, the 9th of the month, another young Luxembourger, who gave his life for the homeland, was buried in Luxembourg soil.

translation.lb: Et wo' de Jean-Baptiste Urlh aus der Escherstrôss
translation.en: It was Jean-Baptiste Urth from Escher Street.

translation.lb: D'famiU Urth, dèr seeh d'undôlnahm vu ganz De'fferdeng zo'wend, ass wirklech schwe'er gepre'ft gin.
translation.en: The Urth family, which saw the participation of all of Differdange, has been truly severely burdened.

translation.lb: Kaum 1940 aus der évacuatio'n erem, ass de papp gestuerwen.
translation.en: Hardly back from evacuation in 1940, the father passed away.

translation.lb: Ennert dem naziterror an de' verhâsst preisesch uniform gepresst, huet de J. B. Urth den e'schten urlaub benolzt fir ze déserte'eren.
translation.en: Under Nazi terror and forced into the hated Prussian uniform, J. B. Urth used his first leave to desert.

translation.lb: Vun der resistenz a Frankreich gelét, gong e gleich bei de maquis, bis e vu verkommene verre'der un d'Preisen dénonce'ert an der gestapo ausgeliwert go'f.
translation.en: Guided by the resistance in France, he went straight to the maquis until he was betrayed by depraved traitors to the Prussians and handed over to the Gestapo.

translation.lb: Seng mamm an der hcmecht hât mëttlerweil de' ganz • schwe'er vum naziterror auszedrénkcn a si go'f vun de preiseschen onmënschen ëmgesiedelt.
translation.en: Meanwhile, his mother at home had to endure the full hardship of Nazi terror and was relocated by the Prussian inhumans.

translation.lb: Malt bravoure huet den Urths Jängi, we' e genannt go'f, ail de' schandilechkélen an de preisesche prisongcn erdroen, bis en de 19. September 1944 matt nach 15 aner komeroden zu Dietz an der Lahn sei jonkt bludd ënnert de kugele vun de preiseschen henkerskniéchte versprëtzt huet.
translation.en: With bravery, Urth's Jängi, as he was called, endured all the disgrace in the Prussian prisons, until on September 19, 1944, along with 15 other comrades in Diez an der Lahn, his young blood was spilled under the bullets of the Prussian executioners.

translation.lb: Enner bedélegong vun der populatio'n an de resistenzorganisatio'ne go'f de Jängi zu graw gedroen.
translation.en: Under the participation of the population and resistance organizations, Jängi was laid to rest with honor.

translation.lb: Um kirfecht huet den hèr Nie. Klein, président vun der Unio'n, dem versluerwenen en ergreifende noruff gehal a sét ofschle'ssend, wann et der schwe'er gepre'fter mamm an dem Jängi senge gesëschter en tro'scht ka sin, da wir et den, datt e seng ro' fond huet am hellege ilctzeburger buedem, an datt onser Herrgott seng verdéngschter belo'nt.
translation.en: At the cemetery, Mr. Nie. Klein, president of the Union, gave a moving eulogy to the departed and concluded, if there could be any comfort for the severely burdened mother and Jängi's siblings, it would be that he found his peace in the holy Luxembourg soil, and that our Lord rewards his merits.

translation.lb: DEN ASSERBEIDSCHAN ASS BERÉT ZE KÄMPFEN
translation.en: AZERBAIJAN IS READY TO FIGHT

translation.lb: Nodém radio Tabtiz d'scheitere vun de verbandlonge matt der persescher regirong annonce'ert hât, huet radio Tabriz gemellt:
translation.en: After Radio Tabriz announced the failure of the negotiations with the Persian government, Radio Tabriz reported:

translation.lb: „Den Asserbeidschan wellt sech net der tyrannci vun der zentralregirong ennerwerfen.
translation.en: "Azerbaijan does not want to submit to the tyranny of the central government.

translation.lb: Wärend 20 joer hu mer versieht, ons freihet zréckzege■wannen.
translation.en: For 20 years we have tried to reclaim our freedom.

translation.lb: me et wor ni onse wonsch, e brudderkrich eropzebëschwiren.
translation.en: But it was never our desire to provoke a civil war.

translation.lb: Mé haut ass d'arme' vum Asserbeidschan berét, d'feindé vun der freihét ze bekämpfen.
translation.en: But today the army of Azerbaijan is ready to fight the enemies of freedom.

translation.lb: Mir wollten de fridden a friddlech verhandlongen, mé vergehidden elementer zu Teheran hun dovunner jnëssbrauch gemäch.
translation.en: We wanted peace and peaceful negotiations, but underhanded elements in Tehran have taken advantage of this.

translation.lb: Ons vertriéder hu versieht, raisonnabel zc blciwen, mé et ass denen elementer gelongen, all ons versicher kalzestellen.
translation.en: Our representatives have tried to remain reasonable, but those elements have managed to thwart all our assurances.

translation.lb: D'nationalarme' vum Asserbeidschan wert sech enger besetzong vum land durch d persesch trnppe widdersetzen.
translation.en: The national army of Azerbaijan will resist an occupation of the land by the Persian troops.

translation.lb: Mir délen elo der ganzer weit matt, datt mir berét sin. ze kämpfen.
translation.en: We now share with the whole world that we are ready to fight.

translation.lb: Mir hun der nationalen arme' an der democratescher partei op der grenz uerderen zo'komme geloss, no dénen d'regirongstruppen, wann se sollte verstehen op de buedem vum Asserbeidschan virzedréngen, dorunncr gchënnert gin.
translation.en: We have allowed the national army and the democratic party to come to the border, so that if government troops attempt to advance on Azerbaijani soil, they will be hindered.

translation.lb: Mir Asserbeidschancr, de' jong wc' de' al, mir wèrde kämpfen an ons frcihét an autonomie net opgin.
translation.en: We Azerbaijanis, both young and old, we will fight and not give up our freedom and autonomy.

translation.lb: Mir ha le wucrt; Mir wèrden ons hémecht hun, mir wèrden onst bludd fir si vergessen a mir sin elo berét derzo".
translation.en: We have the word; we will have our homeland, we will give our blood for it and we are now ready for it."

translation.lb: Op e puer fronten Am norde vun Huesca hu spuenesch regulär truppen sech matt enger abteiiong Partisanen eremgebalegt.
translation.en: On several fronts in the north of Huesca, Spanish regular troops engaged in combat with a band of partisans.

translation.lb: No der klepperei go'f 1 do'degen an 1 verwondten opgeraft.
translation.en: After the skirmish, 1 was found dead and 1 injured.

translation.lb: 4 partisanen hu missen an de prisong spaze'eren.
translation.en: 4 partisans had to be taken to prison.

translation.lb: 15 kilometer östlech vu Batavia stin zënter drei dég eng hollännesch brigade matt 2000 member vun der „volleksarme'" am feier.
translation.en: 15 kilometers east of Batavia, a Dutch brigade with 2000 members of the "people's army" has been in combat for three days.

translation.lb: D'zill vun deser operatio'n soll d'emkrésong vun dem strategesch wichtegen duerf Bejazzi am süd-oste vu Batavia sin.
translation.en: The goal of this operation is to encircle the strategically important village of Bejazzi in the southeast of Batavia.

translation.lb: Zu Klein-Bullesheim bei Köln hun deitsch Zivilisten e grupp vu belschen zaldoten iwerfall an ugegraff.
translation.en: In Klein-Bullesheim near Cologne, German civilians attacked and assaulted a group of Belgian soldiers.

translation.lb: E puer zaldote sin zimlech schwe'er verwond gin.
translation.en: A few soldiers were severely injured.

translation.lb: nA der nuecht vum 1. op den 2. mé huet eng compagnie e repressalieraid ge'nt Klein Bullesheim durchgefe'ert.
translation.en: In the night from the 1st to the 2nd of May, a company carried out a retaliatory raid against Klein Bullesheim.

translation.lb: D'englesch militärpolizei an d'militärregirong sin alerte'ert gin.
translation.en: The English military police and the military government have been alerted.

translation.lb: Momentan fe'eren d'autorite'ten eng schärf enquête, fir d'responsabilite't vun desen zwëschefâll festzeléen.
translation.en: The authorities are currently conducting a thorough investigation to determine responsibility for these incidents.

translation.lb: Ech délen der weiter awunnerschaft.vun Esch an der emge'gend matt, datt ech eng HOHLOGERIE-BIJ OUTERIE an der rue de la gare 25, Esch-Uelzecht e samschdeg, den 11. mé, opmach hun.
translation.en: I share with the esteemed residents of Esch and the surrounding area that I have opened a WATCHMAKING-JEWELRY shop at rue de la Gare 25, Esch-Uelzecht on Saturday, May 11.

translation.lb: Ech si besirewt all bijouterie an auerereparalure bèsçhtens an op reellst auszofe'eren.
translation.en: I am committed to performing all jewelry and watch repairs optimally and with the utmost integrity.

translation.lb: 1072 a Oaston BOCK-HOFFMANN diplsm. auermecher vun der.Ecole Nationale d'Horlogerie de Besancon
translation.en: 1072 a Oaston BOCK-HOFFMANN, diplomaed watchmaker from the National School of Watchmaking in Besancon.

translation.en: * Positions available ♦ Tailor for the ready-made clothing sector wanted and a second cutter. Clothing factory Ginter-Ginter, Fiels. 364 a *

translation.en: Wanted to buy a used LAROUSSE. René Müller, hospital F,ech. ’ 365 a *

translation.en: * For sale * A new, large Latin-French dictionary (Lebaigue) 1372 *. selling for 500 francs. as advertised. -,

translation.lb: Politesch prozesser Alphonse Faber, weinhändler.
translation.en: Political trial of Alphonse Faber, wine merchant.

translation.lb: Wellestén, go'w zu 9 me'nt prisong an enger geldbo'ss vu 50 000 frang verurtélt.
translation.en: He was sentenced to 9 months in prison and a fine of 50,000 francs.

translation.lb: En hât en antrag fir d'NSDAK gestallt, an en éd op de Führer ofgeluegt a wor zellenleiter vun der NSV.
translation.en: He had applied to join the NSDAP, pledged allegiance to the Führer, and was a cell leader of the NSV.

translation.lb: Jean Heller, bauer, Hiéfeneg, ass zu 3 me'nt prisong a 5.000 frang bo'ss verurtelt gin.
translation.en: Jean Heller, farmer, from Hiéfeneg, was sentenced to 3 months in prison and a fine of 5,000 francs.

translation.lb: E wor zellenleiter vun der VDB an huet u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl.
translation.en: He was a cell leader of the VDB and participated in political demonstrations.

translation.lb: Leonard Fohl, schmelzarbechter, Biéles, go'w zu 9 me'nt prisong verurtelt.
translation.en: Leonard Fohl, steel worker, from Biéles, was sentenced to 9 months in prison.

translation.lb: En ass den august 1941 der SA beigetrueden, huet un engem sonderlehrgang vun der SA an u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl.
translation.en: He joined the SA in August 1941, participated in a special training course of the SA, and attended political demonstrations.

translation.lb: Fra M. Gehlhausen (geb. Helene Klaes), Dideleng, ass zu 8 me'nt prisong verurtelt gin.
translation.en: Mrs. M. Gehlhausen (née Helene Klaes), from Dideleng, was sentenced to 8 months in prison.

translation.lb: Se huet a krichszeiten d'ofzéche vun der NS-F -îenschaft gedroen, u politesche manifestatio'nen délgeholl, un der kichendîr 2 plakaten opgehângen „Unser Gruss ist Heil Hitler" an „Ein Volk, ein Reich, ein Führer", an am September 1944 matt dem feind d'land verlôss.
translation.en: During wartime, she wore the insignia of the NS Women's League, participated in political demonstrations, hung up two posters on the kitchen door saying 'Our Greeting is Heil Hitler' and 'One People, One Empire, One Leader', and left the country with the enemy in September 1944.

translation.lb: t v-,'r'}) Jos. Gocrgen, tramschaffner, Letzeburg, ass zu 18 me'nt prisong verurtelt gin.
translation.en: Jos. Goergen, tram conductor, from Luxembourg, was sentenced to 18 months in prison.

translation.lb: E wor blockleiter vun der VDB, huet u politesche manifestatio'- nen délgeholl, am joer 1941 en antrag fir d'NSDAP gestallt a wor op den Hitler verpflicht.
translation.en: He was a block leader of the VDB, participated in political demonstrations, applied for membership in the NSDAP in 1941, and swore allegiance to Hitler.

translation.lb: En noruff fir é vun onse beschten Kaymond Heyardt, erschoss zu Hinzert de 25. Februar 1944 am aller vu 27. joer.
translation.en: An obituary for one of our best, Raymond Heyardt, shot in Hinzert on February 25, 1944, at the age of 27.

translation.lb: D'stad Remeleng verstét et, hir gefâlen helden ze e'eren.
translation.en: The city of Remeleng understands how to honor its fallen heroes.

translation.lb: Neijoschdag beim leichendengscht fir onse nationalheld Raymond Heyardt go'w dat erem bewisen.
translation.en: On New Year's Day during the memorial service for our national hero Raymond Heyardt, this was again proven.

translation.lb: A matt recht!
translation.en: And rightfully so!

translation.lb: Fir all guddo Letzeburger ass de numm Heyardt c begrëff:
translation.en: For every good Luxembourger, the name Heyardt is a concept:

translation.lb: an dèr famill buet de Raymond matt mamm, papp a brudder aus le'ft zur hémecht dat héxt gewôt.
translation.en: in this family, Raymond, along with mother, father, and brother, offered to the homeland the highest sacrifice of life.

translation.lb: Vu Remeleng aus ass 1940 durch d'famill Heyardt matt der parole L. F. B. (Letzeburger Freihétsbewégong) d'startzfchen zur Conterattaque ge'nt d'Preisen an d'land gflngen.
translation.en: From Remeleng in 1940, the Heyardt family with the slogan L.F.B. (Luxembourgish Freedom Movement) initiated the counterattack against the Prussians in the country.

translation.lb: Den trio Heyardt Künscb Giesener war den eckpilier vun der resistenz am bas«in minier
translation.en: The trio Heyardt, Künsch, Giesener was the cornerstone of the resistance in the mining basin,

translation.lb: an d'pione'er vun der letzeburger onofhängegkét an démocratie.
translation.en: and pioneers of Luxembourgish independence and democracy.

translation.lb: Leider stong och ge'nt si de judas am déngscht vun der gestapo an huet se durch feige, verot un d'blutthonn ausge- Jiwert.
translation.en: Unfortunately, Judas in the service of the Gestapo also stood against them and betrayed them cowardly to the bloodhounds.

translation.lb: Gené we' dobaussen an der resistent wor och hirt bedroen an déne vchwe'erst« stonnen am KZ Hinzert fir all Letzeburger en exempeil vu glâw, standhaftegkét, hémechtsle'fl a solidarite't.
translation.en: Just as outside in the resistance, their behavior in the severe hours at the Hinzert concentration camp was an example for all Luxembourgers of faith, steadfastness, love for the homeland, and solidarity.

translation.lb: Duerfir wor eso'guer dem Kayniond sein humor och vun der gestapo net kleng ze kre'en.
translation.en: That is why Raymond's humor could not even be diminished by the Gestapo.

translation.lb: Beim do'desappell vum 25. februar huet liié beim verlôsse vun der baraque eng (eschte ke'er verbasàé gelâcht an dem SS um réck eng Mng nues geroat.
translation.en: At the roll call of February 25, he left the barracks with a smile of astonishment and gave the SS officer a big nose.

translation.lb: Haymond, et war dei Jeschle gank den harde calvaire zur exécutio'nsplaz, dén's du matt dengen 22 konierode stolz, matt erhuesvenem kapp an o'ni z« zécken ugetratt hues.
translation.en: Raymond, it was that very narrow path of hard suffering to the execution site, which you, along with your 22 comrades, walked proudly, with raised heads and without hesitation.

translation.lb: Raymond! Ons idealer waren och èr Idealer.
translation.en: Raymond! Our ideals were also your ideals.

translation.lb: Onstiérwlech ass èren heldegéscht an de rele vun de lctzeburger patrioten.
translation.en: Their heroic spirit and role among the Luxembourgish patriots are immortal.

translation.lb: Er hémechtsle'ft an ère kampfgéscht sin d'symbol vun onser freihét,
translation.en: Their love for the homeland and their fighting spirit are symbols of our freedom,

translation.lb: an d'gro'sst vun èrem sacrifice ass d'garantie fir en e'wegt L'elzeburg!
translation.en: and the greatness of their sacrifice is the guarantee for an eternal Luxembourg!

translation.en: AMERICA The atomic bomb experiments * All ships,

translation.lb: <Je' d'amerikanesch marine bei hiren 2 essai'en matt der atombomm vom nié bis juli brnotzt hun, gi mall enger gewësse quantité'! explosiv gemieden.
translation.en: The American navy, with its two tests with the atomic bomb from nié to July, is estimated to have used a certain amount of explosives.

translation.lb: Et ass iéwel nach net décide'ert gin, datt iiéweg de'eren op d'schëffer charge'ert solle gin, huet den admirol Blandy gesot.
translation.en: However, it has not yet been decided whether they should be loaded onto the ships, Admiral Blandy said.

translation.lb: Op d'fro vum président vun der atomcontrollcom mission, ob d'atombommen plutonium oder nranium enthale ge'wen, hnet den admirol Blandy geäntwert: „Et ass déselwechten typ, we' de', de* mer op Nagasaki geworf hun".
translation.en: To the question from the president of the atomic control commission, whether the atomic bombs contained plutonium or uranium, Admiral Blandy replied: "It is the same type as the one we dropped on Nagasaki".

translation.lb: En huet dun erklärt, datt d'iwerwâsserschëffer an d'Ubooter an eng zort schösse! stationne'ert ge'we gin, de' vn koraHerWfer vnn enger längt vu 35 km an enger brét vun 23 km emgi wir.
translation.en: He then explained that the surface ships and submarines have been stationed in a sort of zone, surrounded by coral reefs with a length of 35 km and a width of 23 km.

translation.lb: D'plâz ass wahrscheinJech den atoll Bikini an der Marschallgrupp.
translation.en: The place is probably the Bikini atoll in the Marshall group.

translation.lb: Bis elo huet ti amerikanesch marine nach weider keng détailler gin, ob d'U-booter iwert dem wâsser oder an enger gewësser de'wt gehate gin.
translation.en: So far, the American navy has not yet provided further details on whether the submarines were kept above the water or at a certain depth.

translation.en: The new Persian government is ready for direct negotiations

translation.lb: De persesche radio huet geseilter d'norlcht confirme'ert, datt d'persesch regirong hir delege'- ert op der Londoner versammlong ugewisen hält, d'direct bespriéchongen mam chef vun der russescher delegatio'n Wischinski opzehuelen.
translation.en: The Persian radio has reportedly confirmed that the Persian government has directed its delegate at the London gathering to commence direct discussions with the head of the Russian delegation, Vyshinsky.

translation.lb: Iwer d'wahl vum generolsecretaire vun der UNO wor gëschter eng zwanglos bespriéchong vun déne 5 stännege memberen vum weltsëcherhétsrot.
translation.en: Regarding the election of the UN Secretary-General, there was an informal discussion yesterday among the five permanent members of the World Security Council.

translation.lb: Lescht meldonge besoen, datt de norwegeschen delege'erten, Lie, vum sëcherhétsrot als generolsecretaire vun der UNO der vollversammlong virgeschloe get.
translation.en: Latest reports say that the Norwegian delegate, Lie, has been proposed by the Security Council as Secretary-General of the UN to the General Assembly.

translation.lb: D'vollversammlong hât gëschter am nomëtteg nemmen eng kurz sëtzong, an dèr de bericht vum sozialen, humanitären a kulturellen ausschoss virgeliés gin ass.
translation.en: The General Assembly had only a brief session yesterday afternoon, during which the report of the social, humanitarian, and cultural committee was reviewed.

translation.lb: Desen ausschoss huet d'forme'erong vu 4 ënnerausschëss virgeschloen, nämlech é fir d'mënseherecliter, é virléfege fir sozial froen, é fir d'rauschgëfter an én demographeschen ausschoss.
translation.en: This committee has proposed the formation of 4 subcommittees, namely one for human rights, one provisional for social issues, one for narcotics, and a demographic committee.

translation.lb: Huet Russland eng atombomm?
translation.en: Does Russia have an atomic bomb?

translation.lb: * E vun denen amerikanesche wëssenschaftler, de' mattgehollef hun fir d'alombomm an Amerika ze réa'lise'eren, de professer Higinbotham, huet décdare'ert, datt et gudd unzehuelen ass, datt d'russesch ar- beeilten op desem gehidd an zeit vun engem joer hinnen d'geheimnes vun der atomenergie ausliweren.
translation.en: * One of those American scientists who helped realize the atomic bomb in America, Professor Higinbotham, declared that it is reasonable to assume that the Russian efforts in this field will, within a year, deliver them the secret of atomic energy.

translation.lb: Et ass bekannt, datt et de Russen bis 1943 gegléckt wor, den uraniumatom opzedélen.
translation.en: It is known that by 1943, the Russians had succeeded in splitting the uranium atom.

translation.lb: D'endresuttat, sët e weider, ass net eso' vHl durch wëssenschaftlech consideiatio'nen z'erréchen we' durch finanzieller.
translation.en: The end result, he continued, is not so much achieved through scientific considerations as through financial ones.

translation.lb: De professer Higinbolham ass weider gefuer, datt et onme'glech wor ze verhënneren, datt gewësse geheimnesser an d'ausiland durchfiltre'ert sin an datt d'publieatio'n vum rapport Smith d'aufgab vun de russesche wëssenschaftleren eppes erdichten huet.
translation.en: Professor Higinbotham further stated that it was impossible to prevent certain secrets from filtering abroad and that the publication of the Smith Report somewhat eased the task of the Russian scientists.

translation.lb: NOKRICHS problémen Franze’sch versécherongsgesellschaften ennerstëtzen de Schwarzhandel
translation.en: Problems with French insurance companies supporting the black market

translation.lb: De sctiwâSrzhaiîael' a Frankreich ass ént vun déne gro'ssen iwelen, de' haut d'gesamt.
translation.en: The black market in France is one of the major evils impacting the entire.

translation.lb: franse'sch wirtschaftsliéwen hemmen a beherrschen.
translation.en: French economic life, restricting and dominating it.

translation.lb: Et ass him ze verdanken, datt d'preisser net nomme stabil bleiwen, mé datt si emmer an emmer nach an d'iûcht gin.
translation.en: It is due to it that prices not only stay stable, but continue to rise.

translation.lb: De Schwarzhandel hat zur folleg, datt égens gesellschafte sech fir sein zweck gegrënd hun, de' Schwarzhandel professionel ausgebeut hun.
translation.en: The black market has led to companies being founded specifically to exploit it professionally.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch wirschaftsministerium huet sech ail erdenklech me' gin, fir hanner hir schléch ze kommen, mé et ass him net gelongen.
translation.en: The French Ministry of Economy has taken every conceivable measure to combat it, but has not succeeded.

translation.lb: Zwar ass et him gegléckt, verschidde vun dénen Organisationen auszehiéwen, mé kurz zeit drop hun de' selwecht ileidd sech crem matt gro'ssem kapital un der biiLdong vu neits Schwarzhandelsgesellschaften bedélegt,
translation.en: Indeed, they managed to dismantle some of these organizations, but shortly thereafter, the same people re-involved themselves with large capital in the founding of new black market companies,

translation.lb: trotz déne schwe'ere geldstrôfen de' si hate misse mine'eren.
translation.en: despite the heavy fines they had to endure.

translation.lb: Schliesslech ass et du geilonge festzestetlen, datt eng ganz rei verséchcrongsgesellschaften massgcblech um Schwarzhandel interesse'- ert sin.
translation.en: Finally, it was established that a number of insurance companies were significantly interested in the black market.

translation.lb: De' versécherongsgcscllschaften hu nämlech matt den traficante pclicen ofgeschloss, an déne si de risiko verséchert hun dén d'murchandise beim transport lafen.
translation.en: The insurance companies concluded policies with traffickers, insuring the risks the merchandise faced during transport.

translation.lb: De' assurancen hu sech awer net nemmen op den transport bezun, mé och op de verloscht vun de wueren, op de verloscht um preis a.s.w.
translation.en: The insurance did not only cover transport but also the loss of goods, price loss, etc.

translation.lb: Dat héscht an anere wiérder, de' assucancen hu net nemmen de reelle wèrt vun de marchandise versichert, mé si hun och den iwerpreis verséchert dén am Schwarzhandel erzielt get.
translation.en: In other words, they insured not only the real value of the merchandise but also the excess price achieved in the black market.

translation.lb: Si wossten also ganz genau ïgsschéd, em vvat et sech ge'w handelen, si hun de Schwarzhandel favorise'ert an dobei ongeheier profiter an d'täsch gestach.
translation.en: They knew exactly what they were dealing with; they favored the black market and profited immensely.

translation.lb: Fir de service vun den assurancen ze sicheren, haten de' versécherongsgesclilschaften é ganze neie j;ode ausgeschafft, dén de' verschidvlen arte vu schwarzhandelsgeschäfter betrëfft:
translation.en: To secure the insurance services, the insurance companies developed an entirely new code that covered various types of black market businesses:

translation.lb: si hun dén zu ernoîfende benefice verséchert de „bénéfice espéré", den indirecte verloscht „perte indirecte", d'ivvenbewèrtong vun déno versccherten artikelen „surévélation des objets assurés" a.s.w.
translation.en: they insured the anticipated profit, the 'bénéfice espéré,' the indirect loss, 'perte indirecte,' and the overvaluation of insured items, 'surévélation des objets assurés,' etc.

translation.lb: Mé dobei ass et netbiliwen.
translation.en: But it did not stop there.

translation.lb: D'vers t cherongsgesellschaflen hu richteg fälschongen op der police virgeholl andern si d'natur an d'quantite't vun de marchandise gefälscht huet.
translation.en: The insurance companies made real falsifications on the policies, altering the nature and quantity of the merchandise.

translation.lb: Domadder ass et nach net duergâng.
translation.en: That wasn't the end of it.

translation.lb: Si hun eso'guer e puer policen op en an de sehvechte risiko ausgestallt.
translation.en: They even issued some policies on different high-risk items.

translation.lb: Besonnesch de' zwé ilescht fait'e belâschten d'versécherongsgcsellschafte schwe'er a bréngen si virun d'gerîclit wo' si schwe'- ere strôfen an hirer ople'song entge'nt gesin.
translation.en: Especially the last two actions weigh heavily on the insurance companies and bring them to court, where they face severe penalties and dissolution.

translation.lb: Selhstverständlech waren d'traficanten och domadder d'accord, datt de' criminell gesellscnaften én he'geren taux gefuerdert hunr we' d'gesetz e virgeseit.
translation.en: Naturally, the traffickers agreed that these criminal companies demanded a higher rate than the law prescribed.

translation.lb: D'franse'sch regirong huel ugeucrdnet, datt d'enquête an dem sënn matt alle mëttelen a réckscchtsilos soll duerchgefe'ert gin.
translation.en: The French government has ordered that the investigation in this regard be conducted with all means and relentlessly.

translation.lb: De' incrimine'crt versécherongsgesellschafte solle malt aller schärft vum gesetz bestrôft gin, well si duerch hir agissementer d'franse'sch Wirtschaft an d'franse'sch finanzwiésen schwe'er geschédeqt hun
translation.en: The incriminated insurance companies should be punished to the fullest extent of the law, as they have severely harmed the French economy and financial system.

translation.en: a) for beef, the subsidy is completely removed,

translation.lb: b) bei schwein ass de sub sid op 6 frang de kilo schluechtgewîcht festgesât.

translation.en: OUR YOUNG ONES WORK...

translation.lb: Iwerall huet ons arme' matt arichtongsschwieregkéten ze
translation.en: Everywhere our army struggles with organizational difficulties

translation.lb: Als quarte'er gi nalirlcch net de' zcrschosscnst heiser ausgcwiélt, mé de' aner sin och net besonnesch dicht.
translation.en: Naturally, quartering does not take place in the most bombed-out houses, but the others are not especially sound either.

translation.lb: Op den décher huet et eragcrént, d'fënstere si kapott, bannenan ass alles ausgeplenncvl.
translation.en: The roofs leaked, the windows are broken, inside everything is plundered.

translation.lb: d'maueren hu vun der fichlëgkét gelidden.
translation.en: The walls have suffered from the moisture.

translation.lb: Et ass onme'gilcch, alles am handelnd re'en an d'rei ze setzen.
translation.en: It is impossible to put everything back in order.

translation.lb: Et hält schwe'er, gleich de erfuerdcrlcch quantite'tcn u glas a blech erbeizcschâfen.
translation.en: It is difficult to procure the required quantities of glass and tin.

translation.lb: D'mauere kenne net ugestrach gi bis et net me' zum dàch crarënt.
translation.en: The walls cannot be painted until the roof no longer leaks.

translation.lb: Solang net iwerall glas an de fënsteren ass, get et och net hell a k'Ioer an den zëmmcren.
translation.en: As long as there is no glass in the windows, it will not be bright and clear in the rooms.

translation.lb: An trotzdem get geschafft, trotzdem verle'eren ons jongen de mudd net, si iéen hand un, si si net op d'nues gefall an hir gebeier mächen am gro'ssc ganzen e gcfällegen androck.
translation.en: And yet work is being done, our young ones do not lose courage, they lend a hand, they are not clueless, and their buildings make a generally pleasing impression.

translation.lb: U kélt brauchen se net ze leiden, d'Franso'se liwere kok an d'Preisc müssen holz hirgin.
translation.en: They do not need to suffer from cold; the French supply coke and the Prussians must bring wood.

translation.lb: HoffenWech lôsscn se sech do net eni d'o'ere schlocn a furrdere we'negstens dal dréchent liolz an iwerlôssen de Preisen dat grengt.
translation.en: Hopefully, they do not let themselves be fooled and at least demand dry wood, leaving the green wood to the Prussians.

translation.lb: DEN TRAM De Pitti hätt a sengem aufsatz gesell ri wen: Der Tram ist ein Schinnen-Weh-Hickel...
translation.en: THE TRAM Pitti supposedly said in his essay: The tram is a little rail vehicle...

translation.lb: nie ecb behapten, et ass é G. m. b. H....
translation.en: I would never claim it is a limited liability company...

translation.lb: a wann én eptpes behapt, da muss én et och ganz bestëmmt wessen.
translation.en: and when someone claims something, they definitely need to know it.

translation.lb: G. m. b. H. dat ass net we' vill ieidd inengen, eng gesellschaft matt beschränkter haftong, nén, dat ass é gefier matt beschränkter haftong.
translation.en: G. m. b. H. is not, as many think, a company with limited liability, no, it's a vehicle with limited liability.

translation.lb: Ech hnn et soss och ni gegléwt, bis da» sc mech eng ke'er fatzeg iwcrzégt haten a mech matt mengem billet an der täsch net inattgehoU hun, et gong einfach ké nie' an de salon eran, an ech hätt mech dach nach eso' gèr tëschend d'médercher gedréckt.
translation.en: I never believed it, until they really convinced me one time and my ticket in my pocket didn't matter, it just didn't go into the salon, and I would have loved to squeeze in between the girls.

translation.lb: — Dén dag huet dat mer nach net eso' vill ausgemat, well ech hât grad dé »ëllechen index nobezueilt krut an dat gong dner fir drei humpen an aller gemütsro' beim Nie ze hue- ItO.
translation.en: — That day it didn't bother me much, because I had just received the old index and that was enough for three mugs at ease at Nie's.

translation.lb: Datt emol bei ans do ons zaldoten vun elauter roserei matt hire camion'en an den tram rennen, datt d'fatzen ewech fueren, well hién owends zeviill hell belîcht ass an emmer grad da lânscht firt.
translation.en: That sometimes our soldiers in sheer anger might drive their trucks into the tram, causing debris to fly everywhere, because it is too brightly lit in the evening and always drives past just then.

translation.lb: wann si matt hire médercher bei der kasäre stin, dat kann é nun awer net erp de korito „beschränkt haftong" setzen, dat musse mir matt onsen zaldoten ausmächen.
translation.en: when they are standing with their girls by the barracks, that can't be blamed on the term 'limited liability,' that's something we must resolve with our soldiers.

translation.lb: Mé wann de Schaffner aus dem unhänger muergens sét: haut musst dir iéch warm zidderen, well ons heizong huet e knax, ons fehlt et um kofferdrot fir dat déngen ze repare'eren, da kann ech nemme Jâchen, déni kann dach opgehollef gin.
translation.en: But if the conductor says in the morning from the trailer: today you have to shiver warmly, because our heating has a glitch, we lack the copper wire to repair it, then I can only laugh, that can certainly be remedied.

translation.lb: Mei frënd Pierre huet mer an d'o'er gepespcrt, den tram krc'ch vun den docteren hémlech eppes zo'gescho'schterl, datt d'leidd seeh sollten erkalen an d'grippe kre'en.
translation.en: My friend Pierre whispered to me secretly that the tram gets something special from the doctors so that people should catch a cold and get the flu.

translation.lb: el wär we'nt der vergre'sserong vun der clientèle.
translation.en: It was for the increase of clientele.

translation.lb: — Mé dat ass eng ligen.
translation.en: — But that is a lie.

translation.lb: Ech mächen do é klenge propos, dé net zo verwerfen ass: Den tram soll eng ke'er all sei courage zesummenhuelen a no Waltiefer op d'gemeng gaen, do kritt hié kofferdrot eso'vill we' hlén es brauch, mir fenken so'vve'- so' ons strosseluch:e net un a wat mecht dann den drot do hänken?
translation.en: I make a small proposal that is not to be dismissed: The tram should once gather all its courage and go to the municipality of Waltiefer, there it can get all the copper wire it needs, as we do not touch our streetlights and what then causes the wire to hang there?

translation.lb: Ech fir mein d'il, ech lâfe le'vver eng ke'er matt der kopp widder d'parkemauer, we' datt ech mer am tram d'grippe huetlen.
translation.en: For my part, I would rather run my head against the park wall than catch the flu in the tram.

translation.lb: Den tram huet och matt onsenr hèr sportsminister en accord getraff.
translation.en: The tram also reached an agreement with our honorable sports minister.

translation.lb: Dat betrëfft ons scho'lkanner.
translation.en: This concerns our school children.

translation.lb: Wann de' beim Crispinus stin ze warden, da spiMe mir liinnen en express...
translation.en: When they're waiting by Crispinus, we pass them by on purpose...

translation.lb: nén, mir fuerdcren hir gesondhét a Jossen se den dauer-
translation.en: no, we encourage their health and let them endure

translation.lb: Iftf üben, mir fueren einfach lânscht.
translation.en: practice endurance, we simply drive past.

translation.lb: Wann se da gndd lafen a si kre'en ons erem bis op d'kreizong, dann huele mir si matt, an als bonnote fir de' sehe' course kre'en si e Jach an de billet gepëtzt. — —
translation.en: If they then run well and catch up with us to the intersection, we take them along, and as a bonus for the fast run, they get a notch on their ticket. — —

translation.en: Despite everything, it doesn't bother us, we take the tram (we have no other choice and even if it's very crowded and we sometimes have to take the next one.

translation.en: The championship return match cannot bring us anything earth-shattering, at most clarify a question of prestige more or less.

translation.en: To what extent the Red Boys, as a well-ranked team, relatively free from worries, can adhere to the true character of a championship match remains to be seen.

translation.en: Complaint against the English government * The English government had to defend itself yesterday in Parliament against a motion from the opposition on the issue of food shortages.

translation.en: The leader of the opposition, Eden, in his parliamentary statement, directed his speech against the ministry, which recently made statements about continuing food rationings.

translation.en: These rationings particularly harshly affect the English population, and the ministers' statements have only caused further unrest.

translation.lb: Den Eden werft der regirong da vir, si hält et verseimt d'vollek matt zeit ze warr.
translation.en: Eden accuses the government of failing to prepare the people in time.

translation.lb: Mir dèrfen den éscht vun der lag net ënnerschätzen, sot en.
translation.en: We must not underestimate the seriousness of the situation, he said.

translation.lb: 6 läng joren sin elo schons an England d'iiéwensmëttel rationne'ert.
translation.en: For 6 long years now, food has been rationed in England.

translation.en: As a result, the situation in England is different from that in various other countries on the continent.

translation.lb: Deitschland hât z. b. bis zu senger nidderlag alles am iwerfloss, wat et set h aus den occupe'erte länner erausgeschléft hält.
translation.en: Germany, for example, had everything in abundance until its defeat, having taken resources from the occupied countries.

translation.en: The Minister of Agriculture should have definitely known that this year there would be a major shortfall in cereals and should have taken measures earlier.

translation.en: Agriculture Minister Smith defended himself and said he had not left Parliament in the dark.

translation.en: It would not have been appropriate to announce the rationings to the population too early, as otherwise the farmers might have held back their products and the workers might have stormed the bakeries.

translation.en: In Europe, 125 million people must get by with less than 2000 calories a day; there are even countries where they must be content with less than 1000 calories per day.

translation.lb: Et ass me'glech, datt se ofwârden, bis de wanter zu enn gét, an d'kélt an den honger d'onzefriddenhét nach me' gro'ss gemäch hun, ir se matt organise'erten actio'ncn agreifen.
translation.en: It is possible that they wait until winter ends and the cold and hunger have increased dissatisfaction even more before they strike with organized actions.

translation.lb: Ech huelen iéwer net un, datt se sech selwer vill succès verspriéchen.
translation.en: However, I do not assume that they promise themselves much success.

translation.lb: Well si sin an enger ganz ancrer lag, we' ons Resistenz am krich:
translation.en: Because they are in a very different position, like our resistance during the war:

translation.lb: Mir haten de' fest gewësshét, datt hannerun ons de' gewalteg muecht vun den Allie'erte sténg, de' ons endlech freimäche ge'w.
translation.en: We were firmly convinced that behind us stood the mighty power of the Allies, who would eventually free us.

translation.lb: Wo' sollten si awer hëllef hirkre'en.
translation.en: But where should they get help from?

translation.lb: Dofir wèrt et hextwarscheinlech bei verénzelten attacke bleiwen.
translation.en: Therefore, it will most likely remain with isolated attacks.

translation.lb: SPUENIEN Strof fir politesch ménong 5 bedeitend männer vum spuenesche kultusministerium, de' op eng lëscht durch hir ënnerschreft hir sympathie fir de spueneschen tro'npretendent Don Juan ausgedruckt jiaten, si vun faire poste geflun.
translation.en: SPAIN Punishment for political opinion 5 significant men from the Spanish Ministry of Culture, who expressed their sympathy for the Spanish throne pretender Don Juan by signing a list, have been dismissed from their positions.

translation.lb: D'herzogin vu Modina a Citania go'w aus dèrsejsvechter ursâch zu enger geldbo'ss vun 10.000 sterling verurteil, well de' betr. lëseht dem use'e vum Franco geschuod hält.
translation.en: The Duchess of Modena and Citiana was sentenced to a fine of 10,000 sterling for the same reason, as the concerned list is considered harmful to the use by Franco.

translation.lb: Bekannllecb haie spuenesch monarchisten eng sympathielëscht un den Don Juan zu Lissabon gescheckt, op dèr net manner we' 500 nimm vu spuenesche perse'nlechkéten, ënner aneren fre'er ministeren aew., figure'- ert hun.
translation.en: Reportedly, Spanish monarchists sent a list of sympathy to Don Juan in Lisbon with no fewer than 500 names of Spanish personalities, including former ministers, etc., listed.

translation.lb: D'nimm vun den ënnerzéchner wore net bekanntgemâch gin.
translation.en: The names of the signatories were not made public.

translation.lb: Tiens, tiens!
translation.en: Well, well!

translation.lb: Wann d'nazien hir berüchtegt parteidég a „Kreistage" orgànise'ert hun, dann hu si hir ieidd aus allen déler vuni land an aus dem Reich matt den autocaren an den zieh an d'versammlonge geschléft.
translation.en: When the Nazis organized their notorious party day and "Kreistage," they transported their members from all parts of the country and from the Reich to the meetings by bus.

translation.lb: An den dag drop huet d'„Nationalblatt" de massebesuch ausposaunt.
translation.en: And the next day, the "Nationalblatt" announced the mass attendance.

translation.lb: Geseilter owend hat d'komnuinisteseh parte! eng opkliirongsversammlong am Hôtel de la Poste zu Letzeburg.
translation.en: That same evening, the communist party! held an informational meeting at the Hôtel de la Poste in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: A well den ex-Minister nel virun eidle still schwètce wollt, hat hié sech seng genossen aus dem ganze land an d'stâdt ofkonunande'- ert.
translation.en: And because the ex-minister didn't want to speak to empty chairs, he summoned his comrades from all over the country to the city.

translation.lb: Net we'neger we' 8 autocaren waren ageiaf.
translation.en: No fewer than 8 coaches were brought in.

translation.lb: Haut kann dann d'„Zeitung" vum „massebesuch" a vun der erziélen, de' d'claqiie matt sech brucrht huet.
translation.en: Today, the "Zeitung" can talk about the "mass attendance" that the claque brought along.

translation.lb: Seiberong am USA-staatsdepartement Washington, 9. october (Exchange).
translation.en: Declaration in the USA State Department Washington, October 9 (Exchange).

translation.lb: D'amerikanescht Staatsdepartement huet d'entlôssen vun alle beamten ugekënnegt, de' member vu kommunisteschen oder fascistesche parteie sin oder dese Parteien nostin, de' verre'deresch oder wühleresch actio'nen ge'nt de Staat ënnerstëtzen oder den intresse vu friéme mächten dengen.
translation.en: The American State Department has announced the dismissal of all officials who are members of communist or fascist parties or adhere to these parties, who support treasonous or subversive actions against the state, or serve the interests of foreign powers.

translation.lb: Entlôss gi weider all perso'nen, de' Spionage dreiwen oder vertraulech informatio'nen an d'ausland weidergin a schle'sslech all perso'nen, de' an enker beze'ong matt agenten vu friéme mächten stin oder denen hire schwäche character ursäch get zu der befiérchtong,.
translation.en: Furthermore, any persons engaged in espionage or passing confidential information abroad, and finally, any persons closely associated with agents of foreign powers whose weak character raises the concern,

translation.lb: datt se eso' handlongen ënnerhuelen, oder dohinner influenze'ert gi kennten.
translation.en: that they might undertake such actions or be influenced in that direction.

translation.lb: Verbänn a Vereiner Cours Supérieurs de Comptabilité et d'Arithmétique Commerciale
translation.en: Associations and Unions Upper Courses of Accounting and Commercial Arithmetic

translation.lb: Les cours de Ire et de 2me année de l'Association des Voyageurs et Employés du Commerce et de l'lndustrie (AVECI) placés sous le contrôle du gouvernement, commenceront lundi, le 13 octobre prochain à 19 heures dans une salle de l'Athénée à Luxembourg.
translation.en: The first and second-year courses of the Association of Travelers and Employees of Commerce and Industry (AVECI) under government control will begin on Monday, October 13th at 7 PM in a room at the Athénée in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Ils auront lieu les lundis et les vendredis de 19 à 20.30 heures.
translation.en: They will take place on Mondays and Fridays from 7 to 8:30 PM.

translation.lb: Les personnes désirant fréquenter ce« cours doivent être âgées de 17 ans au moins.
translation.en: The persons wishing to attend these courses must be at least 17 years old.

translation.lb: Les demandes d'inscription sont à adres ser par carte postale à Monsieur le Président de I'AVECI, 19 Avenue du Bois A Luxembourg.
translation.en: Registration requests should be sent by postcard to Mr. President of the AVECI, 19 Avenue du Bois in Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Ces demandes seront accep tées également lors de l'ouverture des cours.
translation.en: These requests will also be accepted during the opening of the courses.

translation.lb: Interimscomité vun der UNO iwerflësseg ... sét de Wischinsky
translation.en: UNO interim committee redundant ... says Wischinsky

translation.lb: Lake Success, 16. october (Reuter) An •der politescher commissio n vun der UNO huet nom Foster Dulles de sowjetesche verlriéder Wischinsky geschwat, den an enger sarkastescher art a weis versiebt huet, d'amerikanesoh propositio'n fir d'schafong vun engem interimscomité vun der UNO als iwenflësseg duerzeslellen.
translation.en: Lake Success, October 16 (Reuter) In the political commission of the UNO, after Foster Dulles, the Soviet representative Wischinsky spoke, who sarcastically dismissed the American proposal to create an interim committee of the UNO as unnecessary.

translation.lb: De Wisdhinsky huel erklärt, d'Amerikaner hallen sech driwer beklot, datt um ordre du jour vun der generalversammriong esd' vill ponikten sléngen an dofir en i-nterimacomité geschale gi soWt.
translation.en: Wischinsky explained that the Americans complained that there were too many items on the agenda of the General Assembly and therefore an interim committee should be established.

translation.lb: „Firwal hun dann ower d'USA de coreanesche problem op den ordre du jour gesät, dé net drop gehe'ert?
translation.en: "Why then did the USA put the Korean problem on the agenda, which does not belong there?

translation.lb: Firwat hun aner dedegatio'nen de problem vum ilaliencsehe friddensvertrag oipgeworf?
translation.en: Why did other delegations bring up the issue of the Italian peace treaty?

translation.lb: •D'nominatio'n vun engem inlerirnscomité ge'f eng flagrant Verletzung vtrii der chartn vun de Verénte Natio'nne an e versuch bedeiten, de' erfuerderlech énegkét ënner de gro'ssmâcfhten z'emgoen.
translation.en: The nomination of an interim committee would be a flagrant violation of the United Nations Charter and would mean an attempt to undermine the necessary unity among the great powers.

translation.lb: D'USA ge'we versichen, eng kirpersehaft an d'lié wen ze ruffen. de' me' gro'ss rechter hu sollt, we' de wefltsécherhétsrnt selwer.
translation.en: The USA would try to establish an entity with more major rights than the UN Security Council itself.

translation.lb: Dodurch gc f de sécherhétsrot comp le» ausgeschalt gin.
translation.en: In doing so, the Security Council would be completely sidelined.

translation.lb: Den amerikanesche virschlag ge'f zur zeit kommen, wo' aU tentativen fir d Vetorecht ofzeschafen, gescheitert wären.
translation.en: The American proposal comes at a time when all attempts to abolish the veto right have failed.

translation.lb: Et war kloer, da» d'USA versiehe ge'wen de wetllsécherhélsrot auszeschalten.
translation.en: It was clear that the USA intended to eliminate the Security Council.

translation.lb: well et sech als onme'glech erwiesen hätt. de sécherhétsrot zu engem spiMgezei vun déne mächten ze mächen, de' ziller verfoUegc ge'wen, de' de princiipien vun de Verénte Natio'nen widderspriéche ge'wen.
translation.en: Because it had proven impossible to make the Security Council a puppet of powers pursuing goals contrary to the principles of the United Nations.

translation.lb: De Wischinskv huet zum schluss erkJ&rt. d'Sowjetunio'n ge'f d'amerikanesch propositio'n als e weidere versuch belruechten, d'solidarite't vun de Verénte Natio'nen z'öiuiergruc wen.
translation.en: Wischinsky finally stated that the Soviet Union viewed the American proposal as another attempt to undermine the solidarity of the United Nations.

translation.lb: D'Sowjetunio'n ge'f sedh desem virschlag ower schärf widersetzen.
translation.en: The Soviet Union would strongly oppose this proposal.

translation.lb: <tén eng flagrant Verletzung vun der Charta an de principien vun der L'NO bedeite gef an den ënnergaivk vun der UNO verursâche kennt.
translation.en: It could mean a flagrant violation of the Charter and principles of the UNO and potentially cause the downfall of the UNO.

translation.lb: f Den australeschen delege'erten Evatt, huet gemengt, dliehaiptong vum Wischinsky, dalt den interimscomitié d'aetivite't vum sèche rhétsrot durchkreize ge'f, war onbegrënd, well d'ameri'kanesdh propositio'n hätt guer keng eso' absiebten.
translation.en: The Australian delegate Evatt thought Wischinsky's claim that the interim committee would disrupt the activities of the Security Council was unfounded as the American proposal had no such intentions.

translation.lb: Duerfmusek Hueschtert.
translation.en: Village Band Hueschtert.

translation.lb: Nodém ons duerfmusek seoh dest joer scho verschiddentlech ausgezéchent huet, konnte mir de lèschte sonndeg e weidere concert vun hir he'eren.
translation.en: After our village band has already distinguished itself several times this year, we were able to enjoy another concert from them last Sunday.

translation.lb: Et »or eng fréd, ons musikanten z'applaude'eren fir dat, wat si do virbruecht hun.
translation.en: It was a pleasure to applaud our musicians for what they have presented.

translation.lb: Enner der ausgezéchenter lédong vun hirem dirigent, dem hèr Köster, hu si sech selwer iwertTaff, fir dem public dat bèscht ze bidden, wat hinnen och vollkomme gelongen ass.
translation.en: Under the distinguished leadership of their conductor, Mr. Köster, they surpassed themselves to offer the audience the best, which they succeeded in perfectly.

translation.lb: Dat huet de längen applaus bestätegt.
translation.en: That was confirmed by the prolonged applause.

translation.lb: Fuert eso' weider, jonigen.
translation.en: Continue like this, boys.

translation.lb: d'sympathie vun ons alléguer sin iéch gewëss.
translation.en: You have the sympathy of us all for sure.

translation.lb: Eppes vum Torry-congress
translation.en: Something from the Tory Congress

translation.lb: Den e'schten dag vum congress vun den englesche conservativcn vun desem joer huet eng kleng iwerraschong bruecht.
translation.en: The first day of this year's English Conservative Congress brought a small surprise.

translation.lb: Well de' so'genannt industriecharta, de' virun allem vun de lénksconservativen ënnerstëtzt go'f, ass op eng vill me' kleng oppositio'n gesto'ss, we' am ufank ugeholl gin ass.
translation.en: Because the so-called industrial charter, which was mainly supported by the left conservatives, faced much less opposition than initially assumed.

translation.lb: Wuel huet e vertriéd'er vum rechtse parteiflillék, Sir Waldron Smithers, versieht de congress dervun z'iwerzégen,,,datt d'zo'konft vun England vun der oflénong vun deser industriecharta ofhänke ge'f.
translation.en: Indeed, a representative from the right-wing faction, Sir Waldron Smithers, tried to convince the congress that England's future depended on the adoption of this industrial charter.

translation.lb: „Ower de congress huet seng mahnong matt zwëscheruffer, we' „onsënn" etc. kritize'ert, a schle'sslech ass matt allen ge'nt drei stemmen eng resolutio'n guddgehéscht gin, de' d'industrie-charta net nemmen als discussio'nsbasis, mé als „kloren exposé vun den allgemenge prineipien vun enger eonservativer Wirtschaftspolitik" aeeepte'ert huet.
translation.en: But the congress criticized this stance with interjections like 'nonsense' etc., and eventually passed a resolution with only three dissenting votes, accepting the industrial charter not just as a discussion basis but as a 'clear exposition of the general principles of a conservative economic policy.'

translation.lb: Domadden hu sech d'eonservativ zu enger progressiver Wirtschaftspolitik bekannt, de' am fall vun engem retour vun de conservativen an d'regirong, d'verstaatlechong vun der kuelenindustrie an der Bank of England net me' réekgangeg mâche ge'f, an dèr hiren hâptakzent op der förderong vun enger gesonder collaboratio'n tëschen den arbechter an der belriebsdirectio'n leit.
translation.en: Thus, the conservatives committed to a progressive economic policy, whereby if they return to government, the nationalization of the coal industry and the Bank of England will not be reversed, and the main emphasis will be on promoting a sound collaboration between workers and management.

translation.lb: Des industrie-charta,matt dèr d'eonservativ de' nèxt wahlcampagne fe'cre wellen, kënnt der-' Wirtschaftspolitik vun der L ab ou r- regirong (atsächlech eso' no, datt én de rechtsconservative kritiker muss recht gin, de' doran keng alternativ zum Sozialismus, mé e,,mëllech a wâssersozialismus" gesin.
translation.en: This industrial charter, with which the conservatives want to conduct the next election campaign, comes so close to the economic policy of the Labour government that one must agree with the right-wing conservative critics who see no alternative to socialism in it, but rather a 'milk and water socialism.'

translation.lb: Deser ménong ass och den „Daily Herald", dén a sengem commentaire iwer den Torry-congress schreiwt: „Andém d'industriecharla als ausdrock vün der Torry-politik accepte'ert gin ass, huet de congress zo'gin, datt d'controllpolitik vun der Labour an e grossen dél vun hirem nationalise'-erongsprogramni trotz allem dach richteg wor."
translation.en: This opinion is also shared by the 'Daily Herald,' which writes in its commentary on the Tory Congress: 'By accepting the industrial charter as an expression of Tory policy, the congress has acknowledged that the control policy of Labour and a significant part of their nationalization program were indeed correct despite everything.'

translation.lb: Och d'riéd vum Anthony Eden, an dèr de chef vun der eonservativer parteigrupp ze weise gesicht huet, we' et d'eonservativ mâche ge'- wen, wann si an der regirong wären, huet sech trotz e puer allaquen ge'nt d'regirong kengesfalls categoresch vun der Labour-politik ëniierschéd.
translation.en: Even Anthony Eden's speech, in which the leader of the conservative party group tried to show what the conservatives would do if they were in government, did not categorically differentiate itself from Labour's policy despite a few critiques against the government.

translation.lb: De kommunisteschen „Daily Worker" huet dem Eden seng riéd eso'guer „iwerraschend modere'ert" genannt, an den „Daily Herald" huet constate'ert, datt dem Eden seng äntwert op d'questio'n, wat d'eonservativ haut an der regirong mäche ge wen, hoergené dem entspriéche ge l', wat d'Labour-regirong tatsächlech am gang ass ze mächen.
translation.en: The communist 'Daily Worker' even called Eden's speech 'surprisingly moderate,' and the 'Daily Herald' noted that Eden's answer to what the conservatives would do if in government today corresponds exactly to what the Labour government is currently doing.

translation.lb: Dal énzegt, wat den Eden verlange ge'f an dàt d'regirong net gemacht hätt, war eng aschränkong vun de staatleche liéwensmëttelsubventio'nen, wo'durch d'hausfraen ongeheier belâscht ge'we gin.
translation.en: The only thing Eden demanded that the government had not done was a restriction on state food subsidies, which put an enormous burden on housewives.

translation.lb: De conservativcn „Daily Mail" doge'nt verkënnegt, datt d'partei elo endlecli sech selwer fond hält an eng Politik hätt, wärend den „Daily Télégraphe" vun engem „gudde Start" schwètzt a sech nëmmen driwer beklot, datt d'liberal ëmmer nach net berét wäre, malt de conservativen zesunnnen eng anti-sozialistesch front opzerîchten.
translation.en: Conversely, the conservative 'Daily Mail' announced that the party has now finally found itself and has a policy, while the 'Daily Telegraph' speaks of a 'good start' and only laments that the liberals are still not willing to form an anti-socialist front together with the conservatives.

translation.lb: Nodém e freideg no enger-schärfer ausernanersetzong matt der congressdirectio'n, de' den thema net op den ordre du jour setze wollt, durchgesät gin ass, datt eng gêné discussio'n iwer d'gefor vum kommunismus an England stattfanne soll, sto'ng de samschdegmueren am zéchen vum anti-koninmnismus.
translation.en: After a sharper confrontation on Friday with the congress direction, which did not want to put the topic on the agenda, it was decided that a general discussion on the danger of communism in England would take place, and Saturday morning was marked by anti-communism.

translation.lb: Den Churchill huet am nomëtteg eng riéd gehalen, de' d enn vum Torrycongress duergestallt huet.
translation.en: Churchill gave a speech in the afternoon, which represented the end of the Tory Congress.

translation.lb: Verke’ersonfall Wal fer.
translation.en: Traffic accident on Saturday.

translation.lb: E sainschdeg den owend go'f op der lïéscbdrëfferstrôiss Beim haus Hansen, de facteur Mercatoris, dé matl dem vélo hémfuere wollt, vun engem atilo ugesto'ss.
translation.en: On Saturday evening, on the Lieschdrëffer street near the Hansen house, the postman Mercatoris, who wanted to ride home on his bicycle, was hit by a car.

translation.lb: Den automobilst, dé ganz verblend durch d'pharen vun engem aulo aus der directio'n Letzeburg war, huel de facteur ze spe't gesin.
translation.en: The driver, who was completely blinded by the headlights of a car coming from the direction of Luxembourg, saw the postman too late.

translation.lb: Hiön huet secli dem onglécklechen senger direct ugeboJl a bei eil docter gefe'ert.
translation.en: He took the unfortunate man directly to the doctor in a hurry.

translation.lb: Den her Mercatoris huet eng schwerer kappverletzong an c schcllcrbrach dervu gedroen an ass fir länger zeit arbechlsonfäheg.
translation.en: Mr. Mercatoris suffered a severe head injury and a broken arm, making him unable to work for a long time.

translation.lb: Dat ass erem é vun dene viMen, muttw&llegen onglécksfiill de' vjrkommen, well vi M Chauffeuren ze spe t oder guer net olblennon.
translation.en: This is again one of those many unfortunate accidents that occur because too many drivers see too late or not at all.

translation.lb: Ass da Leng autorité"! do, de' des messtänn ofschafe kann?
translation.en: Is there any authority able to eliminate these conditions?

translation.lb: El ass geschwë kc mensch me' eso' kéng owes virun d'dir ze goen.
translation.en: Soon no one will dare to go out the door in the evening.

translation.lb: Befrot eruol t'lrams leidd, de' iérgeren sech och all dag.
translation.en: Ask around, and you'll find people who are upset every day.

translation.lb: BezueJen da blo'ss d'automobilisten steieren?
translation.en: Are only the motorists paying taxes?

translation.lb: ■Sin d'fo'ssgänger birger clasfe?
translation.en: Are pedestrians citizens of a lower class?

translation.lb: Och de franse’schen demonte’erongsplans reduze’ert Koblenz, 21. october (Exchange).
translation.en: Also the French dismantling plans reduced Koblenz, 21 October (Exchange).

translation.lb: D'franse'sch occupatio'nsautorite'ten hun eng ége revisio'n vum demonte'- erongsprogramm vu preiseschen Industrieanlagen durchgefe'ert.
translation.en: The French occupation authorities have conducted a revision of the dismantling program of Prussian industrial plants.

translation.lb: Si déle matt, datt de chiffer vun de maschinnen, de' an der Rheinpfalz ze demonte'ere an no Frankreich ze verschécke sin vu ronn 4000 stéck am wert vun 43 millio'nen letzeburger frangen op ronn 2700 maschinell am wert vu.
translation.en: They indicate that the number of machines to be dismantled in the Palatinate and sent to France has been reduced from around 4000 pieces worth 43 million Luxembourg francs to around 2700 machines worth.

translation.lb: ronn 22 millio'nen frangen reduze'ert gi wiir.
translation.en: about 22 million francs would be reduced.

translation.en: Sunday service of the doctors

translation.en: If on Sunday, October 12, a patient cannot find his home doctor in an urgent case, he can contact the following doctors:

translation.en: Luxembourg: Dr. Kerschen, 48 avenue de la Liberté, tel. 61-36.

translation.en: — The dentist Dr. Raoul Schroeder, 12 route de Beggen, Eich has office hours on Saturday from 15 to 17 and on Sunday from 10 to 12.

translation.lb: E sonndeg nomëtteg ass den zänndocter per telephon 59-56 z'erréchen.
translation.en: On Sunday afternoon, the dentist can be reached by telephone at 59-56.

translation.en: — The pharmacies Bichel, rue Aldringer and Knaff, 123 rue de Bonnevoie have Sunday service and night service until October 18.
