translation.lb: Englesch-amerikanesch hoffnongen op eng preisesch reichsregirong London, 23. octobcr. (Exchange.)
translation.en: English-American hopes for a Prussian imperial government London, October 23. (Exchange.)

translation.lb: De generolma jo'er Bishop, stelilv. Stabschef vum englesche commandant-en-chef an Deitschland huet zu London am vertaf vun enger pressconferenz erkilärt:
translation.en: The General Major Bishop, acting Chief of Staff of the English Commander-in-Chief in Germany, explained at a press conference in London:

translation.lb: „Mir (d. h. d'englesch an d'amerikanesch occupatio'nautorite'ten) hoffe stärk, datt am anschluss un d'conferenz vun den ausseministeren am november eng reichsregirong fir ganz Deitschland entstét.
translation.en: "We (i.e., the English and American occupation authorities) strongly hope that following the conference of foreign ministers in November, an imperial government for all of Germany will emerge.

translation.lb: Wa sech dat als onme'gilech erweise sodlt, so' hoffe mer, an der lag ze sin, a Westdeitschland d'gewa'lt an d'hänn vun enger énhétlecher regirong iéen ze kennen.
translation.en: If that proves impossible, we hope to be able to hand over power to a unified government in West Germany.

translation.lb: Et wär ons da me'glech, ons op de' wesentlech controllmesüren fir d'verhënnerong vun enger neier preisescher oprëschtong ze beschränken a weider drop z'uechten, datt onst égent geld, dat mer fir Deitschland dépense'ere müssen, net ewech geworf get."
translation.en: It would then be possible for us to focus on the essential control measures to prevent a new Prussian armament and to ensure that our own money, which we have to spend on Germany, is not wasted.

translation.lb: De generalmajo'er Bishop huet vun enger „mustergüilleger" englesch-amerikanescher zesummenarbecht geschwat.
translation.en: General Major Bishop spoke of an "exemplary" English-American collaboration.

translation.lb: Dat gemengsamt zill war, we' bekannt, d'oprichte vun enger ausgeglachener, sech selwer erhalender preisescher Wirtschaft, wa se och op modester stuf opere'ere ge'f.
translation.en: The common goal, as is known, was the establishment of a balanced, self-sustaining Prussian economy, even if it would operate at a modest level.

translation.lb: D'Russen hätte matt recht de' gro'ss verwüstongen, de' d'Preisen an der Sowjetunio'n ugertcht hun, higewisen.
translation.en: The Russians had rightly pointed out the great devastations that the Prussians had caused in the Soviet Union.

translation.lb: Aus Deitschland géngen dofir gro'ss quantite'te vun industriellen anlagen a gidder no der Sowjetunio'n, an d'wirker de' ZTéckbleiwe ge'wen, hätten och nëmme fir d'Russen ze schaffen.
translation.en: From Germany, therefore, large quantities of industrial installations and goods were being sent to the Soviet Union, and the remaining functions were to work only for the Russians as well.

translation.lb: Wärend England ower cxp dèr enger seil égen affer brénge misst, andém et slänneg „geld a wueren an Deilschland eraschléfe ge'f",
translation.en: While England would have to make its own sacrifices on the one hand by constantly "pushing money and goods into Germany",

translation.lb: misst et nokucken, we' seng léschtongen um aneren enn „erem erausgeschûéft'' ge'we gin.
translation.en: it would need to ensure that these efforts were not "shoved back out" at the other end.

translation.lb: Dat war de stén zum usto'ss an de grond vum échec vun der Moskauer conferenz gewiéscht.
translation.en: That was the thrust and the reason for the failure of the Moscow conference.

translation.lb: Den occupatio'nsbeamten, de' an Deitschland no bèschtem kennen schaffe ge'wen, le'g virun allem drun z'erfueren, we' dese schwirege problem op der ve'ermächteconferenz ze lé'se war.
translation.en: The occupation officials, who were working to the best of their abilities in Germany, were mainly focused on addressing how this difficult problem could be solved at the four-power conference.

translation.lb: Zur questio'n vun der eso' dax criteze'erter oorruptio'n am englesche verwaltongsapparat an Deitschland sot de generolmajo'er Bishop,
translation.en: Regarding the often criticized corruption in the English administrative apparatus in Germany, General Major Bishop said,

translation.lb: et ge'wen tatsächlech ~gew&ss leidd, de' deischter machenschaften um gewëssen hätten",
translation.en: there were indeed certain people who were guilty of shady dealings,

translation.lb: so'we' eng rei vun onverbesserlechen elementen existe'eren.
translation.en: as well as a number of incorrigible elements existing.

translation.lb: Eso' neischnoteen ge'wen oiver, eso'bal se entdeckt gi ge'wen, mam nèxte schëff no England zréckgeschéckt gin.
translation.en: Such nuisances, once discovered, were immediately returned to England on the next ship.

translation.lb: Et ge'f sech gilécMecherweis nëmmen em eng ganz kleng minorite't handelen.
translation.en: It was supposedly only about a very small minority.

translation.lb: D'majorite't vun de beamten ge'f den „typ, dén é ne'deg huet" verkiérperen,
translation.en: The majority of the officials embodied "the right type",

translation.lb: nämlech „männer, de' net nëmmen hire collegen, mé och de Preisen e lichtend beispill gi ge'wen".
translation.en: namely "men who provided a shining example not only to their colleagues but also to the Prussians."

translation.lb: VVe' aus Moskau bekannt gel, ass de verband vun den englesch-amerikaneschen zeidongscorrespondenten zu Mo-skau, den 1942 gegrënd go'f, vun de sowjetautorite'ten opgele'st gin.
translation.en: As became known from Moscow, the association of English-American newspaper correspondents in Moscow, founded in 1942, was dissolved by the Soviet authorities.

translation.lb: Den Dickstheater den z'joert fir d'e'scht virun d ëffentlechkét getratt ass an dobei gleich d'opmiérksamkét vun all dénen, de nach inlressi u gudder letzburger-bühnekonscht hun, op sech gezun huet, ass de 5. November erem um dill.
translation.en: The Dick Theater, which made its first public appearance last year and immediately attracted the attention of all those still interested in good Luxembourgish stage art, is back on stage on November 5.

translation.lb: Opgefe'ert gin 2 stécker vun onsen àle méschteren Dicks a Batty Weber.
translation.en: Two pieces by our old masters Dicks and Batty Weber will be performed.

translation.lb: „De Kanone'er" (Gottlieb Hurra) ass vum Leo Moulin nei inszene'ert gin.
translation.en: "The Cannon Operator" (Gottlieb Hurra) has been newly staged by Leo Moulin.

translation.lb: an den Henri Pensis huet dat bele'ft volléksstéck matt stëmmongsvoller zwëschenaktsmusék kënschtleresch bereichert.
translation.en: and Henri Pensis has artistically enriched the lively folk piece with atmospheric interlude music.

translation.lb: De zwé nimm elèng si schonsamstand, déite richtegen thealerfrënn a musékkenrier d'saft an de mond ze dreiwen.
translation.en: The two names alone are enough to make true theater lovers and music connoisseurs' mouths water.

translation.lb: Net manner interessant sin d'besetzong an d'mise en scène vum Dicks senge..Kirmesgäscht".
translation.en: No less interesting is the cast and staging of Dicks' "Fair Guests".

translation.lb: Et ass selbstverständlech, datt den Dickstheater besuergt ass,'- sei patre'ner, dén zo'gleich de papp vum letzeburger theater ass an a sengein genre bis haut nach net iwertraff go'f, duerch wirklech biihnekonscht ze e'eren.
translation.en: It is self-evident that the Dick Theater is concerned for its patron, who is at the same time the father of Luxembourgish theater and has not yet been surpassed in his genre, to be honored through true stage art.

translation.lb: Me' soll haut net verrode sin.
translation.en: But nothing more shall be revealed today.

translation.lb: Gidd kucken!
translation.en: Come and see!

translation.lb: N. B. Op der première dirige'ert den Henri Pensis selwer seng neist compositio'nen: Zwëschenaktsmusek zo'm ~Kanone'er".
translation.en: N.B. At the premiere, Henri Pensis himself will conduct his latest compositions: Interlude music for the "Cannon Operator".

translation.lb: Copenhageii. Den däneschen aussenminister huet d'absicht, formell vum G. Marshall ze verlangen, datt Grolland vun den Amerikaner evacue'ert get.
translation.en: Copenhagen. The Danish Foreign Minister intends to formally request G. Marshall for Greenland to be evacuated by the Americans.

translation.lb: Berlin. Sëschler owend si 2 amerikanesch zaldoten vun der aviatio'n vun 8 Preisen iwerfall gin a matt kneppelen a messeren schwe'er hlesse'ert gin. Trotzdem konnten d'Amerikaner fortkommen. Eng enquête ass ageléd gin.
translation.en: Berlin. Last evening, 2 American soldiers from the aviation were assaulted by 8 Prussians and were seriously injured with clubs and knives. Nevertheless, the Americans managed to escape. An inquiry has been initiated.

translation.lb: Athen. 52 kommunisten, de' kriehsgerîcht vu Saloniki zum do't condamne'ert huet, well se griechesch fligeT an en he'ge fonctionnaire vun der police ermuerd haten, si gësohter mueren exécule'ert gin.
translation.en: Athens. 52 communists, sentenced to death by the war tribunal of Saloniki for murdering Greek pilots and a high-ranking police official, are to be executed tomorrow morning.

translation.lb: London, Geseilter ass en traité, dén d'onofhângegkét vu Birma fir de januar 1948 prépare'ert, vum Attlee an Thokin Nu. Premierminister vu Birma ënnerzéchent gin.
translation.en: London. A treaty has been concluded preparing the independence of Burma for January 1948, signed by Attlee and Thokin Nu, the Prime Minister of Burma.

translation.lb: Nei timbren Seit e puer dég scbons könnt é secb de' nei série timbre kâfen, de' d'post zur e er vum generol Patton erausgin huet.
translation.en: For a few days now, you can buy the new series of stamps that the post office issued in honor of General Patton.

translation.lb: Op zwe'n timbre geseit en den amerikanesehe kirfecht, eilauter kleng kreizer, de' bis an d'onendilechkét ze réche schéngen a fir drop dat gro'sst vum Patton sengem graw.
translation.en: On two stamps, you see the American cemetery, a multitude of small crosses, seeming to stretch into infinity, and on top, the grand tomb of Patton.

translation.lb: De' aner zwe'n timbren droen de kapp vum generol, an als symbol eng ketten, de' a stécker firt.
translation.en: The other two stamps bear the head of the general, and as a symbol, a chain that is broken in pieces.

translation.lb: D'série, de' dem â gefällt, a»s e sche'ne souvenir un dat gro'sst liberatio'nswiérk vun den Amerikaner.
translation.en: The series, which appeals to the public, is a beautiful souvenir of the great liberation work by the Americans.

translation.lb: An déne nèxte wochen soll och crem eng nei Caritasserie erauskommen mam kapp vum nationaldichter Lentz.
translation.en: In the next weeks, a new charitable series with the head of the national poet Lentz should also be released.

translation.lb: Iwerhapt hiiet d'postverwaltong fir an déne folgende joeren eng rei s'un „käppercher" erauszegin matt de käpp vun déne bedeitenste männer aus der letzeburgescher geschieht.
translation.en: In general, the postal administration plans to release a series of 'heads' with the portraits of the most significant men from Luxembourgish history in the coming years.

translation.lb: De' iddi ass nemmen ze begre'ssen; well eso' le'ere vill leidd op eng licht an agréa bel mane'er de' gro'ss dichter, componisten a moler aus der letzeburgescher vergângen hét emol kennen.
translation.en: The idea is only to be welcomed; because this way, many people learn in an easy and pleasant way about the great poets, composers, and painters from Luxembourg's past.

translation.lb: Dodurch erföllen de sérien en duebelen zweck: Ais caritastim beren hëllefen si der no't of.
translation.en: Thus, the series fulfill a dual purpose: as charity stamps, they help to alleviate need.

translation.lb: Als kleng biMer matt geschichtlechem wèrt droen n derzo' bei, d'letzeburger votllek opze klären an ze erze en.
translation.en: As small pictures with historical value, they contribute to enlightening and educating the Luxembourger people.

translation.lb: Hinzerter vum november 1941.
translation.en: Hinzerter from November 1941.

translation.lb: Am septcmber deses joers ass bei enger réunio'n vun Hinzerter, de' 1941 op stuff 7 zesumme woren, de svonsch opkomm, sech matt alle komeroden, de' sech 1941 no der november-razzia zu Hinzert op alle stuffen kennegele'ert hun, eremzegesin.
translation.en: In September of this year, during a meeting of Hinzerter who were together in 1941 at level 7, the desire arose to reunite with all comrades who got to know each other at all levels in 1941 after the November raid in Hinzert.

translation.lb: Als datum fir dese rendez-vous ass den 1. sonndeg nom 4. November propose'ert gin.
translation.en: The date proposed for this reunion is the first Sunday after November 4th.

translation.lb: All Hinzerter vum oveinber 1941 gin heimalt invite'ert, e sonndeg, den 9. November em 12 auer am Hôtel Walsheim.
translation.en: All Hinzerter from November 1941 are hereby invited on Sunday, November 9, at 12 o'clock at Hôtel Walsheim.

translation.en: Registrations should be made no later than November 6 to our comrade Pierre Alff, 9 Montée de Clausen, Luxembourg.

translation.en: President Truman receives Mr. Bech Washington, last November (AP).

translation.lb: — Den her Joseph Bech, letzeburgeschen aussenminis ter an den hèr Myron Taylor, spécialver triéder vum Truman an der Vaticanslad. woren enner de pet se'nlechkclen, de' gëschter vum président Truman empfänge gi sin.
translation.en: — Mr. Joseph Bech, Luxembourg's foreign minister, and Mr. Myron Taylor, special envoy of Truman to Vatican City, were among the select few who were received by President Truman yesterday.

translation.lb: Den hër Bech huet erklirt, datt et nrmmtn eng he'flechkétsvisite wor.
translation.en: Mr. Bech stated that it was merely a courtesy visit.

translation.en: On the other hand, Myron Taylor refused to say after his meeting with Truman whether he would return to Rome or not.

translation.lb: E sonndeg huet d'familjeo L. Perlia-Gonner an engerem familjekrés d'2sdéngscht jubrläuru vun der Madame Kelly Schmit-lmberl vu Weimesehkirch gefeiert.
translation.en: On Sunday, the family of L. Perlia-Gonner celebrated the 25-year service anniversary of Mrs. Kelly Schmit-Imberl from Weimesehkirch in a family gathering.

translation.lb: D'Madame S<rhmit ass vun fernster gebiérteg an si war als jongl médchen schons beim papp Xavier Perlia dén aïs apdikler am ganzen dall se'er bekannt wer 4 joer iâng am déngscht.
translation.en: Mrs. Schmit is originally from Fernster and, as a young girl, she worked under Mr. Xavier Perlia, who was well known as an apothecary in the whole valley, serving for 4 years.

translation.lb: We' dun de papp Perlia sengein jong Louis d'apdikt iwergin h net, ass d'Madame Schmit, de no Weimeschkirch beslued ass gin.
translation.en: When Mr. Perlia was about to pass the pharmacy to his son Louis, Mrs. Schmit decided to move to Weimeschkirch.

translation.lb: virugetuer all woch. joer aus joer an.
translation.en: She commuted every week, year after year.

translation.lb: am selwechten haus trei déngsehter ze léschten
translation.en: In the same house, loyally fulfilling her service duties.

translation.lb: D'Madame Ketlv Schmi! huel als unerkennong fir hir brav déngsehter eng ganz sche'n auer geschenkt kritt.
translation.en: Mrs. Kelly Schmit received a very beautiful clock as recognition for her diligent service.

translation.lb: MÎT wënschen deT jubilarin all gléok a guddes an dass si nach lâng eso rusleg kann virufueren.
translation.en: We wish the anniversary celebrant all the best and hope she can continue contently for many more years.

translation.lb: Eng hefteg riéd vum Wallace St. Louis (Missouri), U. nov. — An enger riéd, de' den Henri Wallace, frc'ere Vicepresident vun den USA zu St. Louis gehalen huet, huet hâén erklärt,
translation.en: A passionate speech by Wallace in St. Louis (Missouri), U. Nov. — In a speech given by Henry Wallace, the former Vice President of the USA in St. Louis, he stated,

translation.lb: datf den antikommunismus an d'antirussesch hysterie vun déne leidd propage'ert get, de' net wellen hun,
translation.en: that anti-communism and anti-Russian hysteria are propagated by those who do not want,

translation.lb: datt d'fondamental sozial a wirtschaftlech problemer demoeratesch le'songen kre'-gen".
translation.en: that fundamental social and economic problems receive democratic solutions.

translation.lb: „Wärend d'agenten vnn der Wall Street sech dru gin, den hâss ze se'nen teschen onse fre'eren Allie'erten an den Amerikaner
translation.en: While the agents of Wall Street are engaged in sowing hatred between our former allies and the Americans,

translation.lb: fe'ert ons d'realisatio'nen vun de plangen aus der Wall Street zum krich an zu enger kris,
translation.en: the realization of Wall Street's plans leads us to war and to a crisis,

translation.lb: an dat alles entwickelt sech o'ni d'controll vun der ôffentlechkét.
translation.en: and all of this develops without public control.

translation.lb: „Ech sin aus déne ge'genden zrcckkomm, de' als trouble'ert gëllen,
translation.en: "I have returned from those regions that are considered troubled,

translation.lb: huet de Wallace seng riéd beennegt, fir an den USA d'symptomen vun onuerdnong a collective! violence ze fannen."
translation.en: Wallace concluded his speech, to find the symptoms of disorder and collective violence in the USA."

translation.en: Cripps is thus solely responsible for England's economic policy.

translation.en: The dramatic resignation of the British Chancellor Dalton, a day after the presentation of the emergency budget, which is generally considered insufficient, has raised the question of whether the indiscretion regarding the content of the budget was the real reason for this resignation, or if there are more profound reasons, namely the failure of Dalton's financial policy altogether.

translation.en: Objective journalists had long held the view that Dalton's financial policy called into question the results of Cripps's economic policy and that only with strong support from the financial policy could the economic collapse be prevented.

translation.en: The 'Nord' (6th November) points out that goods are available again and implies that people should be informed when a purchase should be made.

translation.lb: „Sobald den Leuten lebendig zum Bewusslsein kommt, dass auf vielen Märkten die Käufer wieder die stärkere Partei sind, dass sie es durchaus nicht mehr nötig haben, um jeden Preis tu kaufen, dass sie wieder wie in normalen Zeiten die Auswahl zwischen den Lieferanten haben, dass sie von den Verkäufern umworben werden, sobald die Konsumenlen verstehen, wie slark ihre Position geworden ist, geJien wir einer Normalisierung der Wirtschaft entgegen."
translation.en: "As soon as people become aware that in many markets the buyers are once again the stronger party, that they no longer need to buy at any price, that they again have a choice between suppliers like in normal times, that they are courted by sellers, as soon as consumers understand how strong their position has become, we are moving toward an economic normalization."

translation.en: Naturally, measures must be taken to ensure that military power does not resurface.

translation.en: Marshall promises that the USA will do everything to prevent a new German military might.

translation.en: To rely only on appearances, which fortunately do not always get confused with the truth itself,

translation.lb: il semble qu'une fatalité implacable accule chaque jour un peu plus l'Europe à de nouveaux destins sanglants,
translation.en: it seems that an implacable fate is driving Europe every day a bit more towards new bloody destinies,

translation.lb: c'est à dire, celte fois, à sa perte sans remède.
translation.en: that is, this time, to its irredeemable downfall.

translation.lb: Après tant d'échecs répétés, propres à décourager les hommes de bonne volonté,
translation.en: After so many repeated failures, which are likely to discourage men of goodwill,

translation.en: General Marshall, on behalf of the United States, had proposed to this continent a rescue plan which one might have hoped would gain the unanimous support of those who were meant to benefit from it,

translation.lb: c'est a dire de I Europe entière.
translation.en: that is to say, all of Europe.

translation.lb: C'était compter sans l'ombrage d'une Russie qui veut réaliser à son bénéfice l'lnternationale mondiale de la misère sans plus se commettre avec l'Europe qu'avec l'Amérique.
translation.en: That was without taking into account the shadow of a Russia that wants to achieve for its benefit the world International of misery without committing itself with Europe any more than with America.

translation.lb: Sans doute faudrait-il beaucoup de crédulité pour imaginer que le geste des Etats-Unis soit dicté uniquement par des sentiments désintéressés.
translation.en: Undoubtedly, it would take a lot of credulity to imagine that the gesture of the United States is guided solely by disinterested sentiments.

translation.lb: Mais à l'homme qui se noie il importe peu de savoir quels sentiments incitent son sauveur à lui tendre la main, s'il veut vraiment le sauver.
translation.en: But to the drowning man, it does not matter what feelings motivate his savior to extend a hand if he truly wants to save him.

translation.lb: l'ai-un jeu digne des cercles inlernaux auquel le monde présent semble condamné,
translation.en: There is a game worthy of the infernal circles to which the present world seems condemned,

translation.lb: le retranchement volontaire de la Russie suscitera doue, mieux qu'aucun événcmeut,
translation.en: the voluntary withdrawal of Russia will provoke, indeed better than any event,

translation.lb: ee bloc-occidental que toute sa diplomatie tendait à éviter.
translation.en: this Western bloc that all its diplomacy tended to avoid.

translation.lb: D'ores et déjà, il est certain aussi que lu proposition américaine portera le trouble au-delà des peuples occidentaux et jusque dans Ses Etats satellites que l'impérialisme stalinien considérait comme sa chasse gardée.
translation.en: From now on, it is also certain that the American proposal will bring turmoil beyond the Western peoples and into its satellite states which Stalinist imperialism considered its private preserve.

translation.lb: Quelles que soient ses préférences idéologiques, plus d'un préférera sans doute manger à sa faim contre les principes plutôt que de mourir de famine selon les règles.
translation.en: Whatever their ideological preferences, more than one will undoubtedly prefer to eat their fill against the principles rather than die of starvation according to the rules.

translation.lb: 11 reste donc à savoir dans quelle mesure ces Etats pourront se délier de la main de fer qui les étreint pour recevoir la inanue qui leur est proposée.
translation.en: It remains to be seen to what extent these states can break free from the iron hand that holds them to receive the help that is offered to them.

translation.lb: Cette tentative, qui procédera du plus élémentaire instinct de conservation,
translation.en: This attempt, which will proceed from the most elementary instinct of self-preservation,

translation.lb: suscitera, au cours des mois à venir, dans l'Europe orientale, ce que l'euphémisme parlementaire appelle dans les assemblées des „mouvements très divers".
translation.en: will provoke, in the coming months in Eastern Europe, what the parliamentary euphemism calls in assemblies 'very diverse movements.'

translation.lb: De ce qu'il en sortira dépendra la guerre ou la paix du monde.
translation.en: What will come of it will determine the war or peace of the world.

translation.lb: On veut seulement espérer que la politique économique des Etats-Unis ue se satisfait pas seulement d'une supériorité alimentaire, mais qu'elle s'appuie sur une force armée propre à contenir les amateurs de guerre.
translation.en: We can only hope that the economic policy of the United States is not satisfied with just a food superiority but is supported by an armed force capable of restraining those who are fond of war.

translation.lb: Controversen tëschen Russland an de Westmächten zu Genf
translation.en: Controversies between Russia and the Western powers in Geneva

translation.lb: De' zu Genf vun engem Schirokko ähnlech wärme wand nach gesteigert gliddeg temperatur vun e me'ndeg hat hir réckwîrkongen eso'guer op d'verhandlongen an dem kille marmorpalast vun de Verénte Natio'nen net verfélt.
translation.en: The Sirocco-like warm wind in Geneva further intensified the scorching temperature of Monday, which had its repercussions even on the negotiations in the cool marble palace of the United Nations.

translation.lb: So' sin an der wirtschaftscommissio'n tir Europa fir d'e'schte ke'er an offener a graffer polemik d'controversen tëschent Russland an de westmächten openarier gesto'ss.
translation.en: In the Economic Commission for Europe, for the first time, the controversies between Russia and the Western powers were openly and vehemently aired in open polemic.

translation.lb: D'belsch regirong hat d'propositio'n gemacht, op d'traktandenlëscht vun deser tagong d'questio'n vun de wirtschaftsbeze'ongen matt Deitschland ze setzen.
translation.en: The Belgian government proposed to include the issue of economic relations with Germany on the agenda of this meeting.

translation.lb: Vis-à-vis vun desean wonsch, dén och d'ënnerstëtzong vun England fond liât, wollt de sowjeteschen delege'erten Zorin präzise'ert hun, em d'relatio'n vu wëlteche länner matt Deitschland et sech handele ge'f an ob doniatt Deitschland als ganzt oder nemmen en dél gemengt war.
translation.en: In regard to this wish, which also found support from England, the Soviet delegate Zorin wanted to clarify which countries' relations with Germany were being discussed and whether Germany as a whole or only a part was meant.

translation.lb: De Belsch sot, seng regirong ge'f Deitschland als ganzt an d'à fassen.
translation.en: The Belgian said that his government would consider Germany as a whole.

translation.lb: Mé dal huet de Russ net befriddegt an et ass zu endlosen discussio'ne komm.
translation.en: But this did not satisfy the Russians, leading to endless discussions.

translation.lb: An dat wor scho muerges.
translation.en: And that was already in the morning.

translation.lb: Mettes huet des spannong hiren héxtc ponkt dann errécht.
translation.en: By noon, this tension reached its peak.

translation.lb: Fir d'e'scht hun d'Englänner an d'Franso'sen eng erklärong zur Pareiser conferenz iwer de Marshall-plang ofgin.
translation.en: First, the English and the French gave a declaration about the Paris conference concerning the Marshall Plan.

translation.lb: Den delege: erte vun der Sowjetunion, Zorin, huet dorop an enger länger erklärong d'haltong vu senger regirong vis-à-vis vum Marshall-plang klorgeluegt a vun de prositio'nen dénen vun England a Frankreich, wo'bei en dann emmer dem Molotov seng „papageien-argumenter" der coinmissio'n opgedëscht huet.
translation.en: In response, the delegate of the Soviet Union, Zorin, laid out in a long explanation his government's stance towards the Marshall Plan and the propositions of England and France, during which he repeatedly presented Molotov's 'parrot arguments' to the commission.

translation.lb: Den Englänner McNeil huet ganz opgeregt geäntwert an huet sein exposé matt der tauscht um dësch ennerstëtzt.
translation.en: The Englishman McNeil answered very excitedly and supported his speech with the exchange at the table.

translation.lb: Hién huet d'russesch tactic gekennzéchent, durch onnëtz dis.cussio'nen bei de berodongen zeit verle'eren ze lôssen, an huet energesch seng regirong a schütz geholl, de' vleicht, we' och gewessen expert'en, sech enner gewëssen emstänn getäuscht hätt kënnen huu.
translation.en: He characterized the Russian tactic as wasting time during discussions through futile arguments, and vigorously defended his government, which perhaps, like certain experts, could have made mistakes under certain circumstances.

translation.lb: Ower kén dèrft hir politesch one'eriechkét virwerfen.
translation.en: But no one should accuse them of political imperceptiveness.

translation.lb: D'duerstellong, de' den Zorin vun der gescheiterter confereuz gin hât, huet de franse'sehe vertriéder als „roman-versio'n" bezéchent.
translation.en: The portrayal that Zorin gave of the failed conference was referred to as a 'novel version' by the French representative.

translation.lb: Dat ge'f spéciell fir d'beschëllegong gëllen, de' den englesclien delege'erten als lächerlech verworf huet.
translation.en: This applied especially to the accusation that the English delegate dismissed as ridiculous.

translation.lb: datt Frankreich an England matt hëllef vun den U.S.A. en „complott" an szen gesät hätten, fir Europa e genre vun hirer dictatoresch beherrschter wirtschaftlecher superorganisatio'n opzezwéngen.
translation.en: That France and England, with the help of the U.S.A., had conspired to impose a kind of their dictatorially controlled economic superorganization on Europe.

translation.lb: Frankreich ge'f sech net scheien opschloss iwer seng reconstructio'nsbestriéwongen ze gin.
translation.en: France would not hesitate to be open about their reconstruction efforts.

translation.lb: Wärend zu Genf kostbar zeit matt polemik vergeud get, huet virun allem den englesche vertriéder d'drenglechkét vun der hëllef ënnerstrach, ■vvo'bei hién d'ganz tragik vun der momentaner situatio'n an dem sâtz zesummegefâsst huet:
translation.en: While precious time was being wasted on polemics in Geneva, particularly the English representative emphasized the urgency of aid, summarizing the entire tragedy of the current situation in the sentence:

translation.lb: „Europa ass lié politescht schachbriéd, mé c continent, dé vu leidd bewunnt get, de' terribel leiden."
translation.en: "Europe is not a political chessboard, but a continent inhabited by people who suffer terribly."

translation.lb: Neies vun der reconstructio’n M e's c h dr e f f (Dikerech)).
translation.en: News about the reconstruction Mischderff (Diekirch)).

translation.lb: Màtt tler reconstruction gét et elo och hei no an no weider.
translation.en: With the reconstruction, it continues gradually here as well.

translation.lb: Den tour ass elo un der milieu vuin hèr E. Zettinger, de' durch d boninien schwe'er zerste'ert gi war.

translation.en: Reconstruction in Sandweiler.

translation.en: Sandweiler was certainly one of the most ravaged locations in the area by the war.

translation.en: But as soon as the reconstruction began, it already started to heal the wounds inflicted in our town.

translation.lb: Wa mir haut, no nach net grad 3 joer reconstructio'n op de' gelöschten arbecht zréckkucken dann dèrfe mer matt recht sto'lz sin, weil wann elo keng stockong me' antrëtt, da wèrt é wuel no 2 joer neischt me' vu krichsschued an onsem dueiif gesin.
translation.en: If we look back today, after not quite three years of reconstruction on the destroyed work, we may rightly be proud because if no stagnation occurs now, then hopefully in two years no more war damage will be visible in our village.

translation.lb: Fir de' leidd, de' Sandweiler nom krdeh nach net besieht hun, soll de' folgend opslellong vun den ausgefe'erten arbechten en iwei'bléck iwer d'nokrichsgesicht vun onser uertschaft gin.
translation.en: For those who have not seen Sandweiler since the war, the following overview of the completed works should give an insight into the post-war history of our community.

translation.lb: D'zuel vun denen 50—100% zerste'erten heiser beléft sech op 26.
translation.en: The number of houses 50-100% destroyed amounts to 26.

translation.en: Of these, 14 have been completely rebuilt and inhabited, or at least structurally completed.

translation.en: In 5 houses major repairs were undertaken (such as putting on a new roof, rebuilding only certain parts of the house, etc.).

translation.lb: E gro'sse baueienhaff ass momentan am bau.
translation.en: A large farm is currently under construction.

translation.lb: Un déne 6 aneren heiser go'f bis elo nach net geschafft.
translation.en: Nothing has been done to the other 6 houses so far.

translation.lb: An der tahell si selbstverständlich net de' heiser matt abegraff, de' durch bommen- a granatsplitter oder durch bordwaffebeschoss mattgeholl go'wen.

translation.en: Repairs of this kind were carried out on every house.

translation.lb: Fuedelweih vum Escher gesangverein „Fro’hsënn“
translation.en: Consecration of the Banner of the Escher Singing Association 'Fro'hsënn'

translation.lb: Matt frédeii he'eren all ons frënn vum sche'ne gesang, datt de bekannte znännergesangverdin „Fro'hsënn" vun Esch/Uelzecht ereni malt aller kraft drop schafft, den he'gen niveau vun senge virkrichsléschtongen nés z'erréchen.
translation.en: With joy, all our friends of the beautiful singing hear that the well-known men's singing association 'Fro'hsënn' from Esch/Alzette is once again striving with all its might to reach the lofty level of its pre-war achievements.

translation.lb: Kengem vun den Escher musekfrënn sin de' vill concert'en, theaterovvender a speziell de' lèscht musikwoch vu virum krich aus der erënnerong verschvvonn, wo' all dag bal 1500 bis 2000 menschen de représentatio'nen vum verein beigewunnt hun.
translation.en: None of the music friends from Esch have forgotten the many concerts, theater evenings, and especially the last music week from before the war, where almost 1500 to 2000 people attended the performances of the association every day.

translation.lb: D'Preisen haten de fuendel vum verein gestuel, mé gleich no der liberatio'n hun d'Veteranen vum Fro'hsënn secli em hire sympatheschen dirigent, den hèr Mischely- versammelt, fir malt neier kraft a frëschem mutt d'vereinsliéwen erem opzebauen.
translation.en: The Prussians had stolen the association's banner, but immediately after the liberation, the veterans of 'Fro'hsënn' gathered around their sympathetic conductor, Mr. Mischely, to rebuild the association's life with new strength and fresh courage.

translation.lb: E beweis heifir wor de classement vuni verein um lesçhte gro'sse concours zu Remeleng.
translation.en: Proof of this was the classification of the association at the latest big competition in Remeleng.

translation.lb: E samschdeg an e 'sonndeg sin am haff vun der Brouchscho'l d'feierlechkéten vun der fuendehveih ofgehale gin.
translation.en: On Saturday and Sunday, the festivities for the consecration of the banner were held in the courtyard of the Brouchscho'l.

translation.lb: Samsçhdes Owes liuet d'Harmonie de Soleuvre matt engem flotte concert d'festlechkéten, de' ënner dem he'ge protectorat vun der Escher muuicipalite't stong, ugefäng.
translation.en: Saturday evening, the Harmonie de Soleuvre started the festivities with a splendid concert, which was under the high patronage of the Escher municipality.

translation.lb: Owes go'w am gro'ssen turnsall gedanzt.
translation.en: In the evening, there was dancing in the large gymnasium.

translation.lb: E sonndeg de muergen go'w an der Patrekirch de neie fuendel agçweiht, an duerno wor um aie kirfecht eng kleng gedenkfeier fir de' vèrstuerwe memberen.
translation.en: On Sunday morning, the new banner was consecrated in the Parish Church, and afterwards, there was a small memorial ceremony at the cemetery for the deceased members.

translation.lb: Am verlaf vum virmëtteg go'wen d'Escber Biergarbechtermusek an de gesangverein „Uelzecht" ënner der lédong vum professer Nie.
translation.en: During the course of the morning, the Esch Citizens' Miners' Band and the singing association 'Uelzecht' performed under the direction of Professor Nie.

translation.lb: Schuli zwé réusse'ert concert? en.'
translation.en: Schuli gave two successful concerts.

translation.lb: Am nomëtteg go'vv den dépouillement du drapeau durch eng sche'n opfe'-: erong vun der Société Chorale Harmonie ageléd.
translation.en: In the afternoon, the draping of the banner was accompanied by a beautiful performance by the Société Chorale Harmonie.

translation.lb: D'Remelenger Chorale Hémecht huet nach owes em halwer siwen e wonnerbare concert gin.
translation.en: The Remeleng Choir Hémecht gave a wonderful concert at half past six in the evening.

translation.lb: Domadder wor den offiziellen dél erivver.
translation.en: With that, the official part was over.

translation.lb: No 8 auer go'w bei flotter musek bis de'f an d'nuecht era gedanzt.
translation.en: After 8 o'clock, there was dancing into the night to lively music.

translation.lb: Sengen Escher musekfrënn sét de gesangverein naeli eng ke'er merci fir den intressi dén si e samschdeg an e sonndeg gewisen hun.
translation.en: The singing association once again thanks its Escher music friends for the interest they showed on Saturday and Sunday.

translation.lb: D’productio’n am juni De wuelstand vum land hänkt vum quantum arbecht of, de' gelöscht get.
translation.en: The production in June. The prosperity of the country depends on the amount of work done.

translation.lb: Dobei spi Wt de gudde weil vmi denen, de' schaffen eng gro'ss TOH, an heianddo kann en he'eren datt den enzeluen am durchschnitt net me' so'vill léscht, W vir,um krich.
translation.en: The good will of those who work plays a major role, and occasionally one hears that individuals on average are not accomplishing as much as before the war.

translation.lb: Bei d er eisenindustrie hänkt d'productio'n ower och nach vun anere faktoren of.
translation.en: In the iron industry, however, production also depends on other factors.

translation.lb: Well de kok elo me' regel, me'sseg an a gre'ssere quantite'te geliwert get, ass et de schmelze me'glech, me' eisen ze produzo'eren.
translation.en: Since coke is now delivered more regularly, moderately, and in larger quantities, it is possible for the smelters to produce more iron.

translation.lb: Am juni ass d'productio'n crem gesligen.
translation.en: In June, production has increased.

translation.lb: Et go'wen 158.000 tonne goss prodnze'ert an 146.000 tonne stöl.
translation.en: 158,000 tons of cast iron and 146,000 tons of steel were produced.

translation.lb: Et könnt é frëschen he'chuewen ugestach gin (am ganzen sin et der elo 16) a bâil 300 nei arbechter sin age, stallt gin.
translation.en: A fresh charge was started (now there are 16 in total), and soon 300 new workers were employed.

translation.lb: Et get dermatt gerechent, datt am joer 1047 we'negst'ens 1,5 millio'nen tonne goss produze' ert kenne gin.
translation.en: It is estimated that by the year 1047 at least 1.5 million tons of cast iron can be produced.

translation.lb: „Die Produktion von 1,5 Millionen Tonnen im laufenden Jahr darf jedoch als ein Minimum angesehen werden, da die Produktion des zweiten Halbjahres höher sein wird als diejenige des ersten Semesters mit seinen schwachen Anfangsmonaten Ibis April).
translation.en: "The production of 1.5 million tons in the current year should be considered a minimum, since the production in the second half of the year will be higher than in the first semester with its weak starting months until April."

translation.lb: Es müsste denn sein, dass eine Verschlechterung der Koksversorgung einsetzen würde, welche aille normalen Vorausberechnungen über den Haufen werfen müsste.
translation.en: It would have to be that a deterioration in coke supply would occur, which would have to disrupt all normal calculations.

translation.lb: Eine tiefgehende Änderung in der belgisch-luxemburgischen Hoheisenkonven. tion ist nicht -wahrscheinlich." (Oberm. 17. Juli.)
translation.en: A fundamental change in the Belgian-Luxembourg high iron convention is not likely." (Oberm. 17 July.)

translation.lb: Et wir nëmnven ze begre'ssen, wann de' Ii ni en vun der produetio'o nach weider steige ge'wen, well all zorten eisen si vill gefrot, so'datt dese moment nach keng concurrenz ze fèrteu ass.
translation.en: It would certainly be welcomed if production could increase even further, because all kinds of iron are in great demand, so there is no competition to fear at this moment.

translation.lb: Wann de betrieb op de schmelzen sech och bessert, dann ass dat ower net de fall fir d'minièren.
translation.en: If operations at the smelters improve, that is not the case for the miners.

translation.en: As reported in Echo de l'Industrie (10 July), a lot of French and Swedish ore is processed, and we can maintain our minette as long as export to Germany is not possible.

translation.lb: E rapport iwer d’schluecht vu Crécy.
translation.en: A report on the Battle of Crécy.

translation.lb: Den englesche prënz Edouard, hat de beinumm „Schwärze prënz", well hién ëmmer eng schwärz eise rëschtong gedroen huet.
translation.en: The English Prince Edward was nicknamed the 'Black Prince' because he always wore black iron armor.

translation.lb: Hié wor ere'scht 16 joer al, we' en de' e'scht linnen vun der englischer arme', 30.000 mann ge'nt 100.000 Franso'sen gefo'ert huet,
translation.en: He was only 16 years old when he led the first line of the English army, 30,000 men against 100,000 Frenchmen,

translation.lb: de' ëjiner dem Philippe vu Frankreich bei Crécy stongen, a schlo'g eso', datt 30.000 zaldoten, 1200 ritter, 1400 edelleidd, 4000 geharneschter,
translation.en: who stood under the command of Philip of France at Crécy, and struck such a blow that 30,000 soldiers, 1200 knights, 1400 nobles, 4000 armored men,

translation.lb: niéwend den Herzogen vu Lothréngen a Bourbon, d'Grofen vu Blois a vu Flandern, Vaudemont an Amala, matt de Kinneken vu Ma.jocka a Be'hmen op dem schluechtfeld leie blo'wen.
translation.en: along with the Dukes of Lorraine and Bourbon, the Counts of Blois and Flanders, Vaudemont and Amala, with the Kings of Majorca and Bohemia, were left lying on the battlefield.

translation.lb: De Kinnek vu Be'hmen wor blann an hat d'gitt vu sengem pèrd un d'pèrd vu sengem ritter banne gelôss,
translation.en: The King of Bohemia was blind and had tied the reins of his horse to the horse of his knight,

translation.lb: de' ail zesummen op der brènzelecher plaz vun der schluecht erageridde sin an do der do'd fond hun.
translation.en: who all together rode into the midst of the battle and found their death there.

translation.lb: — 'An deser schluecht haten d'Englänner fir d'e'scht 4 kano'nen, durch de' se d'schluecht gewonnen hun.
translation.en: — In this battle, the English used 4 cannons for the first time, through which they won the battle.

translation.lb: D'Englänner haten an deser schluecht nëmme 1 ritter, 3 esqueires, an e puer honnert zaldote verluer.
translation.en: In this battle, the English lost only 1 knight, 3 esquires, and a few hundred soldiers.

translation.en: We have to undress.

translation.en: They took everything away and threw it all into large paper bags, which they labeled with our numbers.

translation.en: They took everything from us; only with all my might was I able to save my glasses....

translation.lb: ..Wann dir. mir den huelt.
translation.en: ..If you take them from me.

translation.lb: da kann ech iwerhapt neischt me' schaffen", sot ech zu dèj-, de' mir de brëll wollt huelen.
translation.en: I won't be able to do anything anymore," I said to the one who wanted to take my glasses.

translation.lb: Det argument schéngt seng wirkong net verfélt ze hun, an so' könnt ech mei brëll behalen.
translation.en: That argument seems to have had its effect, and so I was able to keep my glasses.

translation.lb: An der „Entlassung" hun der vill vun ons d'hoer ewechgeschnidde tritt exiliert dem virwand, si hätte fle' oder leis.
translation.en: In the "release," many of us had our hair cut off under the pretext that we had fleas or lice.

translation.lb: A wirklechkét ass et iéwej, well d'Preisen hocr brauchen fir verschidde vun hiren industriell.
translation.en: And in reality, it is the economy, because they need hair for some of their industries.

translation.en: The curls that fall to the ground are carefully collected.

translation.lb: Daper lâchen de' onglécklech, obschons si loscht hätten ze kreischen, mé glécklecherweis geseit kén sech am Spiegel, soss ge'w vleicht me' we' enger d'iâche vergoen.
translation.en: Bravely, the unfortunate ones laugh, although they feel like screaming, but luckily no one sees themselves in the mirror, otherwise maybe more than one would burst into tears.

translation.en: to dry our heads and bodies after the shower, we were still handed out.

translation.lb: Wär dat net me’ glech?
translation.en: Wouldn't that be more fair?

translation.lb: Um 2. quai vun der gare Letzeburg sti bänken.
translation.en: On the second platform of the Luxembourg station, there are benches.

translation.lb: Owënds sin des bänken vun de Preisen aus dem lager Mutfort matt beschlag beluegt, an de' letzeburger arbecliter, de' och midd vun der arbecht sin a sccli gèr ausro'e ge'wcn, müssen um quai trëppelen.
translation.en: In the evenings, these benches are occupied by the Prussians from the Mutfort camp, and the Luxembourgish workers, who are also tired from work and would like to rest a bit, have to walk on the platform.

translation.lb: bis den zuch fort firl.

translation.en: It's not to make the Prussians angry, but wouldn't it be a bit more decent if they moved a bit?

translation.en: That was nothing compared to before, when our Luxembourgers often stood for hours with their arms crossed in front of them.

translation.en: Under the direction of Mr. Aloys Katlis-Bisser, young and choir master in Klengbetten, the singers proved their art with a resonant mass, and some onlookers were amazed and wondered if they were still in Bissen or in the city.

translation.en: Mr. Bartholé, president of "Cacilia," praises the friendly reception in Bissen and says that their singing club owes it to a Bissen resident who, alongside the late cantor, took on the mission of training the singers from Klengbetten-HOen and brought the club to its current prominence in such a short time.

translation.lb: D'Associated Press bréngt eng meldong vun offizielle kréser aus dem Paraguay.
translation.en: The Associated Press brings a report from official circles in Paraguay.

translation.lb: No deser meldong sollen dTebellen vlrun Assuncion decime'ert gi sin.
translation.en: According to this report, the rebels in front of Assuncion have been decimated.

translation.lb: De rescht soll sech flucharteg a nördleclier richtong zréckze'en.
translation.en: The rest are said to be retreating rapidly in a northerly direction.

translation.lb: Kurz virdrun hat d'paraguanesch gesandschaft zu Buenos Aires gemellt, d'loyalisten Stengen 20 kni am norden vun der haptstâd, während d'attacken vun de rebellen op Assuncion erbatlerl weidergefe'ert ge'wen.
translation.en: Shortly before, the Paraguayan embassy in Buenos Aires reported that the loyalists are standing 20 kilometers north of the capital, while the rebel attacks on Assuncion were continuing fiercely.

translation.lb: No aneren informatio'nen sollen d rebellen sech an der leschter nuecht bis an den centrum vun Assuncion durchgeschloen hun.
translation.en: According to other information, the rebels allegedly fought through to the center of Assuncion last night.

translation.lb: Si wären am besetz vun der residenz vum président Moringo a vun aneren ëffentleche gebeier.
translation.en: They were reportedly in control of the residence of President Moringo and other public buildings.

translation.lb: De widerstand vun de regirongstruppen soll me' schwach gin.
translation.en: The resistance of the government troops is said to be very weak.

translation.lb: E frontbericht vun de rebellen sét: „Ons truppen récken an de Strossen vun Assuncion virun.
translation.en: A front report from the rebels states: "Our troops are advancing in the streets of Assuncion.

translation.lb: Ons aviatio'n huet e convoi schëffer um floss Paraguay bombarde'ert an 2 schëffer ënnergebuert.
translation.en: Our aviation has bombed a convoy of ships on the Paraguay River and sunk 2 ships.

translation.lb: Aner militäresch zieler go'we bombarde'ert.
translation.en: Other military targets were also bombed.

translation.lb: D'rebelle solle verstärkongcn débarque'ert hun am hafen vun Sajonia, wo' d'casère vun de marine-fusiliers secb befannen.
translation.en: The rebels are said to have landed reinforcements at the port of Sajonia, where the marine-fusiliers' barracks are located.

translation.lb: Passio’nsspiller De'fferdeng.

translation.lb: — De' matt spannong erward passio'nsspiller vun De fferdeng vum 14. bis 17. august, sti kurz virun hirer e'schtopfe'erong.
translation.en: The much-anticipated Passion Play of Differdange from August 14th to 17th is shortly before its premiere.

translation.lb: Si bilde schon zënter enger zeit d'dagesgespre ch a verspriécht-n e.gro'sse succès ze gin.
translation.en: They have been the talk of the town for some time and promise to be a great success.

translation.lb: Et gel nach eng ke'er drop higewisen, datt wärend de spilldég vum 15. a 16. ge'nl 1 auer nuets extra trammen de besucher vum Minnetsbasseiig op der De'i'ferdenger martpiaz fir d'héinrés zur disposition stin.
translation.en: It should be noted once more that during the play days on the 15th and 16th, special trams will be available at 1 AM for visitors from the Minnet's Basin to the Differdange market square for the return journey.

translation.lb: Um terrain selwer get e Stand matt warme gedrénks a sandwtcher opgestallt.
translation.en: There will be a stand with warm drinks and sandwiches set up on the grounds.

translation.lb: E vun de polizeia gendarmerieorganen agerîchten uerdnongsdéngscht le'sst och de' friémst passio'nsbesicher seeh zurechtfannen.
translation.en: An order service established by the police and gendarmerie will also help even the most unfamiliar passion spectators find their way.

translation.lb: A we’ stin d’aussichte fir d’finalen vun e sonndeg?
translation.en: So what are the prospects for the finals on Sunday?

translation.lb: Aller viraussieht no si mer der bakuewenhetzt lass an d'finalen kënnen ennert ganz anere viraussetzongen ausgedroe gin, ewell all mensch kann eso' temperaturen aet gudd aushalen, zemol wann et héscht bis zum emfaie kämpfen.
translation.en: All forecasts suggest that we will be spared the scorching heat and the finals can take place under completely different conditions because everyone can handle such temperatures well, especially when it comes to fighting until the end.

translation.lb: Am tro'schtpreis triéden uu d'Aris an de Rapid.
translation.en: In the consolation match, Aris and Rapid face off.

translation.lb: Op grond vun hirem spill vun e sonndeg muss én der Aris de' beseht aussichten matt op de wé gin.
translation.en: Based on their game last Sunday, one must give Aris the better prospects.

translation.lb: Iwerwënnt Neiduerf seng kleng moralesch crise a kann seng 1. garnitur aligne'eren, da kann dé „le'we nopeschstreit" dem publikum e ganzt span. nend treffen reserve'eren.
translation.en: If Neudorf overcomes its small moral crisis and can align its first lineup, then the 'lively neighborhood clash' can offer the audience a very exciting encounter.

translation.lb: Wann Neiduerf tatsächlech d'roll vum trouble-fête spüle wellt, da kann eso' é localderby wo' et em de prestige gét, gewalteg revirementer schâfen, eso', datt et a priori glâl kén 100% favorit an desem match gel.
translation.en: If Neudorf truly wants to play the role of the spoilsport, then such a local derby, where it's about prestige, can provide tremendous turnarounds, so that there is no clear 100% favorite in this match from the outset.

translation.lb: Qui vivra, verra.
translation.en: Who lives, will see.

translation.lb: An de final fir d'hapteoupe fanne mer och zwé al bekannter crem: Mère! a Gasperech.
translation.en: In the final for the main cup, we also find two well-known names: Mère! and Gasperich.

translation.lb: Do schengt kén dém aneren dat gerengst schenken ze wellen an dese choc huet et an sech.
translation.en: Neither seems willing to give the slightest to the other, and this clash is intense.

translation.lb: Gèwëss, am vergangene championnat war Gasperech besser, a wann én als masstab d'rencontre vun e sonndeg ulét, da spréngt é plus fir Tricolore eraus, zemol wann den organisateur och op den Theisen Alfred an de Kemp ziéle kann.
translation.en: Certainly, Gasperich was better in the past championship, and if one takes last Sunday's meeting as a benchmark, then Tricolore comes out ahead, especially if the organiser can also count on Theisen Alfred and Kemp.

translation.lb: Mé et war bestemmt dé gre'sste fêler dén de' Gasperecher kennte begoen, wann se mengen, se kennten hire ge'gner ennerschâtzen.
translation.en: But it would definitely be the biggest mistake Gasperich could make, if they think they can underestimate their opponent.

translation.lb: Ewell do kënnt et emol e ganzt be'st erwache gin.
translation.en: Because then there might be a very rude awakening.

translation.lb: A we' licht war et dann ze spe't.
translation.en: And then it might be too late.

translation.lb: Well Mèrel huet eng t'ienk équipe, de' sche'sse kann, de' energie mattbrengt an sech op é gudde keeper verlôsse kann.
translation.en: Because Mèrel has a talented team that can score, brings energy, and can rely on a good goalkeeper.

translation.lb: Also, dir sportsleidd aus-der stad, wann der e sonndeg gère spannend fo'ssballmatcber gesitt, da kommt op den terrain 'v am F. C. Tricolore.

translation.lb: D’wahlen an Ungarn Budapest, den 13. august. —
translation.en: The elections in Hungary, Budapest, August 13. —

translation.lb: Zéng verschidde parteien gin an Ungarn an de' nèxt wählen, de' um enn vun desem mo'nt ofgehal gin.
translation.en: Ten different parties are going to the next elections in Hungary, which will be held at the end of this month.

translation.lb: De' ve'er coalitio'nsparteien de'*elo d'regirong gebild hun, d'partei vun de klengen égentëmmer, d'sozialdemokraten, d'kommunisten an d'national baurepartei hun zesummen eng déclaratio'n publize'ert, no dèr keng partei de' aner am wahlkampf ugreift an no dèr keng partei behapt, irgendeng réalisatio'n vun deser regiron g war durch si eleng virgeholl gin.
translation.en: The four coalition parties that currently make up the government, the party of small property owners, the social democrats, the communists, and the national agrarian party, have together published a declaration stating that no party will attack another in the election campaign and no party claims any realization of this government was undertaken solely by them.

translation.lb: Zwo' katho'lesch parteie gin an d'wahlen: „de camp vun de clirëschtlechc frae" an „d'deinokratesch vollekspartei".
translation.en: Two Catholic parties are going to the elections: 'the camp of the Christian women' and 'the democratic people's party'.

translation.lb: D'bëscho.fsconferenz an Ungarn huel an engem rundschreiwen de katholike mattgedélt, si wellten d'wiéler op keng mane'er beeinflussen a si ge'fen jidderé frei lôssen ze wiéle, wién a watfir eng partei hié xvëllt.
translation.en: The bishops' conference in Hungary shared in a circular the message to Catholics that they do not want to influence voters in any way and would leave everyone free to choose whom and for which party they want to vote.

translation.lb: Ausserdem weist d'bëschofsconferenz op d'wièhlegkét vun de wählen hin a fuerdert ail katho lik op sech un der wähl ze bedélegen.
translation.en: Furthermore, the bishops' conference highlights the importance of the elections and urges all Catholics to participate in the vote.

translation.lb: Nomëttes um terrain Ge'nt hadwer 3 auer sin d'lei-dd durch „Rang" gângen op den terrain zo', wo' vu weitem gro'ss fiéndel drop higedeit hun, datt dén dag eppeg eitraes um Tricoioresfeld dass wir.
translation.en: In the afternoon at the field around 3 o'clock, people walked through 'Rang' to the field, where from afar large flags indicated that this day there was something special on the Tricolore field.

translation.lb: E städtesche kiosk, dén op der rechter seit vuin terrain opstellong fond huet, funge'ert als e'erentribün.
translation.en: A city kiosk, which was found on the right side of the field setup, functioned as a VIP grandstand.

translation.lb: De' zwo' coupe sin do ausgestallt, hautparleuren diffuse'ere flott marschmusek a lues a lues kommen och schons de' e'scht membre d honneur,.
translation.en: The two cups are displayed there, loudspeakers play nice marching music, and slowly the first honorary members are arriving.

translation.lb: de' op der tribün plaz hueden.
translation.en: who took their place on the grandstand.

translation.lb: Den arbiter rifft de' zwo' équipeu fir den tro'schbpreis.
translation.en: The referee calls the two teams for the consolation prize.

translation.lb: An onsem Sportlechen dél gi mer en détaille'erte compte rendu iwer d'finaden, wo' d'Aris matt 5—0 ge'nt Neiduerf an Tricolore matt 2—0 ge'nt Mèrel gewonnen huet.
translation.en: In our sports section, we give a detailed report about the finals, where Aris won 5-0 against Neudorf and Tricolore won 2-0 against Mèrel.

translation.en: Our team should certainly have won the match, because despite everything we were clearly superior in the first half and we spent most of the time fiercely at the goal of the Remelingen players who, however, held the second half, which did not prevent us from being able to equalize with a little less bad luck.

translation.en: In the early morning hours of Wednesday, the police combed through the Jewish quarter right in front of the old Jerusalem city wall and found a large weapons cache, which presumably belonged to the Irgoun Zvai Leumi.

translation.lb: Et ass dat grc'sst, dat nom fond vun de Waffen zu Yagour den 30. juni vum ieschte joer opgespirt go'f.

translation.en: In the search, more than 400 men, partly police and partly soldiers, were involved.

translation.en: They started at 3 in the morning, after the area had been cordoned off with barbed wire.

translation.en: All male residents were taken to a camp to verify their identities.

translation.en: For three hours, each house was searched one by one.

translation.en: with no success, until they discovered a secret opening in the last house, the Hebrew school, leading to a basement not marked on the building's plans.

translation.lb: Den agang an de keller wor durch eng 30 centimeter deck platt verspart, de' durch eng wâaterlédong verstoppt wor.
translation.en: The entrance to the cellar was blocked by a 30 centimeter thick plate, which was hidden by a pipe.

translation.lb: Den zo'gank wor eso' schmuel, datt nemmen é mann derdurch komm ass.
translation.en: The entrance was so narrow that only one man could pass through.

translation.en: The wall had to be broken down to bring out the crates of automatic weapons.

translation.en: Among other things, 400 hand grenades, 3000 rifle rounds, 1300 revolver bullets, and a large quantity of explosives of all kinds were found.

translation.en: Also, the attackers on the Jerusalem railway in November of the previous year disappeared there, and those injured in this action were treated there before they could be arrested.

translation.en: Furthermore, the accused reportedly had contact with the emigration committees from Cairo, Bari, and Greece, maintaining connections with the revolutionary committee of Kikhailov.

translation.en: "Then, it is claimed in the indictment, part of the bandits crossed into Greek territory."

translation.en: As the indictment further claims, the Turkish Consul in Skopje, Emil Verf Guertchek, allegedly issued passes to the rebels to facilitate their crossing into Greek territory.

translation.lb: Gudd nouvelle fir den tourismus Tëschent England a Letzeburg ass en accord ofgcschloss gin, dé virgcseit, datt tëschent denen zwé lanner kc visa me' ne'- deg ass.
translation.en: Good news for tourism. An agreement has been concluded between England and Luxembourg that states that no visa is needed between the two countries anymore.

translation.lb: Wié vun England op Letzeburg rése wëllt oder cmgeke'eri, dé brauch nëmme me' e richtege pass ze hun.
translation.en: Anyone wanting to travel from England to Luxembourg or vice versa only needs to have a valid passport.

translation.lb: Dodurch fällt eng vuu déne ville lästege Schikanen ewech, de' d'réso bis elo net zo' engem plaise'er gemacht hun.
translation.en: This removes one of the many bothersome nuisances that have not made travel enjoyable until now.

translation.lb: Wann en awer an ofriém-t laud goo wëlit, da gët et pass ne-t duer, et rnpss en ocli de' ne'deg devisen an der läsch oder op deT bank hun.
translation.en: However, if one wants to go to a distant country, then a passport alone is not enough; one must also have the necessary foreign currency in cash or at the bank.

translation.lb: Bis elo war et ail friéme verbueden, me' wo' 1000 fr. an d'gebidd vun der iletzeburgesch-belscher zollunio'n matteranzebréngen.
translation.en: Until now, it was forbidden for any foreigner to bring more than 1000 francs into the Luxembourg-Belgian customs union.

translation.lb: Welt awer d'iiéwen hei zimlech deicr ass, konnten d'tourisle matt dôr zomm net weit lafeu.
translation.en: As the cost of living here is quite high, tourists could not get very far with that amount.

translation.lb: De' belsch natioualbank, de' jo och tir Letzeburg zo'stânneg ass, huel de' zonun op 10 000 fr. erhe'cht.
translation.en: The Belgian National Bank, which is also responsible for Luxembourg, has increased this amount to 10,000 francs.

translation.lb: AH friéme kann elo so' vill geld malt an d'iaud bréugen.
translation.en: Now any foreigner can bring that much money into the country.

translation.lb: „Die auffälligste der Massnahmen besteht darin, dass die belgische Nalionalbank ab 15. Februar die Einfuhr von 10 000 belg. Fr. pro Person nach Belgien und Luxemburg gestaltet...
translation.en: "The most notable measure is that the Belgian National Bank is allowing the import of 10,000 Belgian francs per person to Belgium and Luxembourg from February 15th..."

translation.lb: Falls die Ausländer aber' mit 10 000 belg. ■ Fr. anrückeu dürfen, dann können sie ihren touristischen Neigungen freien Lauf lassen." (L. \V 13. Februar.)
translation.en: If foreigners are allowed to arrive with 10,000 Belgian francs, then they can freely indulge their tourist inclinations." (L. W 13th February.)

translation.lb: En handgreiflechen interview, oder épuratio’n op der eisebunn D'scène huet sech en donneschdeg den owend am Escherzuch em halwersiwen ofgespillt.
translation.en: A palpable exchange, or purging on the railway, occurred on Thursday evening at half-past six in the Esch train.

translation.lb: Gemiddlech so'tzen an engem coupé zwo' jëffercher vun eso' So joer an hun zesumme gepôtert.
translation.en: Comfortably seated in a compartment, two ladies of about 'that age' were chatting together.

translation.lb: D'dîr vum coupé get opgemâch, an era kënnt é klengen handkoffer, un dém é médchen vun ongefe'er 25 joer hängt.
translation.en: The compartment door opens, and in comes a small suitcase, with a girl of about 25 years attached to it.

translation.lb: D'kand sëtzt sech a mëcht sech et och gemiddlech.
translation.en: The girl sits down and makes herself comfortable, too.

translation.lb: Ons jofferen gi stutzeg, tuschele matt enén an ir é sech emsin hat, krut dem koffer sei médchen der e puer krâfteger erof gewe'tscht.
translation.en: Our ladies become suspicious, whispering to each other, and before they realized it, the girl attached to the suitcase received a few strong slaps.

translation.lb: De koffer krut d'dîr opgemâcht an huet sech eng sécher plaz um quai gesicht an d'médchen, wât aus wuelweisleche grënn dèr handfester argumentatio'n keng résistenz gemächt huet, huet virgezunn d'plaz mam koffer um quai ze délen.
translation.en: The suitcase opened the door and found a secure spot on the platform, and the girl, who for understandable reasons did not resist the firm persuasion, preferred to share the place on the platform with the suitcase.

translation.lb: We' et sech erausgestallt huet, wor den hues eng bekannt gre'sst aus dem krich.
translation.en: As it turned out, the girl was a known bigwig from the war.

translation.lb: dém bis elo nach weider neischt geschidd wôr an dén am Escherzuch sein hèr, dat héscht, seng joffere fond huet.
translation.en: Who until now had not faced any further consequences and found her fate in the Esch train, meaning she met our ladies.

translation.lb: Am handemdre'en baten ons zwo' jofferer dén épuratio'nsfall erlédegt.
translation.en: In no time, our two ladies handled the purging incident.

translation.lb: E beweis, datt op der eisebunn iéwer nach épure'ert get!
translation.en: Proof that purging still occurs on the railway!

translation.lb: Bleiwen d’P.W. an England?
translation.en: Will the prisoners of war remain in England?

translation.lb: Am engleschen Oberhaus go'f e gesetzproject virgeluegf, datt d'frae vu krichsgefâiigenen no E gl and komm« kënmten, wa se ge'wen do bleiwen fir ze schaffen.
translation.en: A bill was proposed in the English House of Lords that would allow the wives of prisoners of war to come to England, provided they would remain there to work.

translation.lb: Dén ënneTstaatssecrétaire am krichsmiiiKU-riiim, de Lord Pafccr.tam huet rléclare'ert, datt geschwënn eng englesch missio'n no Dertschland géng, fir arbeehts 1-kräften ze sichen, die' an den- englesche cottonfabriken agcsat solle gin.
translation.en: The Undersecretary in the Ministry of War, Lord Pakenham, declared that soon an English mission would go to Germany to recruit laborers to be employed in English cotton factories.

translation.lb: De grof de Perihe huet de standponkt vertratt, datt d'preisesch prisonne'er eso' lâng we' me'glech an England bleiwe sollten.
translation.en: Count de Perihe held the position that Prussian prisoners of war should remain in England as long as possible.

translation.lb: Hién huet nogewisen, wat fir en intérêt England druu hält, wann d'krichsgefàngener läng an England ble'wen.
translation.en: He demonstrated what interest England had in keeping the prisoners of war in England for a longer time.

translation.lb: Hién huel eso'giuer virgcschloen, datt et ubruecht war, wann hir fraen an hir kanner och no Eitgland ke'men.
translation.en: He even suggested that it would be advisable for their wives and children to also come to England.

translation.lb: De bëschof vun Chichester verfrëtl de standponkt, datt d'krichsprisonne'er eso' schnell we' me'glech hém goe sollen.
translation.en: The Bishop of Chichester asserted the stance that prisoners of war should be sent home as quickly as possible.

translation.lb: Si dèrfen duerno ower exemkommien, wa se dat wënschen, an als frei menschen an England weiderschaffen.
translation.en: They may return afterward, if they wish, and continue to work in England as free men.

translation.lb: Bei all retard, bemierkt de bëschof, lafe mer geför, e „géschtleche krichspotential" ze Schafen.
translation.en: With every delay, the bishop remarked, we risk creating a 'spiritual war potential.'

translation.lb: De-Lord Pakenham huet explize'ert, datt de' Deitsch no engem priorite'tssystem rapatrie'ert ge'wen.
translation.en: Lord Pakenham explained that the Germans would be repatriated according to a priority system.

translation.lb: D'anti-nazien ge'we fix d'e'schi hém kenne goen.
translation.en: The anti-Nazis would certainly be allowed to go home first.

translation.lb: Da kommen d'mattléfer un d'rei an zum schluss d'naxien.
translation.en: Then come the collaborators, and finally the Nazis.

translation.lb: Den ënnerstaatss.ecrétaire hofft, datt all Preiss am enn vum joer dohëm ass.
translation.en: The undersecretary hopes that every Prussian will be home by the end of the year.

translation.lb: E komeschen de’f E heische brasseur bât goldstécker axn wèrt vun 200 000 frang verstoppt.
translation.en: A strange story of a brewer who hid gold coins worth 200,000 francs.

translation.lb: Seng Stopp wor ower net ganz giidd ge>vîélt, well e gudden dag en onbek'annte matt de goldstéckcr duerch d 'hascht wor.
translation.en: However, his hiding place was not very well chosen, as one day an unknown person made off with the gold coins.

translation.lb: Virun' e puer dég huet de brasseur e schwe'ere pik zo'gesta.lt krut, wo'ran hién seng goldstécker eremfond huet.
translation.en: A few days ago, the brewer received a heavy package in which he found his gold coins again.

translation.lb: Hién huet natirleob gleich nogeziélt, an et kann érysech senj; erstaunt minn virstellen, we' hié goldstékker am wèr,t mn 300 000 frang statt 200 000 frang virfond huet.
translation.en: He naturally counted them immediately, and you can imagine his astonishment when he found coins worth 300,000 francs instead of 200,000 francs.

translation.lb: D'sâch ass him vcrdächteg virkomm an hién huet d'pobzei matt dem fall befâsst.
translation.en: The matter seemed suspicious to him, and he involved the police with the case.

translation.lb: Reparatio’ne fir Letzeburg
translation.en: Reparations for Luxembourg

translation.en: So far, our country has received only a little: 131 sewing machines, 10 heavy industrial machines, and 5 commercial establishments.

translation.lb: E gewësse klenge prozentsâtz vun de kokstiweronge soll och op dë konto goen.
translation.en: A certain small percentage of the coke deliveries is also supposed to go into this account.
