translation.en: A few days ago, the Luxembourgish delegation submitted a Luxembourgish memorandum at the London Conference.

translation.lb: Niéwent déne propositio'nen, de' sech op de' nei organisatio'n vun Deitschland beze'en, si besonnesch de' direct reparatio'nsfuerdenongen intressant.
translation.en: Besides the proposals concerning the new organization of Germany, the direct reparation demands are particularly interesting.

translation.lb: Lelzeburg bât gère be sonnesch 3,5 millio nen tonne kucle pro joer.
translation.en: Luxembourg needs about 3.5 million tons of coal per year.

translation.lb: Et ass net me we' recht, datt Deilsch land an dèr mênz bezueilt, de' et huet.
translation.en: It is no longer right that Germany pays in the coin it has.

translation.lb: A well onst land selwer keng kuelegro'wen huet (we negstens net am Inland), dofir ass et se'er wichtcg, datt eso' eng fuerderong erfëllt get.
translation.en: And because our country itself has no coal mines (at least not domestically), it is very important that such a demand is fulfilled.

translation.lb: werfall an der Banque Générale Geseilter muergen kurz no halwer 9 auer huet e laufbursch vun der colonialwarenhandlong Lommer & Van Werweke aus der Hollerecherstrftss d'filiale vun der Banque Générale op der gare betratt.
translation.en: Robbery at the Banque Générale This morning shortly after half past 8 o'clock, an errand boy from the colonial goods store Lommer & Van Werweke from Hollerech Street entered the branch of the Banque Générale at the station.

translation.lb: Well d'biiroen ere'scht em 9 auer opmaehen, huet bien e niewenagank benotzt.
translation.en: Since the offices only open at 9 o'clock, he used a side entrance.

translation.lb: En onbekannten Individuum ass him nokoinm a nés erausgang.
translation.en: An unknown individual followed him in and out again.

translation.lb: We' de jong d'dîr viim niewenzuni hapteorridor wollt opmâehen krut hien vun bannen e schlag op de kapp an ass zcsunimegebrach.
translation.en: When the boy tried to open the door from the side to the main corridor, he was hit on the head from inside and collapsed.

translation.lb: Hien hat naeh dat ondeitleeht gefill, datt seng mapp matt 120.000 —150.000 frang a ehèquen au a pabeiergeld him entrass gin ass.
translation.en: He still had the vague feeling that his briefcase with 120,000 —150,000 francs in checks and paper money had been snatched from him.

translation.lb: Hie kann sech och nach erëunercn, datt gleieh drop en anere kucke ko'm, ob hien ilo'd war oder net, mé well hien hallet bewusstlos an dém moment wor, wéss bie net, ob et sech em den täter oder em en helfeshelfer handelt.
translation.en: He can also remember that right after, another person came to check if he was alert, but since he was half unconscious at that moment, he doesn’t know whether it was the perpetrator or an accomplice.

translation.lb: D'victime ass weider net s-hwe'er blesse'crt an huet net brauchen an d'elinique iwerfc'crt ze gin.
translation.en: The victim was not further seriously injured and did not need to be transferred to the clinic.

translation.lb: D'Sûreté ass matt der enquête befâsst.
translation.en: The Sûreté is handling the investigation.

translation.lb: Bis elo félt eiegntlech nach all spur, well zu dêr stonn keng zeien dem iwerfall beigewunnt hun.
translation.en: So far, there are actually no leads, as at that hour no witnesses were present to the robbery.

translation.lb: Et ass unzehueVen, datt den täler um lafende wor iwer den inhal' vun der mapp an oeh iwer d'emstäüu an wi# a we' dat geld gewe'nlech ofgei.
translation.en: It is assumed that the perpetrator was aware of the contents of the briefcase and also about the circumstances and how and where the money was usually handed over.

translation.lb: wert gin ass.
translation.en: was supposed to be delivered.

translation.lb: Et wèrd wuel e puer ilég daueren, bis ons Sûreté den täter ze pake kritl.
translation.en: It will probably take a few more days until our Sûreté catches the perpetrator.

translation.lb: Hoffentlech geléngt et hir, we* an anerc fäll, och hei d'le'song vum rätsei ze fannen.
translation.en: Hopefully, as in other cases, they will succeed in solving the mystery here as well.

translation.lb: D’Antarktis soll zum frigidaire gin
translation.en: Antarctica should become a refrigerator

translation.lb: Den admirol Byrd ass der ménong, datt d'eisfelder vun der Antarktis zu engem gewallege frigidaire ausgebaut kenne gin.
translation.en: Admiral Byrd is of the opinion that the ice fields of Antarctica can be developed into a massive refrigerator.

translation.lb: Do kennten dann liéwensmëttel opgcstapelt gin, fir d'welt am fall vun engem neie kridh virun de liongersno't a virum ënnergang ze retten.
translation.en: There, food could be stored to save the world from starvation and disaster in the event of a new war.

translation.lb: An déne gudde joeren kennen an der Antarktis stocken ugeluegt gin, fir wann emol nés eng crise antriéde soll.
translation.en: In the good years, stocks could be built up in Antarctica for when another crisis might occur.

translation.lb: Den admirol Byrd huet d'iiéwensmëttel eremfond, de' hié virun 20 joer bei senger e'sehter expédition do leie gelôss hat.
translation.en: Admiral Byrd found the food supplies again that he had left there 20 years ago during his first expedition.

translation.lb: All liéwensmëttel wore nach a guddem zo'stand.
translation.en: All the food supplies were still in good condition.

translation.lb: Si woren an tunnellen ënnerbruecht, de' démols ënner dem sehne' an dem eis ugeluegt wore gin.
translation.en: They were stored in tunnels that had been made under the snow and ice at that time.

translation.lb: A senge weideren erklärongen sét den admirol, datt d'Antarktis fre'er en tropicale clima hât,
translation.en: In his further explanations, the admiral says that Antarctica once had a tropical climate,

translation.lb: an datt d'expeditio'n bestëmmt a nèxter zeit op fossilie sto'sse ge'f.
translation.en: and that the expedition would certainly soon come across fossils.

translation.lb: Hién huet den Amerikaner virgeschlocn, cp d'mannst 8 permanent studieslatio'nen an der Antarktis z'etable'eren.
translation.en: He suggested to the Americans to establish at least 8 permanent research stations in Antarctica.

translation.lb: Vun der atombomm erward hié fir des recherchen de" beseht erfolger, well si de' deckst eisschichte sprenge kann an eso' de sludiecommissio'nen hir arbecht erlichtert.
translation.en: He expects great success from the atomic bomb for this research, as it can blast through the thick ice layers and thus make the work easier for the study commissions.

translation.lb: Et si bekanntlech se'e fond gin. an der noperschaft vun der Knox-kiiste.
translation.en: As is well known, lakes have been found in the vicinity of the Knox Coast.

translation.lb: Des gewässer verdanken hir existenz héxtwahrscheinlech ënnerirdesche volcanen.
translation.en: These bodies of water probably owe their existence to underground volcanoes.

translation.lb: An desem fall hätl dat betreffend gebidd ongefe'er de'selwecht geologesch struktur we' national parc vun „Yellowstone",
translation.en: In this case, the area in question would have approximately the same geological structure as the Yellowstone National Park,

translation.lb: wo" ooh ënnerirdesch volcanen d'ursach vun onzählege geysers a wärme quelle sin.
translation.en: where underground volcanoes are also the cause of numerous geysers and hot springs.

translation.lb: De Saarplébiszite vu 1935 wor gefälscht Berlin.
translation.en: The Saar plebiscite of 1935 was falsified in Berlin.

translation.lb: — „D'fälschong vum Saarplébiszite vum 13. januar 1935 durch d'nazien ass nimols vun den onparteksche beobachteren ugezweiwelt gin", erklärt de Karl Spiecker, président vun der zentristepartê-îv dé wärend der genannter volleksofsfe-mniong am Saargebidd gèwunnt huet, an der' „Rhein: Ruhr-Zeitung".
translation.en: — “The falsification of the Saar plebiscite of January 13, 1935, by the Nazis has never been doubted by the impartial observers,” explained Karl Spiecker, president of the centrist party who lived in the Saar region during this popular vote, in the „Rhein: Ruhr-Zeitung".

translation.lb: ,,\Ve' d'resu'Itater bekanntgemâch go'wen.
translation.en:
,,
When the results were announced.

translation.lb: so' schreiwt hié weider, wor och an der klengster gemeng vum Saargebidd ké mënsch, dé net de kapp gerësclt huet an iwerzégt wor, datt et net matt richtegen dénge vir sech gângen ass."
translation.en: he continues to write, there was no one in even the smallest community of the Saar region who did not shake their head and was convinced that things did not proceed correctly for them."

translation.lb: Laut dem Spiecker wore sämtlech membere vun der internationaler commissio'n beduxt gin
translation.en: According to Spiecker, all members of the international commission had been deceived.

translation.lb: D'fälschong könnt nëmraen op de' zwo' folgen mane'ero vir sech gehell si gin-entweder go'wen de' richteg wiélkëschten durch anerer ersat, an dénen d'stëmmziédele scho fix a fèrdeg togL-n oder d'stëmmziédele vun de wiéler sin durch anerer, gefälschler ersat gin.
translation.en: The falsification can only be explained by two possible methods—either the correct ballot boxes were replaced by others in which the ballots were already prepared, or the ballots from the voters were replaced by others, which were falsified.

translation.lb: Net ze verwiésselen.
translation.en: Not to be confused.

translation.lb: An onser nuiamer vnm 21. 2. 1947 slong enner Politische Prozesse:
translation.en: In our issue of 21. 2. 1947 under Political Processes:

translation.en: For a few months, the French security police have been dealing with a secret organization.

translation.en: The center was located at the prison of Fresnes, where German agents were imprisoned.

translation.en: These agents tried to make contact with their chiefs, who were still at large.

translation.en: They also worked against the French Republic, by trying to discredit various political figures through false documents.

translation.en: They sent the documents to foreign nations, claiming they were found in the German archives.

translation.en: The idea came from Cavailhe, a former agent of Darlan and later of the Abwehr.

translation.en: Klein, former head of the Gestapo, prepared the documents.

translation.en: They were typed on German typewriters outside the prison.

translation.en: Then they returned to the prison of Fresnes, where engraver Ban de Veld placed false stamps on them.

translation.en: 70 men from the French security service monitored and pursued this affair.

translation.en: They conducted a raid in the prison and thoroughly searched a series of cells.

translation.lb: Si konnte genügend material zesummefannen, fir de' betreffend agenten z'entlarven.
translation.en: They were able to gather enough material to expose the involved agents.

translation.lb: Durch hir aussoen sin och schon eng reih vu mattarbechter haussent dem prisong festgeholl gin.
translation.en: Through their statements, a number of collaborators outside the prison have already been arrested.

translation.en: Coal production in the Ruhr area is increasing. Berlin.— It is reported from Berlin that the new system introduced jointly by the English authorities with the Prussians to boost coal production in the Ruhr area has proven to be a success.

translation.lb: Pro woch mellen sech 1000 arbechter, fir an d'kuelegro'we schaffen;e goen.

translation.en: The Syndicat d'Initiative has taken over the organization of the celebration together with the municipality and already asks the people of Pe'teng for the 9th.

translation.en: All the people who still want to contribute something to the monument can still do that 'innerly making deposits at the savings bank (Mr. Durand) and at the International Bank (Mr. Speicher), where subscription lists are available.

translation.lb: Ettore Bugatti En donneschdeg nomëtteg ass de bekannten autosfabricant Ettore Bugatti zu Pareis gestuerwen.
translation.en: Ettore Bugatti. On Thursday afternoon, the famous automobile manufacturer Ettore Bugatti passed away in Paris.

translation.lb: Matt bim ass eng vun de markanteste perse'nlechkéten aus dem autowiésen verschwonnen.
translation.en: With him, one of the most remarkable personalities from the automotive world has disappeared.

translation.lb: Den Ettore Bugatti ass den 15. September 1881 zu Mailand op d'welt komm a wollt sculpteur gin.
translation.en: Ettore Bugatti was born on September 15, 1881, in Milan and wanted to become a sculptor.

translation.lb: We' hién ower erugewuesse wor,.
translation.en: But when he grew up,

translation.lb: ass grad den opschvvonk vutn auto komm, an hién liuet sech fir des branche intresse'ert.
translation.en: the rise of the automobile had just begun, and he became interested in this field.

translation.lb: Töschent 1897—1898 huet sein e'sehte lichte wôn, 4cyL 80x100, d'Coupe de l'Exposition de Milan gewonn.
translation.en: Between 1897—1898, his very light car, 4 cyl 80x100, won the Milan Exposition Cup.

translation.lb: Hién huet dem Dietrich d'baulizenz vun desem modelt verkaft.
translation.en: He sold the construction license for this model to De Dietrich.

translation.lb: Dal wor den ufank vun senger carrière, an hién huet sech am Elsass niddergelôss.
translation.en: That was the beginning of his career, and he settled in Alsace.

translation.lb: Bis 1914 huet den Ettore Bugatti de' verschiddenst autotypen gebaut.
translation.en: Until 1914, Ettore Bugatti built various types of cars.

translation.lb: We' den 1. weltkrich ausgebrach ass, huet en sech der section technique française zur verfiigong gestallt an huet fliegermotoren gebaut.
translation.en: When the First World War broke out, he offered his services to the French technical section and built aircraft engines.

translation.lb: Nom krich huet hién sech nés der autosfabricatio'n zo'gewand, an des ke'er a gro'ssem sti'l.
translation.en: After the war, he turned back to automobile manufacturing, this time on a grand scale.

translation.lb: D'resultat ass jidferengeni bekannt, well d'marque Bugatti liât iwerall erfolleg.
translation.en: The result is known to everyone, as the Bugatti brand enjoyed widespread success.

translation.lb: Dem Ettore Bugatti seng Schöpferkraft wor bedeitend.
translation.en: Ettore Bugatti's creative power was significant.

translation.lb: Hién huet net manner we' 72 typen vu motore gebaut, fir autoen, flieger, schëffer, autorails aew.
translation.en: He built no fewer than 72 types of engines for cars, airplanes, ships, rail vehicles, etc.

translation.lb: We' d'Preisen Frankreich iwerfall hun, liuet den Ettore Bugatti sech matt sengem bèsehten outillage op Bordeaux zréckgezun.
translation.en: When the Germans invaded France, Ettore Bugatti retreated with his best equipment to Bordeaux.

translation.lb: Mé d'Preisen sin och bis Bordeaux komm an liun lüm ailes ofgeholl, grad an dem moment, wo' sçi jong Jean de'tlech beim essai vun engem neie wôn verongléckt ass.
translation.en: But the Germans also reached Bordeaux and took everything from him, just at the moment when his son Jean fatally crashed while testing a new car.

translation.lb: Sein zwéte jong, Roland, fe'ert sei wiérk weider.
translation.en: His second son, Roland, continues his work.

translation.en: It pleased our Lord to take my dear unforgettable wife, our kind-hearted mother, mother-in-law, grandmother, sister, sister-in-law, aunt, and cousin, Mrs. Jean Tompers née Cutb. SCIIELLEK,

translation.en: She passed away after a short illness in the clinic St. François in Luxembourg, on the 27th of August 1947, at the age of 08 years, provided with the holy sacraments.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Pierchen Itiiine-Tompers and their children Nici and Gusty and the entire family.

translation.lb: E gét an de Congo Am bel sc he Congo iliésven haut vill Letzeburger, de' do hirt bro't verdéngen an birt liéwe mächen.
translation.en: In the Belgian Congo today, there are many Luxembourgers who earn their bread and make a living there.

translation.lb: Elo nom krich ass dat engem crem opgefaU, we' der ebêmol eso'vill hém an d'vakauz komm sin.
translation.en: Now after the war, it has been noticed that suddenly so many came back home on vacation.

translation.lb: Momentan denke schon erem munnech jong leidd druu, d'land ze verlôssen an eventuell am Congo hirt gléck ze versichen.
translation.en: Currently, quite a few young people are again thinking about leaving the country and possibly trying their luck in the Congo.

translation.lb: Hei am Jand sin de' méscht plaze besät.
translation.en: Here in the country, most positions are filled.

translation.lb: De Staat stellt zwé joer läng keng leidd me' an D'eisebunn huet der och gcnuch.
translation.en: The state is hiring no more people for two years and the railway has enough as well.

translation.lb: De' frei berufter sin iwerfëllt.
translation.en: The freelance professions are saturated.

translation.lb: A bei de bauer wellt kc schaffe goen.
translation.en: And no one wants to work for the farmers.

translation.lb: Da muss é sech och emol am ausländ emsinn.
translation.en: Then one must also look abroad at times.

translation.lb: Et héscht, de beilsche Congo ste'ng de Letzeburger op.
translation.en: It is said that the Belgian Congo is open to Luxembourgers.

translation.lb: Trotzdéni ass et net eso' einlach dohin ze kommen.
translation.en: Nevertheless, it is not so easy to get there.

translation.lb: D'E.T. (26. aug.) publize'ert en artikel mam titel: L'orientation vers les carrières coloniales, an dém op de' verschidde me'glechkéten higewîse gel.
translation.en: The E.T. (26 Aug.) published an article titled: 'Guidance towards colonial careers,' in which the different possibilities are pointed out.

translation.lb: Et kann én an den déngscht vum staat oder vun enger gesellschal't triéden oder och als selbständesche „Coilon" dohiuner goen.
translation.en: One can enter the service of the state or a company, or even go there as an independent 'colonist.'

translation.lb: De’wstahl Letzeburg.
translation.en: Theft Luxembourg.

translation.lb: An der nu echt vum 26. „ugust ass e jonke kèrel aus dein Pâfendall an d'wunneng vun enger familjen uni Lampertsbiérg eragang.
translation.en: On the night of the 26th of August, a young man from the Pafendall entered the residence of a family in Lampertsberg.

translation.lb: 'T wor kén doht'in, an de borscht huet d'geléenhét henotzt fir secb so' eng 20 000 frang unzeégnen.
translation.en: There was no one there, and the lad used the opportunity to appropriate around 20,000 francs.

translation.lb: Domatt go'ng en du op d'Fo'er.
translation.en: With that, he went to the fair.

translation.lb: En liuet seoh et gudd goe geloss a nach muncher aneren zicrfrei gehal, wel'l we' d police op en opmirksam gemach go'w a sech e gebotzt huet, hât e sehons 7000 frang drop gewixt.
translation.en: He allowed himself to have a good time and held, until the police had noticed him and he fled, he had already spent 7,000 francs.

translation.lb: E go'w an de „kille Grond" spede'ert.
translation.en: He was taken to the 'cool ground' (jail).

translation.lb: De’tlecht ongléck Manier.
translation.en: The unfortunate accident in Manier.

translation.lb: E mëttwoch am nomëtteg, ge'nt x!tb auer, ass den lier Philippe Philippe, ei&ebunner vu Manier, mam velo op der streck Capellen—Manier an en auto gerannt, de grad selwcr iwerhuele wollt.
translation.en: On Wednesday afternoon, around an undefined time, Mr. Philippe Philippe, a resident of Manier, collided with a car while riding his bicycle on the Capellen—Manier route, as he attempted to overtake the same car.

translation.lb: Den her Philippe liât d'besënnong nach guer net verluer, an et huet net geschengt, datt hié schwe'er blesse'ert sollt sin.
translation.en: Mr. Philippe had not lost consciousness at all, and it did not seem that he would be seriously injured.

translation.lb: llién huet nach ganz verstänneg mam chauffeur geschwat.
translation.en: He still spoke quite sensibly with the driver.

translation.lb: Duerno huet hién sech an de strôssegruew gesät, bis eng fra epuer leidd am duerf alerte'ert bât, de' de verongléckten dun matt enger jeep siehe gefuer sin.
translation.en: Afterwards, he sat down in the ditch until a woman alerted a few people in the village, who then drove the injured man away in a jeep.

translation.lb: Den hèr Philippe wor nach emnier bei besënnong.
translation.en: Mr. Philippe was still conscious again.

translation.lb: Ge'nt 7 auer huet hié sech an d'bett geluegt, mé ge'nt 8 auer huet en d'besënnong verluer v a krut stärkt fe'wer.
translation.en: Around 7 o'clock he went to bed, but by 8 o'clock he lost consciousness and developed a high fever.

translation.lb: Em 2 auer an der nuecht ass den Dr. Frieden erbeigeruff gin.
translation.en: At around 2 o'clock in the night, Dr. Frieden was called in.

translation.lb: Hién huet den zo'stand als se'er éscht betruecht an de paschto'er komme gelöss.
translation.en: He considered the condition to be serious and called the pastor.

translation.lb: Hién huet gleich an d'stâd telefone'ert an den zo'stand vun dem verongléckten bei der clinique signale'ert, mé et ivor net rotsam, den transport ze riske'eren, zemol well bei dem he'ge fe'wer eng klinesch behandlong net a fro hätt kënne kommen.
translation.en: He immediately telephoned the city to report the condition of the injured at the clinic, but it was not advisable to risk transportation, especially since clinical treatment could not be considered due to the high fever.

translation.lb: Muerges hat den her Philippe d'besënnong nach emmer net eremfoud.
translation.en: In the morning, Mr. Philippe had still not regained consciousness.

translation.lb: Den docte r huet och elo nach vum transport oi'geroden, well den zo'stand sech nach net gebessert hât.
translation.en: The doctor also still advised against transportation, as the condition had not yet improved.

translation.lb: De verongléckten hât eng coniplize'ert schädelbasisfraktur.
translation.en: The injured man had a complicated skull base fracture.

translation.lb: En donneschdeg, mëtteg ge'nt 12 auer ass den hèr Philippe verschéd, o'ni d'besënnong eremfond ze hun.
translation.en: On Thursday, around 12 in the afternoon, Mr. Philippe passed away without having regained consciousness.

translation.lb: Hién hannerle'sst eng fra matt 3 kanner, de' durch den harde schlag schwerer getx-aff gin ass.
translation.en: He left behind a wife and 3 children, who were severely affected by the harsh blow.

translation.lb: Remercimentsaktion.
translation.en: Thanksgiving action.

translation.lb: Schifflingen.
translation.en: Schifflingen.

translation.en: Under the name 'Socialist Action for Justice and Freedom,' a new party was founded yesterday in Italy, formed by members of the federations and sections of the Action Party who did not approve the merger with the Socialists.

translation.en: The conference does not agree, it states in the resolution, that the cost of living index is falsified by manipulation or that it should even disappear.

translation.en: With the last demand, the professional associations want to prevent the cost of living index, which serves as the basis for wages and salaries, from being suddenly stopped arbitrarily.

translation.lb: Beonro’egong an Dänemark iwer d’amerikanesch mesüren op Grönland Stockholm, 16. septemfcer
translation.en: Concern in Denmark over American measures in Greenland Stockholm, September 16th

translation.lb: D'nouvellen vun der dänescher zeidong „Land og Folk", diatt d'Amerikaner an de löschten dég eng liéweg activite't op Grönland entfalen an am begrëff sin, eng nei radiostatio'n unzeléen, de' wahrscheinledh derzo' dénge soll, den amerikaneschen aerodrom ze verstärken, hun an Dänemark beonro'egong a befriémen ausgele'st.
translation.en: The news from the Danish newspaper "Land og Folk", that the Americans have recently deployed lively activities in Greenland and are about to establish a new radio station, which is probably meant to reinforce the American airbase, has sparked concern and unease in Denmark.

translation.lb: Besonnesch pçinlech si se zu Kopenhagen dervu bere'ert, datt d'USA d'dänesch regirong iwer d'errichlong vun enger neier radiostatio'n an dèr hiren zweck bis elo iwerhapt net informe'ert hun.
translation.en: Particularly troubling to them in Copenhagen is the report that the USA has not informed the Danish government at all about the establishment of a new radio station and its purpose so far.

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch abteilong vun techniker, de' virun 10 dég an der diskobucht op Grönland agetraff ass, an direct ugefângen huet ze schaffen, huet sech weder matt de grönlänneschen autorite'ten a verbindong gesät, nach op ufro hin iwer zweck vun hirer activite't donnée gin.
translation.en: The American division of technicians, which arrived in the Disko Bay in Greenland 10 days ago and immediately began working, has neither communicated with the Greenlandic authorities nor provided information on the purpose of their activities upon request.

translation.lb: Den ausseminister Gustav Rasmussen huet erklärt, datt d'mesür vun den Amerikaner am widersproch matt de bestëmmongen vum dänesch-amerikaneschen Grönland accord stoe ge'wen an hién zur klärong vun der ganzer affaire en diplomatesche schrëtt beim amerikaneschen aussenminister ënnerhodl hätt.
translation.en: Foreign Minister Gustav Rasmussen declared that the American measures were in contradiction with the provisions of the Danish-American Greenland Agreement, and he had taken a diplomatic step with the American Secretary of State to clarify the whole affair.

translation.lb: D'zeidong „Politiken" kritize'ert an engem leitariikel d'vingoen vun den Amerikaner ausseruerdentlech schärf.
translation.en: The newspaper "Politiken" very sharply criticized the actions of the Americans in an editorial.

translation.lb: Et misst an Dänemark opmirksamkét ervirruffen, datt d'Amerikaner eng radiostatio'n oder eng nei basis op Grönland onmëttelbar virum ufänken vun de verhandlongen tëschen Dänemark an Amerika iwer d'opheeren vum Grönland-traktat oprichten.
translation.en: It should cause attention in Denmark that the Americans established a radio station or a new base in Greenland immediately before negotiations between Denmark and America on the termination of the Greenland treaty began.

translation.lb: D'Dänen hätten erwärt, datt d'regirong zu Washington wärend der iwergängszeit bis zur ophiéwong vum Grönland-accord dervun o<fge6i ge'wen, hiT occupatio'n vun däneschem gebidd z'erweideren.
translation.en: The Danes had expected that the government in Washington would refrain from expanding its occupation of Danish territory during the interim period until the lifting of the Greenland agreement.

translation.lb: Wat ower elo geschitt war, missl als eng récksiohtslosegkét vun enger grosser macht ge'nt eng kleng natio'n bezéchent gin.
translation.en: What has now happened must be described as a recklessness of a great power against a small nation.

translation.lb: D'schwedesch zeidong „Stockholms 1 idningen" publize'ert d'rapport'en vun aenzeien, wo'no am august verschiddentlech friém flicer. énzel oder a gruppen. schwedischen territoire iwertflun hätten.
translation.en: The Swedish newspaper "Stockholms Tidningen" publishes eyewitness reports according to which in August several foreign planes, alone or in groups, flew over Swedish territory.

translation.lb: D feststellongen ge'we net vu nervöse grenzbewunner hirstumen, mé vu jongen douanier'en matt guddeti aen a gesonde nerven.
translation.en: The findings did not originate from nervous border residents but from young customs officers with good eyes and healthy nerves.

translation.lb: Et ge'f sech also net em irgend e phanlasieproduct handelen.
translation.en: So it is not a matter of any fantasy product.

translation.lb: De' friém maschinen wären a gro'sser he'cht gefilun an hätten schwedeseht gebidd erem an der directio'n vu Finnland verlôss.
translation.en: The foreign machines flew at a high altitude and left Swedish territory again in the direction of Finland.

translation.lb: D'fliger sin am du komm, a verschidden observateuren wellen he'hétszéctien vun deT Sowjetunio'n erkannt hun.
translation.en: The planes came at night, and several observers claimed to have recognized signs of the Soviet Union.

translation.lb: Well d'schwedesch autorite'ten eso' ro'eig driwer ewech ge'we goen, wär et un der zeit, des affaire der ôffentlechkét zur kenntnes ze bréngen, bemiérkt d'zeidong.
translation.en: As the Swedish authorities have remained silent about it, it is time to bring this affair to public attention, the newspaper remarks.

translation.lb: Wahlmanifest vun de franse’sche kommunisten Pareis, 16. sept. (AFP).
translation.en: Electoral manifesto of the French communists Paris, 16th Sept. (AFP).

translation.lb: Den central-comité vun der franse'scher kommunisteseher partei, dé momentan zu Pareis tagt, lmet eng resolutio'n ugeholl, de' virun de wählen en eigentleche wahlprogramm duerstelH.
translation.en: The central committee of the French communist party, currently meeting in Paris, has adopted a resolution that presents an actual electoral program before the elections.

translation.lb: An der resolutio'n hésciht et e. a.:
translation.en: The resolution states, among other things:

translation.lb: „D'bilanz vun der regirong stellt eng bilanz vum bankrott duer.
translation.en: "The administration's account appears as an account of bankruptcy.

translation.lb: Zur situatio'n am land ass ze soen, datt de ravitaillement ongeniigend ass.
translation.en: Concerning the situation in the country, it must be said that the supply is inadequate.

translation.lb: D'preiser klammen, an d'inflatio'nsgefor drät.
translation.en: Prices are rising, and the threat of inflation looms.

translation.lb: No b aussen hin buet sech d'regirong enger Politik vun der subordinntiö'n vis-à-vis vum ainerikanesche capitalismus verschrivven.
translation.en: Externally, the government has committed to a policy of subordination to American capitalism.

translation.lb: Den égnen eremopbau get dém vun Deutschland hannendru gestallt an d'secherhét vu Frankreich get a matlleidenschaft gezun.
translation.en: The own reconstruction is placed behind that of Germany, and the security of France is compromised.

translation.lb: D'regirong Ramadier hnet hir onfaegkét bewisen, d'reconstructio'n vu Frankreich ze seoheren.
translation.en: The Ramadier government has demonstrated its incapability to ensure the reconstruction of France.

translation.lb: Fir des politik ze verfoilegen, go'wen d'kommunistesch ministeren am iné vun desem joer au« dem cabinett erausgeworf.
translation.en: To pursue this policy, the communist ministers were ousted from the cabinet earlier this year.

translation.lb: Haut handelt et seclh net dodrem, tësehen dem de Gaulle an de kornmunisten ze wiélen, mé tësehen réactio'n an démocratie.
translation.en: Today, it is not about choosing between de Gaulle and the communists, but between reaction and democracy.

translation.lb: Fir d'iand ze retten, get et nemmen eng le'song: D'sozialisteschk om m un ist eseh actio'nsgemengsch af t fir d'forme'erong vun enger democratescher regirong matt kommunistescher hedélegong."
translation.en: To save the country, there is only one solution: The socialist-communist alliance for the formation of a democratic government with communist participation."

translation.lb: Et gin dann d'ponkten vum Programm, dé vun de kommuniste recommande'ert get, opgefe'ert:
translation.en: The points of the program recommended by the communists are then listed:

translation.lb: Förderong vun der prodnotio'n, uwennong vun de preis- a lo'nofkommen tësehen dem gewerkseh aftsbond an de patron'en, verdédegong vum franc, fjscalneform, aschrânkongen vun den öffentlechen dépensen, stärk erof'setzong vun de militëreréditer, directe fridden mam Viet- Nam ënncr der respecte'erong vum acc-d vum 6. mär 7. 1946, aus bau vum ban dsverke'er malt de 1 aimer vun der franse'seher mwo'n, bezuelen vu reparatio'nen durch Deitsohland, dat Frankreich kuelen, etectresch energie a maschine liwere misst, international Ruhrcontrotl an zum schluss wirtschaftlech a finanziell hëllef durch de' befrënd länner.
translation.en: Promotion of production, implementation of agreements on price and wages between unions and employers, defense of the franc, fiscal reform, reduction of public spending, significant reduction of military credits, direct peace with Vietnam respecting the agreement of March 6-7, 1946, development of rail transport tailored to the needs of French economic owth; reparations to be paid by Germany, which must supply France with coal, electrical energy, and machinery; international Ruhr control and finally economic and financial aid from allied countries.

translation.lb: de' net eso' sPhwe'er gelidden hun.
translation.en: Those who have not suffered so hard.

translation.lb: Zum léschte ponkt get präzise'ert, datt effort'e gemacht gi müssen, fir créditofkommen an zuelougserltchterongen o'ni einsëifeg oriente'erong vun der franse'seher aussen pol itik z'erzillen.
translation.en: Regarding the last point, it is specified that efforts must be made to achieve credit agreements and payment facilities without unilateral orientation of French foreign policy.

translation.lb: Zum schluss fuerdert de manifest d'franse'scJi populatio'n op, hire wëllen fir eng schnell forme'erong vun enger „regirong vun der dem oc ratescher énhët" ze bekunden, de' an der lâg war, matt mudd an enthousiasme e Programm zum wuel vun der natio'n durchzefe'eren.
translation.en: Finally, the manifesto calls on the French population to express their desire for a swift formation of a 'government of democratic unity' capable, with courage and enthusiasm, to carry out a program for the national good.

translation.lb: Sophoulis appelle’ert un d’partisanen
translation.en: Sophoulis calls on the partisans

translation.lb: Athen, 18. September (AFP)
translation.en: Athens, 18 September (AFP)

translation.lb: De miniiterpresident Sophoulis huet d'partisanen a Griechentand opgefuerdert, op den onfruchthare brudderkampf ze verzichten a »och der reconstruclio'n ze widmen.
translation.en: Prime Minister Sophoulis has urged the partisans in Greece to abstain from the fruitless fraternal struggle and to also dedicate themselves to reconstruction.

translation.lb: Hién huet gesot: „Eeli bidden iêch ver zeiong. anineslie, fridden, sécherhét, freihat, arbeoht an de retour an èr hémecht un.
translation.en: He said: 'We offer you reconciliation, peace, security, freedom, labor and the return to your homeland.

translation.lb: D'regirong garante'ert zesumme matt dein griechesche votiek d'amnestie.
translation.en: The government together with the Greek people guarantees amnesty.

translation.lb: Dofir gitt zréck an èr dirfer.
translation.en: Therefore, return to your villages.

translation.lb: Dir gidd beschützt an ênnerstëtxt.
translation.en: You will be protected and supported.

translation.lb: Wann der ower op dem kämpf behale wëllt, setien ech d'ganz nalio'n ge'nt iéch an a wèrd den opstand energesch z'ënnerdrécke wessen, dén en instrument vuin ausländ ass.
translation.en: However, if you wish to continue the fight, I will set the entire nation against you and will energetically suppress the uprising, which is an instrument of foreign powers.'

translation.lb: Fonds National d’Epargne-Unio’n Letzeburger fligersport am dengscht vun enger gudder sâch.
translation.en: National Savings Fund Union - Luxembourg aviation in the service of a good cause.

translation.lb: De propriétaire vum fliger LX-MAI, Jos. Cigrand an de beschtbekannte pilot Marcel Pesch stellen cn sonndeg, den 21. September zu ESCH de ganzen dag vu muergcs 9 —1 auer an nomëttes vun 3—7 auer owendg hir kräften fir Baptêmes de l'air zur dispositio'n.
translation.en: The owner of the plane LX-MAI, Jos. Cigrand, and the well-known pilot Marcel Pesch will offer their services for air baptisms all day Sunday, September 21, in Esch, from 9 AM to 1 PM and from 3 to 7 PM.

translation.lb: D'recetten fle'ssen bis op de leschte sou dem Fonds National d'Epargne vun der Unio'n zo', wo'durch dat geld dann déne kanner zu gudd kennt, de' hire papp oder crniérer an der déportatio'n am KZ oder durch soss krichsévénementer verlucr hun.
translation.en: The proceeds will go entirely to the National Savings Fund Union, and the money will then benefit children who lost their father or both parents during deportation to concentration camps or other war events.

translation.lb: Et ass z'erwardcn, datt dem Fonds National d'Epargne Unio'n durch d'baptêmeg de l'air eng onmass geld zo'fle'sst.
translation.en: It is anticipated that a great deal of money will flow to the National Savings Fund Union through the air baptisms.

translation.lb: Dofir ass de preis vun engem fing op nëmmen 100 frang fixe'ert gin.
translation.en: Therefore, the price for a flight has been set at only 100 francs.

translation.lb: Wann én ower elo an der loft ass, kann é ro'eg dem pilot soen, e soll nach c bësse me' läng tëschen himmel an iérd gondelen, wann é gewellt ass nach e puer frang welder ze gin.
translation.en: But once in the air, one can calmly tell the pilot to hover a bit longer between heaven and earth if one is willing to pay a few more francs.

translation.lb: Wat d'qualite't vum fliger a vun de piloten uhrlängt, eso' sin all garantie gin well des leidd hu malt hirem fliger an descm joer matt erfolleg un 3 Ballets délgeholl.
translation.en: Concerning the quality of the plane and the pilots, all guarantees are given since they successfully participated in 3 aeronautical shows with their plane this year.

translation.lb: an de' 3 wonncrsche'n eoupen, de' se dobei gewonn hun, kann én am Aero-Bar zu Esch un der Uelzecht bcwonneren.
translation.en: The three wonderful trophies they won can be admired at the Aero-Bar in Esch on the Alzette.

translation.lb: D'Unio'n begléckwënscht de' hèren Cigrund a Pesch zu hirem spontane geste, a wënscht hinnen e voile succès.
translation.en: The Union congratulates gentlemen Cigrand and Pesch on their spontaneous gesture and wishes them complete success.

translation.lb: Droungen vum iéweschten arabesche rot Cairo. 26. sentember (Reuter).
translation.en: Threats from the supreme Arab council in Cairo. September 26 (Reuter).

translation.lb: E speaker vum iéweschten arabesche rot huet der press eng erklärong ofgin, an dèr et e. a. héscht:
translation.en: A speaker from the supreme Arab council gave a statement to the press, in which it says among other things:

translation.lb: Mir verdrciwen d'Judden, d'Englänner an al), de' se ënnerslëtzen, egal we' stärk se och sin, matt gewalt aus Palestina eraus.
translation.en: We will expel the Jews, the English, and all who support them, no matter how strong they are, with force from Palestine.

translation.lb: De speaker sot da weider.
translation.en: The speaker then continued.

translation.lb: datt d'USA de ..kampfeswëllen" vun den Araber net ënenrschâtze sollten,
translation.en: that the USA should not underestimate the Arabs' 'fighting spirit',

translation.lb: an datt d'gro'ssmâchten gudd dru mächen sollen, den ..droenden opstand" vun de Palestina- Araber zc berécksichtegcn.
translation.en: and that the great powers should do well to consider the 'impending uprising' of the Palestinian Arabs.

translation.lb: „Mir fèrten net emol d'atomboinmen, huet de speaker erklärt, so'lâng d'Judden ënner ons verstrët sin."
translation.en: "We do not even fear the atomic bomb, the speaker declared, as long as the Jews are entangled with us."

translation.en: All servitudes, like the use of a spring or a path, are set at 50 francs per year.

translation.lb: Inauguratio’n vum enger plaque commémorative D i d e 1 e il g.
translation.en: Inauguration of a commemorative plaque in Didelange.

translation.lb: Gro'ss ro't-weiss-blo plakaten annonce'-eren fir de nèxte sonndeg, de 5. october, d'inauguratio'n vun enger „plaque commémorative" al» undenken un de' 6 Didelenger do'desaffer bei der libératio'n den 2. September 1944.
translation.en: Large red-white-blue posters announce for next Sunday, October 5, the inauguration of a 'commemorative plaque' in remembrance of the 6 Didelange victims at the liberation on September 2, 1944.

translation.lb: Des plaque get un der nordseit vum Didelenger stâdhaus übruecht, an zwar op d'propositio'n vun den „An ciens combattants de la Milice" a mam averstândnës vum Didelenger conseil.
translation.en: This plaque will be attached to the north side of the Didelange town hall, upon the proposal of the 'Anciens combattants de la Milice' and with the agreement of the Didelange council.

translation.lb: Bekanntlech woren de' Didelenger den 2. september 1944 grad richteg am gâng d'iilrératio'n ze feieren, we' am nomëtteg plëtzlech en airto preisesch SS beim stâdhaus ugel'uer ko'ni, dé e verre'der geschéckt hat.
translation.en: It is well known that on September 2, 1944, the people of Didelange were in full swing celebrating the liberation, when suddenly in the afternoon a troop of Prussian SS appeared at the town hall, sent by a traitor.

translation.lb: Duerch preiseschen SS-terror an duerch nazistesch brutalite't hun dér. dag folgend 6 perso'nen hirt liéwen fir d'hémecht hirgin:
translation.en: Due to Prussian SS terror and Nazi brutality, the following 6 persons lost their lives for their homeland that day:

translation.lb: Den Norbert Scherer, erschoss aïs e'schten vun der SS an der entrée vum Didelenger stâdhaus:
translation.en: Norbert Scherer, shot first by the SS at the entrance of the Didelange town hall:

translation.lb: de Jängy Ney, erschoss bei der kîrch;
translation.en: Jängy Ney, shot at the church;

translation.lb: de Corneille Schmitz vu Bireng an d'kand Nicole Fossati.
translation.en: Corneille Schmitz from Bireng and the child Nicole Fossati.

translation.lb: allebe'd erschoss vun enger SSpatrouille beim Didelenger stàdparc „Le'h";
translation.en: both shot by an SS patrol at the Didelange city park ‘Le’h’;

translation.lb: d'madame Eléonore Preti-Peeters so'we' d'joffer Blanche Smeets.
translation.en: Madame Eléonore Preti-Peeters as well as Miss Blanche Smeets.

translation.lb: de' allebe'd an engem vun déneu 3, vun « Preisen a brand gestachenen heisei stâdhaus em d'iiéwe komm sin.
translation.en: both perished in one of the three houses set on fire by the Prussians near the town hall.

translation.lb: Iwer d festlechkéten, de' vun den „Anciens combattants de la Milice" nu fir de nèxte sonndeg organise'ert sin an ënner dem protectorat vun der Didelenger gemengeverwaltong stin, leil folgende Programm vir:
translation.en: Regarding the festivities, organized by the 'Anciens combattants de la Milice' for next Sunday and under the protection of the Didelange municipal administration, the following program is planned:

translation.lb: Sonndes muergens em 8.30 auer versammelen sech d'vereiner an d'invitéen op der stâdbausplâz fir zesummen an engem cortège an d'kîrch ze goen.
translation.en: Sunday morning at 8:30 AM, the associations and guests will gather at the town square to proceed together in a procession to the church.

translation.lb: wo' em 9 auer eng feierlech mëss fir de' 6 do'desaffer ofgehâle get.
translation.en: Where at 9 AM a solemn mass for the 6 victims will be held.

translation.lb: No der mëss gét et dann am cortège erem zréck op d'stâdhausplâz.
translation.en: After the mass, the procession will return to the town square.

translation.lb: No enger usprôch un de' versammelt leidd duerch de président vun den „Anciens combattants de la milice" vun Dideleng fërid dann d'inauguratio'n vun der plaque commémorative duerch den Didelenger burgermésobter J. Fohrmann statt.
translation.en: After a speech to the assembled people by the president of the 'Anciens combattants de la Milice' of Didelange, the inauguration of the commemorative plaque will take place by the mayor of Didelange J. Fohrmann.

translation.lb: D'Unio'ns-memheren sin invite'ert a gro'sser zuel un deser feier délzehuelen a sech am cortège dem Unio'nsfuendel unzeschle'ssen.
translation.en: The Union members are invited in large numbers to participate in this celebration and to join the Union's banner in the procession.

translation.lb: Gëscht mëtteg em l /t 2 ass e fruitierscamion vu Letzeburg-Gare dé malt enger fracht vun Antwerpen ko'm, beim haus Graas op der Walfer strôss aus onbekannter uraâch vum wé erofgerannt an huet en zementposlen vun der Cegedel ugesto'ss.
translation.en: Yesterday noon around 2, a fruit truck from Luxembourg train station, with a load from Antwerp, came, ran downhill near the Graas house on the Walfer road for unknown reasons and hit a cement pole from Cegedel.

translation.lb: De mast ass op d'führercabine vum auto gefall an huet se délweis démole'ert.
translation.en: The pole fell onto the driver's cab of the car and partially demolished it.

translation.lb: De chauffeur go'f matt kappwonnen an d'Eecher clinique iwerfo'ert, de begleitmann ko'm mam schreck dervun.
translation.en: The driver was taken with head injuries to the Eecher clinic, the accompanying man was shaken with fright but unharmed.

translation.lb: E gléck datt den hèr Dr. Beringer?mmtr zur stell ass an de' e'schl wirksam hëllef gleich uSrenge kann.
translation.en: Luckily Mr. Dr. Beringer was present and could immediately provide effective help.

translation.lb: Eng luxinaschin ass e bëssen duerno op der Bërelerstrôss just virutn tram iwer d'gleis gerannt an an enger heck stiéfche bliwen.
translation.en: A Luxembourg machine shortly afterward ran over the tracks on the Bëreler road just in front of a tram and got stuck in a hedge.

translation.lb: D'tramsgäscht go'wen dureherné gerëselt, mé et ass kengem eppes gcschitt.
translation.en: The tram passengers were shaken, but nothing happened to anyone.

translation.lb: Och dem auto a sengen insassen ass ké léd geschilt.
translation.en: Neither the car nor its occupants were harmed.

translation.lb: De privatbeamten H. aus Heisem ass beim iippelplecken aus enger he'cht vu 7 meter erofgefall well en sech un en dîren âscht ugcpàkt hât.
translation.en: The private clerk H. from Heisem fell from a height of 7 meters while picking apples because he held onto a rotten branch.

translation.lb: Zum gléck ass e vun ascht zu ascht gerutscht bis en op engem decken ënneschten ascht sech ze hâle krut.
translation.en: Luckily, he slid from branch to branch until he managed to hold onto a thick lower branch.

translation.lb: Et war nach émoi guddgàngen.
translation.en: It ended up well again.

translation.lb: E puer schre'pen a blo plâtzen wërden en un de' âl pléckrcgelen erënneren.
translation.en: A few scratches and bruises will remind him of the old picking rules.

translation.lb: Eir d'e'scht d'iéder richteg an de bam stellen, nie den arm durch d'iéder strecken fir ze plecken an sech nie un dem ascht unhàlen un dém é pleckt
translation.en: First, set the ladder correctly against the tree, never stretch the arm through the branches to pick, and never hold onto the branch from which you are picking.

translation.en: On Sunday evening at about 11:50, a van collided with a brand new car near the radiator.

translation.en: This car was parked opposite the EMS.

translation.lb: Nom ongléck huet sech den täter aus dem stëps gemâcht.

translation.lb: Erem presszensur an E ’ streich (sowjetzon) Wien, 80. sept. (Reuter).
translation.en: Press censorship again in the Soviet zone Vienna, 80th September (Reuter).

translation.lb: Trotz widderhuele protester vun de westlechen Allie'erten ass d'presszensur fir nouvellen aus Wien vun de Russen erem agefo'ert gin.
translation.en: Despite repeated protests from the western Allies, press censorship on news from Vienna has been reintroduced by the Russians.

translation.lb: Den allie'erte rot huet e schreiwes un d'regirong Figl gerîcht an dém op de' lues entnazifize'erong am Staats- a Verwaltungsapparat higewise get.
translation.en: The Allied Council sent a letter to government Figl, pointing out the slow denazification in the state and administrative apparatus.

translation.lb: Den 1. Juli 1947 woren nach emmer 47 443 fre'er nazien am slaatsdéngscht.
translation.en: On 1st July 1947, there were still 47,443 former Nazis in public service.

translation.lb: Ausserdem woren nach den 10. Juli 1947 12 323 fre'er memberen vun der NSDAP op posten an der privatindustrie.
translation.en: Additionally, as of 10th July 1947, there were still 12,323 former members of the NSDAP in positions in private industry.

translation.lb: GESTUERWEN François Juncker, gesluerwen zu Ce'sseng am alter vu 70 joer.
translation.en: DECEASED François Juncker, passed away in Cessange at the age of 70 years.

translation.lb: D'begriéwnes an do leiebendengscht sin den 1. october zu Ce'sseng.
translation.en: The burial and memorial service are on October 1st in Cessange.

translation.lb: Mine Henri Thill-Trlerweller, gestuerwen zu Hersbierg, am alter vu 56 joer.
translation.en: Mine Henri Thill-Trlerweller, passed away in Hersberg, at the age of 56 years.

translation.lb: D'be griéwnes ass den 2, october zu Altre'ar.
translation.en: The burial is on October 2nd in Altrier.

translation.lb: E’scht franse’sch aschränkongsmesüren
translation.en: First French austerity measures

translation.lb: Pareis, 13. oclober (AFP).
translation.en: Paris, 13 October (AFP).

translation.lb: A franse'sche „mémorial" sin de' e'scht veruerdnongen iwer aspuerongen an den öffentlechen servicen ersehenden, so' we' se de Ramadicr a sengem wirtschaftleche spuerprogramm emrass hât.
translation.en: In a French 'memorial', the first ordinances regarding savings in public services are laid out, as announced by Ramadier in his economic savings program.

translation.lb: Dono sollen eleng hei den autoen, de' den öffentlechen servicen zur disposition stin, ronn 000 millio'ne francs agespuert gin.
translation.en: Accordingly, alone from the cars at the disposal of public services, around 000 million francs are to be saved.

translation.lb: An zo'konft kritt all franse'sche minister nemme me' én auto.
translation.en: In the future, each French minister will receive no more than one car.

translation.lb: Op militäresehem gebidd gin aspuerongen an der he'gt vu 800 millio'ne francs gefuerdert.
translation.en: In the military sector, savings amounting to 800 million francs are demanded.

translation.lb: Ge'nt 5000 autoen vun der arme'verwaltong solle verkâft gin.
translation.en: About 5000 cars from the army administration are to be sold.

translation.lb: D'benzinzo'délong fir militörautoen get am ve'erte quartal vum lafendc joer drastesch ageschränkt.
translation.en: The petrol distribution for military vehicles will be drastically restricted in the fourth quarter of the current year.

translation.lb: Am ministère fir fre'er krichsteilnelimer gin eppes 130 plAtzen ofgeschflft, wo' durch aspuerongen an der he'gt vun 30 millio'nen francs errillt gi kennen.
translation.en: In the ministry for former war participants, about 130 positions will be abolished, which will achieve savings of 30 million francs.

translation.lb: Zum schluss solle vun den 20 militärgerichter der 8 ofgeschâft gin.
translation.en: Finally, out of the 20 military courts, 8 are to be abolished.

translation.lb: Dankbarkét Virun e puer dég bege'nen sech zwo' besser dämmen an engem geschäft an der stad.
translation.en: Gratitude A few days ago, two ladies met in a store in the city.

translation.lb: „Dann hutt dir elo ère jong bestued", sot de' eng madame zu der anerer, „et wor »wer och eng ganz sche'n hochzeit.
translation.en: "So you have now married off your son," one lady said to the other, "it was really a very beautiful wedding.

translation.en: — According to earlier reports, General Marshall was supposed to be officially appointed as the successor of James Byrnes next Friday, but since surprises were on the agenda, suddenly there was the announcement that President Truman had made the appointment already.

translation.en: This last noted that James Byrnes's resignation was supposed to be announced on Friday, but James Byrnes learned that a leak had occurred and subsequently requested President Truman to announce his resignation immediately.

translation.en: While waiting for General Marshall to arrive in America, James Byrnes will continue to handle the affairs of the State Department.

translation.lb: Dispensaire de Nourrissons
translation.en: Infant Dispensary

translation.lb: Per cl. Mir délen heimatt der awunnerschaft vu Perel an emge'gend matt, dass vum 10. juni un d'Letzeburger Ro't Kreiz d'accord matt der gemeng Perel é kannerdispensaire (Dispensaire de Nourissons) opmecht, fir kanner bis 2 joer.
translation.en: We hereby inform the inhabitants of Perel and surrounding areas that from June 10 onwards, the Luxembourg Red Cross, in agreement with the municipality of Perel, will open an infant dispensary for children up to 2 years old.

translation.lb: Den dispensaire ass eng plàz, wo' d'mamm regelme'sseg d'gewîcht an d'entwecklong vun hirem kendchen kontrole'ere lôsse kann.
translation.en: The dispensary is a place where the mother can regularly have her child's weight and development monitored.

translation.lb: D'consultatio'nen sollen de mammen hëlleien, e gesonden a stärke bébé ze zillen, an no me'glechkét krankhéten, besonncsch ernährongsstörongeu a rachitis (englesch k renkt), vermeiden.
translation.en: The consultations aim to help mothers raise a healthy and strong baby and to possibly prevent illnesses, especially nutritional disorders and rickets (known as English disease).

translation.lb: Den dispensaire get vun engem docter a vun enger infirmière-visiteuse gelét.
translation.en: The dispensary is run by a doctor and a visiting nurse.

translation.lb: En ass net do fir krank kanner; de' musse vun hirem hausdocter ënnersicht a behandelt gin.
translation.en: It is not for sick children; they must be examined and treated by their family doctor.

translation.lb: Spriéchstonnen gin ofgehâlen an der neier scho'l vu Perel, den 1. an den 3. dënschdeg am ino'nt.
translation.en: Consultation hours are held at the new school in Perel, on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of the month.

translation.lb: Ail mamm ass frëndlechst agelueden matt hirem kendehen an d'consuP&tio'n ze kommen.
translation.en: All mothers are cordially invited to come with their child to the consultation.

translation.lb: De' 1. spiiéchstonn ass en dënschdeg, den 10 juni 1947.
translation.en: The first consultation is on Tuesday, June 10, 1947.

translation.lb: Vauban An fier geschieht vun der festong Letzeburg get cm mer an emnier e numm ernimmt: Vauban, franse'sche festongsbauer.
translation.en: Vauban A significant contribution to the fortress of Luxembourg is mentioned: Vauban, French fortress architect.

translation.lb: De franse'sche kinnek Louis XIV. huet d'festong Lelzeburg ah ganz wichlege slrategesche ponkt, als prëiizîestong'.
translation.en: The French king Louis XIV. considered the fortress of Luxembourg a very important strategic point and referred to it as a principal stronghold.

translation.lb: Nodém de inarschall de Créqui 3 moil vrun der icslong' gestanen an d'iand ronderem och ganz vun de Franso'se bçsat \vor, huet de Vauban de' drëtte ke'er eng regelrecht belagerong gelét bei dèr et um enn, 110 schreckleche bombardementer- a schwe'ere kämpf, schie'sslech zur capitulatio n ko'm: de 4. juni 1684.
translation.en: After Marshal de Créqui had stood before the fortress 3 times and the land around was completely occupied by the French, Vauban laid siege to it for the third time, which finally led after terrible bombardments and heavy fighting to its capitulation on June 4, 1684.

translation.lb: Am selwechte joer huet de Vauban dun den ordre kritt, d'festong z'erneieren.
translation.en: In the same year, Vauban received the order to refurbish the fortress.

translation.lb: VVe' gro'ss seng arbechte woren, get nach haut erzielt an d'iwerfeschter gewisen Letzeburg go f de' bedeitendst franse'sc h feslong, 110 arbechten, de' 13 joer gedauert haten, tëscht der Maas an dem Rhein.
translation.en: How extensive his works were is still told today, and the superiors showed that Luxembourg was the most important French fortress, with work that lasted 13 years, between the Meuse and the Rhine.

translation.lb: Letzeburg get Gro’ssherzogtum
translation.en: Luxembourg becomes a Grand Duchy

translation.lb: No der défaile vum késer Napoléon bei Leipzig hun sech d'gro'ssmuechlcn zu Wien zesummefond fir iwer d'zo'kënfteg llännergestallong ze delibere'eren.
translation.en: After the defeat of Emperor Napoleon at Leipzig, the great powers gathered in Vienna to deliberate on the future territorial arrangements.

translation.lb: An desem vertrag ass Lclzeburg ganz schlecht ewechkomm, dodurch datt zwé liebhaber do woren: Holland a Preisen.
translation.en: In this treaty, Luxembourg was very poorly treated because there were two suitors: Holland and Prussia.

translation.lb: Fir se dun allen zwc'n zefriddenzesteilen go'w gedélt, au dat zerstéckelt Lelzeburg ko'm als Gro'ssherzogtum a Personalunion matt Holland.
translation.en: To satisfy them both, the divided Luxembourg came as a Grand Duchy in personal union with Holland.

translation.lb: Datt dat ower keng personalunio'u wor, beweist de' spe'der belsch revolutio'n, an ere'scht de Wëllem 11.
translation.en: That it was not a personal union is proven later by the Belgian revolution, and only afterwards Wilhelm II.

translation.lb: Franz Neumann président vun der sozialdemokratescher partei vu Berlin, huet an der franse'scher zon eng riéd gehalen, an dèr hién e. a. erklärt huet: Mir sin net ge'nt d'Sowjetunio'u, ower mir sin ge'nt de Kommunismus.
translation.en: Franz Neumann, president of the Social Democratic Party of Berlin, gave a speech in the French zone, in which he stated among other things: We are not against the Soviet Union, but we are against communism.

translation.lb: An den 12 joer vum Hitler-regim sin d'Berliner nel ge'gner vun der diclatur gin, dach go'wen se et an den 12 me'nt, de' no der Hitlerdictatur komm sin.
translation.en: In the 12 years of the Hitler regime, the Berliners did not become opponents of the dictatorship, but they did in the 12 months that followed the Hitler dictatorship.

translation.lb: Op de' 110 russesch zon uspillend, sot de Neumann: ü'grenzen vun der demokratescher freihét si knapps 100 meter vun desem sali eweg.
translation.en: Referring to the Russian zone 110, Neumann said: The boundaries of democratic freedom are barely 100 meters away from this hall.

translation.lb: D'verfolgongen an der östlecher zon vun Deitschlaud si me' schlemm we' jé an d'K.Z. sin do me' gro'ss we' an de joren 1033-1945.
translation.en: The persecutions in the eastern zone of Germany are worse than ever, and the concentration camps there are larger than in the years 1933-1945.

translation.lb: .De riédner liuet da ge'ut de' „stänneg aschränkongen vun den democratesche rechter durch d'AHie'ert" proteste'ert an huet als beispill eng Ordonnanz vun der kommandantur ernimmt, d'wahl vum neie Berliner burgerniéschter, dem allie'erte coutrohrot zur genehmegong virzeléen.
translation.en: The speaker then protested against the "constant restrictions on democratic rights by the Allies" and cited as an example an ordinance from the command corps requiring the election of the new Berlin mayor to be submitted to the allied control council for approval.

translation.lb: Zum schluss huet de Neumann sech un d'vertriéder vun de fraiise'scheu autorite'ten matt de wirder gerlcht: Als träger vum gedanke vun der franse'scher revolutio'n an der menschhét, de' och d'idealer vun der sozialdemocralescher partei duerstellen, sollte Frankreich an Deitschland seit u seit marsche'eren.
translation.en: In conclusion, Neumann addressed the representatives of the French authorities with the words: As bearers of the ideas of the French Revolution and humanity, which also embody the ideals of the Social Democratic Party, France and Germany should march side by side.

translation.lb: An desem fall war et mir net bâng em d'zo'konft vun Deitschlaud.
translation.en: In this case, I would not fear for the future of Germany.

translation.lb: De wirtschat'tleche misère ge'f dat an Europa beweisen, grad we' de politesche chaos.
translation.en: The economic misery in Europe would prove that, just like the political chaos.

translation.lb: Tribune libre Ech hätt gèren e puer frôe vun der kommunistescher partei beäntwert:
translation.en: Free Tribune I would like to answer a few questions from the communist party:

translation.lb: 1) Fir wât go'f de genösse Fonck vu Uëmeleng no 3 wochen aus der haft entlôss?
translation.en: 1) Why was comrade Fonck from Uëmeleng released from custody after 3 weeks?

translation.lb: 2) Ass et eng provisoresch oder définitiv haftentlôssong?
translation.en: 2) Is it a provisional or definitive release from custody?

translation.lb: Well bei der verhaftong vum genösse Fonck d'konnnunistesch zeidong „eine baldmöglichste Aufklärung" an deser affaire annonce'ert huet de' bis haut nach net erfollegt ass froenech:
translation.en: Since during the arrest of comrade Fonck the communist newspaper announced "as soon as possible clarification" in this affair that until today has not yet happened, I ask:

translation.lb: 3) Huet dé genösse Fonck matt der iestapo geschafft?
translation.en: 3) Did comrade Fonck work with the Gestapo?

translation.lb: 4) Huet hién vun hir 300—400 RM. Entgeld" pro mo'nt kritt?
translation.en: 4) Did he receive from them 300—400 RM remuneration per month?

translation.lb: Op de' zwo' lescht froen hätt ech èren eng klipp a kloer äntwert: jo der nén.
translation.en: On the last two questions, I would like a straight and clear answer: yes or no.

translation.lb: Falls d'kommunistesch zeilong et virzitt, de' s. z. annonce'ert .Aufklärung" an enger vuu hire nèxte nummeren ze brengen.
translation.en: If the communist newspaper prefers to bring the so-called announced clarification in one of its next issues.

translation.lb: verzichten ech op d'beäntwertong vun de froen 3 a 4.
translation.en: I will refrain from answering questions 3 and 4.

translation.lb: Madame A. H. F. vun lechternach...
translation.en: Madame A. H. F. from Echternach...

translation.lb: Le'w madame, Dir musst entschëllegeu, wann ech léch e we'neg onverschimmt lang op eng äntwert würde gelôss hun.
translation.en: Dear madame, you must excuse me if I have left you waiting somewhat rudely long for an answer.

translation.lb: Mir hun de moment vill ze dun, wat sech net opschuppe le'sst, an da muss alt e bre'w warden, eso' le'w we' en och ass.
translation.en: We currently have a lot to do, which cannot be postponed, and then a letter must wait, no matter how dear it may be.

translation.lb: Et ass ganz gentil vun léch, datt Dir e frame'scht kand bei léch ophuele wëllt.
translation.en: It is very kind of you to be willing to take in a foreign child.

translation.lb: Mir sin iwerzégt, datt dat klengt eng wonnerbar vakanz viru sech huet an datt et vleicht so'guer e we'neg zevill verwinnt get.
translation.en: We are convinced that the little one has a wonderful vacation ahead and may even become a bit spoilt.

translation.lb: Wat mengt Dir dozo'?
translation.en: What do you think about that?

translation.lb: Mir hun envisage'ert, d'kanner matt caren an de' respectiv uertschaften ze fe'eren.
translation.en: We have planned to transport the children with carriages to the respective places.

translation.lb: Dat schéngt ons de* einfachst le'song, well d'leidd sech net ze déplace'ere brauchen a well et sécher ass, datt se nach all déselwechten owend an hir familje kommen.
translation.en: That seems to be the easiest solution for us, because people do not need to travel, and it is certain that they will return to their families on the same evening.

translation.lb: De convoi kënnt jo aller warscheinlechkét no den 9. juli hei un.
translation.en: The convoy will most likely arrive here after July 9th.

translation.lb: Mir verstännegen d'leidd ower nach all schrëftlech.
translation.en: We will, however, still inform everyone in writing.

translation.lb: Fir haut dann awuar, le'w madame a vill-villmols merci.
translation.en: For now then, dear madame, and many, many thanks.

translation.lb: Oh, Johnnie..... Du klengt geckegt médchen!
translation.en: Oh, Johnnie..... You little silly girl!

translation.lb: erlabt mir den ausdrock, mé et ass dén énzegen dé passt.
translation.en: Allow me the expression, but it's the only one that fits.

translation.lb: Kuckt iéch nërnmen dat „Johnnie" un, dat sét genug.
translation.en: Just look at that 'Johnnie,' that says enough.

translation.lb: Et frét mech, datts de ower trotz dem äussere schein schéngs verstand ugelioM ze hun.
translation.en: It pleases me that despite the outer appearance, you seem to have shown understanding.

translation.lb: Du muss dach selwer agesin, datt dat dén énzege rfchtege wé wor!
translation.en: You must admit yourself that it was the only right way!

translation.lb: Bass de dann net vill me' zefridden elo?
translation.en: Aren't you much happier now?

translation.lb: Fuer dann och sche'n eso' weider a loss ernol nés vun der he'eren!
translation.en: Then keep on going nicely and let nothing deter you!

translation.lb: Madame X. X. Z. Le'w madame Dir mächt iech d'Liewen emsoss schwe'er.
translation.en: Madame X. X. Z. Why do you unnecessarily complicate your life?

translation.lb: De fall vun dém dir mir an Erem leschte bre'f verziélt hutt, ass guer net eso' tragesch ze huelen.
translation.en: The case you described to me in your last letter should not be taken as tragic at all.

translation.lb: Er duechter ass nach ausser de môsse jonk, si kennt den eigentlécbe sënn vun dém wat si iech verziélt huet net.
translation.en: Her daughter is still unusually young, she does not understand the true meaning of what she told you.

translation.lb: Et bestét net de' gerengsten ursâch fir léch dowe'nt opzerégen.
translation.en: There is not the slightest reason for you to get upset about this.

translation.lb: Gitt hir och keng weider détaillen iwer de problem.
translation.en: Also, do not give her further details about the problem.

translation.lb: Mâchl hir de standponkt ganz le'w a gentil kloer, o'ni ower dofir we'scht matt hir ze sin.
translation.en: Make your position very clear and gentle to her, without being angry with her.

translation.lb: Si hëllt de" rotschlc' garante'ert o'ni weideres vun léch un an domadden ass de fall fir léch a fir si classe'ert.
translation.en: She will definitely take your advice without further ado, and with that, the matter is settled for both you and her.

translation.lb: Also net eso' se'er verzoen.
translation.en: So, do not despair so much.

translation.lb: le'w madame.
translation.en: Dear madame,

translation.lb: Well dir hutt net de' gerengsten ursâch dozo'.
translation.en: Because you have not the slightest reason for it.

translation.lb: Ert Madeleine ass e le'wt, gudd an nach onverduerwent kand.
translation.en: Your Madeleine is a dear, good, and still unspoiled child.

translation.lb: „Epuratio’n“ vum kinnék Léopold Bro'ssel, 20. juni i Renier >
translation.en: "Epuratio'n" of King Leopold Brussels, 20th June in Renier >

translation.lb: De vu m belache kinnék am juli 1940 ageaalen enquêtecommissio'n, dèr hir aufgab et wor, d'polifesèh attitude vuui kinnék I.éopold virun a wiirend dem krich ze pre'fen, luiet bir enquête an engem weissbuch publize'ert.
translation.en: The investigatory commission, established in July 1940 concerning King Leopold's behavior, whose task it was to examine King Leopold's political stance before and during the war, has now published their investigation in a white paper.

translation.lb: U'bchàptongcn, wû'no seeh de kiiuiék Léopold 1940 de Preisen ergin hält, o'ni d'englesch an d't'ranse'sch Allie'ert ze benorichtegen, gi vui\ der enquêtecommissio'n als complet! otiZo'lreffend bezéchent.
translation.en: Allegations that King Leopold in 1940 surrendered to the Germans without informing the English and French Allies are described by the investigatory commission as completely unfounded.

translation.lb: Am weissbuch héscht dt, datt de Leopold am november 1940 den Hitler zu Berchtesgaden opgcsicht liätt, fir zc verbeulteren, dilti repressalien ge'nt d'ltelsch vollck ënnerholl ge'we gin, Well eso' vergellongsmcsüren wore fir de lall vu sengor «cigerong ugedroht gin.
translation.en: The white paper states that Leopold met with Hitler in Berchtesgaden in November 1940 to prevent repressive measures against the Belgian people, as such retaliatory actions were threatened in response to his government.

translation.lb: Leopold hflt sech virdrun '2 mol geweigert mam Hitler zesuinmenzekomiueii.
translation.en: Leopold had previously refused twice to meet with Hitler.

translation.lb: Iwer <len zwéte mariage vum kinnék matt Marie Lilian Bacls den 11. sept. 1041 sét de rapport, de mariage liiitt keng politesch folge kennen hun, well d'fra vum kinnék net kinnegin könnt gin an d'kanncr vnn deser fra keng anspréch op den tro'n baten.
translation.en: Regarding the second marriage of the king with Marie Lilian Baels on 11th September 1941, the report states that the marriage would have no political consequences because the king's wife could not become queen, and the children from this wife would have no claim to the throne.

translation.lb: Zënler senger libération aus preisescher gefAngenschaft am joer 194 à liiill rie kinnék Leopold arn exil geliewt.
translation.en: Since his liberation from German captivity in the year 1945, King Leopold has lived in exile.

translation.lb: D'coinmissio'n weist d'behaptong, wo'no et secli bei seiiger deporte'erong no Deilschland am joer 194 als eng vun de Preise virberét komödie gehandelt hätl. als verlenmdong zréck.
translation.en: The commission rejects the claim that his deportation to Germany in the year 1944 was staged as a German-prepared comedy as slander.

translation.lb: No senger capitulatio'n hält sech de kinnék Leopold geweigert, d'hnltong vun der beischer regirong, de" déinois am Prunkreich wor a versieht huet, malt de Preisen e l'riddensverlrag ofzeschle'ssen, ze beilegen.
translation.en: After his capitulation, King Leopold refused to approve the actions of the Belgian government, which at that time was in France and attempting to negotiate a peace treaty with the Germans.

translation.lb: Wärend der occupatio'!! hätl de kinnék d'attitude vu gewësse politiker an hc'ge fonctionnairen ol'gelént, de »■- wënscht hnn, zu Bre'ssel eng nei regirong ze forme'eren, de' d bclsch regirong zu London ersetze sollt.
translation.en: During the occupation, the king rejected the behavior of certain politicians and high officials who wished him to form a new government in Brussels to replace the Belgian government in London.

translation.lb: De Walter Pidgeon als tennisman.
translation.en: Walter Pidgeon as a tennis player.

translation.lb: Zënter datt de Pidgeon professionnellen classe'ert ass, médit den tennis em allerhand suergèn.
translation.en: Since Pidgeon was classified as a professional, tennis has been causing all sorts of worries for him.

translation.lb: Op engem iéssen beim Deborali Kerr, dem Pidgeon senger partenaire aus „IF WINTER COMES", so'tz de Pidgeon vis-à-vis vun enger flotter Engliinnerin.
translation.en: At a dinner with Deborah Kerr, Pidgeon's partner from 'IF WINTER COMES', Pidgeon sat across from a charming Englishwoman.

translation.lb: Et vor e le'ft, schlankt médehen an et huet de Walter gebiéden, dadi eng party tennis matt em ze mächen.
translation.en: She was a lively, slender girl and she asked Walter to play a game of tennis with her.

translation.lb: „Sécher, gèren, sot ons vedette."
translation.en: "Sure, gladly," said our star.

translation.lb: „Ech fèrten nëmmen, datt ecli net un iéch eru kommen, huet dat klengt médehen lamente'ert."
translation.en: "I only fear that I won't match up to you," the little girl lamented.

translation.lb: „Keng angscht" huet de Pidgeon se getre'scht, mir spille jo och nëmmeri."
translation.en: "Don't worry," Pidgeon reassured her, "we're just playing for fun."

translation.lb: „Oh, dir sidd gentil, sot d'joffer,,,de' loscht woeh huet d'Helèn mecli 7—5 geschloen".
translation.en: "Oh, you are kind," said the lady, "the other day, Helen only barely won 7-5."

translation.lb: „Dat gét jo nach", äntwert de Pidgeon.
translation.en: "That's not too bad," replied Pidgeon.

translation.lb: ,,Mé wiéli ass dann dat Helèn?"
translation.en: "But who exactly is this Helen?"

translation.lb: „0, dir kennt et sécher, d'Helene Wille, d'tennischampionne!"
translation.en: "Oh, you surely know her, Helene Wille, the tennis champion!"

translation.lb: Eng perfect koppel.
translation.en: A perfect couple.

translation.lb: An..IF WINTER COMES" sëtzl eng bestuete koppel beim dësch z'iéssen.
translation.en: In 'IF WINTER COMES' a married couple sits at the table to eat.

translation.lb: De Walter Pidgeon an d'Angela Lansburv siii de. manu an d'fra.
translation.en: Walter Pidgeon and Angela Lansbury are the man and the woman.

translation.lb: de' zesuvnmen iéssen an d'discussio'n gét iwert hireii dialogue bei dësch an iwert hir hallong.
translation.en: They eat together and the discussion is about their dialogue at the table and about their conduct.

translation.lb: „Glèwl dir dacli ni, datt eng bestuete koppel seeli eso' bebuele ge'w", granzt d'Angela de Walter un.
translation.en: 'Do you not think that a married couple rarely argues like this?' grumbles Angela to Walter.

translation.lb: ..Verziélt dir mer ower net, we' bestuete leidd secb behuelen, baupst den Pidgeon, „elo sin ech 20 joer ënnert der liauf."
translation.en: 'Don't tell me how married people behave,' retorts Pidgeon, 'I've been in the harness for 20 years now.'

translation.lb: ..Dat gét ganz fein eso'," i'irt de metteur en scène dertësclient.
translation.en: 'That's going quite well,' interrupts the director.

translation.lb: „Fuert ro'eg virun eso' ze slreiden. dir sidd wierklech d'idéal vun enger koppel beim iéssen."
translation.en: 'Keep arguing like that. You really are the ideal couple at dinner.'

translation.lb: Hién cjre't dann de réck a grommelt tir secli: „Meng fra an eeh traine'eren dat schon 20 joer."
translation.en: He turns his back and mumbles to himself: 'My wife and I have been practicing that for 20 years.'

translation.lb: Dem Walter Pidgeon seng mattant ass net impressione ’ ert.
translation.en: Walter Pidgeon's aunt is not impressed.

translation.lb: Et get eng fra, de' de Walter Pidgeon net impressione'ere kann: Et ass seng tata Nan, 9J joer AI.
translation.en: There is a woman that Walter Pidgeon cannot impress: It is his Aunt Nan, who is 91 years old.

translation.lb: De Pidgeon liuet dem Deborah Kerr e message gewisen, den «'seilten, dén e seit joeren vun der mattant krnt.
translation.en: Pidgeon showed Deborah Kerr a message that has been seldom seen for years from the aunt.

translation.en: Aunt Nan is a retired lady.

translation.en: She lives together with Walter's mother in Canada.

translation.en: Aunt Pidgeon herself is 88 years old.

translation.lb: D'le'erin huet hirem neveu ni verzien, datt hién acteur goNv.
translation.en: The lady never forgave her nephew for becoming an actor.

translation.lb: Si wollt émaner e respectabele mann aus ein mächen, en douter oder e jurisl.
translation.en: She wanted to make him a respectable man, a doctor or a lawyer.

translation.en: Yet recently she accidentally came across a newspaper article that praised well-dressed men from America.

translation.lb: Als e'schte ko'm de Mr. Conant, Recteur vun der Universite't vun Haward.
translation.en: The first one was Mr. Conant, rector of Harvard University.

translation.lb: Den zwétc wor de Walter Pidgeon.
translation.en: The second was Walter Pidgeon.

translation.lb: „Mei le'wen neveu', huet duerop d'tata ISan gescluiwen.
translation.en: "My dear nephew," wrote Aunt Nan in response.

translation.lb: „Ech si glécklech, nach erliéwen ze kennen, ivc's du en rapport matt engem intellectuelleri bruecht gëss.
translation.en: "I am happy to still witness that you have been associated with an intellectual."

translation.en: Many thanks for the tailors! * * "

translation.lb: Jeanne de Paris.
translation.en: Jeanne de Paris.

translation.lb: En inlialtle.ch a këhschlerech wertvolle film aus der franse'scher résistenz, dén 011 s beweist, dalt se'er vill leidd zu gro'ssem affer berét sin, wann et secli em én idealen zweck handelt.
translation.en: A content-rich and artistically valuable film from the French resistance, which proves that many are prepared for great sacrifice when it comes to an ideal purpose.

translation.lb: Et ass gleich zeiteg é beweis, datt wann et oft schro an der weit liirgét, dat net eso' vill d'schold vun engem vollek ass, mais d'schold vun ail dénen „autorite'ten", de' d'vollek léden.
translation.en: It is at the same time proof that when things often go wrong in the world, it is not so much the fault of the people, but the fault of all those 'authorities' who lead the people.

translation.lb: Attentat op engleschen attaché zu Lissabon

translation.en: As reported by the English embassy in Lisbon, an assassination attempt was made on March 12th against the naval attaché, Commander J. W. McLelland.

translation.en: At the same moment, a car that was driving in front of him slowed down suddenly.

translation.lb: a we' se ge'nt oné woren, huet de Chauffeur vun dém won e puer mol op de McLelland geschoss, o ui en ower ze geroden.
translation.en: And while they were next to each other, the driver of that car shot several times at McLelland, who managed to escape.

translation.en: However, McLelland managed to keep control of his car — and so nothing happened.

translation.lb: Während der nueclit vun e mëttwoch op eu donneschdeg go' wen hei an Dideleng nés eng ganz partie heiser matt hackekreizer beschmirt.
translation.en: During the night from Wednesday to Thursday, a number of houses here in Dudelange were smeared with swastikas again.

translation.en: Every decent person condemns these methods.

translation.lb: Wie sin nun ower des nuetsschmirerten a wat bezwecken si"?
translation.en: But who are these nighttime smearers and what are they aiming for?
